input: name: peanut butter coconut bars ; ingredients: butter, sugar, smooth peanut butter, eggs, vanilla, salt, all-purpose flour, sweetened flaked coconut, salted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies. ; name: caramel bars ; ingredients: flour, oatmeal, butter, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, caramels, chocolate chips, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool. ; name: chocolate chip coconut bar ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, salt, baking soda, flour, oatmeal, vanilla, coconut, chocolate chips ; preparation:Beat eggs and brown sugar until fluffy. Add salt, baking soda, vanilla and coconut. Beat in flour and oatmeal. Spread into a greased 8 in pan. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Bake 350 for 20 minutes. Careful not to overcook. ; name: coconut protein bars ; ingredients: sweetened flaked coconut, quick oats, whey protein powder, skim milk, fat-free sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Spread half of mixture evenly in bottom of pan. Add layer of coconut. Spread 2nd half of mixture over coconut layer. Place in fridge overnight and cut into 8 individual squares. ; name: date and nut bars ; ingredients: egg, sugar, nuts, dates, milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Beat egg. Add sugar and remaining ingredients. Stir well. Bake at 350 in a greased 7x11 shallow pan for 30-40 minutes. When cool, cut into bars. Sprinkled with powdered sugar if desired. ; name: favorite chocolate chip and fruit bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, raisins, dates, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars. ; name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: mocha almond bars ; ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, egg, instant coffee granules, sliced almonds, powdered sugar, almond extract, milk ; preparation:

name: bacon stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Clean mushrooms with cool water. Remove stems from mushrooms and chop. Cook onions and chopped mushroom stems in butter until tender. Add bread crumbs. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and cheese. Mound filling into mushroom caps. Place in shallow baking pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted. Serve warm. ; name: garlic and mushroom burgers ; ingredients: field mushrooms, sunflower oil, gruyere, garlic clove, butter, hamburger buns, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven. ; name: tasty sausage patties ; ingredients: sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme, sage, flour, parsley ; preparation:Pre-heat grill. Finely dice the spring onions. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, ground beef, pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes. ; name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: bacon stuffed burgers ; ingredients: bacon, onion, mushroom pieces, lean ground beef, ground pork, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder, steak sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Cook bacon until nice crisp. Remove bacon and keep 2 tablespoons of fat drippings. Saute onions in drippings. Crumble bacon with mushrooms add to skillet and set aside. Combine beef, pork, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and steak sauce. Shape into 16 patties. Divide bacon mixture and place over eight of the patties. Place remaining patties on top and press edges to seal. Fry patties until done. Check for doneness. ; name: sausage hamburger dip ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, lean ground beef, hot salsa, cream of mushroom soup, tomatoes and green chilies, garlic powder, oregano, processed cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown, cook sausage and ground beef for 15 minutes and drain. Place in a 4-5 quart slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. Add salsa, mushroom soup, tomatoes, green chilies, garlic powder, and oregeno and stir well. Fold into cheese. Cover and cook on low for 1 hour or until cheese melts. Stir once during cooking. Serve from cooker. ; name: cream cheese and bacon stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: bacon, cream cheese, onion, worcestershire sauce, fresh white mushroom ; preparation:Dice bacon and fry until very crisp. Drain on paper towel. Mix onion and worcestershire sauce with softened cream cheese. Add bacon. Mix well. Clean and remove stems from mushrooms. Fill mushroom caps with cream cheese mixture. Mushrooms can be refrigerated at this point, if made in advance. Bake in preheated oven, 375f for 13 to 15 minutes, or until tops are lightly golden. Watch carefully the last few minutes. ; name: mushroom sausage stuffing ; ingredients: bread cubes, sausage, mushrooms, celery, onion, butter, chicken broth, salt, black pepper, sage ; preparation:

name: simple stove top stuffing ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, parsley flakes, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, stale bread, chicken broth ; preparation:In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until fragrant. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven. ; name: leftover turkey casserole ; ingredients: prepared stuffing, sour cream, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, dry onion soup mix, french style green beans, sliced mushrooms, turkey meat ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Stir together sour cream, condensed soups, and dry onion soup mix in a mixing bowl. Spread the turkey in the bottom of a buttered 9x13-inch casserole dish. Top with green beans and mushrooms. Spread the soup over the meat and vegetable mixture. Crumble the stuffing and spread evenly over the top. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. ; name: turkey chile casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, diced green chilies, onion, cream of chicken soup, corn tortillas, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: ground beef stuffing casserole ; ingredients: onion, celery, poultry seasoning, dry bread, cream of mushroom soup, milk, ground beef, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Mix onion, celery, poultry seasoning and bread cubes. Add one can of the soup and the milk. Set aside. In a large bowl mix the ground beef and the mustard and worcestershire. Add the bread mixture. Mix thoroughly. Spread into a 9x13 pan. Spread the other can of cream of mushroom soup over the top. Bake at 375 for about 1 hour. If this starts to get brown on top or looks too dry, cover with foil. ; name: turkish beef casserole ; ingredients: lean beef, yellow onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, beef stock, ground thyme ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add beef cubes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cut tomatoes into small pieces, add to suacepan and cook for about 5 minutes. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: garlic and ranch turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, ranch dressing mix, egg, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Knead together the turkey, ranch mix, egg, garlic, worcestershire sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper in a bowl until evenly combined. Divide into 4 equal portions and form into patties. Cook on the preheated grill about 5 minutes per side for well done. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 165 degrees f. ; name: turkey and stuffing ring ; ingredients: dry bread cubes, cooked turkey, swiss cheese, dry onion, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning ; preparation:

name: lemon spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, parmesan cheese, fresh lemon juice, salt, pepper, lemon zest, fresh basil ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling, salted water according to package directions stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk the olive oil, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a large bowl. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Toss the pasta with the lemon sauce, and add the reserved cooking liquid and toss again. Season with the salt & pepper. Garnish with lemon zest and chopped basil. ; name: chilli chicken with pasta ; ingredients: chicken breasts, peanut oil, garlic cloves, cracked pepper, fresh basil, red chilies, chives, penne, crushed tomatoes, parsley ; preparation:Bring water to boil in saucepan and add penne. Cook for 12 minutes. Heat oil in wok. Cook chicken in batches until lightly browned. Return chicken to wok. Stir in garlic, chilli, chives, tomatoes and cracked pepper. Bring to boil and reduce heat and simmer until sauce begins to thicken. Stir in basil and simmer until thickened. Stir in parsley. Serve over penne. Sprinkle with fresh parmesan cheese if desired. ; name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired. ; name: asian carrot and cabbage noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, peanut oil, garlic, red onion, brown sugar, green cabbage, carrot, chili sauce, soy sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add garlic. Stir fry 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes or until onion softens. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes. ; name: baked vegetarian chili spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, fat free spaghetti sauce, vegetarian chili, mushrooms, chili powder, garlic powder, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, onion ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Drain. While pasta cooks, mix sauce and next 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes. Coat a 13 x 9 baking dish with spray. Add pasta and top with sauce. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Top with onions if desired. ; name: lemon basil spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti noodles, olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Boil water and cook noodles 8-10 minutes. While the pasta is cooking, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and basil. Mix well. Once the pasta is cooked, drain and separate between two plates. Add the olive oil and lemon mixture and serve. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: peanut szechuan pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti, broccoli florets, chunky peanut butter, vegetable stock, soy sauce, seasoned rice vinegar, oil, garlic cloves, dry crushed red pepper ; preparation:

name: yummy low fat mac and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, low fat cottage cheese, butter, garlic, low-fat cheddar cheese, spinach, sriracha sauce, salt, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except water in oven proof 2 quart casserole dish. Mix well. Pour boiling water over mixed ingredients. Bake at 350f for an hour. Allow to sit for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: beefy barbecue macaroni ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, elbow macaroni, barbecue sauce, pepper, milk, butter, cheddar cheese, cheese ; preparation:In a skillet brown beef with onions and garlic until no longer pink. Drain. Add macaroni, bbq sauce and pepper. Mix well. In a saucepan, heat milk and butter until butter is melted. Stir in cheese until melted. Pour over the macaroni mixture and mix gently. Sprinkle with additional cheese. ; name: old school mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, american cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top. ; name: nacho ordinary macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, taco seasoning, salsa, green onion ; preparation:Cook macaroni in boiling water for 9 minutes. Drain and return to pan. Add cheese and taco seasoning, stirring until cheese melts. Stir in salsa. Sprinkle with green onions. ; name: spicy macaroni cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, mexican blend cheese, milk, eggs, black pepper, green chilies, corn chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray. Cook the macaroni according to package directions. Drain and place in a large bowl. Add the remaining ingredents except for the corn chips. Mix well then pour into a casserol dish and sprinkle with corn chips bake for 30-35 minutes, or until hot and bubbly, and the top is golden. ; name: macaroni and beef casserole ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, lean ground beef, italian-style stewed tomatoes, dried oregano leaves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: vegan macaroni and yeast ; ingredients: small elbow macaroni, vegan mayonnaise, nutritional yeast, non-dairy milk substitute, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: hearty vegetable and sausage bake ; ingredients: new potato, sweet onion, smoked sausage, baby carrots, salt, pepper, margarine, garlic powder, dried thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f and spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Combine all ingredients except smoked sausage in a large zipper type plastic bag, mixing well. Place ingredients from bag into prepared pan, bake uncovered for 30 minutes. Add sausage to vegetables mixing well. Bake for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden browned. ; name: potato and sausage hotpot ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, sausage, floury potatoes, dijon mustard, hot chicken stock, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large frying pan with a lid and fry the onion and sausages until starting to brown. Add the potato slices and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden. Season with salt and pepper. Add the mustard, if using, to the stock, then pour into the pan. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and cook for 10 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Preheat the grill to medium. Scatter the cheese over the top of the potatoes and put the pan under the grill for 5 minutes until the cheese is bubbling and golden. Serve with steamed vegetables. ; name: roasted sausages peppers potatoes and onions ; ingredients: potato, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, italian pork sausage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: sausage vegetable packets ; ingredients: smoked sausage, zucchini, tomatoes, green bell pepper, butter, onion soup mix, brown sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add all the ingredients to a big mixing bowl. Stir to mix well. Spoon mixture evenly onto 2 pieces of double layered heavy duty foil that measure 12x12 inches. Fold foil around mixture to form a packet. Seal tightly and allow room for circulation of heat. Place packets on the grill over medium heat. Cover and grill for 25-30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: end of the week sausage casserole ; ingredients: bulk sausage, onion, green pepper, zucchini, egg noodles, baby carrots, molasses, catsup, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Cook sausage, onion and green pepper in skillet until cooked and sausage is brown. While sausage is cooking cook the package of egg noodles with carrots for 10 minutes, following package directions. Drain well. Combine noodles, carrots and sausage mixture in 2 quart casserole dish. Combine molasses, catsup and worcestershire sauce in measuring cup and pour over noodles and sausage. Mix in well. Cook at 350f for 30 minutes or until hot. ; name: country style breakfast sausage ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, turkey breast, sage, sugar, dry mustard, onion powder, pepper, vegetable oil cooking spray ; preparation:Mix meat and seasonings together. Shape into 12 patties. Spray skillet with non-stick spray. Brown patties on each side. Add a few tablespoons water to pan, cover to reserve moisture, and cook till done. ; name: sausage vegetable casserole ; ingredients: sausages, onion, bacon, french onion soup mix, water, frozen mixed vegetables, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: shrimp caesar sandwich ; ingredients: french bread, extra virgin olive oil, shrimp, salt and pepper, romaine lettuce, caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Slice bread in half long ways and lightly butter center. Heat in 350f oven for 10 minutes. While bread warms, heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and saut briskly, cooking through, for approximately 4-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. In a bowl, toss lettuce with dressing. To assemble sandwich, place cooked shrimp on one half of toasted bread, then top with dressed lettuce and grated parmesan cheese. Top with other half of bread and slice into 4 to 6 portions. ; name: sunshine sandwich ; ingredients: bread, egg, orange marmalade, butter ; preparation:Toast the bread in toaster. In a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat, melt the butter. Carefully break egg into the skillet. Fry egg to desired doneness. Spread marmalade over slices of toast. Place one slice bread, marmalade side up, on a dish. Add the egg. Place second slice of bread over the egg, marmalade side down. ; name: tuna fish junk ; ingredients: butter, onions, celery, bisquick, salt, milk, tuna ; preparation:Saut onion and celery in butter. Remove from heat. Blend in bisquick and salt. Add milk. Cook and stir until thick. Blend in tuna and heat through. ; name: hot jam sandwich ; ingredients: egg, caster sugar, vanilla essence, white bread, jam, unsalted butter ; preparation:Lightly beat together the egg, caster sugar and vanilla essence in a shallow dish and set aside. Spread the jam on to one slice of the bread and then place the other slice on top, pressing together firmly. Melt the butter in a large skillet over a medium-low heat. Soak the sandwich in the egg mixture until all of the egg has been absorbed. Fry in the butter for 1-2 minutes each side until golden brown. Slice the sandwich in half and sprinkle with the extra caster sugar. You may serve with a scoop of ice cream, yoghurt or a dollop of whipped cream or all by itself. ; name: butterscotch cashew bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, butterscotch chips, sweetened condensed milk, salted cashew halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: seafood bisque ; ingredients: green onion, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, fresh lump crabmeat, shrimp, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the green onions in melted butter until the onions are tender. Add in the flour. Stir until smooth. Cook for 1 minutes stirring constantly. Gradually add in the milk. Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Add in crabmeat and shrimp. Cook and stir over low heat until shrimp turn pink. Add in parsley and stir to combine. Serve. ; name: peanut butter breakfast sandwiches ; ingredients: reduced-fat peanut butter, french bread, honey, bananas, eggs, milk, ground cinnamon, butter, fruit preserves ; preparation:Spread peanut butter evenly onto one side of each slice of bread snd drizzle honey over the peanut butter. Cut each banana in half lengthwise and then cut in half crosswise. Arrange 2 banana pieces on 4 of the prepared bread slices. Top with remaining bread slices, peanut butter-sides down. In a shallow bowl combine eggs, milk, and cinnamon. Carefully dip sandwiches into egg mixture, coating both sides. Melt butter in a large skillet or on a large griddle over medium heat. Cook sandwiches in hot butter about 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan heat fruit preserves over medium-low heat until melted, stirring frequently. To serve, cut warm sandwiches in half crosswise. Drizzle with warm fruit preserves. ; name: goldfish checkerboard sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, crunchy peanut butter, whole wheat bread, grape jelly, goldfish crackers ; preparation:

name: chinese chicken ; ingredients: chicken parts, soya sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic, onion powder, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:Put chicken in roaster. Combine ingredients and pour over. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Baste and cook 30 minutes longer uncovered. ; name: crispy rice chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, egg, water, crispy rice cereal, garlic powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:Beat egg and water in a shallow bowl. Place cereal in another shallow bowl. Mix garlic powder, salt, and pepper with cereal. Dip chicken into egg mixture and roll into crumb mixture. Coat all sides. If freezing, i flash-froze and then packaged up my chicken. If baking now, place on a lined baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: chinese brown sauce chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, soy sauce, brown sugar, chicken broth, cornstarch, broccoli, carrot, peas, cooked rice ; preparation:Lightly brown chicken breasts in a small amount of oil. Remove from pan and add garlic, soy sauce, brown sugar and 1 cup chicken broth. Stir to mix and return chicken to pan and cover. Simmer for a few minutes until the chicken is done. Remove chicken again and add remaining broth, which has been mixed with cornstarch. Bring to a boil to thicken and return chicken to the pan, coating it well. ; name: soy sauce marinated chicken breasts rice cooker ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, sugar, toasted sesame oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, green onion, brown rice, chicken broth, vegetables ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic and ginger with chicken breasts and allow to marinate. Pour rice and broth into rice cooker. Cover with lid and press brown rice setting. Allow to cook for 1 hour. Place chicken breasts and marinade on foil sprayed with nonstick cooking spray, top with slivered onion and make packet. Place vegetables in seperate foil packet. Carefully open lid of cooker and place steam tray into the rice cooker. Place chicken packet in tray. Close the lid and steam for 10 minutes then open lid again and place vegetables in allow to steam till cooker changes to keep warm. Carefully check chicken for doneness and using oven mitts carefully remove steam tray from the rice cooker and serve immediately. ; name: rice cooker chicken wild rice and veggies ; ingredients: wild rice, chicken broth, water, chicken breast, cabbage, green onions, bok choy ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in rice cooker and turn on. Stir occassionally. Cook 30-40 minutes. Add green onion and bok choy towards the end of cook time to prevent overcooking. Rice package says 50 minutes cook time, but i just test the rice for tenderness. ; name: super simple sweet and sour chicken with rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sweet and sour sauce, pineapple tidbits, bell pepper, onion, chicken broth, uncooked rice ; preparation:Place uncooked rice in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Top with uncooked chicken breasts. Drain juice from pineapple into a bowl. Add the sweet and sour sauce and chicken broth. Mix to lightly to blend. Scatter peppers, onions and pineapple chunks over the chicken. Pour sweet and sour mixture over all. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Remove foil in last 15 minutes of cooking. ; name: easy texas rice ; ingredients: white rice, oil, onion, bell pepper, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, chili powder, garlic salt ; preparation:In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. ; name: hawaiian chicken white rice made simple ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, flour, soy sauce, sugar, pineapple chunk, parsley, white rice, parsley sprig ; preparation:

name: white chocolate potato chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, white chocolate chips, flour, baking soda, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cream shortening and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Sift flour and baking soda and stir into creamed mixture. Add crushed potato chips and white chocolate chips. Stir to integrate fully. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto greased cookie shhet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: very chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, margarine, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. First, cream both sugars with the shortening, margarine, eggs, and vanilla. Then, gradually add soda, salt and flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake 8-9 minutes. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: shirley corriher s chocolate chip cookies medium version ; ingredients: cake flour, salt, baking powder, butter, shortening, light brown sugar, corn syrup, egg, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Sift flour, salt and baking powder together. Set aside. Beat butter, shortening and sugar until fluffy. Add corn syrup. Add egg and beat thoroughly. Beat in vanilla. Gradually add dry ingredients and beat on low speed until thoroughly combined. Stir in chips. Drop onto lightly greased cookie sheets and bake at for about 12 minutes, or until edges begin to brown. ; name: kennedy family chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: sunny swizzle non alcoholic ; ingredients: juice, lime juice, fine sugar, orange bitters, club soda, ice ; preparation:Combine the juices, sugar and bitters in a shaker half filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir. Fill with soda. Serve with a swizzle stick. ; name: grapefruit orange medley salad ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, mandarin oranges, grapefruits, green seedless grapes ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: ginger pear martini ; ingredients: vodka, simple syrup, pear liqueur, ice, limes, juice of, pear, superfine sugar ; preparation:Chill four martini glasses. Peel, core and slice the pear. Combine the vodka, syrup, liquer, ice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Dip the rims of the chilled glasses in the sugar. Pour the cocktails and garnish the glasses with pear slices. ; name: persian lemonade ; ingredients: lemons, water, caster sugar, orange blossom water, ice ; preparation:Cut the lemons in half and juice half the lemons. Thinly slice the remaining lemons and place in a heatproof bowl. Combine the lemon juice, water and sugar in a large saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and pour warm juice over the lemon slices. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the fridge for 4 hours to chill and develop the flavours. Stir through the orange blossom water. Divide ice evenly among serving glasses. Pour over the lemonade to serve. ; name: blood orange margaritas ; ingredients: kosher salt, ice, blood orange juice, tequila, triple sec, orange wedge ; preparation:Moisten rim of 2 margarita glasses and dip in kosher salt. Fill a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Add orange juice, tequila, and triple sec. Shake well and strain into glasses. Garnish with orange wedges, if desired. ; name: carrot marmalade ; ingredients: lemon, seville oranges, water, carrots, sugar ; preparation:Wash the lemon and orange and shred them finely. Keep all the seeds from both, and put them in a clean new tea ball, or sew them into a scrap of cheesecloth. Put the canning jars in a large kettle with enough water to come to an inch above the rims. Turn the heat on just after you add the sugar and carrots to the marmalade- jars must be boiled 10 minutes to be sterilized. Put the lemon and orange shreds and juice in a large, broad pot with the water and the seeds, and boil for ten minutes. Wash, peel and grate the carrots. Add the carrots and sugar to the peels. Continue boiling until the marmalade is thick and forms a sheet when poured from the spoon, about 30 minutes longer. Fish out the seeds, draining them well. Seal the marmalade in sterilized jars and process in boiling water for 5 minutes. ; name: quick party pitcher ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, apple juice, ginger ale, ice, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a large pitcher combine limeade and apple juice. Shake vigorously. Add ginger ale. Put ice in glasses, pour in mixture. Top with maraschino cherries. ; name: greyhound in the pink ; ingredients: grapefruit, maraschino cherries, white sugar, lime, vodka, ruby red grapefruit juice, ice ; preparation:

name: ginger glazed almonds with dried fruit ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, fresh ginger, sea salt, ground ginger, blanched almonds, cooking spray, berries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Stir in sugar, water, fresh ginger, salt, and ground ginger. Cook until sugar dissolves. Stir in almonds and remove from heat. Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cooking spray. Spread almonds onto foil, and bake 25 to 35 minutes, stirring once, until almonds are golden. Transfer almonds on foil to a rack and cool completely. Loosen with a spatula and combine with dried fruit. Store mixture airtight for up to 3 days. ; name: peach honey almond omelette ; ingredients: peaches, liquid honey, vanilla extract, eggs, butter, sliced almonds, icing sugar ; preparation:Combine peaches, honey and vanilla in a small bowl and set aside. Whisk eggs in a small bowl. Melt butter in a 15 cm non-stick skillet over medium-high heat and swirl to coat pan. Pour in eggs. As mixture begins to set, lift edges with spatula to allow the uncooked egg to flow underneath. Cook until bottom is set and top is almost set. Spread peaches and almonds over half of the omelette. Fold the other half over the peaches, using the spatula, and tilt the skillet so that the omelette slides out of the pan. Sprinkle with icing sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: almond joy butter ; ingredients: almonds, unsweetened dried shredded coconut, dark chocolate, vanilla extract, sea salt ; preparation:Place almonds on a rimmed baking sheet and bake in a 350 degree oven for 12-15 minutes. Remove and set aside to cool for 5-10 minutes. In the meantime place coconut in a food processor and process until it turns into butter, scraping down sides as needed. Scoop into a dish and set aside. Place cooled almonds in the food processor and process until it turns into butter, scraping down the sides as needed. Then add in the coconut. Process to combine, add sea salt and vanilla and process once more. The mixture will be warm at this point so you can add in the chocolate to let it melt and fully combine, or you can wait until the spread cools to keep a chunkier chocolate texture. Stir chocolate to combine and then place in glass jar or tupperwear for storing. Store at room temperature so it does not solidify. However, if storing for more than 2 weeks, store in the refrigerator and bring to room temperature before use. ; name: orange almond cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, light olive oil, eggs, orange juice, orange zest, sliced almonds ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients with mixer for 3 minutes. Pour batter into greased cake pan. I use a 10 inch diameter silicone cake pan and make it in one layer. Sprinkle top of batter with sliced almonds. Bake at 350 degrees until done, about 40 minutes. ; name: danish apricot filling ; ingredients: dried apricot, water, sugar, lemon juice, almond extract ; preparation:Put apricots, water and sugar into a saucepan. Heat and simmer until apricots are soft, plumped and have absorbed most of the liquid. Puree in food processor, transfer to a bowl and stir in lemon juice and almond extract. Scrape filling into a small container and cool to room temperature. Seal container and chill. Will keep refrigerated for two weeks. ; name: orange iced tea ; ingredients: oranges, boiling water, tea bags, ice cube, honey ; preparation:With a vegetable peeler, peel each orange in a continuous spiral, removing only the outer colored layer of peel. In a large pitcher, pour boiling water over the tea bags and orange peel. Cover and steep 5 minutes. Remove tea bags. Chill tea mixture with peel in a covered container. To serve, remove the peel and pour iced tea over ice cubes in tall glasses. Sweeten to taste with honey. Garnish with orange slices and fresh mint leaves, if desired. ; name: pineapple almond bars ; ingredients: flour, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, butter, almond extract, sliced almonds, pineapple preserves ; preparation:In a processor combine flour, oats, brown sugar. Pulse to blend. Add butter and extract. Pulse until crumbly. Remove half the mixture and stir in almonds. Preheat oven to 350f. Coat a 9-inch square dish with non-stick cooking spray. Add the second half of the mixture to the pan, pressing down. Spread preserves over crust. Sprinkle crumb mixture with almonds on top. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: hot orange almond drink ; ingredients: sugar, water, frozen orange juice, lemon juice, almond flavoring, vanilla, ground cloves, allspice, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: cheesy onion soup ; ingredients: shortening, onions, flour, milk, american cheese, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Melt shortening in a pot and add the onions. Cook till browned. Add flour, stirring constantly. Add milk, stirring constantly. When soup gets hot and thick, add the cheese and stir till cheese is melted and soup is smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Shake paprika on top of soup in bowl and serve. ; name: cheesy onion soup ; ingredients: onions, butter, cayenne pepper, flour, seasoning salt, half-and-half, colby, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, crouton ; preparation:In a large saucepan saute onion and pinch cayenne pepper in butter until the onions are just lightly golden. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Gradually add half and half cream until blended. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Season with ground black pepper to taste. Stir in colby or monterey jack cheese until melted. Ladle into bowls, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and croutons. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: green chili snackers ; ingredients: green chilies, eggs, garlic powder, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spread chilis on bottom of 8x8 baking dish. Mix eggs with garlic powder and pepper. Pour over chilis. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 25 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes, cut into squares. Serve on crackers. ; name: super easy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, salt, unsalted butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, and salt. Heat a skillet over low-medium heat. Melt butter. Then add egg mixture. As eggs cook, slowly but constantly move them around skillet. Cook only until eggs are set, yet still soft and moist--avoid overcooking. Transfer scrambled eggs to a plate and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: bacon spinach and egg scramble ; ingredients: egg, egg whites, fresh spinach, bacon, milk, shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry chopped bacon in a non stick skillet. Beat together egg, egg whites, milk, salt, and pepper. When bacon is almost done, add chopped spinach and saute until just wilted. Add egg mixture and scramble. Top with cheddar cheese. ; name: cheesy scrambled eggs with green onions ; ingredients: eggs, milk, cheddar cheese, green onions, salt, pepper, jalapeno ; preparation:

name: chilled cucumber and red bell soup with a kick ; ingredients: cucumbers, red bell pepper, rice wine vinegar, fat free sour cream, chicken broth, salt, cayenne pepper, ground oregano, ground coriander, ice cubes ; preparation:Chop the cucumber and bell pepper. Add all ingredients to the blender and puree. Add more liquid if needed. Adjust taste to your liking. Store in the fridge until ready to serve or serve right away. ; name: lime and garlic soup ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, lime juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the peanut oil in the bottom of a large, deep saucepan or dutch oven and turn the heat to medium. Add the garlic and stir. Cook, stirring occasionally, just until garlic becomes blond, about 5 minutes. Add the stock and tomatoes and turn the heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring, until the mixture boils, then turn the heat down to medium. Stir in lime juice and salt and pepper. Taste and add more salt, pepper and lime juice to taste. ; name: chilled peach soup with riesling ; ingredients: riesling wine, whole cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaves, brown sugar, peaches, orange, lemon, heavy cream, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine the riesling, cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaves, and brown sugar. Bring to a boil. Add the peaches, reduce heat and let simmer for 20 minutes. Add the orange and lemon slices. Continue cooking for 5 minutes. Remove the cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaves, orange and lemon slices from the soup. Puree the soup in a blender or food processor. Strain. Chill in the refrigerator. When the soup is chilled, add the cream and lemon juice. ; name: healthy pumpkin soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, pumpkin flesh, carrot, fresh rosemary, chicken stock, bay leaves, skim milk powder ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock. ; name: butternut ginger soup ; ingredients: light olive oil, butternut squash, carrots, celery ribs, onion, fresh ginger, vegetable broth, salt ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste. ; name: pumpkin tomato cream soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onion, cooked pumpkin, chicken broth, dry sherry, salt, pepper, dried tarragon, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch tomatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer tomatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter tomatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 4-5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree tomatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: pumpkin cream soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, curry powder, flour, chicken broth, canned pumpkin, brown sugar, nutmeg, salt, milk ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add curry powder and flour. Cook until bubbly. Add other ingredients. Simmer. Garnish with chives or parsley. ; name: chilled berry soup ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, ginger ale, milk, sugar, lemon juice, vanilla extract, sour cream ; preparation:

name: baked fish with orange sauce ; ingredients: white fish fillets, orange juice, butter, orange rind, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish in baking pan. Mix orange juice and butter. Pour half this mixture over the fish. Sprinkle the rind over. Bake for 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange mixture over. Bake another 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: sweet soy glazed salmon ; ingredients: light brown sugar, olive oil, soy sauce, fresh lemon juice, dry white wine, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Mix glaze ingredients together, stirring until dissolved. Marinate fish filets for at least 30 minutes. Arrange salmon, skin-side down, in a baking dish lined with aluminum foil & lightly sprayed with cooking spray. Brush glaze on all sides of fish. Bake approximately 15-20 minutes, basting once with pan sauces. Fish is done when it flakes easily and center is cooked through. ; name: sweet and spicy salmon fillets ; ingredients: pepper jelly, butter, worcestershire sauce, salmon fillets, white onion ; preparation:In a non stick baking dish, dice onion and spread out in bottom of dish. Spray with nonstick cooking oil. Lay fillets on top of onions. In separate sauce pan heat butter, jelly and worchestershire sauce over medium heat until jelly becomes liquid. Spoon over salmon. Bake at 350 f for 40 minutes. ; name: baked hoisin sauce chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, honey, hoisin sauce, warm water, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, scallion, fresh ginger ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Marinate chicken wings for 15 minutes in a mixture of honey, hoisin sauce, water, salt, pepper, garlic, scallion, and ginger. Place chicken wings on a baking pan line with alum foil and bake for 30 minutes, brushing occasionally with marinade. Turn oven to broil and broil chicken wings five more minutes. Turn wings every two minutes to avoid burning. To serve, transfer chicken wings to a serving platter and serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: grilled salmon with mustard orange marinade ; ingredients: dijon mustard, orange juice, scallion, salmon steaks, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill. Stir together mustard, orange juice and scallions in a shallow dish. Add salmon, turn to coat both sides. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in refrigerator for 15 minutes. Oil the grill rack, cook salmon just until it is opaque in the center. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: ana s honey and soy glazed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, glaze, honey, soy sauce, fresh lime juice, dijon mustard, water ; preparation:Mix the glaze ingredients together in a small bowl, and set aside. Heat the olive oil in a small skillet over moderately high heat. Place the salmon fillets in the skillet, and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until. Golden, and just cooked through. Transfer salmon onto plates. Add honey glaze to skillet and simmer, stirring, for 1 minute. Pour the honey-soy glaze over the salmon, and serve. ; name: citrus balsamic glazed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt and pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice, brown sugar, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired. ; name: hoisin salmon ; ingredients: orange juice, hoisin sauce, honey, salmon fillets ; preparation:

name: chicken chorizo skewers ; ingredients: chicken thigh fillets, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground oregano, sweet paprika, lemon juice, brown sugar, chorizo sausages ; preparation:Combine chicken, oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, lemon juice and sugar in a bowl. Place in the fridge for 2 hours to marinate. Evenly thread the chicken, alternating with chorizo, among the skewers. Heat a char-grill pan or barbecue on high. Add the skewers and cook, turning, for 6-8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: pesto chicken grill packets ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt and pepper, pesto sauce, zucchini, plum tomatoes, scallions ; preparation:Preheat a grill to medium. Cut four 12-inch-long sheets of heavy-duty foil. Drizzle 1 teaspoon olive oil into the center of each sheet. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Lay 1 piece of chicken in the center of each sheet and spread 1 tablespoon pesto on top. Mound one-quarter of the zucchini, tomatoes and scallions over each chicken breast. Dollop 3 tablespoons pesto over each mound. Fold the foil over the chicken and vegetables. Pinch the edges to seal. Cover and grill the packets over indirect heat for 25 minutes. Remove from the grill and open carefully. ; name: asian beef skewers ; ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh ginger, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, sirloin tip steak, green onions ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix garlic, ginger, soy sauce, vinegar, oil and sugar. Remove the fat from the steak and cut the meat in dices of 1 inch. Add beef to the marinade and let rest for 10 minutes. On metal skewers or presoaked bamboo skewers, thread beef cubes by alternating with green onion. Set the barbecue to medium high. Brush the beef skewers with the marinade and put on a oiled grill of the barbecue. Close cover and cook about 10 minutes or until beef is grilled but still pink inside. ; name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: grilled meat skewers with bay leaves ; ingredients: pork, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, garlic, bay leaves ; preparation:Prepare the grill for a moderately hot fire and place rack about 4 inches from heat. If using wood skewers, soak in water while you prepare the meat. Toss meat with oil, salt, pepper and garlic. Skewer meat alternately with bay leaves. If leaves break, secure by pressing between meat chunks. Grill meat 2- 5 minutes per side, depending on heat and how well done you like your meat. Remove and serve. ; name: chicken bites with spice ; ingredients: ground chicken, fresh breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c. Place minced chicken, breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger and egg in a food processor and pulse to combine. Divide chicken mixture into 12 equal pieces and with wet hands shape into neat ovals. Place bites on a lightly oiled baking sheet and refrigerate for 10 minutes. Bake chicken bites for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot or cold. ; name: grilled skewered sea scallops ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, olive oil, garlic clove, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, sea scallops, cherry tomatoes, lime ; preparation:Whisk lime juice, oil, garlic, cumin, chili powder, salt, and cayenne together in small bowl. Thread scallops and tomatoes alternately on 4 skewers. Place on platter and drizzle with marinade. Cover and refrigerate, basting once with marinade, about 30 minutes. Prepare charcoal for grilling or heat broiler. Grill or broil skewers, basting with marinade but not turning, just until scallops are cooked through, 5-7 minutes. Place lime wedge on each skewer and serve. ; name: grilled chicken skewers with red pepper pesto ; ingredients: roasted red peppers, fresh cilantro leaves, balsamic vinegar, garlic clove, dry mustard, ground coriander, ground cinnamon, olive oil, whole almond, chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: blue cheese sauce for steaks burgers and chicken ; ingredients: green onion, garlic cloves, butter, flour, milk, blue cheese, white wine, white pepper, pepper sauce ; preparation:In a small saucepan, saute onion and garlic in butter until tender. Sprinkle with flour. Stir until blended. Gradually add milk. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Add blue cheese, wine or chicken broth, white pepper and pepper sauce. Heat through. Serve sauce over meat. ; name: grilled bacon and bleu sandwiches ; ingredients: cream cheese, blue cheese, bacon, italian salad dressing, rye bread ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, blue cheese, bacon and 2 tablespoons italian dressing. Spread cheese mixture evenly onto 4 bread slices. Top with remaining bread. Brush sandwiches on both sides with remaining italian dressing. Grill sandwiches in non-stick skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides and filling is melted. ; name: old south blue cheese dressing or dip ; ingredients: buttermilk, mayonnaise, onion, blue cheese, pimento stuffed olive ; preparation:In food processor, grind onions. Remove. Then grind olives. Return onions to processor and add mayo and buttermilk. Pulse until well blended. Add blue cheese crumbles. Stir. Pour into jar. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to blend flavors before serving. ; name: grilled broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, kosher salt, granulated sugar ; preparation:Cut up broccoli into spearlike pieces. Place in a pyrex dish. Coat broccoli pieces with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Cover dish with foil. Place dish on medium to low heat on grill. Heat for approximately 15 minutes. ; name: grilled corn with citrus butter ; ingredients: orange peel, lemon peel, lime peel, kosher salt, unsalted butter, vegetable oil cooking spray, corn ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in small bowl. Mash to combine. Mix in butter. Preheat barbecue. Spray corn with nonstick spray. Grill until browned in spots, turning often, about 15 minutes. Serve with citrus butter. ; name: grilled chicken and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: cooked chicken, raisins, almonds, celery, mayonnaise, monterey jack cheese, whole wheat bread, butter ; preparation:For the chicken mixture, stir the first five ingredients together. Using half the bread place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread the chicken mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each of the sandwiches, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread the other side with remaining butter and cook for three minutes. ; name: blue cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, milk, butter, salt, pepper, blue cheese ; preparation:Boil potatoes until fork tender, about 20 minutes. Drain. Shake pan over low heat to help dry potatoes. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain. Add milk, mashing until smooth. Add butter, salt, pepper and blue cheese. Mash vigorously until potatoes are light and fluffy. If desired, put small pats of butter on top. ; name: grilled vegetable medley with blue cheese butter ; ingredients: blue cheese, unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper, olive oil, fresh basil, garlic cloves, vegetables ; preparation:

name: slow cooker pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, dry onion soup mix, water, red wine, garlic, soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus. ; name: lemon soy pork tenderloin ; ingredients: soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, lemon juice, ground black pepper, vegetable oil, pork tenderloin ; preparation:In a zip-top plastic bag, combine soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, garlic, lemon juice, pepper and oil. Add pork, and turn to coat evenly. Squeeze out as much air as possible, seal, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. ; name: scrumpied tenderloin of pork ; ingredients: pork fillet, flour, butter, onion, button mushrooms, cider, apple, parsley, pepper, salt ; preparation:Beat the pork slices with a meat mallet and dredge them in flour. Melt the butter in a frying pan and saute the onion for a few minutes. Add the pork and fry quickly on each side, then add the mushrooms, pepper and salt and cook a further minute or two. Pour in the cider and cook for about 30 minutes or until the pork has cooked and the sauce has reduced to a creamy consistency. Place the pork and its sauce on a heat-proof serving dish and lay the apple slices on top. Put the dish under a preheated hot grill for 1 minute to heat and slightly brown the apples. Sprinkle the dish with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: crock pot garlic pork with sweet potatoes ; ingredients: canola oil, boneless pork loin roast, salt, fresh ground black pepper, onion, garlic cloves, poultry seasoning, white wine, sweet potatoes, chicken broth ; preparation:If there is a lot of visible fat on the pork roast, trim it away. In a large, heavy skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Sprinkle salt and pepper on pork roast, then brown roast in hot oil on all sides, for about 10 minutes total time. Remove browned roast to a plate and temporarily set aside. In fat in skillet, saute sliced onion and minced garlic, seasoned with the poultry seasoning, just until onion starts to soften. Place in bottom of slow cooker. Turn heat to high and add white wine to skillet. Scrape up all the bits sticking to skillet, then pour this mixture over the onions in the crock pot. Cover onions with cubed raw sweet potato. Place browned pork roast on top of sweet potato cubes, then pour chicken stock over roast. Cover and cook on low power for for 7 to 8 hours, or until sweet potatoes are tender and pork is cooked. ; name: pork tenderloin napoli ; ingredients: olive oil, pork tenderloin, roma tomatoes, green olives, dry white wine, fresh rosemary, garlic, salt, black pepper, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Heat the oil in an ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Season the meat with salt and pepper and brown the pork on all sides in the skillet. Mix together the tomatoes, olives, wine, rosemary and garlic in a bowl and pour over the pork. Place skillet in the oven and bake for 30 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 160. Remove pork from skillet and cover with foil to keep warm. Place skillet with remaining tomato mixture over medium heat and gradually mix in the cream. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, then reduce heat to low and continue cooking for 5 minutes until thickened. Slice pork and drizzle with the cream sauce to serve. ; name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: island pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, salt, pepper, chili powder, ground cumin, cinnamon, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh garlic, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the spice rub. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes. ; name: roasted pork tenderloin with garlic ; ingredients: pork loin, garlic, salt, pepper, butter, onion, olive oil ; preparation:

name: the best pumpkin pie ever ; ingredients: deep dish pie shells, pumpkin puree, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. In a large bowl combine the pumpkin puree, condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg. Mix well and turn into the crust. Bake 15 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 350 and bake another 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted 1-inch from the edge comes out clean. Cool before cutting. Garnish with whipped cream. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: pumpkin pie bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, salt, white sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, pumpkin puree, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving. ; name: pumpkin pie french toast baked ; ingredients: eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, texas toast thick bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and brown sugar in low flat bowl for easy dipping. Line two cookie sheets with foil and spray with pam. Dip the bread into the egg mixture on both sides and place on cookie sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, flipping them over half way through. Serve with maple syrup, powdered suger, or eat them plain if you are on the go. ; name: no crust pineapple pie ; ingredients: milk, sugar, biscuit mix, butter, eggs, vanilla, crushed pineapple ; preparation:In blender, combine first 6 ingredients. Process until smooth. Spoon pineapple over the bottom of a greased deep-dish 9 inch pie plate. Pour batter over pineapple. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. ; name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: sugar free pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, canned pumpkin, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, equal sugar substitute, raisins ; preparation:Make pudding according to directions. Place raisins in hot water for 1 hour to plump. Drain raisins. Mix all ingredients together. Let chill for 2-3 hours. ; name: beautiful berry pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shell, kiwi fruits, blueberries, strawberries, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes. ; name: pumpkin figs pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie crust, pears, pumpkin puree, dried fig, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: s more smoothies ; ingredients: marshmallow creme, chocolate syrup, milk, ice, graham cracker squares, mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Add the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips. ; name: pound cake s mores ; ingredients: poundcake, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping, nuts ; preparation:Place pound cake slices on a baking sheet. I line the sheet with foil for easy clean-up. Sprinkle each slice with marshmallows and chocolate chips. Above measurements are approximate for these toppings. I make sure each slice is covered but not heaping. Broil 4-6 inches from the heat for 1-2 minutes or til marshmallows are lightly browned. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle with caramel ice cream topping and sprinkle on nuts if desired. ; name: rocky road frosting ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsweetened chocolate, butter, vanilla extract, salt, mini marshmallows, nuts ; preparation:In a medium, heavy saucepan over low heat, melt 1 cup of the semisweet chocoalte chips with the unsweetened chocoalte. Remove pan from heat. Add the butter, vanilla, and salt to the melted chocolate and stir until the butter melts and is incorporated into the chocolate. Let stand until the mixture is at room temperature. Using an electric mixer at high speed, whip the chocolate until it holds soft peaks. Fold in the remaining chocolate chips, marshmallows, and nuts. Frost as desired. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: cherry magic cookie bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, maraschino cherries, flaked coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature. ; name: popcorn s mores ; ingredients: light brown sugar, butter, corn syrup, baking soda, popped popcorn, mini marshmallows, graham crackers, chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine the brown sugar, butter, and corn syrup in a medium saucepan and cook over high heat for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the baking soda. Combine the popcorn and the marshmallows in a large metal or heat-resistant glass bowl. Drizzle the sugar mixture mixture over the popcorn, then gently stir in the graham cracker cookies and chocolate chips. Let the mixture set until cool enough to handle, then using buttered plastic sandwich bags on your hands, form the mixture into golf-ball-sized balls. Store in an airtight container. ; name: rocky road s mores bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, flour, graham cracker crumbs, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:

name: low fat granola bars ; ingredients: oats, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, ground cinnamon, honey, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Coat an 8-inch square pan using nonstick cooking spray. Combine oats, flour, wheat germ, and cinnamon. Stir until well mixed. Add honey, stirring until mixture is moist and crumbly. Fold in raisins. Press mixture into pan and bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature, cut into 12 bars and serve. ; name: down to earth granola weight watchers ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, sliced almonds, light brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, cooking oil, honey, vanilla, raisins ; preparation:In a bowl, mix oats, almonds, brown sugar, salt and cinnamon. In a sauce pan, warm the oil and honey. Whisk or stir in the vanilla. Carefully pour liquid over the oat mixture. Stir gently with wooden spoon, finish mixing by hand. Preheat oven to 300f spread granola in a 15x10x1 pan. Bake 40 minutes, stirring carefully every 10 minutes. Transfer granola-filled pan to a cooling rack. Cool completely. Stir in raisins or dried cranberries. Seal granola in an air-tight container or self sealing plastic bags. Store at room temperature for 1 week or the freezer for 3 months. ; name: granola yogurt berry parfait ; ingredients: plain yogurt, granola cereal, berries, bananas, honey ; preparation:Line up 4 parfait, white wine or other tall glasses. Spoon 2 tablespoons of yogurt, into each glass and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of granola overtop and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of fruit overtop and smooth surface. Repeat the process, adding a bit of honey here and there, to taste. ; name: fresh orange yogurt parfaits with granola ; ingredients: plain yogurt, currants, granola cereal, pure vanilla extract, honey, orange, zest of, orange juice, orange ; preparation:Line a sieve with cheesecloth or paper towels and suspend it over a bowl. Pour the yogurt into the sieve and allow it to drain, refrigerated, for 3 hours or overnight. Place the thickened yogurt into a medium bowl and stir in the currants or raisins, vanilla, honey, and orange zest. Thin with orange juice until it is a desirable consistency. Divide yogurt among 4 dessert dishes or parfait glasses, spooning yogurt in alternating with granola. Garnish with sections of orange and serve. ; name: oatmeal granola cookie balls ; ingredients: rolled oats, whole wheat flour, almond meal, salt, pure maple syrup, peanut butter, pure vanilla extract, unsweetened flaked coconut ; preparation:Mix wet ingredients. Mix dry ingredients. Combine until well incorporated. Use a cookie scoop to form dough into balls. Arrange on cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 9 minutes. ; name: simple granola bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, oatmeal, crispy rice cereal, mini chocolate chip, skor english toffee bit ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Melt butter or margarine. Stir in brown sugar until dissolved. Stir oatmeal and cereal into butter and sugar. Stir in chocolate chips and skor bits, or any other tasty fillers you would like. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Pack oatmeal mix into cookie sheet. Bake in oven for 10 minutes. Cool, and cut into 24 pieces. ; name: absolutely fabulous granola bars ; ingredients: whole oats, nuts, all-purpose flour, chocolate chips, eggs, corn syrup, cooking oil, dark brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Line 9x13 pan with tin foil. Grease the foil, then set pan aside. Mix all ingredients in a large bowl until well combined. Press evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until golden brown across the top of the bars. Immediately remove from pan and invert on to a cooling rack so that the foil can be removed from the bars. Allow to cool, then cut into bars. I wrap them indiviually, so they can be quickly snatched for a snack of breakfast on the run. ; name: power granola ; ingredients: oats, almonds, wheat germ, honey, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla, craisins, raisins, dried apricot ; preparation:
