Top with onions if desired. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, extra virgin olive oil, yellow sweet onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, feta cheese, black olives, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm. ; name: pasta with turkey sausage tomatoes mozzarella ; ingredients: hot sausage, olive oil, garlic, onion, tomatoes with juice, dried red pepper flakes, pasta, smoked mozzarella cheese, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot. ; name: garlic pasta ; ingredients: garlic, dried basil, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, olive oil, spaghetti ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: bacon pasta ; ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot. ; name: cheesy spaghetti with bacon and peas ; ingredients: spaghetti, frozen peas, olive oil, onion, bacon, garlic cloves, ricotta cheese, light cream, parmesan cheese, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: really easy and good honey mustard chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, liquid honey, butter, dijon mustard, curry powder, red cayenne pepper ; preparation:Set oven to 350. Grease a large shallow baking dish. Place the chicken pieces in a single layer. In a small bowl, combine honey, butter, dijon mustard, curry powder and cayenne. Mix well to combine. Pour over the chicken pieces in the baking dish. Mix the chicken pieces slightly with your hands to coat. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Turn the chicken pieces over. With a spoon, baste with sauce. Bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked. ; name: honey garlic chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, flour, honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve. ; name: garlic glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, dried red peppers, oil, green onion, sesame seeds, rice ; preparation:Cube chicken into bite-seize pieces. Fry over high heat, stirring often for 3-4 minutes. Add all other ingredients. Cook on mediun-high 15 minutes or until syrupy. Sprinkle with garnishes. Serve over hot rice. ; name: honey mustard soup with chicken ; ingredients: cooked chicken, chicken broth, honey mustard, frozen baby peas, heavy cream, cornstarch ; preparation:Either use left over chicken and canned broth or poach chicken in 1 pint of water and use cooking liquid as the broth-- if using the cooking water as broth, flavour by adding chopped celery and carrots for a better tasting broth. Put the broth and mustard in a sauce pan and simmer until the honey is blended with the broth. Add some freshly cracked white pepper and a bit of nutmeg or cinnamon. Add the frozen peas to the pan and then remove from heat. Mix the cream and cornstarch well and add to the pan. Add in the cooked cubed chicken and then put the pan back on low heat. Stir until thickened slightly. Try with cinnamon raisin bagel bites or croutons. Keep the heat gentle as you do not want to curdle the cream. Everything is cooked already, so nothing needs to be boiled. ; name: baked honey mustard garlic drumettes ; ingredients: garlic cloves, honey, dijon mustard, light soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, chicken drummettes ; preparation:Combine garlic, honey, mustard, soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a non-reactive bowl. Add chicken toss to coat each piece well. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour or up to one day. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place chicken in a singe layer on a wire rack over an oven tray. Bake 45 minutes until well browned and cooked through. ; name: carrots in honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: carrot, sugar, salt, butter, dark brown sugar, prepared mustard, honey, parsley ; preparation:Cook carrots to tender, along with salt and sugar, in enough water to barely cover. Drain unless you have reduced all the water. Place butter, dark brown sugar, mustard and honey in heavy saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick and syrupy. Add cooked carrots and toss to coat them with sauce. Season to taste. Serve hot, sprinkled generously with the chopped parsley. ; name: simple honey baked chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, honey, curry powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn. ; name: honey mustard chicken pot with parsnips ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken thighs, onions, parsnips, vegetable broth, coarse grain mustard, honey, thyme, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: big blast oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, rolled oats, sugar, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, unsalted butter, pure vanilla extract, egg white, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a baking sheet with parchment paper & set aside. Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a medium bowl and stir with a fork to blend. Add butter and vanilla. Blend with fork until moist crumbs form. Add the egg white and beat with fork until stiff dough forms. Use your hands to mix in the raisins. Divide dough in half and place halves four inches apart on baking sheet. Bake until lightly browned. Remove sheet from oven & transfer the parchment to a cooling rack to cool for 15 minutes. Transfer cookies to wire rack and cool completely. ; name: oatmeal honey cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg and water. Sift together the dry ingredients then stir in the oats. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and mix. Add any additional ingredients drop by heaping teaspoonsful onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: peanut butter and banana oat cookies ; ingredients: bananas, peanut butter, rolled oats, oat flour, raisins, butter, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Let sit for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 350. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment lined or lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes until lightly golden. ; name: christmas fudge cookies ; ingredients: eagle brand condensed milk, butter, chocolate chips, flour, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven 325f. Melt chocolate chips and butter on low heat. Stir then add eagle brand milk,. Flour, nuts and vanilla. Cool. Spoon by teaspoon onto greased pan. Bake at 325f for 10-12 minutes. ; name: chocolate oat delights ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, vanilla, flaked coconut, instant oats ; preparation:Combine sugar, cocoa, butter and milk in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add vanilla. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and oats. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper. Chill. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: chocolate chip peanut butter oat cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, quick oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl. Beat butter, peanut butter, sugars, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl until creamy. Beat in eggs. Beat in flour mixture. Stir in oats and chocolate chips. Drop by mounded tablespoons onto a ungreased cookie sheet about 3 inches apart then bake for 10 to 15 mins. Or until they are light brown. Let stand on cookie sheets 3 minutes then remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: oatmeal fudge cookies ; ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, milk, peanut butter, vanilla, cocoa, quick-cooking rolled oats ; preparation:

name: pitcher of frozen margarita s ; ingredients: tequila, triple sec, frozen limeade concentrate, ice, water, lime juice, salt, lime wedge ; preparation:Add first 5 ingredients to a blender and liquify. Add extra water if needed to keep blender moving. Dip rims of glasses in lime juice then salt. Place a lime wedge on glass rim. Serve. ; name: loaded lemonade ; ingredients: fresh orange juice, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, tequila, triple sec, sprite ; preparation:Add first four ingredients to a pitcher or large bowl. Stir to combine. Chill for 2 hours. Right before ready to serve, add sprite. Stir to combine. Serve in ice-filled glasses. ; name: fruits afire ; ingredients: pear, apricot, bing cherry, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, apricot preserves, rum ; preparation:Drain pears, aprictos and cherries, reserving syrup. Combine syrups in a saucepan with lemon juice, cinnamon stick, apricot preserves and 2 tablespoons of the rum. Bring to a boil and cook until reduced by half. Remove cinnamon stick and pour syrup over fruits. Refrigerate until about 30 minutes before serving. Place fruit and syrup in an oven proof casserole. Cover casserole and heat in a 350 degrees fahrenheit oven just until fruit is hot, about 5 minutes. Warm remaining 4 tablespoons rum. At the table, ignite the rum and pour flaming over the fruit. Serve when flames have died out. ; name: brillant sunset ; ingredients: ice, grenadine, orange juice, maraschino cherries, orange slices ; preparation:Add ice to four glasses. Pour 1 tablespoon grenadine over ice in each glass. Slowly add 1 cup orange juice to produce sunset affect. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry. Stir if desired before drinking. ; name: maldivian lady ; ingredients: white rum, apricot brandy, grenadine, orange juice, pineapple juice, pineapple ; preparation:Mix the bacardy with apricot brandy, in a shaker. Add to a glass filled with crushed ice. Add splashes of grenadine. Fill glass up carefully with the orange and pineapple juice. Garnish with cherry and pineapple. ; name: blood orange margaritas ; ingredients: kosher salt, ice, blood orange juice, tequila, triple sec, orange wedge ; preparation:Moisten rim of 2 margarita glasses and dip in kosher salt. Fill a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Add orange juice, tequila, and triple sec. Shake well and strain into glasses. Garnish with orange wedges, if desired. ; name: tequila sunrise ice pops ; ingredients: cranberry juice cocktail, lime juice, honey, orange juice, tequila ; preparation:In a large measuring cup combine canberry juice cocktail, lime juice, and honey. Using 8 plastic frozen pop molds or 3-ounce paper cups, pour 4 teaspoons of the juice mixture into the bottom of each mold. Freeze for 1 hour or until firm but not hard. In another liquid measuring cup combine orange juice and tequila. Carefully pour orange juice mixture over cranberry mixture. Cover paper cups with foil and insert wooden craft sticks into cups or insert pop mold sticks into pop molds. Freeze overnight, remove pops from molds or tear off paper and remove foil before serving. ; name: cool breeze ; ingredients: light rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, ice cubes, orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine ; preparation:

name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: carrots with raisin sauce ; ingredients: carrots, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, cider vinegar, raisins, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in salted water until tender, drain. While carrots are cooking, mix brown sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in water, vinegar and raisins. Cook over low heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat, add butter, stir until melted and pour over carrots. ; name: roasted carrots with lemon dressing ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, cayenne pepper, coarse salt, honey, lemon, juice and zest of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. In foil lined roasting pan, toss carrots with oil and cayenne and season with salt. Arrange in single layer, using two pans if needed. Roast tossing one halfway through for 30-40 minutes, or until tender. In a small bowl, whisk together honey, zest and lemon juice. Season with salt. Drizzled over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: baby carrots with lemon and parsley ; ingredients: baby carrots, sugar, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put carrots in pan and cover with water. Add the sugar and cook just til soft. Drain& return to the pan. Stir in butter, lemon juice and parsley. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: carrots for a change ; ingredients: carrots, bacon, onion, brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Boil carrots until barely tender. Fry bacon until crisp, then drain and crumble. Brown onion in part of the bacon grease after draining off some juice. In a buttered baking dish, combine carrots, bacon, onion, salt and pepper. Sprinkle brown sugar over top and pour melted butter all over. Bake carrots covered until thoroughly heated. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: butter, green cabbage, carrots, onion, brown sugar, reduced sodium soy sauce, cider vinegar, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: candy coated carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, salt ; preparation:Cook carrots to crisp tender, drain. Set carrots aside and keep warm. In same pan cook butter and sugar until bubbly. Stir in lemon juice, hot sauce and salt. Return carrots and heat through. ; name: glazed carrots with cider ; ingredients: carrot, butter, brown sugar, cider, vegetable stock, dijon mustard, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: pasta with beans basil corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, pasta, great northern beans, fresh basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red pepper, yellow pepper ; preparation:Cut the kernels off the uncooked cobs and set aside. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions for al dente. Add the corn kernels to the pot for the last 30 seconds. Drain pasta. And corn in a colander and transfer to a large bowl. Add the beans, basil, salt, olive oil, vinegar and peppers and gently toss. Until blended. This can be served warm or at room temperature. Sprinkle with additional. Fresh chopped basil for an extra color and flavor splash. ; name: garlic pasta ; ingredients: garlic, dried basil, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, olive oil, spaghetti ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic basil chicken with red roasted pepper alfredo spaghetti ; ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, garlic cloves, fresh basil leaves, alfredo sauce, spaghetti noodles ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350. Mix half of chopped fresh basil, melted butter and garlic together in baking casserole dish. Place chicken breasts on top of mixture and top with remaining fresh chopped basil. Bake covered for 45 minutes. Bake uncovered for 15 minutes. Prepare spaghetti noodles boil for 7-10 minutes to preferred taste. Over low heat warm alfredo sauce, stir often. Be careful not to scorch. Serve. Pepper to taste. ; name: bacon pasta ; ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot. ; name: pasta salad with roasted tomatoes and peppers ; ingredients: plum tomatoes, green pepper, macaroni, onion, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, dried basil, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature. ; name: toasted angel hair pasta with roasted red peppers and sausage ; ingredients: sausage links, garlic cloves, angel hair pasta, chicken broth, dried basil, roasted red pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook sausage in large skillet, crumble. Saute garlic. Remove from skillet, leave grease in skillet. Add pasta to skillet and brown in grease 8-10 minutes. Add broth, peppers and spices, stir to mix. Cook until all liquid is absorbed, uncovered. Add meat to heat, mix. Serve with fresh parmesan over top. ; name: jewish spaghetti ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, yellow onions, canned tomato sauce, salt, pepper, cooked spaghetti ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in large frying pan. Cook onions until softened. Add peppers and cook until soft. Add tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Add to spaghetti. ; name: roasted red bell pepper pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, sliced mushrooms, roasted red peppers, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic ; preparation:

name: sausage stroganoff without mushrooms ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, onion, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, pepper, all-purpose flour, sour cream, parsley, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add sausage and onion, cook until meat is no longer pick and onion is tender. Add 1 cup broth, worcestershire sauce, and pepper. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir together remaining broth, and flour, until smooth. Stir into skillet, and bring to a boil and stir for 2 minutes. Reduce heat and add sour cream. Stir until heated through, do not boil. Add parsley if using. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: bacon stuffed burgers ; ingredients: bacon, onion, mushroom pieces, lean ground beef, ground pork, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder, steak sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Cook bacon until nice crisp. Remove bacon and keep 2 tablespoons of fat drippings. Saute onions in drippings. Crumble bacon with mushrooms add to skillet and set aside. Combine beef, pork, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and steak sauce. Shape into 16 patties. Divide bacon mixture and place over eight of the patties. Place remaining patties on top and press edges to seal. Fry patties until done. Check for doneness. ; name: tasty sausage patties ; ingredients: sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme, sage, flour, parsley ; preparation:Pre-heat grill. Finely dice the spring onions. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, ground beef, pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes. ; name: yorkshire sausages ; ingredients: sausage, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, milk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Brown the sausages in a lightly greased frying pan for 10 minutes. Stir and cook until well browned sift together the dry ingredients and add milk, beat until a smooth batter. Add the egges and beat. Pour over the sausages and place in oven for 20 minutes. Served with creamed onions or creamed corn. ; name: spiced beef ; ingredients: eggs, green onions, sour cream, dry breadcrumbs, dry oregano leaves, salt, dry thyme leaves, ground beef ; preparation:Whisk together eggs with onion and sour cream. Stir in bread crumbs and seasonings. Crumble in beef using your hands, work until mixed. Form into burgers, meatballs or whatever you fancy. Cook now or freeze for later. ; name: cottage cheese meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, cottage cheese, egg, quick oats, catsup, prepared mustard, instant minced onion, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except parmesan cheese. Mix ingredients lightly till well blended. Press lightly into an 8 by 8 pan. Cover with waxed paper & microwave on high for 12 to 14 minutes, turning dish once. Drain fat, if needed. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese & cook uncovered on high for 1- 2 minutes or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: sloppy joes sandwiches ; ingredients: ground beef, ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns. ; name: mistakes ; ingredients: bulk sausage, lean ground beef, velveeta cheese, oregano, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, miniature party rye rounds ; preparation:

name: ajvar eggplant aubergine peppers ; ingredients: eggplants, red sweet peppers, salt, pepper, garlic clove, lemon, oil, parsley ; preparation:Bake eggplants and sweet peppers at 350 f until tender when pierced with a fork. Peel skin from hot vegetables and chop or mince the vegetables. Season to taste with salt and pepper and stir in the garlic and lemon juice. Gradually stir in as much of the oil as the vegetables will absorb. Mix well. Pile into a glass dish and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: eggplant aubergine roasted garlic spread ; ingredients: eggplant, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, roasted garlic, sherry wine vinegar, basil leaves ; preparation:Cut the eggplant into 1-inch slices, brush one side lightly with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roast in a preheated 400 degree oven until brown, approximately 20 minutes. When cool, scoop the flesh from the skin and process with remaining ingredients until smooth. Correct seasoning. Can be stored refrigerated for up to one week. ; name: baked eggplant melt sandwich ; ingredients: unseasoned breadcrumbs, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, salt, egg, eggplants, olive oil, buns, pasta sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, basil, parmesan and salt in shallow bowl. Whisk egg in another shallow bowl and dip eggplant slices, then coat each slice in the breadcrumb mixture. Place eggplant on parchment paper-lined baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil and bake for 15 minutes. Transfer baked eggplant to clean plate and discard parchment paper. Set toasted buns halves, cut side down, on baking sheet. Divide eggplant slices evenly among bun halves, spoon on sauce and top with cheese. Place under broiler for 2 minutes until cheese is bubbling. ; name: roasted eggplant for pasta and recipes ; ingredients: eggplants, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, eggplant, garlic powder ; preparation:Place eggplant cubes on a plate and sprinkle with salt then let them sit for 30 minutes to remove bitterness. Rinse off the cubes in a collander then pat them dry with a paper towel. Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place eggplant cubes onto a nonstick baking sheet and drizzle the oil over them. Grind the fresh pepper over the eggplant to give them all a light dusting. Sprinkle the just under 1 tsp salt over the cubes. Sprinkle the garlic powder over the cubes. Bake for 30 minutes, give it a stir midway thru. ; name: roasted eggplant and tomato pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, japanese eggplant, mozzarella cheese, plum tomatoes, pesto sauce, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Arrange eggplant slices in single layer on greased baking tray. Sprinkle eggplant slices with salt, bake until soft and golden. Turn heat up to 515 and place pizza stone in oven. Roll out pizza dough on cornmeal coated paddle, lightly coat with oil. Sprinkle dough with mozzarella and arrange eggplant in a spoke pattern. Sprinkle with tomatoes and dot with pesto. Bake 8-10 minutes. ; name: eggplant aubergine adobo ; ingredients: eggplants, white vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, cooking spray, black pepper, red chili pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Spray cookie sheet with oil. Place eggplant cubes on cookie sheet and spray them with oil. Broil eggplant until browned, about 5 minutes, flip them and 5 minutes more. In a medium saucepan, bring vinegar, soy sauce, garlic and if desired, pepper to a boil and simmer for 6 minutes. Add browned eggplant to sauce and cook for 5 minutes more, stir several times. Serve hot with sticky rice. ; name: grilled eggplant with ricotta and tomato ; ingredients: eggplant, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, capers, ricotta cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Heat the grill to high. Brush the eggplant slices with some of the oil. Grill the eggplant slices on both sides until brown, then place them in the bottom of a lightly greased, small shallow baking pan that will fit under the grill, and set aside. Over a medium heat, add the rest of the oil to a small saut pan, add the cherry tomatoes and garlic and saut for a couple of minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes begin to soften. While still stirring, add the capers and leave the pan over the heat for an additional minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Cover the eggplant slices with the tomato, garlic and capers, season to taste and spoon the ricotta over the tomatoes. Place the baking pan under the grill until the ricotta starts to bubble. Scatter the basil leaves over the top and serve. ; name: roasted peppers and aubergine eggplant sandwich ; ingredients: eggplant, onion, roasted red peppers, garlic, diced tomatoes, olive oil ; preparation:

name: three cheese cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, black pepper, worcestershire sauce, blue cheese, garlic, nuts ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Divide mixture in half and place each half on a sheet of plastic wrap. Draw up the sides of the plastic wrap tightly around each ball and firmly secure. Refrigerate 6-8 hours or until firm. Remove plastic wrap and roll in nuts before serving. ; name: mini cheese balls ; ingredients: chive & onion cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, bacon, italian seasoning, garlic powder, walnuts ; preparation:Mix cream cheese spread and mozzarella cheese until well blended. Stir in chopped bacon and seasonings. Shape mixture into 54 balls, using 1 level tsp for each ball. Roll in walnuts. Cover with plastic wrap. Chill at least 2 hours. ; name: ham cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ham, parsley, dry onion, dry mustard, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill several hours to blend flavors. Serve with assorted crackers. When chilled, you can shape into a ball, then roll in chopped walnuts to give an elegant appearance if serving to guests. Place on lettuce leaves or garnish with parsley sprigs. ; name: nutty cheese ball ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, light cream cheese, fresh chives, worcestershire sauce, paprika, garlic powder, pecans, crackers ; preparation:Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time. ; name: pineapple cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, bell pepper, onions, seasoning salt, pecans, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, savings some pecans to roll cheese ball in. Pack mixture into a bowl or mold. Chill until firm. Remove and roll in pecans to coat exterior. Serve with crackers. ; name: spinach cheese balls using canned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, herb stuffing mix, mozzarella cheese, cheese, margarine, eggs ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in large bowl. Refrigerate 20 min or till needed. Preheat oven to 350. Roll chilled mixture into 1 in balls. Put on greased cookie sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: smoky cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, smoked cheddar cheese, milk, mustard, pecans, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in a medium bowl. Beat at medium speed with mixer until smooth. Cover and chill at least 3 hours. Shape mixture into a ball. Combine pecans and parsley. Roll cheese ball in pecan mixture. Let stand at room temp at least 30 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken cheese balls ; ingredients: chicken, philadelphia cream cheese, prepared mustard, lemon juice, mixed nuts ; preparation:

name: mexican grill chicken taquito enchiladas ; ingredients: chicken taquitos, red enchilada sauce, evaporated milk, sour cream, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Heat up the taquitos according to the instructions on the package and keep warm. Combine enchilada sauce and milk in a heavy bottom sauce pan and bring to a simmer. Stir in sour cream and keep warm. In a casserole dish pour enough sauce on bottom to just cover the bottom of the casserole dish. Arrange taquitos on top of sauce. Pour remaining sauce over the taquitos. Sprinkle cheese over each taquito and melt in a preheated 375 degree oven for 1-2 minutes. Optional-garnish each serving with a teaspoon of sour cream, an avocado slice, chopped green onions, fresh diced tomatoes, and black olives. ; name: tacos wrapidos ; ingredients: spanish rice, lean ground beef, fajita seasoning mix, flour tortillas, avocado, cheddar cheese, lettuce, diced tomato ; preparation:Prepare rice according to package directions. Toss ground beef with fajita seasoning. Cook in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, stirring until beef crumbles and is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in cooked rice. Spread beef mixture evenly over 1 side of tortilla. Tope evenly with avocado slices, cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes. Roll up. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & pepper, onion powder, red enchilada sauce, condensed cheddar cheese soup, black beans, chili powder, cream cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Place breasts in a large crock-pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the enchilada sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove the chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: southern living mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes and green chilies, ranch style beans, corn tortillas, processed cheese ; preparation:Cook gound chuck and diced onion in a dutch oven, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink. Drain meat mixture, and return to dutch oven. Stir in chicken soup, diced tomato and green chiles, and beans. Layer half of the tortillas evenly into 2 lightly greased 13 x 9 inch baking dishes. Top each with one-fourth of meat mixture and one-fourth of cheese cubes. Repeat layers with remaining tortillas, meat mixture, and cheese. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: breakfast nachos ; ingredients: tortilla chips, refried beans, eggs, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a large oven-safe platter with tortilla chips. Microwave refried beans for 1 minute, then spread over the tortilla chips. Crumble scrambled eggs evenly over beans. Evenly pour warmed salsa over eggs. Top with grated cheese. Broil entire platter in oven until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions. ; name: tostadas burros pronto ; ingredients: refried beans, green chili, beef broth, tostadas, flour tortillas, lettuce, chopped tomato, cheddar cheese, salsa, enchilada sauce ; preparation:Mix beans, green chiles, and broth. Heat in microwave until hot or heat on the stove if desired. Warm tostada shells in 350 oven for 3 to 4 minutes. Place some of the bean mixture on the flour tortillas with cheese and roll up. Wrap with foil and place in oven for a few minutes to melt cheese. Serve the tostadas cafetieria style by having each person make their own. Put some bean mixture on top of the shell and sprinkle with cheese. Microwave to melt the cheese if desired. Put lettuce, tomatoes, and salsa on top and eat. Remove burros from the foil and top with any of the lettuce, tomatoes, salsa, or my favorite the enchilada sauce. ; name: couscous tacos ; ingredients: mexican-style stewed tomatoes, water, onion, taco seasoning mix, couscous, firm tofu, taco shells, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine undrained stewed tomatoes, water, onion, and taco seasoning mix. Bring to a boil. Stir in couscous and tofu. Cover. Remove from heat- let stand for 5 minutes. Spoon couscous mixture into taco shells. Top with lettuce and cheese- serve with salsa. ; name: enchiritos micro mexican meal ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, lean ground beef, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, taco sauce, onion, sour cream ; preparation:

name: basil carrots ; ingredients: carrots, butter, salt, basil ; preparation:Slice carrots. Simmer, covered, in salted water until tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Combine remaining ingredients. Toss with carrots. ; name: roasted carrot stick snack ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, fresh herbs, salt ; preparation:Peel carrots. Cut into strips 3 inches long and inch wide. In a large bowl combine carrots, olive oil and herbs. In a baking pan, spread carrots in a single layer. Roast, uncovered, in a 475 oven for 10 minutes, or until just tender. Sprinkle with salt. ; name: brown sugar glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, salt ; preparation:In a medium saucepan cook carrots, covered, in a small amount of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Remove carrots from pan. In the same saucepan combine butter, brown sugar, and salt. Cook and stir over medium heat until combined. Add carrots. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until glazed. ; name: cinnamon carrot pie ; ingredients: carrots, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine first seven ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Beat for two minutes. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Lower heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes longer or until the filling is set. ; name: sweet roasted carrots ; ingredients: honey, butter, bacon, baby carrots, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: dilled carrots ; ingredients: chicken broth, sugar, salt, baby carrots, dill, butter ; preparation:In a small sauce pan combine chicken broth, sugar and salt. Bring to a boil. Add carrots and cover. Reducing heat to medium. Simmer until carrots are tender. Drain. Return carrots to pan and add the dill and butter. Toss until butter melts. ; name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: carrot bake ; ingredients: carrot, onions, mayonnaise, water, prepared horseradish, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, butter, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: missouri cookies ; ingredients: milk, butter, vanilla, sugar, cocoa, oatmeal, chunky peanut butter ; preparation:Add first 5 ingredients to a saucepan. Bring to a boil, and boil 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add in oatmeal and peanut butter. Mix well. Spoon by teaspoons to foil. Let cool 15 minutes. Store in airtight container in refrigerator. ; name: fruit chewy cookies with no added sugar ; ingredients: bananas, egg whites, dates, raisins, rolled oats, cocoa powder ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Defrost the bananas so they are soft and mash them in a bowl, leaving some little chunks. Into the bowl add the egg whites and mix well. Then add the dates and the raisins and mix well or until the fruit is coated with the egg mixture. Add the oatmeal and the cocoa powder if you are using it. Let the bowl sit for 10 minutes or until the oatmeal absorbs all the liquid. Spray baking pans with cooking spray. Using 2 teaspoons, spoon the mixture onto the baking pan. With the back of one of the spoons, smush the mixture down so it is somewhat flat. Bake the cookies for 20-25 minutes or until the edges are getting golden brown. Remove the cookies to a cooling rack. ; name: fat free chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. ; name: lemon cheese spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg, lemon rind, lemon juice, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter, cheese, and sugar until fluffy. Blend in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill. Press out cookies on un-greased baking sheet. Sprinkle with colored sugars. Bake at 375 f 7-8 minutes. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: fried bread cookies ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, salt, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Cut crusts off of the bread and cut into 1 inch wide strips. Beat egg. Add egg to milk, salt, and sugar. Dip the bread strips into batter. Roll in chopped nuts. Deep fry until brown or bake in oven 15 minutes. ; name: very chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, margarine, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. First, cream both sugars with the shortening, margarine, eggs, and vanilla. Then, gradually add soda, salt and flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake 8-9 minutes. ; name: winnie s cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cheddar cheese, flour, rice krispies, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: grilled summer squash and tomatoes with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, dried basil, yellow squash, tomatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package, drain. In a medium bowl, combine squash, tomatoes, oil, garlic, salt, basil, and pepper. Set aside. Heat up grill. Grill the vegetables 3-5 minutes per side until they are slightly softened and browned. Remove from grill and allow to cool enough for you to handle. Cut the veggies into bite-sized pieces. Toss pasta and vegetables together in a large serving bowl. Top with cheese. ; name: basil chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, boneless chicken breast halves, fresh basil, salt, hot pepper sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: shrimp and asparagus with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, yellow pepper, asparagus spear, medium shrimp, green onions, lemons, zest of, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, in large skillet, in 2 tbsp. Olive oil, saute bell pepper and blanched asparagus spears. Add shrimp and cook until shrimp just turns pink. Toss shrimp mixture with prepared pasta. Add remaining olive oil, green onions, lemon zest and lemon juice. Sprinkle hot pasta with fresh, grated parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: lemon garlic chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: flour, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast, butter, lemon, juice of, white wine, hot water, chicken bouillon cube, angel hair pasta ; preparation:Combine flour, parmesan, and garlic powder. Dredge chicken in mixture. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chicken and brown. Add liquid. Stir until thickened. Meanwhile cook pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Pour chicken and sauce over pasta. Toss gently. Top with grated cheese. Garnish with fresh lemon slices and fresh parsley. ; name: toasted angel hair pasta with roasted red peppers and sausage ; ingredients: sausage links, garlic cloves, angel hair pasta, chicken broth, dried basil, roasted red pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook sausage in large skillet, crumble. Saute garlic. Remove from skillet, leave grease in skillet. Add pasta to skillet and brown in grease 8-10 minutes. Add broth, peppers and spices, stir to mix. Cook until all liquid is absorbed, uncovered. Add meat to heat, mix. Serve with fresh parmesan over top. ; name: summer fresh pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, sweet corn, crabmeat, sweet butter ; preparation:Heat oil in a large pan. Saute onions and garlic till translucent. Add remaining ingredients except for butter just to heat through. Stir in pasta. Place into a large pasta bowl. Top with butter while hot. Garnish with pepper flakes to taste. ; name: capellini al gamberetti angel hair pasta with shrimp ; ingredients: capellini, olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, mushroom, diced tomato, artichoke, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Meanwhile, heat a large skillet or saute pan over medium high heat and add the olive oil, shrimp and garlic. Cook, stirring frequently until the shrimp just turns opaque, about 2 minutes. Add the mushrooms, tomatoes, and artichokes and keep cooking until the mushrooms are softened, about 3 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toss with pasta and garnish with fresh parsley. ; name: angel hair with avocado and tomatoes ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh basil leaf, avocado, tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: oven fried fish ; ingredients: orange roughy fillets, butter, all-purpose flour, paprika, lemon juice, parsley, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Place fish on a broiler rack that has been coated with a non-stick cooking spray. Brush tops of fish with 3 tablespoons of the butter or margarine. Dust with flour. Sprinkle with paprika. Broil 5-6 inches from the heat for 5 minutes or until fish just begins to brown. Combine lemon juice, parsley, worcestershire sauce and remaining butter. Pour over the fish. Broil 5 minutes longer or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: crunchy baked fish fillets ; ingredients: fish fillets, french dressing, lemon juice, salt, french-fried onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw fish steaks if frozen. Cut into serving pieces. Place fish in a shallow baking pan. Combine french dressing, lemon juice and salt. Pour sauce over fish and let stand 30 minutes, turning once. Remove fish from sauce and place in a well-greased baking dish. Crush onions in plastic bag with a rolling pin. Add cheese to onions and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle onion mixture over fish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. ; name: mayonnaise baked fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, mayonnaise, butter, onion, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, black pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. ; name: deep fried fish ; ingredients: white fish fillets, plain flour, salt, egg, butter, milk, lemon wedge ; preparation:Half-fill a deep pan with melted fat or oil. Heat until a faint haze rises from it. Sift the flour and salt into a bowl. Beat to a smooth batter, unbeaten egg, butter and milk. Then add the flour and salt mixture. Coat 2 pieces of fish with batter. Lift into the pan with a fork or kitchen tongs. Fry until crisp and golden, allowing about 6-8 minutes for large pieces and 4-5 minutes for medium. Remove from the pan and drain on absorbent kitchen paper. Repeat with the remaining fish. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: baked herb crusted salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dijon mustard, fresh parsley, fresh oregano, fresh thyme, plain breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference. ; name: orange crusted fish ; ingredients: bread, fresh parsley, orange, red chile, white fish fillets, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree c. Process the bread in a blender or food processor to form fine crumbs. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the parsley, orange rind and chilli. Season with salt and pepper. Spray the fish with oil. Place into a baking dish and press the crumb mix onto the fish. Spray with oil again. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes or until fish is cooked through. ; name: salmon burgers ; ingredients: salmon, lemon juice, dijon-style mustard, dry breadcrumbs, green onion, egg whites ; preparation:Drain and flake salmon. Combine lemon juice and mustard. Blend flaked salmon with breadcrumbs, green onions, and lemon juice-mustard mixture. Mix in egg whites until well blended. Form mixture into 4 patties and cook on a lightly oiled grill or saut in skillet until golden brown on both sides. Serve each burger on a bun with lettuce, tomato slices. ; name: fish fillets dijon ; ingredients: orange roughy fillets, butter, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, fresh white breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: minted baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, water, apple juice, cornstarch, fresh mint leaves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Put 6 cups of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: kicked up carrots ; ingredients: carrots, water, raisins, butter, brown sugar, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel and thinly slice carrots. About a quarter of an inch or so. Place carrots in a sauce pan with plenty of water to cover. Cook carrots at a boil over medium high heat till they are tender. About a minute before removing the carrots from stove add your raisins to the water to allow them to hydrate. Remove the pan from stove when the carrots are done and drain the water, returning carrots and raisins to the pan afterward. Drop the heat to low and return the pan to the stove adding the butter to the pan. Once the butter is melted add the brown sugar and cyanne pepper gently mixing in the flavors. Finally add the salt and pepper to your own personal preference. ; name: carrots with raisin sauce ; ingredients: carrots, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, cider vinegar, raisins, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in salted water until tender, drain. While carrots are cooking, mix brown sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in water, vinegar and raisins. Cook over low heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat, add butter, stir until melted and pour over carrots. ; name: baby carrots with lemon and parsley ; ingredients: baby carrots, sugar, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put carrots in pan and cover with water. Add the sugar and cook just til soft. Drain& return to the pan. Stir in butter, lemon juice and parsley. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: roasted carrots with lemon dressing ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, cayenne pepper, coarse salt, honey, lemon, juice and zest of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. In foil lined roasting pan, toss carrots with oil and cayenne and season with salt. Arrange in single layer, using two pans if needed. Roast tossing one halfway through for 30-40 minutes, or until tender. In a small bowl, whisk together honey, zest and lemon juice. Season with salt. Drizzled over carrots and toss to coat. ; name: sweet roasted carrots ; ingredients: honey, butter, bacon, baby carrots, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: dijon glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, light brown sugar, dijon mustard, parsley ; preparation:In a covered medium saucepan, cook carrots in small amount of boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender-crisp. Drain. Remove from pan. Keep warm. In same saucepan, over medium heat, melt butter. Stir in brown sugar and mustard until combined. Stir in carrots. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until carrots are glazed. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: sushine carrots ; ingredients: frozen baby carrots, lemon, zest of, orange juice, dark corn syrup, cornstarch, hot water ; preparation:

name: curried peas ; ingredients: coconut milk, curry powder, olive oil, fresh ginger, onion, cinnamon, cumin, tomatoes, frozen peas ; preparation:In a small bowl, mix together coconut milk, and curry. In a saucepan, heat oil over medium. Add onion, cinnamon and cumin. Saut until onions are soft. Stir in tomatoes, peas and coconut milk. Reduce heat and simmer until peas are tender. Serve over rice and pass naan bread. ; name: peas chickpeas and cumin ; ingredients: chickpeas, peas, garlic cloves, cumin, butter, black pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a pan. Add garlic and cumin and saut for 1 minute. Add chickpeas and saut until heated through. Add peas. Season with black pepper and serve hot. ; name: green pea and potato soup ; ingredients: frozen peas, potatoes, chicken stock, water, olive oil, onion, garlic, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: creamy sweet peas ; ingredients: sweet peas, butter, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in saucepan over low heat. Blend in flour, salt, pepper. Cook over low heat, stirring until mixture is smooth and bubby. Remove from heat and add saved liquid. Heat to boiling stirring constantly, lower heat and add peas. Stir and heat though. ; name: green and gold peas with pasta ; ingredients: orecchiette, bacon, onion, frozen peas, garbanzo beans, of fresh mint, parmesan cheese, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to bite, stirring often. Drain, reserving 1 cup cooking liquid. Transfer to large bowl. Brown bacon in deep large frying pan over medium - high heat until crispy. Transfer bacon to paper towel to drain. Add onion to bacon fat in pan sautee until just beginning to brown, about 5 minutes. Add frozen peas stir two minutes then add the chick peas and continue to cook until both are just heated through and peas are bright green about 1 minute longer. Return bacon to pan and add mint and pasta and enough cooking liquid to moisten pasta. Stir in 1 cup cheese and place on serving platter or bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with reserved mint serve, passing additional cheese alongside. ; name: potatoes and peas in cream sauce ; ingredients: red potatoes, peas, butter, white onion, boston lettuce, fresh ground pepper, sugar, heavy cream, milk ; preparation:Place potatoes in saucepan, cover with water and salt to taste. Boil about 20 minutes until done. Drain. In another saucepan, combine peas, butter, onion, shredded lettuce, salt and pepper to taste, and sugar. Cover and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, until peas are tender. Meanwhile, peel and cut potatoes into quarter inch thick slices. Add potatoes to peas. Add the cream and milk, salt and pepper to taste. Cook about 5 minutes and serve. ; name: skillet italian herbed country potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, butter, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, sage, thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender. ; name: herbed potatoes n peas ; ingredients: small red potato, bay leaves, butter, salt, dried marjoram, thyme, pepper, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: easy oven omelette ; ingredients: butter, eggs, reduced-fat sour cream, low-fat milk, dijon mustard, scallion, swiss cheese, salt, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: peppy rice omelet ; ingredients: cooked rice, salt, cheese, ground pepper, pepperoni, butter, eggs ; preparation:In a bowl, with a fork blend the rice, cheese and pepperoni. Beat the eggs in a separate bowl just long enough to mix the whites and yolks. Then season lightly with salt and pepper. In a large frying pan or omelet pan, over medium high heat, melt the butter, being sure the entire bottom of the pan is coated. Pour the eggs into the pan and cook for an omelet, lifting the cooked part of the eggs to allow the uncooked part to run under, and shaking the pan when the bottom starts to set. While the top is still moist, spoon the rice filling down the center of the omelet. Fold over and cook just long enough to heat the filling and melt the cheese. ; name: nif s spanish omelette omelet for 2 ; ingredients: olive oil, chorizo sausage, eggs, milk, baking powder, fresh spinach, hard cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and saute for about 2 minutes, just until a little browned. Remove sausage and place on a paper towel. Meanwhile, whisk together eggs, milk and baking powder. When sausage is removed from pan, add egg mixture. Sprinkle with sausage and spinach. Top with grated cheese. Cover pan with lid and turn heat down to medium-low. Check after about 3 minutes and see if omelette has set - the middle should not jiggle. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: ham and tomato omelet ; ingredients: eggs, butter, parsley, chives, pepper, deli ham, tomatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Mix eggs and pepper parsley and chives. In pan heat butter until melted. Add eggs. Cook until almost set. Alternate ham slices with tomatoes. On half of omelet. Flip over top and sprinkle with cheese. Cover for a minute while cheese melts. Slide onto plate. ; name: cheddar and chive omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately. ; name: open faced omelet ; ingredients: broccoli floret, sweet red pepper, green onion, ham, frozen hash brown potatoes, egg substitute, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a 9inch or 10inch skillet coated with non-stick cooking spray, saute broccoli, red pepper and onions until tender crisp. Add ham and hash browns. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently. In a bowl whisk together egg substitute and pepper. Pour over vegetable mixture. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes or until set. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. Cut into wedges. ; name: low fat chinese omelet ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, red bell pepper, scallion, bean sprouts, fat free chicken broth, egg whites, low sodium soy sauce, white pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet over high heat, saute all vegetables in chicken broth for 5 minutes. Stirring occasionally. Pour excess broth off vegetables and set vegetables aside in skillet. Meanwhile, in blender, mix egg whites, soy sauce and spices on high for 1 minute. Pour egg mixture over vegetables and return to heat. Cook on low heat until eggs have set to your liking. Serve with whole wheat toast and jam. ; name: jimmy dean sauce for omelets ; ingredients: jimmy dean sausage, butter, flour, pepper, sour cream, milk, salt ; preparation:

name: lemon cheese spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg, lemon rind, lemon juice, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter, cheese, and sugar until fluffy. Blend in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill. Press out cookies on un-greased baking sheet. Sprinkle with colored sugars. Bake at 375 f 7-8 minutes. ; name: swedish spritz ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Thoroughly cream the butter and sugar. Add the egg the vanilla and almond extract. Beat well. Sift the flour and baking powder together. Add to the creamed mixture, mix until smooth. Do not chill. Do not double. Force cookies through a cookie press onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Decorate the cookies with redhots, sprinkles or whatever you like. Bake in a 400 oven for 8-10 minutes. Cool on newspaper. These freeze well but shouldnt be left out for more than a week or so. ; name: pina colada spritz cookies ; ingredients: caster sugar, brown sugar, unsalted butter, egg, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, almond extract, coconut extract, salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 deg f. Combine butter, caster sugar, brown sugar in a large mixer bowl. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add egg, mix until combined. Add the lemon juice, zest, almond and coconut extract. Combine well. Mix salt with flour. Add it to the butter mixture gradually. Put dough into cookie press. Press cookies onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for about 8 minutes. Very delicious tropical cookies that i bake for chinese new year. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: chocolate chunked cookies ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, eggs, granulated sugar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: chocolate dipped spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, salt, baking powder, dark chocolate confectionary coating, nuts ; preparation:

name: summer love tea ; ingredients: water, honey, apple juice, cinnamon, cranberry-flavored tea bags ; preparation:Bring 1 cup water and juice to a boil. Stir in honey and cinnamon. Add the tea bags. Remove from heat. Let stand for one hour. Add 6 cups cold water pour into glasses with ice. Sit back, sip and fall in love. Can be stored in the refrigerator for three days. ; name: baked cranberry conserve ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, orange marmalade, walnuts ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Grease a shallow baking dish. Place the cranberries and brown sugar in the baking dish. Toss gently to combine. Cover and bake for 1 hour, stirring the mixture after about 30 minutes of baking time. After 1 hour baking remove from oven and stir in lemon juice, marmalade and chopped walunuts. Return to oven and bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Store any leftover conserve covered in the fridge. ; name: southern sweet tea ; ingredients: water, tea bags, sugar, baking soda ; preparation:Bring 4 cups water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water. ; name: cranberry and vanila sorbet ; ingredients: cranberries, water, sugar, kosher salt, vanilla bean, lemon juice ; preparation:In a saucepan combine first 4 ingredients, scrape seeds from vanilla bean and add bean to mixture and bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 more minutes or until cranberries pop. Cool to room temperature. Remove vanilla bean. Working in batches puree mixture in a blender and then strain into a large bowl discarding solids. Stir in lemon juice. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight or until chilled. Transfer mixture to ice cream maker and process according to directions. Transfer to a container, cover and freeze. ; name: hot spiced orange and fruit tea ; ingredients: orange spice tea bags, boiling water, water, sugar, lemon juice, orange juice, cinnamon stick, whole cloves, honey ; preparation:Pour 2 quart boiling water over the 8 teabags. Brew 5 minutes, remove tea bags, set aside. While doing the above boil 2 celsius each water and sugar together for10 minutes, or until sugar is disolved, to make syrup. Add remaining ingredients. Bring backto boil and simmer 20 minutes. Remove cloves and cinnamon. Serve hot. Allow each person to sweeten as they choose. ; name: southern spiced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea leaves, lemon, juice of, whole cloves, oranges, juice of, sugar, water ; preparation:Add boiling water to tea, steep 5 minutes. Strain. Make a syrup by boiling the sugar, cloves and water. Add this syrup and fruit juices to the tea. Serve hot or cold. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: diabetic cranberry soul warming tea ; ingredients: family-size tea bags, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, boiling water, sugar, water, splenda sweetened cranberry juice, orange juice, lemon juice, orange ; preparation:

name: oven steak fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, dried thyme, dried oregano, steak seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to high. Cut potatoes and spread out on a cookie sheet. Coat potatoes with extra-virgin olive oil, dried herbs and steak seasoning or, salt and pepper. Spread potatoes to the corners of the cookie sheet. Cook potatoes in very hot oven 25 minutes. Turn potatoes once, half way in the cooking process. Serve fries hot from the oven. ; name: fried potatoes without the fry ; ingredients: russet potatoes, onion flakes, oregano, garlic cloves, paprika, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot. ; name: shrimp and chips ; ingredients: cooked shrimp, beer, flour, baking powder, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce. ; name: old bay steak fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, old bay seasoning, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine potato wedges with oil, seasoning, and salt. Toss to coat well. Spread potatoes in a single layer on the baking sheet. Bake without turning until tender and browned, about 40-45 minutes. ; name: homemade spicy tortilla chips ; ingredients: salt, chili powder, fresh lime juice, flour tortillas, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Combine salt, chili powder and lime juice in a cup. Mix well. Brush lightly over each tortilla. Cut each tortilla into 8 wedges. Spread tortilla wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Toast in a preheated 400 oven for 7-9 minutes or until chips are lightly browned and crisp. Remove from oven. Cool. Chips will firm up as they cool. ; name: baked pork chops with potatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, chicken bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, flour, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring 2 cups water to a boil. Add bouillon cubes and bay leaf. Remove from heat and set aside to allow to cool. Layer potatoes in casserole dish. Layer onion slices on top of potatoes. Place pork chops on top of onions. Remove bay leaf from broth then whisk flour in chicken broth. Pour over pork chops and potatoes. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover dish with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350f oven for one hour and thirty minutes. ; name: oven baked crispy potato fries ; ingredients: idaho baking potatoes, olive oil, fresh rosemary, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 550 degrees. Halve each potato, then cut each half in 5 slices lengthwise. Place on a baking sheet and drizzle the olive oil over them, work the potatoes around in the oil until evenly coated. Season with the rosemary, salt, pepper and red pepper. Throw the garlic cloves on the sheet with the potatoes. Roast 25 minutes. Make sure to turn them all once at the halfway point or they will end up sticking to the baking sheet. ; name: cajun oven fried potato chips ; ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, coarse salt, cajun seasoning ; preparation:

name: grilled asparagus with garlic and fresh lemon ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Toss asparagus in extra virgin olive oil and minced garlic. Place asparagus on hot grill. Liberally season asparagus with salt and pepper. Grill asparagus until lightly charred and tender-crisp. Remove from grill and squeeze lemon juice onto asparagus. ; name: asparagus with curry butter ; ingredients: butter, curry powder, lemon juice, salt, extra virgin olive oil, shallot, asparagus ; preparation:Combine butter, curry powder, lemon juice and salt in a small bowl, creating a curry butter. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add shallot and cook, stirring, until softened, about 2 minutes. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the curry butter into the asparagus. Toss to coat and serve. ; name: gingered asparagus ; ingredients: rice vinegar, fresh ginger, sugar, asparagus, garlic clove, sesame oil, vegetable oil, salt, soy sauce ; preparation:Combine vinegar and ginger in small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cook 10 to 15 minutes over medium heat. Stir in sugar. Set aside. Steam asparagus just until tender but firm. Combine garlic, oils, salt and soy sauce. Arrange asparagus on platter. Pour garlic mixture over. Cover and refrigerate. About one hour or so before serving, pour the vinegar mixture over asparagus. Serve cool. ; name: balsamic asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, oil, black pepper, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Prepare asparagus by washing and snapping off tough end. Heat oil in frying pan. Add asparagus and keep moving around in pan until changes colour add balsamic vinegar and the pepper sprinkling over all of the asparagus. Remove from heat and cover for a few minutes to let flavours develop. Serve. ; name: seasoned roasted asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, lemon juice, seasoning salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place asparagus in a single layer on a baking sheet or broiler pan. Drizzle with oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle with seasoned salt - coat evenly. Bake at 450 f for a total of 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. For a more even tenderness, turn each aspargus stalk after 5 minutes. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese immediately before serving. ; name: asparagus with basil parmesan butter ; ingredients: asparagus, butter, parmesan cheese, fresh basil, garlic, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, cook the asparagus until just crisp tender, about 3 minutes. Arrange on a broilerproof platter. Preheat broiler. Beat butter in a medium bowl until fluffy. Beat in cheese, basil, garlic and lemon juice. Season. Drop butter mixture by teaspoonfuls over asparagus. Broil until topping browns, about 3 minutes. Be careful not to burn. Serve hot. ; name: oriental asparagus and mushrooms ; ingredients: green asparagus, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, fresh mushrooms, white wine, soy sauce, unsalted cashews ; preparation:Wash and trim the asparagus. Cut the asparagus into pieces about 1 inch long, reserving. Heat the oil in a skillet or wok until hot. Add the garlic, the asparagus and mushrooms. Stir fry for about 2 minutes. Now add the wine, soy sauce, the asparagus. Mix well and stir fry for 2 more minutes. Serve warm. ; name: asparagus bundles ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, bacon, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, butter, fresh garlic ; preparation:

name: granny s fudge ; ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add marshmallows, walnuts and vanilla. Stir well. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool.
