Sprinkle the dish with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: pork tenderloin napoli ; ingredients: olive oil, pork tenderloin, roma tomatoes, green olives, dry white wine, fresh rosemary, garlic, salt, black pepper, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Heat the oil in an ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Season the meat with salt and pepper and brown the pork on all sides in the skillet. Mix together the tomatoes, olives, wine, rosemary and garlic in a bowl and pour over the pork. Place skillet in the oven and bake for 30 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 160. Remove pork from skillet and cover with foil to keep warm. Place skillet with remaining tomato mixture over medium heat and gradually mix in the cream. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, then reduce heat to low and continue cooking for 5 minutes until thickened. Slice pork and drizzle with the cream sauce to serve. ; name: pork tenderloin with cranberry and porto wine sauce ; ingredients: butter, pork tenderloin, onion, fresh cranberries, wine, liquid honey, dried rosemary, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: must love cheese chicken wild rice soup ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, wild rice, chicken broth, water, salt, black pepper, half-and-half cream, velveeta cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, cornstarch ; preparation:Cut the tenderloins into bite size pieces then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Spray a large pot with cooking spray & cook the chicken until no longer pink. Pour the broth & water in the pot then add the rice & seasoning packet. Bring to a boil then lower heat & simmer for 20 minutes, covered. Mix the salt, pepper, & half-and-half in with the broth. Then add the velveeta & shredded cheese to the pot. Stir until the cheese is melted. Mix the cornstarch & a small amount of water in a cup to form a running paste. Pour this into the broth, stirring until it thickens. ; name: persian chicken and rice ; ingredients: butter, chicken, onion, dried apricot, raisins, chicken broth, salt, pepper, ground cinnamon, long-grain rice ; preparation:In a soup pot, melt the butter and cook the chicken for about 15 minutes, until brown on both sides. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onion, apricots, and raisins and saute over medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Add the chicken broth, salt, pepper, and cinnamon and bring to a boil. Add the rice and mix well. Return the chicken to the pot. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for about 25 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: simple chicken and rice with a kick ; ingredients: chicken broth, fresh basil, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, stewed tomatoes, long-grain white rice, frozen peas, chicken ; preparation:Bring the stock, basil, garlic powder, tabasco sauce and tomatoes in a large saucepan over medium heat to a boil. Stir in the rice, and reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for about 20 minutes. Stir in the peas and chicken. Cover and continue to cook for about 5 minutes. ; name: chicken and rice oriental ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, betty crocker chicken helper chicken and herb rice, hot water, soy sauce, brown sugar, crunchy peanut butter, frozen oriental-style vegetables ; preparation:Melt butter in 10 inch skillet over high heat. Cook chicken in butter 3 to 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until outside turns white. Stir in uncooked rice, sauce mix, and hot water. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and cover. Simmer about 9 minutes, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid is absorbed. Stir in soy sauce, brown sugar and peanut butter and stir until peanut butter is melted. Stir in vegetables. Heat to boiling, stirring frequently. Stir before serving. ; name: comforting chicken and rice ; ingredients: medium grain rice, cream of mushroom soup, water, dry onion soup mix, chicken pieces, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 9 x 13 baking dish. Place rice in dish. Combine soup, water and soup mix and pour over rice. Stir to loosely combine. Place chicken on top and gently press down into liquid. Season with black pepper. Cover and bake at 350 for about 1 hour, or until rice is tender and liquid absorbed. It can also be made with pork chops. Decrease the water by 1 can if using long grain rice. ; name: crispy rice chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, egg, water, crispy rice cereal, garlic powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:Beat egg and water in a shallow bowl. Place cereal in another shallow bowl. Mix garlic powder, salt, and pepper with cereal. Dip chicken into egg mixture and roll into crumb mixture. Coat all sides. If freezing, i flash-froze and then packaged up my chicken. If baking now, place on a lined baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: wild rice with walnuts and dates ; ingredients: celery, onion, butter, wild rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, dates, walnuts ; preparation:In a 10-inch skillet cook celery and onion in hot butter about 10 minutes or until tender. Add uncooked wild rice. Cook and stir 3 minutes. Add broth and water, bring to a boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 50 to 60 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Stir in dates and walnuts, cook, uncovered, for 3 to 4 minutes more or until heated through and remaining liquid is absorbed. ; name: t s favorite chicken and wild rice ; ingredients: chicken, long grain and wild rice blend, water, vegetables, butter ; preparation:

name: sauteed pear salad ; ingredients: boston lettuce, olive oil, bosc pears, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In large serving bowl, place lettuce. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium-heat 1 minute. Add pears and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until they begin to soften and turn golden. Meanwhile, in cup, stir vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add vinegar mixture to pears in skillet, and cook 1 minute or until liquid begins to thicken. Pour pears and liquid from skillet into bowl with lettuce, toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: baby greens pear walnut and blue cheese salad ; ingredients: lemon juice, dijon mustard, shallot, fresh thyme, olive oil, mixed baby greens, pears, blue cheese, walnuts ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. Toss greens in large bowl with enough dressing to coat. Divide greens among 6 plates. Top with pear slices, dividing equally. Sprinkle with cheese and walnuts. Drizzle lightly with remaining dressing and serve. ; name: apple cottage cheese salad ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, apples, raisins, lemon juice, honey, sunflower seeds ; preparation:In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, apples, raisins. Combine lemon juice and honey. Add to apple mixture. Chill. Just before serving, stir in sunflower kernels if desired. ; name: roasted pear salad ; ingredients: pears, fig jam, goat cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, dijon mustard, watercress, red onion, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoons jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing. ; name: apricot pecan chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, dried apricot, pecans, celery, green onions, cilantro, low-fat sour cream, salt, ground pepper ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Set aside. Whisk together sour cream, salt and pepper in a separate bowl. Pour over first six ingredients. Toss well. Serve with dry wheat toast. ; name: red cabbage and apple salad ; ingredients: onion, red cabbage, apples, brown sugar, red wine vinegar, salt, allspice, water, raisins ; preparation:Slice onion, cook on high 90 seconds in microwave. Or saute in a little oil. Shred cabbage, chop apples and put in medium saucepan with sugar, vinegar and spices. Fry for 5 minutes over medium heat to meld flavors. Add water and simmer for 15 minutes, or until cabbage is soft. Mix in the onions and sprinkle with rasins. Serve warm, or chill for a few hours before serving. ; name: summer peach salad ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, heavy cream, fresh peaches, pecans, lemon juice ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and heavy cream until fluffy. Stir in mayo and lemon juice. Fold in peaches and pecans. Pour into 9x9x2 glass dish and freeze for 3-4 hours. Using warm knife, cut into squares. ; name: apple pecan and blue cheese salad with dried cherries ; ingredients: salad greens, apples, pecan halves, dried cherries, blue cheese, dijon mustard, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: hot chili pepper butter ; ingredients: sweet unsalted butter, green chili peppers, garlic cloves, fresh chives, cayenne, lemon juice, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Let butter soften to room temperature. Beat in other ingredients. Pack butter into molds or crocks or form balls with a melon baller. Chill for at least 3 hours before serving. Can be stored for upto 1 month in the refrigerator or 3 months in the freezer. ; name: marinated olives with lemon and fresh herbs ; ingredients: green olives, fresh thyme, fresh parsley, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, lemon juice, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, fresh lemon zest ; preparation:In a food processor or blender, mix all the herbs, garlic and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil and blend. Add zest. Pour marinade over olives. They can be served immediately but will improve with a day to marinate. ; name: renkon butter ; ingredients: butter, peanut oil, fresh lotus root, soy sauce, bonito flakes ; preparation:Over medium-high temperature, heat a saut pan. Add the butter and peanut oil, melt together, and simmer until the butter is almost browned. Add the lotus root slices and saut until edges are browned on each side. Add the soy sauce, stir, turn slices over, remove the pan from heat, and let sit for about 15 to 20 seconds. Move the lotus root to a shallow serving bowl and cover with the bonito flakes. Serve immediately. ; name: butter lettuce and herb salad ; ingredients: fennel bulb, butter lettuce, fresh tarragon leaves, scallions, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, kosher salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, pecorino romano cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl add the fennel, lettuce, tarragon and scallion. Set aside. Add lemon juice, mustard, salt, and pepper to a small bowl and whisk together. While whisking constantly, slowly add the oil. When well combined pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to coat. Top with the pecorino if desired and serve immediately. ; name: garlic and rosemary jus ; ingredients: beef stock, butter, garlic cloves, rosemary, onion, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter over low heat. Cook garlic and onion in the butter over low heat until soft and golden but not caramelised. Add rosemary and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Pour in stock and stir. Increase heat to bring stock to a boil, then turn down to a simmer. Simmer until reduced by about a third and thickened slightly. Taste for seasoning. Add more rosemary if needed and season to taste with pepper. At this step you could thicken with cornflour and cold water but i like the thinner texture. Serve hot with roast lamb, crispy potatoes and green vegetables. ; name: lemon spice infused oil ; ingredients: lemon zest, whole cloves, bay leaf, cinnamon, whole allspice, whole black peppercorn, fresh lemon juice, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 300 degrees f. With a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder, coarsely grind the lemon zest, cloves, bay leaf, cinnamon, allspice and peppercorns with the lemon juice to form a paste. In a 1-cup metal measure or very small metal bowl, stir together paste and oil. Set the measuring cup or bowl on a baking sheet and cook in lower third of oven for one hour. Cool on a rack for 30 minutes. Line a small strainer with several layers of cheesecloth and strain oil into a glass jar. Covered loosely and refrigerated at all times, flavored oil keeps for one month. ; name: grilled garlic bread with thyme infused butter ; ingredients: portuguese rolls, garlic cloves, sea salt, cracked pepper, unsalted butter, fresh thyme ; preparation:Place butter into a small pot and add thyme sprig. Melt and let infuse for 10 minutes. Preheat a grill to medium high. Slice the rolls in half brush with a little of the thyme infused butter. Place cut side down onto the grill and grill until bread is toasted and grill marks appear. Rub each piece of toasted bread with cut side of garlic clove and then brush with a little more thyme butter. Sprinkle with sea salt and cracked pepper and serve immediately. ; name: fresh herb butter ; ingredients: unsalted butter, fresh basil, fresh marjoram, fresh rosemary, fresh chives, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, garlic ; preparation:

name: easy restaurant style macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, velveeta cheese, old cheddar cheese, whipping cream, salt, black pepper, cream-style cottage cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until just firm-tender. Drain but do not rinse. Place the cooked pasta in a large bowl. Add in the velveeta, shredded old cheddar cheese and whipping cream mix to combine, then season with salt to taste and pepper if using. Place in serving bowls, then top with desired amount of creamed cottage cheese. ; name: quinoa mac and cheese ; ingredients: quinoa, vegetables, salt, seasoning salt, garlic cloves, eggs, soymilk, cheddar cheese, panko breadcrumbs ; preparation:Lightly saute any veggies you would like in this dish. Cook quinoa to packaged instructions until fully cooked. Preheat oven to 350f coat 13x9 inch dish with cooking spray. Whisk together eggs and milk in large bowl. Fold in quinoa mixture and cheese. Stir very well and let some of the cheese melt. Transfer to prepared baking dish and if using panko crumbs or bread crumbs add now and bake 30-35 mins, until bread crumbs are browned. ; name: dump macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, salt and pepper, dry mustard, paprika ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix cooked pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot. ; name: jalapeno pepper mac n cheese ; ingredients: salt and pepper, cavatappi pasta, extra virgin olive oil, jalapenos, serrano chilies, garlic cloves, whole milk, cream cheese, dried onion flakes, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of water to a boil, salt it, add the pasta and cook until al dente. Drain and return to the pot. In a skillet, heat a drizzle of evoo over medium heat. Add the jalapenos, serranos and garlic and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add to the pasta. Preheat the broiler. In a saucepan, combine the milk, cream cheese and onion over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring, until smooth, 5 minutes. Stir into the pasta. Stir in the jack cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer the pasta to a baking dish and broil until browned, about 3 minutes. ; name: cheddar mushroom macaroni ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, mushrooms, onion, garlic clove, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Mix well. Stir in macaroni. Mix well. Transfer to a greased 9 inch baking dish. Cover and bake at 325 degrees f for 30 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted. ; name: macaroni and cottage cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, cottage cheese, milk, vegetable oil, salt, egg, garlic clove, cracker crumb ; preparation:Cook the macaroni according to directions. Stir cottage cheese with milk until smooth. In a seperate bowl, beat the egg, then beat the oil into it. Add salt and garlic to the cheese mixture. Now mix this with the cooked and drained macaroni, pour it in a baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs, and bake at 350 till set, about 25 minutes. ; name: macaroni and cheddar cheese beef bake ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, butter, milk, ground beef, onions, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare mac and cheese according to directions on box. Brown beef and onion with salt and pepper to taste. Mix macaroni and cheese with beef and add milk and cream of mushroom soup in buttered casserole dish. Bake uncovered for 25 minutes. ; name: copycat costco r deli mac and cheese ; ingredients: cavatappi pasta, butter, heavy cream, pepper, garlic salt, pecorino romano cheese, parmesan cheese, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: good gravy beef stew ; ingredients: stew meat, flour, vegetable oil, beef broth, condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, potatoes, baby carrots ; preparation:Coat meat with flour and brown in oil. Drain. Add soups. Simmer 30 minutes. Add vegetables and simmer another hour. ; name: crock pot savory pork roast ; ingredients: pork loin roast, onion, bay leaf, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve. ; name: crock pot burgundy beef ; ingredients: stewing beef, burgundy wine, garlic cloves, onion, cream of mushroom soup, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Dust beef with flour. Brown meat, onions and garlic in olive oil. Remove from pan. Add wine and soup, stirring to mix. Season with salt and pepper. Place meat mixture in crock pot and top with wine and soup. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. Serve over white, brown, or wild rice. ; name: beef hot pot ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, beef stew meat, beef stock, butter, parsley, carrots ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a little oil in frying pan and brown stew meat along with onions and carrots. Remove from pan. Layer sliced potatoes, onion, carrot and meat in a 3 pint casserole, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock. Brush the potatoes with 1 tbsp melted butter. Cover and bake for 1 hour. Remove the hot pot from the oven. Uncover and brush the potatoes again with melted butter or dripping. Return to the oven for a further 30 minutes, uncovered, to brown the potatoes. Serve garnished with parsley. ; name: crock pot stuffed steak ; ingredients: round steaks, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, prepared stuffing, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water ; preparation:Pound the salt, garlic powder and black pepper into the steak. Lay the stuffing on top of the steak and roll up jelly-roll style. Place toothpicks in steak to hold in place. Place the steak in the crock pot. Mix the cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix and water in bowl until smooth. Pour over the steak in the crock pot. Cook on low for about 6 hours. Thicken the broth for gravy if you like. Serve with mashed potatoes, if desired. Slice the steak into serving pieces. ; name: slow cooked beef in onion sauce crock pot ; ingredients: chuck roast, salt, black pepper, paprika, dried oregano, onions, garlic cloves, tomato paste, dry red wine, water ; preparation:Trim off any excess fat from the meat. Mix salt, pepper, paprika and oregano. Rub this mixture into the meat, on all surfaces. Put onions, garlic, tomato paste and about one-half of the liquid into the crock pot, or slow cooker and mix well. Add the remaining liquid and stir. Nestle the meat down into the liquid, cover and cook on the low setting 8-9 hours, or until the meat is tender. Taste for seasoning and make any adjustments. Serve with noodles, rice, or potatoes. ; name: beef with asian mushroom sauce crock pot ; ingredients: sliced mushrooms, beef tip roast, hoisin sauce, garlic cloves, salt, beef broth, cornstarch, water, scallions ; preparation:Put the mushrooms in your slow cooker and place the beef on top. Spread the hoisin sauce over the beef, scatter the garlic and salt over it, and pour in the broth around it. Cover the slow cooker, and cook on low for 6-8 hours. Remove the beef from the slow cooker and put it on a platter. Turn cooker to high. Mix the cornstarch with water and add to the sauce. When sauce is thickened a bit, pour the sauce into a sauce boat. Slice the beef and serve it with the sauce, topped with the scallions. ; name: skier s beef stew crock pot ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, beef stew meat, tomato sauce, water, onion soup mix ; preparation:

name: crispy breaded pesto mozzarella chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, unseasoned breadcrumbs, milk, salt, pepper, garlic salt, thyme, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, pesto sauce ; preparation:Pound out chicken breasts with meat mallet or rolling pin. Take unseasoned breadcrumbs and add salt, pepper, garlic salt, parmesan cheese, thyme, and any other herbs you desire to the crumbs. Combine homemade or store bought pesto with shredded mozzarella cheese in a cup making sure to coat all of the cheese evenly with the pesto. Spread a generous amount of the cheese mixture on the pounded out chicken breast. Roll the chicken breast up and secure with toothpicks. Dip the chicken breast in milk and then into the seasoned bread crumbs. Place chicken onto a greased pan and place into a 400f oven for approximately 20 minutes or until the chicken juices run clear. ; name: crunchy chicken cheese bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, margarine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, cooked rice ; preparation:In 3 quart oblong baking dish, place chicken, top with cheese. Stir soup and spread over cheese. Top with tomato. Combine margarine and stuffing, sprinkle over tomato. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes or until chicken is done and sauce is bubbly and stuffing is browned. Serve over rice. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: greek spinach cheese rolls appetisers ; ingredients: frozen bread dough, frozen chopped spinach, feta cheese, reduced-fat monterey jack cheese, green onions, dill, garlic powder, black pepper, salt ; preparation:If using a store bought bread dough, allow the bread to thaw according to the package directions. Spray a standard muffin pan with nonstick spray. Roll out dough lightly with flour to 15x9 inch rectangle. Combine spinach, cheeses, green onions, and seasonings in a large bowl. Mix well. Sprinkle spinach mixture evenly over the dough to within 1 inch of the edeges. Starting with long edge, roll the dough up snugly, pinching the seam close. Place the seam side down, and cut with serrated knife into about 15 slices. Place slices, cut side up, in to the prepared muffin pan. Bake the rolls at 375 for 20-25 minutes or until golden. Seve warm or at room temperature. The rolls can be stored in an airtight container for up to 2 days. ; name: homemade dinner rolls ; ingredients: yeast, bread flour, milk, sugar, salt, butter, egg ; preparation:Scald cup of milk and cool to lukewarm. Dissolve yeast in cup of hot water in large mixing bowl, let stand 5 minutes. Mix remaining ingredients and beat well with mixer. Oil a large bowl, turn so both sides are oiled, cover with wax paper till doubled in size. Punch down, form into rolls on greased cookie sheet and let rise until double in size. Bake in preheated 400 degree f oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Brush tops with butter or margarine. Prep time is in the rising. If using bread machine follow mfg instructions. ; name: little meat rolls ; ingredients: ground round, sweet onion, teriyaki sauce, parmesan cheese, egg, bread, salt and pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Mix the meat with the onion, egg, bread, cheese, sauce, salt and pepper. Mix very well. Roll out the crust and cut into a 3-inch square. Take a walnut or egg size bunch of meat mixture in your hand, and roll into an oblong shape, put on the center of the crust and pinch the top together. Bake at 350f for 35 minutes or until browned. Makes about 20. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: goat cheese chicken rolls ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, goat cheese, white pepper, salt, garlic powder, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: thai tuna salad ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sour cream, green curry paste, celery, green apple, parsley, tuna in water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Stir mayonnaise with sour cream, curry paste, celery, apple and parsley until evenly combined. Drain tuna and break apart using a fork. Add to mayonnaise mixture and stir until evenly combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve as a sandwich filling or as part of a salad plate. Can be made up to 24 hours ahead. I sometime use chopped coriander to replace the parsley. ; name: creamy tuna pasta salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, medium pasta shell, celery, onion, mayonnaise, dried parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, dry mustard ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Rinse with cold water and drain well. Meanwhile, combine tuna, celery, and onion in large bowl. In smaller mixing bowl, combine mayo, parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and dry mustard. Add pasta to tuna mixture. Spoon mayo mixture over tuna and stir until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled. ; name: pesto tuna salad sandwiches ; ingredients: albacore tuna, pesto sauce, red onions, celery, black olives, mayonnaise, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix tuna and mayo. Add pesto. Add remaining ingredients. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve on a good quality bread. Of course you can adjust the amount of ingredients to your preference. ; name: gingered tuna salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, curry powder, olive oil, red onion, crystallized ginger, mayonnaise, rice vinegar, dijon mustard, pecans, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the curry powder is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the cooked curry powder, crystallized ginger, onion, pecans and cayenne pepper. Whisk again to thoroughly blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy. ; name: tuna pita ; ingredients: tuna in water, celery ribs, green onions, fresh dill, plain nonfat yogurt, dry mustard, celery salt, whole wheat pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna with a fork. Combine with celery, green onion and dill. Blend together yogurt, mustard, and celery salt, then mix with tuna. Cut pita bread in half and line with lettuce and tomato slices. Add tuna and serve. ; name: tuna noodle salad my way ; ingredients: egg noodles, tuna in water, green onion, hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, season salt, ground pepper, dill relish, celery ; preparation:Boil water in a 5 quart pan and cook egg noodles to al dente. Drain and let cool. Drain tuna and combine with onion, celery mayonnaise, dill pickle relish add chopped boiled eggs. Mix well. Add season salt and ground pepper and mix well. Taste. Add more seasoning or mayonnaise to your liking. Best if chilled for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. ; name: mixed bean and tomato salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook green and yellow beans in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain beans and put in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking, then drain. Combine vinegar, oil, salt and pepper with a whisk in a large bowl. Add beans, onion and tomatoes and toss gently. Cover and refrigerate. Right before serving, add basil and feta cheese and toss. ; name: white bean tuna and tomato salad ; ingredients: chunk light tuna, small white beans, ripe olives, tomatoes, celery, green onions, italian parsley, red wine and vinegar salad dressing, lettuce leaf, hardboiled egg ; preparation:

name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: turkey chile casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, diced green chilies, onion, cream of chicken soup, corn tortillas, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: mini turkey loaves ; ingredients: ground turkey, apple, onion, old fashioned oats, dijon-style mustard, dried rosemary, poultry seasoning, salt, cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: beefy turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, lemon juice, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add more bouillon if you like a stronger beef flavor. Let it sit for about 15 minutes to soak all the flavor. Take wax paper, parchment paper or foil and cut 12 square shaped pieces. Lay the wax paper down on the counter, and make a patty from the meat and place on top, layer another sheet and patty up to 2 patties. I made 12 patties, but you can make bigger ones than i did. Place remaining patties and wax paper in a gallon sized freezer bag. Freeze nicely for up to a month. Pull them out as needed. Great grilled or even just placed in the broiler. Cooking time is about 10-15 minutes. ; name: ground beef stuffing casserole ; ingredients: onion, celery, poultry seasoning, dry bread, cream of mushroom soup, milk, ground beef, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Mix onion, celery, poultry seasoning and bread cubes. Add one can of the soup and the milk. Set aside. In a large bowl mix the ground beef and the mustard and worcestershire. Add the bread mixture. Mix thoroughly. Spread into a 9x13 pan. Spread the other can of cream of mushroom soup over the top. Bake at 375 for about 1 hour. If this starts to get brown on top or looks too dry, cover with foil. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: broccoli turkey supreme ; ingredients: cooked turkey breast, condensed cream of chicken soup, frozen broccoli florets, chicken rice pilaf mix, milk, chicken broth, celery, sliced water chestnuts, mayonnaise, onion ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine all of the ingredients. Transfer to a greased 3-qt. Baking dish. Cover and bake at 325 for 1 hour. Uncover. Bake 15-20 minutes longer or until rice is tender. ; name: ground turkey and barley casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, celery, bell pepper, quick-cooking barley, tomato paste, beef broth, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: garlicky hummus ; ingredients: garlic, garbanzo beans, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, part-skim ricotta cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, allspice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Wrap garlic heads in aluminum foil. Cook in oven until very soft, about 30 minutes. Remove from oven, and allow to cool in the foil. When cool, cut each head in half horizontally, and squeeze cloves into the bowl of a food processor. Add remaining ingredients, and puree until smooth. Add up to 2 tablespoons water if mixture is too thick. Refrigerate in an airtight container, up to 3 days, until ready to serve. Great served with pita chip or crackers. ; name: homemade hummus ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, toasted sesame seeds, fresh lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, corn oil, hot sauce ; preparation:While garbanzo beans are being drained, place sesame seeds in food processor and process till very finely ground. Add the drained garbanzo beans and process till pured. Add lemon juice, garlic powder and salt. Process till smooth. Add oil and hot sauce. Process till well blended. Let stand 1 hour at room temperature to blend flavors. Serve with your favorite dippers. ; name: curry currant hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, olive oil, garlic cloves, curry powder, lemon juice, water, salt, dried currant ; preparation:Combine chick peas, olive oil, crushed garlic, curry powder, lemon juice and water in a food processor or blender. Puree until smooth. Add salt to taste. Transfer to a bowl and gently stir in currants by hand. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 4 hour for flavours to blend. ; name: moroccan vegetable topped hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic clove, salt, cumin, tomatoes, green onions, parsley ; preparation:Combine chick-peas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, cummin and salt in a food processor, and process until smooth. Combine tomato, green onions and parsley in a small bowl. Place chick-pea mixture in mediums serving bowl. Spoon tomato mixture evenly over top. Serve with wedges of pita bread or assorted crackers. ; name: cilantro hummus with crispy garlic pita ; ingredients: garlic cloves, red chilies, fresh cilantro, garbanzo beans, lime, juice of, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, pita breads ; preparation:Place the garlic, chillies and cilantro in a food processor and whizz until finely chopped. Add the garbanzos and whizz until well blended. With the motor running, squeeze in the lime juice and drizzle in the olive oil to make a fairly coarse paste. Season well to taste and spoon into a serving bowl. Meanwhile, mix together the olive oil, garlic and parsley and season. Heat one side of the pita breads under a hot broiler for about 1 minute until well browned. Turn over the bread, then use a knife to slash the softer surface 4-5 times without cutting through the bread. Brush with the herb and oil mixture and return to the broiler until bubbling and toasted. When cool, break into pieces and serve with the hummus. ; name: pollinate hummus ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, olive oil, water, fresh lemon juice, garlic cloves, salt, sesame seeds, tahini, nutritional yeast, cumin ; preparation:Put water, oil, lemon juice, salt, garlic cloves, sesame seeds, tahini, nutritional yeast and cumin into a blender. Blend thoroughly. Add beans in 1 cup increments and blend until smooth each time. 5 cups of dried beans makes 7. 5 cups cooked, do not use heat-treated beans - they are icky. ; name: healthy holiday hummus ragu ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, rag pasta sauce, feta cheese, fresh cilantro, canola oil, olive oil, lime, corn tortillas, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place 2 cups garbanzo beans in a food processor. Press for 30 seconds, add olive oil, lime juice, salt. Continue pressing until smooth hummus consistency. Heat a skillet and add ragu sauce until warm. Place on a bowl. Using the same skillet, add canola oil and rest of whole garbanzo beans and heat until crisp. Assemble the hummus by placing garbanzo dip first, ragu sauce, crispy garbanzo beans on top. Sprinkle cilantro, lime, feta cheese, salt and pepper. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: lebanese hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, sesame oil, lemon juice, turmeric, chili powder, cilantro, paprika, salt ; preparation:

name: spicy citrus grilled chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, lime, juice and zest of, orange, juice and zest of, olive oil, dried oregano, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f. ; name: sweet spicy garlic grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, pepper jelly, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, dried italian herb seasoning, oil, seasoning salt ; preparation:Combine jelly, garlic, herbs, and oil. Spread mixture between skin and meat of each thigh. Place in a large ziplock bag with thighs. Refrigerate overnight. Prepare grill. Remove chicken sprinkle lightly seasoned salt. Cook marinade for 5 minutes over medium low flame. Grill 25-30 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked throughout. Discard skin if you want before serving. Top with spicy marinade. ; name: marinated herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, herbs, garlic ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: grilled or broiled rosemary chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh rosemary, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Mix together the garlic, oil, mustard and lemon juice in a blender and porcess until smooth. Add rosemary and pepper. Brush over chicken pieces, cover, and chill 6 hours or overnight. Discard any excess marinade. Prepare grill by brushing grates lightly with oil andheating to medium heat. Grill chicken 12 minutes, flip over and cook another 20-25 minutes or until fully cooked. Or, if broiling, preheat broiler to the broil setting and place chicken on an oiled broiling pan. Broil about 7 inches from the heat source for about 25 minutes, flip over and broil another 20 minutes or until fully cooked. ; name: pan roasted chicken and veggies ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, black pepper, dried rosemary, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh spinach ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving. ; name: italian herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian dressing, oregano, lemon pepper, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Mix mayo and seasonings. One hour before grill time, brush both sides of each breast with about half of mixture & return to refrigerator. Grill for 6-9 minutes each side generously coating each side with mixture. We usually grill 4 minutes, brush & flip then 4 minutes two times each side -- if that makes any sense. Great on ciabatta bread as a sammie, try over rice and even the left overs are great sliced up on a salad. ; name: baked chicken with onions garlic rosemary ; ingredients: chicken parts, salt, pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Position oven rack in center of oven. Preheat to 400f degrees. Rinse chicken parts& pat dry. Season liberally with salt& pepper. In a large bowl, toss together onion rings, garlic, oil& rosemary. Spread half of the onion mixture in a shallow baking dish or roasting pan just large enough to hold the chicken pieces in a single layer. Arrange the chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes. ; name: north beach grilled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dried oregano, dried basil, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, boneless skinless chicken thighs ; preparation:

name: two part lemonade ; ingredients: water, sugar, lemons, lemon juice, salt, ice water ; preparation:For the syrup, bring the water and the sugar to a boil in a medium-sized saucepan. Cook for 5 minutes, until sugar is dissolved. Add the lemon zest. Allow mixture to cool to lukewarm. Pour into a glass jar and store in the refrigerator. For the lemonade, combine the lemon juice, salt, syrup, and ice water in tall pitcher. Stir well and pour into tall, ice filled glasses. ; name: strawberry watermelon vinaigrette ; ingredients: strawberry, lemon, watermelon, salt, white wine vinegar, sugar, oil, mixed greens ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except oil in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth. With machine running, add oil in a. Thin stream. Process until well blended. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days. Chill before serving. Serve on leaf lettuce or mixed baby greens. Does not include chilling time. ; name: berry syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, berries, vanilla, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Enjoy. ; name: lime and lemonade ; ingredients: frozen lemonade concentrate, ice cubes, lime juice, limes, carbonated lemonade ; preparation:Place ice cubes, lime juice and frozen lemonade concentrate in a blender, and blend until ice is very fine. Place this lemon slush in a freezer safe tray, cover and freeze for at least two hours. Slice the 8 limes very thin, reserve a few for glasses and the top of the pitcher. Put the remaining limes in a large pitcher. Layer the slush over the sliced limes. Just before serving add the carbonated lemonade. ; name: red white and blue frozen dessert ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, lemons, rind of, plain yogurt, miniature marshmallows, pecans, strawberry, fresh blueberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, lemon juice and peel and mix well. Stir in yogurt, marshmallows and nuts. Spread half of mixture in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Layer half of the strawberries and half of the blueberries on top. Layer with remaining yogurt mixture and end with rest of berries on top. Cover and freeze for at least 2 hours. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving. ; name: raspberry watermelon sorbet ; ingredients: watermelon, raspberries, granulated sugar, orange juice ; preparation:In a blender, blend watermelon, raspberries, sugar and orange juice until smooth. Press through fine sieve, discarding seeds. Freeze in 13 x 9 inch metal cake pan until solid, about 2 hours. Break up and puree. Freeze in airtight container until firm, about 1 hour. ; name: strawberry banana summer sherbet ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, bananas, orange juice, fresh lemon juice, milk ; preparation:Roughly mash the strawberries, leaving some chunks. Stir in sugar or splenda. Mash bananas and add to strawberries. Mix well. Add orange juice and lemon juice. Stir in milk and blend well. Pour mixture evenly into 4 ice cube trays. Set trays on a cookie sheet and set in freezer. Freeze solid. When ready to serve, put sherbet cubes in fancy dessert glasses. Let set a few minutes to thaw slightly. ; name: strawberry watermelon lemonade ; ingredients: watermelon, strawberries, sugar, frozen lemonade, fresh lemon juice, lemon slice ; preparation:

name: crispy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken broth, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, frozen mixed vegetables, ritz crackers, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Boil your chicken in a pot of water with the chicken broth. When the chicken is done let it cool. Then debone the chicken and remove the skin. Cut chicken meat into bite size pieces. Cook the vegetables and drain liquid. In a large bowl mix chicken meat, vegetables, sour cream, can of soup, and spices. Place chicken mixture in 13x9 casserole dish. In another bowl crush ritz crackers into small pieces and spread over chicken mixture. Place dots of butter all over the crackers. Place in oven preheated at 350 for about 45 minutes or until bubbly in the middle. If crakers start to get too brown before done place a piece of tin foil over the top of chicken. ; name: baby food chicken ; ingredients: butter, unbleached flour, milk, chicken, potato, white cheddar cheese, vegetables, salt ; preparation:Grill or bake chicken, remove bones and shred. Bake or boil potato and chop into small cubes or mash. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add milk, flour, and cheese and make a sauce. Add chicken and potato to it. Add remaining ingredients. ; name: crispy balsamic baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, dry parsley flakes, garlic powder, garlic salt, balsamic vinegar, egg whites, boneless chicken breasts, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, and salt in medium bowl and mix. Whisk together vinegar and egg whites in smaller bowl. Dip chicken in vinegar mixture then dry mixture. Place on sprayed cookie sheet. Spray the top of the chicken breasts with cooking spray. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper. Bake 400 for 30-40 minutes, till fork tender and juices run clear. ; name: butter baked chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, evaporated milk, flour, salt, pepper, butter, cream of chicken soup, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy. ; name: chicken nuggets made with shredded wheat ; ingredients: shredded wheat cereal, parmesan cheese, seasoning salt, paprika, garlic powder, low-fat mayonnaise, honey, prepared mustard, chicken breast ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a bowl blend cereal, parmesan cheese, seasoned salt, paprika and garlic powder. In a different bowl mix mayo, honey and mustard. Stir chicken into wet mixture then roll in dry mixture to coat evenly. Place on rack in shallow backing pan. Bake 15-20 min or until slightly browned and done. ; name: delicious chicken ; ingredients: chicken broth, cornstarch, prepared mustard, dried dill weed, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, wide egg noodles ; preparation:In a bowl, combine chicken broth, cornstarch, mustard and dill weed. Mix well and set aside. Heat butter in large skillet. Saute chicken and onion until lightly browned. Slowly add chicken broth to chicken, stirring constantly over medium heat, bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and cook until slightly thickned. Pour chicken mixture over hot cooked noodles and toss, serve. ; name: crispy brown sugar baked chicken and potatoes ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, potatoes, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, garlic powder, parsley, basil, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease or spray a large glass baking dish. Mix all dry ingredients in large ziptop bag. Rinse chicken, place into bag and shake to coat chicken. Remove chicken from bag and set aside. Add potatoes to bag and shake to coat. Pour potatoes and any extra flour and sugar mixture into greased baking dish. Add chicken to top of potatoes. Place butter cut into small peices around baking dish. Cover with foil and bake 45-60 minutes. Remove foil and broil for 1-5 minutes to make top of chicken crispy. ; name: crispy chicken ; ingredients: crisp rice cereal, all-purpose flour, salt, dried thyme, poultry seasoning, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: mexican dinner pronto ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, tamales, chili without beans, chili with beans, oregano, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:In skillet heat oil. Saute onion until tender. Transfer to ovenproof baking dish. Arrange half the tamales and gravy over onions. Add the two cans of chili. Sprinkle with oregano. Top with remaining tamales. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes, or until bubbling hot. Remove from oven. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 15 minutes more or until cheese has melted. ; name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: green chilie squash casserole ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, biscuit mix, green chilies, onion, garlic clove, cheddar cheese, zucchini ; preparation:Combine eggs, oil, and biscuit mix. Stir in chillies, onion, garlic and half of the cheese. Stir in squash. Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake 5 minutes more. ; name: mexican cornbread hamburger casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, salt, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, mexican cornbread mix, eggs, milk, cream-style corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown meat with salt and bell peppers. Drain. Put into 13 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream corn over meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Mix cornbread mix, eggs, and milk until blended and pour over casserole. Bake at 425 for 25-30 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: vegan mexican tortilla pizzas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, taco sauce, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, green onions, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place tortillas on baking sheet. Bake for 3-4 minutes until crisp. Spread beans evenly over tortillas. Spread taco sauce evenly over beans. Top with ingredients of your choosing. Bake for 7-8 minutes. Top with any additional ingredients. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: mexican squash ; ingredients: butter, calabaza squash, onion, garlic cloves, whole kernel corn, green chilies, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Melt butter ina large skillet. Add squash, onion, and garlic. Saute about 8 minutes or until squash is crisp-tender. Stir in corn and chiles. Spoon inot a 1 quart casserole. Top with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: church breakfast casserole ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, salsa verde, breakfast sausage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. After browning and crumbling the breakfast sausage, place it in the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Beat eggs, add cheese and salsa verde. Pour egg mixture over the sausage. Bake for 45 minutes or until eggs are set. ; name: vegetarian mexican breakfast casserole ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, green bell pepper, eggs, sour cream, flour tortillas, pace picante sauce, cheese ; preparation:

name: double chocolate cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, water, vegetable oil, vinegar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: mincemeat fruitcake cookies ; ingredients: vegetable oil, granulated sugar, egg, almond extract, mincemeat, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, candied red cherries, green glazed cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f, & lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In large bowl, beat oil & sugar until light. Beat in egg & almond extract until smooth. Stir in mincemeat. In medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder & salt. Beat into egg mixture until blended. Stir in cherries. Drop by rounded teasoonfuls onto parchment paper lined baking sheets. Bake 12-14 minutes, or until lightly brown & firm. Cool on wire rack. ; name: fresh cherry pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, sugar, flour, salt, almond extract, tart cherries, butter ; preparation:Combine sugar, flour and salt. Add almond extract to cherries and toss with sugar flour mixture to mix well. Pour into pastry lined 9 inch pie pan. Put on top crust. Bake at 400 for about 40 minutes. If edges brown too much cover it with aluminum foil. The syrup does bubble and may spill over a little so i set the pie on a cookie sheet then baked it. ; name: mango cake ; ingredients: mangoes, ground almonds, sugar, eggs, baking powder ; preparation:Puree mangoes till smooth and you have about 2 cups of puree. Place almonds, sugar and baking powder into food processor. Combine well then pour in puree, blend well. Add eggs one at a time. Pour batter into greased 20 cm cake tin. Bake 180 c for 1 hour. Cool in tin for 10 minutes. ; name: cherry pie ; ingredients: cherries, sugar, flour, cinnamon, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie ; preparation:Mix ingredients for filling. Place in pastry-lined pie pan. Put top crust on. Cut vent slits in top crust, and flute edges. Brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 425f for 25 minutes, reduce heat to 350f and bake for 25-30 minutes more. Add the cherries and toss to coat. This coats them more even than doing it in a bowl and the filling is firmer. ; name: cherry bombs ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, eggs, white sugar, maraschino cherries, powdered sugar ; preparation:Drain cherries, leave in strainer over a bowl. Put the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a mixing bowl. Cut in softened butter with 2 forks. Stir thoroughly with for, continuing to cut until the mixture looks like coarse meal. Beat the eggs in a medium-sized bowl and combine with sugar. Add eggs and sugar mixture to the rest of the ingredients and stir until thoroughly mixed. Extract small bits of dought with your fingers and wrap them around each maraschino cherry, leaving the stem sticking out. Press the bottoms of the dough-wrapped cherries on a greased baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes. Let the cookies cool on the cookie sheet. Then dip them in powdered sugar so only the cookie part it covered, not the stem. ; name: cherry cake apparently for two ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, eggs, almond extract, flour, baking powder, ground almonds, red glazed cherries ; preparation:

name: beefy green bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, bread, milk, celery, onion, low-sodium worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, green beans, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Soak bread in milk, then add to ground beef along with celery, onion, worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Shape into small balls. Bake in a 325-degree fahrenheit oven until brown. Drain grease from meatballs. Combine meatballs and green beans in casserole dish and pour soup on top. Return to oven and bake at 300 degrees for 1 to 1 hours. ; name: victory s taco tater tot casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, taco seasoning, corn, fiesta nacho cheese soup, tater tots, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown beef drain. Stir in taco seasoning and water and simmer for 5 minutes. Add corn soup put in 9 x 13 pan and top with tater tots. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. Take out top with cheese put back in oven for 5 minutes or till cheese is melted. Add ketchup or taco sauce when served tastes very good enjoy. ; name: green bean medley ; ingredients: fresh green beans, carrots, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, seasoning salt, garlic, white pepper ; preparation:Steam or cook carrots and green beans in boiling water. Cook until tender, but still firm. Melt butter over medium heat. Saute onions and mushrooms until almost tender. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 3 minutes. Stir in green beans, carrots, seasoned salt, garlic, and white pepper. Cover and cook five minutes on low heat. ; name: country style green beans with red potatoes ; ingredients: ham hock, green beans, onion, red potatoes, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Place the ham hock and onion into a 4 quart dutch oven and fill half way full with water. Season water with salt, pepper and garlic powder and bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat until meat falls off the bones, about 2 hours. Remove the bones and skin. Return the meat to the pot. Discard bones and skin. Add the green beans to the dutch oven and simmer for 20 minutes, then add the potatoes. Simmer for 10 to 15 minutes more, or until they can be easily pierced with a fork. ; name: jazzed up frozen green beans ; ingredients: frozen green beans, bacon, chicken broth, onion powder ; preparation:Cook frozen green beans according to package directions, using the lowest time given. In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally. ; name: shamrock casserole ; ingredients: frozen baby lima beans, frozen green beans, frozen green peas, cream cheese, mayonnaise, milk, green pepper, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Cook frozen vegetables separately according to package directions. Drain thoroughly. Soften cream cheese. Combine with mayonnaise and milk to make thin sauce. Place vegetables in layers in 8-inch casserole with green pepper slices between layers. Pour sauce over vegetables. Sprinkle heavily with parmesan cheese and lightly with paprika. Bake for 20 minutes at 350. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: tater tot green bean surprise ; ingredients: frozen tater tots, ground turkey, cut green beans, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: tasty bbq ribs ; ingredients: beef, barbecue sauce, spaghetti sauce, brown sugar ; preparation:Line a deep roasting pan with foil. Place ribs in the bottom of pan. Pour bbq sauce and spaghetti sauce over top. Sprinkle brown sugar on top of sauces. Do not mix, just leave it layered. Bake uncovered at 250 degrees fahrenheit for 6 hours, or at 225 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 hours. ; name: french dip roast beef sandwiches ; ingredients: bottom round steaks, onion soup mix, beef broth, beer, onion, rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place roast in a large roasting pan. Combine soup mix, broth and beer in a bowl and stir until soup mix is dissolved. Pour over roast and place onions around it. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into. ; name: roast beef sandwiches au jus ; ingredients: french onion soup, beef consomme, deli roast beef, provolone cheese, hoagie rolls, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium pot simmer roast beef slices, consomme, and soup until fully cooked. Meanwhile, slice hoagie rolls in half lengthwise, sprinkle with garlic and toast until golden brown. Once the meat has heated through and cooked down, place on half of the hoagie rolls and top with slices of cheese as needed to cover meat. Broil until cheese melted and bubbly. Spread mayo on other half of hoagie rolls and top, cutting sandwich in half diagonally. Cut on a diagonal and serve with au jus on the side. ; name: barbecued wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, tomato sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. In a shallow baking pan, arrange the chicken wings so they do not touch each other. Bake for 30 minutes. In small sauce pan combine the tomato sauce, sugar and soy sauce and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm. ; name: tangy barbecue ham sandwiches ; ingredients: italian tomato soup, crushed pineapple, root beer, onion, brown sugar, ham, hamburger buns ; preparation:In 2-qt saucepan, combine soup, pineapple, root beer, onion, and brown sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, for about 10 minutes. Add ham and toss gently to distribute. Continue cooking over medium heat for additional 5 minutes. Spoon ham onto buns or rolls and serve. ; name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: beef and black bean sauce ; ingredients: oil, onion, round steaks, green beans, mushrooms, black bean garlic sauce, beef stock, bean sprouts, hokkien noodles ; preparation:Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice. ; name: smoky barbecue beef sandwiches ; ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, teriyaki sauce, chipotle chile in adobo, salt, hoagie rolls ; preparation:

name: almond spritz press cookies ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, egg, sifted flour, salt, baking powder, almond extract, food coloring ; preparation:Cream shortening, adding sugar in gradually. Add unbeaten egg, sifted dry ingredients, flavoring and a few drops of food coloring. Mix well. Fill cookie press. Form cookies on ungreased cookie sheets using the tree plate. Decorate with tiny multi-colored sprinkles. Bake at 400f for 6-8 minutes. Cool just slightly and remove from cookie sheet to cooling rack. ; name: almond meringue cookies ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, almond extract, splenda sugar substitute, blanched almond ; preparation:Prehat oven to 250 degrees f. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Place egg whites in a totally grease free bowl and beat until frothy add cream of tartar, beat at high speed until soft peaks form. Beat in the almond extract and the sugar, 1 tbsp at a time. Continue to beat until the meringue is shiny& stiff. Gently fold in the almonds. Drop by tbsp onto the parchment covered cookie sheet. Bake in the center of the oven for 30 minutes, then turn the oven off, do not open the oven door and let the cookies sit for another 30 minutes remove from the oven and cool on the baking sheets before trying to remove. Keep in tighly closed tins. ; name: almond cream spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, almond extract, vanilla, all-purpose flour, almonds ; preparation:Beat butter and cream cheese in a large mixing bowl until well combined. Add sugar, almond extract, and vanilla. Beat till combined. Beat in flour. Cover and chill dough for 30 minutes or till easily worked but not too stiff. Pack dough into a cookie press. Force dough through press onto ungreased cookie sheets. Sprinkle with almonds. Bake in a 375 oven for 8-10 minutes or till edges of cookies are firm but not brown. Remove cookies and cool on wire racks. ; name: peanut butter and banana cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, banana, light brown sugar, butter, peanut butter, egg, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Grease cookie sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a small bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks. ; name: no flour peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: flourless peanut chocolate cookies martha stewart ; ingredients: sugar, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, creamy peanut butter, egg, semi-sweet chocolate chips, roasted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small bowl combine sugar, soda and salt. In a large bowl, stir together sugar-soda-salt-mix, egg and vanilla until well combined. I used a wire whisk for this step. Now add in the peanut butter, stir with a spoon til well combined and smooth. Fold in chocolate chips and roasted peanut pieces. With moistened hands, roll dough, about 1 heaping tablespoon at a time, into balls. Place 2 inches apart on two baking sheets. Bake for about 12-14 minutes. Cookies will still be slightly soft, but firm up while cooling. Allow to set on baking sheet for a couple of minutes and then transfer to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: simple chinese almond cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, almond extract, flour, baking soda, salt, sliced almonds, egg white, water ; preparation:

name: scrambled egg and tomato ; ingredients: plum tomato, fresh basil, eggs, water, garlic, olive oil, paprika, pepper, seasoning ; preparation:Combine the tomato and basil and set aside. Beat the egg, water and garlic together. Heat oil, add the egg mixture. Cook and stir gently until the egg is nearly set. Sprinkle with paprika. Add the tomato mixture and the pepper. Cook and stir until the egg is completely set and the tomatoes are heated through. Serve with toast or english muffin. ; name: caramelized onion and goat cheese pizza ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, pizza crust, pizza sauce, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, goat cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges. ; name: tomato basil chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, water, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, tomato soup, milk, parmesan cheese, dried basil leaves, garlic powder ; preparation:In medium skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and water and cook 10 minutes or until browned. Add more water if necessary to prevent chicken from getting too dry. Set chicken aside. Pour off fat and water. Add remaining ingredients. Heat to a boil. Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: tomatoes and peppers for lunch ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, balsamic vinaigrette, tomatoes, red pepper, fat free mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Toast your bread. Douse with a balsamic vinaigrette add thinly sliced tomatoes. Add a layer of roasted peppers, any color. Add mozzarella. Sprinkle with herbs and salt and pepper. If you want melted cheese, place in broiler for a few minutes, do not nuke it, this will make it soggy. ; name: pesto tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, salt & pepper, pesto sauce, diced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on a cookie sheet. Place fish on the foil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with pesto, tomatoes and then cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until fish flakes with fork. To prevent wasting the rest of the pesto in the jar, i make one recipe for dinner and freeze the ingredients to have another day. Just place each of the ingredients in its own quart-size freezer bag, then place all in a gallon-size freezer bag along with directions and freeze. When ready to make, just thaw completely and follow the above directions to prepare. ; name: roasted eggplant and tomato pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, japanese eggplant, mozzarella cheese, plum tomatoes, pesto sauce, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Arrange eggplant slices in single layer on greased baking tray. Sprinkle eggplant slices with salt, bake until soft and golden. Turn heat up to 515 and place pizza stone in oven. Roll out pizza dough on cornmeal coated paddle, lightly coat with oil. Sprinkle dough with mozzarella and arrange eggplant in a spoke pattern. Sprinkle with tomatoes and dot with pesto. Bake 8-10 minutes. ; name: one pot tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes with juice, sweet onion, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves, basil sprigs, vegetable broth, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: tomato basil strata ; ingredients: bread, tomatoes, green onion, mozzarella cheese, eggs, milk, butter, basil, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: fruit and wild rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, celery, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, long grain and wild rice blend, raisins, pecans ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add onions and celery. Cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add broth, water, rice, contents of seasoning packet, and fruit. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in pecans and serve. ; name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: lemon cilantro rice pilaf ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, water, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, ground turmeric, salt, green onion, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated lemon rind, lemon juice, turmeric and salt. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in green onions and cilantro. ; name: asian salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, head of cabbage ; preparation:Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: basic rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, rice, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in saucepan and cook onion over medium heat until golden. Stir in rice and cook for 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in chicken stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in parsley. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: lemon wild rice salad ; ingredients: rice pilaf mix, marinated artichokes, tomatoes, red bell pepper, parsley, capers, lemons, rind of, lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: boneless pork chops with spicy rub ; ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, dried oregano, ground cumin, ground black pepper, pork chops, lime ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, oregano, cumin and pepper. Rub the mixture evenly over the pork chops. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Heat broiler. Broil pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Or you could also bake the chops at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or till done. Serve immediately, with 2 wedges of lime for each chop. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: chili rub for pork ; ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Trim fat and slash edges at 1 inch intervals.
