In bowl, combine dry ingredients. Stir in oil. Rub all over chops. Grease grill and cook until juices run clear. Approx 8 minutes. ; name: grilled pork rub ; ingredients: brown sugar, garlic powder, chili powder, ground black pepper, oregano leaves, salt, pork tenderloin ; preparation:Mix seasonings in small bowl. Coat pork evenly with the rub. Refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 3 hours for extra flavor. Grill over medium heat 25 to 30 minutes or until desired doneness, turning occasionally. Let pork stand 5 minutes before cutting into thin slices. Test kitchen. ; name: chili mint rub ; ingredients: leg of lamb, cooking oil, garlic, hot chili paste, fresh ground black pepper, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Leave lamb to get to room temperature. Place all other items in food blender to create a paste. Spread half of mixture over lamb, alow to stand for 2 hours. Place in foil tray and cover with rest of mixture. Cover tray with foil. Cook for 1 hour in covered bbq. Remove foil and cook a further 30 minutes, or until done to your taste. Mint leaves to be loose packed. ; name: herb roasted chicken ; ingredients: chicken, butter, lemon juice, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried sage, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: sauteed chicken breasts w fresh herbs and ginger ; ingredients: peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice of, chicken broth, fresh gingerroot, fresh basil leaf, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken. ; name: chicken spice rub ; ingredients: salt, sweet hungarian paprika, dark brown sugar, ground black pepper, celery seed, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: honey roasted cinnamon pecans ; ingredients: pecans, honey, butter, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Melt together honey and butter. Remove from heat and mix in cinnamon and salt. Pour over nuts and mix well. Spread mixture on jelly roll pan and bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes, stirring a few times during bake time. Spread mixture onto wax paper and cool completely. Break nuts apart and store in airtight container. ; name: cajun spiced pecans ; ingredients: unsalted butter, pecan halves, light brown sugar, paprika, chili powder, ground cumin, cider vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes. ; name: pecan bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, milk, egg, pecans ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Mix milk and egg and add to dry ingredients. Mix, do not beat. Stir in pecans. Baked in greased loaf pan in a 350 preheated oven about 1 hour. Best kept a day or two before eating. Freezes well, great thinly sliced with cream cheese. ; name: pecan butter cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: cinnamon toast pecans ; ingredients: butter, light corn syrup, sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, pecan halves ; preparation:Oreheat oven to 250 degrees f,. Stir together first 5 ingredients. Add pecans. Tossing to coat. Spread coated nuts in a single layer. On a jelly roll pan. Bake for 1 hour. Stirring everu 15 minutes. Let cool. Store in an airtight container. Up to 2 weeks. ; name: honey chipotle pecans ; ingredients: honey, dried chipotle powder, ground cinnamon, pecan halves, sugar, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a skillet, warm honey with chipotle powder and cinnamon over low heat, then add the nuts and stir to coat evenly. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, then spread nuts evenly in a single layer on the sheet. Bake in preheated oven until nuts are fragrant. Allow to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine sugar and salt. Add the warm pecans, and toss to coat evenly. Spread out on fresh sheet of waxed paper and let dry completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: southern style pecan fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla, salt, pecans ; preparation:Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares. ; name: mag s extra special extra delicious candied pecans ; ingredients: water, egg white, sugar, salt, cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:

name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: pineapple cheesecake squares ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, pecans, egg, crushed pineapple in syrup, cream cheese, powdered sugar, eggs ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients of bottom layer well. Press mixture in a well greased 9x13 pan. Top with pineapples. Mix remaining ingredients well and pour over pineapples. Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes until slightly browned. Cool completely and cut into squares. Serve cold, frozen or warm. ; name: little cheesecakes ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla, chocolate wafers, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake. ; name: high protein no guilt skinny cheesecake ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, eggs, low-fat sour cream, whey powder, splenda granular, lemon, juice and rind of, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 deg f. Put the cottage cheese, eggs, sour cream, whey powder, splenda, lemon rind an juice, and vanilla extract in a blender, and blend until very smooth. Pour mixed into a sprayed pie pan. Place the cake on the top rack of the oven and place a flat pan of water on the bottom rack. Bake for 30-40 minutes. Cook, then chill well before serving. ; name: low sugar low fat lemon cheesecake ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon cookies, margarine, low-fat cream cheese, splenda sugar substitute, sugar, lemon juice, low-fat sour cream, lemon peel, vanilla, egg substitute ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix cookie crumbs with the melted butter and press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan. Bake for 6 - 8 minutes and remove from oven. Next using a mixer, beat softened cream cheese, sugar and sugar substitute, eggs, vanilla, lemon zest, lemon juice and sour cream until creamy. Pour mixture into the baked cookie crust and return to the oven for 30-40 minutes, or until set depending on your oven. While cheese cake is in the oven, mix the topping and set aside. Remove cheese cake from the oven and let cool slightly. After the cake has cooled, pour the sour cream mixture over the top of the cake and return to the oven for 10 minutes. When the topping is set, remove from the oven and let cool for 30 minutes and then place the cheesecake into the fridge until completely cold. Before serving, run a butter knife around the edges or the sides of your pan and carefully remove for slicing. ; name: fruit and mascarpone italian cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, mascarpone cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, kiwi, strawberry ; preparation:Combine mascarpone, powdered sugar, and whipping cream in a medium bowl. Beat until creamy. Spread mixture evenly onto crust. Chill thoroughly in the refridgerator for at least 1 hour. Arrange sliced fruit over pie before serving. ; name: strawberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crusts, fat-free evaporated milk, fat free cream cheese, egg, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, lemon, rind of, fresh strawberries, strawberry jelly ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place evaporated milk, cream cheese, egg, sugar, flour and lemon peel in blender, cover. Blend until smooth, pour into crust. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Arrange strawberries on top of pie. Drizzle with jelly. Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving. ; name: low calorie cheesecake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, orange juice, sugar, orange zest, unflavored gelatin, eggs, vanilla extract, neufchatel cheese, 9 inch pie shell ; preparation:

name: crab omelet ; ingredients: crabmeat, parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, eggs, water, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:Mix the flaked crabmeat with the cheese and season with salt and pepper. Lightly beat the eggs in a bowl with the water and salt and pepper. Melt the butter in a small skillet and when the froth subsides, pour in the eggs. Place the crab and cheese on top of the eggs just when the eggs are beginning to set. Pour on the cream while the eggs are still liquid and transfer under a hot broiler for a few minutes until the top is golden brown. Do not fold, but slide on to a hot plate and serve immediately. ; name: crabby appetizer ; ingredients: green onions, crabmeat, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, chili powder, pepper, muffins ; preparation:Mix everything except muffins. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm. ; name: cheesy crab burritos ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, imitation crabmeat, flour tortillas, salsa ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese and cheddar cheese. Stir in the crab. Spoon down the center of each tortilla. Roll up tightly and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes or until heated through. Serve with salsa. ; name: easy crab spread ; ingredients: light cream cheese, light sour cream, imitation crabmeat, lemon juice, garlic salt, cracker ; preparation:Place crab in food processor and process until it is in small pieces. Remove to mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Chill. Serve with crackers. ; name: crabmeat dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, prepared horseradish, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine everything in a small bowl that can be put in the oven or toaster oven. Stir together until fairly smooth. Place in the oven at 350 degrees for 30 minutes until edges are brown. Let cool for 30 minutes and serve with triscuits. Best served warm. ; name: crab pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, alfredo sauce, crabmeat, green onions, sliced mushrooms, bacon, old bay seasoning, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place pizza dough on a lightly greased pizza pan and press out to 12 inches. Evenly distribute alfredo sauce. Evenly distribute crab meat. Evenly distribute cheddar and motzarella cheeses. Top with the old bay seasoning, onions, bacon and mushrooms. Bake on the lowest rack for 20-25 minutes. ; name: company crab casserole ; ingredients: crabmeat, milk, soft breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, butter, onion, green peppers, pimiento, salt, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Pour milk over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean. ; name: cream cheese and crab wontons ; ingredients: cream cheese, imitation crabmeat, garlic powder, pepper, onion, wonton wrappers, butter, vegetable oil, sweet and sour sauce ; preparation:

name: apple graham cracker dessert ; ingredients: light apple pie filling, butter, splenda sugar substitute, eggs, vanilla extract, graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt, nonfat milk, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: no bake citrus cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, lemon gelatin, boiling water, philadelphia cream cheese, fresh lemon rind, lemon, juice of, cool whip topping ; preparation:Combine graham crumbs with melted butter. Press on bottom of 9 in. Springform pan. Dissolve jelly powder with boiling water in large glass bowl. Make sure jelly powder is completely dissolved before adding cream cheese. Blend in cream cheese with a hand mixer on low speed. Whisk in juice and rind of lemon and whipped topping. Pour over prepared crust. Smooth top. Chill 4 hrs. ; name: low sugar low fat lemon cheesecake ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon cookies, margarine, low-fat cream cheese, splenda sugar substitute, sugar, lemon juice, low-fat sour cream, lemon peel, vanilla, egg substitute ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix cookie crumbs with the melted butter and press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan. Bake for 6 - 8 minutes and remove from oven. Next using a mixer, beat softened cream cheese, sugar and sugar substitute, eggs, vanilla, lemon zest, lemon juice and sour cream until creamy. Pour mixture into the baked cookie crust and return to the oven for 30-40 minutes, or until set depending on your oven. While cheese cake is in the oven, mix the topping and set aside. Remove cheese cake from the oven and let cool slightly. After the cake has cooled, pour the sour cream mixture over the top of the cake and return to the oven for 10 minutes. When the topping is set, remove from the oven and let cool for 30 minutes and then place the cheesecake into the fridge until completely cold. Before serving, run a butter knife around the edges or the sides of your pan and carefully remove for slicing. ; name: mock cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, applesauce, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, lemon juice ; preparation:Grease and flour springform pan or spray with pam. Preheat oven to 325dg. Combine grahamcracker crumbs, melted butter and sugar. Press into bottom and up sides of springform pan. Bake for 5 minutes, then remove to cool. Blend together applesauce, condensed milk slightly beaten eggs and lemon juice. Pour mixture over prepared crust and bake at 325 for 30 minutes. Refrigerate overnight before removingfrom pan and serving. ; name: low carb no bake cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, unflavored gelatin, splenda sugar substitute, boiling water, vanilla ; preparation:Mix gelatin and splenda. Add boiling water, stirring until dissolved. Beat the cream cheese with the vanilla. Slowly add the gelatin until well-mixed. Chill until firm. ; name: no bake key lime cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, unsalted butter, light cream cheese, whipped topping, key lime juice, lime zest, fat-free sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt the butter in a small microwave-safe bowl. Divide the graham cracker crumbs evenly amongst individual serving bowls or ramekins and press down to make a crust. Drizzle some of the butter over the crumbs in each dish. Place the bowls in the freezer. In a large mixing bowl, beat together the cream cheese, whipped topping, key lime juice, zest, and the condensed milk until well-combined. Remove the bowls from the freezer. Pipe or spoon the filling into each bowl. Add additional whipped topping and other desired toppings. Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: 8 minute cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, sour cream, vanilla, cool whip topping, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in sugar. Blend in sour cream and vanilla. Fold in whipped topping. Blend well. Spoon into crust. Chill until set. At least 4 hours. Garnish with your favorite topping or eat plain. ; name: splenda creamy cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, splenda granular, cream cheese, fat free cream cheese, lime juice, salt, eggs ; preparation:

name: savory vegetable rice casserole ; ingredients: basmati rice, cauliflower, chili pepper, eggs, fresh mushrooms, onion, tomatoes, olive oil, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the rice according to the method that you prefer. Steam the cauliflower until tender. Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the mushrooms and onions and saute until soft. Add the chile pepper and tomatoes, continue sauteing until completely cooked through. Mix the rice with the sauteed vegetables. Add the eggs and mix well. Add the paprika, and the salt and pepper to taste. Pour into a greased baking dish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. ; name: corn and rice ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, whole kernel corn, sweet creamy butter, salt, pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper ; preparation:Pepare either the rice a roni or the rice as directed by the instructions on the box or bag. Once the rice, or rice a roni, is fully cooked drain the corn and add it to the rice. Add the butter next. Then add the salt, pepper, and paprika. Add red pepper to taste, the more pepper the spicier the dish will be. Stir it all together and then let sit for 5 more minutes on low heat. Serve at once or place in fridge for a later meal. It will keep for about 4 days in the fridge. ; name: 5 star creamed corn ; ingredients: frozen corn, heavy whipping cream, whole milk, salt, sugar, cayenne pepper, butter, flour, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients, except butter and flour. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Blend melted butter with the flour to make a roux. Add roux to the corn and mix well. Remove from heat. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Broil until cheese is nicely browned. ; name: crispy scalloped corn ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, ground black pepper, bread, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, butter, crisp rice cereal ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine the eggs and milk. Add the sugar, black pepper, cubed bread, both cans of corn amd mix well. Pour into large baking dish that has been coated with non-stick cooking spray. Combine the softened butter and cereal and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle over top of corn mixture and bake, uncovered, until light golden brown. ; name: chicken wild rice chowder ; ingredients: fresh carrots, onion, celery, butter, all-purpose flour, chicken broth, cooked chicken breasts, long grain and wild rice blend, half-and-half cream, pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the carrots, onion and celery in butter til tender. Stir in flour til blended. Gradually add broth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or til thickened. Stir in chicken, rice, cream and pepper. Heat through. ; name: wild rice with walnuts and dates ; ingredients: celery, onion, butter, wild rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, dates, walnuts ; preparation:In a 10-inch skillet cook celery and onion in hot butter about 10 minutes or until tender. Add uncooked wild rice. Cook and stir 3 minutes. Add broth and water, bring to a boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 50 to 60 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Stir in dates and walnuts, cook, uncovered, for 3 to 4 minutes more or until heated through and remaining liquid is absorbed. ; name: corn sausage casserole ; ingredients: sausage, corn, milk, egg, saltine crackers, tater tots, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the sausage & drain. To the sausage, stir in the corn. Crumble the saltines by hand and add them. Whisk the egg with milk and stir into the sausage mixture. Add salt & pepper to taste. Pour into a baking dish & top with tater tots. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, until the tater tots are nice & golden brown. ; name: pioneer woman fresh corn and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: cooked wild rice, fresh corn kernels, eggs, heavy cream, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, butter, milk ; preparation:

name: broccoli and bell peppers ; ingredients: soy sauce, lemon juice, toasted sesame oil, broccoli florets, red sweet peppers ; preparation:For sauce, in a small bowl stir together soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame oil. Set aside. Place a steamer basket in a 12 inch skillet. Add enough water to come just below bottom of basket and bring to a boil. Place broccoli in steamer basket and reduce heat to medium low. Cover and steam for 4 minutes. Add sweet peppers. Cover and steam for 3 to 4 minutes more or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Transfer vegetables to a serving bowl. Drizzle sauce over vegetables and toss gently to coat. ; name: tri color peppers in garlic onions and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, green peppers, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, garlic cloves, red onion, parsley, cilantro, fresh tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large frying pan. Add peppers and onions and cook gently for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently. Add parsley, cilantro and garlic and cook another 2-3 minutes. Add chopped tomatoes and their juice to the pan, stir and season with salt and pepper. Cover the pan and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the peppers are tender but somewhat crisp. The sauce should be somewhat thick. If too much liquid remains when the peppers are crisp tender, remove the peppers and onions and boil rapidly to reduce the liquid. Check the seasoning again at this point. Add the peppers and onions back into the sauce, if necessary. Serve immediately. The dish may be made ahead of time and rewarmed when served. ; name: caramelized corn with onions and red bell peppers ; ingredients: fresh corn kernels, olive oil, red bell peppers, onion, garlic clove, fresh cilantro, chili powder ; preparation:Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn. Stir until beginning to dry and brown, about 8 minutes. Transfer to small bowl. Add oil to skillet. Heat over medium-high heat. Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic. Saut until peppers are tender, about 8 minutes. Mix in cilantro and chili powder, then corn. Stir until heated through, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: green bean and mint salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, red onion, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, lemon, juice and zest of, dijon mustard, olive oil, sour cream, tabasco sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator. ; name: bell pepper relish ; ingredients: red bell peppers, green bell peppers, onions, sugar, white vinegar, celery seeds, salt ; preparation:Grind or otherwise process peppers and onions into finely chopped, even mushy, consistency. Cover with boiling water and let stand 10 minutes. Drain well. Save juice to add to vinegar mixture if needed to cover vegetables. Add sugar, vinegar, celery seed and salt. Boil 15 minutes. Pour into sterilized canning jars and seal. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: lemon pepper capellini ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, light butter, garlic cloves, coarse black pepper, lemons, salt, capellini, basil leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place water on to boil for pasta. In a large skillet combine olive oil and butter over medium heat. Add garlic, pepper and the lemon zest. Salt water when it boils then cook cappellini to al dente, 2 to 3 minutes. Add a ladle of cooking water to lemon pepper butter and stir in the lemon juice. Drain pasta and toss with lemon-pepper butter and salt, to taste. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course. ; name: green bell pepper rings ; ingredients: green peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: spicy broccoli salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red bell pepper, miniature corn cobs, red onion, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, light brown sugar, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam broccoli florets for 2 minutes, then rinse quickly in cold water. Drain well. Place broccoli in serving bowl, adding the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, brown sugar and red pepper flakes. Just before serving toss dressing with vegetables. Season with salt. ; name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: crunchy red cabbage slaw salad ; ingredients: red cabbage, carrot, red apple, green onion, mayonnaise, wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Using a large knife, shred the cabbage. Place in a large bowl with the carrot, apple and green onions. Whisk the mayonnaise, vinegar and oil. Season. Toss with the salad and serve. ; name: asian beef and cabbage salad ; ingredients: ground beef, plum sauce, napa cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, rice vinegar, canola oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef. Stir in plum sauce. Toss together cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, vinegar, and oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with the beef. ; name: red cabbage and apple salad ; ingredients: onion, red cabbage, apples, brown sugar, red wine vinegar, salt, allspice, water, raisins ; preparation:Slice onion, cook on high 90 seconds in microwave. Or saute in a little oil. Shred cabbage, chop apples and put in medium saucepan with sugar, vinegar and spices. Fry for 5 minutes over medium heat to meld flavors. Add water and simmer for 15 minutes, or until cabbage is soft. Mix in the onions and sprinkle with rasins. Serve warm, or chill for a few hours before serving. ; name: roasted corn and pepper salad ; ingredients: white shoepeg corn, red bell pepper, olive oil, green onions, sugar, cumin, salt, lime juice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: cucumber carrot salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, seasoning salt, carrot, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Combine cucumbers and salt in large mixing bowl. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. Rinse salt off of cucumbers and return to bowl. Add carrot. In a small bowl mix together remaining ingredients. Pour over cucumber mixture and toss well to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours. ; name: colorful red cabbage salad ; ingredients: red cabbage, orange bell pepper, canola oil, whole cumin seed, chili powder, celery seed, balsamic vinegar, white sugar, mayonnaise, peanuts ; preparation:

name: homemade italian salad dressing ; ingredients: salad oil, wine vinegar, salt, sugar, dried oregano leaves, dry mustard, paprika, garlic clove ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad. ; name: fresh tomato and roasted garlic salad dressing ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, tomatoes, lemon juice, scallions, vinegar, basil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover. ; name: welsh salad dressing ; ingredients: egg, salt and pepper, butter, milk, warm water, sugar, mustard, flour, vinegar ; preparation:Mix egg, sugar, salt and pepper together. Add flour and mustard. Keep it a nice smooth paste. Add melted butter, milk, water and lastly vinegar. Cook over low heat until as thick as cream. Do not boil. Keep in refrigerator. ; name: herbed oil vinegar dressing ; ingredients: cider vinegar, olive oil, apple juice, honey, fresh parsley leaves, dried leaf basil, dry mustard, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving. ; name: sauteed pear salad ; ingredients: boston lettuce, olive oil, bosc pears, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In large serving bowl, place lettuce. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium-heat 1 minute. Add pears and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until they begin to soften and turn golden. Meanwhile, in cup, stir vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add vinegar mixture to pears in skillet, and cook 1 minute or until liquid begins to thicken. Pour pears and liquid from skillet into bowl with lettuce, toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: cilantro dressing for salads ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, cilantro, parsley, sherry wine vinegar, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, sugar ; preparation:Using your steel knife in the food processor mix garlic and salt. Process until it is a paste. Add cilantro and parsley. Process to a fine mince. Add vinegar. Process for 10 seconds. Add oil in a slow steady stream with the processor on. Add hot pepper sauce and a pinch of sugar. Chill the dressing for several hours in a glass jar. Shake to combine before using. ; name: anne s poppy seed dressing for fruit salad ; ingredients: sugar, dry mustard, salt, cider vinegar, onion juice, canola oil, poppy seeds ; preparation:

name: creamy peach pie ; ingredients: peach jell-o, boiling water, peach ice cream, water, instant vanilla pudding, non-dairy whipped topping, 8-inch baked pie shell ; preparation:Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add ice cream and stir until melted. Combine milk and pudding mix in small mixer bowl. Beat at low speed for 2 minutes. Add gelatin mixture. Whip until fluffy. Fold in non-dairy whipped topping. Spoon into pie shell. Chill about 2 hours. Garnish with additional whipped topping and peach slices. ; name: strawberry or peach pie ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, cornstarch, cold water, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, sugar, reduced fat graham cracker crust, reduced-fat whipped topping ; preparation:Set aside four whole berries for garnish. Slice remaining strawberries and set aside. In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch and water until smooth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Stir in sliced strawberries. Pour into the crust. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Cut reserved strawberries in half. Garnish each serving with whipped topping and a berry half. ; name: lea s peach pie cobbler ; ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, dry tapioca, butter, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Drain peaches, reserving 1 cup of syrup for recipe. Combine peaches, syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg & tapioca in large sauce pan. Bring mixture to a boil, and boil for one minute. Remove from heat and cool. Prepare 9x13 pan lined with pie crust. Prepare lattice topping for cobbler. Place peach mixture in crust lined pan. Dot mixture with butter portions, spaced evenly. Arrange lattice topping, crimping into top edge of crust. Sprinkle crust with cinnamon-sugar mixture for color. Place, uncovered, in 450f oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 400f and bake 60 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: hardee s peach cobbler copycat ; ingredients: peach pie filling, frozen pie crust, butter, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Spread the pie filling into a square baking pan. Put the slices of butter on top of the pie filling, placing them as evenly as possible. Carefully remove the pie crust from the pan it is in, and place it carefully on top of the pie filling and butter. You will need to cut off the edges that hang over and make them fit on the square pan. Sprinkle liberally with cinnamon and sugar. Bake for about 20 to 25 minutes, until pie crust is lightly browned. Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. ; name: summer peach pudding dessert ; ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, flour, salt, margarine, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving. ; name: nectarine berry pie ; ingredients: nectarines, blueberries, granulated sugar, cornstarch, vanilla extract, pastry for double-crust pie, egg, sugar ; preparation:In large bowl, combine nectarine slices, berries, sugar, cornstarch and vanilla. Stir until fruit is coated. Pour filling into one of the pie shells and invert the second pie shell over it. Crimp edges and press with fork to seal. Cut holes in top crust so steam can escape. Place a baking sheet on lower rack of oven to catch juices. Set pie on middle rack. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Brush top crust with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar. Bake 15 minutes longer. ; name: peaches and cream dessert casserole ; ingredients: rolled oats, light brown sugar, peaches, eggs, vanilla extract, cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter an 8-inch square baking dish. Combine the rolled oats and sugar in a small bowl. Set aside. Distribute the peaches evenly in the pan. Mix the eggs, vanilla, and cream in a bowl. Pour over the peaches. Top with the rolled oat mixture. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the oats are browned and the peaches bubble up around the edges of the pan. Serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: southern peach pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, sugar, cornstarch, apple pie spice, peaches ; preparation:

name: spicy cajun dip ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, reduced-fat cream cheese, nonfat plain yogurt, chili sauce, green pepper, green onion, garlic clove, celery seed, ground red pepper ; preparation:In small bowl, pour 1 cup boiling water over tomatoes. Let stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes. Drain and chop tomatoes. Meanwhile, in another small bowl, combine cream cheese, yogurt and chili sauce. Mix well. Add tomatoes and all remaining ingredients. Mix well. Refrigerate till serving time. Just before serving. Stir dip. Serve with cut up fresh veggies or garlic flavored bagel crisps. ; name: chunky cheese dip ; ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, tomatoes and green chilies, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, tabasco sauce ; preparation:In saucepan, brown meat. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer until blended, stirring occasionally. I serve with doritos. ; name: warm artichoke and salsa dip ; ingredients: marinated artichoke hearts, green onion, green chili salsa, monterey jack cheese, sour cream, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Drain and discard marinade from artichokes. Coarsely chop artichokes, and combine with green onion and green salsa in saucepan. Stir frequently over medium heat until mixture is warmed throughout. Remove from heat before stirring in cheese, sour cream, and cilantro. Serve warm. ; name: spicy south of the border spinach cheese dip ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, whole canned tomatoes, diced green chilies, frozen chopped spinach, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, half-and-half cream, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Saute onion in skillet over medium heat in oil until softened, about 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and chiles, let cook 2 minutes. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and stir in spinach, cheese, cream cheese, half and half, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into shallow baking dish like a 9 inch quiche dish or pie plate. Bake in the preheated oven until the dip is bubbly and the top is light brown, about 35 minutes. ; name: addictive corn dip ; ingredients: mexicorn, sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, green onions, four-cheese mexican blend cheese, cumin, cayenne pepper, lime, tortilla chips ; preparation:Mix together the corn, sour cream, and mayonnaise. Slice the lime in half and squeeze the juice from one half over corn mixture. Mix well. Chop the cilantro and green onions. Add to the corn mixture. Blend in the cumin and cayenne pepper. Mix in shredded cheese. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: eggs cheese green chiles and sour cream bake ; ingredients: eggs, cheese, diced green chilies, sour cream, salt and pepper, hot sauce, bacon bits ; preparation:Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set. ; name: mexican stuffed bell pepper casserole ; ingredients: green peppers, ground beef, onion, tomatoes, water, minute rice, chili powder, garlic salt, corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Core green peppers. Immerse in boiling water for 3 minutes. Chop into bite size pieces. Fry ground beef and onion. Drain. Stir in all ingredients except peppers and cheese. Return to boiling. Simmer 15 minutes. Add cooked pepper pieces and cheese. Place in a casserole dish sprayed with pam. Cover and bake at 375 degreees for 20 minutes. ; name: mexican green chile dip ; ingredients: cooked chicken, green chilies, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, cumin, garlic, pepper, colby-monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: creamed spinach like boston market ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, half-and-half cream, cream cheese, onions, garlic, frozen chopped spinach, water, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended. ; name: easiest creamed spinach ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, cream cheese, garlic, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw and cook spinach til most water is gone. Add cream cheese. Add garlic to taste. Stir over medium heat until cream cheese is melted. Put parmesan over the top. Cover and set off the heat until cheese melts. Serve. ; name: ricotta spinach dip with chips ; ingredients: fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, scallions, radishes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh dill, water chestnut, parsley, olive, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Stem the spinach and clean it thoroughly. Dry completely using a salad spiner and mince fine. Place the ricotta in a medium large bowl. Use a wire whisk or wooden spoon to beat until quite smooth stir in the spinach and all other ingredients, except garnishes. Cover tightly and chill until very cold. Serve with chips, raw veggies, or good crackers. ; name: spinach cheese patties ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, egg yolks, flour, wheat germ, fresh spinach, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown. ; name: spinach cheese balls using canned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, herb stuffing mix, mozzarella cheese, cheese, margarine, eggs ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in large bowl. Refrigerate 20 min or till needed. Preheat oven to 350. Roll chilled mixture into 1 in balls. Put on greased cookie sheet. Bake 15 minutes. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: spinach ricotta pizza with fresh tomato puree ; ingredients: pizza dough, tomatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Divide dough into two and roll out into two thin crusts. Lightly brush olive oil to taste on top and bake the dough for 5 minutes in a 425 degree oven on a greased and floured pan. Meanwhile grate the four tomatoes into a medium bowl. If your tomatoes are really ripe, you can drain the excess liquid slighlty. Add the pressed garlic and olive oil. Add the spinach to a medium pan over medium heat and saute with salt and pepper to taste until half-wilted. Spread the tomato mixture on both crusts. Return to the oven for another 5 minutes. This should get rid of any excess liquid in the sauce. Top the pizzas with spinach, basil, and a light sprinkling of mozzarella. Finish by placing small dallops of ricotta around the pizza, using a small spoon. Bake for an additional 10 minutes or until cheese bubbles and begins to brown. ; name: spinach and ricotta pillows ; ingredients: baby spinach, low-fat ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, cracked black pepper, wonton wrappers, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: lime salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dried thyme, salt, ground black pepper, butter, green onions, lime zest, lime ; preparation:Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime. ; name: beer salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic salt, brown sugar, butter, red onion, beer ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Using aluminum foil, create an oblong cooking tray to be placed directly on grill. Place salmon fillet in center of tray. Season first with garlic salt, sprinkle with brown sugar, and then cover with pieces of butter. Top with sliced red onions. Pour beer of choice into tray to just below the highest point of the fillet. Cover tray with aluminum foil to envelope fish completely. Place tray on grill, cover with lid, and grill for approximately 8 minutes or until just cooked through. ; name: creamy baked salmon ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, cream, dried basil, salt and pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter on medium high until onions are translucent. Add tomatoes and cook on high for 5 to 10 minutes untill tomatoes start to break a part. Add cream and simmer on medium low for 5 minutes. Stir basil, salt and pepper in to cream sauce. In an oiled baking dish, pour cream sauce over salmon. Cover and bake for 12 minutes at 350f. Serve over pasta, rice or steamed veggies. ; name: naked grilled salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, olive oil, garlic cloves, cracked black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Rinse fillet and pat dry. Start grill. Heat to medium high to high. Rub with olive oil. If salmon is skinned, rub both sides. Rub one side with garlic, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill for approximately 10 minutes, turning once, or until fish flakes. ; name: panko salmon ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, salt and pepper, honey mustard, fresh thyme, panko breadcrumbs, italian parsley, sweet hungarian paprika ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Set the salmon on a foil-lined baking sheet skin side down. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the honey mustard and 1 teaspoon of the thyme. In another small bowl, mix the panko with the remaining 1 teaspoon of thyme, 4 teaspoons of olive oil, parsley, and paprika. Add salt and pepper. Using a small spoon, spread the mustard mixture on the salmon. Top with the bread crumb mixture. Roast the salmon for 12-14 minutes or until it is almost completely firm to the touch and flakes when poked with a fork. Serve at once. ; name: lemon and parmesan crusted salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, light butter, garlic salt, ground black pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, green onions, lemon peel, dried thyme leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Spray shallow baking pan with cooking spray. Pat salmon dry with paper towel. Place salmon skin side down in pan. Brush with 1 tablespoon of the butter and sprinkle with garlic salt. Mix bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, green onions, lemon peel and thyme in small bowl. Stir in remaining 1 tablespoon butter. Press bread crumb mixture evenly on salmon fillets. Bake uncovered 15 to 25 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with fork. Serve immediately in a bed of cooked spinach, rice or pasta. ; name: citrus balsamic glazed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt and pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice, brown sugar, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired. ; name: blackened country french salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, french dressing, lemon, garlic, salt, paprika, capers ; preparation:

name: simple roast veggies ; ingredients: potatoes, red pepper, yellow pepper, mushrooms, onion, zucchini, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Chop up potatoes. Put in microwave for 2 minutes while chopping rest of veggies. Place all veggies in bowl. Add oil, vinegar and garlic, and toss to coat. Spread out in roasting pan and cook for about an hour. ; name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: grilled greek lemon chicken ; ingredients: roasting chickens, olive oil, lemons, juice of, oregano, coarse sea salt, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Combine olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano. Pour over halved chicken in a large glass baking dish. Sprinkle chicken on both sides with sea salt and black pepper. Place in refrigerator and marinate for 2 or so hours. Turn chicken at least once during marinating process. Preheat gas grill on medium high for five minutes. Place chicken skin side down on middle of grill and turn off inner burners so that heat is indirect. Turn chicken when skin is nicely browned and continue to cook for 1-2 hours or until meat thermometer registers 170 deg f. Remove from heat, cover loosely with foil and let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: roast chicken with potatoes lemon and asparagus ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, salt and pepper, whole chickens, asparagus, lemon, fresh thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 478 degrees. Place potatoes and half the butter in a shallow roasting pan. Season with salt and pepper. Roast, tossing once, until potatoes are golden, 20-25 minutes. Place chicken, skin side up, on top of the potatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until chicken begins to brown, about 20 minutes. Scatter asparagus, lemon, remaining butter, and thyme around chicken. Roast until asparagus is tender and chicken is cooked throughout, 5-15 minutes. Serve with pan juices. ; name: five spice roast chicken ; ingredients: garlic cloves, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil, chinese five spice powder, chicken, onion ; preparation:Combine garlic, salt, olive oil, and chinese five-spice powder in a large bowl. Add chicken pieces. Turn to coat. Cover and chill at least 1 hour to overnight. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Arrange onion wedges in a 13x9x2 inch roasting pan. Arrange chicken, skin side up, atop the onions. Roast until chicken is cooked through, basting occasionally with pan juices, about 50 minutes. Remove chicken from oven and let rest 10 minutes. Arrange chicken and onions on platter and serve. ; name: herb roasted chicken ; ingredients: chicken, butter, lemon juice, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried sage, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: lemon garlic roasted chicken thighs ; ingredients: skinless chicken pieces, lemons, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Spray a deep baking dish, or roaster with non stick spray. Combine 1 tbs of olive oil, the juice and zest of both lemons, plus the additional lemon juice, and the 4 cloves of garlic minced in a small bowl. Place the chicken in the roasting pan. Sprinkle liberally with the lemon pepper salt. Pour the lemon mixture over all- you can throw the lemon rinds into the baking dish too. Bake at 400 for about 45 minutes to an hour, turning the chicken over halfway through baking. I sometimes make this, and seal it in a ziplock bag in the freezer, then when you are ready, thaw, dump in the roaster and bake- just adding the lemon pepper salt. My family likes this when i take the sauce from the chicken, combine it with a small amount of half and half and serve it over pasta. ; name: mini roast chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, potato, red onion, tomatoes, lemon juice, lemon zest, olives, garlic cloves, olive oil ; preparation:

name: black bean burger ; ingredients: black beans, onion, rolled oats, chili powder, cumin, salt, black pepper, egg, liquid ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine the beans, onion, oats, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper, and egg in a food processor. Pulse until chunky, but not pureed. The mixture should be moist, but not sticky. Add a little liquid if needed. Grease a baking sheet. Use your hands, a spoon, or an ice-cream scoop to make patties. Drop these onto the baking sheet. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the bottoms are nicely colored and lift easily from the baking sheet. Flip and bake for 15 more. You can also broil these burgers, or cook them in a hot cast iron skillet, or on the grill. They cook a lot faster using these other methods, so just be sure to keep an eye on them. ; name: black bean and salsa soup ; ingredients: black beans, beef broth, thick & chunky salsa, cumin, sour cream, green onion ; preparation:In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the beans, broth, salsa, and cumin. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat bean mixture in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions. ; name: intense black bean soup ; ingredients: water, black beans, onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, cayenne pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, green bell pepper, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix 7 cups of water and black beans and set to boil on medium heat. Sautee onions, garlic, cayenne, and crushed red pepper in olive oil until onions are soft. Add onion mixture to the beans and water and stir. Boil for 15 minutes. Add chopped green bell pepper and lower heat to simmer for 20 minutes. Allow to cool for 15-20 minutes. Pour half of the mixture into a blender and puree. Add to pot and reheat until ready to serve. Good with crackers, whole wheat toast, and pitas. ; name: simple black beans ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh thyme, dried black beans, bay leaves, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, saute onion in oil over medium-high heat until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. Please. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags. ; name: classic black beans and rice ; ingredients: onion, bell peppers, garlic cloves, black beans, water, oregano, salt, cider vinegar ; preparation:Saute the onion till it begins to caramelize. Add garlic, then bell pepper. Saute some more, then add the black beans. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer till thickened. If you need more water, add a bit at a time. Instead of salt, use a packet of goya sazon, available in the spanish section of your local supermarket - at least in the east coast. Otherwise just use salt. Serve over rice. ; name: healthy black bean soup ; ingredients: diced onions, minced garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, ground cumin, black beans, chunky salsa, lime juice, plain yogurt ; preparation:In a medium pot, saut onions in olive oil until they are soft and translucent. Sprinkle in cumin and garlic and saut for a minute. Pour in black beans, salsa, and lime. Stir to combine and bring to a simmer. Simmer covered for 20 minutes. Ladle soup into individual bowls and top with a dollop of yogurt. Chili and lime tortilla chips or other white corn tortilla chips go nicely on the side. ; name: bacony beans ; ingredients: bacon, sweet onion, pork and beans, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, molasses ; preparation:Brown bacon in skillet till crispy. Set aside. Pour off all but a thin layer of the bacon fat and cook onion till soft. In large casserole dish, combine remaining ingredients and then add bacon, onion and the fat left in the skillet. Mix thoroughly and bake in a 375 oven for 45 minutes. ; name: bacon and black bean smash ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, black beans, salt and pepper, ground cumin, hot sauce, sour cream ; preparation:

name: tex mex carnitas ; ingredients: pork roast, taco seasoning, water, green chilies, flour tortillas ; preparation:Cook pork roast 3 hours at 325. Cool. Shred meat, discarding any fat. Place shredded meat, taco seasoning, water and green chilies in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 2 hours. When ready to serve, steam tortillas to soften. Place a generous portion of shredded pork mixture on each tortilla and fold over. May be served with refried beans, guacamole, shredded lettus, shredded cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, picante sauce, or any other garnish of your choice. ; name: tex mex taco soup ; ingredients: ground beef, garlic cloves, whole kernel corn, pinto beans, kidney beans, salsa, taco seasoning, ranch dressing mix, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a dutch oven or other large pot, over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with garlic until beef is crumbly. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients, except for cheese, and stir. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer for 45-60 minutes. Serve in bowls, if desired over broken tortilla chips. Top with grated cheese to garnish when serving. ; name: crock pot tex mex chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, taco seasoning mix, flour, green pepper, red pepper, frozen corn, salsa, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:Spray crock pot with cooking spray. Place chicken with seasoning and flour in slow cooker. Stir in all remaining ingredients except the shredded cheese. Cover with lid. Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. Stir well just before serving. Top with the shredded cheese and serve over rice. ; name: tex mex breakfast hash and eggs ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, onion, garlic, frozen hash brown potatoes, green chilies, tomatoes, salsa, eggs, cilantro, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skilled cook the chorizo over medium heat until browned and done. Drain reserving 3 t. Drippings, setting sausage aside. Return drippings to the pan and over medium heat saute the onions and garlic for 4-5 minutes. Add the chiles and stir well. Add the potatoes, reduce heat to medium low and cook for 20 minutes, stirring often. Add the tomatoes to heat through. Spoon onto plates, top with eggs and offer salsa at the table. Garnish with chopped cilantro and cheese if you wish. ; name: tex mex chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, garlic salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in plastic zippered bag with salsa or picante sauce. Zip shut and refrigerate 1 hour. Place on barbecue grill and cook for 5 minutes on each side. Top with cheese and close top of grill until cheese melts. Spread bottoms of each hamburger bun with avocado mixture. Top with lettuce, tomato, chicken breasts and top of buns. ; name: mexican beef spaghetti pie ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic powder, salt, ground cumin, tomatoes and green chilies, light sour cream, monterey jack cheese, spaghetti, egg ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook pasta 8 minutes, drain. Mix pasta shell ingredients and toss with pasta. In 9-inch pie plate press pasta to form a shell. Cook ground beef for 4-5 min., breaking into crumbles. Add garlic powder, salt and cumin, stir in tomatoes and cook until almost all liquid has evaporated, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and add sour cream. Spoon mixture into pasta shell. Add cheese to top and bake 15 minutes. ; name: turkey and sausage veggie pot pie ; ingredients: butter, kielbasa, flour, milk, mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, salt, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add sausage and saute 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 2-3 minutes. Whisk in milk and cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in canned veggies, diced turkey and salt and pepepr. Pour into a lightly buttered pie plate. Roll out pie curst to fit over pie plate. Place pie crust over pie plate, trimming to fit. Crimp edges and cut steam slits in top. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes or until crust is golden. ; name: tex mex pot pie ; ingredients: lean ground beef, red beans, salsa, prepared polenta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: blue cheese and chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, butter, fresh chives, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Cook in boiling water for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain well. Mash with a potato masher or mixer until smooth and stir in remaining ingredients. Return to stove and cook for a few minutes more until very hot. ; name: ranch mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, ranch dressing mix, sour cream, milk, margarine, bacon ; preparation:In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: blue cheese and rosemary mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, whole milk, fresh rosemary, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in a large pot of salted boiling water until very tender about 15 minutes. Drain potatoes and return to pot. Add cheese and milk mash until smooth adding more milk if necessary. Stir in rosemary. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: twice baked mashed potatoes ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, fresh chives, bacon, seasoned pepper, salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Prepare potatoes according to package directions. Stir in cream cheese and next 5 ingredients. Place in a 2-quart, lightly greased, baking dish. The recipe states to divide the mixture evenly between 6, 6-oz. Lightly greased ramekins or custard cups- i preferred to make it in one big dish but you all can do as you like. Sprinkle evenly with cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or till thoroughly heated. ; name: traditional mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, soymilk, vegan margarine, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture. ; name: kicked up bacon cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, half-and-half, butter, pepper, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes and 1 tsp salt in a saucepan, cover with water, bring to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. Drain, return to pot. Add half and half, butter, remaining salt, pepper. Place pan over medium low heat, mash for 4-5 minutes. Add bacon, cheese, sour cream, chives and stir. ; name: mashed yukon gold potatoes with goat cheese and basil ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, soft fresh goat cheese, butter, half-and-half, fresh basil, garlic ; preparation:

name: flank steak with teriyaki marinade ; ingredients: flank steaks, garlic, fresh lemon juice, soy sauce, honey, olive oil ; preparation:Make inch slits in one side of the steak with a sharp paring knife. Fill slits with garlic and put steak in a shallow dish large enough to hold it. Whisk together remaining ingredients until emulsified. Pour over steak, turning steak to coat well, let marinate, covered, turning occasionally, for 1 hour at room temperature and up to 10 hours, chilled. Let steak come to room temperature and discard garlic. Broil 4 inches from heat, turning once, 10-12 minutes for medium-rare meat and reserve pan juices. Alternatively, remove steak from marinade and grill over hot coals, brushing occasionally with marinade for the same amount of time as the broiler. Transfer to a platter and let stand 10 minutes. Slice thin across the grain and serve with reserved pan juices. ; name: steak paste ; ingredients: steak, anchovies, butter, salt, pepper, cayenne ; preparation:Remove any fat from the steak. Place meat into a double-boiler and cook for 4 hours. Place meat into blender with butter and blend to a paste. Add other ingredients and blend to mix. Place into sterilized jars. Store in refrigerator. ; name: beef teriyaki hors d oeuvre ; ingredients: flank steaks, chicken bouillon, sherry wine, soy sauce, honey ; preparation:Slice partially frozen steak thinly on the diagonal. Prepare marinade by combining rest of ingredients. Marinate meat at least thrity minutes. Thread on skewers. Broil at highest heat or grill until brown. ; name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: british steak and ale pie ; ingredients: beef, flour, onion, mushrooms, beef stock, beer, salt and pepper, pastry dough ; preparation:Fry beef until browned. Transfer to a large pan, add onions and mushrooms, beef stock, beer and salt and pepper. Simmer for 1 hour until tender and the sauce thickened. Add beef mixture to a large oven proofed dish. Roll out puff pastry and place on the top of the beef mixture ensuring no gaps. Brush milk with a pastry brush. Bake in a preheated medium oven for 30 to 40 minutes until risen and brown. Serve. ; name: great garlic beer steaks ; ingredients: steaks, beer, oyster sauce, lemon, juice of, garlic cloves, black pepper, seasoning ; preparation:In a shallow glass dish, combine the beer, garlic, pepper, oyster sauce and lemon juice - mix well. Rub steaks on both sides with the grill seasoning and place them in the marinade. Be sure to coat the steaks well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Preheat the grill to high, and lightly oil the grate. Remove steaks from the marinade, and discard marinade. Grill steaks for about 5 min on each side, or to desired doneness. ; name: steaks with balsamic mustard sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, steaks, coarse salt, ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce. ; name: carpetbag steak ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, oysters, teriyaki sauce, olive oil ; preparation:

name: ice cream pancake with honey and walnuts ; ingredients: flour, sugar, honey, walnuts, egg, water, oil, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Chop the walnuts into halves. Heat sugar to caramalize slightly and add honey. In a mixing bowl, mix flour along with egg and oil. Add water and mix to a smooth batter. Make small pancakes and keep aside. Place a scoop of icecream in the pancake and roll. Cut the pancake into two. Serve immediately, garnished with chocolate sauce, caramalize honey and walnuts. ; name: soft serve vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sugar, cool whip, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Place milk in electric mixing bowl. Make pudding according to directions on box. Add pudding & sugar to mixer, blend well. Add cool whip and vanilla to mixer, blend well. Pour mixture into 1 gallon ice cream maker. ; name: banana honey and walnut ice cream ; ingredients: milk, honey, egg yolks, whipping cream, bananas, walnuts ; preparation:Combine milk and honey in medium saucepan. Bring almost to simmer, stirring occasionally. Beat yolks until pale yellow. Gradually beat in hot milk. Set bowl into a larger bowl filled with ice. Cool custard completely, stirring occasionally. Fold in whipped cream and bananas. Process according to ice cream makers manufacturers instructions, until half set. Add walnuts and process until set. Let ripen in freezer several hours before serving. ; name: walnut milk chocolate cream fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halves ; preparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half. ; name: maple pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, maple syrup, salt, egg yolks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Bring the cream, maple syrup and salt to a simmer in a sauce pan. Mix the egg yolks and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix the cream mixture into the egg yolks a little at a time. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve. Pour the mixture into 4 ramekins. Place the ramekins in a baking dish and fill the baking dish with hot water until it come halfway up the ramekins. Bake in a preheated 300f oven until set, about 50-60 minutes. Remove from hot water bath and let cool to room temperature. ; name: cranberry maple butter ; ingredients: water, fresh cranberries, maple syrup, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine the water and cranberries in a large saucepan or dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes or until cranberries pop. Place cranberry mixture in a blender or food processor, and process until smooth. Combine cranberry mixture, maple syrup, sugar, and cinnamon in pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered 25 minutes or until mixture is thick, stirring frequently. Stir in vanilla. Cool. Store in refrigerator up to 2 months. ; name: maple tofu pudding ; ingredients: soft tofu, corn oil, maple syrup, salt, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Drain the tofu and cut it into small pieces. Place the pieces in a blender. Add the oil, maple syrup, salt and vanilla. Put the lid on the blender. Process the mixture for a minute or two, or until the pudding is quite smooth. If necessary, turn off the blender, and scrape down the sides of the blender jar. Then put the lid back on and process some more. When the mixture is smooth, turn it into 4 small, resealable, half-cup containers. Chill until serving time, or serve right away if desired. If you like, you can sprinkle a tablespoon of finely chopped walnuts on top of each serving of pudding. I prefer black walnuts, but any type will do. ; name: maple walnut ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, butter, water, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:

name: autumn fruit salad ; ingredients: granny smith apples, red seedless grapes, mandarin orange segments, miniature marshmallows, low-fat vanilla yogurt, nuts, lime, zest of ; preparation:Core and wedge apples. Combine apples, grapes, and mandarin oranges in medium bowl. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: strawberry asparagus salad ; ingredients: asparagus, strawberries, lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey ; preparation:Toss the asparagus and strawberries together in a bowl. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine the dressing ingredients and mix well. Pour dressing over salad and toss. Chill before serving. ; name: black and white grape salad ; ingredients: seedless black grapes, sour cream, mayonnaise, cinnamon, brown sugar, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the sour cream, mayo, cinnamon. Add 2 tablespoons of each sugar to the mix. If the grapes are not as sweet as you desire, add the remaining sugar. If the grapes are sweet, you can leave it out. Cut the grapes in half and add to the dressing, stirring gently to coat the grapes. Refrigerate covered until chilled. Serve in parfait cups and garnish with mint for a beautiful fancy dessert. ; name: orange strawberry and kiwi salad ww ; ingredients: orange juice, honey, oranges, strawberries, grapes, kiwi fruits, mint leaves ; preparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine orange juice and honey. Add the fruits. Toss to coat. Refrigerate, covered, until chilled, at least 1 hour. Sprinkle with mint before serving. ; name: heartbeet salad ; ingredients: beets, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, arugula, frisee, fresh chives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Wrap the beets in a large piece of aluminum foil and bake for an hour, or until tender. Let cool slightly and then peel and slice inch thick. Using a 1-inch heart cookie cutter, cut out as many hearts as possible from each slice. In a large glass bowl, whisk the oil with the lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add the arugula, frisee and the beet cut outs and toss. Mound on salad plates and sprinkle with the chives and serve. ; name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: carrot and ginger salad ; ingredients: sultana raisin, carrot, salt, honey, peanuts, gingerroot, lemon, orange, sour cream ; preparation:Put a little water into a kettle and put it on to boil. Put the sultanas into a small bowl, then cover them with boiling water and set them aside. To make the citrus dressing, peel and finely grate the ginger into a small mixing bowl. Finely grate half the rind from the lemon and then from the orange into the bowl. Squeese the juice from half of the lemon and then from half of the orange and add it to the ginger in the mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream or yogurt and set the dressing aside. Peel the carrots and grate them into a serving bowl, then drain the sultanas and add them. Stir the dressing into the carrots and sultana mixture, then season with salt and add honey or sugar to taste. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and serve. ; name: salad with lemonade honey dressing ; ingredients: frozen lemonade concentrate, honey, poppy seed, red seedless grapes, watermelon, nectarines, pears ; preparation:

name: cocoa chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, cake flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high for 15-30 seconds, or until just melted. Stir in brown sugar, cocoa and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in cake flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 1 hour, or until firm. Preheat oven to 350f. Break off small pieces of dough and form into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until firm but not browned.
