Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large sauce pan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart. ; name: sweet corn pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sour cream, flour, baking soda, baking powder, corn, vegetable oil ; preparation:Beat the egg whites until they hold soft peaks when the beaters are lifted up. In another bowl, combine the egg yolks, half-and-half, and sour cream. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg yolk mixture. Add the beaten egg whites, using a gentle stirring motion to combine them with the yolk mixture. Add the corn and stir gently. Pour a small amount of oil into a non-stick pan and heat it over medium heat. Drop batter, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into the pan for each pancake and cook until golden brown on each side. Serve with butter if desired. ; name: popcorn drops ; ingredients: popped popcorn, egg whites, baking powder, salt, cream of tartar, sugar substitute ; preparation:Place popped corn in food processor or food grinder. Grind into kernel-size pieces. Beat egg whites until frothy and add baking powder, salt and cream of tartar. Beat into stiff peaks. Add sugar replacement, beating until well blended. Fold popcorn pieces into stiffly beaten egg whites. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 f for 12 to 14 minutes or until lightly browned. Yield 36 cookies. ; name: sweet corn for the freezer ; ingredients: fresh corn, hot water, sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large pot. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spread out in large shallow containers to cool. Spoon into freezer containers, or bags. Freeze. ; name: homemade corn syrup substitute simple syrup ; ingredients: white sugar, water, cream of tartar, salt ; preparation:

name: banana chocolate chip muffins ; ingredients: bananas, egg, low-fat buttermilk, granulated sugar, brown sugar, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add flour mixture to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack. ; name: wonderful banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, wheat bran, baking soda, salt, butter, applesauce, splenda brown sugar blend, eggs, mashed bananas, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: banana bites ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, banana, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, nuts, raisins, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream the butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time beating well after each addition. Add mashed banana. Add all the remaining ingredients. Beat well. Pour the dough with a spoon on a greased baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven of 375 f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: cinnamon chip applesauce cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, applesauce, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon baking chips, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture, beating until well blended stir in cinnamon chips. Pour into two loaf pans. Bake for 60 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean cool completely in pan. Drizzle with glaze or wait until the cake is sliced and then drizzle with glaze to maximize the glazed area. ; name: not your typical chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: vegetable oil, banana, sugar, salt, ground cardamom, whole wheat pastry flour, all-purpose flour, baking soda, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine the oil, bananas, sugar, salt and cardamom in a medium saucepan. Heat over low heat for about 2 minutes, whisking to blend everything. Sift together the flours and baking soda into a large bowl. Mix in the banana mixture until well combined. Fold in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop onto a parchment-lined or lightly oiled baking sheet. Bake for 14-16 minutes, until they look slightly underdone. Let rest on cookie sheet for about 5 minutes, then transfer to a cooling rack. ; name: banana banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: chocolate chip banana cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, bananas, vegetable oil, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: savory slow cooker beef roast ; ingredients: boneless beef roast, onion, vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic cloves, pepper, thyme ; preparation:Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness. ; name: beef and mushrooms ; ingredients: beef, cream of mushroom soup, bacon, mushrooms, butter, salt and pepper, toothpick ; preparation:Make up the soup using only half of the fluid needed according to the can or packet. Set aside. Wrap each piece of beef in a slice of bacon and secure with toothpicks. Fry the wrapped meat gently in a little butter to seal the meat. Turn to ensure both sides are browned. Pour prepared soup over the meat, add sliced mushrooms. Stir well. Season to taste. Simmer meat in the pan until tender. When tender, serve meat with creamy mashed potatoes and your favourite vegetables. Pour any remaining fluid over the meat as a gravy. ; name: french dip roast beef sandwiches ; ingredients: bottom round steaks, onion soup mix, beef broth, beer, onion, rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place roast in a large roasting pan. Combine soup mix, broth and beer in a bowl and stir until soup mix is dissolved. Pour over roast and place onions around it. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into. ; name: roast pork and apple dinner ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, sliced mushrooms, balsamic vinaigrette, minute white rice, condensed chicken broth, water, red apples, dried thyme leaves ; preparation:Spray large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add chops. Cook on medium-high heat 4 minutes on each side or until browned. Add onion, mushrooms and dressing. Cook an additional 3 minutes. Stir in rice, broth, water, apples and thyme. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 10 minutes or until heated through. ; name: quick vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: beef stock, red potatoes, diced tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables, roast, water ; preparation:Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced potato and bring to a boil. Cook until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. While the potatoes are boiling, cook the frozen vegetables, according to the package, in the microwave. When the potatoes are tender, reduce heat to medium and add the remaining ingredients except water. Use an additional cup of stock if you desire a stronger flavored broth. Add enough water to cover the meat and veggies with broth. Stir to combine. Allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until heated thoroughly. ; name: roast beef sandwiches au jus ; ingredients: french onion soup, beef consomme, deli roast beef, provolone cheese, hoagie rolls, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium pot simmer roast beef slices, consomme, and soup until fully cooked. Meanwhile, slice hoagie rolls in half lengthwise, sprinkle with garlic and toast until golden brown. Once the meat has heated through and cooked down, place on half of the hoagie rolls and top with slices of cheese as needed to cover meat. Broil until cheese melted and bubbly. Spread mayo on other half of hoagie rolls and top, cutting sandwich in half diagonally. Cut on a diagonal and serve with au jus on the side. ; name: slow cooked mushroom pork tenderloins ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed golden mushroom soup, condensed french onion soup, mashed potatoes ; preparation:Place pork in a slow cooker. In a bowl, combine the soups. Stir until smooth. Pour over pork. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until the meat is tender. Serve with mashed potatoes if desired. ; name: oven roast beef ; ingredients: sirloin tip roast, dry onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, water ; preparation:

name: portobello pizza ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, portabella mushroom caps, salt, black pepper, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, tomatoes, oregano leaves ; preparation:Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture. Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms. Sprinkle with oregano, if using. Bake at 450 until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes. ; name: ravioli with garbanzos and spinach ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, summer squash, roma tomatoes, fresh thyme, black pepper, fresh spinach ; preparation:Cook ravioli, drain, cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add garbanzos, squash, tomatoes, thyme and pepper. Sstir 4-5 minutes, until squash is tender. Add the cooked ravioli to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people. ; name: veggie and pepperoni pizza ; ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pizza sauce, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, pepperoni, roma tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, onion ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450. Spread the pepperoni between two paper towels and blot to remove the excess grease. Brush the olive oil over the pizza crusts and cover with the pizza sauce. Next add the cheese, pepperoni, and tomatoes in that order. Finally topped with the chopped vegetables. Place pizzas on pizza stones or pizza pans. These really work better than cookie sheets. Change the oven temperature to 425 before putting the pizzas in the oven. Bake until the crust is a golden brown. About 15 minutes. ; name: garlic pizza wedges ; ingredients: bread pizza crust, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, red onion, garlic, dried oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: olive garden capellini pomodoro ; ingredients: pasta, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, romano cheese, olive oil, fresh tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Boil pasta in salted water and drain. You may process garlic, olive oil, basil leaves, salt and pepper whole in mini chopper or food processor and then stir into drained noodles. Or add garlic, olive oil, and basil. Stir well. Add salt, pepper, and tomatoes. Adjust seasonings to taste. Top with parmesan, romano, or asiago cheese. ; name: italian garlic bread ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, parsley, dried thyme, dried marjoram, paprika, parmesan cheese, french bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice. ; name: quick white pizza ; ingredients: prepared pizza crust, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500 degrees f. Put the pizza shell or focaccia onto a pizza pan or cookie sheet. Drizzle shell with oil and scatter minced garlic over shell to edges. Cover the pie with a layer of all 3 cheeses combined and work all the way to the edge of the shells. Cook 6 to 8 minutes, until cheeses have melted and begin to bubble. Remove from oven and garnish with parsley. Cut pie with pizza wheel or knife into bite-size squares and serve. ; name: veal pizzaiola ; ingredients: olive oil, veal scallopini, butter, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, oregano, salt & pepper, white wine, parsley ; preparation:

name: green bean chicken casserole packets ; ingredients: aluminum foil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, paprika, frozen green beans, potatoes, margarine ; preparation:Place one chicken breast half on each double layer of foil sheet. Spoon soup over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Top with vegetables. Dot with margarine or butter. Fold up foil to form 4 separate packets. Place on cookie sheet and cook at 450 f for 18 to 22 minutes. ; name: green bean casserole ii ; ingredients: adzuki beans, shoe peg corn, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, onion, cream of celery soup, ritz cracker, margarine ; preparation:Drain beans, put in 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Drain corn, pour over beans. Mix onions, celery soup, sour cream and cheese. Pour over beans and corn. Crush crackers, melt butter and mix with crackers. Spread over top and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: garden green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, onions, garlic, olive oil, sliced water chestnuts, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: hamburger casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, green beans, onion, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, tomato soup, potatoes ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown hamburger and onion, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes. ; name: parmesan garlic green beans with almonds onions ; ingredients: green beans, butter, olive oil, almonds, onion, garlic, salt and pepper, chicken broth, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place the beans in a pan of boiling salted water and cook for 3-5 minutes until firm but not raw, drain well. Or, alternatively, microwave with a little water for 4 minutes. Melt the butter in a pan, add the olive oil and heat, add the almonds and onions and cook for 3 minutes, or until the almonds are lightly browned. Add garlic and cook for another minute. Add the beans, salt and pepper to taste and toss. Add the chicken stock. Cover and cook until desired tenderness, about 5-10 minutes. Sprinkle beans with parmesan. Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with mushroom cream ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, mushrooms, garlic, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place a large covered pot of lightly salted water on the stove and bring it to a boil. In the meantime, melt butter in a small skillet, increase heat to high, add mushrooms and stir fry until golden brown. Reduce heat to low, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add cream, salt and pepper and heat through on low. Add beans to boiling water and cook until just tender, drain. Place beans on a serving plate, spoon the mushroom cream across the middle of the beans, sprinkle with parmesan and parsley and serve. ; name: company green peas casserole ; ingredients: frozen peas, bacon, onion, sliced mushrooms, flour, light cream ; preparation:Cook peas according to package directions. In a skillet, cook bacon until crisp, then remove from pan and drain on paper towels. Add onion and mushrooms to skillet and saute until almost done. Add flour, stir and cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Add cream, cook and stir to consistency of a medium white sauce. Add all of mixture to peas and stir in bacon. ; name: pareve green bean casserole ; ingredients: margarine, onions, white mushrooms, flour, soymilk, garlic powder, salt, pepper, french style green beans, french-fried onions ; preparation:

name: chinese style broccoli ; ingredients: canola oil, broccoli, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add soy sauce, garlic, and lemon juice. Continue to stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: broccoli rice bake ; ingredients: broccoli, instant brown rice, vegetable broth, condensed cream of broccoli soup, diced pimentos, pepper, firm butter, bisquick baking mix ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Heat 1 inch water to boiling in 2-quart saucepan. Add broccoli. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook about 5 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Mix broccoli, rice, broth, soup, pimientos and pepper in 2-quart casserole. Cover and bake 20 minutes. Cut margarine into baking mix, using pastry blender, until crumbly. Sprinkle crumbly mixture over broccoli mixture. Bake uncovered 8 to 10 minutes or until top is light brown. ; name: incredibly good pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, olive oil, vidalia onions, salt and pepper, garlic, porter, beef broth ; preparation:Dry the roast on both sides and sprinkle with salt and fresh ground pepper. Heat oil in 5 qt dutch over. Brown chuck on both sides, remove from pan and set aside. Add sliced onions to the same pan and cook over medium heat until carmelized. This will take a little time, but be patient, it is worth it. Dont allow the onions to burn. I would guesstimate it will take approx 30 minutes. Now add the garlic and stir it around, cook for about a full minute. Place the roast on top of the onions, pour the beer and the broth over top and cover, allowing to cook on medium for the next 2 hours. Optional -- at the hour mark, you can add quartered potatoes and carrots if you want. We prefer to serve this over mashed potatoes though, the gravy is fab. ; name: not so honest roast vegetables ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, onions, sweet potatoes, carrots, coarse salt, dried rosemary, garlic clove, olive oil ; preparation:Pre-cook vegetables in microwave on autocook cycle for potatoes but remove 4 minutes before completion of cook cycle. Allow to cool. Grind salt, rosemary and garlic in mortar and pestle to a paste. Add paste and olive oil to cooked vegetables in ziplock bag and shake to coat. Marinate vegeables overnight in refrigerator. Preheat oven to 280 centigrade. Place marinated vegetables in ovenproof dish and roast for 30 minutes at 280 celsius. Serve. ; name: roasted peppers and hominy ; ingredients: white hominy, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Arrange hominy and vegetables on pan. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with seasonings to taste. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with parmesan just before serving. ; name: quinoa black bean broccoli deliciousness ; ingredients: quinoa, roasted red pepper, sun-dried tomatoes, black beans, capers, zucchini, fresh garlic cloves, fresh spinach, broccoli florets, olive oil ; preparation:Make the quinoa according the directions on package. Typically 2 parts liquid, 1 part quinoa, cooked for 10-15 minutes until liquid is absorbed. While the quinoa is cooking, heat the garlic in the olive oil for 2 minutes. Add the zucchini and cook until tender. When the quinoa and zucchini are done, add all other ingredients and allow to reheat over medium low heat. Serve hot. ; name: chickpea and broccoli curry stew ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, curry powder, roma tomatoes, chickpeas, tomato ketchup, broccoli, tabasco sauce, salt ; preparation:In a medium pot, heat the oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice. ; name: roast teriyaki broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, garlic cloves, teriyaki sauce, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil flavored cooking spray ; preparation:

name: rice pudding with sultanas spain ; ingredients: white rice, granulated sugar, milk, vanilla extract, sultana, brandy, cinnamon, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Put sultanas in a bowl & cover them with the brandy, then allow them to sit & soak up some of the liquid, about 30 minutes. In a heavy sauce pan, combine rice, sugar, milk, the drops of vanilla & the cinnamon stick. When the milk starts to boil, turn heat to low & simmer slowly, about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan. When sultanas have soaked up some of the brandy, drain them & add the sultanas to the rice & milk mixture. Continue cooking for another 10-15 minutes, & once rice has cooked, remove pan from the heat & remove the cinnamon stick. Spoon into a serving bowl & let cool a bit before sprinkling a little ground cinnamon over the top & serving. ; name: chocolate rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, milk, sugar, cocoa, salt, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Place cooked rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving. ; name: rice pudding for one ; ingredients: water, long-grain rice, milk, egg, sugar, vanilla extract, raisins ; preparation:Bring water to a boil and add rice. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Whisk milk and egg together, then whisk in sugar and vanilla. Stir into the hot cooked rice and then stir in raisins. Pour rice mixture into a small greased casserole dish and bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes. Serve warm with pouring cream. ; name: rice with milk ; ingredients: water, salt, rice, milk, sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Bring 6 cups water to boil. Add salt and rice. Stir well. Cook until rice is done, 15 minutes. Drain. Add milk. Heat and simmer slowly until well blended, 15 minutes. Serve in bowls with cinnamon sugar. Add cold milk if desired. ; name: japanese sweet potato and rice shojin ryori ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, medium grain rice, salt, sake ; preparation:Peel sweet potato and cut into bite size pieces. Wash rice using several changes of water. Place rice, sweet potato pieces, salt to taste and sake in the rice cooker. Put your hand flat on the top of the rice and pour in cold water until it reaches where your wrist starts. Let it sit for about 20 minutes before cooking the rice. Once the cooking cycle is done, let it sit for about 15 to 20 minutes and fluff with a wooden or plastic rice paddle. ; name: mom s rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, rice, eggs, cinnamon, golden raisin, vanilla ; preparation:Combine sugar and milk in a saucepan. Place over medium heat. Stir until sugar is dissolved, then heat to just below the simmer point. Add rice and cook until the rice is soft, 20-30 minutes. Beat egg yolks in a small bowl. Add hot milk, a spoonful at a time, beating well after each addition, until the egg yolks have tripled in volume and are very warm. Add the egg yolks to the pan and stir well. Add raisins, cinnamon and vanilla, and stir well. Beat egg whites to soft peaks. Fold egg whites and custard together and transfer to a baking dish. Bake in preheated 300f oven until top is browned. ; name: rice delicious ; ingredients: rice, sliced mushrooms, sliced water chestnuts, butter, french onion soup ; preparation:Saute mushrooms and water chestnuts in butter for 15 minutes. Add onion soup to mixture and simmer for 2-3 minutes. Fill empty soup can with liquid from mushrooms and water chestnuts. Add water to reach top of can. Pour liquid into pot with mushroom mixture and add rice, mixing well. Pour into 9x9 casserole dish, cover and bake for 1 hour at 300 degrees or until rice is tender. ; name: swedish rice dessert ; ingredients: mini marshmallows, rice, crushed pineapple, maraschino cherry, slivered almonds, heavy cream, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:

name: italian chicken with sauce ; ingredients: chicken pieces, condensed tomato soup, tomato paste, onion salt, garlic salt, oregano, mushroom pieces, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Remove skin from chicken& place in an 12 by 8 inch microwave safe dish with the meatiest portions towards the outside of the dish. In a mixing bowl, stir together soup, tomato paste, spices, & mushrooms. Spoon over chicken. Microwave on high for 20 to 22 minutes, rotating dish if necessary, halfway through. Sprinkle cheese over chicken& microwave on medium for 2 to 4 minutes, or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: chilli chicken with pasta ; ingredients: chicken breasts, peanut oil, garlic cloves, cracked pepper, fresh basil, red chilies, chives, penne, crushed tomatoes, parsley ; preparation:Bring water to boil in saucepan and add penne. Cook for 12 minutes. Heat oil in wok. Cook chicken in batches until lightly browned. Return chicken to wok. Stir in garlic, chilli, chives, tomatoes and cracked pepper. Bring to boil and reduce heat and simmer until sauce begins to thicken. Stir in basil and simmer until thickened. Stir in parsley. Serve over penne. Sprinkle with fresh parmesan cheese if desired. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: mexican stuffed bell pepper casserole ; ingredients: green peppers, ground beef, onion, tomatoes, water, minute rice, chili powder, garlic salt, corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Core green peppers. Immerse in boiling water for 3 minutes. Chop into bite size pieces. Fry ground beef and onion. Drain. Stir in all ingredients except peppers and cheese. Return to boiling. Simmer 15 minutes. Add cooked pepper pieces and cheese. Place in a casserole dish sprayed with pam. Cover and bake at 375 degreees for 20 minutes. ; name: hearty mexican spaghetti ; ingredients: ground chicken, onion, low-sodium taco seasoning, diced tomatoes, chilies, angel hair pasta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook chicken and onions until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, and chiles. Cook over medium heat until heated through. Fold in cooked spaghetti and cheese. Mix well and serve. ; name: creamy chicken and chilies casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, green chilies, cooked rice ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: hot chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, cooked chicken, slivered almonds, celery, water chestnuts, potato chips ; preparation:In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: golden chicken spaghetti casserole ; ingredients: yellow bell pepper, orange bell pepper, onion, mushrooms, cheddar cheese, chicken stock, cooked chicken, diced tomatoes, oil, spinach ; preparation:

name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, dried sage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold. ; name: really good brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, salt, green onions, lemon, juice of, sugar ; preparation:Trim the bottoms off of the brussels sprouts and then cut in half vertically. Fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Remove from pan and reserve the fat. Add the brussels sprouts to the bacon fat and fry on medium. Do not stir too often as they need to brown. Sprinkle with the salt. Once the brussels sprouts are browned, add the green onion. Crumble the bacon and add to the brussels sprouts. Stir together the juice of the lemon and the sugar. Pour juice over the brussels sprouts and cook until evaporated. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: brussels sprouts with fried onions and pancetta ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, pancetta, lemon juice, sea salt, cracked black pepper, fried onions ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the pancetta and fry for 2 minutes until just becoming crisp. Toss in the sprouts, then the lemon juice. Season well. Cook for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve topped with fried onions. ; name: brussels sprouts and bacon ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, onion, caraway seed, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Add brussels sprouts and boil until almost tender, about 7 minutes. Drain. Cook bacon in heavy large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Remove using slotted spoon. Drain on paper towels. Pour off all but 3 tablespoons bacon drippings. Add onion to skillet and saute over medium heat until tender, about 4 minutes. Stir in caraway seeds. Add bacon and brussels sprouts and stir until warmed through. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: brussels sprouts extraordinaire ; ingredients: onion, butter, flour, sugar, tomato juice, salt, pepper, frozen brussels sprouts, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Remove onion and set aside. Blend flour into the drippings. Add tomato juice. Cook and stir over low heat until thickened and smooth. Stir in the sugar, salt, pepper and onion. Arrange the brussels sprouts in a greased 1 quart baking dish. Top with the tomato sauce. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: brussels sprouts with black pepper butter hazelnuts ; ingredients: black peppercorns, butter, brussels sprouts, olive oil, hazelnuts, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Crush the peppercorns in a mortor and pestle and then combine in a small bowl with the softened butter. Refrigerate until needed. Cut a small slice from the stalk end of each brussel sprout to help separate the leaves, pull off the outer leaves of the sprouts very carefully and finely slice the tight centres. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and add the hazelnuts and saut for 2 minutes until toasted. Add the brussel sprouts and stock and saut for a further 2 minutes then season with salt to taste. Remove from the heat and toss through the black pepper butter. Put into a serving bowl or on individual plates. ; name: brussels sprouts n potatoes ; ingredients: onion, butter, potato, brussels sprout, bay leaf, sweet red pepper, chicken stock, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:

name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: cider braised cabbage ; ingredients: butter, onion, green cabbage, apple cider, apple cider vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in large pot over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saute until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes. Add cabbage. Saute until slightly wilted, tossing frequently, about 6 minutes. Stir in apple cider. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook until cabbage is tender, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes. Uncover. Simmer until almost all liquid in pot evaporates, about 3 minutes. Stir in vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: red curry with vegetables ; ingredients: coconut milk, red curry paste, chicken stock, fish sauce, brown sugar, zucchini, sugar snap peas, mushroom, bamboo shoot ; preparation:Combine 4 ounces coconut milk, curry paste, stock, fish sauce, and sugar and bring to a boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add vegetables and remaining coconut milk and simmer an additional 15 minutes. If using snow peas, add just before serving. Serve with rice. ; name: simple spiced cider ; ingredients: apple cider, whole cloves, ground nutmeg, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain cider mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot. ; name: hot mulled apple cider ; ingredients: brown sugar, whole allspice, whole cloves, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon sticks, apple cider, orange wedge ; preparation:Combine brown sugar, allspice, 1 teaspoon cloves, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon and apple cider in large saucepan. Bring to boiling. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Strain to remove spices. Serve in mugs with clove-studded orange wedges. ; name: sweet potato gravy ; ingredients: flour, onions, garlic, pecan pieces, water, salt, cayenne pepper, sweet potato ; preparation:Make a dark brown roux, about 3 minutes. Add the onions and saute for 5 minutes, or until wilted. Stir in the garlic, pecans and water. Season with salt and cayenne. Bring the liquid to a boil. Add the sweet potatoes and blend to make the sauce smooth. Stir in the cane syrup and green onions. ; name: apple cider pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, butter, yellow onions, salt, apple cider, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Brown chops on both sides in a large skillet, remove and set aside. Melt butter in same large skillet. Thinly slice onion and cook in butter for 15 minutes or until caramelized. Add apple cider to onion and then nestle chops down in the onion and cider. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes until chops are cooked through and cider reduces by a little more then half. ; name: cider roasted vegetables ; ingredients: beets, parsnips, baby carrots, brown sugar, olive oil, apple cider vinegar, shiitake mushrooms ; preparation:

name: honey fried chicken ; ingredients: chicken legs, chicken tenderloins, flour, garlic salt, ground pepper, honey, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine flour, garlic salt and pepper in mixing bowl. Brush chicken with honey. Coat with flour mixture. Fry in oil to a nice golden brown, taking care as the chicken can burn rather easy. Turn often. Serve with mashed potatoes, a vegetable and gravy. ; name: asian barbecue chicken ; ingredients: brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, fresh lime juice, crushed red pepper flakes, curry powder, garlic cloves, chicken thighs, cooking spray, lime wedge, green onion top ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in a large ziploc plastic bag, add chicken. Seal and marinate in refrigerator for 4 hours or overnight, turning ocacsionnally. Prepare grill. Remove chicken from bag, reserving marinade. Place marinade in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, cook 1 minute. Place chicken on grill rack coated with cooking spray. Grill 20 minutes or until done, turning and basting frequently with cooked marinade. Garnish with lime wedges and green onion tops, if desired. ; name: spicy sweet chicken thighs ; ingredients: lemon juice, molasses, worcestershire sauce, garlic, skinless chicken thighs, cooking spray, salt, pepper, lemon wedge ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in a plastic zip-locked bag. Marinate for 1 hour, turning occasionally. Preheat oven to 425. Remove chicken from bag and reserve marinade. Arrange chicken in a shallow baking dish coated with cooking spray. Pour reserved marinade over chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 425 for 20 minutes, baste chicken with marinade. Bake an additional 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: oven baked chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, ground cumin, paprika, ground turmeric, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, ground cinnamon, olive oil ; preparation:In a shallow dish, stir together all spices and 1 teaspoon salt. Coat chicken thighs with spice mix. Warm the oil in a skillet and pan-fry chicken thighs, making sure each side is nicely browned. Transfer chicken thighs to a greased 9x5 baking dish. If you have any remaining spice mix, feel free to sprinkle it over the thighs, as this will reduce to a nice gravy. Put in pre-heated oven at 375 for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. Serve with basmati rice or couscous. ; name: five spice roast chicken ; ingredients: garlic cloves, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil, chinese five spice powder, chicken, onion ; preparation:Combine garlic, salt, olive oil, and chinese five-spice powder in a large bowl. Add chicken pieces. Turn to coat. Cover and chill at least 1 hour to overnight. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Arrange onion wedges in a 13x9x2 inch roasting pan. Arrange chicken, skin side up, atop the onions. Roast until chicken is cooked through, basting occasionally with pan juices, about 50 minutes. Remove chicken from oven and let rest 10 minutes. Arrange chicken and onions on platter and serve. ; name: garlic glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, dried red peppers, oil, green onion, sesame seeds, rice ; preparation:Cube chicken into bite-seize pieces. Fry over high heat, stirring often for 3-4 minutes. Add all other ingredients. Cook on mediun-high 15 minutes or until syrupy. Sprinkle with garnishes. Serve over hot rice. ; name: chili roasted chicken breasts or thighs ; ingredients: barbecue sauce, chili powder, dried oregano, salt, chicken thighs ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix together first 4 ingredients. Add chicken and turn to coat. Place on foil-lined, rimmed baking sheet. Spread with any remaining sauce. Bake in preheated 425f degree oven for about 25 minutes for breasts and 35 minutes for thighs. ; name: korean roast chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, soy sauce, green onion, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ground ginger, black pepper ; preparation:

name: all in one breakfast ; ingredients: english muffins, bulk pork sausage, eggs, sour cream, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In the bottom of a greased 3 quart rectangular baking dish, arrange muffin halves in the bottom. Overlap muffins as neccesary to make them fit well. Set aside. Using a large skillet, cook sausage until brown, drain. In a large bowl whisk the eggs. Add sausage, sour cream, and chilies and mix until well combined. Pour egg mixture over the muffins and press lightly to thoroughly moisten the muffins. Sprinkle with cheese, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight. Bake in a 375 degree oven uncovered for 35 to 40 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Prep and cook time does not include chilling time. ; name: cowboy chicken cheese muffins ; ingredients: cooked chicken breast strips, pesto sauce, butter, english muffins, cooked bacon, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a medium bowl, stir together the chicken, pesto, and melted butter until chicken is evenly coated. Place english muffin halves, cut sides up, on a baking sheet. Divide the chicken mixture evenly among the muffin halves. Bake about 10 minutes or until chicken mixture is heated through. Top muffins with the bacon pieces. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 2 to 3 minutes more or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: sausage swiss muffins ; ingredients: pork sausage, baking mix, rubbed sage, dried thyme, egg, milk, swiss cheese ; preparation:In a small skillet, brown sausage over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. In a bowl, combine the baking mix, sage, and thyme. In another bowl, combine the eggs and milk. Stir into the dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in the cheese and sausage. Fill greased muffin cups two-thirds full. Bake at 375 for 15-18 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from the pan to a wire rack. Serve warm. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: breakfast sandwich quick healthy ; ingredients: whole wheat english muffin, egg, lean ham, fat free cheese ; preparation:On a microwaveable plate lined with a paper towel, place one of the english muffin halves. Carefully crack egg onto english muffin. Pierce yolk membrane with a fork. Microwave on high for about 40 seconds. Top with folded ham slice, cheese slice, and remaining english muffin half. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds, or until eg white is completely set and yolk is thickened around edge. Makes 1 serving. ; name: english muffin chicken pizza ; ingredients: english muffins, pizza sauce, chicken breasts, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Halve the english muffins and spread each with 1 tablespoon pizza sauce. Add one slice of chicken and top with one slice of cheese. Place on baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. We have also toasted the muffins and cooked these in the microwave. ; name: greek eggs benedict open faced egg sandwich ; ingredients: english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, black pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:Halve your english muffins so there are four slices. Break up the 2 deli slices cheddar cheese and divide them among the four slices. Broil the english muffins with cheese until cheese is melted and the top of the bread is slightly brown, remove when done. In the meantime, cook eggs over easy so the whites are cooked, but the yolks are still runny. Place the over easy eggs on the english muffins with cheese, add a turn or two of freshly ground black pepper and feta cheese to taste. Serve with fork and knife. The runny eggs serve as kind of a sauce and the pepper and feta add a nice flavor to this quick breakfast. ; name: corn muffins with sweet red peppers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, pepper, buttermilk, vegetable oil, egg, sweet red pepper ; preparation:In large bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt and pepper. In small bowl, beat together buttermilk, oil and egg, stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Stir in red pepper. Spoon batter into well greased or paper lined muffin cups, filling each two thirds full. Bake in 425f degree oven for 15 minutes or until tester inserted in centre comes out clean. Or bake in 8 inch square baking pan in 425f degree oven for 20 minutes or until firm to the touch. Cut into squares to serve. ; name: just like mc donald s sausage egg mc muffin copycat ; ingredients: sausage patties, english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, margarine, oil ; preparation:

name: beef and black bean sauce ; ingredients: oil, onion, round steaks, green beans, mushrooms, black bean garlic sauce, beef stock, bean sprouts, hokkien noodles ; preparation:Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice. ; name: simply elegant steak and rice ; ingredients: boneless beef round steak, vegetable oil, onions, sliced mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, garlic salt, cooked rice ; preparation:Cut steak into thin strips. In a large skillet, brown meat in oil, using high heat. Add onions. Saute until tender crisp. Blend soup, liquid from mushrooms and garlic salt. Pour over steak. Add mushrooms. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for one hour or until steak is tender. Serve over bed of fluffy rice. ; name: beef and mushrooms ; ingredients: beef, cream of mushroom soup, bacon, mushrooms, butter, salt and pepper, toothpick ; preparation:Make up the soup using only half of the fluid needed according to the can or packet. Set aside. Wrap each piece of beef in a slice of bacon and secure with toothpicks. Fry the wrapped meat gently in a little butter to seal the meat. Turn to ensure both sides are browned. Pour prepared soup over the meat, add sliced mushrooms. Stir well. Season to taste. Simmer meat in the pan until tender. When tender, serve meat with creamy mashed potatoes and your favourite vegetables. Pour any remaining fluid over the meat as a gravy. ; name: hamburger steak with gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, lipton onion soup mix, egg, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, black pepper, garlic powder, self rising flour, beef broth ; preparation:Combine all hamburger ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: easy crock pot baked steak and mushroom gravy ; ingredients: boneless beef round steak, beef broth, salt, pepper, garlic powder, sweet onion, cream of mushroom soup, brown gravy mix, mushrooms ; preparation:Place frozen or thawed beef in a crock pot sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place chopped onions on top. Pour beef broth over beef and onion. Cook on low for 5 to 6 hours. Add soup, mushrooms, and gravy mix. Stir well. Cook on low an additional hour or on high for 30 minutes. Serve with mashed potatoes. ; name: creamy swiss steak ; ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, boneless beef round steak, butter, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a shallow bowl combine the flour, salt, and pepper. Dredge beef. In a large skillet, brown beef in butter on both sides. Transfer to a 3 quart slow cooker. Top with onion. Combine soup and water, pour over onion. Cover and cook on low 8-9 hours or until meet is tender. Serve with noodles. ; name: beef mushroom dijon ; ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, vegetable oil cooking spray, sliced mushrooms, onion, cream of mushroom soup, water, dijon-style mustard, cooked rice, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: cooked potato or pasta salad dressing ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, ground mustard, eggs, water, half-and-half, white vinegar, black pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad. ; name: simple tasty potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, sweet pickle, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, onion ; preparation:Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all. ; name: mustard potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, green onions, dill pickles, mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 20 minutes. In the meantime mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl. Peel potatoes and chop into bite size pieces. Add chopped potatoes to mixture in bowl and carefully combine until everything is mixed up. Either chill in fridge or serve at once. ; name: favorite potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, eggs, onion, pickle, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve. ; name: dutch cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, white vinegar, sugar, onion ; preparation:Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next. ; name: new york style potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, lemon juice, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, celery ribs, hard-boiled eggs, red onion, fresh parsley, mayonnaise, cider vinegar ; preparation:Boil the potatoes just until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain, peel and dice. Toss with the lemon juice, oil and salt and pepper to taste. Let cool. Add the celery, eggs, chopped red onion, and parsley toss gently. Combine 1 cup mayonnaise with vinegar, blend well then toss over the potato salad, gently folding until completely coated. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary. ; name: cucumber salad swedish style ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cuke. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle. ; name: bavarian german potato salad ; ingredients: onion, cucumber, radishes, all-purpose flour, cider vinegar, water, salt, ground pepper, potatoes ; preparation:

name: savory chicken sandwiches from the crock pot ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, chicken thighs, onion soup mix, garlic salt, italian salad dressing, water, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place chicken in crockpot. Sprinkle with soup mix and garlic salt. Pour dressing and water over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, black beans, rotel, black olives, corn, salsa, onion, garlic cloves, sea salt ; preparation:Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Add all other ingredients. Cook on high for 5-6 hours. Remove chicken and shred with two forks. Return chicken to crock pot, reduce to low, and cook for 1-2 hours. ; name: crispy balsamic baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, dry parsley flakes, garlic powder, garlic salt, balsamic vinegar, egg whites, boneless chicken breasts, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, and salt in medium bowl and mix. Whisk together vinegar and egg whites in smaller bowl. Dip chicken in vinegar mixture then dry mixture. Place on sprayed cookie sheet. Spray the top of the chicken breasts with cooking spray. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper. Bake 400 for 30-40 minutes, till fork tender and juices run clear. ; name: crock pot chick n peppers ; ingredients: chicken breasts, roasted red peppers, garlic powder, dried rosemary, olive oil, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put the water in the bottom of crockpot. Lay down a layer of red peppers. Rub olive oil on the chicken breasts, sprinkle with garlic powder, rosemary and salt and pepper. Place the chicken on top of red peppers. Add another layer of peppers. Cook low for 6 hours. Your crockpot may vary in the length of time to cook. ; name: garlic broiled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people. ; name: crock pot chicken cheese dip ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, rotel tomatoes & chilies, water, velveeta cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, flour, light sour cream, tortilla chips ; preparation:Blend the tomatoes & chilies in a food processor then pour into a crock pot. Add the water & frozen chicken breasts, cover with a lid & cook on low for 3 hours. Remove the chicken & shred, place back into the crock pot. Stir in the velveeta & spices. Mix the flour with a small amount of water. Stir into the crock pot & recover with a lid. Cook for another hour. Turn off the pot then stir in the sour cream. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: crock pot balsamic chicken ; ingredients: garlic powder, dried basil, salt, pepper, instant minced onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: date nut balls ; ingredients: egg, margarine, sugar, pitted dates, pecans, rice krispies, vanilla ; preparation:In electric skillet set at 300 degrees, cook butter, sugar, dates and egg until gooey and thickened. About 7-10 min. Add pecans and vanilla. Then add rice krispies. Mix well. Cool until slightly warm. Form into balls & roll in powdered sugar. Makes 50-60 small balls. ; name: date and cherry balls ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, dates, glace cherries, rice krispies, coconut ; preparation:Combine butter, sugar, cherries and dates. Cook at medium heat until soft, stirring constantly. Cool until lukewarm. Stir in rice krispies. Shape into balls and roll in coconut. Store in a sealed container. ; name: date walnut scones ; ingredients: self raising flour, table salt, caster sugar, dates, walnuts, lemon, milk, cream, eggs, plain flour ; preparation:Prehaeat fan forced oven to 180c. Sift the flour, salt and sugar into a bowl. Add the dates, walnuts and lemon zest & mix lightly. Make a well in the centre of the mixture and set bowl aside. Whisk the milk, cream and the eggs in a seperate small bowl and pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture. Using your finger. Press dough lightly using finger. Gently roll out the dough until 2-3cm thick then using a 5-6cm scone cutter cut the dough into rounds. Place rounds on a non stick baking tray and brush each round with a little milk. Bake scones for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm with favourite topping. ; name: oatmeal date cookies ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, oatmeal, dates ; preparation:Cream shortening. Gradually add the sugar, beating well. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Combine flour, salt and soda. Add to creamed mixture, mixing well. Stir in the uncooked oats and chopped dates. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from cookie sheets while still warm. Complete cooling on wire racks. ; name: sugarless apple cookies ; ingredients: dates, apple, raisins, water, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, eggs, artificial sweetener ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine dates, apple, raisins and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Combine flour, cinnamon and baking soda. Stir into apple mixture and mix well. Combine eggs and sweetener. Add to batter and mix well. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a nonstick baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. ; name: casserole cookies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, dates, flaked coconut, walnuts, vanilla, almond extract ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar gradually beating until fluffy. Stir in remaninig ingredients. Place into an ungreased 2 qt casserole. I use a 9 x 9 pyrex pan. Bake in oven at 350 for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and stir well. Cool. Form into balls and roll in granulated sugar. ; name: nut cake ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, milk, vanilla, nutmeats ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar, add egg yolks and beat well. Mix flour and baking powder together and add alternately to shortening mix with milk and vanilla. Stir in nuts. Beat egg whites until stiff, then fold into batter. Bake in a greased pan in a 350 degree oven for 50 minutes. ; name: date fruitcake ; ingredients: dates, walnut pieces, candied cherry, flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: bacon and cheese toast ; ingredients: egg, milk, baking powder, cheese, bread, bacon ; preparation:Beat egg. Add milk, baking powder and cheese. Mix well and spread on bread slices. Place a strip of bacon on top. Place under broiler and cook until golden brown. ; name: grilled cheese with a kick ; ingredients: butter, bread, monterey jack pepper cheese, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place bread in a skillet on medium heat. Add butter to pan to prevent sticking. Lightly toast bread on both sides. Put cheese directly in pan to slightly melt. After cheese is slightly melted, place cheese on bread using a spatula. Fold bread over onto instelf. Place grilled cheese on plate and eat. ; name: grilled cheese pickle and tomato sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, american cheese, kosher dill pickle, tomatoes ; preparation:Spread butter on one side each of 2 slices of bread. Place 1 piece of american cheese on a non-buttered side of bread. Place tomato slices on top of the cheese. Lay thin slices of dill pickle on top of tomato slices. Put other slice of bread, butter side up, on top. Fry in a pan until both sides are nicely browned. ; name: bacon cheese melts ; ingredients: swiss cheese, bacon, mayonnaise, fresh chives, onion, celery salt, ground red pepper, bread ; preparation:Stir together cheese, bacon, mayo, chives, onion, celery salt and red pepper. Spread over bread slices. Cut each slice into 3 equal strips. Place on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 325 on the lowest oven rack for 12 minutes. ; name: club sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, american cheese, ham, tomatoes, lettuce, crisp bacon, monterey jack cheese, deli turkey ; preparation:Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on top of that second piece of toast. Layer monterey jack cheese, the rest of the tomatoes, lettuce, turkey and bacon on top. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together. ; name: grilled ham cheese sandwich ; ingredients: bread, ham, cheese, butter ; preparation:Put butter on one side of each piece of bread. Put ham and cheese onto the bread then cook like you would grilled cheese. In a pan with butter, or stick on an electric grill. Cook on each side till brown. Open sandwich on side without cheese and add your condiments. ; name: grilled ham n jack cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, texas toast thick bread, sharp cheddar cheese, deli ham, red onions, ranch dressing, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Butter one side of each slice of texas toast. On the unbuttered sides of four slices, layer cheddar cheese, half of the ham, onion if desired and remaining ham. Spread with ranch dressing. Top with pepper jack cheese and remaining toast, buttered side up. On a hot griddle, cook sandwiches for 3 - 4 minutes or until bottoms of sandwiches are browned. Carefully turn. Cook 2 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: bacon and tomato grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: cooked bacon, butter, bread, monterey jack pepper cheese, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: rhubarb pineapple pie different and delicious ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, rhubarb, pineapple, pastry for double-crust pie, granulated sugar ; preparation:In large bowl measure 1st amount of sugar and flour, stir. Add rhubarb and pineapple, stir. Pour fruit mixture into unbaked pie shell. Moisten pastry rim and cover with top crust. Cut slits in top crust to let steam escape. Sprinkle with remaining sugar. Bake in 350 oven on bottom rack for 50- 60 minutes until browned and rhubarb is cooked. ; name: chocolate chip buttermilk custard pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, buttermilk, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsels ; preparation:Fit pie crust into a 9-inch deep-dish pie plate. Fold edges under and crimp. Bake at 400 degrees for 6 minutes. Cool crust on a wire rack. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, beat butter, sugar, and flour and medium speed with an electric mixer until blended. Add eggs, buttermilk, and vanilla. Beat well. Fold in chocolate morsels. Pour into prepared crust. Bake at 350 for 1 hour until just set and lightly browned. Cool completely before serving. ; name: luscious rhubarb sponge dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, golden brown sugar, water, flour, baking powder, sugar, butter, eggs, whole milk, whipping cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Butter 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Alternate adding milk in 2 additions and fold in flour in 3 additions. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipping cream. ; name: canadian pork pie ; ingredients: unbaked pie shells, ground lean pork, lean ground beef, mashed potatoes, salt, ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, egg white ; preparation:Brown ground beef and ground pork over medium heat until thoroughly cooked. Drain off grease. Mix together cooked meat, potatoes, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Line a 9 inch pie dish with pastry. Spoon pork mixture into pie crust, and top with second pie crust. Brush top crust with egg white. Shield crust edges with aluminum foil to prevent burning. Bake at 375 degrees f for 45 minutes. Remove foil for final 15 minutes of baking to brown edges. ; name: moma s ez rhubarb pie ; ingredients: unbaked pie shell, rhubarb, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, butter ; preparation:Cut rhubarb in small pieces. Pile the rhubarb pieces in the pie shell. Sprinkle with the jello. Mix together the flour & sugar. Cut in the margarine. Sprinkle on top of rhubarb and jello. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Serve with cool whip. ; name: easy baked custard ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, vanilla extract, salt, milk, eggs, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 f. Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a buttered 9-in. Deep-dish pie or cake pan. Bake at for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack until room temperature. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: custard tart ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, cornflour, milk, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean. ; name: rhubarb custard pie ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, salt, eggs, rhubarb, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:

name: fresh corn pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shells, eggs, whipping cream, salt, yellow onion, fresh corn kernels, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Prick crust well on bottom and sides with fork, par-bake pastry crust with parchment paper and pie weight beans for 5-7 minutes until firm but not brown. Stir together rest of ingredients except paprika and parsley. Pour carefully into pie shell. Sprinkle with a little paprika. Bake 10 minutes, reduce heat to 350 and bake 30 minutes longer or until center is almost firm. Cool about 10 minutes. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley if desired. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: deep dish turkey pot pie ; ingredients: hot water, chicken stuffing mix, cooked turkey, frozen mixed vegetables, turkey gravy ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Add water to stuffing mix. Stir just until moistened. Set aside. Place turkey and vegetables in 2-quart casserole. Pour gravy over turkey mixture. Stir gently, then top with prepared stuffing. Bake 30 minutes or until heated through. ; name: squirrel pot pie ; ingredients: onion, celery, garlic clove, beef broth, fresh ground black pepper, squirrel, mexicorn, cornstarch, pastry for double-crust pie ; preparation:Combine the onion, celery, garlic, broth, pepper and squirrel in a large pot and bring to a boil. Simmer until meat is very tender and easily removed from bones. Debone the meat and set aside. Researve 1 cup cooking liquid. Fit the bottom crust into a pie pan. Combine the meat, vegetables reserved broth and cornstarch in a large bowl and mix well. Spoon the mixture into the pie shell. Top with the second crust, press the edges to seal and cut vents in the top for steam to escape. Bake at 350 degrees until crust is browned, about 1 hour. ; name: super easy chicken pot pie ; ingredients: ready-made pie crusts, healthy request cream of chicken soup, russet potatoes, frozen peas and carrot, frozen cut green beans, chicken breast ; preparation:Lay the bottom crust in a deep-dish pie plate and press in lightly. Arrange the vegetables and chicken in the crust and cover with the condensed soup. Cover with the top crust and seal the edges. Cut a couple of vents in the top crust and bake as if for a two-crust pie until golden brown and bubbly. Put some foil or a cookie sheet underneath the pie plate to prevent this. ; name: turkey and sausage veggie pot pie ; ingredients: butter, kielbasa, flour, milk, mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, salt, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add sausage and saute 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 2-3 minutes. Whisk in milk and cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in canned veggies, diced turkey and salt and pepepr. Pour into a lightly buttered pie plate. Roll out pie curst to fit over pie plate. Place pie crust over pie plate, trimming to fit. Crimp edges and cut steam slits in top. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes or until crust is golden. ; name: fried pies ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, egg yolk, oil, powdered sugar ; preparation:Cut butter into flour with pastry blender. Combine milk and egg yolk. Pour over flour mixture, stirring to mix well. Roll out small portions on floured surface. Place pie filling in center. Fold over and seal edges. Fry in deep fat until golden. Put sugars or coating in brown paper bag and shake to coat. Enjoy. ; name: cornbread chicken pot pie ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, whole kernel corn, cooked chicken, corn muffin mix, milk, egg ; preparation:

name: garden spaghetti ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, canola oil, swiss chard, vegetable broth, fresh black pepper, kosher salt, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: easy garlic spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti noodles according to directions. Drain and return to pot. Can use any pasta - does not have to be spaghetti. In a skillet, add olive oil and garlic. Saute garlic over medium heat until it begins to brown, then remove from burner. Pour garlic and olive oil over spaghetti and add parmesean cheese. Salt and pepper to taste. Toss to coat spaghetti and serve. I sprinkle more parmesean cheese on top after serving. ; name: garlic pasta ; ingredients: garlic, dried basil, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, olive oil, spaghetti ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: italian chicken pasta toss ; ingredients: spaghetti, italian salad dressing, olive oil, tomatoes, cooked chicken, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm. ; name: spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, extra virgin olive oil, yellow sweet onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, feta cheese, black olives, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm. ; name: broccoli and garlic breadcrumb spaghetti ; ingredients: day-old white bread, spaghetti, broccoli, olive oil, butter, lemon juice, ground cumin, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Remove and discard the crusts from the bread. Process the bread until it is fine. Use your culinary discretion. Cook the pasta in a larg saucepan of boiling water until it is tender, and drain. Meanwhile boil, steam or microwave the broccoli until tender, and drain. Heat the oil, butter and lemon juice in a large pan. Add the cumin and make sure that it is mixed through the breadcrumbs. Cook the breadcrumbs and garlic until they are browned and slightly crisp. Combine the pasta, broccoli and breadcrumbs in a large bowl. Serve sprinkled with the shaved parmesan. ; name: chicken and broccoli spaghetti ; ingredients: broccoli florets, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, cooked chicken, basil leaves, ground black pepper, thin spaghetti, tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: spiced skewered chicken chicken sosaties ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, onions, madras curry powder, garlic cloves, coriander seed, light brown sugar, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Place chicken in a large deep nonreactive bowl. Heat oil in a nonreactive saucepan and fry the onions until they are lightly browned. Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 2 minutes over low heat, stirring constantly to make sure that the sugar has dissolved. Allow the marinade to cool and pour it over the chicken. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate it for 24 hours. When ready to grill the chicken pieces, remove them from the marinade, drain them, place them on skewers, and grill over hot coals or under the broiler for 10 minutes, turning once, or until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot with apricot chutney. ; name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: chicken and roasted pepper skewers ; ingredients: mayonnaise, roasted red pepper, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Soak 12 eight inch skewers in water for 30 minutes. Mix mayonnaise, pepper, and garlic in a shallow dish until well blended. Thread 2 to 3 pieces of chicken on each skewer and place in shallow dish.
