Rotate skewers in dish to thoroughly coat the chicken in the mayonnaise mixture. Marinate for 30 minutes in refrigerator. Remove skewers from marinade and place in the rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-6 inches away from heat for 10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through, turning occasionally. ; name: lemon marinade and sauce for poultry ; ingredients: brown sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, water, soy sauce, green onion, garlic salt, garlic, margarine, lemon pepper ; preparation:Mix the cornstarch and brown sugar in a small saucepan. Stir in the remaining ingredients except the onions. Blend well and heat to boiling. Add the onions and immediately turn heat down. Stir constantly until sauce is thickened and bubbling. Use this sauce to baste poultry during last few minutes of grilling. You can also use this sauce as a marinade. Put sauce in a heavy plastic bag along with 2 to 3 pounds of chicken pieces and marinate for from 2 hours to overnight, turning bag to coat all sides of meat. Use the leftover sauce to brush on chicken while grilling. This recipe doubles nicely. ; name: honey barbecue chicken skewers ; ingredients: oil, liquid honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce, fresh garlic cloves, green onion, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, wooden skewer ; preparation:Slice the chicken breasts in half or into thirds or whatever size you you desire to thread on the skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken strips on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat. ; name: sambal chicken skewers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, brown sugar, rice vinegar, chili paste, fish sauce, hot sauce, ground ginger ; preparation:Mix brown sugar, rice vinegar, chile paste, fish sauce, sriracha, and ginger. Marinate chicken for 6-8 hours in plastic bag. Thread chicken onto metal or soaked wooden skewers. Take reserved marinade and bring to boil to use as a basting sauce. Grill chicken 15 minutes, turning and basting occassionally. ; name: herb roasted chicken ; ingredients: chicken, butter, lemon juice, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried sage, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes. ; name: chicken on lemongrass skewers ; ingredients: lemongrass, peanut oil, lime rind, coriander leaves, chicken breasts, lime juice, birds eye chiles, macadamia nut oil, raw sugar, garlic clove ; preparation:

name: mediterranean pasta ; ingredients: linguine, bacon, boneless chicken breast, salt, diced tomatoes with juice, dried rosemary, feta cheese, pitted black olives, artichoke hearts ; preparation:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: macaroni and beef casserole ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, lean ground beef, italian-style stewed tomatoes, dried oregano leaves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: mom s italian hamburger helper ; ingredients: pasta, ground beef, garlic powder, italian seasoning, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta as directed on box. Meanwhile, brown ground beef with garlic powder and italian seasoning. Drain grease and add sauce. Heat. Drain pasta and add to sauce mixture. Stir in cheese until it just melts. Serve with garlic bread and salad. ; name: tomato and macaroni dinner ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, ground beef, diced tomatoes, cooked macaroni, paprika, dried oregano, chili powder, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook onion in vegetable oil. Add in ground beef and cook until meat is browned. Stir in tomatoes, macaroni, and spices. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer, stirring often for 10min. Uncover and boil if not thick enough. ; name: kielbasa pasta casserole ; ingredients: ziti pasta, polish sausage, oil, italian-style stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, dried oregano, fresh parsley, ground black pepper, italian style breadcrumbs, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: mint iced tea ; ingredients: water, peppermint tea bags, orange pekoe tea bags, orange, zest of, mint leaves, whole cloves, superfine sugar, pink grapefruit juice, ice cube, mint sprig ; preparation:Bring water to boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired. ; name: lemon lime iced tea ; ingredients: green tea bags, boiling water, frozen concentrated lemonade, white rum, ice cube, lemon, lime ; preparation:Add tea bags to boiling water. Steep for 3 minute remove bags, then immediately add frozen lemonade and stir until completely dissolved. Sweeten with sugar or honey, if needed. Refrigerate at least until cold. Then stir in rum to taste. To serve, place a few ice cubes in a large pitcher. Thinly slice lemon and lime and add. Pour tea mixture overtop. ; name: hot spiced orange and fruit tea ; ingredients: orange spice tea bags, boiling water, water, sugar, lemon juice, orange juice, cinnamon stick, whole cloves, honey ; preparation:Pour 2 quart boiling water over the 8 teabags. Brew 5 minutes, remove tea bags, set aside. While doing the above boil 2 celsius each water and sugar together for10 minutes, or until sugar is disolved, to make syrup. Add remaining ingredients. Bring backto boil and simmer 20 minutes. Remove cloves and cinnamon. Serve hot. Allow each person to sweeten as they choose. ; name: fresh mint and ginger lemonade ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, fresh ginger, honey, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, water, ice cube, lemon slice ; preparation:Combine chopped mint, ginger and honey in medium bowl. Add boiling water and allow to steep for 30-40 minutes. Strain into 4-cup glass measuring cup, pressing on solids to extract liquid. Add lemon juice and enough cold water to measure 4 cups total. Fill glasses with ice cubes. Add lemonade. Garnish with mint leaves and fresh lemon slices. ; name: brewed iced tea with lemon ; ingredients: water, black tea, unbleached cane sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a teapot or large saucepan heat water until boiling. Steep tea bags in water for 2 hours. Add lemon juice and sugar to a 2 quart pitcher. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill. ; name: touch of mint iced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, of fresh mint, frozen lemonade concentrate, lemon slice, mint ; preparation:In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint. ; name: iced tea with a twist ; ingredients: tea, orange juice, grapefruit juice, sugar, ice cube, orange rind, grapefruit peel ; preparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine tea, orange juice, and grapefruit juice. Stir in desired amount of sugar to taste. To serve, pour over ice cubes in glasses. If desired, tie a strip of orange peel and a strip of grapefruit peel into a knot and use as a garnish. Serve at once. ; name: honey citrus iced tea ; ingredients: tea bags, water, navel oranges, lemons, orange juice, lemon juice, honey, ginger ale ; preparation:

name: food processor loaf bread ; ingredients: water, active dry yeast, sugar, all-purpose flour, salt ; preparation:Combine water, sugar and yeast in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: raisin bread not bread machine ; ingredients: flour, fast rising yeast, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, salt, butter, raisins, water ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: healthy household bread ; ingredients: plain flour, brown flour, lsa, honey, salt, oil, yeast, sunflower seeds, water ; preparation:Dissolve honey in water. Add yeast. Leave 10 - 15 minutes to bubble. Sift flours, adding husks left over from sifting into the sifted flour, and salt. Stir in the lsa and sunflower seeds. Add yeast mixture and oil. Knead until texture has developed. This takes about 4 - 5 minutes in the kenwood mixer, but would take longer if doing it by hand. Grease and flour a bread tin. Place dough into tin and leave to rise. Bake at 190 degrees c for about 30 - 32 minutes. ; name: french peasant bread ; ingredients: yeast, warm water, sugar, salt, flour, olive oil, cornmeal, butter ; preparation:Dissolve yeast, sugar and salt in water. Add flour and stir with a wooden spoon until blended. Do not knead -- it will be lumpy. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hours. Oil a cookie sheet with olive oil. Oil hands and remove dough from bowl and divide into 2 rounds and place on cookie sheet. Sprinkle dough with cornmeal. Let rise 1 hour. Preheat oven to 425 degrees and brush dough with melted butter. Bake for 10 min then reduce heat to 375 degrees and bake an additional 15 minutes. When finished baking, brush again with melted butter. ; name: bread machine naan ; ingredients: bread machine quick-acting active dry yeast, warm water, white sugar, milk, egg, salt, bread flour, butter, garlic ; preparation:Add ingredients to bread machine in order suggested by manufacturer. Remove bread after kneading cycle, then divide into pieces about the size of a golf ball. Roll into ball shape, cover, and let rise for 30 minutes. During second rising, heat grill or grill pan to medium high heat. At grill side, roll one ball of dough out into a thin circle. Lightly oil grill. Place dough on grill, and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, or until puffy and lightly browned. If you want to use the butter and garlic, let the garlic soak in the butter and brush uncooked side with butter before turning over. Brush cooked side with butter, and cook until browned, another 2 to 4 minutes. Remove from grill, and continue the process until all the naan has been prepared. ; name: buttermilk cheese bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, egg, sharp cheddar cheese, whole wheat flour, bread flour, dry buttermilk, salt, yeast, lemon pepper ; preparation:Place ingredients in bread machine pan in recommended order and set on dough cycle. Check consistency of dough and add additional water or flour, if necessary. At end of cycle, remove, shape, and let rise until approximately doubled. Bake in preheated 350 deg. Oven. For app. 30 to 40 minute. ; name: hearty wheat bread not bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, molasses, vital wheat gluten, stone ground whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, sunflower seeds, salt ; preparation:Stir yeast and molasses into water. Mix all dry ingredients except additional flour. Combine dry mixture with yeast mixture knead in additioal flour to form elastic dough. Place in greased bowl, turn greased side of dough up. Let rise in warm place until double, 60-90 minute. Punch down dough and roll out on floured suface divide in half. Roll into loaves and place in greased bread pans. Let rise 45 min - 1 hour. Bake 350f for 40-45 minute. ; name: best bread machine bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, oil, skim milk powder, white bread flour, salt ; preparation:

name: u wing it pork loin chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, sour cream, horseradish, grainy mustard, ranch dressing, dry red wine ; preparation:Brown chops in oil in a frying pan. Remove to casserole dish. Saute onion and garlic over high heat for 2 minutes. Add sour cream, horseradish, mustard, dressing and wine. Heat for 3 minutes. Pour over chops. Bake in preheated 350f oven for 1 hour or until done. ; name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: braised pork spareribs ; ingredients: vinegar, brown sugar, soya sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, pork spareribs ; preparation:Brown spareribs in frying pan in small amount olive oil. Remove spareribs and place in oven proof pan. Add brown sugar, vinegar, soya sauce, ginger and garlic in frying pan and cook at low heat until melted and blended. Pour over ribs and cover with tight covered lid or tin foil. Cook at 350 for 1 hour and turn ribs. Continue for another hour. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: crock pot yummy bbq pork sandwiches ; ingredients: pork shoulder, beef broth, barbecue sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: spicy beer brined rotisserie pork loin ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, beer, dark corn syrup, green onions, prepared mustard, vegetable oil, chili powder, fresh garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Place the pork loin roast in a heavy large plastic ziploc bag. In a bowl whisk together beer, corn syrup, onions, mustard, chili powder, garlic and black pepper. Pour the marinade over the pork. Seal the bag tightly and turn to coat the meat. Place the bag in a large bowl and place in the refrigerator for 8-24 hours. When ready to cook prepare the rotisserie. Remove the roast from the marinade and bring to almost room temperature before cooking. Place the pork on the spit then set over heat and baste every 10-15 minutes or the internal temperature reads 155-160f. Discard any remaining marinade. Remove the roast from the spit and let rest for 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: 16 hour pulled pork ; ingredients: pork butt, onions, ginger ale, barbecue sauce ; preparation:

name: eggless chocolate cookies ; ingredients: margarine, oil, sugar, water, salt, baking soda, flour, cocoa ; preparation:Cream margarine, oil, sugar and 1 t water until light and fluffy. Mix in remaining 2-3 t of water and beat well. Mix dry ingredients. Add to margarine mixture and mix until combined. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to an hour. Preheat oven 400f and grease a cookie sheet well. Make 24 balls. Bake for 10 minutes, should be very puffy. Allow to cool for 5 minutes on baking sheet, they will fall considerably due to the lack of egg. ; name: light chocolate chip oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: margarine, dark brown sugar, egg, vanilla, cinnamon, whole wheat flour, baking powder, oats, dark chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine margarine, sugar, egg, vanilla and cinnamon. Stir until creamy and smooth. I microwave the margarine for about 30 seconds to soften. Add flour and baking powder and stir until completely combined. Add oats and then chocolate chips. Spoon onto greased cookie sheets with a soup spoon with about an inch between each cookie. Bake at 350 f for 11 minutes. I used two sheets in the oven at once, and if you do that, switch the bottom sheet with the top sheet after about 5 minutes and then continue cookie. Let cool. ; name: semi sweet chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, oatmeal, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy. ; name: party time chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, sugar, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips, slivered almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar together in a medium bowl. Add extracts and beat well. Scrape bowl. Add flour, chocolate chips and almonds, and blend on low speed until just combined. Do not overmix. Shape rounded tablespoonsful into 12 balls and place on a greased baking sheets, 2 inches apart. Bake 15 minutes or until cookies just begin to brown. Transfer cookies to a cool, flat surface. ; name: classic chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: raspberry chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, almond extract, vanilla, flour, raspberry jam, semi-sweet chocolate chips, powdered sugar ; preparation:In large bowl, combine butter and sugar. Add almond extract and vanilla. Add flour and mix until incorporated. Drop by tablespoons on prepared baking sheets. Make an indent with your thumb in the center of each cookie. Fill with jam and three chocolate chips. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes or until lightly firm. Cookies should still be pale in color. ; name: sinful cookies ; ingredients: saltine crackers, butter, sugar, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Line a 9 x 13 pan with aluminum foil. Preheat oven to 400. Place saltine crackers in pan in rows. I usually can fit about 24 in the pan. In a saucepan, bring the butter and sugar to a boil. After it begins boiling, boil for 3 minutes. Immediately pour the butter-sugar mixture on the crackers. Bake in the oven for 7 minutes. Take out of the oven, pour chocolate chips over crackers, and smooth them out after they melt. Cool in the fridge until the chocolate has hardened. Cut into squares. ; name: stained glass window cookies ; ingredients: chocolate chips, margarine, mini marshmallows, nuts ; preparation:

name: beef chestnut and red wine stew ; ingredients: beef, onion, fresh thyme, vegetable oil, beef stock, chestnuts, carrots, red wine, seasoned flour ; preparation:Cube the beef and dredge it in the seasoned flour. Fry the beef in oil over a high heat until browned in a dutch oven. Add the onions and keep frying until they start to brown. Add the thyme, wine and stock, bring to the boil, then turn down the heat and simmer for 1 hour, lid on. Add the carrots and chestnuts, season and cook gently for a further hour, lid off. ; name: crock pot beef and broccoli ; ingredients: rib eye, soy sauce, white wine, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, sesame oil, ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, frozen broccoli florets ; preparation:Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice. ; name: beer beef fajitas crock pot ; ingredients: beef round steak, fajita seasoning mix, onion, green peppers, red bell pepper, beer ; preparation:Rinse steaks well with cold water. Pat dry with paper towels. Season both sides of steak with 1 packet fajita seasoning mix. Slice into strips, set aside. Place peppers and onions in crock pot. Sprinkle second packet of fajita mix on top of vegetables. Place steak strips on top of vegetables. Pour in beer. Cover. Cook on low for 8-10 hours. ; name: new england crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef roast, red potatoes, carrots, onion, prepared horseradish, salt, black pepper, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place potatoes, carrots, and onion into a 4-6 qt slow cooker. Place beef on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables. ; name: beef with asian mushroom sauce crock pot ; ingredients: sliced mushrooms, beef tip roast, hoisin sauce, garlic cloves, salt, beef broth, cornstarch, water, scallions ; preparation:Put the mushrooms in your slow cooker and place the beef on top. Spread the hoisin sauce over the beef, scatter the garlic and salt over it, and pour in the broth around it. Cover the slow cooker, and cook on low for 6-8 hours. Remove the beef from the slow cooker and put it on a platter. Turn cooker to high. Mix the cornstarch with water and add to the sauce. When sauce is thickened a bit, pour the sauce into a sauce boat. Slice the beef and serve it with the sauce, topped with the scallions. ; name: crock pot savory pork roast ; ingredients: pork loin roast, onion, bay leaf, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve. ; name: savory crock pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, dried thyme, basil leaves, salt & pepper, garlic cloves, red wine, water, baby carrots, white button mushrooms ; preparation:Cover both sides of roast with italian dressing mix and place in crock pot. Sprinkle thyme and basil over top of roast. Add salt and pepper. Gently pour red wine and water over and around roast being careful not to wash the spices off the roast. Sprinkle minced garlic over the roast. Top roast with baby carrots and mushrooms. Finish with a little more salt and pepper. Set crock pot on high for two hours, and then low for five to six more. ; name: crock pot beef with red wine gravy ; ingredients: beef stew meat, onions, beef bouillon cubes, cornstarch, salt, pepper, dry red wine, cooked noodles ; preparation:

name: melt in ya mouth swedish butter cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, egg yolks, butter, almond extract ; preparation:Sift flour and sugar into a bowl. Mix the egg yolks, butter and extract in separate bowl. Slowly add flour and sugar a bit a time, mixing the mixture with your finger. Fource dough through a press or roll balls and flatten or make snakes onto grease trays. Bake in a moderate oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Keep in air-tight container. ; name: nutty caramel corn ; ingredients: brown sugar, margarine, corn syrup, salt, butter flavoring, maple flavoring, cream of tartar, baking soda, popped corn, mixed nuts ; preparation:In saucepan, combine brown sugar, margarine, corn syrup, and salt. Boil for 6 minutes, stirring constantly. Add flavorings, cream of tartar, and soda. Pour over popped corn and nuts, mixing thoroughly. Spread glazed mixture out on a large baking sheet. Bake in 200 oven for one hour. ; name: kahlua candied yams ; ingredients: yams, butter, brown sugar, kahlua ; preparation:Cut yams in serving size pieces. In heavy skillet, melt butter with sugar. Add kahlua. Cook 1 minute. Add yams. Turn until brown on all sides. Cover, reduce heat. Cook about 15 minutes. Turn yams once more before serving. ; name: sugar and spice nuts ; ingredients: egg white, cashews, pecan halves, almonds, white sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: chockful of nuts brittle ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, corn syrup, salted nuts ; preparation:Combine butter, sugar and corn syrop in a large saucepan. Using a wooden spoon, stir and cook over medium heat until smooth and bubbly. Cook, covered for one minute. Add nuts, increase heat to medium-high. Cook uncovered, stirring constantly until syrop is a warm golden color. Line a cookie sheet with foil and lightly butter. Pour mixture onto pan, spreading as thin as possible. Cool until hard. Peel from foil and break into bite-sized pieces. ; name: crispix snack mix ; ingredients: crispix cereal, mixed nuts, small pretzels, brown sugar, light karo syrup, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Bring sugar, syrup, butter, and vanilla to a boil. Grease a cookie sheet. Spread cereal, nuts, and pretzels evenly over cookie sheets. Pour syrup mixture over the top. Bake at 250 degrees for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Shake mixture to break apart. ; name: candied almonds ; ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon, almonds ; preparation:Bring water, sugar and cinnamon to a boil. Stirring constantly. Add almonds and toss to coat. Remove almonds with slotted spoon. Arrange on greased baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, basting twice with reserved syrup. Cool. Store airtight. ; name: swedish hard candies knck ; ingredients: sugar, dark corn syrup, butter, cream, blanched almonds ; preparation:

name: caesar salad sandwiches with chicken ; ingredients: hard rolls, romaine lettuce, fat-free caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, chicken breasts, olive oil ; preparation:Set the oven on broil. Cut each roll in half and scoop out the dough to form a pocket in one side of the bread. Combine the lettuce, dressing and cheese in a bowl. Place the chicken strips on a broiler pan and brush with the olive oil. Broil the strips of chicken for a total of about 7 minutes, turning once. Add the chicken to the salad and pile the mixture into the bread pocket. Top with the other half of bread and serve. ; name: broccoli and tortellini salad ; ingredients: bacon, cheese-filled tortellini, mayonnaise, white sugar, cider vinegar, fresh broccoli, raisins, sunflower seeds, red onion ; preparation:Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook tortellini in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain, and rinse under cold water. In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar to make the dressing. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, tortellini, bacon, raisins, sunflower seeds and red onion. Pour dressing over salad, and toss. ; name: festive winter salad ; ingredients: raspberry vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, honey, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, romaine lettuce, pomegranate seeds, roasted pistachios, gorgonzola ; preparation:Combine the vinegar, oil, honey, salt and pepper in a medium bowl, and whisk to combine. Taste for seasoning, and add more salt or pepper if needed. Place half of the lettuce on each of two salad plates. Scatter the pomegranate seeds, pistachios, and cheese over each plate. Drizzle with the dressing, and serve immediately. ; name: broccoli salad with gouda ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red onion, grape tomatoes, slivered almonds, gouda cheese, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook broccoli in boiling salted water for 1 minute. Drain well. Rinse with cold water. Drain well agin. Combine the broccoli with onion, tomatoes, nuts and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, sugar, pepper and salt. Pour over salad mixture and toss to coat. ; name: healthy salad ; ingredients: artichokes, cucumbers, cilantro leaf, laughing cow cheese, cherry tomatoes, pita bread, lemon juice, olive oil, ground black pepper, chives ; preparation:1preheat the oven 325 degrees f. Toast the pita cubes for five minutes. Let it cool completely. 2in a salad bowl, combine the baby cucumbers, canned artichokes, cilantro, cherry tomatoes, and cheese and toss. Add the pita cubes, which should not be hot or it will melt some of the cheese and warm the vegetables, which should not happen. 3in a small bowl combine the lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper and chives. Add to the salad and combine well. 4refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: grilled caesar chicken breasts ; ingredients: caesar salad dressing, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the dressing, oil, mustard and garlic. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill chicken, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer reads 170. ; name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: original cesar cardini caesar salad ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, olive oil, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, bacon bits, romaine lettuce leaf ; preparation:

name: chicken creole with chili cream sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, creole seasoning, olive oil, cream of chicken soup, water, green chilies, lime juice, sour cream ; preparation:Season chicken with creole seasoning heat oil in skillet. Add chicken and brown on both sides. Add soup, water, chiles and lime juice. Heat to a boil. Cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done. Stir in sour cream and heat thru. ; name: pepper lime chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime zest, lime juice, cooking oil, dried thyme, black pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedge ; preparation:Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, and garlic. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges. ; name: chicken ranchero ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, garlic, green chilies, chicken broth, green chili salsa, cheddar cheese, cooked rice ; preparation:Saute chicken over medium heat, in olive oil about 5 minutes. Add onions and continue cooking until chicken is done and onions are soft. Add garlic, green chiles and broth. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for 30 minutes. Stir in salsa. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Gently fold in cubed cheddar cheese. Serve immediately over beds of rice. ; name: spicy citrus chicken ; ingredients: water, onion, frozen orange juice, ketchup, garlic cloves, cinnamon, hot sauce, salt, chicken ; preparation:Place ingredients in a zip top bag and refrigerate for 4-6 hours. Heat grill and cook meat. Brush with marinate while cooking. Bring marinade to a boil. Thicken slightly and serve with the meat. ; name: savory chicken with peppers ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt, pepper, onion, beer, bell peppers ; preparation:In 10-inch skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add onion slices. Cook 4 to 5 minutes, turning chicken once, until chicken is brown on all sides. Add beer, heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer about 10 minutes or until juice of chicken is clear when center of thickest part is cut. Stir in bell peppers. Increase heat to medium. Cook uncovered 5 minutes longer, stirring occasionally until peppers are crisp tender. ; name: spicy chicken with pineapple ; ingredients: cooking oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, paprika, chili powder, red pepper, pineapple slices in juice, tomatoes, red kidney beans ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes. ; name: cuban style chicken with fresh pineapple salsa ; ingredients: fresh pineapple chunks, green onions, fresh cilantro leaves, fresh lemon juice, ground cumin, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cinnamon, salt & pepper ; preparation:Chop fresh pineapple roughly and mix in a small bowl with green onions, cilantro, lemon juice, and cumin. Season to taste with some salt& pepper. Cover and chill. Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season both sides of chicken with some salt& pepper and some cinnamon to taste. Saute chicken in oil about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink inside- but still moist. Spoon pineapple mixture over each serving and serve immediately. If you prefer, you may instead grill chicken. ; name: spicy caribbean chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, green onions, jalapeno peppers, lemon juice, honey, fresh thyme ; preparation:

name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: oatmeal buttermilk muffins ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, quick-cooking oatmeal, buttermilk, flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add egg. Add oatmeal. Add buttermilk. Then add flour. Salt baking powder and baking soda. Mix well. Bake in greased muffin tin 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: english muffin bread ; ingredients: flour, yeast, sugar, baking soda, milk, water, salt, cornmeal ; preparation:Combine flour, yeast, sugar, salt and soda in a large bowl. Heat together milk and water until very warm. Add dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in remaining flour to make a stiff batter. Spoon into 2 loaf pans that have been greased and sprinkled with cornmeal. Sprinkle cornmeal on top. Cover and let stand in warm place for 45 minutes. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes. ; name: rustic oatmeal cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, oatmeal, baking powder, salt, eggs, margarine, milk, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: cornmeal molasses pancakes ; ingredients: egg, buttermilk, dark molasses, butter, unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, yellow cornmeal ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the egg, buttermilk, molasses and melted butter. Add the flour, salt, baking soda and baking powder. Add the cornmeal last, stirring just until combined. The batter will be slightly lumpy. Drop by tablespoons ful on a hot greased griddle until bubbles form around the outer edges. Turn and brown on the other side --. Serve with butter and sorghum molasses or maple syrup. ; name: maple cinnamon muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon, brown sugar, baking powder, milk, oil, maple syrup, egg ; preparation:Sift together dry ingredients. Slightly beat egg in a separate bowl. Stir in milk, oil and maple syrup. Stir into dry ingredients until moist. Pour into 12 greased muffin cups. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Immediately remove from pan. Delicious warm or cool. ; name: moist cornbread ; ingredients: white flour, cornmeal, salt, baking powder, white sugar, milk, oil, creamed corn, eggs ; preparation:Turn oven on to 300 degrees. In large bowl mix together dry ingredients, first 5 ingredients. In smaller bowl mix together wet ingredients, last 4 ingredients. Add wet ingredients to larger bowl of dry ingredients. Mix well. Grease an 8-9 inch cast iron pan with pam. Pour batter into pan and bake for 1 hour. ; name: maismeel kadetjes cornmeal muffins ; ingredients: butter, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, baking powder, flour, cornmeal ; preparation:

name: new england crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef roast, red potatoes, carrots, onion, prepared horseradish, salt, black pepper, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place potatoes, carrots, and onion into a 4-6 qt slow cooker. Place beef on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables. ; name: texas crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef chuck, salt, black pepper, paprika, garlic clove, oil, beef broth, onion, bottled chili sauce ; preparation:Mix together salt, pepper, paprika and garlic and rub into roast. Cover and chill to marinate. Brown well on both sides in oil, then place in crock pot and add beef broth and onions. Cook 6 to 8 hours on low or until tender. Add chili sauce the last hour of cooking. ; name: mock crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef eye round, root beer, garlic powder, lemon pepper, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Mix the root beer, garlic powder and lemon pepper in a small pot. Add the steak and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for one hour to an hour and a half. Remove steak. Mix cornstarch with a little bit of water. Add to the leftover sauce and stir on medium heat until thickened. Serve over noodles or rice. ; name: v s crock pot bottom round roast ; ingredients: boneless bottom round roast, dijon mustard, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, dry red wine, beef broth, onion, carrots, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place chopped onion and carrots in bottom of crock pot. Season all sides of the roast liberally with the kosher salt and ground pepper. Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Combine mustard, sugar, worcestershire sauce, beef broth and red wine in a separate bowl and pour over roast. Set crock pot to low and cook for 3 hours. After 3 hours, turn the roast onto one side and cook for 20 minutes. After 20 minutes, turn the roast on the next side and cook 20 minutes, repeat until the roast has the fat side on the bottom again. Cook for about 2 more hours usually 6 hours total. The roast is done when it shreds easily with a fork. ; name: bbq crock pot beef ; ingredients: beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celery ; preparation:Cut or trim beef if needed. Place all ingredients in crock pot. Stir to combine. Cover. Turn on high for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles. ; name: crock pot savory pork roast ; ingredients: pork loin roast, onion, bay leaf, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve. ; name: zesty italian style crock pot roast ; ingredients: dry onion soup mix, paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, oregano, basil, chuck roast ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine all seasonings, mixing well. Pierce roast all over. Rub in seasonings. Place in crock pot, cover with lid. Cook on low for 7 to 8 hours. Serve on buns if desired. ; name: tangy crock pot beef roast ; ingredients: beef eye round, tomato paste, marsala wine, red wine vinegar, warm water, brown sugar, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, thyme, pepper ; preparation:

name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: big and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, white sugar, margarine, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream together sugars and margarine until fluffy with mixer. Blend in eggs, 1 at a time. Blend in vanilla. Combine flour, salt and baking soda. Add flour, combining with a spoon. Add chocolate chips. Use an ice cream scoop for measurement and place on shiny cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350f oven for 18-20 minutes or until golden. ; name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: soft and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream margarine. Add gradually and beat in brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift and stir in flour, salt, baking soda. Add chocolate chips. Bake 10 minutes at 375. ; name: very chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, margarine, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. First, cream both sugars with the shortening, margarine, eggs, and vanilla. Then, gradually add soda, salt and flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake 8-9 minutes. ; name: mean chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:

name: bunches of bananas bread ; ingredients: bananas, sugar substitute, vanilla, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:In one bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour. ; name: kay s banana nut cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant banana pudding mix, eggs, banana, oil, water, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs until thick. Add cake mix, pudding, water, oil, and bananas. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add walnuts, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish. ; name: hawaiian banana bread ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, bananas, eggs, cake flour, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack. ; name: wonderful banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, wheat bran, baking soda, salt, butter, applesauce, splenda brown sugar blend, eggs, mashed bananas, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool. ; name: banana eggs ; ingredients: eggs, banana, cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Preaheat skillet over medium heat. Place eggs, banana, cinnamon, and salt in a blender. Blend until smooth. Melt butter in skillet and add egg mixture. Cook until eggs begin to set. Flip. Cook until fully set and enjoy with toast. ; name: one pan banana bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, bananas, vanilla extract, eggs, bisquick baking mix, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease the bottom only of a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Stir all ingredients in pan with a fork until moistened. Beat vigorously 1 minute. Bake 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. Run knife around sides of loaf to loosen, remove from pan. Cool completely. ; name: banana bites ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, banana, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, nuts, raisins, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream the butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time beating well after each addition. Add mashed banana. Add all the remaining ingredients. Beat well. Pour the dough with a spoon on a greased baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven of 375 f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: pesach banana cake ; ingredients: eggs, banana, salt, sugar, potato flour ; preparation:

name: hot cheese and bacon dip ; ingredients: bacon, cream cheese, mild cheddar cheese, half-and-half, worcestershire sauce, dried onion flakes, dry mustard, salt, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Brown and drain bacon, and set aside. Mix remaining ingredients in a slow cooker. Cover, cook on low for 1 hour, stirring occasionally until cheese melts. Stir in bacon. Serve with fruit slices, or french bread slices. ; name: hot ham and cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese spread, smoked ham, cheddar cheese, ritz cracker ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, cheddar cheese and ham until well blended. Spoon into oven proof crock or 9 inch. Pie plate. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned. Serve warm as a spread with crackers. ; name: white cheese dip ; ingredients: white processed cheese, milk, canned jalapeno slices, garlic cloves, salt ; preparation:In saucepan heat milk to a simmer. Cube cheese. Add to milk and stir until melted. In blender jar add jalapenos and juice. Blend till minced. Add to melted cheese. Add garlic and salt. Serve with tortilla chips or use as a sauce for chimichangas or burritos. ; name: copycat pancho s cheese dip ; ingredients: american cheese, cumin powder, garlic powder, rotel tomatoes & chilies ; preparation:Melt cheese until smooth in a double boiler or microwave, stirring throughout. Puree rotel in blender or small processor. Stir into the cheese the rotel, cumin and garlic. If too thick, add a little water. Serve with tortilla chips. Enjoy. ; name: baked seafood dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, green onion, white wine, seafood, swiss cheese, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: chive egg dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, hard-boiled eggs, chives, sweet peppers ; preparation:In a small bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in milk and mayonnaise until blended. Add the mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Stir in eggs and chives. Mix well. Serve with peppers or crackers. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: chunky cheese dip ; ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, tomatoes and green chilies, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, tabasco sauce ; preparation:In saucepan, brown meat. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer until blended, stirring occasionally. I serve with doritos. ; name: crock pot cheese dip with a new twist ; ingredients: cheese spread, cream cheese, rotel, smoked sausage ; preparation:

name: baked seasoned beet crisps ; ingredients: beets, balsamic vinegar, sugar, allspice, parsley, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn. ; name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: simple greek beet salad ; ingredients: beet, olive oil, red wine vinegar, walnuts, garlic clove ; preparation:Boil the beets with their skins for about 30 to 40 minutes, let them cool and peel. In a little bowl mix the olive oil, vinegar and garlic. Cut the beets in round slices and place on a plate. Pour the dressing over the beets and sprinkle with the walnuts. You can also cut in cubes and serve in a deeper bowl. ; name: green beans with tomato onion and bacon ; ingredients: green beans, bacon, onion, tomatoes, garlic clove, dried oregano, salt, lemon juice, pepper ; preparation:In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoons of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoons bacon fat and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice. ; name: mixed greens with honey lime dressing ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, honey, lime zest, salt and pepper, red onion, mixed greens, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in a small bowl to blend, season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer 2 tablespoons dressing to another smaller bowl. Mix in onions. Let onion and remaiming dressing stand at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours. Toss onion mixture occasionally. Mix lettuces, tomatoes, and onion mixture in bowl. Toss with dressing, serve. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: beet salad with chives salatat shamandar ; ingredients: beets, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, fresh chives, olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Boil the beets until tender. When beets are cool enough to handle, peel, dice, and place in a salad bowl. Stir in garlic, cilantro, chives, olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper. Chill for at least 1 hour. Stir, sprinkle with parsley and serve. ; name: beet greens with bacon and onion ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, yellow onion, beet leaves, white wine, bacon bits, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: pucker up lemon crunch pie ; ingredients: lemon cream-filled vanilla sandwich cookies, butter, instant lemon pudding mix, milk, cool whip, lemon drop candy ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine cookies and butter and mix well. Spread over bottom and up sides of 9 inch deep dish pie pan to form a crust. Bake 10 minutes and cook completely. In meantime mix pudding according to package directions using milk. Spoon evenly into cooled crust. Carefully fold the crushed candies into the cool whip. Spread over the pie filling. Cover loosely and refrigerate at least 2 hours to meld flavors. ; name: rustic crunchy apple pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, apples, unbaked pie shell, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon. Roll apple slices in the crumb mixture. Arrange apples in unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture over top of apples. Pour melted butter evenly over the top of the apples. Bake for 1 hour. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice-cream. ; name: pistachio cream dessert ; ingredients: butter, butter-flavored cracker crumbs, milk, instant pistachio pudding mix, vanilla ice cream, frozen whipped topping, heath candy bars ; preparation:In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving. ; name: apple graham cracker dessert ; ingredients: light apple pie filling, butter, splenda sugar substitute, eggs, vanilla extract, graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt, nonfat milk, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: low fat cherry cheesecake pudding pie ; ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, cherry pie filling, skim milk, cheesecake flavor instant pudding and pie filling, cool whip free ; preparation:Spoon half of the pie filling into crust. In a mixing bowl, combine milk, and pudding mixes. Mix until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon mixture over pie filling in crust. Refrigerate three hours or until set. Top with remaining pie filling. You can sprinkle with some shaved chocolate for a nice effect. ; name: lemon berry pie ; ingredients: raspberries, frozen lemonade, cool whip topping, sweetened condensed milk, yellow food coloring, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:Set aside 1 cup berries for garnish. In a large bowl and using a rubber spatula, carefully mix lemonade concentrate and whipped topping. Fold in condensed milk, food coloring and remaining berries. Refrigerate covered up to six hours. Fold mixture into crust. Place reserved berries in a decorative manner on top of filling. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: chocolate cherry ice cream pie ; ingredients: magic shell ice cream topping, graham cracker crust, maraschino cherries, vanilla ice cream, peanut butter cups ; preparation:Following package directions, drizzle half of the ice cream topping over the crust. Gently spread to coat bottom and sides. Freeze until firm. Meanwhile, set aside six cherries for garnish. Chop remaining cherries. In a large bowl, combine ice cream and chopped cherries. Spread into prepared crust. Sprinkle with peanut butter cups. Drizzle with remaining ice cream topping. Garnish with reserved cherries. Cover and freeze for 2 hours or until firm. Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving. ; name: toffee bar crunch pie ; ingredients: caramel ice cream topping, milk, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:

name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: orange baked chicken ; ingredients: oranges, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, worcestershire sauce, water, tomato paste, salt & pepper ; preparation:Thinly pare the rind from 1 orange, and cut the rind into thin strips. Grate the rind from the other orange, and squeeze the juice from both. Heat the oil in a frying pan, add the chicken pieces and brown on both sides. Remove from the pan and keep warm. Add the onion to the fat remaining in the pan and gently fry for 5 minutes. Drain off any fat, then add the worcestershire sauce, water, tomato paste, orange rind and juice. Bring to the boil and season lightly with salt and pepper. Line a shallow ovenproof dish or roasting pan with foil, leaving enough on either side to over lap in the middle. Place the chicken on the foil, spoon over the orange sauce, then cover wit h the foil, securing the edges by folding together. Bake at 180 c for 1 hour. To serve, spoon the juices over the chicken. ; name: grilled soy honey glazed chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken breasts, scallion, garlic, honey, dry sherry, fresh ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:Combine scallions, garlic, honey, sherry, ginger and soy sauce. Place chicken in a resealable plastic bag and pour the sauce over the chicken. Close the bag and marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour. Or, refrigerate it overnight. Turn occasionally to keep sauce distributed evenly on the chicken. Remove chicken from bag and pour sauce into a small saucepan. Bring sauce to a boil and let boil for one full minute. Grill chicken over hot coals, turning as needed to prevent charring and to cook evenly. Grill until just done, about 25 minutes. Brush with sauce as needed to keep moist. Serve chicken with remaining sauce and hot cooked rice. ; name: grilled ginger chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, liquid honey, fresh ginger, garlic, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir soy sauce, lime juice, honey, ginger, garlic and tobasco. If you want this as a marinade, make this several hours in advance, pour into a ziploc bag, add chicken and marinate in fridge for several hours shaking often. Alternatively, you can brush both sides of the chicken after making the sauce for a quick meal. Lightly oil grill and then heat bbq to medium. Bbq with lid closed, turning and basting halfway through with remaining marinade. Remember not to baste chicken before taking off grill since raw chicken was in it. Make sure the baste is fully cooked before removing from grill. Grill for 12- 16 minutes until juices run clear. ; name: ginger chicken with peaches and onions ; ingredients: peach, red onions, gingerroot, soy sauce, olive oil, toasted sesame oil, chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Place frozen peaches and onion slices on a large rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with ginger, soy sauce, one tablespoon of olive oil, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes, and toss to coat. Rub chicken breasts with remaining teaspoon of olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Arrange chicken skin-side up among peaches and onions. Roast until chicken is opaque throughout and registers 160 on a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the breast, about 25 to 30 minutes. Serve over rice, couscous, or bulgur. ; name: oriental chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, teriyaki sauce, water, orange marmalade, garlic ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe. ; name: chicken ranchero ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, garlic, green chilies, chicken broth, green chili salsa, cheddar cheese, cooked rice ; preparation:Saute chicken over medium heat, in olive oil about 5 minutes. Add onions and continue cooking until chicken is done and onions are soft. Add garlic, green chiles and broth. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for 30 minutes. Stir in salsa. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Gently fold in cubed cheddar cheese. Serve immediately over beds of rice. ; name: tropical glazed chicken strips ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, pineapple-orange juice concentrate, butter, ground ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: mixed bean and tomato salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook green and yellow beans in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain beans and put in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking, then drain. Combine vinegar, oil, salt and pepper with a whisk in a large bowl. Add beans, onion and tomatoes and toss gently. Cover and refrigerate. Right before serving, add basil and feta cheese and toss. ; name: roasted tomato salad with herbs and feta ; ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil flavored cooking spray, sea salt, red wine vinegar, olive oil, whole grain mustard, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh basil leaf, feta, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Remove tomatoes from oven when cooked and place them on a serving platter and sprinkle with the combined herbs and feta. Drizzle with the dressing and freshly ground black pepper. Serve. ; name: tomato mint and red onion salad ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, red onion, mint, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice tomatoes in half and place in bowl. Add onion and mint to tomatoes and mix. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle the lemon zest on top. Salt and pepper to taste. Let salad marinate for 20 minutes before serving. ; name: roaring fork tomato salad ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, garlic, salt, pepper, fresh basil leaf, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, basil leaves ; preparation:Puree ricotta, garlic, and spices. Mix in minced basil leaves. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Line platter with lettuce leaves. Overlap tomato slices around platter, leaving space in the middle. Spoon ricotta mixture into center of platter. Garnish with whole basil leaves. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: healthy salad ; ingredients: artichokes, cucumbers, cilantro leaf, laughing cow cheese, cherry tomatoes, pita bread, lemon juice, olive oil, ground black pepper, chives ; preparation:1preheat the oven 325 degrees f. Toast the pita cubes for five minutes. Let it cool completely. 2in a salad bowl, combine the baby cucumbers, canned artichokes, cilantro, cherry tomatoes, and cheese and toss. Add the pita cubes, which should not be hot or it will melt some of the cheese and warm the vegetables, which should not happen. 3in a small bowl combine the lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper and chives. Add to the salad and combine well. 4refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: strawberry romaine salad ; ingredients: butter, sugar, sliced almonds, romaine lettuce, fresh strawberries, red onion, mayonnaise, milk, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar ; preparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine lettuce, strawberries, onion and the sugared almonds. Mix dressing ingredients together and toss with salad. Chill for a short time and then serve. ; name: barley corn and cherry tomato salad ; ingredients: barley, salt, white wine vinegar, basil leaves, olive oil, corn kernels, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:

name: crock pot apple and brown sugar corned beef ; ingredients: corned beef brisket, apple juice, brown sugar, prepared mustard, red potatoes, carrots, onion, cabbage ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a large crock pot. Stir to mix. Cook on high for 4 to 5 hours or on low for 8 to 10 hours. Remove meat and vegetables and some of the cooking liquid. Slice meat thinly across the grain. Serve with vegetables and some of the liquid. ; name: crock pot pork chops in homemade bbq sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ketchup, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, liquid smoke ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl except for pork chops. Stir until well mixed. Place pork chops in bottom of crock pot. Pour liquid mix over pork chops. Cook in crock pot on low for 4-6 hours or until meat is cooked and tender. ; name: crock pot chops ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, minced garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, rice ; preparation:Brown pork chops in oil if desired. I never do this step. Place chops in crock pot. Add to crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for 6 hours. Remove the chops carefully as they will fall apart quite easily. Combine cornstarch and cold water. Gradually stir cornstarch into the sauce in crock pot. Put the chops back into the crock pot and cook 20 to 30 minutes longer until sauce thickens. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: crock pot cranberry pork roast and gravy ; ingredients: lean pork loin, salt and black pepper, whole berry cranberry sauce, pineapple juice, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, cinnamon, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:Rub salt and black pepper onto pork loin and place in crock pot. Add all of remaining ingredients except cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles. ; name: texas crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef chuck, salt, black pepper, paprika, garlic clove, oil, beef broth, onion, bottled chili sauce ; preparation:Mix together salt, pepper, paprika and garlic and rub into roast. Cover and chill to marinate. Brown well on both sides in oil, then place in crock pot and add beef broth and onions. Cook 6 to 8 hours on low or until tender. Add chili sauce the last hour of cooking. ; name: tangy barbecue sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, celery, yellow onions, ketchup, fresh lemon juice, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add celery and onion and cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients and whisk together. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: crock pot yummy bbq pork sandwiches ; ingredients: pork shoulder, beef broth, barbecue sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: bourbon mustard brisket crock pot ; ingredients: sweet onions, beef brisket, garlic salt, salt-free lemon pepper, spicy brown mustard, hickory and brown sugar barbecue sauce, bourbon, light brown sugar ; preparation:

name: cinnamon apple oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, water, apple juice, dried apples, ground cinnamon, salt, pure maple syrup, flax seed oil, walnuts ; preparation:Place all the ingreients except the maple syrup, flaxseed oil, and nuts in a medium saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring once or twice. Remove from heat and let sit, covered, for 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in maple syrup and flaxseed oil, if using. Sprinkle one tablespoon nuts over each serving, if desired. ; name: chocolate peanut butter granola ; ingredients: margarine, peanut butter, honey, vanilla, oatmeal, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, banana chips, pecans, heath candy bar ; preparation:Melt together margarine, peanut butter and honey. Add vanilla. Pour over oatmeal and toss to coat. Spread on baking sheet. Bake at 350, for 10-15 minutes, stir frequently as the edges may burn easily. Let cool a few minutes. While oats are still mostly warm, transfer to a bowl and stir in chocolate chips. The warmth of the oats should melt the chips. Cool completely. ; name: incredible granola bars ; ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, brown sugar, sunflower oil, honey, salt, cocoa nibs, dried banana ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly,. Press into an oiled 9 inch square tray,. And bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow to cool before cutting into bars. Will keep for weeks stored in airtight container in fridge. Also freezes well. ; name: choc walnut and oat slice ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, honey, rolled oats, self raising flour, walnuts, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven 180c. Grease and line pan - 20cm x 30 cm. Melt butter, sugar and honey in pot. Stir gently till sugar dissolves. Stir in oats, flour and nuts. Cool mixture. Add choc chips. Press mixture into pan. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: down to earth granola weight watchers ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, sliced almonds, light brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, cooking oil, honey, vanilla, raisins ; preparation:In a bowl, mix oats, almonds, brown sugar, salt and cinnamon.
