In a sauce pan, warm the oil and honey. Whisk or stir in the vanilla. Carefully pour liquid over the oat mixture. Stir gently with wooden spoon, finish mixing by hand. Preheat oven to 300f spread granola in a 15x10x1 pan. Bake 40 minutes, stirring carefully every 10 minutes. Transfer granola-filled pan to a cooling rack. Cool completely. Stir in raisins or dried cranberries. Seal granola in an air-tight container or self sealing plastic bags. Store at room temperature for 1 week or the freezer for 3 months. ; name: oatmeal treats ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, oil, evaporated milk, vanilla, oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in raisins and nuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set. ; name: oatmeal granola cookie balls ; ingredients: rolled oats, whole wheat flour, almond meal, salt, pure maple syrup, peanut butter, pure vanilla extract, unsweetened flaked coconut ; preparation:Mix wet ingredients. Mix dry ingredients. Combine until well incorporated. Use a cookie scoop to form dough into balls. Arrange on cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 9 minutes. ; name: cinnamon walnut granola ; ingredients: rolled oats, walnuts, golden raisin, ground flax seed, brown sugar, olive oil, honey, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:

name: coconut chocolate bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces. ; name: african banana coconut bake ; ingredients: bananas, margarine, orange juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, shredded coconut ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Cut bananas crosswise into halves. Cut each half lengthwise into halves and arrange in greased 9-inch pie plate. Dot with margarine or butter and drizzle with orange and lemon juices. Sprinkle with brown sugar and coconut. Bake until coconut is golden, 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: coconut protein bars ; ingredients: sweetened flaked coconut, quick oats, whey protein powder, skim milk, fat-free sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Spread half of mixture evenly in bottom of pan. Add layer of coconut. Spread 2nd half of mixture over coconut layer. Place in fridge overnight and cut into 8 individual squares. ; name: layered coconut bars ; ingredients: margarine, vanilla wafer crumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Combine butter and crumbs in an 8-inch square baking dish. Press down to form a crust. Sprinkle with chocolate chips, nuts and coconut. Pour milk over all. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes. ; name: vanilla coconut bars ; ingredients: french vanilla cake mix, butter, water, vanilla, egg, coconut, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Stir in coconut. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: lemon coconut bars ; ingredients: flour, powdered sugar, margarine, eggs, sugar, baking powder, lemon juice concentrate, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: peach and raspberry jam ; ingredients: frozen raspberries, peaches, lemon juice, sugar, liquid fruit pectin ; preparation:Thaw berries according to package directions. Peel, pit and crush peaches. Measure thawed berries and add enough crushed peaches to make 4 cups fruit. Place in kettle, add lemon juice and sugar, mixing throughly. Bring to a full rolling boil over high heat and let boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, add pectin, stirring vigorously. Stir and skim alternately for about 5 minutes. Ladle quickly into hot sterilized jars. Seal 5 minutes in boiling water bath using 2 piece lids. ; name: fruit n honey jam ; ingredients: strawberries, peach, blueberries, cherries, dry pectin, honey, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine strawberries, peaches, blueberries, cherries and pectin in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a full rolling boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Cook for one minute. Add the honey and lemon juice. Return to a rolling boil and cook for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and skin off the foam. Ladle into sterilized jars, seal and process in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: bananaberry bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, buttermilk, flour, baking soda, salt, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: peach jam ; ingredients: peaches, bottled lemon juice, sugar, nutmeg ; preparation:Prepare peaches by peeling, pitting, and cutting into quarters. Chop in a food processor or cut into small pieces. Put the peaches, lemon juice, sugar, and nutmeg in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring to dissolve all the sugar. Boil rapidly and stir constantly until the jam is thick or has reached the jell point on a thermometer. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Skim off any foam. Ladle into hot jars. Clean the rims, seal, and process in hot water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: cranberry spread jam ; ingredients: cranberries, water, cinnamon, sugar, pectin ; preparation:Put cranberries into a colander, rinse with cold water. Throw away any berries that are dried out or mushy. Bring water to a boil and put cranberries into boiling water. Cook over medium heat until the berries pop. Ladle cranberries into food mill and sieve. Pour prepared fruit back into pot, add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual. ; name: banana pineapple jam ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple with juice, sugar, liquid pectin ; preparation:Peel and mash the bananas, then add the pineapple to the bananas. Add the sugar to the fruit mixture and pour it into a large enameled pot. Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring continuously. Boil mixture for 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in pectin, and stir for 5 minutes. Skim and seal in hot sterilized canning jars. May be water bath processed for 10 minutes, if preferred. ; name: pineapple bread bread machine ; ingredients: pineapple juice, water, egg, butter, sugar, salt, bread flour, active dry yeast, candied pineapple ; preparation:In bread machine pan, place the first eight ingredients in order suggested by manufacturer. Select basic bread setting. Choose crust color and loaf size if available. Bake according to bread machine directions. Just before final kneading, add the pineapple if desired. ; name: blueberry lime jam bread machine ; ingredients: fresh blueberries, sugar, dry pectin, fresh lime juice, lime zest ; preparation:

name: christmas strawberries ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, vanilla extract, decorator sugar, slivered almonds ; preparation:Blend together the gelatin and condensed milk. Add coconut and vanilla. Mix well and refrigerate until chilled. Roll into small balls and shape into strawberries. Roll in red sugar crystals. Dip fat end into green sugar crystals. Place an almond sliver into the fat end for a stem. To prevent hardening, store in an air tight container until ready to serve. ; name: strawberry and orange fool ; ingredients: strawberries, whipping cream, plain yogurt, sugar, fresh orange juice, orange zest, cointreau liqueur, strawberry ; preparation:Place chopped strawberries in medium bowl. Mash coarsely with fork. Place in colander and let drain 15 minutes. Beat cream in large bowl to form stiff peaks. Gently fold in yogurt, sugar, orange juice and peel. Fold in cointreau, if desired. Gently fold in strawberries. Divide among 4 wineglasses or coupes. Cover and chill. This can be made 4 hours ahead. Garnish fools with additional halved strawberries and serve. ; name: strawberry cheese parfaits ; ingredients: cottage cheese, egg white, whipping cream, salt, vanilla, sugar, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Beat egg white until soft peaks are formed. Blend with cottage cheese, whipped cream, salt, vanilla, and sugar. In parfait gasses, alternate spoonfuls of cheese mixture with strawberries. Freeze. Remove from freezer 20 minutes before serving. ; name: frozen strawberry delight ; ingredients: strawberries, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, crushed pineapple, lemon juice ; preparation:Puree strawberries in container of an electric blender. Set aside. Combine condensed milk and cool whip. Stir until well blended. Stir in strawberry puree, pineapple, and lemon juice. Spoon mixture into a 13x9 inch pan. Freeze until firm. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes before serving. ; name: strawberry spread ; ingredients: cream cheese, strawberry jam, orange peel, pecans ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, jam, and orange peel. Stir in pecans. Cover and chill until firm. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator. Serve with toast or muffins. ; name: festival berry parfaits ; ingredients: strawberries, blackberry, raspberries, sugar, mascarpone cheese, heavy whipping cream, vanilla, powdered sugar, of fresh mint, berries ; preparation:Place all the berries in a large bowl and sprinkle with the sugar. Stir to combine and leave to macerate for about 30 minutes. Using a mixer, beat the mascarpone, heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar and vanilla extract just until soft peaks form. Take four wine or parfait glasses and layer the berries with the cream. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and a few fresh berries. The parfait can be made about an hour or two before serving. Cover and store in the refrigerator. ; name: strawberry cream cheese sandwich cookies ; ingredients: cream cheese, strawberry preserves, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, vanilla wafers ; preparation:In a medium bowl, smash cream cheese with a fork. Combine the rest of the ingredients together with the cream cheese. Mix well. Let chill in the refridgerator for at least 30 minutes. On the flat side of the wafer, spread 2 tsp of mixture. Then top with another wafer to make a sandwich. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: stuffed strawberries ; ingredients: strawberries, cream cheese, walnuts, splenda sugar substitute, orange extract ; preparation:

name: beef cabbage casserole ; ingredients: head of cabbage, lean ground beef, onion, tomato soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown beef with onion. Boil cabbage 3 min, than drain. Alternate layers of beef and onion with cabbage in 2 qt casserole or crock pot. Pour soup, undiluted, over top. Bake uncovered 30 min at 350 f, or 6-8 hrs on low in crock pot. ; name: asian beef and cabbage salad ; ingredients: ground beef, plum sauce, napa cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, rice vinegar, canola oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef. Stir in plum sauce. Toss together cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, vinegar, and oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with the beef. ; name: creole ; ingredients: kielbasa, oil, onion, red bell pepper, spanish rice mix, salsa, water, pepper ; preparation:Saute onion, bell pepper and sausage in oil in a large skillet. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring well. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed, and rice is tneder, about 10-12 minutes. Remove from heat, and let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: bloody mary style cabbage jambalaya ; ingredients: ground beef, coleslaw mix, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, rice, bloody mary mix ; preparation:Brown ground meat. When almost done browning, add bell peppers and onions. Brown until bell pepper is limp. Add bag of cole slaw mix and mix completely. Add enough bloody mary mix to cover entire mixture until it is about an inch above. Add uncooked rice and mix thoroughly. Stir occasionally until rice is fluffy and cooked. ; name: cabbage curry ; ingredients: cabbage, green chilies, onion, garlic cloves, canola oil, salt, chili powder, turmeric, canned tuna ; preparation:In a medium sized pan, pour the oil and heat under high heat. After 1 minute, add the onions, garlic, and salt. Fry until onion and garlic are slightly turning gold. Add the chillies and continue frying. Keep stirring the whole time to avoid burning on the bottom of pan. When the onions and garlic look golden, but not browned, add chilli powder, turmeric and tuna. Stir the ingredients well for about 1 minute or so. Lower the heat to the lowest it can go. Now add the cabbage to the rest of the ingredients in the pot and gently stir around until the cabbage is fully coated with the rest of the ingredients. Place a lid on the pot and let it cook for about 30 minutes taste and see if the cabbage is cooked after 30 minutes. If not, leave it for another 5 min or so until you think its cooked. Goes well with rice or naan, or just as a side dish. ; name: creamy coleslaw with bell peppers red onion ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, carrots, bell peppers, red onion, celery seeds, mayonnaise, rice wine vinegar, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, toss together all vegetables and celery seed. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Toss together the vegetables and dressing until thoroughly combined. Taste and correct seasoning. Refrigerate 30 minutes to let flavors blend. Serve. ; name: creole cabbage ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, butter, tomatoes, rotel tomatoes, tomato sauce, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chipotle lime wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion powder, italian seasoning, lime juice, hot sauce, garlic powder, seasoning salt, honey ; preparation:Remove any excess skin and fat from the wings. Bake 25 minutes, or until fully cooked, at 350 on a rack to allow grease to drip off. Cool completely. Mix all other ingredients. Coat wings or toss in sauce and marinade at least 2 hours. Bake 15 minutes at 350 on a rack. Serve as they are, out of the oven or coat them again in sauce. ; name: grilled steaks or chops with chipotle butter ; ingredients: butter, chipotle chile in adobo, adobo sauce, boneless beef top loin steaks, black and red pepper blend, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. In a small dish, combine the butter, chipotle and adobo sauce until well blended. Wash steaks, dry and sprinkle both sides of meat with the pepper blend and seasoned salt. Gently rub into meat. Place on grill and cook 8 to 10 minutes or until desired degree of doneness, turning once. Top each steak with chipotle butter and serve. ; name: chipotle pork with strawberry avocado salsa ; ingredients: chipotle chiles, lime juice, onion, garlic cloves, pork tenderloin, salt, fresh strawberries, avocado, scallions, fresh cilantro ; preparation:For pork, combine all but the salt in a large plastic zipper bag. Marinate in refrigerator, turning the bag occasionally, for 2 hours. Remove pork and discard marinade. Sprinkle pork evenly with salt. Grill pork over indirect heat for about 20 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 155. Let stand 10 minutes. Slice crosswise. For salsa, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl and toss gently. Serve immediately with the sliced pork. ; name: shrimp with creamy orange chipotle sauce ; ingredients: half-and-half, chipotle chile, orange rind, large shrimp, cumin, salt, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Place first three ingredients in a blender and puree until smoot. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray and add shrimp. Toss shrimp to coat with spray and sprinkle with the cumin and salt. Saute shrimp 4 minutes or until done, stirring frequently. Transfer to a serving platter. Reduce heat to medium and add half and half mixture to pan. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Pour sauce over shrimp and sprinkle with cilantro. ; name: cod vera cruz ; ingredients: cod fish fillet, condensed tomato soup, condensed chicken broth, salsa, lime juice, fresh cilantro, dried oregano, garlic powder, cooked rice ; preparation:Place fish in a 2-qt shallow baking dish. Mix, soup, broth, salsa, lime juice, cilantro, oregano and garlic powder. Pour over fish. Bake at 400 for 20 minute or until fish flakes easily. Serve over rice. ; name: lemon marinade and sauce for poultry ; ingredients: brown sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, water, soy sauce, green onion, garlic salt, garlic, margarine, lemon pepper ; preparation:Mix the cornstarch and brown sugar in a small saucepan. Stir in the remaining ingredients except the onions. Blend well and heat to boiling. Add the onions and immediately turn heat down. Stir constantly until sauce is thickened and bubbling. Use this sauce to baste poultry during last few minutes of grilling. You can also use this sauce as a marinade. Put sauce in a heavy plastic bag along with 2 to 3 pounds of chicken pieces and marinate for from 2 hours to overnight, turning bag to coat all sides of meat. Use the leftover sauce to brush on chicken while grilling. This recipe doubles nicely. ; name: cubano marinade ; ingredients: white onion, garlic cloves, orange juice, lime juice, lemon juice, water, dried oregano, cumin seed, salt ; preparation:Put onion, garlic, orange juice, lime juice, lemon juice and water in a blender. Set blender on liquify setting and process until smooth. Add remaining ingredients to blender. Process for one minute more. Marinate meat for at least one hour in mixture. It is better to marinate meats overnight. Marinate fish for no longer than 20 minutes, or it will toughen. Brush meat frequently with the sauce while cooking. ; name: ancho chile marinade for meat ala chipotle ; ingredients: dried ancho chiles, black pepper, cumin powder, fresh oregano, garlic cloves, red onion, vegetable oil, chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: healthy salad ; ingredients: artichokes, cucumbers, cilantro leaf, laughing cow cheese, cherry tomatoes, pita bread, lemon juice, olive oil, ground black pepper, chives ; preparation:1preheat the oven 325 degrees f. Toast the pita cubes for five minutes. Let it cool completely. 2in a salad bowl, combine the baby cucumbers, canned artichokes, cilantro, cherry tomatoes, and cheese and toss. Add the pita cubes, which should not be hot or it will melt some of the cheese and warm the vegetables, which should not happen. 3in a small bowl combine the lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper and chives. Add to the salad and combine well. 4refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: cucumber tomato salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, italian salad dressing, vinegar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the cucumber, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve. ; name: baby potato salad ; ingredients: baby potatoes, peas, eggs, basil, pine nuts, parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemon juice, black pepper ; preparation:Steam or boil the ptoatoes until just cooked and keep warm. Boil the eggs for about 5 minutes and chill under running water, peel the eggs. Blanch the peas in boiling water, and cool. Put the herbs, pine nuts, parmesan, oil, garlic, lemon juice into a food processor and whiz to a coarse paste. Cut the potatoes into chunks add the peas, dress with the herb dressing, add a dash of seasoning and serve warm. ; name: fast and easy bean and corn salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomatoes, green onions, cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, salsa ; preparation:In a large serving bowl put the lettuce, canned corn, canned beans, tomato, green onion and cheese. Lightly toss. Right before serving mix together the ranch dressing and salsa and pour over the salad. Mix well. Serve at once. You may top the salad with roasted chicken pieces that you have diced, but that is optional. ; name: prize winning potato salad ; ingredients: potato, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, carrot, celery, radishes, miracle whip, prepared horseradish, pepper, frozen green pea ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain potatoes and cut cup but not too small. Cook, peel and cut up hard boiled eggs. Chop green onions, shred carrot, and finely chop celery and radishes. Add to potatoes and eggs. Add enough miracle whip to moisten. Add horseradish and pepper. Lastly, add still frozen green peas just 5 to 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: 7 30 salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce hearts, baby spinach, hearts of palm, cucumber, carrot, tomatoes, red onion, frozen green pea, capers ; preparation:

name: pumpkin and carrot soup ; ingredients: pumpkin, carrots, onions, garlic clove, water ; preparation:Fill a pot with water and place on high heat. Once water is boiling, reduce heat and add all of the chopped vegetables. Cook vegetables until tender. Using a slotted spoon, move cooked vegetables from pot into a blender with 20ml of the cooking liquid. Blend the vegetables and continue to add water until the soup reaches the desired consistency. Serve with salt, pepper, nutmeg and a dollop of creme fraiche. ; name: curried carrot potato soup ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, white onions, red onions, garlic clove, oil, vegetable broth, curry powder, caraway seed, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel and chop carrots and potatoes into small chunks. Slice the onions, mince the garlic. Heat the oil in a large heavy pot. Add the garlic, the curry powder, caraway seeds and the onions and saute for some minutes until lightly browned. Add the potatoes and carrots and saute on medium heat for another 10 minutes. Add the broth, cover and let simmer for about 35-40 minutes or until all veggies are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Puree soup using a hand held blender until it has the desired consistency-i like it to be still chunky. Serve with some warm bread of your choice. ; name: healthy pumpkin soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, pumpkin flesh, carrot, fresh rosemary, chicken stock, bay leaves, skim milk powder ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock. ; name: spicy carrot peanut soup ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, carrots, celery, salt, chili paste, water, peanut butter, soy sauce, fresh lime juice ; preparation:In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onions, carrots, celery, salt, and chili paste. Stirring frequently, saute the vegetables over high heat for 5 minutes. Add in the water, cover the pot, and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until the carrots are soft. Add in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice. Stir to combine. Puree the soup in batches using an electric blender. Reheat soup if necessary and serve hot. ; name: sweet potato chili soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, red chile, sweet potatoes, carrots, vegetable stock ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onions and garlic until soft and golden. Stir in the chilies, sweet potatoes and carrots. Add stock. Cover and bring to a boil. Simmer for 20 minutes or until all veggies are tender. Puree the soup, in batches if necessary, then return to the pan. Season and if necessary, add a bit of water to adjust the consistency. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: carrot onion and celery soup by me ; ingredients: baby carrots, sweet onion, celery, butter, dried tarragon, vegetable broth, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Slice the carrots fine, mince the onion, slice the celery thin. In a big pot saute the onion in butter until softened. Stir in the carrot, celery and tarragon. Add broth and wine. Bring to a boil. Simmer until done. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: hot or cold carrot soup ; ingredients: onion, extra virgin olive oil, fresh ginger, baby carrots, chicken broth, honey, salt ; preparation:

name: yellow summer squash bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla, yellow squash ; preparation:Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a medium bowl. Combine the eggs, sugar, oil and vanilla in a separate large bowl. Beat well. Stir in the shredded yellow summer squash. Add the dry ingredients to the squash mixture. Stir until moistened. Pour or spoon into a greased and floured loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees f for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for about 10 to 15 minutes and remove from pan. ; name: yellow squash with peanuts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, yellow squash, roasted peanuts, salt, brown sugar ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet and cook squash until it becomes tender. Stirring often. Add peanuts, salt and sugar. Reduce heat to low and simmer until the flavors have mingled, about 5 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: the black eyed peas baked squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, whole wheat rolls, butter, sugar, salt, pepper, onion ; preparation:Cut squash and onion in pieces, boil together, then reduce heat until tender. Drain & mash squash some. Combine squash, onion, eggs, bread bits, butter, sugar, salt. Put into a 3 quart dish that has been oiled. Bake at 350 until lightly browned. Sometimes i toss in some velveeta - when the kids were small they liked it with the cheese. ; name: healthy butternut squash muffins ; ingredients: butternut squash, wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, brown sugar, salt, pumpkin pie spice, milk, egg, applesauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly grease a 12 cup muffin pan. In a medium saucepan with enough water to cover, boil squash 20 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and puree in a food processor. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pumpkin pie spice. In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg and applesauce. Stir in squash. Fold the squash mixture into the flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into the greased muffin pan, filling cups about full. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: pineapple stuffed acorn squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, cinnamon, canned crushed pineapple, ground nutmeg, allspice, ground ginger ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, pineapple, nutmeg, allspice, and ginger. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly. ; name: butternut squash with garlic and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, butternut squash, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: pumpkin butter no cook ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, canned pumpkin, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Beat butter at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy. Gradually add sugar, beating well. Add pumpkin, cinnamon and nutmeg. Mix well. Cover and chill at least 3 hours. Let butter stand at room temperature to soften before serving. ; name: baked brown sugar squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, butter, brown sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: open faced stroganoff sandwich ; ingredients: french bread, lean ground beef, onions, medium sharp cheddar, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, salt & pepper, tomatoes, green bell pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Slice the bread in half lengthwise, then lightly butter the bread and wrap in foil. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Brown the ground beef and drain the excess fat. Add the onion, and cook until the onion is transparent. Remove from the heat and add the sour cream, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Remove the bread from the oven and spread the meat mixture on each half. Arrange the chopped tomatoes and chopped bell pepper on top of the meat mixture and top with the grated cheese. Place back in the oven and bake only until the cheese is melted. Serve hot. ; name: miracle hamburger stroganoff ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, mushrooms, garlic cloves, mushroom soup, water, miracle whip, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef. Add onions and cook until the onions are clear. Add mushrooms, continue cooking. After the mushrooms are warm add the minced garlic and continue cooking on low. Add soup and water, mix and simmer for about 10 minutes. Add miracle whip and salt and pepper to taste. Serve over noodles. ; name: hamburger stoganoff ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, ground beef, flour, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushroom ; preparation:Saute onion and garlic in butter over medium heat. Stir in meat and brown. Add mushrooms, flour, salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes. Stir in soup. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Add sour cream, mix well and heat through. Serve over mashed potatoes, pasta or rice. ; name: potatoes stroganoff ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic powder, betty crocker au gratin potatoes, hot water, milk, green giant mushroom pieces and stems, sour cream ; preparation:Cook beef and garlic powder in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until beef is brown. Drain. Stir in potatoes, sauce mix, hot water and milk. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are tender. Stir in mushrooms and sour cream. Heat just until hot. High altitude no changes. ; name: peppery beef tenderloin ; ingredients: oregano, paprika, thyme, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, basil, cracked black pepper, cayenne pepper, beef tenderloin ; preparation:Mix all the spices together well. Rub into the tenderloin. Place on rack in a roasting pan. Bake at 400 for 45 minutes----rare. 60 minutes---medium rare. 65 minutes---medium. 73 minutes---well done. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: easy southwestern stroganoff ; ingredients: ground beef, water, thick & chunky salsa, pasta, salt, nonfat sour cream ; preparation:Cook beef in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until brown, drain. Stir in water, salsa, salt and pasta. Heat to boiling, reduce heat. Cover and simmer about 15 min., stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender. Stir in sour cream, cook until just hot. ; name: lickety split beef stroganoff ; ingredients: chuck eye steak, yellow onion, canola oil, mushroom, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Trim steak of excess fat. Slice into thin strips. Slice onion into thin rings. Brown steak strips and onion in oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add mushrooms and mushroom soup. Stir, lower heat to medium and cover. Simmer for ten minutes. Add sour cream, stir. Serve over rice, small egg noodles or toast. ; name: beef stroganov with mustard ; ingredients: filet of beef, salt & pepper, flour, butter, beef stock, tomatoes, prepared mustard, onion, white mushrooms, sour cream ; preparation:

name: chicken in thyme cream sauce ; ingredients: chicken breast fillets, plain flour, olive oil, fresh thyme, dry sherry, cream ; preparation:Toss the fillets in the flour, and shake off any excess. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, and cook the fillets for 5 minutes on each side or until they are golden brown. Sprinkle on the thyme and turn the fillets over. Add the sherry and half the cream and boil for 2-3 minutes. Turn the fillets again and pour over the remaining cream. Season to taste and serve. I like this with a jacket potato and a green vegetable. Also a nice young riesling. ; name: creamed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, cream of chicken soup, water, salt, black pepper, sour cream, english muffins, cayenne pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika. ; name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: maine gold chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, salt and pepper, olive oil, lemon juice, real maple syrup ; preparation:Cut the chicken into bite size pieces. Season with salt and pepper. Heat the olive oil and saute the chicken pieces until lightly browned. Turn the heat off under the pan. Add all the lemon juice, dredging the chicken in the juice for at least two minutes. Drain the juice from the chicken. Add and stir in all the maple syrup. Turn the heat back on to medium high, stirring continuously as syrup begins to bubble and caramelize over the chicken. This takes about 4 minutes. Serve with white rice and steamed carrots. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: bacon mushroom chicken ; ingredients: butter, chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, garlic clove, bacon, mushroom, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: make ahead swiss chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, reduced-fat cream of chicken soup, light sour cream, white wine, garlic powder, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, crouton ; preparation:Grease a 9x13 disposable foil pan with non-stick cooking spray. Place chicken pieces in dish. Sprinkle with swiss cheese. Mix together remaining ingredients and spread over cheese. Cover dish with foil. Place croutons in a ziploc bag and crush with a rolling pin. Tape bag of crushed croutons to dish. Freeze. When ready to bake, thaw in refrigerator overnight. Uncover dish and sprinkle with croutons. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until bubbly. Cover with foil mid-way through cooking if croutons start getting too brown. ; name: chicken divine ; ingredients: canadian bacon, chicken breast fillets, butter, flour, salt, white pepper, milk, cream, oregano, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: awesome rice pilaf ; ingredients: long-grain rice, butter, onion, celery, broth, dried parsley, frozen peas, carrot, soy sauce, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in dutch oven. Add rice, onion, and celery. Cook on medium heat till rice is light brown with a nutty aroma stirring often. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Add rest of ingredients, almost over season to taste. Bring to boil on medium heat. Turn off heat. Cover tightly with foil then put lid on top. Bake for 45 minutes then remove from oven and let rest for 15 minutes. Take lid and foil off, fluff with fork and serve. ; name: lemon cilantro rice pilaf ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, water, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, ground turmeric, salt, green onion, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated lemon rind, lemon juice, turmeric and salt. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in green onions and cilantro. ; name: curry chicken and tomato pilaf ; ingredients: olive oil flavored cooking spray, chicken breasts, onion, curry paste, basmati rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, almonds, tomatoes, fresh coriander, skim natural yoghurt ; preparation:Heat a saucepan over med high heat. Spray with olive oil. Cook chicken for 3-4 min each side. Transfer to plate. Add onion to pan. Cook stirring for 5 minute add curry paste and cook stiiring for 1 minute add rice and stir to coat. Add chicken and stock and bring to boil. Reduce heat to low, and cook covered for 12 min or until liq has absorbed. Set aside, covered for 10 minute. Top pilaf with almonds, tomato and coriander. Serve with youghurt. ; name: shrimp rice pilaf ; ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, shrimp, long-grain rice, chicken stock, fresh dill, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: yummy rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, orzo pasta, scallions, long grain rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in medium sauce pan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: greek lemon pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, long grain rice, orzo pasta, chicken broth, lemon juice, parsley ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. Add rice and orzo and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add chicken broth and lemon juice and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Fluff pilaf up with fork and stir in chopped parsley. ; name: parmesan rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, white rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, sliced almonds ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium sauce pan on medium heat. Add rice, cook and stir three minutes. Stir in chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes or until rice in tender. Stir in parmesan cheese and sliced almonds. ; name: orange pilaf ; ingredients: butter, celery, green onion, long-grain rice, orange juice, salt, orange, slivered almonds ; preparation:

name: slow cooker chicken taco stew ; ingredients: onion, black beans, kidney beans, corn, tomato sauce, tomatoes and green chilies, taco seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Mix everything together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 3-4 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir together. Top with cheese, sour cream, or tortilla chips, if desired. ; name: stewed chicken taco meat ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, low-sodium taco seasoning, garlic clove, ro-tel tomatoes, colby-monterey jack cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Put all ingredients except cheese in crockpot and cook on low for 6 hours. Use two forks to shred the chicken into chunks. Add cheese and stir. Serve immediately in tacos or use as a filling for enchiladas. You can also use chicken breasts, but it turns out drier and not as tasty. ; name: chicken taco soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, diced tomatoes with green chilies, diced tomatoes, diced green chilies, kidney beans, black beans, whole kernel corn, taco seasoning mix, ranch dressing mix, sour cream ; preparation:Shred the chicken, if desired. Do not drain the remaining cans. Combine all the ingredients into a crock-pot and stir. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Garnish as desired. ; name: crock pot taco soup ; ingredients: cooked ground beef, v8 vegetable juice, onion powder, whole kernel corn, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef until no longer pink. Place all ingredients except cheese in crock pot and stir. Cook on low 4 hours or until heated through. If eating immediately, pour in bowls and top with cheddar cheese. If freezing, let cool and place in freezer container. When ready to eat, pull and let thaw in fridge. Microwave on high 2 minutes or until heated through. Top with cheddar cheese. Also you can make this on the stove top. Combine all ingredients except cheese and let simmer for an hour. Top with cheddar cheese and serve. ; name: doritos taco dip ; ingredients: hamburger, taco seasoning, taco sauce, catalina dressing, mexican cheese, doritos, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, tortilla chips ; preparation:Brown hamburg. Add taco seasoning according to package. Chill for 2 hours. Add taco sauce, catalina dressing, cheese and bag of crushed doritos. Mix well. Add lettuce and tomatoes. Mix together. Serve cold with your favorite tortilla chips. ; name: healthy soft chicken tacos ; ingredients: chili powder, salt, ground cumin, fresh ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, cooking spray, white corn tortillas, green cabbage, monterey jack cheese, low-fat sour cream ; preparation:Prepare grill. Combine first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. Rub spice mixture over chicken. Place chicken on grill rack coated with cooking spray. Grill 10 minutes on each side or until done. Let stand 5 minutes. Chop. Heat tortillas according to package directions. Divide chicken evenly among tortillas. Top each tortilla with 2 tablespoons cabbage and 1 teaspoon cheese. Serve with sour cream, if desired. ; name: mexican casserole dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, cooked long-grain rice, tomato soup, green chilies, taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, corn chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. ; name: quick easy taco burger casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, water, sweet corn, condensed tomato soup, cheddar cheese, macaroni noodles, green pepper, black olives ; preparation:

name: butterscotch pound cake ; ingredients: butterscotch chips, instant coffee, water, butter, sugar, self-rising flour, buttermilk, eggs ; preparation:Melt together in top of a double boiler the morsels, instant coffee, and water. Cream together butter and sugar. Blend into the butterscotch mixture. Add flour alternately with the buttermilk to the creamed mixture. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Turn into a well-greased and floured bundt pan or a tube pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 55-60 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: low fat citrus pound cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, mandarin orange sections, egg substitute, powdered sugar ; preparation:Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. ; name: chocolate cream pound cake ; ingredients: whipping cream, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 175 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil. ; name: queen cakes ; ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, butter, egg, vanilla essence, raisins, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c grease a patty tin or use paper cups. Sift flour and baking powder. Cream fat and sugar until mixture is light and creamy. Add in vanilla essence. Beat egg and add it gradually to the mixture, beating well after each addition. Fold in the sifted flour with a metal spoon. Add a little milk if necessary to give it a soft dropping consistency. Mix in the raisins. Fill greased patty tin or paper cups half full with the mixture. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: butter cake 1957 ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, white sugar, egg yolks, vanilla, salt, baking powder, cake flour, half-and-half cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and line two 8 inch cake pans. Beat butter and oil, combining well. Add sugar and vanilla. Beat until fluffy. Add egg yolks two at a time, beating after each addition well. Add dry ingredients and cream alternating, and ending with flour. Bake in preheated oven 350 degrees, for 30 minutes, until tester comes aways clean. ; name: norwegian gold cake ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Place butter and flour in a mixing bowl. Mix 5 minutes at low speed. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift together sugar, baking powder and salt. Add gradually to creamed mixture. Add vanilla and mix additionaly 2 minutes. Turn into greased and floured 10 inch tube or bundt pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: butterscotch cake with marshmallows ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, brown sugar, water, vanilla, eggs, milk, marshmallows ; preparation:Sift the flour. Measure and sift again with the baking powder and salt. Mix the shortening, sugar, and water and cook over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Cool and add vanilla. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Alternately add dry ingredients with the milk. Beat until smooth, being careful not to overheat. Pour into 9 inch cake pan lined with paper. Place marshmallows at intervals on top of the batter. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes. ; name: mile high all butter pound cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, lemon juice, salt, butter, eggs ; preparation:

name: sauted mushrooms with garlic and lemon juice ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, olive oil, butter, garlic paste, mushrooms ; preparation:Stir together lemon juice, soy sauce, and sugar. Set aside. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat butter, olive oil, and garlic over medium-high heat until butter melts. Add mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed. ; name: mushroom barley casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, water, barley, onion and mushroom soup mix, dried thyme, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: glazed rosemary honey mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, rosemary, garlic clove, honey, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, button mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat onven to 325 degrees. In a heavy bottom pan place oil through salt and pepper heat and whisk to blend and melt honey. Add mushrooms and toss to coat. Bake for 30-40 minutes stirring a couple times. Serve with a sprig of rosemary. ; name: mushroom brochettes ; ingredients: mushrooms, salt, white pepper, thyme, rosemary, summer savory ; preparation:Clean the mushrooms well. You can scuff up the skin a little, so that the mushroom juices combine with the herbs. Mix the herbs together and crush them with a mortar and pestle, or just crush them together. Put 6 mushrooms on each of 4 bamboo skewers. Salt and pepper them, and sprinkle the herb mix over them. Put them under a hot grill and turn them frequently. Sprinkle more herbs and salt and pepper once or twice. The mushrooms should be hot, and cooked but still crisp when they are done. ; name: carrots and mushrooms saute ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, garlic clove, fresh mushrooms, sugar, dried thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Place carrots in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: italian mushrooms in vinegar funghi al salamoia ; ingredients: button mushroom, spices, garlic clove, wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:Wipe mushrooms well with damp cloth. Heat vinegar until lukewarm. Put mushrooms in a sterilized glass jar. Add spices, garlic, warm vinegar, & salt & stir thoroughly. Cover jar tightly. Set aside in dry place for 2 days. ; name: wild mushroom and bean salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, green beans, bacon, white wine vinegar, mustard, parsley ; preparation:Boil the beans until tender and drain when done. Cut the bacon into small cubes and fry in a shallow pan until golden. Add the vinegar and let it bubble for a few seconds. Season with salt, pepper, the mustard and parsley. Mix the beans and mushrooms together and serve. ; name: marinated mushrooms with shallots and thyme ; ingredients: button mushroom, shallots, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, dried thyme ; preparation:

name: linguine with fresh tomatoes olives and feta cheese ; ingredients: linguine, tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, black olives, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine tomato, basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in mixing bowl. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Top with tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese and olives. Serve. ; name: linguine with green onions ; ingredients: linguine, green onion, butter, dark sesame oil, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook linguine just until done. Trim green onions and cut lengthwise into long thin threads, including green tops. While noodles are cooking, heat butter and sesame oil in a large skillet. Stir in green onions. Cook for 1 minute or until onions are wilted. Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder. Add drained pasta, toss well and serve. ; name: lemon linguini with shrimp ; ingredients: linguine, olive oil, lemons, juice of, green onion, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese, asparagus, shrimp ; preparation:Cook linguini according to diretions. Combine next 4 ingredients in large serving bowl. Add pasta and toss well. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss in parmesan cheese. Add asparagus and shrimp. ; name: shrimp and shallot linguini from trader s joes ; ingredients: shrimp, shallots, butter, olive oil, garlic, black pepper, lemon juice, fresh parsley, linguine ; preparation:Mix melted butter, olive oil, shallots, garlic, pepper, parsley and lemon juice in a bowl. Toss shrimp into mixture. Heat skillet on medium. Pour shrimp mixture into skillet and saute until shrimp turn pink in color. Serve over linguini noodles. ; name: buttered linguine with parmesan ; ingredients: linguine, butter, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta in boiling water to the desired degree of doneness. Drain, but do not rinse. Return to the pot. Toss in the remaining ingredients and warm over low heat until the butter and cheese melts. Serve immediately as a side dish or entre. ; name: linguine with clams bacon and tomato ; ingredients: bacon, garlic cloves, dry white wine, crushed tomatoes, bottled clam juice, clam, flat leaf parsley, salt, dried red pepper flakes, linguine ; preparation:In large frying pan, cook the bacon over moderate heat until almost crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and pour off all but 2 tbs fat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds. Add wine. Stir in bacon, tomatoes and clam juice and heat to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes. Add the clams, parsley, salt and red-pepper flakes and cook for one minute longer. In the meantime, boil the linguine until just done, about 12 minutes. Drain the linguine well and add to the sauce. Allow the linguine to sit for 2 to 3 minutes to absorb some of the liquid. ; name: lemon pasta ; ingredients: linguine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta and drain. While the pasta is cooking, in a large skillet, saute parsley, lemon peel and garlic in oil till garlic is tender. Add the drained pasta to the skillet. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Top with parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic tuna linguine ; ingredients: linguine, garlic cloves, olive oil, tuna, chicken broth, parsley, cayenne pepper ; preparation:

name: oriental cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, chili, rice vinegar, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: strawberry cucumber and basil salad ; ingredients: strawberries, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, lemon juice, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and seed cucumbers. Halve lengthwise, and slice thin. Combine strawberries, basil, vinegar, and sugar. Toss to coat and chill for 1 hour. Combine cucumbers and lemon juice. Toss to coat. After chilling, add cucumber mixture, salt, and pepper to strawberry mixture. Gently toss to combine, and serve immediately. ; name: oriental marinated cucumber salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, ground ginger, english cucumber, green onions ; preparation:Combine vinegar, soy sauce, sugar and ginger. Thinly slice cucumber and combine with green onions in a separate bowl. Pour dressing on top. Mix well. Chill. ; name: cucumber carrot salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, seasoning salt, carrot, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Combine cucumbers and salt in large mixing bowl. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. Rinse salt off of cucumbers and return to bowl. Add carrot. In a small bowl mix together remaining ingredients. Pour over cucumber mixture and toss well to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours. ; name: sweet sour watermelon cucumber salad ; ingredients: cider vinegar, water, sugar, poppy seed, green onion, seedless watermelon, english cucumbers, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix together the vinegar, water, sugar and poppy seeds in a bowl and season with salt and pepper to taste. Stir in the chopped green onion. Place the watermelon and cucumber in a serving bowl and pour the marinade over the top. Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate a couple of hours before serving. Toss gently before serving. ; name: cucumber salad with rice wine vinegar ; ingredients: toasted sesame seeds, cucumbers, rice wine vinegar, distilled white vinegar, sugar, kosher salt ; preparation:In a medium bowl, toss the cucumber slices with all the other ingredients, except sesame seeds. Cover, and refrigerate for at least an hour. Sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds just before serving. Actually, i pick up a half pound at the health food store, rinse and drain them well, and then toast them in thedry skillet. Allow them to cool completely, and store them in the freezer until needed. They will rapidly go rancid otherwise. ; name: asian sesame cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, kosher salt, white sesame seeds, rice wine vinegar, toasted sesame oil, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Peel and seed cucumbers and cut on the diagonal into thin slices. Toss the cucumber pieces with kosher salt, transfer to a colander, and let drain for 1 hour. Toast white sesame seeds in a dry skillet until theyre golden brown. Whisk together rice wine vinegar, toasted sesame oil, sugar, and crushed red pepper flakes. Rinse the cucumber slices thoroughly under cold running water and pat dry with paper towels. Toss the cucumbers with the dressing and toasted sesame seeds and serve. ; name: yummy cucumber and tomato salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, yellow pear tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, apple cider vinegar, flax seed oil, dijon mustard, garlic clove, fresh dill ; preparation:

name: chocolate cherry breakfast smoothie ; ingredients: sweet cherries, vanilla yogurt, nonfat milk, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes, honey ; preparation:In the jar of a blender, combine the cherries, yogurt, milk, cocoa, and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: fresh banana berry shake ; ingredients: bananas, strawberry, fresh orange juice, low-fat vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Add ice cream. Process until smooth. Pour into glasses. Serve immediately. ; name: frosty fruity smoothie ; ingredients: blueberries, unsweetened sliced peaches, milk, vanilla yogurt, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Combine blueberries or huckleberries, peaches and milk in a blender. Cover and process on high until smooth. Add yogurt, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Process until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: banana chocolate peanut butter smoothie ; ingredients: ovaltine, banana, peanut butter, water, sugar, cashews, cinnamon ; preparation:Put all ingredients in a blender. Blend until mixed. Put cashews in if wanted. Blend, but leave cashews chunky. Pour into a glass. Put cinnamon on top of the poured smoothie. ; name: banana liqueur ; ingredients: bananas, vodka, sugar syrup, vanilla extract ; preparation:Peel and mash bananas. Combine with the vodka, sugar syrup and vanilla in sterilized, wide-mouth jar. Cap the jar and shake gently to mix. Let stand in a cool, dark place for 1 week. Strain and filter the liquid. Transfer clear liqueur to a sterilized bottle. Simmer, occasionally scraping down the sides of the pan, until the sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. ; name: peanut butter and jelly smoothie ; ingredients: creamy peanut butter, jelly, milk, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Combine peanut butter and jelly. Place in blender container. Add milk and ice cream. Cover. Blend until smooth. Pour into tall glass. Serve immediately. ; name: strawberry kiwi banana smoothie no dairy ; ingredients: banana, kiwi, strawberries, apple juice, water, flax seed, psyllium ; preparation:Cut all fruit into chunks. Blend. Add apple juice and water. Add flax seed and psyllium husk. Blend and serve. ; name: banana blaster smoothie ; ingredients: bananas, milk, coconut milk, ice cubes, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: 20 minute huckleberry muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, huckleberries, eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f grease a standard 12-muffin pan or line with paper cups. Thoroughly mix the flour, baking powder, salt and huckleberries together in a large bowl. Set aside. In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk or cream, sugar, butter, and vanilla. Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix together with a few light strokes just until just blended. Do not overmix. The batter should not be smooth. Divide the batter among the muffin cups. Bake for 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in 1 or 2 of the muffins comes out clean. Let cool for a few minutes, and serve warm. ; name: marshmallow muffins ; ingredients: marshmallows, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, salt, light brown sugar, eggs, milk, sunflower oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Using scissors, cut the marshmallows in half. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and marshmallows. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely. ; name: diet pineapple muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, artificial sweetener, salt, margarine, crushed pineapple, egg ; preparation:Combine flour, baking powder, sweetner and salt. Add melted butter. Add beaten egg and 19 oz tin of crushed pineapple. Ingredients will be very thick in texture. Line your muffin pan cups with cupcake papers. Bake 18 minutes at 400f. ; name: old fashioned blueberry muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, frozen blueberries, eggs, milk, canola oil ; preparation:In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in blueberries until coated with flour. Put eggs in 4 cup glas measuring cup and add enough milk to measure 2 cups. Add oil and whisk until blended. Make well in center of flour mixture and pour milk mixture. With large spatula, gently fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients just until moistened. Spoon into greased muffin pan. 400f for 30 minutes or until tops are firm to the touch. ; name: double bran muffins ; ingredients: all-bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, buttermilk, honey, vegetable oil, prune ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes. ; name: alabama biscuit muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with butter and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir till the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes. ; name: chocolate cinnamon muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, ground cinnamon, salt, light brown sugar, semisweet mini chocolate chips, eggs, low-fat milk, sunflower oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely. ; name: spring muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, vegetable oil, fresh strawberries, fresh rhubarb ; preparation:

name: cheddarburger loaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, cheddar cheese, plain breadcrumbs, egg, onion, heinz 57 steak sauce, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Make into loaf. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Serve. ; name: cheese stuffed bread ; ingredients: sourdough bread, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, green pepper, red pepper, salt, parmesan cheese, ground cumin, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip. ; name: mini cheddar meatloaves ; ingredients: egg, milk, shredded cheddar cheese, oats, onion, salt, ground beef, ketchup, brown sugar, prepared mustard ; preparation:In a bowl beat eggs and milk, stir in cheese, oats, onion, and salt. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into 8 loaves place in 13x9x2 baking dish, i normally make my loaves bigger and can get about 4-5. In separate bowl, combine ketchup, brown sugar, and mustard, mix well. The original recipe says to spoon over loafs and bake 45 minutes or until no longer pink and meat thermometer reads 160 degrees, uncovered at 350 degrees. However, i bake mine without the sauce until the last 10 minutes or so and then spoon the mixture over the loaves, replacing them back in oven to finish cooking. ; name: cheddar cheese grits ; ingredients: water, whole milk, quick-cooking grits, sharp white cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, salt, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the grits, whisking constantly. Cook, stirring frequently and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and cooked, about 7 minutes. Add the cheese and butter and stir just until melted. Remove from the heat. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately. ; name: cheddar and chive omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately. ; name: gourmet grilled cheese ; ingredients: cream cheese, miracle whip, monterey jack cheese, cheese slices, bread ; preparation:Stir the cream cheese, miracle whip and montery jack cheese together. Spread the cream cheese mixture over half of the bread, top with a cheese slice. Place another slice of bread over the cheese slice making a sandwich. Spread the second amount of miracle whip over the bread, using it like butter. Turn the sandwich over, spreading it onto that slice. Spray a frying pan with cooking spray and grill the sandwiches, turning once, until brown. ; name: classic grilled cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, white bread, unsalted butter ; preparation:Combine cheeses in bowl. Brush top side of each slice of bread with melted butter. Flip 4 slices over, sprinkle with cheese, and compact cheese lightly with hand. Cover with remaining bread slices, buttered side up. Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat for 1 minute. Place 2 sandwiches in pan and weight with round cake pan, pressing lightly. Leave cake pan on top and cook until first side is golden brown, 3-5 minutes. Flip sandwiches, press again with cake pan, and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining 2 sandwiches. ; name: white trash cheese souffle ; ingredients: bread, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:

name: my stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, dried basil, dried rosemary, butter, whole chicken breasts, boiled ham, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone. ; name: simple stove top stuffing ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, parsley flakes, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, stale bread, chicken broth ; preparation:In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until fragrant. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven. ; name: cheesy sour cream herb chicken ; ingredients: herb seasoned stuffing mix, parmesan cheese, butter, sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a bowl, combine stuffing, cheese and butter. Stir well to combine and moisten, breaking up any large stuffing pieces. Transfer to a plate or pie pan. Lightly spread sour cream over chicken and coat with stuffing mixture, pressing well to adhere. Place on a lightly oiled, foil-lined 13-by-9-inch baking sheet. Put any extra mixture on top of chicken. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the coating is crisp and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: crock pot chicken gravy and stuffing ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, pepper, chicken broth, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, milk, pepperidge farm herb stuffing, butter ; preparation:Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over breasts. Put one slice of swiss cheese on each breast. Combine both cans of soup and milk. Cover chicken breasts with soup mixture. Sprinkle stuffing mix over all. Drizzle melted butter on top. Cook on low for 6 hours or high for 3. ; name: easy creamy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, cream of chicken soup, stove top stuffing mix, butter, water, half-and-half cream, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cook stuffing with butter & water according to package directions. Combine well cream of chicken soup and half & half in a mixing bowl. In a 13 x 9 casserole dish, arrange chicken in a single layer. Spread soup mixture evenly over the top of chicken. Sprinkle over pepper to taste. Spoon stuffing evenly over the top of soup mixture. Bake for 30-35 minutes until chicken is cooked through. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed ; ingredients: chicken fillets, oil, butter, shallots, garlic clove, crabmeat, lemon juice, cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut a pocket into each chicken fillet. Melt butter in a pan, adding the spring onions, cook for 2 minutes stirring. Add drained crab meat, lemon juice and cream, cook for 1 minute and season. Allow to cool. Fill the pockets with the stuffing, heat oil in pan and add the chicken browning until golden. Place in a greased dish and bake in a moderate oven 180c for 25 - 30 minutes. Can be served either with salads, or new potatoes, fresh vegetables and a sauce of your choice. ; name: diamond chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, seasoning salt, seasoned stuffing mix, cream of chicken soup, white wine ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in an 8x8-inch pan. Lay swiss cheese over each breast. Sprinkle with seasoned salt. Mix soup with wine, pour over chicken. Sprinkle with stuffing mix. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: stuffing coated chicken ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, parmesan cheese, butter, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:

name: garlic herb sauce ; ingredients: light butter, skim milk, flour, garlic salt, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set heat on stove to low. In a saucepan, melt butter, then add a tablespoon of flour. Add milk, garlic salt, parsley, then stir. Allow to heat thoroughly and start to bubble. Add the other tablespoon of flour, then stir until thickened. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: low fat garlic prawns ; ingredients: green shrimp, white wine, skim evaporated milk, cornflour, shallot, garlic ; preparation:Spray pan with cooking spray. Saute prawns for 2- 3 minutes and then add garlic, wine and shallots and cook 5 minutes. Mix cornflour with evaporated milk, add to pan and stir constantly until thickens. Season to taste.
