These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator. ; name: rebecca s olives olives baked in cheese ; ingredients: cheese, butter, flour, cayenne, garlic-stuffed olives ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Drain olives and pat dry. Thoroughly combine cheese and butter. Add flour and cayenne, stirring to fully mix. When thoroughly combined but crumbly, work mixture together with your fingers to form dough. Roll a tablespoon-sized clump of dough into a ball. Press it flat between the palms of your hands. Put an olive in the center and press dough around sides to enclose. Roll it between your palms to smooth surface, if you like. Bake 15 - 20 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: sauteed black olives with tomatoes ; ingredients: black olives, tomatoes, salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, ground pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Rinse and drain olives. You can pit them or not, whichever you prefer. Combine tomatoes and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley. ; name: zesty cheese ravioli ; ingredients: water, diced tomatoes, garlic clove, cheese ravioli, fresh spinach, sugar, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mince the garlic. Finely chop the spinach. Combine the water, tomatoes and their juice, and garlic in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add the ravioli, cover, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes. Uncover and cook 5 more minutes or until done. Stir in the spinach, sugar, salt, and pepper. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle with parmesan. Serve sprinkled with additional parmesan and pepper, if desired. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: greek stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mixed mushrooms, tomatoes, black olives, feta cheese, garlic clove, fresh basil ; preparation:Put mushrooms, smooth side on top, on a baking sheet that has parchment paper. Cook in a preheated oven of 425 f for 5 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool a little bit. Flip the mushrooms, hollow side on top. In a bowl, mix tomatoes, olives, feta, garlic and basil. With a spoon, distribute this mixture in the mushrooms. Keep cooking at 425f 8 to 10 minutes or until mushrooms are tender and hot. ; name: zesty stuffed olives ; ingredients: cream cheese spread, black olives, italian dressing, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: double delicious cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars. ; name: coconut chocolate bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces. ; name: goody cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, butter, brown sugar, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Line a jelly roll pan with foil. Arrange graham crackers in the pan in a single layer to cover pan. Combine butter and sugar in a heavy medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for 2 minutes until the consistency of carmel. Stir in vanilla and chopped nuts. Drizzle the hot mixture over crackers and spread evenly. Bake 10 minutes at 300. Remove at once from pan to flat surface to cool. When cool, break into smaller pieces. ; name: graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, oleo, brown sugar, nuts ; preparation:Lay graham crackers in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Boil oleo and brown sugar 4 minutes. Pour over graham crackers. Sprinkle top with nuts. Bake at 350 for 6-8 minutes. ; name: heavenly crunch cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, butter, sugar, pecans ; preparation:Spread crackers in a single layer on a large jelly roll pan. Sprinkle pecans over crackers. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add sugar and boil 3 minutes. Pour over crackers. Bake in 350 degree over for 10 - 15 minutes or until very lightly browned. Remove from pan before they cool completely. Break into sections. ; name: eggless chocolate cookies ; ingredients: margarine, oil, sugar, water, salt, baking soda, flour, cocoa ; preparation:Cream margarine, oil, sugar and 1 t water until light and fluffy. Mix in remaining 2-3 t of water and beat well. Mix dry ingredients. Add to margarine mixture and mix until combined. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to an hour. Preheat oven 400f and grease a cookie sheet well. Make 24 balls. Bake for 10 minutes, should be very puffy. Allow to cool for 5 minutes on baking sheet, they will fall considerably due to the lack of egg. ; name: raisin coconut treasure cookies ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, flour, baking powder, eagle brand condensed milk, margarine, raisins, coconut, walnuts ; preparation:

name: picadillo de carne filipino beef soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, tomatoes, lean ground beef, seasoning salt, beef bouillon, potatoes ; preparation:In a dutch oven or other large pot, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute garlic, onion, and tomato until garlic is crisp and onion is tender. Add beef and salt. Simmer, covered, for 15 minutes. Add bouillon and simmer until meat is done. Add potatoes and simmer until potatoes are tender. Serve hot. ; name: braised beef and tortelloni olive garden copycat ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless beef short rib, garlic clove, tomatoes, fresh mushrooms, marsala wine, flour, italian seasoning, tortellini ; preparation:Heat oil on high heat in a large nonstick pan. Toss short ribs in flour, add to pan, and sear on all sides. Reduce heat to low and add garlic. Cook and stir for about 1 min. Add tomato, mushrooms, marsala wine, and italian seasoning one at a time, allowing about 1-2 min between each for liquid to evaporate. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure liquid has not evaporated away. Increase heat to medium high and heat thoroughly. Serve over tortelloni. ; name: seasoned spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, kosher salt, garlic cloves ; preparation:Steam half of spinach, covered, for 5 minutes or until the spinach wilts. Place steamed spinach in a colander. Repeat proceduce with remaining spinach. Cool slightly, and squeeze dry. Place spinach in a bowl. Add onions and remaining ingredients. Toss mixture well to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: thai chilli swordfish ; ingredients: swordfish steaks, olive oil, of fresh mint, fresh coriander, chili sauce, nam pla, fresh ginger, sea salt ; preparation:Sprinkle a little sea salt over the fish. Heat the oil in a very hot skillet. Cook the fish in the skillet for about 4 minutes each side, or until cooked to your liking. Meanwhile, put remaining ingredients in a screw-top jar and shake vigorously. Serve the fish with a little of the sauce drizzled over. ; name: moroccan fish and potatoes ; ingredients: paprika, corn oil, potatoes, hot red peppers, fish fillets, garlic, salt, fresh coriander ; preparation:In a heavy skillet or dutch oven-type pot, layer the sliced potatoes and sprinkle with 1 t paprika and oil. Place sliced peppers on top, then slices of fish. Sprinkle salt on next, then 1 tsp paprika. Spread coriander over everything. Add water up to middle of fish layers and boil on medium heat until water is reduced to just under fish layer, shaking pan occasionally. ; name: arabian spinach ; ingredients: onion, oil, garlic, spinach, cumin, chickpeas, butter ; preparation:In a large wok, fry onion in oil for about 5 minutes, until softened. Add the garlic and cumin, and then fry for another minute. Add spinach in stages, stirring until leaves begin to wilt. Stir in chickpeas, butter and salt and pepper to taste. Reheat. ; name: carne asada torta ; ingredients: round steaks, garlic salt, black pepper, oil, parsley, rolls, mayonnaise, water ; preparation:

name: garlic red pepper dip ; ingredients: bell peppers, instant minced garlic, cream cheese, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut, seed, and dice peppers, and place into pan. Add olive oil and to peppers and stir around thoroughly. Add minced garlic and stir thoroughly. Place in oven and cook for hour and a half. Add cream cheese and stir until thoroughly melted and blended. Transfer into serving dish and serve right away or refrigerate. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: jalapeno pepper stuffed cherry peppers ; ingredients: sweet red cherry peppers, cream cheese, green onions, garlic sausage, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaise ; preparation:Cut cherry peppers in half, vertically, leaving stem for presentation. Remove seeds. Drain well on paper towel. In a small bowl combine all remaining ingredients and mix well. Spoon filling into pepper halves. ; name: cheeseburger chili mac and cheese ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, ground sirloin, onion, chili powder, salt & fresh ground pepper, ketchup, yellow mustard, beef stock, whole wheat elbow macaroni, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat for the pasta. Place a medium pot over medium-high heat with 2 turns of the pan of evoo, about 2 tablespoons. Add the meat to the pan and cook until golden brown, 5-6 minutes. Add the onion and chili powder to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and cook until the onion is tender, 4-5 minutes. Add the ketchup, mustard and beef stock to the pot, bring up to a bubble and simmer until slightly thickened, 4-5 minutes. While the chili is working, salt the boiling water and drop the pasta inches cook to al dente according to package directions then drain thoroughly and return it to the pot. Add the chili to the pot with the pasta and give everything a good toss. Transfer to a casserole dish and top with the shredded cheese. Place the casserole under the broiler to melt and brown the cheese. Serve with a simple salad alongside. ; name: mexican stuffed bell pepper casserole ; ingredients: green peppers, ground beef, onion, tomatoes, water, minute rice, chili powder, garlic salt, corn, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Core green peppers. Immerse in boiling water for 3 minutes. Chop into bite size pieces. Fry ground beef and onion. Drain. Stir in all ingredients except peppers and cheese. Return to boiling. Simmer 15 minutes. Add cooked pepper pieces and cheese. Place in a casserole dish sprayed with pam. Cover and bake at 375 degreees for 20 minutes. ; name: pepper cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, taco seasoning, sour cream, eggs, diced green chilies, red bell pepper, hot salsa, guacamole ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Beat the cream cheese, shredded cheese, and taco seasoning mix until fluffy. Stir in 1 cup of sour cream. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then fold in the chilies and the red pepper. Pour in a greased spring-form pan and bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes on wire rack. Combine the remaining sour cream with the salsa and spread on top. Bake for 5 minutes more. Refrigerate over night. To serve, unmold and spread with the guacamole or avocado dip. Garnish with fresh tomatoes, olives, or cheese. Serve with taco chips. ; name: cheesy capsicums bell peppers ; ingredients: red capsicums, yellow peppers, ricotta cheese, feta cheese, oregano leaves, fresh parsley, egg yolks, fresh ground black pepper, pine nuts, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cut capsicums in half horizontally and remove seeds and stalks so they can sit upright in a baking dish. Mix ricotta, feta, oregano, parsley, egg yolks and pepper together. Fill capsicums with the cheese mixture and stand upright in a baking dish. Scatter the pinenuts and parmesan over the top of the cheese mix. Bake at 180c for 40 minutes or until the capsicums are soft and cheese mixture is cooked through. Grill 2 minutes until golden. ; name: cheese filled peppers ; ingredients: red bell peppers, coarse salt, ground beef, tabasco sauce, garlic salt, pepper, lemon, breadcrumbs, jarlsberg cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: boneless pork chops with spicy rub ; ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, dried oregano, ground cumin, ground black pepper, pork chops, lime ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, oregano, cumin and pepper. Rub the mixture evenly over the pork chops. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Heat broiler. Broil pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Or you could also bake the chops at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or till done. Serve immediately, with 2 wedges of lime for each chop. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: vietnamese spiced pork chops ; ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, cooking spray, green onion, brown sugar, paprika, ground coriander, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, minced ginger, garlic ; preparation:Lightly score a diamond pattern on both sides of pork. Combine the ingredients for the rub and rub evenly over pork. Let rest at least 5 minutes. Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add pork. Cook 4 minutes on each side or until done. Garnish with sliced green onions, if desired. ; name: pork strips ; ingredients: sugar, soy sauce, pork, extra virgin olive oil, mushroom, whole corn, tomatoes and green chilies, water, white rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a mixing bowl add the sugar and soy together. Make it more of a marinade sauce than a paste. Add the pork strips and refrigerate at least one hour or over night. When ready to cook add the extra virgin olive oil to a large skillet brown the pork then remove from the skillet add the tomatoes with green chilli, corn and mushrooms. Let them get warm. In a sauce pan bring the water to a boil then add the rice. When the veggies are warm add the sauce in the skillet along with the pork. Put the rice on the bottom of the plate then add the mixture of pork and veggie. Salt and pepper to your liking. Enjoy. ; name: thai red pork curry with corn and peas ; ingredients: peanut oil, red curry paste, lean pork, coconut milk, corn kernel, fresh peas, fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind, thai basil ; preparation:Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add pork, stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add corn and peas to wok, cook for 5 minutes. Add fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind and basil leaves, toss well. Serve with steamed rice. ; name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: stir crazy pork and papaya ; ingredients: vegetable oil, unsalted cashews, red chile, garlic cloves, pork fillets, greens, lime, juice and zest of, soy sauce, papaya, brown rice ; preparation:Heat 1 tablespoon of the vegetable oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the cashews and gently toss until golden brown. Remove with a perforated spoon and set aside. Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil. Add the chilli and garlic, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Raise the heat and add the pork, greens and lime zest. Fry for a few minutes until pork begins to colour. Add the lime juice, soy sauce and papaya. Heat through for 1 minute, stirring. Return the cashews to the wok and toss to mix. ; name: pork with spicy greenbeans ; ingredients: green beans, vegetable oil, curry paste, dried shrimp, pork, chicken stock, fish sauce, palm sugar, fresh lime leaves ; preparation:

name: my stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, dried basil, dried rosemary, butter, whole chicken breasts, boiled ham, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone. ; name: rosemary grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime peel, lime juice, fresh rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: bacon cheese stuffed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, mozzarella cheese, bacon, egg, italian breadcrumbs, olive oil, ragu hearty robusto pasta sauce, chicken broth, linguine ; preparation:Evenly top each chicken breast half with cheese and bacon. Roll up and secure with wooden toothpicks. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium heat and brown chicken, turning occasionally. Stir in ragu pasta sauce and broth. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. To serve, arrange chicken and sauce over hot linguine or spaghetti. Garnish, if desired, with chopped fresh basil or parsley. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed with spinach sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sun-dried tomatoes with italian herbs, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Coat a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Add the spinach, and cook over medium-high heat, 2 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted. Remove from heat, and toss in the sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella and parmesan. Set aside. Cut a deep pocket into the thickest side of each piece of chicken, and stuff a quarter of the spinach mixture into each pocket. Close by pressing flesh together and securing with a wooden toothpick, if necessary. Combine the italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and sprinkles both sides of the chicken pieces with some of the mixture. Wipe out the skillet, add the olive oil, and preheat over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: brined grilled chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, chicken thighs, water, kosher salt, brown sugar, olive oil ; preparation:Combine the water, salt, and sugar together in a large deep bowl or plastic tub. Stir until salt and sugar are dissolved. Add the chicken and fully submerge. Refrigerate for 2-4 hours to brine. Remove the chicken from the brine, rinse and pat dry. Grill chicken on direct heat for 5-7 min, turning once or twice until chicken is golden and well-marked from the grill. Move the chicken over to the side of the grill to indirect heat and continue to cook until juices run clear, about another 5-7 minute. ; name: grilled stuffed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, bacon, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, garlic salt, parsley ; preparation:

name: blood orange margaritas ; ingredients: kosher salt, ice, blood orange juice, tequila, triple sec, orange wedge ; preparation:Moisten rim of 2 margarita glasses and dip in kosher salt. Fill a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Add orange juice, tequila, and triple sec. Shake well and strain into glasses. Garnish with orange wedges, if desired. ; name: margarita soaked cake ; ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, cold water, margarita mix, butter, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large bundt pan. Combine all of the ingredients for the cake and mix on medium speed for 2 minutes or until smooth. Pour batter into bundt pan. Bake for 35-45 minutes or until knife insterted comes out clean. Invert onto a plate. Combine ingredients for the topping in a saucepan. Boil mixture for about 2 minutes. While still warm, poke holes in the top and sides of the cake with a fork. Pour margarita mixture over cake. ; name: watermelon margaritas ; ingredients: watermelon, lime wedge, salt, tequila, orange liqueur, sugar, ice cubes, lime slice, orange slice ; preparation:Place watermelon slices in heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired. ; name: spicy pineapple margarita ; ingredients: kosher salt, chili powder, lime wedge, tequila, lime juice, pineapple juice, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce ; preparation:Mix the salt and chile powder on a small plate. Rub the rims of 4 martini glasses with the lime wedge, then dip the rims in the salt mixture to coat. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add all of the remaining ingredients. Shake vigorously, then strain into glasses. Serve immediately. ; name: orange party punch ; ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, pineapple juice, orange sherbet ; preparation:Prepare orange juice according to package directions. Pour into a punch bowl. Stir in the soda and pineapple juice. Top with scoops of sherbet. Serve immediately. ; name: lemonade punch ; ingredients: kool-aid lemon-lime powdered drink mix, sugar, water, lemonade, limes ; preparation:Mix powdered drink mix with water. Pour into ice trays. Freeze. Prepare lemonade mix. Fill punch bowl or large pitcher. Add lemon-lime cubes and lime slices. ; name: loaded lemonade ; ingredients: fresh orange juice, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, tequila, triple sec, sprite ; preparation:Add first four ingredients to a pitcher or large bowl. Stir to combine. Chill for 2 hours. Right before ready to serve, add sprite. Stir to combine. Serve in ice-filled glasses. ; name: margarita punch ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, frozen lemonade, orange extract, water, 7-up soda, tequila ; preparation:

name: lazy day brunch casserole crustless quiche ; ingredients: broccoli, tomatoes, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, flour, eggs, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix milk, flour and eggs well. Add the remaining ingredients and pour into 8 x 8 greased baking dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes. Let sit 10 minutes before serving. ; name: any flavor easy quiche ; ingredients: ready-made pie crust, eggs, nonfat milk, green onion, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, zucchini, cheese, flour ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning. ; name: spinach ham quiche ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, eggs, heavy whipping cream, tabasco sauce, tarragon, chicken base, fresh spinach, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese, ham ; preparation:In a large bowl combine eggs, whipping cream, tabasco, tarragon& chicken base. Whip until smooth. Arrange the pie shell in a 9 inch pie pan. Add the grated swiss cheese, spinach, ham and parmesan cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all and bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes. ; name: smoked salmon frittata ; ingredients: eggs, milk, chives, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, red onion, cream cheese, smoked salmon, fresh tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving. ; name: carrot and cheese crustless quiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrot, salt, curry powder, eggs, milk, mozzarella cheese, paprika ; preparation:In a skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add onion and saute for 5 minute. Add carrots, salt and curry powder. Cook for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from heat and cool. In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs and milk. Stir into veggie mixture. Pour into greased 8x8 pan. Bake at 300 for 20 minutes. Top with cheese and paprika. Return to oven and bake for another 15 minutes or until custard is firm and cheese is melted. Cut into square and serve. ; name: no crust crab quiche ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, crabmeat, milk, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9-inch pie pan with cooking spray. Mix together the milk, eggs, flour, salt, pepper, and green onions. Arrange the cheese evenly over the bottom of the pie pan. Top with the crab meat. Pour the egg mixture evenly over the cheese and crab. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: crustless crab quiche ; ingredients: onion, butter, salt, parmesan cheese, crab, feta cheese, eggs, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Saut onions in butter until caramelized. Add salt to taste. Beat eggs and milk together in small bowl. Sprinkle parmesan in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer onions, then crab, then feta cheese. Pour egg mix over top. Cook 20 minute. Let cool 8-10 minutes. If it is sticking, scrape the edges with a knife to help release. ; name: broccoli salmon quiche ; ingredients: pie crusts, fresh broccoli, salmon, swiss cheese, fresh chives, eggs, whipping cream, red cayenne pepper, dried dill weed ; preparation:

name: cinnamon cream cheese roll ups ; ingredients: bread, cream cheese, egg yolk, powdered sugar, sugar, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Mix cream cheese, egg yolk, and powdered sugar. Combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Spread 1 t cheese mixture on each slice bread. Roll up. Dip in melted butter, then in cinnamon sugar. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes, or until golden. ; name: broiled apricot and cheese toast ; ingredients: apricot jam, bread, cream cheese, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Heat broiler with rack 4 inches from the heat source. Spread jam over one side of toasted bread. Top with cheese. Sprinkle cinnamon over the cheese. Broil until cheese is hot and slightly bubbly, about 3 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: strawberry cream cheese sandwich cookies ; ingredients: cream cheese, strawberry preserves, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, vanilla wafers ; preparation:In a medium bowl, smash cream cheese with a fork. Combine the rest of the ingredients together with the cream cheese. Mix well. Let chill in the refridgerator for at least 30 minutes. On the flat side of the wafer, spread 2 tsp of mixture. Then top with another wafer to make a sandwich. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: oven baked french toast ; ingredients: cinnamon-swirl bread, half & half light cream, eggs, butter, brown sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:Lightly grease a 9x13 pan. Arrange bread in 2 layers in pan. In large bowl, wisk together the remaining ingredients. Pour evenly over bread slices, pressing down until some of the liquid is absorbed and bread does not float. Bake 350f for 45 minutes, or until center reaches 160f and bread is golden brown. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: grandma mac s cinnamon toast ; ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, milk, cinnamon, salt, bread ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in milk, cinnamon and salt. Spread entire top of lightly toasted bread with butter mixture. Place on a cookie sheet and broil briefly until mixture bubbles. Cool slightly on a rack. Cut into triangles, and serve warm for breakfast toast. Cover and refrigerate remaining butter mixture for future use. ; name: healthier french toast ; ingredients: eggs, milk, maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla extract, bread, oil, powdered sugar, carrot, sweet potato ; preparation:Combine eggs, milk, orange puree, maple syrup or honey, cinnamon, and vanilla in a large shallow dish. Dip bread until soaked on both sides. Cook in skillet over medium heat. Use a small amount of oil to keep the toast from sticking. Allow the first side to brown, then flip to brown the second side of the bread. Dust with powdered sugar or top with your favorite syrup. ; name: cream cheese stuffed cinnamon toast with fruit ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cream cheese, cinnamon-swirl bread, fruit, sweet cream ; preparation:

name: famous red lobster shrimp scampi ; ingredients: medium shrimp, pure olive oil, garlic, white wine, fresh lemon, italian seasoning, butter, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat cast iron skillet and add olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until tender and no longer translucent, reduce heat. Remove shrimp and set aside. Add garlic and cook 2-3 minutes. Do not allow garlic to brown - it will make it bitter. Add white wine, and lemon juice. Cook until wine is reduced by half. After it is reduced, add italian seasoning. Reduce heat to low, and add butter. If pan is too hot, the butter will separate. Add shrimp back into sauce, add parsley, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: easy lemon dijon shrimp scampi ; ingredients: large shrimp, fresh garlic, butter, dried chili pepper flakes, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir shrimp, garlic and chili flakes in butter in a large skillet over medium heat, until shrimp are pink and cooked. Blend mustard, lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper, add to shrimp mixture. Heat thoroughly. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese if desired. Serve with white rice or cooked pasta. Delicious. ; name: broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic, parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Put shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like. ; name: scampi lower fat ; ingredients: butter, shallot, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, large shrimp, parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Melt butter in large non-stick skillet over medium heat, add shallot and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, until golden, 4-5 minutes. Remove from heat, add lemon juice, salt and pepper, then add shrimp and toss to coat. Spread shrimp in a shallow baking dish large enough to hold shrimp in a single layer. Broil 3-4 inches from the heat, until shrimp are just opaque in the center and lightly browned on the outside, about 3 minutes on each side. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with lemon wedges. ; name: sauteed shrimp with lemon and garlic ; ingredients: lemons, large shrimp, garlic, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel, devein and rinse shrimp. Set aside. Grate the zest of both lemons, then juice both lemons. Keep zest and juice separate. In a large bowl, place shrimp then add lemon zest, garlic and half of the olive oil. Toss well to coat evenly and season with the salt and pepper. Heat remaining oil in a large saute pan over medium heat. Saute shrimp in single layer for about 1 minute on each side until cooked through. After all shrimp is cooked and removed from pan, deglaze pan with 3 t of lemon juice, stirring up any browned bits. Pour sauce over shrimp and serve. ; name: outrageously good broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic salt, unseasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley ; preparation:Butterfly shrimp and place on non-stick baking pan or line pan with aluminum foil for easier cleanup. Brush shrimp with melted butter. Sprinkle lightly with garlic salt. Mix together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese and parsley. Sprinkle lightly over shrimp. Drizzle lightly with additional melted butter. Broil until light brown. ; name: skewered garlic shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, soy sauce, pineapple chunks, oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, green onions ; preparation:Combine soy sauce, pineapple chunks, pineapple juice, oil, garlic, crushed red pepper and green onions in plastic bag. Add shrimp. Marinate at least 1 hour. I usually let it marinate a few hours. Place shrimp, pineapple and green onions on skewers. Grill until pink. ; name: broiled shrimp scampi ; ingredients: unsalted butter, lemon juice, fresh parsley, garlic, ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shrimp ; preparation:

name: raspberry topped lemon pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crust, frozen raspberries in light syrup, cornstarch, egg yolks, eagle brand condensed milk, realemon juice, yellow food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 deg. In saucepan, combine raspberries and cornstarch. Cook and stir until thickened. In bowl, beat egg yolk. Stir in sweetened condensed milk, realemon juice and food coloring if desired. Pour over crust. Bake 8 minutes. Spoon raspberry mixture over top. Chill 4 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Garnish as desired. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: fabulous raspberry cream pie ; ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, raspberry yogurt, fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:In a large bowl dissolve jello completely in boiling water. Stir in yogurt with a wire whisk. Fold in 1 container of whipped topping. Spread in crust. Refrigerate several hours or overnight. I serve the slices with extra container of whipped topping but that can be optional. ; name: deep dish sour cream apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch deep dish pie crust, flour, cooking apples, sour cream, brown sugar, egg yolks, butter, salt ; preparation:Use an unbaked 9-inch deep-dish pie shell, your own recipe or storebought. Sprinkle 1 tbsp of the flour in shell. Arrange apple slices in bottom. Preheat oven to 425f degrees. In a mixing bowl, combine sour cream, brown sugar, yolks, butter, salt and remaining 1 tbsp flour. Blend well and spoon over apples. Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce heat to 350f degrees and bake for 40 more minutes, or until apples are tender. ; name: cherry pie ; ingredients: cherries, sugar, flour, cinnamon, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie ; preparation:Mix ingredients for filling. Place in pastry-lined pie pan. Put top crust on. Cut vent slits in top crust, and flute edges. Brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 425f for 25 minutes, reduce heat to 350f and bake for 25-30 minutes more. Add the cherries and toss to coat. This coats them more even than doing it in a bowl and the filling is firmer. ; name: cherry chocolate cream pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, salt, cherry pie filling, almond extract, vanilla extract, pie crusts, cool whip, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries. ; name: raspberry lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lime juice, cool whip, red food coloring, fresh raspberry, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:In a bowl, combine milk and lime juice. Mix well. Mixture should thicken. Add cool whip and food coloring if desired. Fold in raspberries. Spoon mixture into pie crust. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: elderberry pie ; ingredients: elderberries, sugar, flour, lemon juice, cinnamon, butter, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie ; preparation:Combine berries, sugar, flour, and lemon juice in a medium sauce pan. Heat mixture until it just starts to boil, stirring occassionaly. Remove from heat and let cool for 15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Spread bottom crust in a 9 inch pie pan. Spread berry mixture in pie shell. Sprinkle cinnamon on top. Dot butter on top. Put top crust on and seal edges. Poke several vent holes in top crust. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350 degrees fahrenheit, leaving pie in oven, and bake for 30 minutes longer. ; name: raspberry sour cream pie ; ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, frozen unsweetened raspberries, sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, lemon juice, cinnamon, sour cream ; preparation:

name: hazelnut brittle ; ingredients: white sugar, water, light corn syrup, butter, hazelnuts, salt, baking soda, vanilla, chocolate ; preparation:Put a large pot or kettle over a medium heat. Add sugar, water, and corn syrup and bring to a boil. When mixture comes to a boil, add butter. Cook to 260 degrees f on a candy thermometer without stirring and add the sliced hazelnuts. Bring mixture to 300 degrees f and stir in salt, baking soda and vanilla. Pour mixture onto a greased baking sheet and spread out and allow to cool. Break up into pieces and decorate with melted chocolate. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: turkish hazelnuts ; ingredients: hazelnuts, egg whites, sugar, salt, butter ; preparation:In a large shallow baking pan, toast hazelnuts in 325 oven, 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add sugar and salt, beating until stiff. Fold in toasted hazelnuts. Melt butter in same pan. Spread nut mixture on top. Bake 30 to 40 minutes at 325 or until nut are browned and butter is absorbed. Stir nuts thoroughly every 10 minutes during baking. ; name: hazelnut chocolate brownies ; ingredients: hazelnuts, dark chocolate, butter, eggs, brown sugar, vanilla, plain flour, baking powder ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 160 c. Grease 16 x 16 cms pan and line with baking paper. Melt chocolate and butter together in bowl over saucepan of boiling water. Cool slightly. Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla with electric beaters till thick and pale. Stir in cooled chocolate. Sift in flour and baking powder, stir till just combined. Add hazelnuts, mix in well. Pour into prepared pan, bake for 35 - 40 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then turn onto wire rack. ; name: coconut chocolate bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: krispies chocolate caramel bars ; ingredients: flour, powdered sugar, margarine, vanilla caramels, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening, crispy rice cereal ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix crust ingredients with fork until crumbly. Press mixture in ungreased 13x9-inch pan. Bake for 10-12 minutes. Cool slightly. In saucepan melt filling ingredients over low heat, stirring constantly. Spread over crust. Cool slightly. In saucepan over low heat, melt chocolate chips and shortening, stirring constantly. Stir in cereal. Carefully spread over filling. Cool completely. ; name: hazelnut slice bars ; ingredients: butter, golden syrup, sweetened condensed milk, biscuit, slivered almonds, copha, chocolate ; preparation:

name: fried crab sticks ; ingredients: imitation crab sticks, eggs, milk, panko breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil to 350 degrees. Unwrap crabsticks and line them on foil or a plate. Whisk together eggs and milk to create egg wash. Dredge crab stick in flour. One at a time. Then dredge the crabstick in egg wash. Now roll the crabstick in the panko breadcrumbs until completely covered. Repeat steps 4 thru 6 for about two or three more crabsticks. Deep fry at 350 degrees for about 2 minutes, turning over once. While these are cooking, prepare the remaining crabsticks. Fry in batches for best results. ; name: crab stuffed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, white crab meat, mayonnaise, relish, tabasco sauce, fresh chives, salt and pepper, mixed salad greens ; preparation:Spoon out the egg yolks and put them into a large bowl, keeping the egg whites on the side. Mash the yolks with a fork and mix well with the crab meat, mayonnaise, relish and tabasco. Adjust seasoning as necessary. Spoon the mixture back into the egg whites, piling it up. Sprinkle the chives over the eggs. Arrange salad leaves on a plate and place the eggs on top. Chill for about 1 hour until ready to serve. ; name: clydes crab cakes courtesy of the tombs ; ingredients: jumbo lump crab meat, mayonnaise, water, old bay seasoning, dijon mustard, parsley, saltine crackers ; preparation:Pick the crab meat over to remove excess shells and cartilage. Combine the mayo, old bay, parsley, mustard and water until smooth. Add the mayo mixture to the crab meat and mix, being careful not to break up the lumps of crab meat. With your hands, break up the saltines into crumbs and mix into the crab mixture. Form into four patties and pan-fry, or broil the cakes until golden brown. ; name: barb s zucchini pancakes ; ingredients: zucchini, onion, bisquick, parmesan cheese, eggs, garlic powder, salt and pepper, canola oil ; preparation:Grate zucchini. Chop onion, add to zucchini. Add beaten eggs, bisquick, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Mix well. Fry as pancakes on hot greased griddle or skillet. Serve as a side dish. ; name: zucchini pizza boats ; ingredients: zucchini, tomato sauce, black olives, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Wash zucchini well, then slice lengthwise. Scoop out the zucchini flesh from each half using a spoon, leaving the halves about a centimeter thick. Save the scooped zucchini in a bow. Place the hollowed zucchini pieces on a baking sheet. Chop or mash the saved zucchini, then mix in the tomato sauce, bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, and italian seasoning. Refill the zucchini halves with the mixture, then top with mozzarella cheese and black olives. Place the tray in the oven for approximately 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and slightly browned. Since these are supposed to mimic pizza, you could use other toppings. The longer the zucchini is in the oven, the softer it gets, so if you want firmer zucchini, feel free to take them out of the oven sooner. ; name: baked crab and olive quesadillas ; ingredients: crabmeat, miracle whip, monterey jack cheese, pitted ripe olives, flour tortillas ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except tortillas. Spread 2 tablespoons of mixture onto each tortilla. Fold in half. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 8 minutes or until folden. Cut each into 4 wedges. ; name: zucchini and bacon casserole ; ingredients: zucchini, bacon, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Fry bacon leaving just enough grease to saute zucchini & tomatoes. Cook zucchini and tomatoes to desired doneness. Crumble cooked bacon into large pieces & add to zucchini-tomato mixture. Top with cheese. Let stand to melt. Now it is up to you if you mix the cheese in or just leave topped. Great the next day too. ; name: zucchini crab cakes from wynn ; ingredients: egg, mayonnaise, italian seasoning, old bay seasoning, onion, zucchini, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: easy apple pudding ; ingredients: apples, self raising flour, cinnamon, butter, sugar, egg ; preparation:Peel, core and slice apples into bite-size pieces. Wash and place them in a saucepan. Combine the dry ingredients with the egg and sprinkle the mixture on top of the apples. Melt butter and pour over the topping. Cover and heat the pan over medium heat for 15-20 minutes. Reduce heat and cook for 15 minutes. This yummy pudding can be served hot or cold. ; name: chocolate rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, milk, sugar, cocoa, salt, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Place cooked rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving. ; name: orange cocoa ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, water, milk, orange rind, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: chocolate mocha pudding ; ingredients: sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, cornstarch, cinnamon, instant coffee granules, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Combine sugar, cocoa, cornstarch, cinnamon and coffee in an 8 cup measure cup or bowl. Gradually stir in milk. Microwave on high 5 to 6 minutes or until it starts to boil and thicken slightly. Stir in butter and vanilla. Place plastic wrap on surface of pudding. Refrigerate at least 2 hours. Whisk until smooth. Serve in individual bowls or wine glasses. ; name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: sweet bread bread pudding ; ingredients: sweet bread, raisins, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Grease a 9x12 pan. Scald milk. Add sugar and butter. Mix until butter is melted. Cool. Break sweet bread into pieces. Spread apple pie filling on top of the sweet bread. Sprinkle raisins over the filling. Combine cooled milk mixture with beaten eggs. Pour liquid over the bread. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: chocolate pudding pops ; ingredients: reduced-fat milk, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, cornstarch, salt, egg yolk, vanilla extract, bittersweet chocolate ; preparation:Combine the first 6 ingredients in a medium saucepan over medium high heat, stirring with a whisk. Cook for 8 minutes or until thick and bubbly, stirring constantly. Remove pan from heat. Add vanilla extract, and cocoa, stirring until smooth. Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and place the bowl in an ice-filled bowl. Cover surface of pudding directly with plastic wrap, and cool completely. Spoon chocolate mixture evenly into 6 icepop molds. Top with lids, and insert craft sticks. Freeze 4 hours or until thoroughly frozen. ; name: chocolate orange pudding with cocoa sauce ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, self rising flour, vanilla, orange, zest of, orange juice, cocoa powder, water ; preparation:

name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, light corn syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: safari biscuits cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, milk, baking soda, golden syrup, vanilla, flour, sultana ; preparation:Put butter, sugar, milk, soda and syrup into a pot and melt. Add vanilla and cool slightly. Add flour and sultanas. Roll into balls and place on a greased baking tray. Flatten slightly. Bake at 180 for 10-12 mins. ; name: oatmeal treats ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, oil, evaporated milk, vanilla, oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in raisins and nuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: delicious oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, baking soda, boiling water, flour, rolled oats, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: simple no bake mountain bar cookies ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, milk, cocoa, quick-cooking oats, peanut butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients in sauce pan. Boil one minute. Remove from heat. Stir in oats. Add remaining ingredients. Drop onto wax paper and let cool. ; name: fiddle diddles ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, milk, cocoa, quick-cooking rolled oats, coconut, walnuts, salt, vanilla ; preparation:

name: goldy bear s honey gingersnaps ; ingredients: honey, butter, sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Set oven temp to 375f. Cream honey, butter, sugar and egg. Sift together and the flour, soda, salt, and spices. Chill one hour. Roll level tablespoons of dough into balls and place 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: gingerbread men dough ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, allspice, ginger, butter, brown sugar, egg ; preparation:Sift flour, soda, spices and salt. In a separate bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until creamy. Add egg and beat well. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, mixing well. Chill. Roll out on a floured board, and cut with gingerbread men cookie cutter. Decorate with raisins, candied fruit or small candies. Bake on a lightly greased cookie sheet at 325f, until browned. Decorate with icing after cooled. ; name: moist and spicy gingerbread squares low fat ; ingredients: margarine, light brown sugar, molasses, egg white, all-purpose flour, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, baking soda, salt, applesauce ; preparation:Beat margarine and sugar until well blended. Beat in molasses and egg white. Combine dry ingredients. Add to wet, alternately with applesauce mixing well after each addition. Bake in a 350 degree f oven in a greased 8 inch baking pan 25 to 30 minutes, or until toothpick in center comes out clean. Cool and cut into squares, frost if desired. ; name: baker baker ; ingredients: oats, flour, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, unsalted butter, braeburn apples, honey ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients in a bowl with cold butter. Mix with hands until mixture forms small clumps and appears sandy. Refrigerate. Cut a small layer off the bottom of the apples to create a level surface. Cut a cone out of the top of the apple, removing about an inch of the core and discard the top. With a melon baller, remove the remaining core and seeds but do not puncture the base. Place the apples in a pie dish, making sure the apples do not touch. Fill each apple with a teaspoon of honey. Spoon in oat mixture, packing lightly until overflowing slightly. Bake in the oven at 350f on the middle or top rack for 40 minutes or until a knife can stick in the side of the apple with little effort. Let stand ten minutes before serving. ; name: nick s banana bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, ginger, cinnamon, vegetable oil, water, vanilla, bananas ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour mix into bread pan. Bake at 350-400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour. ; name: sugar coated molasses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, molasses, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft. ; name: gingersnaps soft chewy ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, clove, ground ginger ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg. Stir in sifted, flour, salt and baking soda. Then cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. Dough will be soft and sticky. Roll, into walnut-sized balls and roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350f for 7 to 8 minutes. Cookie will flatten out while baking. ; name: my favourite gingerbread lebkuchen ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, treacle, eggs, plain flour, self raising flour, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, bicarbonate of soda ; preparation:

name: corn spoon bread ; ingredients: whole milk, fresh corn kernels, cornmeal, butter, fresh thyme leave, kosher salt, black pepper, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: corn and okra casserole ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, green pepper, bacon drippings, tomatoes, frozen okra, mexicorn whole kernel corn, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute onion, garlic and green pepper in bacon drippings. Add tomatoes, mixing well. Cook 1 minute. Stir in okra and corn. Season with salt and pepper. Spoon into baking dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. ; name: fried corn nuggets ; ingredients: corn, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine corn, lightly beaten egg yolks, flour, sugar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Beat egg whites with an electric mixer set at high speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes. Stir egg whites into corn mixture. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of corn batter into skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook until nuggets are browned, about 3 minutes per side. ; name: chicken and bacon casserole ; ingredients: lardons, olive oil, chicken, carrots, baby onions, garlic cloves, chicken stock, fresh thyme, parsley, potato ; preparation:Put the bacon into a small saucepan of cold water and bring to the boil. Simmer for three minutes, drain, and dry the bacon on kitchen paper. Heat a frying pan with two tablespoons of olive oil and saut the blanched bacon until golden and crisp. Remove to a casserole, add the chicken pieces to the pan, adding more oil if necessary. Saute the chicken until golden, and remove from the casserole. Saute the carrots, onions and garlic for a minute or so, in the same oil. Return the bacon and chicken to the pan and pour in the stock, adding a sprig of thyme. Simmer in a preheated oven at 160c for about 45 minutes, or until the chicken is tender. Skim any fat from the top of the casserole and sprinkle with chopped parsley to finish. Serve with mashed potatoes. ; name: mixed bean casserole ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, mushrooms, leek, olive oil, beans, kidney beans, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, parsnips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Fry onion, garlic, mushrooms and leek in a pan in the olive oil until softened. Rinse and drain mixed beans and kidney beans and add to pan. Add tomatoes and heat through. Combine the parmesan and the grated parsnip in a bowl and put aside. Place the bean mixture in an oven proof casserole dish. Cover with the parmesan and parsnip mixture and sprinkle over some olive oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: corn casserole from food network ; ingredients: fresh corn kernels, salt and black pepper, ground nutmeg, vegetable oil, onions, eggs, milk, aged white cheddar cheese, oil ; preparation:

name: sauteed broccoli cauliflower and mushrooms ; ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix cut-up broccoli and cauliflower, sliced mushrooms and minced garlic. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover and let stand an hour, if possible. Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes. ; name: creamy cauliflower pea medley ; ingredients: water, frozen cauliflower, frozen green peas, cucumber, ranch salad dressing, nonfat sour cream, dried dill weed ; preparation:Combine the first 3 ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover and cook 5 minutes. Drain well. Combine the cauliflower mixture and the remaining ingredients in a bowl, and toss well. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: lemon pepper veggies ; ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, fresh carrot, water, butter, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic powder ; preparation:In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the broccoli, cauliflower, carrots and water. Cover and microwave on high for 4-7 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain. Combine the rest of the ingredients. Drizzle over vegetables and toss to coat. ; name: italian mixed vegetables ; ingredients: california-blend frozen vegetables, water, reduced-fat italian salad dressing, salt, basil, oregano ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, bring vegetables and water to a boil. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Uncover. Cook and stir until liquid is almost absorbed. Add the salad dressing, salt, basil and oregano. Cook and stir until heated through. ; name: mediterranean cauliflower salad ; ingredients: cauliflower, red bell pepper, fresh parsley, greek olive, capers, wine vinegar, olive oil, dried oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam cauliflower florets until just tender. Refresh under cold water to stop the cooking process. In a bowl, combine cauliflower, pepper, parsley, olives and capers, toss lightly. Whisk together the vinegar, oil and oregano and pour over vegetables. Marinate in the refrigerator for two hours or even overnight. Serve cold. ; name: dee s cauliflower and seafood salad ; ingredients: cauliflower, imitation crabmeat, frozen peas, celery, miracle whip ; preparation:Break up the cauliflower into bite size pieces. Chop the crab meat into bite size pieces. Add the rest of ingredients. Chill and eat. You can put this mixture on chopped lettuce to make a larger salad also. ; name: orange scented broccoli cauliflower ; ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower, navel orange, salt, extra virgin olive oil, shallots, orange, juice of, pepper, scallions ; preparation:Bring a couple inches of water to a boil in a large skillet. Add the florets, orange rind and salt, cover and simmer until tender. About 6 minutes. Drain broccoli and cauliflower, remove rind and transfer to a platter or bowl. Return pan to heat, add extra virgin olive oil and heat over medium heat. Add shallots and cook until soft, about 3 to 4 minutes. Add broccoli & cauliflower and turn to coat. Squeeze the orange juice over the pan and toss veggies again. Season the orange scented broccoli & cauliflower with salt & pepper, to your taste. Garnish with sliced scallions. ; name: steamed vegetable medley ; ingredients: cauliflower florets, carrot, red onion, fresh mushrooms, margarine, lemon juice, dried basil, dried marjoram ; preparation:

name: hershey s homemade chocolate ice cream ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, condensed milk, chocolate milk, vanilla, semisweet chocolate ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar and mix well. Add condensed milk, chocolate milk, melted chocolate, and vanilla one ingredient at a time, stirring well after each addition. Mix until smooth. Pour directly into ice cream mixer or machine. For best results let ice cream freeze over night. ; name: honey puff ; ingredients: cream cheese, flour, milk, eggs, honey, vanilla, salt, baking powder, butter, powdered sugar ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, flour, milk, eggs, honey, vanilla, salt, and baking powder in a blender and process on high for 3-4 minutes or until well blended. Heat the butter in a 10-inch baking pan at 375 degrees until melted. Swirl to coat pan. Pour the cream cheese mixture into the prepared pan. Bake at 375 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until a knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Sprinkle baked puff with powdered sugar. ; name: alton brown s ice cream ; ingredients: vanilla sugar, egg yolks, half-and-half, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:In a medium sauce pan combine the half and half and heavy cream, stir over medium heat until just boiling. Blend the egg yokes and slowly add the sugar until all mixed. Temper in the heated milk mixture. Return to saucepan and over low heat bring mixture to 170 degrees. Move to chilled metal bowl. After slight cooling, add vanilla extract. Chill until mixture reaches 40 degrees. Add mixture to machine and add any additional flavorings. Enjoy. ; name: vanilla custard ice cream ; ingredients: whole milk, sugar, salt, egg yolks, heavy cream, vanilla extract ; preparation:Place milk in a small pan and heat over low heat until bubbles form, and milk becomes hot. Add sugar and salt, stirring to dissolve. Remove from heat and add 1-2 tbsp of the hot milk to the egg yolks, mixing well. Add more milk to eggs and bring it up to temperature. Pour egg mixture back into pan and continue to cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until it starts to thicken and reaches 160 degrees, about 10-12 minutes. Place the pan in a sink or basin full of ice water to cool down, continuing to stir. When custard is just barely warm, stir in the cream and vanilla. Refrigerate mixture until ready to use. Just prior to making, pour through strainer into the ice cream maker and follow your appliances instructions for operating. ; name: creamsicle ice cream ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, eggs, frozen orange juice concentrate, instant vanilla flavor pudding and pie filling ; preparation:Whip the cream until stiff. Add the sugar and continue whipping. Add the eggs once at a time, beating continuously. Add the orange juice and vanilla pudding, beat until smooth. Pour into ice cream container and freeze. ; name: cinnamon basil ice cream ; ingredients: milk, fresh basil, cinnamon stick, egg yolks, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Bring the milk to a simmer in a medium-sized saucepan. Stir in the basil and cinnamon stick, cover, and remove from heat. Steep 15 minutes, then pour the milk through a sieve, pressing down on the solids to extract all the liquid. Whisk together the egg yolks and sugar in a large mixing bowl. Whisk the cinnamon-basil flavored milk. Pour it back into the saucepan and stir constantly with a rubber spatula over medium heat just until the custard thickens enough to coat the back of a spoon but no further or it may curdle. Pour the custard back into the mixing bowl and cool, either over ice or in the refrigerator, until the custard is very cold. Whisk in the heavy cream. Freeze in an ice cream maker. Store in a covered container in the freezer until firm enough to scoop. ; name: chocolate cherry breakfast smoothie ; ingredients: sweet cherries, vanilla yogurt, nonfat milk, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes, honey ; preparation:In the jar of a blender, combine the cherries, yogurt, milk, cocoa, and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: honey ginger ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, brown sugar, honey, gingerroot, egg yolks ; preparation:

name: hot chocolate with pink peppermint whipped cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, peppermint candies, powdered sugar, peppermint candy, whole milk, salt, semisweet chocolate, creme de cacao, instant coffee granules, vanilla extract ; preparation:This recipe can also be made with white chocolate. Simply substitute white chocolate and leave out the coffee. Beat the cream, pulverized peppermints and sugar untill stiff peaks form. Pipe or spoon onto a parchment paper lined baking sheet, sprinkle with the crushed peppermints, and freeze until firm, about 20 minutes. Heat the milk and salt for the hot chocolate in a saucepan over medium heat until steam begins to rise. Whisk in the remaining ingredients until smooth. Ladle into mugs and top with a rosette of frozen whipped cream. Doubling the whipped cream will give you quite a few rosettes to keep in the freezer until needed. Store them in an airtight container and try to use them within 2 or 3 weeks. ; name: fiesta hot chocolate ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, dark brown sugar, milk, cloves, cinnamon stick, powdered sugar, vanilla, whipped cream, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Mix cocoa and flour in 2-quart saucepan. Stir in brown sugar, milk, cloves, and 1 stick cinnamon. Heat just to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Remove cloves and cinnamon. Stir in powdered sugar and vanilla. Beat with molinillo, wire whisk or hand beater until foamy. Pour into 4 cups or mugs. Serve with whipped cream and cinnamon sticks. ; name: chocolatey hot cocoa for one ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, marshmallows, whipped cream ; preparation:In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar, crushing any lumps. First by approximately tablespoons, and then in a slow steady stream, stir in the milk. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows. ; name: strong hot chocolate ; ingredients: whole milk, heavy cream, vanilla bean, unsweetened cocoa powder, dark brown sugar, bittersweet chocolate, fleur de sel, marshmallows ; preparation:Off the heat, in a 1-quart saucepan, combine the milk and cream. Split the vanilla bean lengthwise and use the. Whisk the cocoa powder and brown sugar into the milk, then place the saucepan over medium heat and whisk for 5 to 7 minutes, or until frothy and simmering. Place the chocolate in a heatproof bowl. Remove and discard the vanilla pod from the milk mixture, then pour the mixture over the chocolate. Add the salt and whisk until the chocolate is smooth. Divide the hot chocolate among cups and top each with 2 marshmallows or a dollop of whipped cream. Can be cooled, tightly covered and refrigerated up to 3 days. ; name: columbian gold ; ingredients: strong coffee, half-and-half cream, coffee liqueur, chocolate liqueur, cinnamon schnapps, whipping cream, fine sugar, chocolate ; preparation:Make 1 cup of strong coffee, keep warm. In a small pot add half and half cream with chocolate and coffee liquers. Heat on low about 3 minutes, whisking constantly to blend flavours. Pour cinnamon liquer and white sugar onto small plates. Rim your glass first in cinnamon liquer and then dip your glass into the white sugar to coat rim evenly. Reserving any left over liquer and sugar for garnishing. Add warm liquer mixture to coffee and stir. Pour the coffee & liquer mixture into the prepared glass and top with whipped cream. Slowly drizzle the reserved cinnamon liquer over the whipped cream and then sprinkle with sugar and chocolate flakes. ; name: hot chocolate pudding ; ingredients: granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, vanilla ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, mix sugar, cocoa powder, flour and salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled. ; name: hot chocolate espresso ; ingredients: hot coffee, sugar, cream, unsweetened cocoa, whipped cream, milk chocolate, cinnamon stick ; preparation:In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick. ; name: aztec hot chocolate ; ingredients: skim milk, sugar, honey, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground red pepper, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla extract, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: leftover turkey ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, turkey, water, turkey gravy mix, milk, flour, salt ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: teriyaki turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, scallions, carrot, egg, teriyaki sauce, breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the turkey, scallions, carrot, egg, teriyaki sauce and bread crumbs. Blend well. Using a 2-ounce scoop, form meatballs with wet hands and place on a baking pan lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Sprinkle meatballs with sesame seeds and spray with vegetable oil. Roast in a 375f oven for 20 minutes or until golden brown on the outside and cooked through. ; name: turkey meatball and escarole soup ; ingredients: carrots, chicken broth, escarole, ground turkey, onion, eggs, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a 3 quart or larger slow cooker, combine the carrots, broth and escarole. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours. In a medium bowl, combine the turkey, onion, eggs, bread crumbs, grated parmesan, salt and pepper. Mix well and make 1 inch meatballs and carefully add to the slow cooker at the 4 hour mark. Cover and cook 4 hours longer, or until the meat and veggies are cooked through. Serve sprinkled with the additional cheese. I would separate the leaves from the stems of the swiss chard and add them first.
