Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with lemon and oil ; ingredients: green beans, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh lemon juice, fresh lemon zest ; preparation:Cook beans in a 5-quart pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest. ; name: grecian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, sweet onion, olive oil, tomatoes, dried oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Cook for 3-4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. In a small skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minutes longer or until heated through. ; name: green beans with herbs ; ingredients: green beans, water, butter, onion, celery, garlic, rosemary, basil ; preparation:Place beans and water in sauce pan and bring to a boil. Cook for 6-8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and return to pan. Add remaining ingredients to pan. Cover and cook for 4-6 minutes or until vegetables are tender. ; name: green bean medley ; ingredients: fresh green beans, carrots, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, seasoning salt, garlic, white pepper ; preparation:Steam or cook carrots and green beans in boiling water. Cook until tender, but still firm. Melt butter over medium heat. Saute onions and mushrooms until almost tender. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 3 minutes. Stir in green beans, carrots, seasoned salt, garlic, and white pepper. Cover and cook five minutes on low heat. ; name: green bean saute ; ingredients: fresh green beans, canola oil, yellow onion, salt, black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: hot chicken salad most requested ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, miracle whip, cheddar cheese, water chestnuts, onion flakes, celery, lemon juice, salt & pepper, potato chips ; preparation:Cut chicken breasts into 2-inch squares. Boil chicken chunks 5 minutes. Drain. Mix all ingredients. Spread into greased 13x9-inch pan. Top with crushed chips. Bake at 350f for 25 - 30 minutes until cheese melts & chips brown. ; name: asian chicken salad ; ingredients: ramen noodles, cooking oil, chicken breasts, sesame ginger salad dressing, ground ginger, celery, carrot, cashews, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles until just tender, about 3 minutes. Pan fry cubed chicken with oil. When the pasta is done, drain it, add the chicken. Mix in celery, carrots, peas and nuts. Wisk the dressing with the ginger and coat chicken and vegetables with the dressing. ; name: thalhimers chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, white pepper, salt ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine chicken, celery, lemon juice and mayonnaise. Stir to blend. Add pepper and salt and mix thoroughly. Chill before serving. 8 servings. ; name: russian chicken salad ; ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, cucumbers, hard-boiled eggs, onion, red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, tomatoes ; preparation:Combine chicken breast, cucumber, eggs, onion and potatoes in large bowl. In small bowl combine sour cream and mayo. Blend chicken mixture with the dressing mixture. Place on a couple leaves of romaine or boston lettuce and garnish with tomatoes. Enjoy. ; name: holiday chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, fat-free mayonnaise, paprika, dried cranberries, celery, green onions, green bell pepper, pecans, seasoning salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: lentil chili soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, fresh garlic, onions, frozen carrots, dry lentils, low-sodium v8 juice, water, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano ; preparation:Pour the vegetable oil into a large cooking pot or dutch oven. Over medium-high heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve. ; name: lentil and ginger soup ; ingredients: red lentils, water, carrots, ginger, miso ; preparation:Rinse lentils and add to the pan with water. Bring to the boil and then reduce to a simmer for 15 minutes. Spoon off any scum or froth from the surface. Add the carrot and ginger and continue to cook for a further 15 minutes. Mix the miso paste in half a cup of water until smooth and pour into the soup. Return to the boil then turn off. Serve immediately. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: jacob s middle eastern lentil soup ; ingredients: dried lentils, water, olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, ground cumin, ground red pepper, salt, lemon juice ; preparation:Rinse lentils, discarding and stones, or blemished lentils. Drain. Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until hot. Add onion and bell pepper, cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Add cumin and ground red pepper and stir 1 minute. Pour in the 4 cups of water and the lentils. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 20 minutes. Stir in salt and simmer 10 minutes more or until lentils are tender. Stir in lemon juice and serve. ; name: ham and bean soup ; ingredients: white beans, black beans, cooked ham, carrots, onion, herbs, pepper, low sodium chicken broth, fresh kale, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In crock pot, combine beans, ham, carrots, onion and pepper. Stir in undrained tomatoes and broth. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Stir in kale or spinach just before serving. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: delicious and easy lentils ; ingredients: canadian bacon, butter, carrot, onion, water, lentils, salt, marjoram, dried parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Lightly brown the canadian bacon over med heat. Add butter, onion, and carrots and saute for 5 minutes. Add water, lentils, salt and herbs. Cover and simmer on low for 20 minutes. Uncover and simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: winter vegetable soup ; ingredients: light olive oil, garlic cloves, leeks, kumara, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, chicken stock, pumpkin ; preparation:Heat oil and a large pan and cook the garlic and leek, stirring until the leek is soft. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer uncovered for about 40 minutes, making sure the vegetables are tender. Blend or process the mixture in batches until pured. Return soup to pan and stir over heat until hot. This goes well with cheesy chive muffins for a lunch. ; name: my mom s lentil soup ; ingredients: lentils, celery ribs, onion, garlic, fresh pork hocks, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: mashed potato spinach casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt, pepper, butter, milk, frozen spinach, cheddar cheese, dill seed, chives ; preparation:Peel, cook and mash potatoes. Add sour cream, salt, pepper. Mix in enough milk to bring it to your favorite mashed potato consistency. Add spinach. Place in casserole dish and top with grated cheddar cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20-30 minutes. We like to serve this with corn, which usually ends up mixed in with all the rest. ; name: savory egg casserole ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, cream, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: potato egg casserole a la hot potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, parsley, mustard, fresh ground black pepper, low-fat sour cream, bacon, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain and cool. Combine potatoes, eggs, bacon, parsley and spring onions in a casserole dish. Combine sour cream, mustard and black pepper and then mix through potato mixture, if mixture needs more moisture then add a little milk. Cover and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes, then sprinkle with cheese and grill until golden. ; name: creamy cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: green chilie squash casserole ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, biscuit mix, green chilies, onion, garlic clove, cheddar cheese, zucchini ; preparation:Combine eggs, oil, and biscuit mix. Stir in chillies, onion, garlic and half of the cheese. Stir in squash. Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake 5 minutes more. ; name: the best baked potato casserole ever ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, pepper, bacon, sour cream, cheddar cheese, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish. ; name: christie s baked onion casserole ; ingredients: butter, sweet onions, potato chips, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 2 quart casserole dish. In a large pot, cover onions with water. Bring to a boil and cook until onions are just crisp tender, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and drain well. Layer onion pieces, potato chips and cheese in prepared dish, beginning with onions & ending with cheese. Mix soup and milk together. Stir in cayenne pepper. Pour soup mixture over the top of the cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until onions are completely tender. ; name: cheesy potato and onion casserole ; ingredients: potato, tomatoes, onions, herbs, margarine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, milk, plain flour, cheese ; preparation:

name: red ruby strawberry sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, orange juice concentrate, fresh strawberries, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and cornstarch. Stir in orange juice concentrate until smooth. Add strawberries. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Cool. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: easy and fast caramel bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, skor candy bars, caramel sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a big bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan. ; name: non alcoholic hard sauce ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, salt, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Sift powdered sugar and set aside. Beat butter until soft. Gradually beat in the sugar until well blended. Beat in salt and vanilla. Beat in heavy cream. When sauce is very smooth chill thoroughly. Serve. ; name: old fashioned butterscotch sauce ; ingredients: light brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, evaporated milk, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine sugar, syrup, and butter. Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until sugar has dissolved and mixture comes to a full rolling boil. Allow to boil, without stirring, for exactly 1 minute. Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. In another bowl or large measuring cup, combine evaporated milk, baking soda, and vanilla. Stir into the slightly cooled sauce. Pour into jars, cover, and refrigerate. Place jar in a pan of warm water to reheat. ; name: fudge dessert fondue sauce ; ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, butter, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Heat milk and sugar to rolling boil, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Add chocolate, stirring until melted. Beat over heat until smooth. Remove from heat. Blend in butter, vanilla, and salt. ; name: brandied strawberry sauce ; ingredients: honey, orange juice, brandy, strawberries, cornstarch ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat honey, orange juice and brandy to boil. Reduce heat and add strawberries. Simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in corn starch. Remove from heat and let cool. Refrigerate before use. Use as a topping. ; name: peach sauce for the microwave fat free ; ingredients: water, white sugar, molasses, lemon juice, vanilla, fresh peaches ; preparation:Peel, pit, and slice the peaches. In a microwave safe dish with a lid, mix all the ingredients but the peaches. Microwave on high for 6 minutes or until boiling. Add the peaches and let it sit. Serve cold. ; name: fruit plate with marshmallow sauce ; ingredients: sugar, hot water, light corn syrup, egg whites, vanilla, salt, mayonnaise, orange rind ; preparation:

name: vanilla fruit dip ; ingredients: light cream cheese, brown sugar, lemon juice, vanilla essence ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and sugar together until well combined and smooth. Blend in lemon juice and vanilla essence. Spoon into a serving dish. Refrigerate until needed. Serve with any fruit you choose. ; name: baked seafood dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, green onion, white wine, seafood, swiss cheese, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: crabmeat dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, prepared horseradish, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine everything in a small bowl that can be put in the oven or toaster oven. Stir together until fairly smooth. Place in the oven at 350 degrees for 30 minutes until edges are brown. Let cool for 30 minutes and serve with triscuits. Best served warm. ; name: philly cream cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, bacon, green onion, cracker ; preparation:Combine cream cheese and mayonnaise. Mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Chill for at least 2 hours. Serve with crackers. ; name: savory pumpkin dip ; ingredients: bread, cooked pumpkin, light cream cheese, mexican seasoning, garlic powder, pumpkin pie spice, deli ham, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, black olives ; preparation:Beat together the pumpkin, cream cheese, mexican seasoning blend, garlic powder, and pumpkin pie spice -- test seasoning and adjust to your liking. Gently stir in diced bell peppers, the ham, and the olives to combine. Cover and chill until ready to serve. Before serving, cut off the top of your round loaf of bread and scoop out the middle, forming a bread bowl and lid and fill the cavity with the dip. Serve dip with assorted fresh veggies, crackers, chunks of torn bread, etc. ; name: pepperoncini cream cheese dip ; ingredients: pepperoncini peppers, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Position knife blade in food processor bowl. Add first 3 ingredients. Pulse several times or until smooth. Stir in sour cream. Cover and chill until ready to serve. Serve with crackers. ; name: party chicken dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, white chicken meat, seasoning salt, onion, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together except for the parmesan cheese. Spread mixture in a shallo, medium-sized, ovenproof dish. Sprinkle the parmesan cheese on top. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 30 minutes. Serve warm with crackers along side. ; name: black olive dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, milk, black olives ; preparation:

name: chicken biscuit bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, milk, dried thyme leaves, pepper, cooked chicken, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning. ; name: budget biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, rolled oats, golden syrup, baking soda, water ; preparation:Melt the butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add golden syrup. Stir until golden syrup is dissolved. Stir in sugar, rolled oats and flour. In a small bowl or cup, dissolve baking soda in water and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put teaspoon lots onto a greased oven tray. Bake at 170 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden. Store in an airtight container. ; name: gingernut biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, golden syrup, flour, ground ginger, baking soda ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream the butter and the sugar. Add the golden syrup and the dry ingredients. Mix everything together and roll into little balls. Put onto a greased baking tray, pressing the balls down very slightly with a fork. Bake at 350f and 180c for 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold. ; name: chocolate crispy biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, rice bubbles, self raising flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack. ; name: bisquick chocolate chip cookies just 6 ingredients ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, bisquick, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream the shortening and brown sugar together in a mixing bowl with an electric mixer. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in the bisquick until fully incorporated. Carefully beat in the chocolate chips. Grease a cookie sheet with cooking spray, and pour on tablespoons of dough about 2 inches apartl. Bake at 375f for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown at the edges. ; name: sesame seed cheese biscuits ; ingredients: biscuit mix, sharp cheddar cheese, sesame seeds, half and half milk, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Combine the biscuit mix, cheese, sesame seed and half and half in a bowl and mix well. Shape into balls and place on a greased baking sheet, flaten slightly with palm of hand. Brush with the melted butter. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: my own best cheddar drop biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, garlic powder, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, butter, italian seasoning ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine first 7 ingredients in medium-sized bowl just til all is moistened. Drop heaping tbls. Of dough onto ungreased baking sheet making 10 mounds. Melt butter with rest of ingredients, and spoon on top of each biscuit. Bake for 8-10 minutes or til golden brown. My oven takes 10 minutes. ; name: breakfast biscuits brekkie bix ; ingredients: orange marmalade, butter, bisquick baking mix, cold water ; preparation:

name: oatmeal treats ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, oil, evaporated milk, vanilla, oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in raisins and nuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set. ; name: buttermilk oatmeal bread ; ingredients: fast-rising active dry yeast, water, bread flour, rolled oats, sugar, salt, unsalted butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Sprinkle the yeast over the water in a small bowl. Do not stir. Set aside for at least 5 minutes to proof to a foamy consistency. Stir together the flour, oats, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Add the butter, buttermilk and yeast mixture and beat with an electric mixer until the ingredients are well blended. Turn out the dough onto a floured surface and knead for about 5 minutes or until the dough is smooth and elastic. Lightly oil a large bowl and transfer the dough to the bowl. Cover with a tea towel and let the dough rise in a warm place until it is doubled in size, about 1 hour. Pun the dough down and let it rise again, covered with a tea towel, for 45 minutes. Preheat oven to 350 and oil a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Punch the dough down again and place it in the loaf pan. Bake for 35-40 minutes or till the loaf pulls away from the side of the pan and loaf sounds hollow when you thump it. ; name: oatmeal honey cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg and water. Sift together the dry ingredients then stir in the oats. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and mix. Add any additional ingredients drop by heaping teaspoonsful onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: oaties ; ingredients: sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, cocoa, rolled oatmeal, coconut ; preparation:Melt together sugar, butter and milk. Take off heat and mix in vanilla and cocoa until smooth. Stir in oatmeal and coconut. Drop by spoonfuls on waxed paper or foil. Chill. Can also be frozen. ; name: no fuss chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, quick oats, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes. ; name: big blast oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, rolled oats, sugar, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, unsalted butter, pure vanilla extract, egg white, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a baking sheet with parchment paper & set aside. Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a medium bowl and stir with a fork to blend. Add butter and vanilla. Blend with fork until moist crumbs form. Add the egg white and beat with fork until stiff dough forms. Use your hands to mix in the raisins. Divide dough in half and place halves four inches apart on baking sheet. Bake until lightly browned. Remove sheet from oven & transfer the parchment to a cooling rack to cool for 15 minutes. Transfer cookies to wire rack and cool completely. ; name: chocolate oat delights ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, vanilla, flaked coconut, instant oats ; preparation:Combine sugar, cocoa, butter and milk in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add vanilla. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and oats. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper. Chill. ; name: easy oatmeal favorites ; ingredients: butter, flour, sugar, baking soda, oatmeal ; preparation:

name: chicken with orange and cranberry sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, chicken broth, orange peel, dry white wine, dried fruit, dried cranberries, orange juice, cornstarch, water, green onion ; preparation:Place frozen breasts in 12 inch frying pan and add all ingredients except cornstarch, water, and onions. Bring to boil over medium high heat. Reduce heat and simmer until meat is no longer pink in center of thickest part - about 20 minutes total. Transfer chicken to platter and keep warm. Boil pan juices over high heat, uncovered, 3 or 4 minutes. Mix cornstarch with water and add to sauce. Stirring until it boils. Moisten chicken with sauce and serve over rice. Sprinkle chicken with minced green onions. ; name: crock pot hoisin chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, hoisin sauce, plum sauce, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, lime, juice of, cornstarch, salt and pepper, fresh garlic ; preparation:Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the chicken to the mixture. Coat well. Put all ingredients in the slow cooker. Cook for 5-6 hours, or until chicken is tender. Serve with rice. ; name: chili citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, jalapeno jelly ; preparation:In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken. ; name: grilled ginger chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, liquid honey, fresh ginger, garlic, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir soy sauce, lime juice, honey, ginger, garlic and tobasco. If you want this as a marinade, make this several hours in advance, pour into a ziploc bag, add chicken and marinate in fridge for several hours shaking often. Alternatively, you can brush both sides of the chicken after making the sauce for a quick meal. Lightly oil grill and then heat bbq to medium. Bbq with lid closed, turning and basting halfway through with remaining marinade. Remember not to baste chicken before taking off grill since raw chicken was in it. Make sure the baste is fully cooked before removing from grill. Grill for 12- 16 minutes until juices run clear. ; name: crock pot lemon garlic chicken and wild rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic cloves, wild rice, lemon juice, water, fresh parsley ; preparation:Season the chicken breasts generously with salt and pepper. Place the chicken breasts in the bottom of a slow cooker. Add the garlic and rice. Add the lemon juice to the water and stir. Pour this mixture over the rice and chicken. Stir once to coat. Place the lid on the slow cooker and set on low for 8 hours. To plate, place a serving of the rice on each plate and top with 1 chicken breast. Garnish with fresh parsley sprigs. ; name: spicy citrus chicken ; ingredients: water, onion, frozen orange juice, ketchup, garlic cloves, cinnamon, hot sauce, salt, chicken ; preparation:Place ingredients in a zip top bag and refrigerate for 4-6 hours. Heat grill and cook meat. Brush with marinate while cooking. Bring marinade to a boil. Thicken slightly and serve with the meat. ; name: crock pot herbed chicken and shrimp ; ingredients: salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, onion, tomato sauce, white wine, garlic clove, dried basil, medium shrimp ; preparation:Combine salt and pepper and rub over the chicken pieces. In a skillet, brown chicken on all sides in butter. Transfer chicken to crock pot. In a bowl combine the onion, tomato sauce, wine or broth, garlic and basil and pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the shrimp. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. ; name: crock pot citrus ginger chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken, orange marmalade, lime juice, crushed pineapple, soy sauce, dijon mustard, gingerroot, cayenne pepper, minced garlic clove, sugar ; preparation:

name: fruity bread pudding for two ; ingredients: stale bread, apple, dried cranberries, egg, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, milk, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a lightly greased 2 cup baking dish, toss together the bread cubes, apple and dried fruit. In a small bowl, whisk together the egg, sugar and vanilla. In a small saucepan, heat the milk with the butter just until steaming. Gradually whisk into the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream. Pour over the bread mixture. Let stand for 5 minutes. Press gently to moisten the bread evenly. Sprinkle with cinnamon to taste. Bake at 350 degrees f for about 30 minutes or just until puffed and a knife inserted in the centre comes out clean. Broil for about 2 minutes or until golden and crusty. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: bread pudding for 2 ; ingredients: challah, golden raisins, eggs, nonfat milk, brown sugar, vanilla, ground cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Spray two 6 to 7 oz ramekins with non-stick cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cube bread and measure out 1 cup of cubes, place cubes in prepared ramekins and divided the raisins or blueberries between the two. In a small dish, beat together the milk, egg or egg substitute, stir in brown sugar, cinnamon and vanilla. Mixing well. Pour the mixture evenly over the bread cubes and drizzle with melted butter. Place on a cookie sheet, just in case it cooks over, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a knife inserted near center comes our clean. Serve warm. ; name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: chocolate banana bread puddings ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, bananas, milk, eggs, pure vanilla extract, white bread, milk chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes. ; name: summer peach pudding dessert ; ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, flour, salt, margarine, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving. ; name: apple bread pudding ; ingredients: butter, baking apples, sugar, white wine, bread, light cream, eggs, orange zest ; preparation:

name: hamburger in oven ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onions, frozen french fries, salt and pepper ; preparation:Divide meat into 6-8 equal parts and make into patties. Season to taste. Place on foil in large baking pan and arrange onion slices on top of each patty. Place fries around them. Wrape foil tightly and bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: beef pot pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, beef gravy, frozen mixed vegetables, worcestershire sauce, cornstarch, sliced mushrooms, roast beef ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Prepare pie crusts as directed on package for 2 crust pie using a 9 in pan. In large saucepan combine gravy, and cornstarch. Add frozen mixxed vegetables, mushrooms, worcestershire sauce and mix well. Cook over med-high heat until bubbly. Stir in the roast beef. Pour into pie crust lined pan. Top with the second crust and flute. Cut decorations as you like but at least put several slits into top crust to allow steam to escape. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. ; name: baked beans and hamburger casserole ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, ground beef, onion, ketchup, salt and pepper, yellow mustard, butter, sugar, pork and beans ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion. Drain. Remove from heat. Add all other ingredients and stir well. Place in a casserole dish and bake, covered, at 325 for 45 minutes. ; name: stuffed hamburgers ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, onion, eggs, sugar, soy sauce, water, garlic clove, msg, ginger ; preparation:Combine ground beef with remaining ingredients. Mix well. Shape into 6 patties or 3 larger steaks. Broil 4 to 5 inches from heat for 10 minutes, turning once. These burgers can also be pan grilled. ; name: dressed up burger patties ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, egg, onion, beef broth, fresh mushrooms, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. ; name: beefy turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, lemon juice, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add more bouillon if you like a stronger beef flavor. Let it sit for about 15 minutes to soak all the flavor. Take wax paper, parchment paper or foil and cut 12 square shaped pieces. Lay the wax paper down on the counter, and make a patty from the meat and place on top, layer another sheet and patty up to 2 patties. I made 12 patties, but you can make bigger ones than i did. Place remaining patties and wax paper in a gallon sized freezer bag. Freeze nicely for up to a month. Pull them out as needed. Great grilled or even just placed in the broiler. Cooking time is about 10-15 minutes. ; name: beef gravy ; ingredients: beef round steak, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water, cornstarch, cooking oil, mushroom ; preparation:In 6-qt stockpot, in 2 t hot oil, brown meat on all sides. Stir in mushroom soup, onion soup mix, mushrooms and 1 cup water. Cover. Cook 45 minutes or until meat is tender. Stir together cornstarch and cup water until smooth. Gradually stir into gravy mixture. Cook until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly. Excellent served with rice and biscuits. ; name: hamburger pudding ; ingredients: ground beef, salt, worcestershire sauce, onion gravy mix, biscuit mix, milk, brown gravy mix, hot water ; preparation:

name: sweet and tangy sloppy joes ; ingredients: ground beef, white onion, tomato sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, soy sauce, orange, juice of, cider vinegar, dry mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread. ; name: my ground cherry ketchup ; ingredients: cape gooseberries, onions, apples, bell peppers, white vinegar, white sugar, pickling spices, black pepper ; preparation:Mince the onions. Cut green and red mild peppers into pieces as big as a stamp. Pass the spices and the black pepper through the blender to obtain a spice powder. Peel, take away the core and cut the apples in 1 inch pieces. Peel and wash the ground cherries thoroughly. Mix all the ingredients in a big thick cooking pot and bring to a boil, then reduce to medium heat. Let cook until the liquid acquire a syrupy consistency, stirring often to prevent sticking at the bottom of the pot. Pour into sterilized mason jars and close the lids. Verify that the jars are vacuum-sealed. ; name: grammy s bbq sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, white vinegar, onions, garlic, dried mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Toss all ingredients into a pot. Cook over medium heat and bring to slow boil then reduce heat to lower setting and continue cooking for about 15 to 30 min longer. Best if used on ribs or chicken. Can use this sauce if baking or bbq. Usually, depending on the qty i am cooking, i have to double or triple this recipe. ; name: sweet hot mustard ; ingredients: dry mustard, sugar, vinegar, salt, egg, miracle whip ; preparation:Mix dry mustard and vinegar and let stand overnight in a closed container. I use a glass mason jar and lid. The next day, in a glass saucepan beat egg. Mix in sugar, salt and mustard mixture. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly with wire whisk, until mixture thickens and just begins to bubble. Take off heat. Let cool approximately 30 minutes. Then stir in miracle whip. Keep in a sealed container in the refrigerator. Will keep in the refrigerator for up to two months. Great sandwich spread. It also works well as a dip for sausage or pepperoni sticks at a party. ; name: tangy barbecue sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, celery, yellow onions, ketchup, fresh lemon juice, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add celery and onion and cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients and whisk together. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: ww crispy barbecued sweet potatoes ; ingredients: ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red wine vinegar, yellow mustard, fresh ground pepper, sweet potato ; preparation:Spray the grill rack with nonstick spray. Prepare the grill for medium-hot fire. Combine the ketchup, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, mustard, and pepper in small bowl. Mix well. Brush the potato slices on both sides with the ketchup mixture. Grill the potatoes 5 inches from heat, turning frequently and brushing with the remaining ketchup mixture, until browned on the outside and tender when pierced with a barbecue fork, about 8 minutes. ; name: sweet and sour chambord sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, scallions, garlic, chicken stock, chambord raspberry liquor, rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, ground black pepper, cornstarch ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepot. Add scallions, garlic and ginger, and cook for 20 seconds. Do not brown. Add chicken stock, chambord, vinegar, soy sauce, honey and pepper, and cook over low heat for two minutes. Stir in cornstarch to thicken and cook for an additional two minutes. Strain through fine mesh strainer if desired. ; name: dees sweet and sour sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, cider vinegar, orange juice, pineapple juice, wine vinegar, sugar, mustard, cornstarch, water ; preparation:

name: wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: pumpkin pie bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, salt, white sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, pumpkin puree, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving. ; name: honey buttermilk cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little. ; name: honey sweet cornbread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, margarine, sugar, honey, eggs, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: english muffin bread ; ingredients: flour, yeast, sugar, baking soda, milk, water, salt, cornmeal ; preparation:Combine flour, yeast, sugar, salt and soda in a large bowl. Heat together milk and water until very warm. Add dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in remaining flour to make a stiff batter. Spoon into 2 loaf pans that have been greased and sprinkled with cornmeal. Sprinkle cornmeal on top. Cover and let stand in warm place for 45 minutes. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes. ; name: sunny cornbread muffins ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, canola oil, whole kernel corn ; preparation:In large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in corn. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 400 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm. ; name: rustic oatmeal cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, oatmeal, baking powder, salt, eggs, margarine, milk, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: cornmeal bread ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, canola oil, water ; preparation:

name: brhuberry pie ; ingredients: double crust, rhubarb, fresh blueberries, sugar, flour, nutmeg, salt, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Line 9 inch pie pan with pastry. In large bowl combine all filling ingredients except butter and toss lightly. Spoon filling into crust lined pan. Cut butter into small pieces and dot top of filling. Top with second crust, seal edges, and flute. Cut 4 slits in top of crust. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. ; name: blueberry cream cheese pie ; ingredients: pastry shells, blueberries, sugar, cornstarch, water, butter, lemon juice, cream cheese, whipped cream ; preparation:Spread softened cream cheese unto bottom of pie shell. Mix cornstarch with water and stir until dissolved. Combine 2 cups of berries, cornstarch liquid, sugar, butter and lemon juice in a medium saucepan. Slowly bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Let boil for one minute stirring constantly. Let cool slightly. Pour into pie shell and let cool. Top with more fresh berries. Serve with whipped cream. ; name: beautiful berry pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shell, kiwi fruits, blueberries, strawberries, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes. ; name: cran apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch double-crust pie shells, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, tart apples, butter, sugar, cinnamon, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: rustic crunchy apple pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, apples, unbaked pie shell, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon. Roll apple slices in the crumb mixture. Arrange apples in unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture over top of apples. Pour melted butter evenly over the top of the apples. Bake for 1 hour. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice-cream. ; name: blueberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, blueberry pie filling, non-dairy whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Combine cream cheese, sugar and eggs in a small bowl. Beat until fluffy. Place crust on baking sheet. Pour mixture into crust. Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven. Cool. Spread blueberry filling on top. Garnish with whipped topping. Chill 3 hours. ; name: cranberry white chocolate nut pie ; ingredients: dried cranberries, brandy, pie crust, butter, sugar, eggs, salt, walnuts, flour, white baking bar ; preparation:In a small bowl combine dried cranberries and brandy. Cover and chill at least 1 hour. Drain and reserve 1 tablespoons brandy. Preheat oven to 325. Prepare pastry and line a 9 inches pie plate. In a medium bowl wisk together butter, sugar, eggs, and salt. Stir in walnuts, flour and chopped baking bars until just combined. Stir in drained cranberries and 1 tablespoons brandy. Spoon into crust lined pie plate. Bake for 65 minutes, loosely covering pie with foil the last 30 minutes of baking. Cool on rack. ; name: blueberry crumb pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shell, fresh blueberries, sugar, flour, cinnamon, orange juice, brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: spicy country pancakes ; ingredients: milk, brown sugar, salt, oil, yeast, water, eggs, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Scald milk. Add sugar, salt, and oil. Cool to lukewarm. Dissolve yeast in water. Combine yeast mixture, eggs, and milk mixture. Sift flour and spices. Add to liquid mixture. Beat until smooth. Cover and let stand one hour or more in a warm place. Batter will be light and bubbly. Stir down batter. Bake on greased griddle. ; name: all in one breakfast ; ingredients: english muffins, bulk pork sausage, eggs, sour cream, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In the bottom of a greased 3 quart rectangular baking dish, arrange muffin halves in the bottom. Overlap muffins as neccesary to make them fit well. Set aside. Using a large skillet, cook sausage until brown, drain. In a large bowl whisk the eggs. Add sausage, sour cream, and chilies and mix until well combined. Pour egg mixture over the muffins and press lightly to thoroughly moisten the muffins. Sprinkle with cheese, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight. Bake in a 375 degree oven uncovered for 35 to 40 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Prep and cook time does not include chilling time. ; name: overnight eggnog french toast ; ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sugar, nutmeg, vanilla, rum extract, french bread, powdered sugar ; preparation:Grease two 15x10 inch baking pans. In a large bowl combine the eggs, half-and-half, sugar, nutmeg, vanilla and rum extract. Beat until well blended arrange bread slices in greased baking pans. Pour egg mixture over the bread in the pans. Lift and move bread slices until all egg mixture is absorbed. Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight or freeze up to 1 week. Heat oven to 500 degrees. Remove pans from refrigerator or freezer. Remove foil. Bake one pan at a time for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. ; name: company breakfast bake ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with frozen hash browns. Cover hash browns with sausage. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir together the remaining ingredients. Pour this mixture over everything. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving. ; name: make ahead breakfast ; ingredients: sausage, bread, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, mustard ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet and drain well. Grease 13 x 9 inch casserole dish. Line dish with bread, then top with cheese and sausage. In bowl, combine eggs, milk, and seasonings. Beat well and pour into casserole. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, bake casserole at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: cheesecake for breakfast omelette ; ingredients: butter, eggs, sour cream, white sugar, cream cheese, vanilla, fruit preserves, whipped cream ; preparation:In bowl mix eggs with sour cream and 1 tbsp sugar. Whisk for five minutes or use electric mixer on low for two minutes. Melt butter in a heavy 8-inch teflon coated fry pan over lowest heat setting and add egg mixture. While eggs are cooking place cream cheese in bowl and warm in microwave for 45 seconds. Check for warmth, must be warm but not hot. Microwaves vary, after 1st time segment if additional heating is needed use 15 second bursts. Add vanilla and rest of sugar to cream cheese and stir until well combined. Flip omelette by sliding onto plate, cover top with fry pan and invert, replace on heat until firm. Top omelette with cream cheese mixture and then place fruit topping on top of cream cheese. Finish with whipped cream. Serve with your favorite toast buttered and topped with cinnamon sugar. ; name: breakfast gravy for biscuits ; ingredients: breakfast sausage, flour, milk, buttermilk, black peppercorns, salt ; preparation:Brown sausage and break up into bite size pieces. Cook until fully done. Add flour to the sausage and grease and cook until it has a pasty consistency. Add milk very slowly to sausage making sure to mix well and avoid lumps. Cook on medium heat stirring occasionally until it is a thick gravy. Finally add buttermilk pepper and salt to taste. Let the gravy once again thicken for about 5 minutes on medium heat. Serve hot over fresh baked biscuits. ; name: breakfast delish ; ingredients: eggs, ricotta cheese, heavy cream, splenda sugar substitute, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: delicious oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, baking soda, boiling water, flour, rolled oats, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes. ; name: no bake chocolate cookies ; ingredients: cocoa, sugar, milk, margarine, peanut butter, quick-cooking oatmeal, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Bring first 4 ingredients to a boil. Cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well and drop by teaspoon onto wax paper. Let cool. They seem to harden better, plus they taste good that way. ; name: healthier no bake chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, salt, peanut butter, butter, vanilla extract, rolled oats ; preparation:Mix sugar, cocoa, milk and salt in saucepan. Boil for one minute. Add peanut butter, butter, and vanilla to hot mixture. Stir until combined. Stir in oats thoroughly and drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool thoroughly before removing from paper. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: chocolate crunch peanut butter treats ; ingredients: powdered sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, oil, dipping chocolate ; preparation:Combine sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, and oil together. Take spoonfuls sized however large you want and drop onto wax paper cookie sheet. Freeze for about 30 minutes. Remove from freezer. Shape into eggs, hearts for valentines, or other shapes according to holidays with cookie cutters if you need to. Put back on wax paper covered cookie sheet. Freeze for 2 hours. Melt dipping chocolate or chocolate with some grated paraffin wax in microwave. Dip eggs in and completely cover. Put back on cookie sheet and refrigerate. Decorate. Cooking time is freezing time. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: crunchy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: rolled oats, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, egg whites, corn syrup, vanilla, rice krispies ; preparation:

name: garlic broiled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people. ; name: limon chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, garlic, yellow onions, chilies, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Season both sides of the chicken liberally with salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a deep saucepan, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden brown, about 2 minutes on each side. Remove the chicken and add the onions and garlic and cook at medium-low heat until the onions are golden brown, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in the yellow chile and return the chicken to the pan. Spoon some of the onions over the chicken, cover and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, until chile sauce has completely infused the mixture and the chicken is cooked through. Add the lemon juice and cook another 10 minutes, to allow flavors to meld. Slice breasts to serve. ; name: caribbean chicken with rice ; ingredients: chicken breasts, black beans, ground ginger, lime juice, sea salt, fresh garlic cloves, mangoes, green onions, whole grain rice, seasoning ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice. ; name: spicy citrus grilled chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, lime, juice and zest of, orange, juice and zest of, olive oil, dried oregano, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f. ; name: lemon chicken with olives ; ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, lemon, brown sugar, oregano, kalamata olive, salt & pepper ; preparation:Fry off chicken until browned, about 5 minutes. Put aside and keep warm. In the same fry pan, fry off onions and garlic. Cook til transparent or soft, about 3 minutes. Stir often. Add chicken back to the pan. Add tomatoes, lemon slices, sugar and oregano. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 40 minutes. It is ready when the sauce is thickened and the chicken is cooked through. Stir in olives in the last few minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if needed. ; name: lemon chili chicken with penne ; ingredients: penne, boneless skinless chicken breast half, olive oil, onion, garlic, bottled lemon juice, tomatoes, water, red pepper flakes, cilantro ; preparation:In large pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in large skillet, brown chicken in oil with onion and garlic. Add lemon juice, tomatoes, water and red pepper flakes. Cook 2 to 3 minutes. Add penne. Heat through. Garnish with cilantro. Serve hot or cold. ; name: cilantro grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, limes, juice of ; preparation:Pound chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time. ; name: chile chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, bell peppers, onions, ground cumin, oregano, hot chili peppers, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: persian style steamed rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, salt, water, unsalted butter ; preparation:Place the rice in a large bowl and add cold water to cover by 3 inches. Swirl around with your fingers until the water becomes cloudy, then pour through a strainer to drain. Repeat this process until the water remains clear. This will take 4 to 6 rinsings. Place the rice, salt and the 6 cups water in a deep, nonstick saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer the rice gently, uncovered, for about 18 minutes. When the rice has absorbed all the water, reduce the heat to the lowest possible setting and sprinkle the butter pieces over the top. Wrap a clean kitchen towel around the pot lid, piling any excess cloth on top of the lid. Place the cloth-covered lid over the rice and steam for 20 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Gently fluff the rice with a fork and serve immediately. ; name: healthy and easy red lentil dhall ; ingredients: red lentil, hot water, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, yellow mustard seeds, cumin seed, onion, oil, salt ; preparation:Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry ginger and garlic paste for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the paste. Add hot water. Wash the lentils and put into the water. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry onion till light brown. Add mustard and cumin seeds and fry till mustard seeds start popping. Add onions and fried seed mixture to lentils, stir through. Serve with basmati rice. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: koshari lentils and rice with tomato sauce ; ingredients: lentils, white rice, macaroni, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place lentils in saucepan with 4 cups of water and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer on low for 30 minutes, or until tender. Add rice to the lentils and cook for another 20 minutes or so, until rice is tender. Meanwhile, cook macaroni according to package directions to an al dente stage. Combine lentils, rice and macaroni in large pot. Saute onions and garlic in pan in olive oil until browned. Add tomato sauce to onions and garlic and heat until bubbling. Remove from heat. Place a serving of lentil mixture on a plate and cover with sauce. Sprinkle red pepper on top and serve. ; name: jeera cumin rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cumin seed, basmati rice, water, salt ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium size saucepan over a medium-high heat. Drop in the cumin seeds, and cook until they splutter. Do not allow the cumin seeds to burn or become really dark brown in color. Add the rice and fry it in the oil for about 1 minute. Add the water and salt and bring to a boil. Once the water is boiling, reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook the rice for approximately 15 minutes. If you feel the rice is getting burnt near the base of the pan as it cooks, one trick is to place the saucepan on another flat pan or griddle which is directly on the flame. Toss with a fork. ; name: lentil rice dish mujadarah arabic dish ; ingredients: lentils, basmati rice, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, olive oil, onions ; preparation:

name: hot mexican bean dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chives, fresh parsley, onion flakes, chili powder, medium cheddar, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Mix first seven ingredients in a bowl and spread in a 3 quart casserole. Sprinkle with cheddar, then monterey jack. Top with second amount of chili powder. Can chill ahead of time. Bake, uncovered in a 350 oven for 20 minutes or until hot and cheese is melted. ; name: sauteed spinach with parmesan cheese ; ingredients: spinach, olive oil, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thoroughly wash and dry spinach and remove stems. Using half the ingredients and working in batches, heat olive oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Saute garlic about one minute. Add spinach leaves, increase heat to high, and stir until evenly wilted, about 2 minutes. Add salt, pepper, and tomatoes. Cook an additional minute. Stir in grated parmesan, remove from heat, taste, and adjust seasonings. Serve immediately. If spinach releases too much water, you can drain mixture in a colander before serving. Taste and adjust seasonings again after draining. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: addictive corn dip ; ingredients: mexicorn, sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, green onions, four-cheese mexican blend cheese, cumin, cayenne pepper, lime, tortilla chips ; preparation:Mix together the corn, sour cream, and mayonnaise. Slice the lime in half and squeeze the juice from one half over corn mixture. Mix well. Chop the cilantro and green onions. Add to the corn mixture. Blend in the cumin and cayenne pepper. Mix in shredded cheese. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: dynamite chili dip ; ingredients: chili, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, chopped tomato, green onion, black olives ; preparation:Place chili in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: hot chile cheese corn dip ; ingredients: corn, black olives, green chilies, jalapeno pepper, chopped pimiento, parmesan cheese, monterey jack cheese, mayonnaise, ground cumin ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: spinach pumpernickel dip ; ingredients: low-fat sour cream, low-fat mayonnaise, herb salad dressing mix, frozen spinach, pumpernickel rounds, water chestnuts, green onion ; preparation:Combine the sour cream, mayonnaise and salad dressing and mix well. Squeeze the spinach to remove water. Add to the mixture and mix well. Add optional ingredient. Hollow out the bread and fill with the sour cream mixture. Cube the bread that was removed from the loaves. Arrange assorted cut up veggies and bread cubes around loaves. ; name: old mexico spinach cheese dip ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, whole canned tomatoes, diced green chilies, frozen chopped spinach, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, half-and-half cream, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: after christmas quiche ; ingredients: prepared cornbread stuffing, cooked turkey, swiss cheese, eggs, evaporated milk, white pepper, chopped tomato, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Press leftover dressing into 9 inch pie plate, forming a crust. Bake 10 minutes, remove and turn oven on 350f. Spread meat and cheese evenly over bottom of hot crust. In a medium bowl combine eggs, milk, and pepper. Pour this mixture over meat and cheese. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with tomatoes and paprika if desired. ; name: spinach ham quiche ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, eggs, heavy whipping cream, tabasco sauce, tarragon, chicken base, fresh spinach, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese, ham ; preparation:In a large bowl combine eggs, whipping cream, tabasco, tarragon& chicken base. Whip until smooth. Arrange the pie shell in a 9 inch pie pan. Add the grated swiss cheese, spinach, ham and parmesan cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all and bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes. ; name: ham quiche ; ingredients: cooked ham, red bell pepper, green onion, swiss cheese, all-purpose flour, half-and-half, eggs, pie crusts ; preparation:Mix ham, bell pepper, green onion, cheese and flour. Toss all ingredients lightly. Mix half-and-half gently into eggs. Still gently. Fold ham mixture into egg mixture. Pour this mixture into unbaked pie shell. Bake 10 minutes at 425 degrees, and then lower heat to 325 degrees and bake 20 minutes more or till done. ; name: quick bacon tomato quiche ; ingredients: cooked bacon, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, cheddar cheese, green onion, plum tomato, black pepper, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Beat eggs and combine with all other ingredients. Mix well and pour into pie shell. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 minutes. Cut while warm and serve. Any leftovers may be refrigerated and microwaved at a later date. ; name: chowder quiche ; ingredients: clam chowder, eggs, swiss cheese, green onions, parsley, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In mixing bowl, combine chowder, eggs, cheese, onions, parsley& pepper. Blend well. Set empty piecrust on baking sheet on extended oven rack. Ladle chowder mixture into crust. Carefully slide rack back into place. Bake 1 hour or till set. Cool 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: chicken and corn impossible quiche ; ingredients: milk, eggs, butter, plain flour, tasty cheese, cooked chicken, creamed corn, fresh parsley, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Whisk eggs, milk and butter together in a large jug. Sift the flour into a bowl. Make a well in the centre and gradually whisk in the milk mixture. Mix in half the cheese and all remaining ingredients. Spoon mixture into a deep greased pie 25cm pie plate. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in a moderate oven for 35-40 minutes or until firm. ; name: quiche pastry ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, salt ; preparation:Mash together cream cheese and butter. Sprinkle in flour and salt. Mash with a fork until they are just tiny grains. Then knead only once or twice, until it just comes together. Place mixture in buttered bowl, seal with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 3-4 hours or overnight. Roll between 2 pieces of wax paper an hour before using. Fit the pan, crimp edges, and freeze at least 45 minutes. Jab holes in it with a fork and bake in a 400 degree oven for 6-7 minutes. Remove from oven and cool. Proceed with usual quiche recipe. ; name: the old barn inn breakfast brunch quiche ; ingredients: breakfast sausage, egg, cheese, salt, pepper, garlic powder, crescent rolls, milk ; preparation:

name: old fashioned rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, salt, sugar, butter, vanilla, eggs, brandy, cooked long-grain rice, fresh lemon juice, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also. ; name: my favorite rice pudding ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla, salt, cooked rice, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, sugar, rice, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt to the eggs. Pour into buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: rice pudding for one ; ingredients: cooked brown rice, milk, cream, cinnamon, cornstarch, honey ; preparation:Combine rice, milk and cream in a microwave bowl and stir. Spoon a few tablespoons of the liquid out and stir in cornstarch in a small bowl until no lumps are present. Add the cornstarch mixture and stir. Microwave on medium high for about 3 minutes, or until desired thickness is reached. Add cinnamon and honey and serve warm. ; name: near instant rice pudding ; ingredients: egg, cooked white rice, milk, ground cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven 350f. Whisk together egg, milk, cinnamon and sugar in a small bowl, stir in cooked rice. Pour into a small baking dish. Bake for about 20 minutes or until golden on top. Serve warm or cold. ; name: eggnog rice pudding ; ingredients: long grain white rice, salt, water, eggnog, nutmeg, dried cranberries ; preparation:Combine the rice, salt, and water in a large, heavy saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium high heat. Cover and reduce heat to low, and simmer until the water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes. Add the egg nog and nutmeg and cook over medium heat stirring continuously about 30 minutes. The rice is done when it becomes thick. Do not over cook the pudding or it will be gummy. Remove from heat. Stir in the cranberries, if desired. Can be served warm or cold. ; name: rice pudding with sultanas spain ; ingredients: white rice, granulated sugar, milk, vanilla extract, sultana, brandy, cinnamon, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Put sultanas in a bowl & cover them with the brandy, then allow them to sit & soak up some of the liquid, about 30 minutes. In a heavy sauce pan, combine rice, sugar, milk, the drops of vanilla & the cinnamon stick. When the milk starts to boil, turn heat to low & simmer slowly, about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan. When sultanas have soaked up some of the brandy, drain them & add the sultanas to the rice & milk mixture. Continue cooking for another 10-15 minutes, & once rice has cooked, remove pan from the heat & remove the cinnamon stick. Spoon into a serving bowl & let cool a bit before sprinkling a little ground cinnamon over the top & serving. ; name: grand marnier rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, arborio rice, sugar, salt, egg, grand marnier, butter, vanilla ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, bring milk, sugar, rice and salt to a boil, stirring frequently. Reduce heat and simmer about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Lightly beat egg in a medium bowl. Gradually stir about a fourth of the hot milk mixture into the egg. Return to pan, stirring constantly. Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thick and rice is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in liqueur, vanilla and butter, stirring until butter melts. ; name: simple coconut rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, whole milk, unsweetened coconut milk, sugar, salt, coconut extract, coconut flakes ; preparation:

name: white chocolate cranberry cheesecake ; ingredients: oreo cookie crumbs, unsalted butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, eggs, white baking chocolate, dried sweetened cranberries, orange zest, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. For the crust, mix the two crust ingredients in a bowl, then press onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan. Chill to set. For the filling, beat cream cheese on medium speed until fluffy. Beat in sugar until blended, then beat in eggs until blended. Stir in white chocolate, cranberries, zest & vanilla. Pour into prepared crust & bake 45-50 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool in pan for 30 minutes, then refrigerate. Run knife around sides of pan to loosen, then chill 4 hours or more. Remove rim & cut into wedges.
