Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: bread crumb pancakes low fat and dairy free ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, soymilk lite, canola oil, whole wheat flour, egg whites, salt, baking powder ; preparation:Soak the breadcrumbs in the milk and oil. While it is sitting mix the other ingredients together. Add the flour, salt, and baking powder and eggs to the milk and mix. Pour onto a hot griddle and cook until done, flipping once. Serve warm with your favorite toppings. ; name: strawberry cheesecake oatmeal ; ingredients: oat bran, light cream cheese, strawberries, vanilla extract, graham cracker squares, sugar substitute ; preparation:Pour oat bran in a large bowl and add enough water to cover, stir. Microwave for about 2 minutes. Add light cream cheese and stir until smooth. Add vanilla extract. Add sugar substitute. Stir in strawberries. Crush graham crackers in your hands and sprinkle over the oatmeal. ; name: no bake diabetic pineapple cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, cream cheese, artificial sweetener, vanilla extract, lemon juice, nutriwhip, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Press into a 9in pie pan. Cream together remaining ingredients except pineapple. Fold in pineapple. Pour into crust. Chill for 3 hours or more. ; name: raspberry cream cheese pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, cinnamon, cream cheese, cream, unflavored gelatin, water, fresh raspberries, whipped cream ; preparation:Combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, melted butter, and cinnamon. Press into a 9-inch pie pan, set aside. Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Whip cream and gently fold into cheese mixture. Soak gelatin in water 5 minutes in the top of a double boiler, over hot water. Stir gelatin mixture until completely dissolved. Stir gelatin into cream cheese mixture. Fold in raspberries. Pour into prepared crust. Chill for 2 to 3 hours. Before serving, decorate with whipped cream. ; name: strawberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crusts, fat-free evaporated milk, fat free cream cheese, egg, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, lemon, rind of, fresh strawberries, strawberry jelly ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place evaporated milk, cream cheese, egg, sugar, flour and lemon peel in blender, cover. Blend until smooth, pour into crust. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Arrange strawberries on top of pie. Drizzle with jelly. Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving. ; name: fruit and mascarpone italian cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, mascarpone cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, kiwi, strawberry ; preparation:Combine mascarpone, powdered sugar, and whipping cream in a medium bowl. Beat until creamy. Spread mixture evenly onto crust. Chill thoroughly in the refridgerator for at least 1 hour. Arrange sliced fruit over pie before serving. ; name: pumpkin cheesecake vegan ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, vegan margarine, soy cream cheese, pumpkin puree, light brown sugar, rum extract, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, ground nutmeg ; preparation:

name: good morning casserole ; ingredients: bread, sausage, eggs, evaporated milk, water, cheddar cheese, dry mustard, salt ; preparation:Spray 9 x 13 pan with cooking spray. Line pan with bread quarters. Cut sausage into small pieces as you brown it. Drain. In marge mixing bowl combine cooked sausage, eggs, evaporated mild, water, cheese, mustard, and salt. Pour over bread. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 - 60 minutes. Can be served with salsa. ; name: coarse black pepper cheese bread ; ingredients: flour, yeast, sugar, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, milk, shortening, water, egg, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups flour, yeast, sugar, salt and pepper. Mix well in a saucepan, heat milk, water and shortening until warm. Add to flour mixture add egg and beat at low speed until moistened. Beat 3 minutes at medium speed. By hand, add cheese and enough flour to make a firm dough. Knead well on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes. Punch dough down, divide into 2 parts. Shape into 2 round loaves. Place on a greased baking sheet, cover and let rise in a warm oven until light and doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on racks, makes 2 loaves. ; name: buttermilk cheese bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, egg, sharp cheddar cheese, whole wheat flour, bread flour, dry buttermilk, salt, yeast, lemon pepper ; preparation:Place ingredients in bread machine pan in recommended order and set on dough cycle. Check consistency of dough and add additional water or flour, if necessary. At end of cycle, remove, shape, and let rise until approximately doubled. Bake in preheated 350 deg. Oven. For app. 30 to 40 minute. ; name: hot cheese bites ; ingredients: butter, cheddar cheese, flour, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Chill mixture for 2 hours. Roll into small balls. Place balls on a cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes. ; name: cheese stuffed bread ; ingredients: sourdough bread, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, green pepper, red pepper, salt, parmesan cheese, ground cumin, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip. ; name: sole fillet bake with cheese ; ingredients: sole fillets, garlic salt, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, all-purpose flour, lemon juice, onions, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Clean sole and pat dry. Sprinkle garlic salt on both sides and arrange on a greased baking dish. Mix the rest of the ingredients. Spread them onto the sole fillets. Bake in a preheated oven of 200 degrees for 5 minute. Switch oven to grill and grill for another 5 min until golden brown. Serve. ; name: garlic cheese biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick, milk, cheddar cheese, butter, garlic salt ; preparation:Mix bisquick, milk and cheddar cheese until a soft ball forms. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Drob by balls onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 8-10 munutes. Melt butter. Mix butter and garlic salt. Brush garlic butter on rolls while still hot on the pan. ; name: supper time cheese bread ; ingredients: eggs, water, biscuit mix, onions, cheddar cheese, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: spicy maple roasted pork chops and sweet potatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salt, sweet potatoes, olive oil, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. In a small bowl, combine paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper and salt. Divide in half. In a medium bowl, combine half of spice mixture, sweet potatoes, olive oil and maple syrup. Toss to coat sweet potatoes thoroughly. Spread sweet potatoes onto foil-lined baking sheet into a single layer, leaving two spaces in the middle for the pork chops. Rub remaining half of spice mixture lightly over both sides of pork chops and nestle into spaces made in sweet potatoes. Roast for 35-40 minutes or until pork chops are done. ; name: glazed pork chops and apple bake ; ingredients: pork steaks, salt & pepper, apples, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: brown sugar glazed pork chops ; ingredients: brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, salt and pepper, cornstarch, water, boneless pork loin chops ; preparation:Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook. ; name: braised pork chops with tomatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, red onion, rosemary sprigs, garlic cloves, plum tomatoes, anchovy fillets, polenta ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat pork chops dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear chops in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down, about 8 minutes. Return pork chops to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice. ; name: pork chops with raspberry glaze ; ingredients: butter, boneless pork chops, seedless raspberry jam, raspberry vinegar, grey poupon dijon mustard, orange zest ; preparation:Melt butter in large skillet over medium high heat. Add pork chops and cook 5 to 7 minutes on each side, or until browned. Mix jam, vinegar, mustard and orange zest in small bowl. Spoon evenly over pork chops. Lower heat and simmer uncovered until sauce is reduced to glaze consistency and chops are cooked through, approx 5-7 minutes. Turn chops occasionally. Spoon small amount of sauce onto center of each plate. Slice chops in thin slices. Place chops on top of sauce on plate in a fan shape. Drizzle with remaining sauce. ; name: black cherry glazed pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, cherry fruit spread, red wine, balsamic vinegar, fresh rosemary, olive oil ; preparation:Add fruit spread, wine, vinegar and rosemary to a small saucepan, whisk to combine and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Add oil to a skillet and brown chops over medium high heat, 2 minutes per side. Spoon glaze on chops, reduce heat to medium low, cover and cook 6 minutes. Turn chops and cook 5 minutes more or until no longer pink in the center. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: maple baked pork chops ; ingredients: pure maple syrup, dijon mustard, molasses, cider vinegar, ground cumin, salt and pepper, center-cut pork chops ; preparation:

name: coconut cranberry chews ; ingredients: butter, sugar, orange rind, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, dried cranberries, dried coconut ; preparation:With a mixer on medium speed, beat butter, sugar, orange peel and vanilla until smooth. In another bowl mix flour, baking powder and salt. Add butter mixture and beat on low speed for about 5 minutes. Stir in cranberries and coconut. Shape dough into 1-inch balls and place 2 inches apart on buttered baking sheets. Bake in a 350 oven for 8 minutes. Remove from oven and let cookies cool on sheets for 5 minutes. ; name: layered coconut bars ; ingredients: margarine, vanilla wafer crumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Combine butter and crumbs in an 8-inch square baking dish. Press down to form a crust. Sprinkle with chocolate chips, nuts and coconut. Pour milk over all. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes. ; name: vanilla coconut bars ; ingredients: french vanilla cake mix, butter, water, vanilla, egg, coconut, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Stir in coconut. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool. ; name: quick coconut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, coconut milk, butter, vanilla extract, unsweetened coconut, currants ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift dry ingredients into mixing bowl. Blend in egg, milk, butter, and vanilla. Mix in the grated coconut and the currants or raisins, if used. Turn out onto a floured board and knead slightly. Shape into two loaves and pat into two buttered medium loaf pans. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until a toothpick in the centre comes out clean. ; name: low fat chocolate cake ; ingredients: unbleached flour, unbleached cane sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, water, brewed coffee, safflower oil, vanilla, cider vinegar ; preparation:In a large bowl mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt, and set aside. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cider vinegar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Drizzle the cider vinegar over the top of the batter and whisk quickly to incorporate. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. ; name: nikki s health cookies ; ingredients: bananas, vanilla extract, coconut oil, rolled oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, sea salt, baking powder, dark chocolate bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl combine bananas, vanilla and coconut oil. In another bowl wisk oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, salt and baking powder. Add dry ingredients to wet ones. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop small dollops on parchment or silpat lined baking sheet. Bake 14-18 minutes, as long as possible without burning. ; name: vanilla pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Stir together flour and baking powder in small bowl. Gradually add flour mixture alternately with milk to butter mixture, beating at low speed until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: needhams ; ingredients: potatoes, shredded coconut, almonds, vanilla, powdered sugar, dark chocolate ; preparation:

name: crescent roll bars ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sugar, egg, vanilla, cream cheese, cinnamon ; preparation:Remove roll from the refridgerator 20 minutes ahead of time. Mix together 1 cup of sugar, egg yolk, vanilla and cream cheese in mixer. Place 1 package of crescent rolls in bottom of a greased 9x13 pan. Pour cream cheese mixture over top. Put second package of rolls over top. Beat egg white and spread over the top of rolls. Mix remaining sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes. Cuts better if chilled overnight. ; name: chicken egg pie ; ingredients: crescent roll dough, cheddar cheese, bacon, cooked ham, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Unroll crescent dough. Separate into triangles. Arrange in a greased 9 inch pie plate, forming crust. Seal seams and perforations. Sprinkle with 1 cup cheese, bacon and ham. In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour over the ham. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Cover edges of crust loosely with foil. Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 20 minutes longer or until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: spiral cheese slices ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, green onion, garlic powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Remove crescent dough from tube. Do not unroll. Cut into 8 slices. Place on an ungreased baking sheet. Top with green onions. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cheese. Lightly press cheese into slices. Bake at 375 degrees for 14-16 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: breakfast crescent pizza ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sausage, bacon, hash brown, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: bacon crescent rollups ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sour cream, onion powder, bacon, swiss cheese ; preparation:Unroll crescent rolls and separate into triangles. Spread with sour cream. Sprinkle with onion powder. Top with bacon and small amount of cheese if desired. Cut each wedge into 2 equal wedges. Roll up. Place on foil lined cookie sheet. Bake 375 for 12-15 minutes until golden. ; name: beef stuffed crescents ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, sweet pickle relish, garlic cloves, salt, chili powder, black pepper, sugar, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the pickle relish, garlic, salt, chili powder, pepper and sugar. Set aside. Unroll crescent dough and separate into triangles. Cut each in half lengthwise, forming two triangles. Place 1 t beef mixture and some cheese along the wide end of each triangle, carefully roll up. Place point side down 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees for 11-15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: honey cream filled crescents ; ingredients: cream cheese, honey, almonds, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f mix cream cheese and 2 tablespoons of the honey. Stir in almonds. Unroll crescent roll dough. Separate into 8 triangles. Spread 1 rounded tablespoons cream cheese mixture onto each triangle. Roll up each loosely, starting at shortest side of triangle, rolling to opposite point. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet. Curve each into crescent shape. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bale 12 to 14 minute or until golden brown. Serve rolls warm, drizzled with remaining honey. ; name: chicken and cheese crescent rolls ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, whole milk, crescent rolls ; preparation:

name: bacon pasta ; ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot. ; name: pasta with lemon pepper and parmigiano ; ingredients: egg noodles, olive oil, chicken stock, lemon, juice of, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, black pepper, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a big casserole, cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Put pasta in a bowl. Add olive oil, chicken stock, lemon juice, parmigiano and pepper. Add salt if needed. Mix well. Serve immediately and sprinkle with parsley. Delicious with veal. ; name: pasta house pasta con broccoli actual recipe ; ingredients: shell pasta, cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper, button mushroom, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta until half done. Drain. Return pasta to the pot. Add cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper. Bring to a hard boil. When noodles are fully cooked and sauce is starting to thicken, add mushrooms and stir to combine. Remove from the heat. Add cheese. Toss and serve. ; name: zucchini carrot and parmesan sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic clove, parmesan cheese, cooked pasta ; preparation:Heat the oil over low in a medium skillet. Stir in the carrot, zucchini and garlic. Stirring, 3 minutes. Toss hot pasta with the sauce. Serve with the cheese. ; name: brown butter pasta ; ingredients: salted butter, nutmeg, turmeric, gouda cheese, coarse unseasoned bread crumbs, pine nuts, fresh fettuccine ; preparation:Bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. While the water heats, in a small saucepan over medium-low heat, combine the butter, nutmeg and turmeric. Heat, stirring frequently, until the butter has melted and browned slightly, about 8 to 10 minutes. Meanwhile, use a food processor to finely grate the cheese. Add the bread crumbs and pine nuts, then pulse several times, or until the mixture resembles coarse sand. Set aside. Once the water has boiled, add the pasta and cook according to package directions. Drain and return to the pot. Pour the butter mixture over the pasta and toss to coat. Transfer the pasta, along with any butter in the pan, to a large serving bowl. Sprinkle the bread crumb mixture over the pasta. ; name: pasta shells with gorgonzola cheese sauce ; ingredients: pasta shells, gorgonzola, milk, butter, heavy cream, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, cook the pasta for 10 minutes, or until al dente. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, gently heat the gorgonzola, milk and butter. Stir with a wooden spoon to make a smooth sauce. Stir in the cream and add salt if necessary. Drain the pasta, shaking to remove excess water. Combine the hot pasta and hot sauce in a large serving bowl, tossing until the pasta is well coated. Serve immediately with grated parmesan. ; name: creamy tomato sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream cheese, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: pasta with courgette and walnut sauce ; ingredients: butter, onion, courgettes, pasta, walnuts, parsley, cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: smoothie quick sob no dairy ; ingredients: tangelo, strawberries, splenda sugar substitute, banana, ice cubes ; preparation:Peel tangelo, section, and remove white strings. Place in blender. Hull strawberries and cut in quarters. Place in blender. Add splenda or sugar to blender. Peel banana and place 1 inch chunks in blender. Place ice cubes in blender. Blend for 30-40 seconds until smoothie reaches desired consistency. The blender may need to be jiggled at the beginning as there is no liquid in the bottom. ; name: banana split smoothies ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple, milk, fresh strawberries, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: green tea berry smoothie ; ingredients: water, green tea bag, ground flax seeds, oat bran, frozen mixed berries, low-fat vanilla yogurt, cranberry juice, honey ; preparation:Microwave water on high until boiling, about 45-60 seconds. Add tea bag and steep for 3 minutes. Meanwhile, in a blender or food processor, combine ground flaxseed, oat bran, berries, yogurt and juice and blend until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings. ; name: indian cold coffee ; ingredients: milk, boiling water, instant coffee powder, cream, sugar, ice ; preparation:Dissolve instant coffee powder and sugar in boiling water and allow to cool. Blend the the coffee mixture and milk in a blender for few seconds. Add cream and crushed ice. Blend for another few seconds till it becomes frothy. Serve chilled. ; name: green tea and berry slushie ; ingredients: brewed green tea, frozen mixed berries, banana, honey ; preparation:The original recipe specified six tea bags and three full tablespoons of honey. I toned it down a little. Brew the tea and let steep for 10 minutes. Covered. Remove tea bags, allow tea to cool down then refrigerate. Place all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. ; name: coffee chiller ; ingredients: ground coffee, water, sugar, half-and-half, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Brew coffee using 12 cups of water. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Stir in half-and-half, milk, and vanilla. Chill. Serve over ice. ; name: super easy green tea smoothie ; ingredients: green tea bag, boiling water, mashed banana, ice, orange juice concentrate, fresh ginger, honey ; preparation:Brew green tea in water. Steep to desired strength, and discard tea bag. Refridgerate 30 minutes, or until cool. Puree tea, banana, ice, orange juice concentrate, and ginger in blender until smooth. Add sweetener. Drink immediately, or place in freezer for up to two hours, or until ready to serve. ; name: frozen coffee smoothie ; ingredients: strong coffee, brown sugar, vanilla bean, bananas, blanched almonds, ice cubes ; preparation:

name: beefy turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, lemon juice, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add more bouillon if you like a stronger beef flavor. Let it sit for about 15 minutes to soak all the flavor. Take wax paper, parchment paper or foil and cut 12 square shaped pieces. Lay the wax paper down on the counter, and make a patty from the meat and place on top, layer another sheet and patty up to 2 patties. I made 12 patties, but you can make bigger ones than i did. Place remaining patties and wax paper in a gallon sized freezer bag. Freeze nicely for up to a month. Pull them out as needed. Great grilled or even just placed in the broiler. Cooking time is about 10-15 minutes. ; name: honey garlic meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, egg, dry breadcrumbs, honey, lemon pepper seasoning, garlic cloves, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x10 glass baking dish. Set aside. In a bowl, combine all ingredients then transfer to bakind dish. Top with desired amount of ketchup. Bake at 350 for 1. 25 hours. Let stand for 3-5 minutes before serving. ; name: cottage cheese meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, cottage cheese, egg, quick oats, catsup, prepared mustard, instant minced onion, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except parmesan cheese. Mix ingredients lightly till well blended. Press lightly into an 8 by 8 pan. Cover with waxed paper & microwave on high for 12 to 14 minutes, turning dish once. Drain fat, if needed. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese & cook uncovered on high for 1- 2 minutes or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: last minute meatloaf ; ingredients: ground chuck, small curd cottage cheese, egg, quick-cooking rolled oats, catsup, prepared mustard, onions, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine beef with first 8 ingredients. Mix well but lightly until well-blended. Press mixture loosely into an 8-inch square baking dish. Bake at 350-degrees for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. Return to oven and bake 10 minutes longer. Let stand 5 minutes before cutting into squares. ; name: garlic and ranch turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, ranch dressing mix, egg, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Knead together the turkey, ranch mix, egg, garlic, worcestershire sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper in a bowl until evenly combined. Divide into 4 equal portions and form into patties. Cook on the preheated grill about 5 minutes per side for well done. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 165 degrees f. ; name: vegetable soup meatloaf ; ingredients: white bread, vegetarian vegetable soup, onion, egg, salt, pepper, lean ground beef, tomato sauce ; preparation:In a large bowl, soak bread in soup for 5 mintes. Stir in the onion, egg, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into an 8 in x 4 in loaf. Line and 11 in x 7 in x 2 in baking dish with foil and grease the foil. Place meatloaf in pan. Top with tomato sauce. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: easy meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, oatmeal, eggs, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, onion, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Dump meat into a large mixing bowl. Salt and pepper. Add all of the other ingredients to the bowl and mix by hand. Put mixture in a well greased pan or dish and form into a loaf. Place dish on top oven rack and cook for 1-1 hours, checking periodically. ; name: hearty turkey meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, oats, minced garlic cloves, onion ; preparation:

name: turkey fiesta ; ingredients: margarine, flour, salt, milk, cooked turkey, frozen peas, chopped pimiento ; preparation:Melt butter in pan. Add flour and salt. Slowly add milk, stirring with a fork or whisk to keep mixture smooth. Heat until thickened. Stir in turkey, peas, and pimentos. Cook until thoroughly heated. Serve over puff pastry shells or toast. ; name: rice slice with turkey and asparagus ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, asparagus, cooked turkey, eggs, herbs, garlic cloves ; preparation:If you make risotto the night before, keep some aside before you add the final ingredients and fold some cheese inches. You will need to warm it through before proceeding with this recipe. If using rice-a-roni or similar, just prepare as directed. Stir in asparagus, turkey, eggs, herbs and garlic. Spoon into a greased and lined 9x11-inch pan and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes. Cut into squares and serve warm, at room temperature or even cold. Serves 6 as a light lunch with a green salad, or at a party as finger food. ; name: mexican casserole dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, cooked long-grain rice, tomato soup, green chilies, taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, corn chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. ; name: mexican rice easy ; ingredients: vegetable oil, long-grain white rice, garlic salt, ground cumin, taco seasoning, onion, tomato sauce, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork. ; name: leftover turkey ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, turkey, water, turkey gravy mix, milk, flour, salt ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: low fat turkey in the garden meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, frozen chopped spinach, quick oats, onion, carrot, nonfat milk, egg whites, italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing. ; name: turkey chili con carne ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion soup mix, chili powder, red kidney beans, black beans, crushed tomatoes ; preparation:Place ground turkey in large skillet. Sprinkle with onion soup mix. Brown meat well. Add the beans, chili powder, and crushed tomatoes. Simmer covered 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: 1 2 3 ground turkey mexican rice ; ingredients: mexican rice, black beans, mexicorn, lean ground turkey ; preparation:

name: crockpot ribs and taters ; ingredients: pork spareribs, salt & pepper, onion, bay leaf, pork seasoning, beer, potatoes ; preparation:Rinse and dry the ribs. Cut down serving size. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Place ribs in crockpot on high heat. Peel and quarter potatoes, rough chop onions and add to the ribs in the crock. Add bay leaf and pork seasoning. Pour beer into crock, cover and cook on high 6-8 hours or until done. Stir halfway through. ; name: mushroom risotto in pressure cooker ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, portabella mushrooms, arborio rice, chicken broth, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:In a presssure cooker, heat 4tbs olive oil and 2 tbs butter. Add onion and garlic. Saute until translucent. Add portabella and rice. Stir until rice is coated with oil. Add chicken broth. Cover and cook under high pressure for 7 minutes. Release pressure and add remaining 2 tbs of butter. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: slow cooker chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken thighs, chicken breasts, onion soup mix, garlic salt, italian salad dressing, water, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle the garlic salt and onion soup mix over the chicken. Pour salad dressing and water over the chicken. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns. ; name: slow cooker spareribs ; ingredients: condensed tomato soup, onion, garlic cloves, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, pork spareribs, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:Place ribs in a large stock pot, and cover with water. Bring to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes. In a mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, garlic, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, and soy sauce. Remove ribs from water, and transfer to a slow cooker. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover, and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, or until ribs are tender. If sauce is too thin when cooking time is done, drain sauce from ribs, and pour into a sauce pan. Combine 1 teaspoon cornstarch with a small amount of cold water, stir into sauce, and bring sauce to boil. Cook until sauce has reached desired thickness. ; name: slow cooker german style pork roast ; ingredients: white potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper, boneless pork loin roast, sauerkraut, caraway seeds ; preparation:Place the potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to coat. Season the pork roast with salt and pepper. Lay atop the potatoes. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast, sprinkle with caraway seeds. Cook in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours. ; name: boiled ribs and cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, pork ribs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Separate your ribs into single pieces. Use a large stock pot half filled with water- and a pinch of salt-- bring the water to the boil and add the ribs. Allow the ribs to boil for approximately 30 minuts. Remove the ribs from the water using a slotted spoon- but reserve the water- set the ribs aside. Chop your cabbage in desired size. Boil the cabbage in the rib water for approximately 30 minutes or until desired tenderness is achieved. Return the ribs to the water mixing the cabbage and ribs together for approximately 10 minutes- just enough time to rewarm the ribs. Drain and salt and pepper to taste- use a generous amount of pepper- since there are no other spices in this dish. Serve. ; name: slow cooker pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, dry onion soup mix, water, red wine, garlic, soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus. ; name: new england boiled dinner pressure cooker ; ingredients: ham shank, water, potatoes, onions, carrots, cabbage, pepper ; preparation:

name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: baked eggs with spinach and parmesan ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, baby spinach leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, eggs, cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200d celsius lightly grease 4 ramekins and place on a baking tray. Heat a medium sized fry pan over a moderate heat and add the oil to the pan, then add the spinach and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the leaves are just softened. Drain the spinach in a colander and as soon as spinach is cool enough to handle, squeeze out excess liquid. Divide the spinach between the ramekins and break two eggs on top of the spinach. Pour one tablespoon of cream over the eggs and sprinkle with one tablespoon of parmesan. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the eggs are set and puffed up. Serve immediately with toast. ; name: creamy spinach potato mash ; ingredients: baby spinach, baking potatoes, garlic cloves, rosemary, chicken broth, butter, roasted red pepper ; preparation:Place spinach in colander. In pot, bring next 3 ingredients and enough salted water to cover, to a boil. Cook 20 minutes. Pour over spinach to drain. Discard rosemary. Return potatoes and spinach to pot and stir in butter and broth. Using hand masher, mash mixture until smooth. Stir in peppers and serve. ; name: baked grated zucchini ; ingredients: zucchini, butter, light sour cream, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Wash zucchini, leaving skins on, and grate either by hand or in a food processor. Blot zucchini with paper towels to remove as much moisture as possible. Place in an 8 inch square baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Cut butter into small pieces and place evenly over zucchini. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese and bake until zucchini is tender and cheese melts. About 5-10 more minutes. ; name: spinach cheese patties ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, egg yolks, flour, wheat germ, fresh spinach, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown. ; name: creamed spinach like boston market ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, half-and-half cream, cream cheese, onions, garlic, frozen chopped spinach, water, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended. ; name: creamy chicken and gnocchi ; ingredients: potato gnocchi, onion, red bell pepper, flour, chicken broth, half-and-half, green onions, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Cook the gnocchi according to directions on the box. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, heat up some butter or olive oil and sautee onions and red bell pepper until softened. Add in the chicken pieces and allow it to brown all over. Season with salt and pepper. In a seperate saucepan melt the butter over medium heat and add flour until mixed well. Pour in chicken broth and half-and-half. Stir and allow it to come to a boil then reduce heat and let it simmer until its thickened. Pour white sauce into chicken mixture and toss in gnocchi, toss well. Serve with scallions chopped and sprinkled ontop. Goes great with salad and bread. ; name: nana s spinach gnocchi ; ingredients: spinach, potatoes, egg yolks, parmesan cheese, salt, flour, boiling water, butter ; preparation:

name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: sesame seed cookies india ; ingredients: sesame seeds, flour, sugar, butter, eggs, caraway seed, milk, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees fl. In a large bowl, sieve the flour with salt and baking soda. Add sugar, butter, 2 eggs, caraway seeds and blend well. Add the milk a little by little and knead to a smooth dough. Roll out on a floured board 1cm thick and cut out with fancy cookie cutters. Brush with remaining well beaten egg and sprinkle heavily with sesame seeds. Place on a greased baking sheet. Bake in a 325 degree oven for 10 minutes. Cool and enjoy with a good cup of tea. ; name: eatmore chocolate peanut bars ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, salt, corn flakes, vanilla, peanuts, chocolate chips, peanut butter ; preparation:Bring corn syrup, sugar and salt to a full rolling boil. Stir in peanut butter until well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and peanuts. Add cornflakes and chocolate chips. Stir until chips are melted. Turn into buttered 8x8 pan. Pack down and chill before cutting into squares. ; name: easy and fast caramel bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, skor candy bars, caramel sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a big bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan. ; name: sesame snackers ; ingredients: cooking oil, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine oil, sugar, egg and vanilla in mixing bowl. Beat well. Add flour, baking powder, salt and first amount of sesame seeds. Stir well. Shape into small balls. Place onto a ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a glass. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in 350 degree oven for 8-10 minutes. Makes 4 dozen. ; name: cherry gems cookies ; ingredients: butter, eggs, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, dried cherries, almonds ; preparation:Mix butter, eggs, brown sugar, and flour until well combined. Add baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, cherries, and nuts. Roll dough into logs that are approximately 1 inch around. Wrap in waxed paper and place in the refrigerator until ready to bake. When you are ready to bake, preheat oven to 350 degrees. Slice logs into 1 inch rounds and place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool 5 minutes before transfering to a cooling rack. ; name: dolores chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, vegetable shortening, creamy peanut butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl, set aside. Combine shortening, peanut butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix until well blended. Blend in reserved dry ingredients, stir in coconut. Batter will be very stiff. Spread batter into a well-greased 13x9x2in baking pan. Bake at 350 degree for 25-35 minutes, or until golden brown. Cut into bars when completely cool. ; name: dragon hair candy or dragon beard candy ; ingredients: white sugar, peanuts, corn syrup, rice flour ; preparation:

name: whole wheat tortillas ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, warm water, vegetable oil, salt, cornstarch ; preparation:Stir together the first 6 ingredients. On a floured board knead until smooth. Divide dough into 12 equal balls. Dust lightly with cornstarch. Roll into a circle as thin as possible on a lightly-floured board. Drop onto a very hot ungreased griddle. Cook until brown spots appear on one side. Turn and cook on second side. Repeat with other balls. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: 100 whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: yeast, water, honey, olive oil, eggs, salt, whole wheat flour ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water and honey for about 5 minutes. Combine honey, olive oil, eggs, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Slowly add flour and knead until it loosens from sides of the bowl. Place in large oiled bowl, cover and let rise until about double. About one hour, be sure it is in a warm place. Punch down and remove dough. Shape dough into rolls about 2 inch in diameter. Place on an oiled or non stick baking sheet, cover and let rise for 30 minutes. Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake at about 375 degrees for about 20 minutes or until browned. ; name: mostly whole wheat fat free egg free raisin bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, baking soda, salt, raisins, fat-free buttermilk, molasses ; preparation:In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled. ; name: light wheat beer bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, bread flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, splenda sugar substitute, beer, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Mix dry ingredients and beer. Pour into a greased loaf pan. Pour melted butter over mixture. Bake 1 hour, remove from pan and cool at least 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: fruity whole wheat yogurt muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, white sugar, baking powder, baking soda, plain yogurt, egg, vanilla extract, oil, apples ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. In a separate bowl, combine yogurt, egg, vanilla, oil and fruit. Stir mixtures together just until combined. Batter will be very thick. Scoop into prepared muffin cups and bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. This helps the leavening process. ; name: whole wheat popovers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, butter, eggs, milk, salt ; preparation:

name: canadian baked beans with maple syrup no molasses ; ingredients: white pea beans, onion, dry mustard, summer savory, ground black pepper, chili powder, maple syrup, salt pork, salt ; preparation:Soak beans overnight to cut down on cooking time. Drain and place in a 4 quart bean pot. Mix seasonings and maple syrup together and stir into beans. Add enough water to cover. Peel onion and remove root and blossom ends. Push whole onion down into beans and place the salt pork next to it. Bake covered in a 250 degree oven for about 8 hours. Check on them every hour or so and see if you need to add water so they never dry out. When finished if you want the sauce to be thicker then you can always stir in some refried bean flakes and let sit to thicken. ; name: california yucchi dip ; ingredients: hamburger, refried beans, velveeta cheese, avocado, onion, salsa, garlic powder ; preparation:In a crockpot, simmer the refried beans, the chopped avocado, and salsa, along with the velvetta cheese. In a skillet, brown the hamburger along with the chopped onions and garlic powder. After the hamburger is browned, add to the crockpot with the other ingredients and allow to cook for about 20 minutes on the high setting. Be sure to stir occasionally to prevent burning or sticking. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips or in mini-taco shells. ; name: flageolets en pissenlits beans with dandelion greens ; ingredients: flageolet beans, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, dried thyme, dried savory, dandelion greens, unsalted butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Soak the dried beans in warm water for at least two hours. Drain. Place the beans in a flameproof casserole with the onion, carrot, garlic and herbs, and add enough water to cover the beans by one inch. Cover and bring just to the boil over medium heat. Immediately reduce the heat and simmer for about an hour, adding additional water if necessary to keep beans covered. Add the greens and continue to cook for another thirty minutes or until the beans are creamy. Remove from the heat, swirl in the butter and season with the salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately. ; name: greek style green beans ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, water, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, of fresh mint, oregano leaves, salt, black pepper, green beans ; preparation:Wash,. Place in pan with water to cover beans. Simmer uncovered until beans are just tender, stirring a few times. Meanwhile, combine undrained tomatoes with water, onions, parsley, garlic, mint, oregano, salt and pepper in a saucepan. Cover. Bring just to a boil, reduce heat and let simmer 10 minutes, stirring frequently. When tomato sauce is thick, drain green beans and top with sauce. Serve promptly. ; name: pasta and beans ; ingredients: pasta, olive oil, garlic, tomatoes, kidney beans, italian seasoning, sugar, fresh spinach, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives ; preparation:Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives. ; name: suppertime turnip greens ; ingredients: turnip greens, water, bacon, seasoning salt, sugar, garlic powder, ground red pepper ; preparation:Remove and discard tems from greens. I do this by rollin up leaves, from stem to. Coarsely chop leaves. Bring 4 cups water and bacon slice to a boil in a large dutch oven. Add greens, seasoned salt, and remining ingredients. Cook over medium heat 35 to 45 minutes or until tender. ; name: unstuffed bell pepper skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, crushed tomatoes, green bell peppers, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried italian seasoning, cooked rice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Brown ground meat and onion. Drain. Season with salt, pepper, garlic and italian seasoning. Add crushed tomatoes and green pepper. Cover and simmer until peppers are tender crisp. Serve over cooked rice. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: greg s monterey jack ; ingredients: kidney beans, italian-style stewed tomatoes, lean ground beef, sweet onion, green bell pepper, monterey jack cheese, butter, salt and pepper, paprika ; preparation:

name: beef bean chile verde ; ingredients: ground beef, red bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, green chili salsa, water, pinto beans ; preparation:Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute. ; name: no beans no tomato chili ; ingredients: ground beef, water, chili seasoning mix, pepper, accent seasoning, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, onion powder, salt ; preparation:In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want. ; name: low fat homestyle refried beans ; ingredients: onion, canola oil, garlic cloves, ground cumin, salt, cayenne pepper, pinto beans, water, lime juice ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onion in oil until tender. Stir in the garlic, cumin, salt and cayenne. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Add beans and mash. Add water. Cook and stir until heated through and water is absorbed. It only takes a few minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lime juice. ; name: cranberry chili ; ingredients: ground beef, picante sauce, low-fat refried beans, whole canned tomatoes, chili powder, garlic clove, whole berry cranberry sauce, kidney beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a cooking pan brown meat until pink, stirring to separate. Pour off any fat. Add picante sauce, refried beans, tomatoes, chili powder and garlic. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. Add cranberry sauce and kidney beans. Heat thoroughly. Sprinkle each bowl of chili with cheddar cheese before serving. ; name: beans and burger hillbilly chili ; ingredients: lean ground beef, baked beans, onion, barbecue sauce ; preparation:Brown beef in a large high-sided skillet or soup pot. Drain the fat from the beef and discard. Return the cooked beef to the pot and add the onion, beans, and barbecue sauce. Cook for about 30 minutes over medium heat, stirring occaisionally. Serve with corn muffins, fried potatoes, hot sauce, or diced raw onion. ; name: not hot chili ; ingredients: ground beef, chili beans, crushed tomatoes in puree, green pepper, onions, celery, garlic cloves, chili powder, cumin ; preparation:Brown beef in skillet. In another skillet, saute peppers, onion, celery and garlic. Mix veggies with beef, put into crockpot. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder and cumin. Cook on low 6 hrs or high 4 hours. ; name: cheater s chili ; ingredients: oil, lean ground turkey, stewed tomatoes, hot chili beans, chili powder ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Crumble turkey and cook over medium-high heat until no longer pink. Stir in all remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: refried bean chili ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, chili beans, thick & chunky salsa, refried beans, beef broth, chili powder, ground cumin ; preparation:

name: penne with sun dried tomato pesto ; ingredients: penne pasta, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to the bite, stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Meanwhile, blend the sun-dried tomatoes and their oil, garlic, salt and pepper, to taste, and basil in a food processor and blend until the tomatoes are finely chopped. Transfer the tomato mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the parmesan. Add the pasta to the pesto and toss to coat, adding enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season the pasta, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: penne with chicken and pesto ; ingredients: penne pasta, butter, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, heavy cream, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Heat butter and oil in large skillet over medium heat. Saute chicken and garlic until chicken is almost cooked through. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside,. Stir in cooked pasta. ; name: penne with tomato mozzarella arugula pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomatoes, salt, arugula, mozzarella cheese, penne, parmesan cheese, chili pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat oil, add garlic and saut until golden brown. Pour into a large bowl. Chop tomatoes and toss with salt. Cut arugula into strips and toss most of it with the tomatoes, saving some to top dish before serving. Mix together with oil, tomatoes, garlic and greens while boiling slated water for pasta. While pasta is cooking, cut mozzarella into small pieces. Mix all ingredients with hot cooked pasta. Sprinkle with remaining arugula and red pepper flakes. ; name: penne with chicken and sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: shallots, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, sun-dried tomatoes, heavy cream, penne, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Cook chicken through. Cook penne al dente. Saute shallots in 1 tbsp oil for 2 minutes or until soft. Add cooken chicken, and tomatoes. Cook over moderate heat for 5 minutes. Add cream and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Add remaining ingredients, and toss with pasta to combine. Serve immediately. ; name: penne with collards sausage and mushrooms ; ingredients: spicy smoked sausage, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, collard greens, dried italian seasoning, tomatoes seasoned with basil garlic & oregano, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and plan to have it cooked& ready to go by the end of the cooking process. Brown sausage slices in a large deep pot until browned on each side. Remove sausage slices from the pan and drain off any fat. Add oil to the same pot, heat over medium briefly, then add garlic and mushrooms, stirring constantly until mushrooms are tender - this will take only a few minutes. Return the sausage slices to the pan along with collards, italian seasoning, and tomatoes with their juices. Cook, stirring as needed, for about 10 minutes. Add the cooked pasta and toss well. Serve with grated parmesan cheese sprinkled over each serving to taste. ; name: penne with zucchini and ricotta cheese ; ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, garlic, penne, fresh basil, ricotta cheese, salt and pepper, fresh parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil the water, and add salt. Boil the zucchini for about 2 min, let it cool off. Cut it in pices of 1 cm. Heat the oil in a pan. Frie the garlic until soft, add the zucchini and let it fry on lowheat. Boil the pasta. When the pasta is ready drain it from water and add the zucchini, and basil. Mix it with the ricotta cheese. Serve with parmesan. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: penne with chard and pine nuts ; ingredients: olive oil, pine nuts, penne pasta, garlic cloves, red swiss chard, chicken broth, salt, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: pork teriyaki ; ingredients: teriyaki sauce, water, all-purpose flour, pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, cooked rice ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine teriyaki sauce mix and water until dissolved. Set aside. Place flour in a large resealable plastic bag. Add pork and shake to coat. In a large skillet, brown pork in oil until juices run clear. Add teriyaki sauce. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 1-2 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve with rice. ; name: toni s teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: chicken, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, bay leaves, lemon, black pepper ; preparation:Wash and seperate chicken legs from thighs. De-bone chicken if desired. Combine remaining ingredients in pitcher. Place chicken in 2 gallon zipper-top bag. Pour marinade on top of chicken. Squeeze air out of bag and seal, place in refridgerator. Allow the chicken to marinade for at least tow hours, but up to two days. Turn bag over mul. Chicken can be frozen in marinade. Grill chicken as desired, discard marinade. ; name: easy chicken teriyaki ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, onion, bell pepper, pineapple slices, teriyaki sauce, butter, aluminum foil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place one chicken breast in center of a square of alumium foil and salt and pepper. Layer onion and bell pepper slices and 2 pineapple slices on top of each piece of chicken. Drizzle 1-2 tablespoons of bottled teriyaki sauce over chicken mixture. Put 1 tsp butter on top of pineapple slice. Seal up alumium foil by folding edges together. Bake at 375 degrees for approximately 45 minutes. You can also put these on the outdoor grill on indirect heat. Serve with rice. ; name: island teriyaki ; ingredients: soy sauce, salad oil, molasses, ground ginger, dry mustard, garlic cloves, round steaks ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Cut meat across grain into strips 1 inch wide. Add meat to soy marinade, stirring to coat. Let stand 15 minutes at room temperature. Lace strips accordian-style on skewers. Broil 5 inches from heat 5-7 minutes or until cooked rare to medium-rare, turning frequently and basting with soy marinade. Alternatively, you can grill these. Serve hot as an appetizer. ; name: slow cooked teriyaki beef ; ingredients: sirloin, soy sauce, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sugar, cornstarch, sesame oil ; preparation:Arrange sliced meat in bottom of crock pot. Combine soy sauce, garlic cloves, ginger, sugar, cornstarch and sesame oil in blender. Process until smooth. Pour mixture over meat in crock pot. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. High for 3-4 hours. ; name: lemon teriyaki chicken quick and easy ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, brown sugar, water, minced garlic cloves, ground ginger ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, except the chicken, in a skillet. Cook on high for 3-4 minutes on the stove. Add the chicken. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: teriyaki pork chops ; ingredients: teriyaki sauce, brown sugar, garlic, pork chops ; preparation:Spray inside of slow cooker with cooking spray. Combine teriyaki sauce, brown sugar and garlic in small bowl and mix well. Place pork chops in cooker. Pour mixture over top. Cover and cook on low heat 7-8 hours. ; name: timely teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: chicken thighs, sesame oil, scallions, soy sauce, brown sugar, gingerroot ; preparation:

name: lemon dilled brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, butter, lemon juice, dill weed, lemon zest, salt, pepper, almonds ; preparation:Wash and trim the sprouts, cut an x in the core end. In a large saucepan, bring 1 inch of water and the sprouts to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 10 to 12 minutes or until fork tender. In a small microwave safe dish, melt the butter and blend in lemon juice, dill weed and lemon zest. Drain the sprouts, return to pan and dry over heat for 1 to 2 minutes. Pour the butter mixture over, tossing to coat, stir in chopped almonds. Enjoy. ; name: brussels sprouts with fried onions and pancetta ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, pancetta, lemon juice, sea salt, cracked black pepper, fried onions ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the pancetta and fry for 2 minutes until just becoming crisp. Toss in the sprouts, then the lemon juice. Season well. Cook for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve topped with fried onions. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts with hazelnut brown butter ; ingredients: butter, brussels sprout, hazelnuts, salt, fresh ground pepper, water ; preparation:Position rack in bottom third of oven and preheat to 450f. Put butter on a large rimmed baking sheet and roast until the butter is melted, browned and fragrant. Remove baking sheet from oven and toss brussels sprouts and hazelnuts with the browned butter. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Return to oven and roast for 7 minutes. Sprinkle with water, toss, and continue roasting until the sprouts are tender and lightly browned. ; name: french onion brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, butter, olive oil, french onion soup mix, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Trim the root end off the sprouts, peel off the first layer of leaves and cut each one on half. Heat butter and oil in a large frying pan until the butter just starts to brown. Add the sprouts being careful not to get splattered with hot oil. Stir or toss frequently until the sprouts are nicely browned. Add the water and soup mix and simmer uncovered for about 7 minutes. Taste a sprout and season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: brussels sprouts with black pepper butter hazelnuts ; ingredients: black peppercorns, butter, brussels sprouts, olive oil, hazelnuts, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Crush the peppercorns in a mortor and pestle and then combine in a small bowl with the softened butter. Refrigerate until needed. Cut a small slice from the stalk end of each brussel sprout to help separate the leaves, pull off the outer leaves of the sprouts very carefully and finely slice the tight centres. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and add the hazelnuts and saut for 2 minutes until toasted. Add the brussel sprouts and stock and saut for a further 2 minutes then season with salt to taste. Remove from the heat and toss through the black pepper butter. Put into a serving bowl or on individual plates. ; name: brown sugar brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar ; preparation:Steam the brussels sprouts over boiling water until tender, about 10-15 minutes. Heat oil and garlic over medium-high heat until fragrant, being careful not to burn. Add brussels sprouts, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and salt. Stirring until they begin to brown, about 5 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar and brown sugar, stir for a minute and remove from heat. Serve immediately. ; name: brussels sprouts and bacon ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, onion, caraway seed, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Add brussels sprouts and boil until almost tender, about 7 minutes. Drain. Cook bacon in heavy large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Remove using slotted spoon. Drain on paper towels. Pour off all but 3 tablespoons bacon drippings. Add onion to skillet and saute over medium heat until tender, about 4 minutes. Stir in caraway seeds. Add bacon and brussels sprouts and stir until warmed through. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: glazed brussels sprouts with lemon and pepper ; ingredients: brussels sprout, kosher salt, unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, water, sugar, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: shrimp and potato salad ; ingredients: shrimp, potatoes, celery, sweet pickle relish, hardboiled egg, salt, sour cream, mayonnaise, italian salad dressing mix ; preparation:Mix together the potatoes, celery, relish, eggs, and salt. Mix together sour cream, mayo, and dry italian dressing mix. Combine the potatoe mixture with sour cream mixture. Refrigerate. To serve, add the shrimp and serve in a salad bowl lined with lettuce. ; name: chunky shrimp spread ; ingredients: water, fresh shrimp, onion, fresh lemon juice, curry powder, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper, parsley sprig ; preparation:Bring the water to a boil. Add the shrimp and cook 3-5 minutes, just until done. Drain the shrimp well and rinse under cold water. Chill. Peel and devein the cooked shrimp and coarsely chop. Add remaining ingredients except parsley, mixing well. Chill. Garnish the spread with a sprig or two of parsley. Serve with party-size rye or whole wheat bread. ; name: garlic shrimp ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, garlic, shrimp, salt and pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: chopped shrimp salad ; ingredients: small shrimp, seedless cucumber, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice, fresh dill, salt & pepper ; preparation:Cut shrimp in halve or thirds depending on the size. Peel cucumber and chop cucumber, celery and onion, small. Add the remaining ingredients, mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Serve over lettuce or in a hallowed out veggie. ; name: another garlic shrimp recipe ; ingredients: medium shrimp, butter, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic, kosher salt, red chili pepper flakes, lemons, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place shrimp in a large broiler safe pan and pre-heat broiler, set aside. In a large saute pan, melt butter and oil until bubbly. Add garlic and saute 1-2 minutes-- be careful not to burn garlic. Add the dijon mustard, chili flakes and salt and stir until well blended. Pour sauce over shrimp and broil for approximately 5 minutes or until shrimp has turned pink. Remove from broiler and place on large platter, sprinkle with lemon juice and fresh parsley. Serve with fresh bread and extra lemon. ; name: chapel hill shrimp cucumber salad rounds ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, prepared mustard, garlic powder, shrimp, cucumber, onion, cracker ; preparation:Blend together the cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, and garlic powder. Gently fold in the shrimp, chopped cucumber, & chopped onion. Chill for at least 3 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, spread crackers or toast rounds with the spread, then garnish each with a cucumber round and a shrimp. This spread also makes a wonderful sandwich. ; name: sea shell shrimp salad ; ingredients: shell pasta, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, dill weed, salt, cucumber, carrot, baby shrimp ; preparation:Cook shells as it is directed on pkg. Rinse and drain well. In a large bowl combine mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, dill weed and salt. Mix well. Add cumcumbers, carrots, shrimp and shells. Mix well cover and chill in ref. For 2-4hours or overnight. ; name: buttermilk and shrimp soup ; ingredients: buttermilk, dijon mustard, salt, granulated sugar, shrimp, cucumber, green onions ; preparation:

name: katia s apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, water, cinnamon stick, self-rising flour, margarine, egg ; preparation:Peel the apples and cut them into pieces. Put in a saucepan the apples, one glass of water, the glass of sugar and the cinnamon stick. Let them boil until the apples are more like applesauce, approximately 50 minutes. In mixer bowl, blend the shortening with the rest of the sugar for 3-4 minutes and then add the egg. Continue for 2 minutes more. Then add slowly the flour using hand to make a dough. In a baking pan put at the bottom foil. Divide the dough in half. Place by fingers half of the dough at the bottom of the pan. Remove the cinnamon stick and layer the apples. The rest of the dough shape it into a disk on a foil and then turn it over the apples. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: apple peach pies ; ingredients: apple pie filling, peach slices in syrup, caster sugar, olive oil flavored cooking spray, shortcrust pastry, egg, double cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c combine the apple, peach and 2 tablespoons of sugar in a medium bowl. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Divide the apple mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream. ; name: apple sweet potato scallop ; ingredients: apples, sweet potatoes, orange juice, orange, zest of, cinnamon, corn flakes, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Place alternate layers of sweet potatoes and apples in baking dish, ending with apples. Pour orange juice and zest over mixture and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake, covered with foil, in preheated 375 degree oven for 40 minutes. Remove foil, top with crushed cereal or bread crumbs, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Bake 15 to 20 minutes more until brown. ; name: rustic crunchy apple pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, apples, unbaked pie shell, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon. Roll apple slices in the crumb mixture. Arrange apples in unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture over top of apples. Pour melted butter evenly over the top of the apples. Bake for 1 hour. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice-cream. ; name: beautiful berry pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shell, kiwi fruits, blueberries, strawberries, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes. ; name: almost apple pie for one ; ingredients: apple, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, splenda sugar substitute, light margarine ; preparation:Slice and core apple. Combine flour, spices & sweetener in bowl. Toss apple in dry mixture. Pour in pan. Drop margarine in dots on top. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until apples are soft. ; name: schnitz pie dried apple pie ; ingredients: dried apple, water, orange, juice and zest of, cinnamon, salt, sugar, pie crusts ; preparation:

name: korean seasoned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, green onion, salt ; preparation:Remove roots from spinach and wash well. I soak in a solution of vinegar and water and then rinse. In bowl, combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, and green onions. In a large pot bring water to boil. Add spinach and immerse only until leaves turn bright green. Do not over boil. Spinach will not taste right. Drain and rinse with cold water. Squeeze out as much water as possible. Add the spinach to the sauce and mix well. This can be served warm or even refrigerated for another time. ; name: sauteed spinach with sesame korean ; ingredients: dark sesame oil, garlic, spinach, sugar, soy sauce, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Put 2 t.
