Great with a salad. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: simple and inexpensive spaghetti ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, tomatoes, butter, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, warm chopped tomatoes in microwave. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add butter and cheese, stirring until melted. Add warmed tomatoes and stir well. Leftovers can be placed in casserole dish and baked at 350 until warmed through. ; name: chicken with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, italian salad dressing mix, white wine, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese with chives, angel hair pasta ; preparation:

name: frozen pineapple salad good use for those muffin tins ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple, pineapple yogurt, pecans ; preparation:Blend cream cheese and sugars, beating well. Add pineapple and yogurt. Spoon into cupcake liners placed in a muffin tray. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cover and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer about 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: george washington cherry salad ; ingredients: cherry gelatin, cherry pie filling, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, pecans ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, mix gelatin with 2 cups boiling water until dissoved. Add cherry pie filling and pineapple with juice. Mix well. Pour into 13x9x2 inch pan and refrigerate until gelatin is set. Mix cream cheese, sour cream and sugar until smooth. Spread over salad after gelatin is set. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Sprinkle with nuts just before serving. ; name: festive winter salad ; ingredients: raspberry vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, honey, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, romaine lettuce, pomegranate seeds, roasted pistachios, gorgonzola ; preparation:Combine the vinegar, oil, honey, salt and pepper in a medium bowl, and whisk to combine. Taste for seasoning, and add more salt or pepper if needed. Place half of the lettuce on each of two salad plates. Scatter the pomegranate seeds, pistachios, and cheese over each plate. Drizzle with the dressing, and serve immediately. ; name: pudding fruit salad ; ingredients: prepared vanilla pudding, frozen whipped topping, seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, mandarin orange segments, pineapple chunks in juice, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In a medium bowl, mix pudding and whipped topping. Gently stir in grapes, marshmallows, oranges, and pineapple. Add strawberries. Toss gently to coat. Serve immediately or store in refrigerator up to 8 hours. ; name: red white and blue frozen dessert ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, lemons, rind of, plain yogurt, miniature marshmallows, pecans, strawberry, fresh blueberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, lemon juice and peel and mix well. Stir in yogurt, marshmallows and nuts. Spread half of mixture in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Layer half of the strawberries and half of the blueberries on top. Layer with remaining yogurt mixture and end with rest of berries on top. Cover and freeze for at least 2 hours. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving. ; name: instant fruit salad ; ingredients: instant lemon pudding, pineapple chunk, mandarin orange, fruit cocktail ; preparation:Open and drain liquid from all cans except pineapple. Place all fruit in serving container. Pour lemon pudding powder onto fruit and stir. Add can of pineapple with liquid. Refridgerate until ready to serve. ; name: fruit salad with pudding ; ingredients: peach slices, pineapple chunks, vanilla instant pudding mix, strawberry, banana, blueberries, grapes, sugar ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine peaches, pineapples, and vanilla pudding mix. This includes the juices from the cans. Mix well until pudding is dissolved. Stir in strawberries, banana, blueberries, grapes, and sugar if desired. Chill. ; name: paper cup frozen salad ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, salt, crushed pineapple, banana, red food coloring, pecans, bing cherries ; preparation:

name: naturally sweetened banana bread ; ingredients: bananas, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, water, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing. ; name: one pan banana bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, bananas, vanilla extract, eggs, bisquick baking mix, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease the bottom only of a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Stir all ingredients in pan with a fork until moistened. Beat vigorously 1 minute. Bake 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. Run knife around sides of loaf to loosen, remove from pan. Cool completely. ; name: bananacran bread ; ingredients: bananas, frozen cranberries, butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Beat together butter, sugar and eggs until creamy. Add bananas and cranberries. Combine the remaining dry ingredients in a separate bowl. Add to the wet ingredients and stir until well mixed. Pour into a large greased loaf pan and bake in a 350 oven for an hour. Remove and cool for 20 minutes in the pan before removing. ; name: my incredibily popular banana bread ; ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, salt, bananas, butter, caster sugar, free-range eggs, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 180c. Lightly butter a 25cm x 10cm loaf tin. Sift the flour, baking powder and slat into a bowl, set aside. Mash the bananas to a puree, set aside. Cream the butter and sugar together in a bowl, with a hand-held electric beater, until smooth and pale. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well until just combined. Fold in the mashed bananas, vanilla and walnuts, using a spatula. Then lightly fold in the flour. Spoon the mixture into the loaf tin. Bake for 1 hour or until toothpick inserted to the middle comes out dry, covering the top with foil if it starts to brown to quickly. Allow to cool in tin 20 minutes before turning out. Cut into thick slices. ; name: banana banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: simple banana apple bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk, bananas, nuts, apple ; preparation:Mix together flour, baking soda, salt, and sugar. Blend in eggs, oil, and milk. Stir in banana, apple, and nuts. Pour batter into greased loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for about 1 hour or until toothpick test comes out clean. ; name: hawaiian banana bread ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, bananas, eggs, cake flour, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack. ; name: ba nana s bread ; ingredients: unbleached flour, sea salt, baking soda, sweet creamy butter, unbleached cane sugar, pure vanilla extract, mashed bananas, eggs, pecan pieces ; preparation:

name: nineteen forty eight cocoa cake ; ingredients: cocoa, cold water, baking soda, butter, eggs, flour, sour milk, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Mix water, cocoa, and baking soda first, set aside while mixing remaining ingredients. Cream butter and sugar add eggs. Add half the flour and half the milk beat then add rst of flour and rest of milk. Last, add the cocoa mixture and mix well. Stir in vanilla. Bake in two well greased and floured pans at 350f for 30 minutes or until cake test done. Frost with your favorite icing. Cake will take on a red color after cooling. ; name: one bowl chocolate cake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, milk, self-rising flour, cocoa, bicarbonate of soda, almond meal, eggs, almond essence ; preparation:Heat butter, sugar and milk in saucepan till melted. Stir to combine and remove from heat. Sift flour, cocoa and soda together into saucepan. Stir in almond meal, eggs and essence. Pour into greased and lined 20 cm round cake tin. Bake at 180 degrees celsius for 40 - 50 minutes. Cool in tin and the turn onto rack. Ice with your favourite frosting or ganache. ; name: chocolate mug cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, egg, milk, oil, chocolate chips, vanilla, coffee ; preparation:Add dry ingredients to mug and mix well. Add egg and mix well. Pour in milk, oil, and mix well. Add chocolate chips and vanilla and mix again. Put mug in microwave for 3 minutes on 1000 watts. The cake will rise over the top of mug, dont be alarmed. Allow to cool a bit and. ; name: low fat chocolate cake ; ingredients: unbleached flour, unbleached cane sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, water, brewed coffee, safflower oil, vanilla, cider vinegar ; preparation:In a large bowl mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt, and set aside. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cider vinegar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Drizzle the cider vinegar over the top of the batter and whisk quickly to incorporate. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. ; name: victory chocolate cake ; ingredients: flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, shortening, sugar, corn syrup, eggs, vanilla extract, coffee ; preparation:Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Set aside. Cream the shortening and sugar in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, using an electric mixer at medium speed. Blend in the corn syrup and egg yolks. Beat in vanilla. Add dry ingredients alternately with coffee to creamed mixture, beating well after each addition. Beat egg whites in another bowl until stiff peaks form. Fold egg whites into cake batter. Pour batter into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven 45 minutes or until cake tests done. Cool in pan on rack. ; name: cocoa cake brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, stirring well after each addition. Stir in vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt. Gradually add to butter mixture. Stir until moistened. Transfer to a greased 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: chocolate cream pound cake ; ingredients: whipping cream, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 175 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil. ; name: homemade chocolate cake ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, baking soda, sugar, salt, eggs, buttermilk, wesson oil, vanilla, boiling water ; preparation:

name: chicken casserole with broccoli ; ingredients: baking mix, cooked chicken, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, milk, eggs, seasoning salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: jane and michael stern s broccoli casserole ; ingredients: white bread, eggs, milk, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, sugar, broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square pyrex baking dish. Cover the bottom of the dish generously with the torn bread. Combine the eggs, milk, melted butter, cheese, salt and sugar in a bowl. Mix ntil combined. Stir in the roccoli and pour the mixture over the read. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes. For a chewier top, remove the foil during the last 10 to 12 minutes of baking. If you want a crisper crust, run the casserole under the broiler. ; name: best broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, egg, milk, onion, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper, cheez-it crackers, butter ; preparation:Boil florets for 3 minutes or until just tender. Mix beaten egg, milk, onion, mayonnaise, cheese, mushroom soup, salt and pepper. Lightly fold in florets into this mixture. Pour into a greased 3 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle crushed crackers on top and drizzle with melted butter. Bake in a 325 degree oven for 30 minutes or until bubbly. Careful not to overbrown cracker crumbs. ; name: 412 broccoli casserole ; ingredients: frozen broccoli cuts, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese, garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, milk, soy sauce, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 2 quart baking dish with cooking spray, set aside. In a large bowl mix together broccoli, soup, one cup of cheese, garlic powder, pepper, salt, milk, 1 cup of french onions, and soy sauce. Pour into baking dish, sprinkle remaining cheese over top. Bake for 25 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned. Sprinkle with rest of french fried onions and bake until onions are browned and cheese is bubbly, about 10 more minutes. ; name: cheesy chicken and rice bake ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:Mix soup, water, rice, onion powder and black pepper in 2-qt shallow baking dish. Top with chicken. Sprinkle chicken with additional pepper & salt. Cover and bake at 375 for 45 min or until chicken is no longer pink and rice is done. Uncover and sprinkle cheese over chicken. ; name: broccoli rice bake ; ingredients: broccoli, instant brown rice, vegetable broth, condensed cream of broccoli soup, diced pimentos, pepper, firm butter, bisquick baking mix ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Heat 1 inch water to boiling in 2-quart saucepan. Add broccoli. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook about 5 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Mix broccoli, rice, broth, soup, pimientos and pepper in 2-quart casserole. Cover and bake 20 minutes. Cut margarine into baking mix, using pastry blender, until crumbly. Sprinkle crumbly mixture over broccoli mixture. Bake uncovered 8 to 10 minutes or until top is light brown. ; name: cheesy broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: cooked white rice, broccoli, butter, onion, cheese whiz, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: chicken with veggies in sour cream sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, garlic, cashews, red bell pepper, snow peas, chicken broth, sour cream, dijon mustard, honey ; preparation:In a large cast iron skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high. Add chicken and garlic - cook for about 4 minutes. Add cashews, bell pepper and snow peas - cook until tender, about 2 minutes. Add chicken broth, reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Move chicken and vegetables to a bowl and keep warm. Whisk in sour cream, dijon and honey to juices in skillet and heat only until warmed through. Pour sauce over chicken mixture and toss to combine. Serve over rice, noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: inspired grilled cheese ; ingredients: sourdough bread, reduced-fat mayonnaise, basil, stone ground mustard, swiss cheese, tomatoes, aged cheddar cheese, honey ; preparation:Spread mayo on the outside of sourdough bread. On inside of first slice, spread basil paste. On the next slice, spread stone ground mustard. Layer swiss cheese, tomato and cheddar on one slice. Drizzle with honey before closing sandwich. Grill on panini press or fry pan until browned and cheese has melted. ; name: caramelized onion grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: butter, sweet onion, brown sugar, pumpernickel bread, stone ground mustard, muenster cheese ; preparation:Over medium-high, melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a 12-inch nonstick skillet. Add the onion. Cook stirring for 3-5 minutes, until tender. Reduce to medium-low heat, adding in the brown sugar. Cook until onion is glazed and golden, around 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally. While cooking, spread mustard over 4 slices of bread. Place cheese slice on each piece of bread. Spoon the onion mixture evenly over cheese and other bread slices. Spread tops of sandwiches with 1 tablespoon of butter. In skillet, over medium-low, heat until hot, placing buttered side down. Spread remaining butter on other sides and cook until cheese has melted. Serve warm. ; name: chicken with mustard cream ; ingredients: chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, onion, mushrooms, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, sour cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute chicken in oil until well browned on all sides. Add 1 teaspoon of alino--rz does not recognize this spice combination. Add salt and pepper to your taste. Also add the onions, mushrooms and bell pepper, saute 5 minutes. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Add garlic, mustard and sour cream. Heat through but do not boil. Serve over rice or noodles, sprinkled with cheese. ; name: company casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pepper, tomato sauce, cottage cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, green bell pepper, green onion, noodles ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion in skillet. Add salt, to taste, pepper and tomato sauce. Simmer slowly while preparing remaining ingredients. Combine cottage cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, green pepper and green onion. Place half of cooked noodles in a greased 3 qt. Baking dish. Top with cheese mixture over top, and then remaining noodles. Pour meat mixture over top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: cheese burgers ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, lean ground beef, egg, parsley, roquefort cheese, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, salt, pepper ; preparation:In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes. ; name: sourdough sandwiches ; ingredients: chive & onion cream cheese, lemon juice, dijon-style mustard, garlic pepper seasoning, sourdough bread, smoked turkey breast, provolone cheese, roasted sweet peppers, spinach leaves ; preparation:

name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: scrunchy apple pie ; ingredients: pie apples, ground cinnamon, caster sugar, phyllo pastry, olive oil flavored cooking spray, icing sugar, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c fan forced. Combine apples, cinnamon and sugar in a bowl and spoon mixture into a rectangular ceramic baking dish. Place fillo on a clean work surface and lightly spray one filo sheet with olive oil spray. Fold each in half crossway and scrunch into a rosette sheape. Place on the apple mixture, repeating with remaining fillo. Lightly spray the pastry again. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Dust with icing sugar and. Cut and serve with cream or i think custard would work well too. ; name: deep dish sour cream apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch deep dish pie crust, flour, cooking apples, sour cream, brown sugar, egg yolks, butter, salt ; preparation:Use an unbaked 9-inch deep-dish pie shell, your own recipe or storebought. Sprinkle 1 tbsp of the flour in shell. Arrange apple slices in bottom. Preheat oven to 425f degrees. In a mixing bowl, combine sour cream, brown sugar, yolks, butter, salt and remaining 1 tbsp flour. Blend well and spoon over apples. Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce heat to 350f degrees and bake for 40 more minutes, or until apples are tender. ; name: irish apple crumble ; ingredients: pastry dough, granny smith apples, sugar, cinnamon, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: katia s apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, water, cinnamon stick, self-rising flour, margarine, egg ; preparation:Peel the apples and cut them into pieces. Put in a saucepan the apples, one glass of water, the glass of sugar and the cinnamon stick. Let them boil until the apples are more like applesauce, approximately 50 minutes. In mixer bowl, blend the shortening with the rest of the sugar for 3-4 minutes and then add the egg. Continue for 2 minutes more. Then add slowly the flour using hand to make a dough. In a baking pan put at the bottom foil. Divide the dough in half. Place by fingers half of the dough at the bottom of the pan. Remove the cinnamon stick and layer the apples. The rest of the dough shape it into a disk on a foil and then turn it over the apples. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: crustless apple cinnamon pie ; ingredients: apples, splenda brown sugar blend, cinnamon, salt, water, butter, cheddar cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel, core and slice apples into a bowl. Add brown sugar, cinnamon, water and salt. Mix well to coat apples. Place in two ramikins or small au gratin dishes, sprayed with cooking spray. Dot with butter and spread cheese over top. Bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until apples fall. ; name: streusel crumb topped apple pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, granny smith apples, sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, light brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: oriental cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, chili, rice vinegar, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: cucumber carrot salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, seasoning salt, carrot, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Combine cucumbers and salt in large mixing bowl. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. Rinse salt off of cucumbers and return to bowl. Add carrot. In a small bowl mix together remaining ingredients. Pour over cucumber mixture and toss well to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours. ; name: prize winning potato salad ; ingredients: potato, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, carrot, celery, radishes, miracle whip, prepared horseradish, pepper, frozen green pea ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain potatoes and cut cup but not too small. Cook, peel and cut up hard boiled eggs. Chop green onions, shred carrot, and finely chop celery and radishes. Add to potatoes and eggs. Add enough miracle whip to moisten. Add horseradish and pepper. Lastly, add still frozen green peas just 5 to 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: asian chicken salad ; ingredients: ramen noodles, cooking oil, chicken breasts, sesame ginger salad dressing, ground ginger, celery, carrot, cashews, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles until just tender, about 3 minutes. Pan fry cubed chicken with oil. When the pasta is done, drain it, add the chicken. Mix in celery, carrots, peas and nuts. Wisk the dressing with the ginger and coat chicken and vegetables with the dressing. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: japanese pickled daikon and carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, daikon radish, salt, rice vinegar, japanese soy sauce, fresh ginger, sugar ; preparation:Peel and finely shred carrot and daikon. Put vegetables into large bowl. Sprinkle with salt and let stand for 30 minutes. Gently squeeze out as much water as possible from vegetables. In a bowl, combine vinegar, soy sauce, ginger and sugar, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add vegetables and refrigerate for 8 hours. Salad will keep for up to 1 week in sealed container in refrigerator. ; name: unusual glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Place carrots in a saucepan. Add 1 inches of water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and set aside. In the same pan, combine butter, brown sugar and salad dressing mix until blended. Add carrots. Cook and stir over medium heat for 5 minutes or until glazed. ; name: light oriental style vegetables ; ingredients: slivered almonds, frozen mixed vegetables, celery, sliced mushrooms, reduced sodium soy sauce, water ; preparation:

name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: savory vegetable rice casserole ; ingredients: basmati rice, cauliflower, chili pepper, eggs, fresh mushrooms, onion, tomatoes, olive oil, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the rice according to the method that you prefer. Steam the cauliflower until tender. Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the mushrooms and onions and saute until soft. Add the chile pepper and tomatoes, continue sauteing until completely cooked through. Mix the rice with the sauteed vegetables. Add the eggs and mix well. Add the paprika, and the salt and pepper to taste. Pour into a greased baking dish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: southwestern mushroom casserole ; ingredients: mushrooms, beef broth, flour, heavy cream, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the mushrooms in a 2-quart pie pan. In a medium bowl, combine the beef broth and flour. Microwave at low power until slightly thickened, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the heavy cream and cayenne. Season with salt. Immediately pour the sauce over the mushrooms. In a medium bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs and parmesan. Sprinkle on top of the mushrooms. Top with the butter and bake until browned, about 45 minutes. ; name: turkish beef casserole ; ingredients: lean beef, yellow onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, beef stock, ground thyme ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add beef cubes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cut tomatoes into small pieces, add to suacepan and cook for about 5 minutes. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: chicken noodle casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, medium noodles, onions, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix onions with noodles. Add chicken and seasonings. Add soup and mix well. Put mixture in greased 2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle buttered bread crumbs or corn flake crumbs over top. Cover and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Uncover 10 minutes before done and let brown. ; name: delicious barley casserole ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, fresh mushrooms, pearl barley, chicken broth, fresh ground black pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: apple squares ; ingredients: rolled oats, flour, shortening, baking soda, brown sugar, sliced apples, butter, cinnamon, white sugar ; preparation:Mix rolled oats, flour, shortening, soda and brown sugar together and put half of mixture in bottom of baking pan. Mix together sliced apples, butter, cinnamon and white sugar. Spread over first layer of rolled oats. Cover with remaining rolled oat mixture. Bake in 350 degree oven 35- 40 minutes til done. ; name: cinnamon applesauce bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsweetened applesauce, raisins ; preparation:Suft together flour, baking soda and cinnamon. Beat butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Add eggs. Stir in vanilla. Blend mixture and stir in the applesauce with raisins. Spread in a prepared 13 by 19-inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream. ; name: crescent roll bars ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sugar, egg, vanilla, cream cheese, cinnamon ; preparation:Remove roll from the refridgerator 20 minutes ahead of time. Mix together 1 cup of sugar, egg yolk, vanilla and cream cheese in mixer. Place 1 package of crescent rolls in bottom of a greased 9x13 pan. Pour cream cheese mixture over top. Put second package of rolls over top. Beat egg white and spread over the top of rolls. Mix remaining sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes. Cuts better if chilled overnight. ; name: irish apple crumble ; ingredients: pastry dough, granny smith apples, sugar, cinnamon, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: cranberry walnut crescent rolls ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, sugar, dried sweetened cranberries, walnuts, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Unroll dough. Separate into 12 triangles. Sprinkle with sugar, craisins and walnuts. Press craisins and walnuts lightly into dough. Roll up loosely towards pointed end. Place rolls point-side down, onto ungreased cookie sheet. Curve into crescent shape. Bake at 375 for 11-13 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve warm. ; name: cinnamon baked apples ; ingredients: cooking apples, raisins, honey, ground cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Core the apples and pare a 1-inch strip of skin from around the middle of each to prevent splitting. Place the apples in two 10-oz custard cups. Pack the raisins into the apples. Mix the honey and cinnamon, pour over the raisins and into the apples. Top with butter. Cover tightly and microwave on high until tender when pierced with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes. If you prefer, they can also be baked at 375f for 30 minutes. Serve warm with cream, if desired. ; name: easy crunchy apple crisp ; ingredients: sliced apples, white sugar, flour, cinnamon, water, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, butter ; preparation:Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute. Serve warm with icecream or caramel sauce. ; name: mountain dew apple dumplings ; ingredients: crescent rolls, tart apples, sugar, butter, cinnamon, mountain dew soda ; preparation:

name: creamy pumpkin pie ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, pumpkin, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, salt, ginger, nutmeg, clove ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired. ; name: easy sweet potato pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, evaporated milk, egg, vanilla, cooked sweet potatoes, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:In a bowl, combine sugar, flour, milk, egg and vanilla. Stir in the sweet potatoes. Pour into pie shell. Cover edges of pastry loosely with foil. Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer or until crust is golden brown and a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: winter squash pie ; ingredients: squash, sugar, salt, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground ginger, mace, eggs, cream, pie crust ; preparation:Line a pie plate with pastry, crimp edge attractively and chill. Preheat oven to 450f. Strain the cooked squash and set aside to cool. Add sugar, salt and spices. Mix thoroughly. Beat the eggs, add cream and mix with squash. Pour into prepared pie pan, place in oven and bake for ten minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake for 40 minutes longer. ; name: easy pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: pumpkin, eggs, pumpkin spice, evaporated milk, sugar, yellow cake mix, butter, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together pumpkin, eggs, spice, milk, and sugar. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 pan. Sprinkle dry cake mix on top. Pour melted butter over top and then sprinkle with walnuts. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes until set. Serve with ice cream or cool whip. ; name: pumpkin pie bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, salt, white sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, pumpkin puree, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving. ; name: sugar free pumpkin dessert ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, canned pumpkin, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, equal sugar substitute, raisins ; preparation:Make pudding according to directions. Place raisins in hot water for 1 hour to plump. Drain raisins. Mix all ingredients together. Let chill for 2-3 hours. ; name: 3 layer pumpkin pie dessert ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, pumpkin pie filling, eggs, evaporated milk, sugar, cinnamon, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350f. Grease or use non-stick cooking spray and prepare 13x9 inches pan. Reserve 1 cup dry cake mix for topping. Crust - combine remaining cake mix, butter and egg, press into bottom of pan. Prepare filling - combine pie mix, 2 eggs and evaporated milk, mix well and pour over crust. Topping - combine dry mix, sugar, cinnamon and cut in butter to crumble mixture. Sprinkle over filling. Bake 350 for 50 minutes or until set. Serve with dollip of whip cream. ; name: kahlua pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crust, evaporated milk, light brown sugar, kahlua, light corn syrup, pumpkin pie spice, salt, canned pumpkin, eggs ; preparation:

name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: mediterranean pasta ; ingredients: linguine, bacon, boneless chicken breast, salt, diced tomatoes with juice, dried rosemary, feta cheese, pitted black olives, artichoke hearts ; preparation:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired. ; name: shrimp and basil pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti, shrimp, fresh basil, capers, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt, baby spinach ; preparation:Bring 3 quarts water to a boil in a pot. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Add shrimp to pot. Cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done and pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: italian fish ; ingredients: flounder fillets, dried oregano, salt, pepper, spaghetti sauce, fresh parsley, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: indian spiced cauliflower soup ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, garlic, curry paste, cauliflower, chicken stock, natural yoghurt, cream, pappadams ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and cook over low heat until soft. Add garlic and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add cauliflower and stir to coat with the curry paste. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums. ; name: purple cauliflower soup with walnut oil ; ingredients: butter, leek, purple potatoes, cauliflower florets, whole milk, kosher salt, white pepper, walnut oil ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat, add leeks and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add cauliflower, potatoes, milk and salt and bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer on low heat until vegetables are soft, about 25 minutes. Do not boil. Remove the vegetables from the heat, let cool slightly and pure them in a blender, with an immersion blender or in a food mill. If serving warm, reheat gently and serve with a drizzle of walnut oil. If serving cold, chill in the refrigerator before serving. ; name: creamy curry cauliflower soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, onion, garlic cloves, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, red curry paste, vegetable broth, coconut milk, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put cauli, onion, garlic, celery, tomatoes, water and curry paste in a large pot. Bring to a boil and simmer until all ingredients are well cooked. Using an immersion blender, puree all ingredients to desired smoothness and return to heat. Lower temperature and add milk and coconut milk. Heat through and serve. ; name: cream of cauliflower and cheddar soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, cauliflower, condensed chicken broth, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese, pepper, parsley, crouton ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan, saute onion until tender. Stir in cauliflower and chicken broth. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1215 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Combine flour and milk. Add to saucepan. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Add cheese and stir until melted. Add pepper and parsley to taste. Serve with croutons. ; name: spinach leek cream soup ; ingredients: leek, garlic cloves, olive oil, celery salt, chicken stock, potatoes, fresh spinach, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, soften leek and garlic in oil. Add celery salt and pepper. Add chicken stock and potatoes. Bring to boil. Cover and let simmer about 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add spinach and keep cooking 1 minute. In blender, reduce in a creamy puree and homogeneous. Adjust seasoning. You can serve with firm plain yogurt on top. Or if you have people over, you can use whipped cream instead of yogurt. ; name: cauliflower vanilla soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, low sodium vegetable broth, red onion, garlic clove, vanilla pod, heavy cream, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Break the cauliflower into small florets. In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the stock and bring it to a simmer. Add the cauliflower, sliced onion, and garlic. Split the vanilla pod and scrape out the seeds, adding them to the contents of the saucepan. Simmer the soup for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Remove from heat and stir in the heavy cream, then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour the mixture into a blender, in batches if necessary, and whir until smooth or to desired texture. Serve immediately with good crusty bread. Also good garnished with a shaving of parmesan or asiago. ; name: pumpkin soup ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, carrots, garlic cloves, pumpkin flesh, water, chicken stock, cream, pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan add leeks and garlic and cook until soft. Add carrots, pumpkin, stock and water and cook covered until pumpkin is soft. Spoon 2 cups of liquid out, blend or process soup until smooth. Add pepper to your liking. Serve soup in bowls pour a about 1-2 tablespoons of cream over top and serve immediately. Makes about 6-8 servings great for lunches or as a starter. ; name: creamy cauliflower leek soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, leek, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: italian chicken noodles ; ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mushroom soup, cream cheese, cooked noodles ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: chicken with egg noodles ; ingredients: chicken thighs, wide egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken until tender. Drain a little of the water off. Add noodles and cook til tender. Add can of cream of chicken soup and stir until well blended. Serve. ; name: crock pot chicken gravy and stuffing ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, pepper, chicken broth, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, milk, pepperidge farm herb stuffing, butter ; preparation:Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over breasts. Put one slice of swiss cheese on each breast. Combine both cans of soup and milk. Cover chicken breasts with soup mixture. Sprinkle stuffing mix over all. Drizzle melted butter on top. Cook on low for 6 hours or high for 3. ; name: crock pot sour cream chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, italian seasoning, garlic, dill weed, new potatoes, water ; preparation:In a crock pot add all ingredients except chicken and potatoes. Whisk until smooth. Add chicken. Cook all day on low or cook on high for 4 hrs. Add potatoes and cook for 1 hour. If you cook all day, warm potatoes in a pan before you put them in soup mixture. ; name: crock pot creamy chicken fettuccine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, condensed cream of chicken soup, process american cheese, sliced ripe olives, fettuccine ; preparation:Place the chicken in crock pot and sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder and pepper. Top with soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or until chicken juices run clear. Stir in cheese and olives. Cover and cook until cheese is melted. Meanwhile, cook fettuccine according to package directions and drain. Serve chicken on top of fettuccine. ; name: asian chicken and noodles ; ingredients: chicken-flavored ramen noodles, frozen broccoli, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until done, about 8 minutes. Stir in noodles, vegetables, stir-fry sauce and packet of seasoning. Mix well and heat through. ; name: crock pot potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, bacon, cream cheese, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, water, milk, pepper ; preparation:Stir together the potatoes, onion and bacon in the crock pot. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, water, milk and pepper. Add the mixture to the crock. Cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 4 to 5 hours. Before serving, put some of the mixture into the blender, and mix back in to thicken the soup. ; name: crockpot chicken noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, butter, egg noodles ; preparation:

name: cheddar and scallion bread ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, scallions, garlic cloves, kosher salt, black pepper, bread ; preparation:Place an oven rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: cheddar garlic biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, cheddar cheese, margarine, garlic powder ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits. ; name: garlic cheese biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick, milk, cheddar cheese, butter, garlic salt ; preparation:Mix bisquick, milk and cheddar cheese until a soft ball forms. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Drob by balls onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 8-10 munutes. Melt butter. Mix butter and garlic salt. Brush garlic butter on rolls while still hot on the pan. ; name: savory egg casserole ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, cream, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: ham and cheese bars ; ingredients: bisquick, ham, cheddar cheese, onion, parmesan cheese, sour cream, salt, garlic powder, whole milk, egg ; preparation:In a bowl, combine all the ingredients in a mixing bowl, and mix by hand. Spread in a greased 9x13 inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until lightly brown. Cut in rectangles, about 2 inches by 1 inch. Serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: cheddar and chive omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: cheddar baked bagels and eggs ; ingredients: bagels, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: harvest baked apples ; ingredients: apples, quick oats, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, pecans ; preparation:Cut all ingredients together in a bowl except apples. Place apples in a glass baking dish. Stuff each of them as full as you can get them with the oatmeal mixture, sprinkling the remainder over the tops. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream. ; name: vegan apple oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, white sugar, applesauce, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, rolled oats, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix sugars and applesauce. Add flour, baking powder, and salt and mix well. Add rolled outs. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto a lightly greased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake for 10 minutes. ; name: baker baker ; ingredients: oats, flour, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, unsalted butter, braeburn apples, honey ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients in a bowl with cold butter. Mix with hands until mixture forms small clumps and appears sandy. Refrigerate. Cut a small layer off the bottom of the apples to create a level surface. Cut a cone out of the top of the apple, removing about an inch of the core and discard the top. With a melon baller, remove the remaining core and seeds but do not puncture the base. Place the apples in a pie dish, making sure the apples do not touch. Fill each apple with a teaspoon of honey. Spoon in oat mixture, packing lightly until overflowing slightly. Bake in the oven at 350f on the middle or top rack for 40 minutes or until a knife can stick in the side of the apple with little effort. Let stand ten minutes before serving. ; name: ultimate oatmeal raisin cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, baking soda, ground cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, salt, eggs, oats, flour, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack. ; name: oatmeal raisin bran cookies ; ingredients: raisin bran cereal, whole wheat flour, self-rising flour, butter, sugar, light brown sugar, eggs ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 325f. In a bowl combine cereal, wheat flour, and flour. Set aside. In a larger mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack. ; name: apple and apricot crisp ; ingredients: dried apricot, brandy, all-purpose flour, dark brown sugar, salt, butter, old fashioned oats, sliced almonds, apples ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a small bowl, soak the apricots in brandy for 5 minutes. Blend flour, brown sugar, salt and butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add oats and almonds and toss. In a 9 inch glass pie dish, toss together apples, apricots and brandy. Sprinkle oat mixture evenly over top and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until apples are tender and topping is browned. ; name: apple cinnamon granola ; ingredients: rolled oats, pecan pieces, apple pie spice, honey, egg whites, unsweetened applesauce, dried cranberries, dried blueberries, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine oats, cinnamon, and pecan pieces. In a seperate bowl combine honey, egg whites, and applesauce. Pour honey mixture over oats and stir to combine. Place granola on baking sheet and place in oven for 60-90 minutes. Stir every 10-15 minutes. Remove granola from oven when it is crunchy. Cool and stir in dried fruit. Store in ziploc bags or seal with a food sealer. ; name: baked apple oatmeal ; ingredients: apples, old fashioned oats, raisins, ground cinnamon, salt, soymilk, real maple syrup, walnuts ; preparation:

name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: zesty lemon chicken ; ingredients: cooking spray, chicken breasts, lemon juice, lemon rind, chicken stock powder, brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, cornflour, water ; preparation:Coat a large non stick frypan with cooking spray. Fry the chicken until cooked through. Remove from the pan and leave to one side. Place all other ingredients into pan except the water and cornflour. Stir ingredients well until boiling. Combine cornflour with water and add to pan. Bring back to the boil stirring constantly. Cut chicken into large slices then return to the pan and re-heat, coating with sauce. ; name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: lemon pepper chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, lemons, black pepper, garlic cloves, honey, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400. Cover a glass baking dish with aluminum foil and place the chicken breasts on top. Zest all 3 of the lemons into a small bowl, and then add the juice of 2 of the lemons. Add the pepper and all the other ingredients into the bowl. Mix the combine and pour over all the chicken breasts. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill. ; name: sauteed chicken breasts w fresh herbs and ginger ; ingredients: peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice of, chicken broth, fresh gingerroot, fresh basil leaf, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken. ; name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: honey fried chicken ; ingredients: chicken legs, chicken tenderloins, flour, garlic salt, ground pepper, honey, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine flour, garlic salt and pepper in mixing bowl. Brush chicken with honey. Coat with flour mixture. Fry in oil to a nice golden brown, taking care as the chicken can burn rather easy. Turn often. Serve with mashed potatoes, a vegetable and gravy. ; name: farmgirl s funky chicken ; ingredients: chicken, relish, salt, oil, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:

name: pasta with beans basil corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, pasta, great northern beans, fresh basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red pepper, yellow pepper ; preparation:Cut the kernels off the uncooked cobs and set aside. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions for al dente. Add the corn kernels to the pot for the last 30 seconds. Drain pasta. And corn in a colander and transfer to a large bowl. Add the beans, basil, salt, olive oil, vinegar and peppers and gently toss. Until blended. This can be served warm or at room temperature. Sprinkle with additional. Fresh chopped basil for an extra color and flavor splash. ; name: italian style tomato sauce ; ingredients: italian plum tomatoes, olive oil, onions, tomato paste, basil, oregano, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks. ; name: shrimp and basil pasta ; ingredients: spaghetti, shrimp, fresh basil, capers, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt, baby spinach ; preparation:Bring 3 quarts water to a boil in a pot. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Add shrimp to pot. Cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done and pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture. ; name: lemon basil spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti noodles, olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Boil water and cook noodles 8-10 minutes. While the pasta is cooking, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and basil. Mix well. Once the pasta is cooked, drain and separate between two plates. Add the olive oil and lemon mixture and serve. ; name: spicy red pasta sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, diced tomatoes with juice, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: tomato and basil pasta sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried chili pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar, sugar, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:

name: parmesan rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, white rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, sliced almonds ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium sauce pan on medium heat. Add rice, cook and stir three minutes. Stir in chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes or until rice in tender. Stir in parmesan cheese and sliced almonds. ; name: rice pilaf with mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, onion, mushroom, salt & freshly ground black pepper, long-grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Melt butter in a large flameproof casserole and cook the onion over low heat for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, salt and pepper and continue cooking 5 minutes longer or until the mushrooms release their liquid. Turn up the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the moisture in the mushrooms evaporates. Add the rice and stir it for a few minutes or until the grains are transparent. Pour in the stock or stock mixed with water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, cover the pan and cook the rice for 20 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed. Transfer half the rice to a plastic container. Serve remaining rice at once. ; name: yummy rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, orzo pasta, scallions, long grain rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in medium sauce pan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste. ; name: fruit and wild rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, celery, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, long grain and wild rice blend, raisins, pecans ; preparation:Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add onions and celery. Cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add broth, water, rice, contents of seasoning packet, and fruit. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in pecans and serve. ; name: orange rice and barley pilaf ; ingredients: fresh orange juice, chicken broth, long grain brown rice, barley, dry white wine, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parsley, walnuts ; preparation:In a saucepan over med-high heat, bring orange juice and broth to a boil. Stir in rice and barley. Add in wine, thyme, salt, and pepper. Decrease heat to low and simmer, covered, until liquid is absorbed and rice and barley are tender, about 55-60 minutes. Add in parsley and nuts. Fluff with a fork. Serve. ; name: lemon rice pilaf ; ingredients: yellow onion, converted rice, water, unsalted butter, kosher salt, bay leaf, cayenne, lemon, zest of, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Saute onion in oil in a large saucepan just until softened. Add rice and continue sauteing until it starts to turn golden. Stir in water, butter, salt, bay leaf, and cayenne. Bring to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low. Cook until liquid is absorbed, 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon zest and juice. Allow rice to steep a few minutes before serving. ; name: lemon cilantro rice pilaf ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, water, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, ground turmeric, salt, green onion, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated lemon rind, lemon juice, turmeric and salt. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in green onions and cilantro. ; name: brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: brown rice, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, frozen peas, frozen corn, salt and pepper, basil, oregano, olive oil ; preparation:

name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: cheesy cheddar mock lasagna ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Prepare dinner according to package directions. Meanwhile, brown meat in large skillet. Drain. Add spaghetti sauce to meat. Mix well. Layer half each of the meat mixture and prepared dinner in 8-inch square baking dish. Repeat layers. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until heated through. ; name: easy kielbasa pasta ; ingredients: kielbasa, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, baby spinach, penne pasta ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook kielbasa in frying pan. Combine all ingredients into casserole dish except cheese. Sprinkle cheese on top. Place in oven for 7-10 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes and serve. ; name: easy chicken parmesan ; ingredients: pasta sauce, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta. ; name: cheezy chicken spaghetti bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, spaghetti, onion, green bell pepper, butter, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, velveeta cheese, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Bring chicken, salt and pepper to a boil in a large boiler, cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 45 minutes or until chicken breasts are done. Remove chicken reserving broth and cut into bite size pieces. Bring broth to a boil. Add spaghetti noodles and cook until tender. Chop onion and bell pepper, saute in butter until tender. Mix together next four ingredients, add onion mixture, spaghetti noodles and chicken, mix well. Pour into a casserole dish and top with reserved cheeses. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and heated throughout. ; name: toddler veggie packed pasta ; ingredients: farfalle pasta, pasta sauce, low-fat cream cheese, cheddar cheese, olive oil, frozen mixed vegetables ; preparation:Boil pasta according to directions, i always boil it a minute longer for younger toddlers. Add pasta to serving dish and mix with olive oil and cheddar cheese. Steam veggies according to directions. Heat sauce according to directions. In food processor or blender add veggies, sauce, and cream cheese. Blend well. Sauce will be thick. Stir sauce in with pasta and serve. ; name: easy creamy pasta with veggies ; ingredients: fusilli, california-blend frozen vegetables, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, mustard, cream cheese, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Bring a large saucepan of salted water to boil and cook pasta according to package directions. Add frozen veggies in with pasta during last five minutes of cooking. Drain pasta and veggies in colander. In the same pan, over low heat, whisk together soup, milk, parmesan, and mustard. Add cream cheese and whisk frequently while cream cheese melts. Once mixture is smooth, add veggies and pasta into sauce. Heat until mixture is combined and warmed through, stirring frequently. Taste. Add salt and pepper if desired. Serve. ; name: easy cheesy pasta ; ingredients: pasta shells, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: macaroni and cheese casserole ; ingredients: cooking spray, elbow macaroni, fat free cream of celery soup, fat-free mayonnaise, low-fat cheddar cheese, sweet red pepper, pimientos, whole wheat crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: cheesy stove top macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, parmesan cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, dry mustard, pepper, salt, cooked macaroni ; preparation:Start cooking the macaroni while you prepare the sauce to save time. Melt butter in a medium sauce pan. Whisk in flour. On medium-high heat, whisk in milk a little at a time. Continue to whisk til thick and bubbly. Do not allow to burn, turn down heat if sauce is cooking to fast to keep from burning. Whisk in mustard, salt and pepper. Reduce to medium heat, stir in cheeses. When melted and blended pour over cooked and drained macaroni. Taste, add more salt if needed. Mix and cook 1 or 2 minutes on medium heat. Serve. ; name: cheeseburger macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: oil, onion, ground beef, flour, milk, butter, garlic salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, cooked macaroni ; preparation:In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts. ; name: macaroni and beef casserole ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, lean ground beef, italian-style stewed tomatoes, dried oregano leaves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: macaroni and cottage cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, cottage cheese, milk, vegetable oil, salt, egg, garlic clove, cracker crumb ; preparation:Cook the macaroni according to directions. Stir cottage cheese with milk until smooth. In a seperate bowl, beat the egg, then beat the oil into it. Add salt and garlic to the cheese mixture.
