Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until hot dogs are browning. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through. ; name: sunrise chicken hash ; ingredients: olive oil, yukon gold potatoes, fennel, celery, cooked chicken, ripe olives, chives, dill, kosher salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and fennel and cook 5 to 6 minutes until golden. Add red onion, celery and chicken. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates. ; name: hash brown bake ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, butter, cooked ham, shredded cheddar cheese, red peppers, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: pepper jack potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, diced pimentos, salt, fresh breadcrumb, margarine, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: sunday morning hash browns potatoes homemade ; ingredients: russet potatoes, onions, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: comforting baked macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. ; name: oven macaroni ; ingredients: tomato bisque soup, water, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, oregano leaves, garlic salt, macaroni, green pepper ; preparation:In a 1 quart casserole dish blend together soup, water, cheese, and seasoning. Gently stir in cooked macaroni. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes or until hot. Stir mixture and garnish with green pepper rings if desired. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta macaroni salad ; ingredients: dry pasta, mayonnaise, buttermilk, fresh dill, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, cucumber, sweet red pepper, scallion ; preparation:Cook pasta to package. Drain and rinse with cold water. Set pasta to the side make sure all water is removed. In a big bowl combine mayo, buttermilk, dill, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Stir in pasta, celery, cucumber, scallions and sweet pepper. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk. ; name: macaroni surprise ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, macaroni, tomato sauce, garlic salt, chili powder, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a skillet saute onion and ground beef until meat is no longer pink. Stir in tomato sauce, macaroni and spices. Cover. Simmer on low heat for 15 minutes. Remove cover. If sauce is too thick add water. Serve topped with grated parmesan cheese and a side salad if desired. ; name: homemade beefaroni ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, lean ground beef, garlic, onion, condensed tomato soup, water, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni and drain. Brown together the ground beef, onion and garlic. Drain if needed. Mix in the soup, water and sugar to the beef mixture. Add the cooked macaroni and stir. Taste and add salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat for 15 minutes, stirring often. ; name: macaroni and beef casserole ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, lean ground beef, italian-style stewed tomatoes, dried oregano leaves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: cheeseburger macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: oil, onion, ground beef, flour, milk, butter, garlic salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, cooked macaroni ; preparation:In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts. ; name: gram s baked macaroni ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: oriental pumpkin stir fry ; ingredients: pumpkin, chicken stock, garlic cloves, gingerroot, green onions, sugar, apricot preserves, fish sauce, canola oil, pepper ; preparation:Peel pumpkin, remove seeds, wash and cube. Heat oil in a large pan, stir fry garlic, ginger and green onions until fragrant. Add pumpkin, sprinkle in sugar and saut for about 8-10 minutes until the pumpkin is soft. Add in chicken stock and fish sauce, bring to a boil. Then reduce heat and let it simmer for about 15 minutes. The pumpkin will be a little mushy at this point. Stir in preserve evenly, sprinkle with pepper and serve with jasmine rice. ; name: stir fried green beans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh green beans, garlic, fresh gingerroot, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, black bean sauce, white sesame seeds ; preparation:In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving. ; name: stir fry mushrooms and bell peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, green onions, garlic cloves, bell peppers, champignon mushrooms, chinese rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oil til really hot. Stir fry onions, then garlic. Then add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft,. Add the wine and soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes. When done, remove from heat and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve. ; name: spinach stir fry with garlic ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic clove, fresh spinach, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minutes. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve. ; name: stir fry chicken salad ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetables, garlic cloves, broccoli floret, mixed baby greens, italian dressing, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve with noodles or rice. ; name: summer squash stir fry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, zucchini, summer squash, red bell pepper, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat a large skillet or wok over high heat. Add vegetable oil or spray to coat pan. Add zucchini, summer squash, and red pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, for 3 to 4 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Add italian seasoning and garlic powder. Cook 1 minute more- serve hot. ; name: scallop and shiitake stir fry ; ingredients: scallops, sesame oil, peanut oil, shiitake mushrooms, baby bok choy, sugar snap peas, fresh gingerroot, garlic cloves, lime, juice of, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut each scallop in half and each coral into three pieces. Heat a wok with the two oils. Add the scallops and the corals, and toss for one minute over high heat. Add the mushrooms, bok choy stalks and sugar snap peas, then stir-fry for one minute further. Spoon in the ginger and garlic, along with the bok choy leaves and a little water, and stir-fry all together for another minute or two until the leaves have wilted. Add the lime juice. Season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve on warm plates. ; name: asian style vegetable stir fry ; ingredients: honey, stir-fry sauce, red pepper flakes, peanuts, broccoli florets, mushrooms, onion, carrot ; preparation:

name: lemon cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, vegetable oil cooking spray, parsley, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish. ; name: fish madelene ; ingredients: flounder, sliced almonds, parsley, butter, white wine, lemon juice, lemon pepper ; preparation:Place fish in a shallow baking dish, in a single layer. Sprinkle fish with lemon pepper. Sprinkle fish with almonds and parsley. In a small bowl combine butter, wine and lemon juice. Pour over fish. Cover and bake at 350 for 10minutes. Uncover and bake another 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let set 5 minutes. Before serving. ; name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: roasted bluefish for two ; ingredients: bluefish, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, capers, tomatoes, fresh dill, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Lightly saute onion and garlic in olive oil. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees. Place the fillet in a lightly oiled baking dish with the skin-side down. Cover it with onion-garlic mixture and tomatoes, then capers and dill. Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Roast for 15 to 20 minutes or till the fish becomes opaque. ; name: lemony salmon ; ingredients: salmon, lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Line a baking sheet with tin foil, and rest the fish on top of the tin foil. Drizzle the lemon onto the fish. Season with parsley, salt and pepper. Put in a preheated 350 f oven. Cook it for 30 minutes or until done. ; name: citrus balsamic glazed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt and pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice, brown sugar, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired. ; name: spicy whitefish with olives and cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, tilapia fillets, fresh parsley, dried red pepper flakes, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive, garlic cloves ; preparation:Heat olive oil in heavy non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saute until just opaque in the center, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer fish to platter. Add parsley and crushed pepper to same skillet and saute for one minute. Add tomatoes, olives and garlic. Saute about two minutes until tomatoes soften and get juicy. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Spoon over fish and serve hot. ; name: citrus roasted fish with capers ; ingredients: fish, olive oil, lemon, juice of, sea salt, pepper, lemon, orange, capers ; preparation:

name: quick and easy tuna noodle casserole ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, elbow macaroni, water, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles. Then strain. Mix in cream of mushroom soup and tuna. Pour into casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese of top. Bake at 350 until cheese is melted. Let cool and serve. ; name: old fashioned tuna potato chip casserole ; ingredients: noodles, cream of mushroom soup, milk, canned tuna, potato chips, onion, cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles in unsalted water. Drain noodles. Mix soup, milk and tuna with noodles. Add shredded cheese and onion. Pour into casserole dish. Crush potato chips and sprinkle on top. Bake 15 minutes at 425 degrees. ; name: all in one tuna casserole ; ingredients: onion soup mix, milk, frozen peas and carrot, egg noodles, tuna, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large bowl, blend onion soup mix with cream of mushroom soup and milk. Stir in peas & carrots, cooked noodles, cheese and tuna. Turn into greased 2-quart baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until bubbling. ; name: tuna rice casserole ; ingredients: brown rice, cream of mushroom soup, water, tuna fish, frozen peas, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 and put rice and tuna into casserole dish. On the stove, heat soup, adding the water to it. Bring to a boil. Add peas, stir and bring to boil again. Pour on top of rice. Lay cheese on top. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: low fat tuna casserole ; ingredients: tuna, no yolks egg noodle substitute, cream of celery soup, peas, dill weed, pepper ; preparation:Prepare egg noodles according to package directions. When noodles are done drain well. Put noodles back into pan and add the drained tuna, drained peas, soups and seasonings to noodles and mix altogether. You may want to warm the casserole in the pan after you are done making it. It may be a little bit cool for your taste after you add all of the ingredients but i even like this cold. Make sure that you do not overcook when heating this up. It will stick to the pan fast so i always heat it on the lowest flame for only about 5 minutes or until warmed through. ; name: tuna italian ; ingredients: onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, cheddar cheese, tuna, sliced mushrooms, parsley, lemon juice, noodles ; preparation:Cook onion until tender but not brown. Add soup, milk, and cheese. Heat and stir. Break tuna in chunks and add to remaining ingredients. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: tuna or chicken enchilada casserole ; ingredients: tuna in water, canned corn niblets, mild green chilies, black olives, white onion, sour cream, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, soft taco-size flour tortillas, red enchilada sauce, iceberg lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix the first 8 ingredients together through the tortillas. Pour 1 cup of the enchilada sauce in the bottom of a 13x9 casserole dish. Spread enchilada mix over the sauce in the 13x9 dish. Pour the remaining sauce over the enchilada mix. Top with remaining 1 cup of cheese. Bake for 1 hour until bubbly. Let sit for 5-10 minutes before serving. Great with crisp torn iceberg lettuce and sour cream. ; name: kid friendly tuna casserole ; ingredients: pasta, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, canned tuna ; preparation:

name: basil chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, boneless chicken breast halves, fresh basil, salt, hot pepper sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: pepperoni angel hair ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, cucumber, green pepper, pepperoni, italian salad dressing, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine the cucumber, green pepper and pepperoni in a large bowl. Drain pasta and add to pepperoni mixture. Top with the salad dressing and parmasean cheese. Toss to coat. Serve. ; name: toasted angel hair pasta with roasted red peppers and sausage ; ingredients: sausage links, garlic cloves, angel hair pasta, chicken broth, dried basil, roasted red pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook sausage in large skillet, crumble. Saute garlic. Remove from skillet, leave grease in skillet. Add pasta to skillet and brown in grease 8-10 minutes. Add broth, peppers and spices, stir to mix. Cook until all liquid is absorbed, uncovered. Add meat to heat, mix. Serve with fresh parmesan over top. ; name: shrimp and asparagus with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, yellow pepper, asparagus spear, medium shrimp, green onions, lemons, zest of, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, in large skillet, in 2 tbsp. Olive oil, saute bell pepper and blanched asparagus spears. Add shrimp and cook until shrimp just turns pink. Toss shrimp mixture with prepared pasta. Add remaining olive oil, green onions, lemon zest and lemon juice. Sprinkle hot pasta with fresh, grated parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: summer fresh pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, sweet corn, crabmeat, sweet butter ; preparation:Heat oil in a large pan. Saute onions and garlic till translucent. Add remaining ingredients except for butter just to heat through. Stir in pasta. Place into a large pasta bowl. Top with butter while hot. Garnish with pepper flakes to taste. ; name: eggplant and diced tomatoes over angel hair ; ingredients: eggplant, diced tomatoes, fresh parsley, fresh basil, olive oil, salt and pepper, garlic powder, whole wheat angel hair pasta, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat a 13x9 inch pan with olive oil. Cube a medium sized eggplant and add to the pan. Add the diced tomatoes, parsley, basil, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Stir to coat. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for about 1 hour. Toss over angel hair pasta or thin spaghetti. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: angel hair with garlic spinach and white beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach leaves, cannellini beans, vegetable broth, angel hair pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: bacon stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Clean mushrooms with cool water. Remove stems from mushrooms and chop. Cook onions and chopped mushroom stems in butter until tender. Add bread crumbs. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and cheese. Mound filling into mushroom caps. Place in shallow baking pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted. Serve warm. ; name: carrot and cheese crustless quiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrot, salt, curry powder, eggs, milk, mozzarella cheese, paprika ; preparation:In a skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add onion and saute for 5 minute. Add carrots, salt and curry powder. Cook for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from heat and cool. In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs and milk. Stir into veggie mixture. Pour into greased 8x8 pan. Bake at 300 for 20 minutes. Top with cheese and paprika. Return to oven and bake for another 15 minutes or until custard is firm and cheese is melted. Cut into square and serve. ; name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: sausage quiche ; ingredients: sausage, 9-inch deep dish pie crust, eggs, heavy cream, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet, drain well. Spoon into pie shell. Mix the eggs and cream in a bowl. Spoon over sausage. Top with cheese. Bake ar 350. For partially bake pie crust i bake it about 10 minutes to set the crust. ; name: roasted asparagus onions and mushrooms ; ingredients: asparagus, mushroom, red onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender. ; name: mushroom bacon burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, sliced mushrooms, bacon, green onions, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, salt, pepper, hamburger buns, cheese slice ; preparation:Mix together first 8 ingredients in a bowl. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Grill over medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes or until done, turning once. Just before taking off the grill, place cheese slice on each patty. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, etc. ; name: crock pot asparagus casserole ; ingredients: asparagus, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, saltine, butter ; preparation:Place drained asparagus in lightly buttered crock pot. Combine soup and cheese. Top asparagus with soup mixture, then the cracker crumbs. Dot with butter. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 6 hours. ; name: asparagus mushroom bacon quiche ; ingredients: pie crust, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon, mushroom, onion, asparagus spears, milk, eggs, italian seasoning, garlic ; preparation:

name: asian turkey burger ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, applesauce, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the turkey, applesauce, hoisin and soy sauces, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, scallions and salt and pepper to taste. Form the meat into 6 patties. Lightly brush a grill pan or skillet with the sesame oil and place over medium-high heat. Add the patties and fry until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and cook until the other side is golden and the turkey is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bun. Serve immediately. ; name: oven baked sweet bbq chops ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, brown sugar, ketchup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine everything in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Simmer 5 minutes. Place 3 pork chops in a pan. Spoon sauce on top and cover. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: glazed turkey tenderloins ; ingredients: turkey breast tenderloins, vegetable oil, orange marmalade, ground ginger, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Cook turkey breast tenderloins in oil in skillet over medium heat about 5 minutes or until brown on one side. Turn turkey. Stir in remaining ingredients. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until turkey is done & sauce is thickened. Cut turkey into thin slices. Spoon sauce over turkey. ; name: lemon turkey breast ; ingredients: turkey breast cutlets, lemon pepper, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, parsley, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Coat a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat for 30 seconds. Add turkey. Sprinkle with lemon pepper. And cook for 3 to 5 minutes on each side until browned and no longer pink in center. Combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl, mixing well. Add to pan and cook until heated through. Garnish with parsley. ; name: sweet sour crock pot turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, dry breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, onions, egg, jellied cranberry sauce, ketchup, chili sauce ; preparation:Combine turkey, bread crumbs, parsley, onion and egg in a large bowl. Mix well and shape into 24 meatballs. In a 6 quart. Slow cooker, mix cranberry sauce, ketchup and chili sauce. Carefully add the meatballs, coating them with the sauce mixture. Put the lid on and cook on low for 8-10 hours. ; name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: baked barbecue chicken ; ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, onion, ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, liquid smoke ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Place chicken pieces in 13x9-inch baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Arrange onion slices over top. In small saucepan, combine ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and liquid smoke. Heat over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Pour over chicken. Bake chicken 1 hour or until juices run clear. Discard onion slices. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: baked bbq turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: turkey legs, sea salt, black pepper, unsulphured molasses, red wine vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red onion, coconut oil ; preparation:

name: carrot and radish salad ; ingredients: carrots, radish, salt, sesame oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:Put the carrot and radish in a bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, and cayenne. Mix and eat. ; name: cool cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumber, tomatoes, green pepper, onion, lime juice, red wine vinegar, dill weed, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, green pepper and the onions. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, vinegar, dill, salt and pepper. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon. ; name: crisp cucumber radish salad ; ingredients: english cucumber, carrot, radish, white onion, vegetable oil, rice wine vinegar, brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Halve cucumber lengthwise. Seed and thinly slice crosswise. Place in bowl. Peel and halve carrot. Thinly slice crosswise and add to cucumber. Add radish and onion. Whisk together oil, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce. Add to cucumber mixture and toss to coat. ; name: strawberry salad with orange blossom water ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, orange juice, orange blossom water, sugar ; preparation:Mix the orange juice, orange water and sugar. Pour over the strawberries. Place mixture in the fridge for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. Sprinkle with chopped mint or pistachio. ; name: green bean salad with radishes and prosciutto ; ingredients: green beans, radishes, prosciutto, sherry wine, dijon mustard, fresh chives, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook beans in a large pot of salted water until crisp-tender, about 4-5 minutes. Drain well and cool. Whisk sherry, mustard, and chives, then gradually whisk in the oil. Season with salt and pepper. Toss beans, radishes, and prosciutto, then toss with enough dresing to coat. Using a vegetable peeler, shave parmesan or reggiatto on top of salad. ; name: spinach salad with egg vinaigrette ; ingredients: egg, fresh spinach, garlic clove, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from spinach. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat. ; name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: strawberry and greens salad ; ingredients: mixed salad green, radishes, strawberry, spring onions, red pepper, coriander, vinaigrette ; preparation:

name: ww 4 pt diet soda cake ; ingredients: cake mix, diet soda, sugar free fat free instant pudding mix, cool whip free ; preparation:Mix cake mix and can of drink together using mixer. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 baking pan. Bake according to package directions. While cake is baking, make pudding mixture using ff milk. When cake is cooled, top with pudding then cool whip. ; name: shoo fly cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, margarine, sugar, salt, molasses, water, hot water, baking soda ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients with margarine. Take 1 cup of mixture and reserve for topping and set aside. Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add molasses, water and dissolved baking soda. Mix well. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with reserved topping mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: no bake coconut cake ; ingredients: angel food cake, instant vanilla pudding, coconut, cool whip, milk ; preparation:Crumble angle food cake in large dish. Mix instant pudding& milk according to the instructions on the package. Add coconut. Pour over cake and mix thoroughly. Top with cool whip, chill. ; name: basic pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, evaporated milk ; preparation:Beat sugar, butter, vanilla and eggs in large bowl, low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl, then at high speed for 5 minutes, scrape occasionally. In separate bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt. Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture alternately with milk on low speed. Spread into pan. Bake in 2 loaf pans for approx 55 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: juanita roberts blueberry cake ; ingredients: sugar, egg, butter, flour, baking soda, salt, vanilla, sour milk, blueberries ; preparation:Cream sugar, egg and butter together until fluffy. Sift the flour, baking soda and salt together and gradually beat into the butter mixture along with the vanilla and milk. Beat cake batter until smooth. Stir in berries. Pour cake into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees fpr 45-60 minutes. ; name: fat free sour cream pound cake ; ingredients: nonfat sour cream, egg whites, vanilla, unbleached flour, splenda sugar substitute, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Oil and flour a loaf pan. In a mixing bowl, combine sour cream, egg whites, and vanilla. In another mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just moistened. Pour into pan and bake for 1 hour or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: weight watchers raspberry zinger cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, diet sprite, egg whites, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cool whip, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: grilled buttermilk ranch marinated chicken breast ; ingredients: chicken breasts, buttermilk ranch dressing, lemon, juice and zest of, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh ground pepper, fresh savory ; preparation:Wash and dry the chicken breasts and set aside. In the bowl of a food processor or blender, put in the ranch dip, lemon zest and juice, garlic, olive oil and fresh ground pepper. Process until well blended. Stir in the herbs. Place the chicken in a large zip loc bag and pour in the marinade to coat the chicken well. Close bag tightly and place in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat grill and when well heated, reduce to low. Lay the chicken on the grill, cover and check frequently to make sure chicken does not burn. It is important to cook the chicken slowly about 25-30 minutes turning once. ; name: low fat oven bake crispy chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, buttermilk, dried breadcrumbs, garlic powder, chili powder, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken breasts into about 3 pieces and put into a ziplock bag, add the buttermilk and marinade overnight, or for at least 2 hours. Preheat oven to 325f and spray a baking sheet with pam cooking spray. Put all the dry ingredients into a ziplock bag and shake to combine. Remove chicken from the ziplock bag and shake off any excess buttermilk and add to the breadcrumb mix, add 3 pieces at a time and shake to coat the chicken. Remove and place on baking sheet. Repeat till all pieces are coated. Spray chicken with pam cooking spray and bake for about 20 minutes. ; name: oven baked chicken ; ingredients: tomato soup mix, self rising flour, italian salad dressing mix, salt, butter, paprika, cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together and place mixture in a zip lock bag. Rinse chicken in cold water and pat dry. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray to prevent sticking. Add chicken breast to dry mixture and shake to coat evenly. Place chicken on baking sheet and brush with melted butter and spray chicken with cookings spray for a crispier coating. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. Omit butter until you are cooking the chicken. ; name: baked fried chicken ; ingredients: flour, seasoned bread crumbs, old bay seasoning, salt, pepper, frying chicken, oil ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: chicken ranch pasta bowl ; ingredients: cooked chicken, onion, tomatoes, bacon, ranch dressing, lemon juice, garlic powder, pasta ; preparation:Mix the ranch dressing, garlic powder and lemon juice in the bottom of a pasta bowl, and set aside. Cook the pasta according to package direction, and drain. Add to the pasta bowl and toss lightly. Fry the bacon until crisp, remove and crumple. Drain all the fat except about one tablespoon. Saute the onions in the remaining bacon dripping until transparent, then add the cooked chicken and cook until warm. Add the chicken, onion, bacon, and diced tomatoes to the pasta and toss again. Season with pepper to taste. ; name: crispy parmesan ranch chicken breasts strips or tenders ; ingredients: corn flakes, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, black pepper, dry ranch dressing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter ; preparation:Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Set oven to 350 degrees f. In a shallow dish mix together the cornflake crumbs with parmesan cheese, garlic powder black pepper and dry ranch dressing mix. Place the melted butter in a shallow dish. Coat the chicken breast or strips into the melted butter, then roll into the cornflake mixture. Place in prepared baking dish. Bake uncovered for about 30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. ; name: best baked chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt, pepper, lemon juice, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350. In a large bowl mix the breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter. Dip the chicken in the breaded mix. Brush lemon juice onto the tops of the chicken. Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for one hour. ; name: oven ranch chicken ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, ranch dressing mix, low-fat sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:

name: creamy cheesy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, butter, light spreadable cheese with garlic and herbs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium to medium low heat, melt butter in frying pan. Add the wedges of laughing cow cheese and slowly melt. In mixing bowl, crack and whisk eggs until puffy. Add eggs to pan & turn with a spatula. When the eggs are pretty well set, add the shredded cheddar and take the pan off the heat. Mix the cheddar in by folding over the eggs until cheddar is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: creamy scrambled eggs with fines herbes ; ingredients: eggs, mixed herbs, kosher salt, butter, baguette, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, herbs, and salt. Stir in 1 tablespoon of the butter. Heat a small skillet over medium low heat. Add egg mixture and cook, while stirring, so that the eggs do not set too fast. The eggs will begin to set and form a creamy sauce. Add in the remaining butter, one piece at a time, continuing to stir. Arrange the toasts on serving plates. Once the eggs set spoon them over the toast, season with pepper and the remaining herbs, and serve immediately. ; name: country style scrambled eggs ; ingredients: bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove to paper towels to drain. Cook and stir potatoes in drippings over medium heat for 12 minutes or until tender. Add onion and green pepper. Cook and stir for 3 or 4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Stir in the reserved bacon. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted. ; name: chopped egg sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, whole milk, salt, white pepper, eggs ; preparation:Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan. Stir in flour, increasing heat if necessary until the mixture gently bubbles. Cook 2 minutes. Remove pan from burner, add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook, stirring constanly, until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly, adding more milk if the sauce becomes too thick. Season with salt and pepper, add chopped egg and mix. ; name: ranch deviled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, ranch salad dressing, cream cheese, salt & pepper, paprika ; preparation:Place eggs in sauce pan and cover with water. Bring water to a quick boil. Remove from heat and cover for 20 minute. Let eggs cool. Shell eggs and cut in half. Scoop out hard boiled yoke. Mash the yoke with a fork until smooth. If you add your salt now this will help. Add ranch salad dressing and cream cheese to the mashed yokes and mix well. You may need to add a little more ranch dressing to get your desired creaminess. Use a piping bag or spoon to fill the egg halves. Sprinkle with paprika. ; name: egg roll salad ; ingredients: coleslaw mix, cooked chicken, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, garlic powder, egg roll wraps, green onion, sweet and sour sauce, vegetable oil ; preparation:In large frying pan heat oil. Slowly add egg roll wrappers fry until crispy set aside on paper towel to drain. Add coleslaw mixture to frying pan then add meat and soy and teriyaki sauce and garlic powder. Stir until warmed through. Place salad into serving bowl topped with crispy egg roll wrappers and chopped green onion. Serve warm with sweet and sour sauce or duck sauce to taste. ; name: buffalo style stuffed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, blue cheese, mayonnaise, parsley, tabasco sauce, salt, pepper, celery salt, celery rib ; preparation:Hard cook eggs. Cool, shell, then cut in half. Mash yolks and mix well all other ingredients except diced celery. Spoon yolk mixture back into egg white halves. Garnish with diced celery. ; name: seasoned scrambled eggs ; ingredients: egg whites, eggs, ranch salad dressing, spicy brown mustard, fresh parsley, garlic powder, canola oil, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: carrot and ginger salad ; ingredients: sultana raisin, carrot, salt, honey, peanuts, gingerroot, lemon, orange, sour cream ; preparation:Put a little water into a kettle and put it on to boil. Put the sultanas into a small bowl, then cover them with boiling water and set them aside. To make the citrus dressing, peel and finely grate the ginger into a small mixing bowl. Finely grate half the rind from the lemon and then from the orange into the bowl. Squeese the juice from half of the lemon and then from half of the orange and add it to the ginger in the mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream or yogurt and set the dressing aside. Peel the carrots and grate them into a serving bowl, then drain the sultanas and add them. Stir the dressing into the carrots and sultana mixture, then season with salt and add honey or sugar to taste. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and serve. ; name: clementine cake ; ingredients: clementines, ground almonds, sugar, baking powder, eggs ; preparation:Boil the whole clementines for 2 hours in water. Yes, whole skin and stalk. Once boiled, place clementines, almonds, sugar, baking powder and eggs into a blender and mix. Place in a greased deep cake tin. Bake for 1 hour on gas 4. ; name: glazed carrots with ginger ; ingredients: unsalted butter, baby carrots, sugar, chicken broth, gingerroot, golden raisins, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skilloet over medium heat, tilting pan to coat completely. Add carrots and cook for 1 minute. Add sugar and stir to combine, cook for 1 minute. Add chicken broth, grated ginger, raisins, salt and pepper and cook for 20 minutes or until carrots are tender when pierced with a fork. Serve warm. Makes 4 servings. ; name: glazed ginger carrots ; ingredients: carrot, butter, light brown sugar, ground ginger, soy sauce, orange juice ; preparation:Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed. ; name: carrot cake muffins ; ingredients: oil, brown sugar, egg, applesauce, carrots, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt ; preparation:In a large mixer, combine oil, brown sugar and the egg on medium speed. Blend in the baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and applesauce. Add the carrots and flour, mix well. Preheat oven to 400. Spoon batter to top of muffin cups. Bake at 400 for 25-30 minutes. ; name: crunchy pound cake ; ingredients: butter, shortening, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes. ; name: orange glazed carrots with mint ; ingredients: baby carrots, vegetable oil, ginger, garlic, shallot, honey, orange juice, soy sauce, water, of fresh mint ; preparation:Cut the carrots on the diagonal into 3-inch lengths. Cut thicker pieces in half lengthwise to make them uniform in size. Heat the oil in a 9-inch saute pan over moderate heat. Add the carrots and cook until lightly browned on all sides, about 3 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper. Add the ginger, garlic, and shallots and cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the shallots are softened, 5-7 minutes. Add the honey, orange juice, soy sauce and water. Cover with a round of waxed paper that fits snugly on the vegetables. Cook the carrots slowly on top of the stove, stirring occasionally, until the carrots are tender and the juices have formed a glaze, 30-40 minutes. Garnish with the mint. ; name: the cake of wisdom ; ingredients: carrots, ginger, lemon peel, eggs, honey, cinnamon, dry breadcrumbs, ground hazelnuts, cream cheese ; preparation:

name: splendiferous guacamole with sour cream dip ; ingredients: avocados, lime juice, hot sauce, sour cream, fresh cilantro, dried cilantro, jalapeno pepper, yellow onion ; preparation:Peel and pit the avocados, then coarsely mash them in a bowl with a fork. Mix in the lime juice, blending well. Add the other ingredients and combine well. Garnish with sour cream and sprinkle a little cilantro on top. May be served at room temperature or chilled. Serve with warm tortilla chilps or veggie dippers. ; name: easy awesome guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, salsa, sour cream, mayonnaise, onion powder, pepper, salt, garlic, lemon juice, fresh chives ; preparation:Cut avocados in half and take out the seed, scoop out meat with a spoon and place in bowl. Mash the avocado with a fork. Add the salsa, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Mix together well. Add lemon juice, mix and serve. Garnish with fresh chives. ; name: simply guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocado, mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, and salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: low fat guacamole with cottage cheese ; ingredients: avocado, low fat cottage cheese, fresh lime juice, green onion, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeo and garlic. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: guacamole sandwiches ; ingredients: avocados, cottage cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts, taco sauce ; preparation:Position knife blade in food processor bowl. Add first 4 ingredients, and process until smooth. Set aside. Place tortillas on a lightly greased baking sheet. Top with cheese slices. Broil 6 inches from heat just until cheese melts. Spoon avocado mixture evenly onto tortillas. Top evenly with tomato slices and sprouts. Fold tortillas in half. Serve with taco sauce, if desired. ; name: grecian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, sweet onion, olive oil, tomatoes, dried oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Cook for 3-4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. In a small skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minutes longer or until heated through. ; name: green bean medley ; ingredients: fresh green beans, carrots, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, seasoning salt, garlic, white pepper ; preparation:Steam or cook carrots and green beans in boiling water. Cook until tender, but still firm. Melt butter over medium heat. Saute onions and mushrooms until almost tender. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 3 minutes. Stir in green beans, carrots, seasoned salt, garlic, and white pepper. Cover and cook five minutes on low heat. ; name: spring green guacamole ; ingredients: peas, avocado, nonfat sour cream, green onion, cilantro, lime juice, green chili, garlic clove, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: garlic ginger chicken for two ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, cumin, ground ginger, lemon juice, dark brown sugar, water ; preparation:Use one tablespoon of the olive oil to saute the chicken breast over medium heat until brown, set aside. Add second tablespoon of olive oil, butter, garlic and spices and saut until fragrant. Add lemon juice and stir until mixed. Add reserved chicken, brown sugar and enough water or wine to create a sauce with the spices and sugar. Simmer about 10 minutes, turning once, until the flavors begin to penetrate the meat. Add more water as needed. ; name: honey and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, green onions, garlic clove, honey, orange juice, orange, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked. ; name: orange rosemary chicken ; ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, dry white wine, honey dijon mustard, fresh rosemary, soy sauce, tabasco sauce, garlic, hickory chips, chicken ; preparation:Blend first 7 ingredients in processor. Set orange glaze aside. Prepare bbq. Place smoke chips in 8x6-inch foil packet with open top. Set packet atop coals about 5 minutes before grilling. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until golden, turning occasionally, about 5 minutes per side. Continue grilling chicken until cooked through, brushing glaze over chicken and turning occasionally, about 25 minutes longer. ; name: keys style citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, garlic cloves, butter, lime peel, lime juice, ground ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, orange ; preparation:In large skillet, cook chicken and garlic in hot butter over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning chicken once and stirring garlic occasionally. In a small bowl, combine lime peel, lime juice, ginger, and red pepper. Set aside. Peel orange. Reserving juice, cut orange in half lengthwise. Then cut crosswise into slices. Add any reserved orange juice and the lime juice mixture to the skillet. Place orange slices on top of the chicken. Cook, covered, 1-2 minutes or until healted through. ; name: orange teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen vegetables, quick-cooking tapioca, chicken stock, orange marmalade, teriyaki sauce, dry mustard, ground ginger ; preparation:In a skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours. ; name: orange thyme chicken ; ingredients: chicken drumsticks, garlic clove, thyme, orange juice, marmalade ; preparation:Heat oven to 180 c. Combine all ingredients but chicken in a saucepan. Stir over low heat until melted and well combined. Cool slightly then add chicken. Toss to coat then chill for 15 minutes. Place 1 cup of water in a roasting pan. Position wire rack over pan. Place chicken on rack, bake 35 minutes. Brush every 10 minutes with reserved marinade. ; name: ann s chicken oriental ; ingredients: chicken breasts, rose wine, salad oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, paprika, garlic powder, pepper, oregano ; preparation:Place one cut up fryer or 4 breasts in a casserole. Combine all other ingredients. Pour sauce over chicken. Place in 350 degree oven. After 1 hour turn chicken. Back another 30-45 minutes. Serve with white rice. ; name: orange ginger chicken and rice recipe ; ingredients: orange juice, onion, cooked brown rice, fresh ginger, dried parsley, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: bourbon mustard glazed pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt and pepper, grainy mustard, stock, honey, butter, bourbon ; preparation:Preheat oven 400. Place large oven skillet over medium high heat with 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Season the chops and sear until deep golden brown. When chops are seared, add 1 tablespoon olive oil along with the mustard, stock, honey and butter. When liquids come up to a bubble, pour bourbon into the skillet, remove from heat and carefully flame with a lighter. Or just continue boiling the sauce and the alcohol will cook away. Season the sauce with salt and pepper, and continue cooking until it starts to thicken, 2-3 minutes. Flip the chops over and transfer the entire pan to the oven to finish cooking, about 5 minutes. ; name: honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, honey, lemon juice, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops. ; name: pork with horseradish mustard sauce ; ingredients: garlic cloves, pepper, pork tenderloin, evaporated skim milk, prepared horseradish, stone ground mustard ; preparation:Combine garlic, pepper and salt to taste, rub over tenderloins. Cover and chill 1 hour. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly coat rack of shallow roasting pan with non-stick cooking spray. Brown tenderloins in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat 1 - 2 minutes on each side. Place in roasting pan on rack. Bake 25 - 30 minutes or until a meat thermometer inserted into thickest portion registers 160 degrees. Let stand 10 minutes before slicing. Heat evaporated milk in medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring frequently. Add horseradish and mustard. Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture is heated. Serve over tenderloin. ; name: pork chops with tangy creole mustard pineapple sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt, pepper, chicken broth, pineapple preserves, creole mustard, cider vinegar, tabasco sauce, light brown sugar ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, heat the olive oil. Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper and add to the skillet. Cook the chops, turning, until well browned. Add the chicken broth. Cover and continue cooking for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients. Add the sauce to the pork chops, turning to coat well. Cook the chops, uncovered, for 15 minutes longer, turning occasionally. ; name: dijon crusted pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, dijon mustard, fresh rosemary, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes. ; name: creamy citrus sauce pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, orange juice, orange zest, white wine, onion, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Chop onion and set aside. Heat oil in large high sided pan over medium heat. Salt and pepper each chop, put in hot oil. Cook about 3 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. To the pan add the orange juice, zest, onion, and white wine. Reduce heat to low cover and cook for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes remove pork chops from pan. Put them on a serving platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Add the cream of mushroom soup to the pan and whisk constantly over medium heat until the sauce is thickened. Pour over chops. ; name: pork chops in honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, dry white wine, honey, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: 5 spice tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, five-spice powder, reduced sodium soy sauce, light brown sugar, canola oil, scallions ; preparation:Sprinkle both sides of tilapia fillets with 5-spice powder. Combine soy sauce and brown sugar in a small bowl. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook until the outer edges are opaque, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium, turn the fish over, stir the soy mixture and pour into the pan. Bring the sauce to a boil and cook until the fish is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more. Add scallions and remove from the heat. Serve the fish drizzled with the sauce. ; name: cajun rubbed tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, paprika, light brown sugar, garlic powder, cumin, ground cayenne pepper, salt, olive oil ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine everything but the tilapia and olive oil. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Rub spice mixture onto both sides of each fillet and add to the skillet. Cookuntil just opaque in the center, gently turning halfway though. ; name: crusted tilapia ; ingredients: crushed tomatoes, tilapia fillets, salt and pepper, corn chips, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, butter ; preparation:In a 9x13 pan pour crushed tomatoes in bottom spread evenly. Place tilapia fillets on top of tomatoes and sprinkle salt and pepper on them. Crush corn chips until pieces are small and mix with cheese and bread crumbs. Melt butter and mix with the breading mixture. Spoon topping over fish and bake 400 for 20 minutes. ; name: easy roasted tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, lemon juice, olive oil, thyme, garlic clove, onion, salt, pepper ; preparation:Drizzle lemon juice over tilapia fillet. Salt and pepper to taste. Heat oil in a pan. Add thyme and garlic. Roast fillet on medium high heat on each side for about 3 minutes. Do not overcook. Remove fillet from pan and drain on paper towels. Add onion slices to pan and cook until soft for about 1-2 minutes. Serve fillet with onion slices. Just increase the amount of ingredients to your needs, but use as less oil as possible and do not use more than 8 sprigs thyme and 2 cloves garlic for one pan. ; name: honey mustard pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, honey, dijon mustard, olive oil, garlic, dried oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices. ; name: baked honey mustard garlic drumettes ; ingredients: garlic cloves, honey, dijon mustard, light soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, chicken drummettes ; preparation:Combine garlic, honey, mustard, soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a non-reactive bowl. Add chicken toss to coat each piece well. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour or up to one day. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place chicken in a singe layer on a wire rack over an oven tray. Bake 45 minutes until well browned and cooked through. ; name: dijon glazed halibut ; ingredients: dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, halibut fillets ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Coat the grill rack with nonstick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients but fish and optional parsley. Brush over fish. Grill fish, covered with grill lid, 6 to 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes with a fork. Garnish with additional parsley, if used. ; name: honey mustard tilapia ; ingredients: butter, dijon-style mustard, honey, seasoned dry bread crumb, pecans, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: baked garlic lemon tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, garlic cloves, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the lemon juice and shut off flame. Spray the bottom of a baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh parsley. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes. ; name: easy roasted tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, lemon juice, olive oil, thyme, garlic clove, onion, salt, pepper ; preparation:Drizzle lemon juice over tilapia fillet. Salt and pepper to taste. Heat oil in a pan. Add thyme and garlic. Roast fillet on medium high heat on each side for about 3 minutes. Do not overcook. Remove fillet from pan and drain on paper towels. Add onion slices to pan and cook until soft for about 1-2 minutes. Serve fillet with onion slices. Just increase the amount of ingredients to your needs, but use as less oil as possible and do not use more than 8 sprigs thyme and 2 cloves garlic for one pan. ; name: tilapia with garlic lime butter ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, butter, garlic powder, lime juice ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add tilapia fillets to the pan. Sprinkle the fish with garlic powder. Pour lime juice over fish. Saute the tilapia until the fillets are opaque and easily flake with a fork. Serve while hot. I like to serve this with a side of rice pilaf and california blend veggies. ; name: 5 spice tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, five-spice powder, reduced sodium soy sauce, light brown sugar, canola oil, scallions ; preparation:Sprinkle both sides of tilapia fillets with 5-spice powder. Combine soy sauce and brown sugar in a small bowl. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook until the outer edges are opaque, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium, turn the fish over, stir the soy mixture and pour into the pan. Bring the sauce to a boil and cook until the fish is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more. Add scallions and remove from the heat. Serve the fish drizzled with the sauce. ; name: sauteed tilapia fillets with lime ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, garlic, dry white wine, lime juice, butter, olive oil, green onions ; preparation:Rinse the fish and pat dry. Put the flour on a plate and season it with salt and pepper. Dredge the fillets in the flour, patting to remove excess. In a small bowl, combine the garlic, wine, lime juice and butter, then set aside. Heat the oil in a 10 to 12-inch frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the fillets without overlapping. Cook until golden on the bottom, about 3 minutes. Turn the fillets over and cook until opaque through the thickest part, 1 to 2 minutes more. Transfer the fish to a platter and keep warm. Add the wine mixture to pan and boil, scraping up cooked bits, until reduced by half, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in the onions and heat on low about 30 seconds. Pour the sauce over the fish and serve. ; name: tilapia with creamy lemon sauce ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, flour, light italian dressing, chicken broth, lemon juice, fat free cream cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the dressing in a medium skillet on medium heat. Coat the fish with flour and then add to the pan. Cook 4-5 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Remove from skillet, cover and keep warm. Add broth and lemon juice to the pan. Cook 3 minutes, until it is reduced by half, stirring frequently witha whisk. Add cream cheese and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Pour over fish, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: pancho villa baked tilapia ; ingredients: olive oil, tilapia fillets, diced tomatoes, diced green chilies, lime, juice of, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat 4 pieces of aluminum foil with olive oil and center fillets in them. Spoon diced tomatoes with juices over fish and do the same with the chilies. Sprinkle with lime juice and cilantro. Add sprinkling of salt and pepper if preferred. Close and seal foil packets, and place on a baking tray. Bake for approximately 20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: ginger orange tilapia ; ingredients: orange juice, orange peel, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, tilapia fillets, flour, salt and pepper, green onion ; preparation:

name: coffee chiller ; ingredients: ground coffee, water, sugar, half-and-half, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Brew coffee using 12 cups of water. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Stir in half-and-half, milk, and vanilla. Chill. Serve over ice. ; name: honey coffee ; ingredients: brewed coffee, milk, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, vanilla extract ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine the coffee, milk, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into cups or mugs. Serve immediately. ; name: basic iced coffee ; ingredients: regular grind coffee, water, milk, sugar ; preparation:Make coffee in your coffee pot with coffee & water listed under coffee cubes, and allow to cool. Pour into an ice tray and freeze. Make additional coffee. Add milk and sugar to hot coffee, if desired. You can throw everything in the blender at this point if you like a smooth consistency like i do, or you can just put the cubes in a tall glass and pour in the freshly brewed coffee. ; name: anyday holiday coffee ; ingredients: brewed coffee, cinnamon sticks, peppermint extract, splenda sugar substitute, fat-free evaporated milk ; preparation:Brew the coffee. Drop the cinnamon stick into the cup. Add coffee, peppermint extract and splenda. Add milk if using. Stir and enjoy. ; name: chilled cafe latte ; ingredients: dark roast coffee, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, ice cubes, whipped cream ; preparation:In blender container, combine condensed milk and vanilla. Blend well. Add coffee and gradually add ice, blending until smooth. Serve immediately. Top with whipped cream, if desired. ; name: hot chocolate espresso ; ingredients: hot coffee, sugar, cream, unsweetened cocoa, whipped cream, milk chocolate, cinnamon stick ; preparation:In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick. ; name: greenlandic coffee ; ingredients: whiskey, kahlua, grand marnier, hot coffee, whipped cream ; preparation:Pour a measure of whisky into a large glass with a stem. Warm the whisky carefully over a candle or a spirit burner and set it alight. Let it burn for a moment, after which kahla and hot coffee without sugar should be added. Then carefully pour in a thick layer of gently whipped cream. Finally, add burning grand marnier from a large sauce spoon lifted high above the glass preferably in a dark room so that the blue grand marnier flame is clearly visible. ; name: modern morocco coffee cinnamon ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, instant espresso powder, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, plain fat-free yogurt, ground cinnamon, figs ; preparation:

name: guacamole sandwiches ; ingredients: avocados, cottage cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts, taco sauce ; preparation:Position knife blade in food processor bowl. Add first 4 ingredients, and process until smooth. Set aside. Place tortillas on a lightly greased baking sheet. Top with cheese slices. Broil 6 inches from heat just until cheese melts. Spoon avocado mixture evenly onto tortillas. Top evenly with tomato slices and sprouts. Fold tortillas in half. Serve with taco sauce, if desired. ; name: easy awesome guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, salsa, sour cream, mayonnaise, onion powder, pepper, salt, garlic, lemon juice, fresh chives ; preparation:Cut avocados in half and take out the seed, scoop out meat with a spoon and place in bowl. Mash the avocado with a fork. Add the salsa, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Mix together well. Add lemon juice, mix and serve. Garnish with fresh chives. ; name: mushroom guacamole ; ingredients: avocado, white mushroom, cilantro, vinaigrette, lime juice ; preparation:Dice mushrooms & place in bowl. Mix with vinaigrette. Let sit 5 minutes to marinate a bit. While mushrooms are marinating, prepare avocado & cilantro. Add remaining ingredients to bowl & mash avocado as you are mixing together. ; name: sweet pea guacamole ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, cilantro, jalapenos, frozen peas, cumin, salt, red onion ; preparation:In a food processor, process onion until finely diced. Remove and set aside. Add oil, lime juice, cilantro and pepper until roughly pureed. Add peas, cumin and salt. Blend until smooth, there will still be a few lumps, leave them. Remove mixture to bowl and stir in onion. ; name: low fat guacamole with cottage cheese ; ingredients: avocado, low fat cottage cheese, fresh lime juice, green onion, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeo and garlic. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: splendiferous guacamole with sour cream dip ; ingredients: avocados, lime juice, hot sauce, sour cream, fresh cilantro, dried cilantro, jalapeno pepper, yellow onion ; preparation:Peel and pit the avocados, then coarsely mash them in a bowl with a fork. Mix in the lime juice, blending well. Add the other ingredients and combine well. Garnish with sour cream and sprinkle a little cilantro on top. May be served at room temperature or chilled. Serve with warm tortilla chilps or veggie dippers. ; name: rachael ray s garlicky holy guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, jalapeno, plum tomato, yellow onion, coarse salt, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Cut avocados in half around the pit. Separate the halves. Pop out pit with spoon, then scoop flesh of avocados into a bowl. Squeeze the juice of a lemon over the avocados. Add garlic, jalapeno, tomato, onion and salt to the bowl. Mash and mix the ingredients into a chunky dip using a fork. Serve with corn tortilla chips. ; name: la casita s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, onion, salt, water ; preparation:

name: frozen jello pops ; ingredients: boiling water, gelatin, sugar, water ; preparation:Stir boiling water into gelatin and sugar in medium bowl at 2 minutes until completely dissolved. Stir in cold water. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or until almost firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Press firmly on bottom of mold to release pop. Store leftover pops in freezer. ; name: whipped cream topping ; ingredients: heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, nutmeg ; preparation:Chill a medium-sized mixing bowl and mixer beaters in refrigerator for 15-30 minutes before preparing. Make sure to thoroughly chill whipping cream as well. Pour all ingredients into the mixing bowl. Beat at low speed at first until mixture begins to bubble and slightly thicken. Then beat at medium-high speed until beaters begin to leave a trail, and stiff peaks form when tested with the back of a spoon. Top dessert of your choice. Cover and store in refrigerator for 24-48 hours. ; name: raspberry rave ; ingredients: red raspberries, crushed pineapple, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, sour cream ; preparation:In sieve, drain berries and pineapple over a bowl. Press the fruit with spoon until you have 2 cups juice. In med bowl, dissolve the gelatin in the boiling water. Stir in the 2 cups of juice, the fruit, and the sour cream until blended well. Pour into serving bowl and chill until firm. ; name: berry syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, berries, vanilla, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Enjoy. ; name: iced raspberry tea ; ingredients: red raspberries, tea bags, boiling water, ice cube, raspberries, orange wedges ; preparation:Place the raspberries and tea bags in a large glass bowl. Pour the boiling water over the berries and tea bags. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Remove the tea bags. Strain the berries from the mixture, then discard them. Cool for a few hours. If desired, chill the tea. Serve in tall glasses, with ice cubes, a few more berries, and a wedge or slice of orange, lemon, or lime, if desired. ; name: jello fruit bars ; ingredients: gelatin, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, berries ; preparation:Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Stir in berries. Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm. Cut into bars. ; name: frozen strawberry delight ; ingredients: strawberries, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, crushed pineapple, lemon juice ; preparation:Puree strawberries in container of an electric blender. Set aside. Combine condensed milk and cool whip. Stir until well blended. Stir in strawberry puree, pineapple, and lemon juice. Spoon mixture into a 13x9 inch pan. Freeze until firm. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes before serving. ; name: raspberry whip ; ingredients: sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, cold water, sugar-free cool whip ; preparation:

name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: chicken noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, carrot, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, water, egg noodles, monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken, onions, garlic and bay leaf in broth or water until chicken can be pulled away from the bones. I prefer broth for a richer taste. Remove chicken and cool until you can handle it. Add the celery and carrots to the broth. Cut cooled chicken into bite size pieces. Return chicken to the broth. Simmer until veggies are almost tender. Add pasta to the chicken and veggies. Simmer until pasta and veggies are cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and stir. ; name: italian chicken noodles ; ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mushroom soup, cream cheese, cooked noodles ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes.
