In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown. ; name: praline sweet potatoes and apples ; ingredients: butter, sweet potatoes, apples, granulated sugar, brown sugar, pecans, ground cinnamon, salt, water ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add sweet potatoes. Cover and cook over medium heat 5 minutes or until golden. Turn potato slices over. Reduce heat, cover, and cook 5 more minutes. Remove potatoes from skillet. Add apples. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until tender and golden. Return potatoes to skillet. Add sugars, pecans, cinnamon, and salt, tossing to coat. Add 2 tablespoons water, stirring to loosen browned particles. Cook 5 minutes or until potatoes and apples are glazed and tender. ; name: sweet and spicy pecans ; ingredients: pecans, granulated sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, honey, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar. ; name: apple spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, golden raisin, butter, apple pie spice, pecans, sugar ; preparation:

name: ultimate warm salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, jalapenos, serrano pepper, onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, garlic, comino, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Using a food processor, process the tomatoes to a chunky puree, do not liquify. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the oil and add the peppers and onions. Saute until the onion softens and is clear 5-10 minutes. Add the tomato puree and spices. Simmer for 20-30 minutes or until desired consistency. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: cranberry jalapeno salsa ; ingredients: cranberries, green onion, fresh orange juice, honey, water, green bell pepper, fresh cilantro, sugar, jalapeno pepper, salt ; preparation:Place the cranberries in a food processor. Pulse 3-4 times until chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Add in all the remaining ingredients except the salt. Mix well to combine. Season with salt to taste and more sugar if needed. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 3 hours before using. ; name: roasted serrano salsa ; ingredients: serrano chilies, tomatoes, red onions, orange juice, yellow bell peppers, cilantro, rice vinegar, salt, sugar ; preparation:In a cast iron skillet over medium high heat cook the seranos until blackened. Remove half of the blackened skin and discard. Chop the chilies. Combine the chopped chilies with the remaining ingredients. Let stand 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: fresh key lime salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, fresh jalapeno pepper, fresh cilantro leaves, red onion, fresh garlic, granulated sugar, salt, black pepper, key limes, juice of ; preparation:In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips. ; name: corn black bean salsa ; ingredients: black beans, corn kernels, rotel diced tomatoes, green onion, fresh cilantro, oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Combine beans, corn, diced tomatoes, green onions and cilantro in large bowl. Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving. ; name: salsa with a twist ; ingredients: red bell pepper, canned black beans, mango chutney, whole kernel corn, green onions, fresh cilantro, green chili, ground coriander, hot pepper sauce, tortilla chips ; preparation:Combine bell pepper, beans, chutney, corn, green onion, cilantro, chiles, coriander and hot pepper sauce in medium bowl. Mix well. Cover. Refrigerate for 2 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving. Serve with chips or crackers. ; name: tomatillo salsa fresca ; ingredients: tomatillo, white onion, cilantro leaf, jalapeno pepper, garlic cloves, sugar, salt ; preparation:First prepare the tomatillos. Remove papery husks and then rinse tomatillos under warm running water, using your fingers to remove the sticky residue. Remove stems. Chops into quarters. Place all the ingredients into a blender or food processor. Blend either coarse or smooth, depending on your preference. Transfer tomatillo salsa to covered container and refrigerate at least 3 hours. Good with tortilla chips, enchiladas, tacos, etc. I always triple the recipe and freeze in 8 ounce containers. ; name: chilean cilantro salsa pebre ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, green onions, jalapenos, fresh cilantro leaves, water ; preparation:

name: jalapeno corn grits ; ingredients: butter, jalapeno, fresh corn kernels, onion, grits, water, fresh thyme, kosher salt, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Melt the butter in a medium saucepan. Add the jalapeno, corn and onion. Saute until the vegetables are tender. Stir in the grits. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Stir in the thyme and season with salt and pepper. ; name: tasty triple corn fritters ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, oil, cream-style corn, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder, sugar and salt in a medium bowl. Combine eggs, milk, oil and cream style corn in a large bowl. Blend in dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened. Stir in whole kernel corn. In deep fryer or heavy saucepan drop batter by tablespoonfuls and fry in 2-3 inches of hot oil or fat for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown. Drain on paper towles. ; name: asian popcorn ; ingredients: popped popcorn, rice crackers, butter, soy sauce, ground ginger, sesame oil ; preparation:Mix popcorn and asian snack mix together in a large bowl. In a small microwave-safe bowl, microwave butter on high until melted, about 20 seconds. Stir in soy sauce, ginger and oil. Drizzle over popcorn mixture. Toss. Spread mixture on a baking sheet and bake in a 300 f oven for 20 minutes, stirring once. Allow to cool, serve or store in airtight container. ; name: roasted corn and tomato relish ; ingredients: corn kernels, tomatoes, red bell pepper, red onion, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, thyme ; preparation:Soak cleaned corn in a bowl of water for approximately 30 minutes. Heat a grill and place corn straight on the cooking surface. Cook until beautiful black & caramelized grill marks appear, turning frequently. Do not boil or microwave corn or you will lose all of the sweet natural flavor. Once corn has cooled enough to handle, cut off all of kernels. Add all of the remaining ingredients and mix together. Serve at room temperature or cold. ; name: bean burgers ; ingredients: sunflower seeds, red beans, onion, chili powder, ketchup, wheat germ ; preparation:Chop the sunflower seeds in a food processor. Mix in the remaining ingredients and form the patties. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool until you can pick up each patty and compress it firmly in your hand to reform the burger. Cook for another 15 minutes on each side. ; name: tortilla bread pudding ; ingredients: frozen corn kernels, vegetable oil, onion, chorizo sausage, eggs, whole milk, flour tortillas, salt and pepper, scallions ; preparation:Preaheat the oven to 400f grease an 8-inch square baking dish. Using a food processor, puree 1 cup corn. In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining 1 cup corn and cook until the corn begins to brown, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chorizo. In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the milk, pureed corn and tortilla crumbs. Add the onion-chorizo mixture and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the mixture to the prepared pan and bake until set and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes. Let sit for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with the scallions. ; name: corn sausage casserole ; ingredients: sausage, corn, milk, egg, saltine crackers, tater tots, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the sausage & drain. To the sausage, stir in the corn. Crumble the saltines by hand and add them. Whisk the egg with milk and stir into the sausage mixture. Add salt & pepper to taste. Pour into a baking dish & top with tater tots. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, until the tater tots are nice & golden brown. ; name: indonesian corn patties ; ingredients: corn kernels, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shallots, egg, cornflour, oil ; preparation:

name: crock pot mexican goulash ; ingredients: fat-free chili, fat-free refried beans, whole kernel corn, salsa, fat free cheese, flour tortillas, sour cream ; preparation:Spray crock pot with cooking spray. In a large bowl stir together the chili, beans, corn, and salsa until well mixed. Lay one tortilla flat on the bottom of the crock pot. Pour one-fifth of mixture on top. Continue layering the tortillas and the remaining four-fifths of the mixture until all the ingredients are used up. Cover and cook on low for 7hrs. Using a sharp knife cut through all the layers, making a checkerboard design on top. Each cut out should be about 1 inch apart. With a large spoon stir the entire dish to mix up the cut up tortilla pieces. Or scoop out of crock pot without stirring up for a more formed meal. Serve in bowls, sprinkled cheese, and top with sour cream if desired. ; name: okra goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, whole tomatoes, water, okra, onions, worcestershire sauce, creole seasoning, pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: tomato hamburger macaroni goulash ; ingredients: lean ground beef, italian stewed tomatoes, onion, minced garlic clove, parmesan cheese, macaroni ; preparation:Fry ground beef in large size frying pan until almost all red is gone. Add chopped onion and garlic and continue frying until beef is completely cooked. Add the tomatoes and parmesan cheese and stir completely. Lower heat and simmer while you cook the macaroni. When macaroni is done, just mix it all together and serve. Have your spouse clean up the mess cuz really, who needs the grief. ; name: hungarian goulash with caraway and sour cream ; ingredients: side bacon, onions, sweet hungarian paprika, caraway seed, round steaks, tomatoes, salt and pepper, potatoes, sour cream ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, then crumble and set aside. Add onions to skillet and brown on medium low in drippings. Stir in paprika and caraway seed. Cook for 10 to 15 seconds, stirring. Add meat. Stir to coat evenly withpaprika. Add 2 cups of the tomatoes, cover and simmer for 1 hour, until meat is almost tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Add potato and cook 25 minutes more, until potatoes and meat are both tender. Stir in reserved tomatoes and heat thru. Sprinkle with reserved bacon and serve with sour cream if desired. ; name: simple goulash with sauerkraut ; ingredients: onion, fat, lean pork shoulder, hungarian paprika, water, sauerkraut, sour cream ; preparation:Cook onions in fat until slightly brown. Add meat, paprika and water. Simmer until almost tender. Rinse kraut in water and squeeze out water lightly. Add to meat. Cook 30 minutes or until meat is done. Add sour cream and heat, but do not boil. ; name: bavarian goulash ; ingredients: pork steaks, olive oil, yellow onion, sauerkraut, caraway seed, sour cream ; preparation:In large pot brown pork steaks in the olive oil, adding sliced onion after steaks are braised to caramelize onions. Add can of sauerkraut and caraway seed. Allow to simmer for 4-5 hours, adding water if liquid simmers off. Remove any bone after meat has boiled off. 10-15 minutes prior to serving add sour cream. Serve over spetzle or egg noodles. Also, just fine with plain old mashed potatoes on the side. ; name: creamy baked gouda macaroni ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, milk, chives, dry mustard, hot pepper sauce, elbow macaroni, gouda cheese, buttered bread crumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. In 2-quart casserole dish, combine soup, milk, chives, mustard, and hot pepper sauce. Stir in macaroni and cheese. Sprinkle with bread crumbs. Bake 25 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: easy for sheezy goulash ; ingredients: ground turkey, olive oil, garlic, spaghetti sauce, sweet corn, onion, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni ; preparation:

name: southern tea punch ; ingredients: orange juice, tea bags, of fresh mint, water, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil water. Add to large teapot with 5-6 teabags and fresh mint. Steep until cool. Add to orange juice. Add sugar to taste. Add squeeze of lemon juice. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: hot spiced orange and fruit tea ; ingredients: orange spice tea bags, boiling water, water, sugar, lemon juice, orange juice, cinnamon stick, whole cloves, honey ; preparation:Pour 2 quart boiling water over the 8 teabags. Brew 5 minutes, remove tea bags, set aside. While doing the above boil 2 celsius each water and sugar together for10 minutes, or until sugar is disolved, to make syrup. Add remaining ingredients. Bring backto boil and simmer 20 minutes. Remove cloves and cinnamon. Serve hot. Allow each person to sweeten as they choose. ; name: mulled fruit tea puncher ; ingredients: tea bag, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, fresh water, white sugar, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemonade, ginger ale ; preparation:Steep tea bag, cinnamon and cloves in water to make 1 cup of spiced black tea. In a pitcher, combine sugar and spiced tea. Stir until sugar isdissolved. Stir in orange juice, pineapple juice and lemonade. Chill in refrigerator for 4 hours. To serve, pour chilled mixture into a punch bowl and stir in ginger ale. ; name: blushing cranberry cider ; ingredients: blood orange, unsweetened pineapple juice, cranberry juice, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, whole allspice, cloves, dark brown sugar, orange slices ; preparation:Remove two, 3-inch-long strips of peel from the orange and set aside until needed. Next juice and strain the orange. To a medium pot, add the orange, pineapple and cranberry juices, orange peel, cinnamon sticks, ginger, allspice and cloves. Make sure to sample and add the sugar if desired. Heat over medium-high heat until it starts to simmer, then reduce the heat to low and continue to simmer 30 - 45 minutes. Strain the cider, pour into warm mugs, add orange slices and serve immediately. ; name: cran fizzy iced tea ; ingredients: green tea bags, frozen cranberry juice concentrate, water, club soda ; preparation:Steep 4 tea bags in 2 cups boiling water according to package directions. Discard tea bags. Stir in can of frozen cranberry juice concentrate. Cover and chill. To serve, fill a glass of ice one-quarter full with tea mixture. Top off with chilled club soda. You may also add fresh berries as a garnish. ; name: hot scarlet wine punch ; ingredients: cranberry juice, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves, white zinfandel wine ; preparation:In a lrg saucepan, combine cranberry juice, brown sugar, cinnamon stick & cloves. Bring to a boil, reduce heat & simmer uncovered for 5 minute remove spices. Add white zinfandel. Heat till just warm. Ladle into mugs or transfer to a warm, heatproof pitcher & pour into mugs. ; name: cranberry tea hot punch ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, unsweetened cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, cloves, cinnamon sticks, orange slices ; preparation:

name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: roasted glazed sweet potatoes with apples ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, butter, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with orange marmalade and balsamic glaze ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, honey, ground ginger, balsamic vinegar, orange marmalade, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Lay the sweet potatoes out in a single layer on a roasting tray. Drizzle the oil, salt and pepper over the potatoes. Roast for 25 to 30 minutes in oven or until tender. In a saucepan reduce the vinegar by half, then add honey, marmelade and ginger. Stir to combine. When potatoes are roasted, remove and toss to coat with marmelade mixture. ; name: sweet potato gravy ; ingredients: flour, onions, garlic, pecan pieces, water, salt, cayenne pepper, sweet potato ; preparation:Make a dark brown roux, about 3 minutes. Add the onions and saute for 5 minutes, or until wilted. Stir in the garlic, pecans and water. Season with salt and cayenne. Bring the liquid to a boil. Add the sweet potatoes and blend to make the sauce smooth. Stir in the cane syrup and green onions. ; name: honey roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, honey, fresh lemon juice, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: crock pot orange spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, dark brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, orange, juice of, salt, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in bottom of slow cooker. Mix spices and orange juice together. Stir into sweet potatoes. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Check for doneness because each crock pot cooks at a different heat setting. Before serving, stir in toasted pecans. ; name: oven roasted glazed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper, butter, brown sugar, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Toss the potatoes with the oil and season lightly with salt and pepper to taste. Bake for 35 minutes. While the potatoes are baking, place the butter, brown sugar, zest and lemon juice in a small pan over medium heat. Cook until the butter is melted and all is combined. Remove the potatoes from the oven and toss with the butter mixture. Return potatoes to oven and continue cooking for 10 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked through and glazed. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with pineapple and pecans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, sweet potatoes, fresh pineapple, salt, pecans, pure maple syrup, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: cabbage and tomato chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrots, garlic cloves, fresh chives, fresh basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: pumpkin wild rice soup ; ingredients: onion, butter, chicken broth, pumpkin, wild rice, white pepper, heavy cream, fresh chives ; preparation:Saut the onion in the butter in a large saucepan for 5 minutes. Stir in the broth and pumpkin, heat, stirring occasionally, over low heat for 10-15 minutes. Stir in the wild rice and pepper. Continue to heat for another 10 minutes. Stir in the cream and heat through. Do not boil. Garnish with chives or parsley and serve. ; name: chicken and rice with bacon ; ingredients: chicken pieces, bacon, rice, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, milk, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Line large baking dish with bacon. Pour rice evenly over top of bacon. Place chicken on top of rice. Season chicken with salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and paprika. Mix together soup, broth, milk and pour over chicken and rice. Cover and bake for 3 hours at 325. Uncover and bake for 15 minute more. ; name: kossman chicken rice ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, water, rice, whole chicken, lipton onion soup mix ; preparation:Mix cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, water, and rice together. Put a layer of soup mixture in a baking dish. Add the chicken. Add the rice mixture. Sprinkle the top with the lipton onion soup mix. Cover with tin foil. Bake at 375 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours. Uncover for the last 30 minutes of baking. ; name: super simple chicken soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, carrot, celery, shallot, garlic, chunk chicken, hot water, chicken base, cold water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a soup pot and saute for 5 minutes. Add chicken, stir. Combine hot water and base then add to your pot. Cook for 15 minutes or until carrots are done enough for you. Combine cold water and corn starch then add to your pot while stirring. Your soup will thicken and be ready to serve. You can add more cornstarch mixture if you would like it thicker. I like mine somewhere between a soup and a stew consistency. ; name: sandra lee semi homemade beef and broccoli soup ; ingredients: low sodium beef broth, sour cream, teriyaki seasoning mix, noodles, frozen carrots, beef roast, frozen broccoli florets, kosher salt, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a large heavy-bottomed pot, combine broth, sour cream, and teriyaki seasoning. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low, add noodles, and cook for 5 minutes. Add carrots, beef roast, broccoli, salt, and crushed red pepper. Cook for 2 minutes longer. Serve immediately. ; name: dad s chicken soup ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, onion, celery, carrots, garlic, long-grain white rice, fresh thyme, cooked chicken, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Bring first five ingredients to boil in heavy large pot or dutch oven over high heat. Mix in rice and thyme. Return soup to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer uncovered until rice is tender, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes. Add chicken and simmer until heated through, thinning with additional broth if desired. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer soup to large bowl. Garnish with parsley and serve. I like corkscrew pasta in this. ; name: mark bittman s chicken and rice soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, long grain white rice, carrot, celery, chicken, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: grilled fusion pork chops ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, garlic paste, ginger paste, pork chops, garam masala ; preparation:In a bowl, stir together soy sauce, lime juice, garlic, and ginger. Place pork chops in a large ziplock bag. Pour mixture over chops. Seal and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for direct heat and lightly oil grate. Place chops on the grill. As they cook, sprinkle with a little more of the garam masala. For thick chops, cook about 10 minutes on each side. ; name: south pacific pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt, pepper, sherry wine, soy sauce, vegetable oil, garlic clove, ground ginger, oregano, maple syrup ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Slightly salt and pepper pork. Brown pork chops in cast iron skillet. Place chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning. ; name: vietnamese spiced pork chops ; ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, cooking spray, green onion, brown sugar, paprika, ground coriander, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, minced ginger, garlic ; preparation:Lightly score a diamond pattern on both sides of pork. Combine the ingredients for the rub and rub evenly over pork. Let rest at least 5 minutes. Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add pork. Cook 4 minutes on each side or until done. Garnish with sliced green onions, if desired. ; name: instant pot asian pork chop ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, sesame oil, ginger, sriracha sauce, black pepper, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat instant pot on saute. Once hot, add the oil. Place the pork chops in the oil and brown both sides. Add the rest of the ingredients, close the lid, and pressure cook on manuel for 12 minutes. Let the instant pot do a natural pressure release. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: slow cooked oriental pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover& cook 7-8 hours on low heat. Remove chops. Combine corn starch& cold water until smooth and stir into slow cooker. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice. ; name: grilled rosemary pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, coarse sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, center-cut pork loin chops ; preparation:Mix oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, salt, & pepper, and brush on chops. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or as long as overnight. Preheat grill. Grill 5-8 minutes on each side, depending on thickness. Let rest 1-2 minutes before serving. ; name: ginger honey glazed barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: honey, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic cloves, gingerroot, pork loin chops ; preparation:

name: strawberry banana salad ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, bananas, crushed pineapple, pecans, sour cream ; preparation:Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: orange pineapple salad ; ingredients: orange gelatin mix, pineapple gelatin mix, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, cool whip, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Dissolve jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Put oranges and pineapple with their juice in jell-o. Pour mixture into a 9x13 cake pan. Refrigerate until set. Beat cream cheese and sugar. Fold in cool whip. Spread over jell-o. Garnish with nuts. ; name: mellow yellow jello salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, lemon jell-o gelatin, 7-up soda, pineapple juice, flour, butter, eggs, whipped topping ; preparation:Mix the pineapple, jello, and 7up. Pour into a 9x13 dish. Put into refrigerator to set. In saucepan, mix juice, flour, butter and eggs. Cook and stir, on med, bring to a boil. Boil for 1 minute. Allow to cool, while jello sets. Mix the cooled cooked mixture with the whipped topping. Spread over the jello. ; name: blueberry grape salad ; ingredients: grape jell-o, boiling water, crushed pineapple, blueberry pie filling, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Dissolve jell-o in water. Add pineapple and pie filling. Pour into 9x13 inch glass dish and chill until set. Stir together cream cheese and sour cream. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend well. Spread cream cheese mixture over chilled jell-o. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Chill. ; name: green jello ; ingredients: lime gelatin, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, whipping cream, walnuts ; preparation:Follow directions on gelatin box to prepare gelatin. Let set until syrupy. Add pineapple, cream cheese, whipping cream, and optional nuts. Mix all ingredients together in a mixer. Turn into a mold and let sit in refrigerator until fully firm. Turn out from mold onto plate. Cut into sections and enjoy. ; name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: lime jello and pineapple salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, sour cream, pineapple ring, carrot, celery, pecans, boiling water ; preparation:

name: arizona green chile cornbread green chili cornbread ; ingredients: creamed corn, egg, cornmeal, garlic salt, salad oil, baking powder, diced green chilies, longhorn cheese ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together, except for 2 handfuls of cheese. Pour into a greased casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or so. Recipe can easily be doubled, tripled, etc., but, if using a deep dish, allow extra baking time. ; name: chili noodle casserole ; ingredients: egg noodles, cream cheese, sour cream, kosher salt, black pepper, chili, cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f begin cooking noodles according to package directions. Have cream cheese and sour cream ready. Remove noodles from heat, drain in collander, and return directly to pot. Add cream cheese, sour cream, salt, and black pepper. Stirr thoroughly, mixing well. Lightly grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the noodle mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: hominy green chile casserole ; ingredients: yellow hominy, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, green chili, sweet red pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Set aside half of the cheese. Mix the remaining cheese with the remainder of the ingredients. Spread mixture into an 8x8 or 9x9 baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 minutes. ; name: eggs cheese green chiles and sour cream bake ; ingredients: eggs, cheese, diced green chilies, sour cream, salt and pepper, hot sauce, bacon bits ; preparation:Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set. ; name: onion frittata ; ingredients: butter, onions, eggs, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chili ; preparation:Put the butter, garlic, diced chili and onions in a frying pan and fry gently until the onions are a nice golden brown. Beat the six eggs well with the salt and pepper. Scoop the onions out of the pan and mix with the eggs. Melt the extra butter in the pan and pour in the egg mixture. Cook on both sides until browned slice in wedges and serve hot. ; name: chili cheese grits ; ingredients: water, grits, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, eggs, jalapeno peppers, red bell pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: chili rellenos ; ingredients: eggs, water, flour, whole green chilies, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Separate the eggs, beat the whites until stiff then fold in the yolks, water and flour. Remove seeds and clean chilies, then stuff with cheese. Spoon a portion of the egg mixture onto a heated frying pan then place a chili on top of the mixture. Then add another portion of egg mixture on top of the chili. Brown one side then the other. ; name: green chile scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, green chili pepper, garlic, whipping cream, cayenne ; preparation:

name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: beet salad with raspberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: beets, sweet onion, olive oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, garlic, salt & fresh ground pepper, fresh chives ; preparation:Place beets and onion in a large bowl. In a cup, combine oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and garlic. Season with the salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour over the beet mixture and toss well. Sprinkle with the chives. Cover and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes or up to 3 days. ; name: easy pickled beets ; ingredients: beets, vinegar, sugar, water, cinnamon, salt, ground cloves ; preparation:Boil beets for approx. 15-20 minutes. Drain and pour cold water over them. Peel skin off and cut roots& tops off. In a sauce pan add remaining ingredients, stir. And add beets, bring to a boil. Simmer for 5 minutes. Chill. Good for 1 month in refridgerator. ; name: simple beet pickles ; ingredients: beet, white vinegar, white sugar, salt, powdered allspice ; preparation:Cook beets, cool and peel. Prepare solution. Put beets in jars. Pour solution over beets. Seal jars. ; name: baked honey onions ; ingredients: chicken broth, butter, honey, lemon, zest of, paprika, black peppercorns, parsley, white onions, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Mix all ingredients except onions and cheese together. Coat 9x11 casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Place the onions in a single layer in the casserole and pour chicken broth mixture evenly over all the onions. Cover onions and bake for 1 hour. After hour, remove and sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven uncovered and bake 5 more minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: beet salad with chives salatat shamandar ; ingredients: beets, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, fresh chives, olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Boil the beets until tender. When beets are cool enough to handle, peel, dice, and place in a salad bowl. Stir in garlic, cilantro, chives, olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper. Chill for at least 1 hour. Stir, sprinkle with parsley and serve. ; name: simple greek beet salad ; ingredients: beet, olive oil, red wine vinegar, walnuts, garlic clove ; preparation:Boil the beets with their skins for about 30 to 40 minutes, let them cool and peel. In a little bowl mix the olive oil, vinegar and garlic. Cut the beets in round slices and place on a plate. Pour the dressing over the beets and sprinkle with the walnuts. You can also cut in cubes and serve in a deeper bowl. ; name: beets with onions ; ingredients: beets, butter, onions, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: lentil burgers vegetarian ; ingredients: red lentil, celery, carrots, water, curry powder, all-purpose flour, egg whites, dried breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine lentils, celery, carrot, water, curry powder in a pan and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for approx 20 minutes or until the mixture has thickened. Remove from heat and cool. Stir in 2 cups of breadcrumbs. Shape the mixture into 8 burger patties. Toss them in the flour, dip in the egg white and cover with the remaining breadcrumbs. Heat the oil in a non-stick pan. Add the burgers and cook until well browned on both sides. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve on a bun as a burger or as a meal with a salad on the side. ; name: lentil chili soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, fresh garlic, onions, frozen carrots, dry lentils, low-sodium v8 juice, water, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano ; preparation:Pour the vegetable oil into a large cooking pot or dutch oven. Over medium-high heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve. ; name: steamed lentils with saffron ; ingredients: brown lentils, olive oil, onion, prosciutto, dry white wine, saffron thread, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Rinse the lentils well. Heat the vegetable stock in a small pot. Meanwhile, in a different medium pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 8 minutes, then add the prosciutto and cook for a few more minutes. Add the lentils, cook for another 2-3 minutes, and pour the white wine. Add the saffron and cook until the alcohol has evaporated, 4-5 minutes. Add the stock, salt to taste, and cook over low heat for 50 minutes to 1 hour, covered. Add water or more stock if necessary. ; name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: koshari lentils and rice with tomato sauce ; ingredients: lentils, white rice, macaroni, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place lentils in saucepan with 4 cups of water and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer on low for 30 minutes, or until tender. Add rice to the lentils and cook for another 20 minutes or so, until rice is tender. Meanwhile, cook macaroni according to package directions to an al dente stage. Combine lentils, rice and macaroni in large pot. Saute onions and garlic in pan in olive oil until browned. Add tomato sauce to onions and garlic and heat until bubbling. Remove from heat. Place a serving of lentil mixture on a plate and cover with sauce. Sprinkle red pepper on top and serve. ; name: california yucchi dip ; ingredients: hamburger, refried beans, velveeta cheese, avocado, onion, salsa, garlic powder ; preparation:In a crockpot, simmer the refried beans, the chopped avocado, and salsa, along with the velvetta cheese. In a skillet, brown the hamburger along with the chopped onions and garlic powder. After the hamburger is browned, add to the crockpot with the other ingredients and allow to cook for about 20 minutes on the high setting. Be sure to stir occasionally to prevent burning or sticking. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips or in mini-taco shells. ; name: thick cheesy tomato lentil pasta sauce ; ingredients: dried red lentils, onion, water, cheese, parmesan cheese, seasoning, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:Cook the lentils in the water until tender. I do a taste test for the lentils to see if they are done. Drain the lentils if they are a little watery. Saute the onion with garlic in oil over medium hear until onion is tender. Add the seasoning, lentils, tomato sauce and cheese. Stir until cheese is melty and everything is well combined. Pour over or spoon over pasta. ; name: healthy lentil dip for cheapo cooks on a budget ; ingredients: brown lentils, vegetable broth, diced onion, red bell peppers, monterey jack cheese, red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:

name: veg all pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cooked chicken, cream of mushroom soup, thyme, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl, combine vegetables, chicken, soup, and seasoning. Fit one pie crust into 9-inch pie pan. Pour vegetable mixture into pie crust. Top with remaining crust, crimp edges to seal and pick top with fork. Bake at 350f for 60 minutes or until crust is golden brown and filling is hot. Allow pie to cool slightly before cutting into wedges to serve. ; name: breakfast crab pie ; ingredients: scallion, red pepper, backfin crab meat, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, half-and-half, salt, pepper, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Butter a 10-inch quiche pan. Beat the eggs. Mix all of the remaining ingredients together and add to the eggs. Pour into the pan and bake at 350f for about 45-50 minutes until set. Cut into pie-shaped pieces and serve hot. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: torta pascualina argentine spinach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, frozen spinach, onion, nutmeg, oregano, salt, eggs, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the bottom crust in your pie plate. Cook the spinach, drain it, and chop it finely. Saute the chopped onion in a little cooking spray. Mix together the spinach, the onion, and the rest of the ingredients. Pour the mixture into the pie crust. Add the top crust and seal. Bake for 30-40 minutes. ; name: spinach and feta pie ; ingredients: phyllo pastry, spinach, olive oil, onion, fresh dill, eggs, feta cheese, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Cut the pastry to fit the size or your baking dish,, then keep it covered with a damp cloth. Prepare the spinach. Heat the oil and saute the onion for 5 minutes until soft. Add the spinach and stir for 5 minutes over a medium heat then increase the heat to evaporate any moisture. Leave to cool then mix in the dill, eggs, cheese, salt and pepper. Brush the baking dish with melted butter. Brush 8 layers of pastry with butter and lay them in the bottom of the dish. Spread with the filling, then cover with the remaining pastry, brushing each one with melted butter and scoring the top into diamond shapes. Sprinkle with water and bake in a preheated oven at 325f for 40 minutes until crisp and golden. Leave to stand for 10 minutes, then cut into wedges and serve with crisp lettuce leaves. ; name: kielbasa and pasta ; ingredients: onion, red bell pepper, granulated garlic, kielbasa, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, whole wheat penne ; preparation:Spray pan with cooking spray and saute sausage. Drain as much grease as possible. Put 1 large diced onion and one diced red bell pepper in pan with sausage and cooked until the tender. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Add can diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Cook pasta separately and add in at end of cooking time. ; name: spring vegetable pie ; ingredients: eggs, milk, swiss cheese, frozen chopped spinach, vegetable soup mix, frozen deep dish pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven and baking sheet to 350. In large bowl, whisk eggs. Blend in milk, cheese, spinach and. Knorr recipe mix. Pour into frozen pie crust. Bake on baking sheet 60 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: andreas viestad onion pie with jarlsberg and thyme ; ingredients: unsalted butter, red onions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, black peppercorns, whole cloves, sea salt, puff pastry, jarlsberg cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:

name: stove top and chicken ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Prepare stove top with 1 cup water. In small mixing bowl mix soup and sour cream. Place chicken breast on bottom of 9x13 baking pan. Pour soup mix over top. Spoon stuffing on top. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover bake an additional 5 to 10 minutes. ; name: baked summer squash casserole ; ingredients: summer squash, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, onion, carrot, margarine, chicken stove top stuffing mix ; preparation:Boil squash in small amount of water,. Season to taste, with salt and pepper. Add butter and all the other ingredients. Do not dilute the soup. Pour into a greased casserole dish and bake about 30 minutes at 350. ; name: easy creamy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, cream of chicken soup, stove top stuffing mix, butter, water, half-and-half cream, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cook stuffing with butter & water according to package directions. Combine well cream of chicken soup and half & half in a mixing bowl. In a 13 x 9 casserole dish, arrange chicken in a single layer. Spread soup mixture evenly over the top of chicken. Sprinkle over pepper to taste. Spoon stuffing evenly over the top of soup mixture. Bake for 30-35 minutes until chicken is cooked through. ; name: simple stove top stuffing ; ingredients: onion, celery, butter, parsley flakes, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, stale bread, chicken broth ; preparation:In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until fragrant. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven. ; name: crock pot chicken breasts with stove top stuffing ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, milk, stove top stuffing mix, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over chicken breasts. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Put one slice of swiss cheese on each breast. In a separate bowl, combine both cans of soup and milk. Pour soup mixture evenly over chicken breasts. Sprinkle stuffing over entire top of dish. Drizzle melted butter on top of stuffing. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours. ; name: crunchy chicken cheese bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, margarine, herb seasoned stuffing mix, cooked rice ; preparation:In 3 quart oblong baking dish, place chicken, top with cheese. Stir soup and spread over cheese. Top with tomato. Combine margarine and stuffing, sprinkle over tomato. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes or until chicken is done and sauce is bubbly and stuffing is browned. Serve over rice. ; name: crock pot chicken gravy and stuffing ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, pepper, chicken broth, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, milk, pepperidge farm herb stuffing, butter ; preparation:Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over breasts. Put one slice of swiss cheese on each breast. Combine both cans of soup and milk. Cover chicken breasts with soup mixture. Sprinkle stuffing mix over all. Drizzle melted butter on top. Cook on low for 6 hours or high for 3. ; name: classic one dish chicken stuffing bake with vegetables ; ingredients: hot water, chicken flavor stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mozzarella cheese, frozen peas and carrots ; preparation:

name: szechuan noodles ; ingredients: noodles, green onions, garlic cloves, peanut butter, thai sweet chili sauce, reduced sodium soy sauce, dry sherry, sesame oil ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on the package. Drain. Mix all remaining ingredients together until well mixed. It may help to heat for a minute in the microwave. Mix noodles and sauce. Serve warm, but these also taste great cold. ; name: asian carrot and cabbage noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, peanut oil, garlic, red onion, brown sugar, green cabbage, carrot, chili sauce, soy sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add garlic. Stir fry 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes or until onion softens. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes. ; name: broccoli ramen noodles ; ingredients: broccoli, ramen noodles, corn oil, lemon juice, honey, pepper, salt, unsalted peanuts ; preparation:Prepare noodles according to package directions. Do not add flavoring. Drain noodles and toss in corn oil. Blanch broccoli in boiling water and drain. Refresh under cold water. Mix lemon juice, honey, pepper, salt, and noodle flavoring. And combine with broccoli and noodles. Refrigerate. Before reheating, stir in peanuts. Reheat in microwave. ; name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: quick and easy longevity noodles ; ingredients: cornstarch, water, sesame oil, soy sauce, egg, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, cooked chicken, green onions ; preparation:Stir the cornstarch, water and sesame oil in a small cup. Set the mixture aside. Heat the broth and soy in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil. Stir the cornstarch mixture and stir it into the saucepan. Cook and stir until mixture is slightly thickened. Reduce the heat to low. Add the eggs, in a slow steady stream, stirring while adding. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Divide the pasta, chicken and green onions among 8 serving bowls. Ladle about 1 cup broth mixture into each bowl and serve immediately. ; name: cabbage noodles ; ingredients: linguine, green cabbage, chicken broth, salt and pepper, garlic powder, sour cream ; preparation:Cook noodles according to pkg. Directions. Drain. Meanwhile saute the cabbage in the chicken broth until tender, about 10 minutes. Add cooked noodles and mix well. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder to taste. Take the pan off the heat and fold in the sour cream. ; name: spicy oriental chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, green peppers, onion, flour, sugar, soy sauce, hot chinese chili paste, chicken stock, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken into a 1-2 inch size and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in a bowl and evenly coat with flour. Slice green peppers and onion into strips. Combine sugar, soy sauce, chili paste and chicken stock or water in a small bowl. Heat a saute pan with olive oil. Place chicken and brown both sides. Add green pepper and onion strips, put a lid and cook until chicken is heated through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: spicy cold soba noodles ; ingredients: soy sauce, molasses, sesame oil, tahini, brown sugar, chili oil, balsamic vinegar, green onion, salt, soba noodles ; preparation:

name: dutch cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, white vinegar, sugar, onion ; preparation:Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next. ; name: scandinavian cucumber salad recipe ; ingredients: sour cream, parsley flakes, tarragon vinegar, sugar, chives, cucumbers ; preparation:Thinly slice unpeeled cucumbers - use can use a mandolin or slicer for nice paper thin slices. Should be about 3 cups. Whisk sour cream, parsley, vinegar, sugar, and chives in a small bowl. Fold in sliced cucumbers. Cover and chill for at least two hours. ; name: novak family cucumber salad ; ingredients: onion, cucumbers, salt, black pepper, dill, parsley, sugar, oil, white vinegar ; preparation:Mix together onion, cucumber, salt, pepper, dill, and parsley. In a separate bowl, combine sugar, oil, and vinegar. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss. Marinate several hours in the refrigerator before serving. ; name: chapel hill shrimp cucumber salad rounds ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, prepared mustard, garlic powder, shrimp, cucumber, onion, cracker ; preparation:Blend together the cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, and garlic powder. Gently fold in the shrimp, chopped cucumber, & chopped onion. Chill for at least 3 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, spread crackers or toast rounds with the spread, then garnish each with a cucumber round and a shrimp. This spread also makes a wonderful sandwich. ; name: cool cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumber, tomatoes, green pepper, onion, lime juice, red wine vinegar, dill weed, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, green pepper and the onions. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, vinegar, dill, salt and pepper. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon. ; name: a very easy cucumber and fresh dill salad ; ingredients: rice wine vinegar, superfine sugar, fresh dill, cucumbers, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated. ; name: strawberry cucumber and basil salad ; ingredients: strawberries, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, lemon juice, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and seed cucumbers. Halve lengthwise, and slice thin. Combine strawberries, basil, vinegar, and sugar. Toss to coat and chill for 1 hour. Combine cucumbers and lemon juice. Toss to coat. After chilling, add cucumber mixture, salt, and pepper to strawberry mixture. Gently toss to combine, and serve immediately. ; name: threadgill s cottage cheese cucumber salad ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, cucumber, fresh dill, green onion, pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cocoa chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, cake flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high for 15-30 seconds, or until just melted. Stir in brown sugar, cocoa and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in cake flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 1 hour, or until firm. Preheat oven to 350f. Break off small pieces of dough and form into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until firm but not browned. Cool on baking sheets 5 minutes, then remove to rack to cool completely. ; name: soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: softest chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f. Sift together the flour and baking soda, set that aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in the instant pudding mix until blended. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Blend in the flour mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips and nuts. Drop cookies by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be golden brown. ; name: semi sweet chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, oatmeal, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy. ; name: peanut butter and banana cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, banana, light brown sugar, butter, peanut butter, egg, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Grease cookie sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a small bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks. ; name: classic chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: banana chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, unsweetened applesauce, raw sugar, bananas, eggs, pure vanilla extract, unbleached all-purpose flour, baking soda, quick-cooking oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: pacific pesto grilled halibut ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, garlic clove, lime zest, fresh lime juice, jalapeno, soy sauce, vegetable oil, halibut steaks, new potatoes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. In a food processor or blender, combine the cilantro, garlic, lime zest and juice, jalapeo, and soy sauce. Blend until mixed. With processor or blender running, gradually pour in the oil and process until thickened. Place the fish steaks on a greased broiler pan. Brush top of each steak with the sauce. Coat the potatoes with remaining sauce. Place in broiler pan with the fish. Broil about 10 minutes, or until fish flakes with a fork. ; name: dijon glazed halibut ; ingredients: dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, halibut fillets ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Coat the grill rack with nonstick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients but fish and optional parsley. Brush over fish. Grill fish, covered with grill lid, 6 to 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes with a fork. Garnish with additional parsley, if used. ; name: baked country style steak ; ingredients: cube steaks, cream of mushroom soup, kitchen bouquet, flour, water, onion, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven 200 degrees. Flour and brown steaks in a small amount of oil in skillet. Place steaks in 8x12 casserole. Add mushroom soup, water, and onion to meat drippings in skillet in which meat was browned. Simmer together and add kitchen bouquet, pour over steaks and bake covered for 2 hours. ; name: broiled steak with shallot butter ; ingredients: steaks, oil, butter, white wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, shallots, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Rub the steaks on both sides with oil. Heat the broiler until it is glowing. Broil the steaks until just cooked to the point that you prefer, turning 2-3 times. Melt the butter in a small frying pan, add the vinegar and worcestershire sauce, the shallots, salt and pepper. Heat through, without cooking the shallots, mix in the parsley and keep on one side. Put the steaks onto a heated dish and pour some of the shallot butter over each, when it will mingle with the juices. Serve at once with your favourite side dishes. ; name: hamburger steaks ; ingredients: ground chuck, salt & pepper, vegetable oil, onion, green pepper, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard ; preparation:Salt and pepper ground beef. Form into 6 patties. Brown in hot oil over medium high heat, about 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pan. Add onion and green pepper to pan. Saute about 5 minutes or until tender. Add tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, and mustard. Blend and return hamburger patties to pan. Bring to boil, cover, and reduce heat. Simmer until patties are no longer pink, about 15 minutes. Remove cover and cook 5 minutes more. ; name: grilled marinated halibut with picante cilantro mayo ; ingredients: halibut fillets, olive oil, fresh cilantro, chili powder, cumin, seasoning salt, fresh garlic, mayonnaise, picante sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine all the marinade ingredients. Marinate halibut filets for three hours. Combine all sauce ingredients and set aside. Grill halibut filets on medium-high heat 5 minutes per side, or to your liking. Serve immediately with sauce on the side. ; name: baked halibut steaks ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, tomato sauce, halibut steaks, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: broccoli cheese soup ; ingredients: onion, margarine, flour, salt, white pepper, chicken broth, milk, broccoli, cheddar cheese, celery ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in butter in saucepan over medium heat until tender. Add flour, and salt and pepper, cooking and stirring until mixture is smooth and bubbly. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken. Add cooked broccoli, stirring until all is heated through. Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted and smooth. ; name: bow tie bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, sliced mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper, bow tie pasta, condensed tomato soup, mozzarella cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef, onion, mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink. Drain. In a greased 3-quart baking dish, layer half of the pasta, half of the meat mixture, all of the tomato soup and 1 cup of cheese. Top with the remaining pasta and meat mixture. Spread evenly with mushroom soup. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes or until heated thoroughly. ; name: p g s bow tie pasta side ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, asparagus, red bell pepper, celery, onion, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, feta cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta just to done. Drain and cool in icy water 2 minute and drain again. Cook the fresh asparagus for only 1 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain again. Into a large bowl place all the ingredients including the pasta & asparagus. Mix well, cover and place in refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving. Serves 6-8. ; name: broccoli cheese squares ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, nutmeg, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, frozen chopped broccoli, green onions ; preparation:Whisk together eggs and milk in a bowl. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and nutmeg. Stir into egg mixture. Fold in cheese, broccoli and onions. Pour into well greased 9x13 pan. Bake in 350 oven for 35 minutes, until set and golden. ; name: bow tie pasta with pink cream sauce ; ingredients: bacon, red pepper flakes, diced onion, garlic cloves, italian plum tomatoes, whipping cream, salt, bow tie pasta, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In heavy skillet over medium heat cook bacon, pepper flakes, onion and garlic and cook until onion is tender and bacon is done, about 7 minutes. Add tomatoes, cream and salt. Simmer until slightly thickened, about 15 minutes. Toss with cooked pasta. Add lots of parmesan cheese and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: bow tiezanga ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, cooked ground beef, spaghetti sauce, cottage cheese, italian cheese blend, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:In the cooked beef add the sauce and garlic simmer on low. After the bow-tie are drained really well put the cottage cheese and one of the shredded chesses in and mix well. In a 13x9 bake dish layer first part if the sauce and then half of the bow tie mixture. Then repeat until all is gone. Top with remaining shredded cheese. Bake at 350f for about 20 until heated through and cheese is melted. Enjoy. I also think this would be good to add veggies such as grated zucchini and mushroom or any you would like. ; name: cream of broccoli and cheddar soup ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, chicken broth, butter, flour, milk, black pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Clean broccoli, chop florets and thinly slice stems. In a medium-size saucepan, combine broccoli and chicken broth. Heat to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 7 minutes, or until broccoli is fork tender. Transfer, one third at a time to a food processor. Process until fairly smooth. In the same saucepan, melt butter over medium heat, add flour. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbly. Add milk and pepper. Heat to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium and add the broccoli puree. Stir in cheese until the cheese melts, stirring constantly. ; name: broccoli and cheddar bow ties ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, broccoli, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, milk, dijon mustard, old cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: shrimp with rice stick noodles and vegetables ww ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, sesame seed oil, rice sticks, large shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantro ; preparation:In a small cup combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: green onion rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, hot chili pepper, water, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp or shrimp meat, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve. ; name: spinach fried rice ; ingredients: spinach, garlic, dark sesame oil, white wine, celery, mushroom, long grain brown rice, scallion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: prawn and bacon fried rice ; ingredients: cooking spray, eggs, lean bacon, green onions, garlic clove, snow peas, prawns, cooked basmati rice, soy sauce ; preparation:Spray a hot non-stick wok with oil spray. Pour in eggs. Swirl to cover the base of the wok and cook until set. Remove from the wok. Roll up and slice. Set aside. Spray the wok again and add bacon, stir-frying for 4 to 5 minutes until golden. Add the green onions, garlic and snow peas and stir-fry a further 2 to 3 minutes. Add the prawns to the wok along with the rice, egg, and soy sauce. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until hot. Serve immediately. ; name: rum shrimp curry ; ingredients: shrimp, spiced rum, cajun seasoning, oil, onion, water, crushed tomatoes, thai curry paste, cooked jasmine rice, fish stock ; preparation:Place shrimp in a medium bowl, add rum and sprinkle with cajun spice powder. Add 2 tablespoons oil and let marinate for 15 minutes. Meanwhile add 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet and saut onion until tender. Add curry paste and water, mixing well. Remove shrimp from marinade and set aside. Stir in marinade and tomatoes to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes. Add shrimp and cook gently for 3-4 minutes. Dont overcook or shrimp will be tough and rubbery. Serve over cooked jasmine rice. ; name: thai chicken and noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, sweet chili sauce, chicken fillets, chicken stock, red capsicum, brown sugar, fish sauce, coriander ; preparation:Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through. ; name: filipino shrimps sauteed ; ingredients: shrimp, onions, garlic cloves, soy sauce, mountain dew soda, sugar, cornstarch, water, tomatoes, oil ; preparation:Put oil in skillet. Add crushed cloves garlic and finely diced onion. Peel and devein shrimp leaving tails on. Add to pan fry. Add tomato diced fine. Add sugar. Add mountain dew or sprite. Cook 5 minutes. Add cornstarch and water. Cook until thick. ; name: thai shrimp fried rice with pineapple ; ingredients: jasmine rice, vegetable oil, garlic, onion, medium shrimp, fish sauce, sugar, crushed pineapple, green onions ; preparation:

name: brenda s hidden valley ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, louisiana hot sauce, vinegar, hidden valley ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Put wings, hot sauce and vinegar in a large bowl. Toss together. Marinate for at least 30 minutes. While marinating heat oven to 400f. Line jelly roll pan with parchment paper or foil. Lay marinated wings, skin side up on shallow pan. Sprinkle with the dressing mix. Bake for 40 minutes or until done. The more crowded the wings are, the juicier they are. The more separated the wings are, the crispier they are. Drain wings on paper towels, then place in serving dish. Either keep warm or place in fridge and heat at a later time. ; name: lacquered chinese chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, honey, dark sesame oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, five-spice powder, white pepper ; preparation:Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold. ; name: oriental chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, sugar, cornstarch, salt, ground ginger, pepper, water, lemon juice, soy sauce ; preparation:Cut wings in half at joint, discard. Place on broiler rack, or wire rack with pan under and bake at 400 deg for 15 minutes. Turn and bake an additional 15 minutes. In a saucepan mix the sugar, cornstarch, salt, ginger & pepper. Add liquids. Cook stirring constantly over med heat until mixture thickens. Boil 2 minutes. Brush over wings. Continue baking at 400 deg. For 35 minutes. During baking brush soy mixture on wings frequently. ; name: barbecued wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, tomato sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. In a shallow baking pan, arrange the chicken wings so they do not touch each other. Bake for 30 minutes. In small sauce pan combine the tomato sauce, sugar and soy sauce and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm. ; name: sticky chilli chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, red chilies, ginger, water, soya sauce, white wine vinegar, sugar, fresh coriander leaves ; preparation:Place chilli, ginger, water, soya sauce, vinegar and sugar in a deep frying pan, and simmer over medium heat. Allow to simmer for 3 minutes. Add chicken wings and cook covered for 35 minutes, turning occasionally. Remove lid from pan and continue cooking for 25 minutes, turning the chicken pieces till it is cooked and well coated in the chilli sauce. Stir through the coriander leaves and serve with steamed rice and greens. ; name: orange glazed chicken wings ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken wings, sugar-free orange marmalade, dijon mustard, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add wing pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting.
