The meat just falls off the bone. ; name: bourbon chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, vegetable oil cooking spray, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, soy sauce, bourbon, ketchup ; preparation:Lightly coat large non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Place frozen wings in a single layer in the prepared skillet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour mixture evenly over chicken. Cover and cook over medium heat 20 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside, turning wings often to prevent from sticking. ; name: spicy ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, hot pepper sauce, butter, cider vinegar, ranch dressing mix, paprika ; preparation:

name: applesauce jello salad ; ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, sugar-free raspberry gelatin, unsweetened orange juice, diet 7-up ; preparation:Heat applesauce. Stir in the jello till dissolved. Stir in the orange juice. Carefully pour in the 7-up. Chill until slightly gelled. Pour into a mold or an 8-inch by 8-inch pan. Refrigerate until set. ; name: red hot jello salad ; ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, cherry jell-o, applesauce ; preparation:In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil. Stir red-hots in simmering water until dissolved. Remove from heat. Add jello mix and stir until dissolved. Stir in cold applesauce. Pour mixture into a serving dish and chill until set. ; name: zingy jello salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, small curd cottage cheese, crushed pineapple in syrup, miracle whip ; preparation:Empty both boxes of jello into a large bowl and add boiling water. Stir to dissolve and let cool. Add miracle whip and beat to a smooth consistency. Add cottage cheese and pineapple with the syrup. Mix and refrigerate until set up. ; name: mountain dew salad ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, lemon pudding mix, cool whip, mountain dew soda, hot water ; preparation:Prepare pudding according to package directions and cool. Dissolve jello in 2 cups hot water and add mountain dew. Cool slightly. Whip jello and pudding together and fold in cool whip. Chill 4 hours. ; name: strawberry banana salad ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, bananas, crushed pineapple, pecans, sour cream ; preparation:Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: cran raspberry waldorf salad ; ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, celery rib, apples, walnuts ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir till dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir till combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill till set, 2-3 hours. ; name: raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: pretzel sticks, white sugar, margarine, cool whip, cream cheese, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen raspberries ; preparation:

name: doris cranberry salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, water, black cherry gelatin, whole berry cranberry sauce, apple, celery, walnuts, lemon juice ; preparation:Prepare the apples, celery, and walnuts. Combine pineapple& water in a saucepan. Heat just to boiling& add gelatin. Stir until gelatin is dissolved. Add other ingredients, stir well, and turn off burner. Pour into bowl. Chill until firm. ; name: cranberry apple waldorf gelatin salad ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, sugar, boiling water, cranberry juice cocktail, apple, fresh cranberries, celery, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix gelatin and sugar. Add boiling water and stir until gelatin is completely dissolved. Add juice. Chill in refrigerator until mixture has consistency of unbeaten egg whites. Fold in apple, cranberries, celery, and walnuts. Pour into a 8-inch square pan. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator until firm. To serve, cut into squares. ; name: red hot jello salad ; ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, cherry jell-o, applesauce ; preparation:In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil. Stir red-hots in simmering water until dissolved. Remove from heat. Add jello mix and stir until dissolved. Stir in cold applesauce. Pour mixture into a serving dish and chill until set. ; name: blueberry grape salad ; ingredients: grape jell-o, boiling water, crushed pineapple, blueberry pie filling, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Dissolve jell-o in water. Add pineapple and pie filling. Pour into 9x13 inch glass dish and chill until set. Stir together cream cheese and sour cream. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend well. Spread cream cheese mixture over chilled jell-o. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Chill. ; name: pineapple rice cream salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, crushed pineapple, pineapple juice, cooked rice, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Also chill the condensed milk for 1 hour. Beat the condensed milk till thick. Beat jello till light and fluffy, then add condensed milk. Fold in rice and well drained pineapple. Chill at least 1 hour. ; name: strawberry banana salad ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, bananas, crushed pineapple, pecans, sour cream ; preparation:Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time. ; name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: cranberry raspberry salad ; ingredients: jello gelatin, boiling water, cranberry sauce, lemon juice, red raspberries ; preparation:

name: swiss steak mozzarella ; ingredients: beef round steak, flour, margarine, tomatoes, salt, cream of mushroom soup, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut meat into serving size pieces. Coat with flour. Melt margarine in skillet. Brown meat slowly on both sides. Put into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Combine tomatoes, soup and salt. Pour over meat. Bake covered at 350 degrees 1 hour, or until meat is tender. Remove cover and sprinkle with cheese. Bake an additional 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: chili with ravioli ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, lean ground beef, dried oregano, chili powder, salt, chili beans, crushed tomatoes, cheese ravioli, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil in a wide deep skillet or dutch oven. Add onion, and cook over medium-high heat for 5 mins until onion is translucent. Add ground beef and, using a large spoon or fork to break up, cook until the meat is browned. Add next 5 ingredients, rinsing out each can with a few tablespoons of water and adding the water to the pot. Cook for 15-20 minutes to let the flavors blend. Salt to taste. As the chili simmers, bring a large pot of water to boil and salt the water. When the water boils, add the frozen ravioli, and when the water returns to a boil, lower heat to simmer. Cook 4 or 5 mins until ravioli is cooked through. Place in serving bowls with chili over the top, sprinkled with grated cheese. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: pizza steak ; ingredients: plain flour, salt, pepper, boneless eye of round beef steak, onion, canola oil, pizza sauce, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Combine flour, salt, & pepper. Pound into steaks. In large skillet, brown onions in oil over medium heat. Remove & set aside to drain. Add steaks to skillet, & brown well on both sides. Return onion to skillet, piling them on top of steaks. Pour pizza sauce over all. Cover skillet, reduce heat to medium low, and simmer 10-12 minutes, until steaks are cooked through. Uncover and top evenly with parmesan and mozzarella. Cover, and cook 3-5 minutes until cheeses are melted. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: homemade hamburger pizza ; ingredients: biscuits, tomato sauce, oregano, hamburger, mozzarella cheese, pineapple chunks ; preparation:Leave the refrigerator biscuits in the container on the counter for about 10 minutes, it is easier to spread the refrigerator rolls out when they are at room temperature. Open the containers and squish the rolls out onto a greased pizza pan, slightly over lapping the rolls. On big you want your pizza depends on how spread out you put the rolls and how thick you want the dough. Bake in the oven for 7-10 minutes at 375 only until the dough puffs and starts to get stiff to the touch, just before it starts to brown. Remove dough from the oven. Mix the tomato sauce and oregano together. Spread tomato sauce mix onto the dough. Spread the hamburger over the sauce. Spread the shredded mozzerella cheese over the hamburger. Sprinkle pineapple over the cheese. Bake the pizza another 10 minutes at 375 or until the cheese is melted and the dough just starts to turn brown. ; name: baked beef and ravioli ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: tuna pita ; ingredients: tuna in water, celery ribs, green onions, fresh dill, plain nonfat yogurt, dry mustard, celery salt, whole wheat pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna with a fork. Combine with celery, green onion and dill. Blend together yogurt, mustard, and celery salt, then mix with tuna. Cut pita bread in half and line with lettuce and tomato slices. Add tuna and serve. ; name: the world s best tuna burgers ; ingredients: solid white tuna, egg, cheese, ranch dressing, onion, seasoned dry bread crumb, breadcrumbs, pam cooking spray ; preparation:In a medium bowl mix all ingredients together thoroughly. I noticed it is a better consistency if you mix with your hands. Place the extra breadcrumbs for coating on a shallow dish. Preheat pan on medium with pam. Form a patty with your hands and coat both sides of it with breadcrumbs. Place the patty in a preheated fry pan. Repeat steps until mix is finished, usually around 6 patties. Cook until each side has browned and has a slight crispiness. I like to serve them on toasted bread with mayo, lettuce, and tomato if you like. ; name: easy tuna melt casserole bake ; ingredients: tuna, onion, celery, mayonnaise, bread, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, half-and-half ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Toast the bread slices. Line the bottom of a greased baking dish with 6 slices of bread, set 6 slices of bread aside. In a bowl, mix together the tuna, chopped onion, celery and mayo. Spread the mixture on the bread in the baking dish. Place the remaining bread slices on top of the tuna mixture. Place the slices of cheese over the bread. Mix together the undiluted soup and the half and half. Pour over the cheese slices, spreading with the back of a spoon to coat evenly. Bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: creamy tuna casserole ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, cheddar cheese, onion, tuna, sour cream, whole wheat elbow macaroni ; preparation:Cook pasta and drain. Preheat oven to 350. Set aside 1 cup of the cheddar for topping. Mix all other ingredients well and put into covered casserole dish. Top with the reserved cheddar prior to baking. Bake for 45 minutes. ; name: low fat tuna casserole ; ingredients: tuna, no yolks egg noodle substitute, cream of celery soup, peas, dill weed, pepper ; preparation:Prepare egg noodles according to package directions. When noodles are done drain well. Put noodles back into pan and add the drained tuna, drained peas, soups and seasonings to noodles and mix altogether. You may want to warm the casserole in the pan after you are done making it. It may be a little bit cool for your taste after you add all of the ingredients but i even like this cold. Make sure that you do not overcook when heating this up. It will stick to the pan fast so i always heat it on the lowest flame for only about 5 minutes or until warmed through. ; name: tuna fish junk ; ingredients: butter, onions, celery, bisquick, salt, milk, tuna ; preparation:Saut onion and celery in butter. Remove from heat. Blend in bisquick and salt. Add milk. Cook and stir until thick. Blend in tuna and heat through. ; name: tropical grilled tuna ; ingredients: fresh pineapple, onion, jalapeno peppers, fresh cilantro, lime juice, tuna steaks, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Grill pineapple slices, uncovered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side. Chill for 30 minutes. Dice the pineapple. Place in a bowl. Stir in the onion, jalapenos, cilantro and lime juice. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled. Brush tuna steaks with oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5 minutes. ; name: terrific tuna melt ; ingredients: solid white tuna packed in water, chive & onion cream cheese, pita bread, mild cheddar cheese, assorted fresh vegetable ; preparation:

name: spinach fried rice ; ingredients: spinach, garlic, dark sesame oil, white wine, celery, mushroom, long grain brown rice, scallion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: spanakorizo spinach with rice ; ingredients: spinach, spring onions, dill, rice, oil, water, salt and pepper, lemon ; preparation:Wash the spinach well and cut as finely as possible. Clean onions and cut into fine strips. Put onions into a saucepan with the oil and cook til softened. Add dill and cook a bit longer. Add the spinach, salt and pepper, add 3 c water and allow to boil. Just before spinach is fully cooked, add in 3 more cups water and the rice. Cover the saucepan and allow the ingredients to cook, stirring occassionally. When the water is absorbed, serve with freshly ground pepper and lemon juice. Enjoy. ; name: spinach stir fry with garlic ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic clove, fresh spinach, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, sesame seeds ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minutes. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: warm spinach and basil salad ; ingredients: spinach leaves, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic, pine nuts, prosciutto, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine the spinach and basil in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the prosciutto. Mix well. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: ukrainian spinach noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh spinach, swiss cheese ; preparation:In a bowl toss noodles with one tablespoon butter. In a skillet melt the remaining butter over medium low heat. Stir in onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in spinach and increase heat to high cooking until spinach is limp, tossing occasionally. Stir in noodles, cooking and stirring until heated through. Transfer noodle mixture to a bowl and toss with cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Toss. ; name: arabian spinach ; ingredients: onion, oil, garlic, spinach, cumin, chickpeas, butter ; preparation:In a large wok, fry onion in oil for about 5 minutes, until softened. Add the garlic and cumin, and then fry for another minute. Add spinach in stages, stirring until leaves begin to wilt. Stir in chickpeas, butter and salt and pepper to taste. Reheat. ; name: spinach with sesame dressing from japanese home cooking ; ingredients: spinach, sesame seeds, dashi, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: quick turkey pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, cream soup, bisquick, egg, milk ; preparation:Place turkey and vegetables in a 8 inch pie pan. Cover with soup. Mix egg, milk and bisquick. Pour over top. Bake at 400f 30-35 minutes or until golden. Serve with favorite salad. ; name: turkey and cabbage casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, rice, tomato soup, water, stewed tomatoes, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease covered casserole dish. Cut cabbage into large pieces and place in casserole dish. Brown turkey and onion. Add rice to turkey and stir. Salt and pepper to taste. Put turkey mixture over cabbage. Add tomato soup, water, and stewed tomatoes. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until rice and cabbage are tender. ; name: turkey burgers with a twist ; ingredients: ground turkey, panko breadcrumbs, mango chutney, sour cream, monterey jack cheese, dijon mustard, chili powder, salt ; preparation:Mix all burger ingredients together, cuting up large pieces of mango in the chutney. Form into four burgers. Grill, broil or pan fry to medium well. Mix together topping ingredients, cutting up large pieces of mango in the chutney. Top burgers and enjoy. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: asian turkey burger ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, applesauce, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the turkey, applesauce, hoisin and soy sauces, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, scallions and salt and pepper to taste. Form the meat into 6 patties. Lightly brush a grill pan or skillet with the sesame oil and place over medium-high heat. Add the patties and fry until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and cook until the other side is golden and the turkey is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bun. Serve immediately. ; name: canadian pork pie ; ingredients: unbaked pie shells, ground lean pork, lean ground beef, mashed potatoes, salt, ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, egg white ; preparation:Brown ground beef and ground pork over medium heat until thoroughly cooked. Drain off grease. Mix together cooked meat, potatoes, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Line a 9 inch pie dish with pastry. Spoon pork mixture into pie crust, and top with second pie crust. Brush top crust with egg white. Shield crust edges with aluminum foil to prevent burning. Bake at 375 degrees f for 45 minutes. Remove foil for final 15 minutes of baking to brown edges. ; name: california turkey burger ; ingredients: ground turkey, cilantro, breadcrumbs, yellow mustard, egg, salt, black pepper, monterey jack cheese, red bell peppers ; preparation:Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over high heat for 15 minutes or until no longer pink in center. Top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Grill pepper rings for two minutes. Place burgers on bun, top with pepper rings. ; name: turkey and hash browns pie ; ingredients: ground turkey, carrots, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, frozen hash browns, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: old fashioned walnut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, shortening, milk, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: apple nut cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, shortening, egg, flour, salt, nutmeg, apple, walnuts ; preparation:Cream together sugar and shortening. Beat in egg. Sift together dry ingredients, and add to mixture. Beat until well blended. Stir in apples and nuts. Drop in the shape of a ball on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375, for 12-15 minutes. ; name: classic chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool. ; name: our favorite chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate bits, butter, condensed milk, all-purpose flour, nuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: fried bread cookies ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, salt, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Cut crusts off of the bread and cut into 1 inch wide strips. Beat egg. Add egg to milk, salt, and sugar. Dip the bread strips into batter. Roll in chopped nuts. Deep fry until brown or bake in oven 15 minutes. ; name: walnut brownie bites ; ingredients: walnuts, butter, dark chocolate, brown sugar, egg, plain flour, sour cream, rolo chocolates ; preparation:Preheat oven to moderate. Lightly grease 2 non-stick 12 hole mini muffin pans. Divide walnuts among holes. Stir butter and chocolate in small saucepan over low heat until smooth. Stir in sugar, cool to just warm. Stir in egg, then flour and cream. Spoon mixture into prepared pan. Press one rolo into centre of each quantity of mixture. Spread mixture so that rolo is completely enclosed. Bake in oven about 15 minutes. Using a sharp pointed knife, loosen sides of brownies from pan, stand 10 minutes. Remove brownies gently from pan. ; name: prize nut cookies ice box cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, eggs, white sugar, cinnamon, crisco, salt, flour, walnuts ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugars. Add eggs and beat well. Add flour, salt, cinnamon and nuts. Mix well. Make two rolls and refrigerate over night. Cut thin and bake in 350 degree oven until lightly browned. ; name: delicious no flour walnut cookies ; ingredients: extra-large egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, walnuts, lemon rind ; preparation:

name: turkey dinner casserole ; ingredients: turkey gravy, mixed vegetables, prepared stuffing, cooked turkey, mashed potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well. ; name: turkey fiesta ; ingredients: margarine, flour, salt, milk, cooked turkey, frozen peas, chopped pimiento ; preparation:Melt butter in pan. Add flour and salt. Slowly add milk, stirring with a fork or whisk to keep mixture smooth. Heat until thickened. Stir in turkey, peas, and pimentos. Cook until thoroughly heated. Serve over puff pastry shells or toast. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: turkish beef casserole ; ingredients: lean beef, yellow onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, beef stock, ground thyme ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add beef cubes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cut tomatoes into small pieces, add to suacepan and cook for about 5 minutes. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice. ; name: low fat turkey in the garden meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, frozen chopped spinach, quick oats, onion, carrot, nonfat milk, egg whites, italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing. ; name: turkey and cabbage casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, rice, tomato soup, water, stewed tomatoes, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease covered casserole dish. Cut cabbage into large pieces and place in casserole dish. Brown turkey and onion. Add rice to turkey and stir. Salt and pepper to taste. Put turkey mixture over cabbage. Add tomato soup, water, and stewed tomatoes. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until rice and cabbage are tender. ; name: ground turkey stew ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, potatoes, carrot, celery, onions, frozen corn, chicken broth, bay leaves, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute ground turkey in stock pot. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 45 minutes - 1 hour. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve. ; name: russian style turkey cutlets ; ingredients: white bread, half-and-half, ground turkey, egg, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried dill, butter, dry breadcrumbs, cooking oil ; preparation:

name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: curried chicken rice salad ; ingredients: raw rice, cooked chicken, canned pineapple, celery, green pepper, mayonnaise, peach preserves, curry powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine cool rice, chicken, pineapple, celery and green pepper in biggish bowl. Combine peach preserves, mayonnaise and curry powder. Stir into the chicken mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Chill for at least 2-3 hours. Serve topped with grated cheese, or not --. ; name: asian chicken salad ; ingredients: ramen noodles, cooking oil, chicken breasts, sesame ginger salad dressing, ground ginger, celery, carrot, cashews, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles until just tender, about 3 minutes. Pan fry cubed chicken with oil. When the pasta is done, drain it, add the chicken. Mix in celery, carrots, peas and nuts. Wisk the dressing with the ginger and coat chicken and vegetables with the dressing. ; name: chicken salad tea tarts ; ingredients: pie crust, cooked chicken, green onion, celery, curry, mayonnaise, pecans ; preparation:Cut rounds out of your pie crust to fit into the tiny cupcake tins. Press them in and prick them with a fork. Bake 400 degrees till golden. Cool. Mix the rest of ingredients to your liking and fill the tart shells with the chicken salad. Sprinkle chopped pecans over the top. Refrigerate till ready to use. ; name: healthy egg salad sandwich ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, scallions, dijon mustard, lettuce, whole grain bread, salt and pepper ; preparation:With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches. ; name: salad sandwich ; ingredients: white bread, russian salad dressing, tomatoes, lettuce, watercress ; preparation:Spread the dressing on one slice of bread. Place a lettuce leaf on the bread. Top with two slices of tomato. Top with the watercress. Add the remaining tomato and the other slice of bread. ; name: chicken salad sandwiches with poppy seed dressing ; ingredients: mayonnaise, honey, rice wine vinegar, poppy seeds, fuji apples, cooked chicken, dried cranberries ; preparation:

name: our favorite chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate bits, butter, condensed milk, all-purpose flour, nuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: welfare cookies ; ingredients: saltine crackers, sugar, butter, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray your baking pan with cooking spray or line with aluminum foil. Line cookie sheet with the crackers, breaking the end pieces to fit the pan. Melt the butter in a saucepan, stir in the sugar. Bring to a boil stirring constantly until the the sugar is melted and turns a light caramel color. Spread sugar mixture on crackers and place in oven for 10 minutes. Remove pan from oven& sprinkle chocolate chips over all. Spread with a knife when chips melt enough to do so. Sprinkle with crushed walnuts. ; name: apple nut cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, shortening, egg, flour, salt, nutmeg, apple, walnuts ; preparation:Cream together sugar and shortening. Beat in egg. Sift together dry ingredients, and add to mixture. Beat until well blended. Stir in apples and nuts. Drop in the shape of a ball on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375, for 12-15 minutes. ; name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: cracker cookies ; ingredients: dates, nuts, eagle brand condensed milk, cracker, butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients together. Put in double boiler, cook till thick. Cool. Spread on townhouse crackers. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 300 degrees for 10 minutes. Cool, then ice. ; name: chocolate wagon wheel cookies ; ingredients: vegetable oil, unsweetened chocolate, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, vanilla, powdered sugar ; preparation:Combine oil, chocolate, and sugar. Add eggs to this mixture, one at a time, and beat well. Stir in vanilla. Sift flour and baking powder and fold into egg combination. Chill dough several hours or overnight in refridgerator. Roll into balls size of walnuts, then roll in powdered sugar. Bake on greased cookie sheet 7-10 minutes at 350 oven. If you like your cookies soft and chewy, bake only 7 minutes. ; name: hungarian nut nuggets cookies ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, walnuts, vanilla extract, flour ; preparation:

name: steak diane from a treasury of great recipes by vincent price ; ingredients: sirloin steaks, shallots, worcestershire sauce, unsalted butter, parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons of butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the shallot sauce over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: steaks with balsamic mustard sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, steaks, coarse salt, ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce. ; name: sirloin steak bites for two ; ingredients: salt and pepper, butter, oil, top sirloin steak, onion, green pepper, beef bouillon cube, water ; preparation:Salt and pepper the steak pieces. Heat butter and oil in lg skillet. Add steak pieces and cook on med-hi, stirring, for 4 minutes. Remove steak and keep warm. Add onions and peppers to skillet. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Add the crushed boullion and water. Let mixture come to a boil. Spoon onto top of steak bites. ; name: balsamic beer flank steak ; ingredients: flank steaks, beer, garlic cloves, ketchup, chili powder, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, grainy mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pierce meat with a fork several times. Place in a plastic bag. Mix other ingredients and pour over meat. Marinate in fridge 12 hours or overnight. Broil or grill steak over medium high heat 5 to 6 minutes per side. Let meat rest 5 minutes when done. Boil marinade in saucepan for 5 to 10 minutes until slightly thickened. Slice steak into thin strips and top with sauce. ; name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: steak creole ; ingredients: round steaks, celery, green pepper, worcestershire sauce, diced tomatoes, onion, sliced mushrooms, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cut and trim steak into bite-sized pieces. Brown in skillet over medium heat in 2t oil. Add diced celery, green pepper, tomatoes, onion, mushrooms, worcestershire and tabasco. Simmer over low heat for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until meat is tender. Serve over hot cooked rice or noodles. ; name: steak with caramelized onions ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, brown sugar, salt, boneless beef top sirloin steak, pepper, balsamic vinegar, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: cocktail meatballs in garlic butter sauce ; ingredients: ground beef, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, kosher salt, extra large egg, butter, minced garlic clove, flour, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first six ingredients and form into cocktail size meatballs. Place on jelly roll style pan with lip. Bake meatballs in oven for 15-20 minutes until done. Melt butter in saucepan. Add garlic and saut for 1-2 minutes. Stir in flour. Stir in chicken broth and cook until thickened. Combine meatballs and sauce. Keep warm in crockpot if serving for party. ; name: buffalo meatballs gravy ; ingredients: ground buffalo meat, egg, ritz cracker, onion, garlic powder, pepper, beefy mushroom soup, flour ; preparation:Combine the first 6 ingredients. Mix well. Using a large scoop,. Scoop into balls and place on large jellyroll pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. In a large skillet, combine the soup and flour. Cook over medium heat until thickened. Add cooked meatballs, and simmer 10 minutes. Serve over mashed potatoes, or egg noodles. ; name: tomato and maple meatballs ; ingredients: ground veal, green onion, garlic cloves, milk, bread, olive oil, maple syrup, salt and pepper, tomato sauce ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix veal, green onion and garlic. In a medium bowl, put milk and soak the bread then incorporate to the veal mixture. Shape in 10 large meatballs. At medium heat, in a small skillet, heat olive oil and brown the meatballs a few minutes. Add maple syrup, salt, pepper and let cook around 3 minutes more. Remove the skillet from the heat. In a saucepan, put tomato sauce and bring to boil. When it comes to boil, add meatballs, cover and simmer around 25 minutes. Serve on a bed of pasta. ; name: taco meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, green onion, eggs, garlic clove, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients except the cheese together in a bowl. Mold a tbs of meat around a cube of cheese to form a small shaped meatball. Repeat with all of the meat. Spray an edged cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray and place meatballs on the cookie sheet. Bake for 7-10 min or until meat is done and cheese is melted. ; name: meatballs for spaghetti or sandwiches ; ingredients: lean ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, milk, romano cheese, dried basil, dried oregano, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Mix spices with breadcrumbs and grated cheese. Thoroughly combine with remaining ingredients, by hand. Shape into balls. Brown in olive oil on all sides, or alternatively, bake in 400 degree oven for approx. 20 to 30 minutes, till browned but not cooked through. The meatballs maintain their shape better using the oven method. Add to spaghetti sauce and simmer for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: danish meatballs frikadeller ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, ground lean pork, egg, breadcrumbs, onion, water, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy. ; name: meatball pancakes ; ingredients: egg yolks, ground beef, baking powder, salt, pepper, lemon juice, parsley, onion, egg whites ; preparation:Beat until light the 3 egg yolks. Then blend in the ground beef, baking poweder, salt, dash of pepper, lemon juice, parsley, and onion mix well. Then fold in the 3 egg whites that have been stiffly beat. Drop spoonfuls on hot greased griddle when puffed and brown, turn and brown on other side. Serve with mushroom gravy. ; name: weeknight meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, white bread, egg, garlic powder, onion powder, ground pepper, tomato paste, hunts tomato sauce, sugar, salt ; preparation:

name: brie and cranberry pizza ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, brie cheese, whole berry cranberry sauce, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. Unroll the crescent rolls and press into baking dish pinching seams together. Bake 5 minutes, or until lightly brown. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with pieces of brie cheese. Spoon the cranberry sauce over the cheese. Top with pecans. Bake an additional 8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown. Cool 5 minutes and cut into squares. ; name: warm brie berry dip ; ingredients: sourdough bread rounds, brie cheese, brown sugar, pecans, pine nuts, blueberries, raspberries ; preparation:Slice the top off a round loaf of sourdough bread. Save the top, but hollow out the inside of the loaf. Discard insides or use for breadcrumbs later. Combine brie, sugar, nuts and berries. Place into the hollowed-out loaf and cover with bread top for a lid. Wrap in foil and bake for 40 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve warm with a tray of sliced baguettes. Bread lid can be cut into pieces and also used for dipping. ; name: basic french toast ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, salt, white bread, butter, maple syrup ; preparation:Put the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup. ; name: pat s cranberry banana bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, bananas, cranberries, flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Beat together the butter, sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in fruit. Blend dry ingredients in another bowl. Add all at once to the fruit mixture, stirring only to moisten. Scrape into greased loaf pan and bake at 350 degrees for 60 minutes until done. ; name: amazing overnight french toast ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, raisin bread, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Over medium heat, bring corn syrup, brown sugar and butter to a boil. Boil 5 minutes and pour into a greased 13 x 9 baking pan. Cut or tear all of the bread and place in the pan, set aside. Beat eggs, milk and vanilla and pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Uncover and bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: cranberry scones ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, ground cloves, butter, whipping cream, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients. Cut in butter with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Reserve 1 tbsp whipping cream. Add remaining whipping cream and chopped cranberries to dry ingredients, stirring just until dry ingredients are moist. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead 5- 6 times. Shape into an 8-inch circle. Cut into 8 wedges, and place on a lightly greased baking sheet. Prick wedges with a fork 3- 4 times, and brush with reserved 1 tbsp whipping cream. Bake at 425 for 18 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve warm with whipped cream drizzled on top. ; name: cranberry chocolate chip biscotti ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, dried cranberries, semi-sweet chocolate chips, baking powder, salt, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, almond extract, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, berries, chips, baking powder & salt. In a small bowl, mix vegetable oil, the 2 extracts & beaten eggs. Add egg mixture to flour mixture & blend well. Knead dough on lightly floured surface until smooth. Divide dough in half & shape each half into an 8-inch long log. Place logs 6 inches apart on baking sheet coated with cooking spray, then flatten each to about a 1-inch thickness. Bake 35 minutes, then remove logs from baking sheet & cool 10 minutes on wire rack. Meanwhile, reduce oven heat to 325 degrees f. Cut each log diagonally into 15 half-inch slices, placing slices standing up on baking sheet. Return slices to oven & bake an additional 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven, & transfer slices to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: easy honey cranberry french toast with brie ; ingredients: butter, cranberries, honey, eggs, sugar, milk, vanilla, whole grain bread, brie cheese ; preparation:

name: sauteed spinach with mushrooms ; ingredients: baby spinach, butter, mushroom, salt and pepper, fresh garlic cloves ; preparation:Bring water in a large pot to a boil. Add the spinach and cook for 1 minute or less. Drain in colander and let cool. Squeeze spinach to extract moisture and chop. Melt all but 1 tablespoons of butter in the pan on medium low heat, add the the sliced mushrooms and cook, stirring often. Add salt and pepper when mushrooms are almost cooked and add remaining butter and spinach. Cook thru stirring about 30 seconds. Sprinkle with chopped garlic, stir and cook for a few more minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: simple spinach side dish ; ingredients: frozen spinach, sour cream, dehydrated onion, cheese, fresh breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw and drain the spinach. Mix spinach, onion and sour cream. Place in greased casserole dish. Cover with grated cheese, fresh bread crumbs, and parm. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: scalloped spinach casserole ; ingredients: bacon, onion, eggs, spinach, flour, milk, salt and pepper, cracker crumb, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Add the bacon-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: sweet and sour german spinach ; ingredients: bacon, frozen spinach, onion, egg, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium skillet until almost crisp. Fry onion in bacon grease until soft. Remove onion and bacon from grease. Place spinach in grease, stirring until hot. Return onion and bacon to skillet. Mix sugar and vinegar. Beat egg then mix with vinegar and sugar. Pour over spinach. Cook 2-5 minute. Salt to taste. ; name: spinach cheese patties ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, egg yolks, flour, wheat germ, fresh spinach, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown. ; name: mushroom tomato bacon and egg pie ; ingredients: puff pastry, bacon, sliced mushrooms, tomatoes, onion, ground black pepper, eggs, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190-200 degrees. Line a 20cm pie dish with baking paper. Place 1 sheet of pastry over the paper. Trim edges. Place bacon, mushrooms, tomato and onion in pastry case. Season with black pepper. Crack eggs over filling. Top pie with remaining sheet of pastry. Trim and crimp edges. Glaze top of pie with milk. Cut a vent in centre of pie. Bake for 25-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown. ; name: the best spinach pie and so easy ; ingredients: pie crust, butter, mushrooms, jarlsberg cheese, spinach souffle ; preparation:

name: mustard rub for pork ; ingredients: brown mustard seeds, fennel seed, coriander seeds, cumin seed, whole black peppercorn, dried thyme, dry mustard, ground ginger, coarse salt, sugar ; preparation:Place the first 5 ingrediants in a dry skillant. Place over medium heat, moving the skillet to keep seeds from burning, until aromatic, about 2 minutes. Mustard seeds will begin to pop. Transfer seeds to a spice grinder, cool slightly, and pulse until finely chopped but not powdery. Transfer to a small bowl and stir in rest of the ingrediants. ; name: mustard ham sauce ; ingredients: sugar, flour, eggs, prepared mustard, vinegar, beef bouillon, butter ; preparation:Stir flour and sugar together. Add eggs and mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick. Serve hot over ham. Refrigerate leftover sauce to use for sandwiches. ; name: swiss pork chops with mustard sauce ; ingredients: pork loin chops, flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt and pepper. Brown in hot butter on both sides, about 20 minutes. Add wine and lemon juice and simmer for about 45 or 50 minutes, or until tender. Remove to warm serving platter. Make mustard sauce. Stir flour into drippings in skillet until smooth. Stir in cream, mustard and cayenne. Boil, stirring 1 minute. Serve chops with sauce. ; name: molasses mustard ; ingredients: mustard seeds, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, white wine vinegar, molasses ; preparation:Mix the mustard seeds and spices in a bowl, pour the vinegar on top and leave to soak overnight. Place the mixture in a mortar and pound to a paste. Gradually work in the molasses. The finished mustard should resemble a stiff paste, so add extra vinegar if necessary. Store the mustard in sterilized jars in the fridge. Use within 4 weeks. ; name: pork chops with cherry mustard sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, pork chops, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, dry white wine, dijon mustard, fresh cherries, unsalted butter ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops. ; name: raisin sauce ; ingredients: mustard powder, flour, butter, water, brown sugar, cider vinegar, raisins ; preparation:Whisk mustard and flour together. Melt butter. Whisk in dry ingredients. Cook 1-2 min, until the raw taste is cooked out of the flour. Add water, sugar and vinegar. Simmer 45 minutes. Add raisins and simmer 10 minutes more. ; name: old style mustard and rosemary asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, olive oil, whole grain mustard, fresh rosemary, lemon, zest of, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the asparagus with all the other other ingredients on the baking sheet until combined. Roast for 10 to 12 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: grainy french style mustard ; ingredients: brown mustard seeds, rice vinegar, mustard powder, salt, beer ; preparation:

name: hubby s chewy brownies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, eggs, water, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f grease a 9x13-inch baking pan. Combine dry ingredients in a medium bowl. Add remaining ingredients, stir well. Pour into prepared dish. Bake for 27-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out slightly sticky. Cool pan on a wire rack. ; name: weight watchers chocolate marshmallow fudge ; ingredients: sugar, fat-free evaporated milk, reduced-calorie margarine, semisweet chocolate, marshmallows ; preparation:Coat an 8x8-inch pan with cooking spray. Stir together sugar, evaporated milk and margarine. Bring to a boil in sauce pan, reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in chocolate and marshmallows. Remove from heat and stir until smooth. Pour into pan and refrigerate until firm, about two hours. Cut into 36 squares and serve. If you are following weight watchers, this has 3 points per serving. ; name: tanner s brownies ; ingredients: oleo, sugar, flour, eggs, cocoa, vanilla ; preparation:Melt oleo in medium saucepan. After melted. In same pan add all the other ingredients. Stir well and pour into a 8x8 pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: light carrot cocoa snack cake brownies ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, baking powder, sugar, carrot, skim milk, applesauce, egg whites, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 and spray a 9 inch square pan with sprayable oil. Mix cocoa, flour and baking powder in a bowl. Mix in shredded carrots and sugar. In another small bowl, mix egg whites, milk, apple sauce and vanilla. Lightly beat with fork and add to dry ingredients. Mix just until blended. Pour batter into pan and bake for 20-25 minutes. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: weight watchers brownie cupcake bites ; ingredients: brownie mix, water, unsweetened applesauce, egg whites, light whipped topping, candy corn ; preparation:

name: vegan sponge cake ; ingredients: spelt flour, unbleached cane sugar, baking powder, ener-g egg substitute, pure vanilla extract, light oil, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean. ; name: basic cake or muffin mix wheat and egg free ; ingredients: gluten-free flour, salt, baking powder, caster sugar, butter, puree, white vinegar, milk ; preparation:Rub the dry ingredients in with the butter. Add the wet ingredients, adding a little milk at a time to get a soft dropping consistancy. Beat the mixture well to combine. Add paper liners to the muffin tin and fill with the mixture. Sprinkle a little sugar on the tops of the muffins. Bake at about 190 degrees celsius for about 20 - 25 minutes for muffins and about 50 minutes for a loaf tin. Makes about 12 muffins. ; name: orange and almond cake gluten free ; ingredients: orange, eggs, caster sugar, almond meal, baking powder, icing sugar, butter ; preparation:Place orange in boiling water for 2 hours. Remove and allow to cool. This can be done ahead of time. Preheat oven to 180c. Break eggs into a blender. Add caster sugar and blend together. Cut up orange and place into egg mix, and blend together to a smooth consistency. Add the almond meal and baking powder and blend. Grease baking pan and dust with caster sugar. Pour batter into the pan and sprinkle caster sugar on top and bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown. Dust with icing sugar to serve. ; name: amaranth pie crust gluten free ; ingredients: arrowroot, flour, amaranth flour, sea salt, cinnamon, vegetable oil, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f and lightly oil a 9-inch pie pan. Set aside. Combine dry ingredients and blend well. Combine oil and 3 tablespoons water and blend with fork. Add all at once to flour. Stir only until a ball forms. If ball appears dry and crumbly, add a little more water, one teaspoon at a time, until ball hangs together. Pat or roll crust to fit into pie pan. Dough tears easily, but mends easily using extra bits to patch. Prick with fork. Bake 3 minutes at 400f, fill pie and finish baking the time required for filling or bake about 15 minutes until brown and crisp. Cool and fill. ; name: a quick and easy white cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, vegetable shortening, milk, vanilla, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done. ; name: ww core friendly sweet corn cakes ; ingredients: cornmeal, plain fat-free yogurt, baking powder, water, egg, onion, frozen corn, splenda sugar substitute, yogurt cheese ; preparation:Mix yogurt, water and egg together in bowl. Add in cornmeal and baking powder and stir together until batter is moist. If you like sweeter cakes, especially for breakfast, add splenda at same time. Let batter stand for 15-20 minutes. Quickly fold in corn and grated onions. Heat pan over medium heat and lightly coat with cooking spray. Add batter to the pan in spoonfuls. For best results, keep the cakes 2-3 inches in diameter. Let first side cook until tops is dry around the edges. Turn and cook other side. Serve with a dollop of soft yogurt cheese. ; name: egg white cake ; ingredients: egg whites, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, potato starch, baking powder, butter ; preparation:Whisk the egg whites with 2 tbsp of sugar until thick and pale and very foamy. Mix the rest of the sugar with flour, potato starch and baking powder, then sift into the egg mixture and fold in gently. Finally fold in cool melted butter. Pour the batter into a buttered bundt-form and bake in a pre-heated 180 c oven for 30-40 minutes. Test for doneness with a wooden toothpick. Cool slightly before turning out of the cake tin. ; name: gluten free sponge cake ; ingredients: cornflour, baking powder, eggs, salt, sugar ; preparation:

name: orange coconut pound cake ; ingredients: margarine, butter flavor shortening, sugar, eggs, almond extract, orange, zest of, orange juice, flour, milk, flaked coconut ; preparation:Grease and flour 10-inch tube pan. Preheat oven 350. Cream margarine, shortening, and sugar till light and fluffy, about 10 minutes. Beat in eggs 1 at a time, beating well after each one. Add extract, zest and juice. Combine well. Alternately add flour and milk, beating well after each addition. Add coconut and beat 1 minute. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 1 hour and 15 minutes till test done. Cool 15 minutes remove to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: orange almond cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, light olive oil, eggs, orange juice, orange zest, sliced almonds ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients with mixer for 3 minutes. Pour batter into greased cake pan. I use a 10 inch diameter silicone cake pan and make it in one layer. Sprinkle top of batter with sliced almonds. Bake at 350 degrees until done, about 40 minutes. ; name: orange breakfast coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, pecans, orange zest, reduced-fat cream cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, powdered sugar, orange juice ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in small bowl - set aside. Place about tsp cream cheese in center of each biscuit. Fold biscuit half over cheese, pressing edges to seal. Dip folded biscuit in melted butter, and dredge in sugar mixture. Place biscuits, curve side down in a single layer in curves of a lightly greased 12-cup bundt pan, spacing evenly. Place any remaining biscuits around center of tube pan filling in spaces if necessary. Drizzle any remaining butter over biscuits, sprinkle with any remaining sugar mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until done. Immediately invert onto a serving plate. Combine powdered sugar and oj, stirring well. Drizzle icing over warm coffee cake. ; name: pineapple orange cream cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, mandarin oranges in juice, eggs, oil, instant vanilla pudding, crushed pineapple in juice, whipped topping ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients. Pour into 2-9 inch greased and floured layer cake pans. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Cool. Combine instant pudding and crushed pineapple. Put in refrigerator for an hour. When ready to ice, fold in whipped topping. Frost layers and top and sides of cake. ; name: orange polenta cake ; ingredients: reduced fat margarine, caster sugar, vanilla essence, eggs, egg whites, gluten-free low fat vanilla yogurt, polenta, desiccated coconut, orange rind, fresh orange juice ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, cream margarine, sugar and vanilla essence with electric beater. Add eggs and egg whites, one at a time, continue beating between additions. Blend in yoghurt, polenta, coconut, orange rind and orange juice. Beat well for further 2 minutes. Pour into greased ring pan. Bake in a moderately slow oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until cooked when tested and golden brown. ; name: low fat citrus pound cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, mandarin orange sections, egg substitute, powdered sugar ; preparation:Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: orange sunshine cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, self rising flour, salt, orange, juice and rind of, butter ; preparation:

name: chamomile cauliflower soup ; ingredients: chamomile tea bags, water, head cauliflower, onion, celery ribs, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil water and tea bags in large saucepan for 5 minutes. Remove tea bags. Squeezing the excess liquid into the pan. Add the cauliflower to the tea, cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain, reserving 1 cup of the liquid. In small pan, saute the onions and celery in the butter until the onions are clear. Put in a blender with the cauliflower, salt and pepper, and the reserved cooking liquid. Blend until smooth and serve. For thinner soup, reserve and add more liquid. For thicker soup reserve and and add less. ; name: cream of cauliflower and cheddar soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, cauliflower, condensed chicken broth, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese, pepper, parsley, crouton ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan, saute onion until tender. Stir in cauliflower and chicken broth. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1215 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Combine flour and milk. Add to saucepan. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Add cheese and stir until melted. Add pepper and parsley to taste. Serve with croutons. ; name: pot o gold cauliflower chicken and rice soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, yukon gold potatoes, garlic cloves, onion, curry, turmeric, red pepper flakes, chicken breasts, rice, scallions ; preparation:In a large pot heat 6 cups water and the first 7 ingredients. Simmer till tender about 20 minutes. Blend in blender or hand immersion blender. Add chicken and rice to heat. Season to taste with salt a pepper. Garnish with scallions. For vegan omit the chicken. ; name: purple cauliflower soup with walnut oil ; ingredients: butter, leek, purple potatoes, cauliflower florets, whole milk, kosher salt, white pepper, walnut oil ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat, add leeks and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add cauliflower, potatoes, milk and salt and bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer on low heat until vegetables are soft, about 25 minutes. Do not boil. Remove the vegetables from the heat, let cool slightly and pure them in a blender, with an immersion blender or in a food mill. If serving warm, reheat gently and serve with a drizzle of walnut oil. If serving cold, chill in the refrigerator before serving. ; name: secret ingredient curried cauliflower soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, tart apple, curry powder, garlic clove, cauliflower, vegetable broth, honey, rice wine vinegar ; preparation:Saute onions in oil in large stock pot for 5-7 minutes or until soft and golden. Add apple, curry powder and garlic and cook 2 minutes more or until curry powder turns deep yellow. Add cauliflower and vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cover, reduce heat to medium low and simmer 20 minutes. Cool 20 minutes then blend in food processor or blender until smooth. Stir in honey and vinegar. Season with salt to taste. Reheat or serve cool. ; name: golden autumn soup low fat ; ingredients: fat-free chicken broth, cauliflower, carrot, onion, nonfat milk, ground nutmeg, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, combine broth, cauliflower, carrots, and onions. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 7 to 10 minutes, until vegetables are tender. Puree in a blender or food processor. Return to pan. Add milk and heat thoroughly, but do not boil. Stir in nutmeg and pepper. ; name: easy creamy vegetable soup ; ingredients: onion, carrot, celery, water, vegetables, salt, pepper, chicken broth, half-and-half ; preparation:Simmer onion, carrot and celery in water for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. In a blender or food processor. Puree all vegetables. Add salt, pepper, chicken broth and cream. Heat before serving, but do not boil. ; name: comforting cauliflower soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic, potatoes, cauliflower, low sodium chicken broth, water, salt and pepper, chives ; preparation:

name: chicken and stars soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, onion, celery, garlic cloves, pasta, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a stock pot, place chicken, carrots, garlic, onion and celery. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment. ; name: chicken noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, carrot, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, water, egg noodles, monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken, onions, garlic and bay leaf in broth or water until chicken can be pulled away from the bones. I prefer broth for a richer taste. Remove chicken and cool until you can handle it. Add the celery and carrots to the broth. Cut cooled chicken into bite size pieces. Return chicken to the broth. Simmer until veggies are almost tender. Add pasta to the chicken and veggies. Simmer until pasta and veggies are cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and stir. ; name: delicious vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: winter vegetable soup ; ingredients: light olive oil, garlic cloves, leeks, kumara, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, chicken stock, pumpkin ; preparation:Heat oil and a large pan and cook the garlic and leek, stirring until the leek is soft. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer uncovered for about 40 minutes, making sure the vegetables are tender. Blend or process the mixture in batches until pured. Return soup to pan and stir over heat until hot. This goes well with cheesy chive muffins for a lunch. ; name: amish style chicken and corn soup ww core ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, skinless chicken breasts, onion, carrot, celery, saffron, frozen corn, whole wheat egg noodles, parsley ; preparation:Add the broth, chicken, onion, chopped celery and saffron to a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce to a simmer for 30 minutes. During simmering time, you may want to gently skim any foam that comes to the top of the broth. Take the chicken from the pan and reserve to the side while it cools. Strain broth removing all bits. Return to the sauce pan. Take the now cooked chicken, remove the bones and dice into small inch cubes. Add to the broth along with the cooked noodles, corn, celery and parsley. Heat the soup until all ingredients are hot. Serve. ; name: green veggies soup ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, broccoli florets, zucchini, green onions, chicken stock, pesto sauce, pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, brown the green beans in oil about 4 minutes at medium heat. Add remaining veggies and keep cooking 1 minute. Add chicken stock and pesto. Bring to boil and let simmer until the broccoli is tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Add pepper. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: chicken vegetable soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, frozen corn, celery rib, carrot, onion, cooked chicken, diced tomato, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: crisp beef ; ingredients: lean beef chuck, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dark brown sugar, molasses, lime juice, ground coriander, water, peanut oil ; preparation:Cut the meat in thin slices along the grain, not across it. Pound the slices until they almost fall apart. Put the meat and all the other ingredients except the oil in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium low and cook, stirring now and then, until the liquid has evaporated. Remove the meat and tear it into fine strips using two forks. Scrape the bottom of the pan to gather the residue, add the oil and set it over medium heat. When the oil is hot add the meat shreds and fry, stirring, until they are crisp and dark brown. Drain on paper towels before serving. ; name: no beans no tomato chili ; ingredients: ground beef, water, chili seasoning mix, pepper, accent seasoning, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, onion powder, salt ; preparation:In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes.
