Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want. ; name: beef gravy ; ingredients: beef round steak, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water, cornstarch, cooking oil, mushroom ; preparation:In 6-qt stockpot, in 2 t hot oil, brown meat on all sides. Stir in mushroom soup, onion soup mix, mushrooms and 1 cup water. Cover. Cook 45 minutes or until meat is tender. Stir together cornstarch and cup water until smooth. Gradually stir into gravy mixture. Cook until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly. Excellent served with rice and biscuits. ; name: tender flank steak ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, garlic cloves, brown sugar, vegetable oil, ground ginger, black pepper, flank steak ; preparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: spiced beef ; ingredients: eggs, green onions, sour cream, dry breadcrumbs, dry oregano leaves, salt, dry thyme leaves, ground beef ; preparation:Whisk together eggs with onion and sour cream. Stir in bread crumbs and seasonings. Crumble in beef using your hands, work until mixed. Form into burgers, meatballs or whatever you fancy. Cook now or freeze for later. ; name: beef and bean burrito filling ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, ground beef, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, refried beans ; preparation:Saute the onion in the oil until tender. Add the beef and garlic and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add the chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until well blended. ; name: hamburger steak with gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, lipton onion soup mix, egg, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, black pepper, garlic powder, self rising flour, beef broth ; preparation:Combine all hamburger ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: beef with snow peas ; ingredients: soy sauce, rice wine, brown sugar, cornstarch, vegetable oil, fresh gingerroot, garlic, beef round steak, snow peas ; preparation:

name: simple curry sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt butter. Blend in flour, curry powder, and salt. Slowly add hot stock and bring to boiling. Boil 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Add egg yolk lightly beaten with cream. ; name: curried turkey strips ; ingredients: turkey breast, flour, curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, black pepper, egg, olive oil ; preparation:Slice turkey breast into strips. In a medium bowl combine all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl beat egg. Using one hand for the wet and the other for the dry, dredge the turkey in the egg followed by the flour mixture. Repeat until all strips are coated. Drizzle about a tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Place turkey strips in skillet, cook for 3-4 minutes. Flip strips, cook an additional 3-4 minutes until cooked through, taking care to not overcook or the turkey will become incredibly dry. ; name: crock pot curried lamb and risotto ; ingredients: boneless lamb roast, cooking oil, vegetable juice, brown rice, curry powder, salt, carrots, green pepper ; preparation:Trim any fat from the roast. In a large skillet brown roast on all sides in the hot oil. In a 4 quart slow cooker, combine juice, uncooked rice, curry powder and salt. Add the carrots and place the roast on top. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-9 hours. Add the green pepper to cooker. Cover and let stand 5-10 minutes. ; name: india chicken curry ; ingredients: onion, celery, margarine, flour, curry powder, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, chicken, tomato juice, rice ; preparation:In a medium saucepan cook the onion and celery in hot margarine or butter until tender. Stir in flour and curry powder. Add the chicken broth and worcestershire sauce. Cook and stir until bubbly. Stir in the cooked chicken and tomato juice. Heat through. Season with salt and pepper if desired. Serve over hot rice. ; name: very quick low gi chicken curry ; ingredients: oil, onion, curry paste, tomatoes, skinless chicken thighs, baby spinach, plain yogurt, coriander leaves ; preparation:You also need basmati rice or naan bread to serve. Heat a little oil in a deep non-stick frying pan and add the onion. Fry for about 3 minutes until tender. Then stir in the curry paste and fry for 1 minute. Add the chicken and tomatoes and a splash of water, cover and cook for 15-20 minutes until cooked through. Stir in spinach until it just wilts. Then stir in the yoghurt and coriander, season. Serve with rice, naan bread or salad. ; name: cabbage curry ; ingredients: cabbage, green chilies, onion, garlic cloves, canola oil, salt, chili powder, turmeric, canned tuna ; preparation:In a medium sized pan, pour the oil and heat under high heat. After 1 minute, add the onions, garlic, and salt. Fry until onion and garlic are slightly turning gold. Add the chillies and continue frying. Keep stirring the whole time to avoid burning on the bottom of pan. When the onions and garlic look golden, but not browned, add chilli powder, turmeric and tuna. Stir the ingredients well for about 1 minute or so. Lower the heat to the lowest it can go. Now add the cabbage to the rest of the ingredients in the pot and gently stir around until the cabbage is fully coated with the rest of the ingredients. Place a lid on the pot and let it cook for about 30 minutes taste and see if the cabbage is cooked after 30 minutes. If not, leave it for another 5 min or so until you think its cooked. Goes well with rice or naan, or just as a side dish. ; name: dry and spicy curry ; ingredients: ghee, onion, curry powder, red chili powder, cooked beef, salt, water ; preparation:Heat the ghee or oil in a pan and stir-fry the onion over moderate heat until crisp and light brown. Do not burn. Add the curry powder, chili, and the cooked meat or fish and mix well. Add the salt and water and cook for 5 minutes as a rich, brown sauce develops. Serve warm with rice. ; name: kerrieschotel meat and rice dish flavored with curry ; ingredients: onions, butter, curry powder, chicken broth, aroma seasoning, cooked chicken, long grain rice, corn flake crumbs ; preparation:

name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: elegant tomato beef casserole ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, onion, green pepper, lean ground sirloin, cream cheese, sour cream, cottage cheese, tomato sauce, tomato paste ; preparation:Cook egg noodles according to package directions, drain. Saute onion and green pepper in butter, set aside. Brown ground beef, drain if nesessary. Add onion and green pepper mix to beef, set aside. Cream together cream cheese and sour cream, add cottage cheese, mix well. Mix cheese mix into noodles, mix well. Mix tomato sauce and tomato paste, set aside. Butter a 4-quart casserole. Pour noodle mix into casserole. Spread beef mix over noodles. Spread tomato mix over beef mix. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour. ; name: tomato and macaroni dinner ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, ground beef, diced tomatoes, cooked macaroni, paprika, dried oregano, chili powder, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook onion in vegetable oil. Add in ground beef and cook until meat is browned. Stir in tomatoes, macaroni, and spices. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer, stirring often for 10min. Uncover and boil if not thick enough. ; name: company casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pepper, tomato sauce, cottage cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, green bell pepper, green onion, noodles ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion in skillet. Add salt, to taste, pepper and tomato sauce. Simmer slowly while preparing remaining ingredients. Combine cottage cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, green pepper and green onion. Place half of cooked noodles in a greased 3 qt. Baking dish. Top with cheese mixture over top, and then remaining noodles. Pour meat mixture over top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: zesty italian crescent casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, sour cream, crescent rolls, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: pepperoni casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, tomato sauce, elbow macaroni, pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: hurricane pasta ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, whole tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, cannellini beans, pecorino romano cheese, garlic salt ; preparation:Open cans of tomatoes and pour into large skillet. Cut up whole tomatoes with knife, releasing juices. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add drained beans. Boil pasta water and add pasta. Cook acording to package directions. Add cheese to sauce & stir, simmer till pasta is done. Drain and add to sauce. Sprinkle with extra cheese. ; name: bettyo s rigatoni ala vodka ; ingredients: scallions, garlic clove, butter, vodka, half-and-half, tomato sauce, pecorino romano cheese, basil, garlic powder ; preparation:In a skillet saute butter and finely chopped garlic and scallions until tender. Remove from heat. Ignite and let vodka cook down,. In a sauce pot add tomato sauce, half and half, pecarino romano, basil, and garlic powder. Then add vodka and chopped scallion and garlic butter mixture into the sauce. Cook over medium heat, stirring. Pour over cooked rigatoni. Garnish with fresh parsley. I recommend pouring the sauce over each individual dish it goes further. ; name: pasta with pancetta and gorgonzola sauce ; ingredients: pasta, pancetta, onion, heavy cream, sherry wine, gorgonzola, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta is cooking, heat a cast iron skillet to medium high. Add pancetta and saute until fat begins to render. Add onion and saute until the onion is translucent and the pancetta begins to brown, about 5 minutes. Add the heavy cream and the sherry. Bring to a boil and then remove from heat. Add the gorgonzola and stir until smooth. Place the pan back on the heat just until the cheese is fully melted and stir in the nutmeg. Drain the pasta and put back into the pasta pot or a pasta bowl. Pour sauce over pasta and mix. Serve in shallow bowls and pass parmesan cheese for diners to grate over the hot pasta. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: tomato mozzarella and pesto pasta salad ; ingredients: dry pasta, fresh mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, pesto sauce, olive oil, parmesan cheese, pine nuts ; preparation:Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Meanwhile, cut the mozzarella into small cubes and quarter the cherry tomatoes. When the pasta is cooked, drain it and rinse it in cold water until the pasta is cold. Drain it again. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil and parmesan in with the pasta. In a large serving bowl, mix the pasta with the mozzarella and tomatoes. Sprinkle the pine nuts over the top and serve. ; name: pasta with cherry tomatoes and goat cheese ; ingredients: gemelli pasta, cherry tomatoes, goat cheese, brine-cured black olives, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Cook pasta in 6-quart pot of boiling water until tender. While pasta is cooking, toss tomatoes with salt and let juices exude. Toss hot pasta with goat cheese in large bowl until cheese is melted and coats pasta. Add tomatoes with juices, olives, basil, salt and pepper to taste. Toss and combine. ; name: pasta with lemon pepper and parmigiano ; ingredients: egg noodles, olive oil, chicken stock, lemon, juice of, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, black pepper, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a big casserole, cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Put pasta in a bowl. Add olive oil, chicken stock, lemon juice, parmigiano and pepper. Add salt if needed. Mix well. Serve immediately and sprinkle with parsley. Delicious with veal. ; name: buca di beppo rigatoni positano copycat ; ingredients: fresh basil, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, romano cheese, chicken breast, garlic, olive oil, eggplant, rigatoni pasta ; preparation:

name: sugared walnuts ; ingredients: walnut halves, sugar, water, cinnamon, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Spread the walnuts out on a large cookie sheet. Bake at 275 for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove from oven and set aside. Combine the sugar, water, cinnamon and salt in a 3 quart saucepan and cook to 236, soft-ball stage, without stirring. You get much better results. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and the nuts. Stir gently until the nuts are well coated and mixture has begun to cool down. Turn out onto a greased cookie sheet, separating any pieces that have clumped together. Cool completely. ; name: date nut meringues ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, sugar, vanilla, dates, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200f. In a large bowl of an electric mixer, beat egg whites until foamy. With the mixer on high speed, beat in salt. Then gradually add sugar, about a tableshppon at a time, beating well after each addition, until whites fold stiff, glossy peaks. Add vanilla and beat for 1 minute. Fold in dates and walnuts. Drop meringue mixture by rounded teaspoonfulls onto well-greased cooking sheets, spacing cookies about 1 inch apart. Bake in a 200f oven for 1 hour or until outside is dry and set. Cookies should not turn brown. Let cool on baking sheets for about 5 minutes, then transfer to racks and let cool completely. Store airtight. ; name: peanut puffs ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, peanuts, vanilla extract, flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 325. Grease a baking sheet with cooking oil spray or a small amount of margarine. Cream margarine and sugar in medium mixing bowl. Add peanuts, vanilla & flour, mix well. Using your fingers roll dough into small balls about 1 inch across. Place the balls on the greased baking sheet. Bake for 35 minuites. Remove from the oven. While still warm roll puffs in the powdered sugar. Roll in the sugar again when puffs are cool. ; name: butter walnut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: walnut milk chocolate cream fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halves ; preparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half. ; name: date and nut bars ; ingredients: egg, sugar, nuts, dates, milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Beat egg. Add sugar and remaining ingredients. Stir well. Bake at 350 in a greased 7x11 shallow pan for 30-40 minutes. When cool, cut into bars. Sprinkled with powdered sugar if desired. ; name: chocolate hazelnut truffles ; ingredients: milk chocolate, chocolate hazelnut spread, thickened cream, slivered almonds ; preparation:Place the cream and chocolate in a medium heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Heat, uncovered, stirring every minute, for 2 minutes or until smooth. Stir in the spread until well combined. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the fridge for 1 hour or until firm enough to roll into balls. Place the slivered almonds in a shallow bowl and line a tray with non-stick baking paper. Scoop out a teaspoonful of the chocolate mixture and use your hands to roll it into a ball. Roll the truffle ball in the almonds until it is completely covered and then place it on the lined tray. Repeat with remaining chocolate mixture. Refrigerate for 45 minutes or until firm and set. ; name: powdered nut balls ; ingredients: margarine, powdered sugar, vanilla, flour, walnuts ; preparation:

name: sausage hamburger dip ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, lean ground beef, hot salsa, cream of mushroom soup, tomatoes and green chilies, garlic powder, oregano, processed cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown, cook sausage and ground beef for 15 minutes and drain. Place in a 4-5 quart slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. Add salsa, mushroom soup, tomatoes, green chilies, garlic powder, and oregeno and stir well. Fold into cheese. Cover and cook on low for 1 hour or until cheese melts. Stir once during cooking. Serve from cooker. ; name: sausage vegetable packets ; ingredients: smoked sausage, zucchini, tomatoes, green bell pepper, butter, onion soup mix, brown sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add all the ingredients to a big mixing bowl. Stir to mix well. Spoon mixture evenly onto 2 pieces of double layered heavy duty foil that measure 12x12 inches. Fold foil around mixture to form a packet. Seal tightly and allow room for circulation of heat. Place packets on the grill over medium heat. Cover and grill for 25-30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. ; name: barbecued polish sausage or kielbasa ; ingredients: polish sausage, catsup, brown sugar, onion, liquid smoke, garlic powder ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, put catsup, brown sugar, onion, liquid smoke and garlic powder. Cook for 5 minutes. Put sausage in a casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray. Pour sauce over meat. Bake at 350f for 30-40 minutes, or until sausage is completely heated through and barbecue sauce thickens up. ; name: crock pot pork chops in homemade bbq sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ketchup, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, liquid smoke ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl except for pork chops. Stir until well mixed. Place pork chops in bottom of crock pot. Pour liquid mix over pork chops. Cook in crock pot on low for 4-6 hours or until meat is cooked and tender. ; name: tasty sausage patties ; ingredients: sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme, sage, flour, parsley ; preparation:Pre-heat grill. Finely dice the spring onions. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, ground beef, pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes. ; name: tasty bbq ribs ; ingredients: beef, barbecue sauce, spaghetti sauce, brown sugar ; preparation:Line a deep roasting pan with foil. Place ribs in the bottom of pan. Pour bbq sauce and spaghetti sauce over top. Sprinkle brown sugar on top of sauces. Do not mix, just leave it layered. Bake uncovered at 250 degrees fahrenheit for 6 hours, or at 225 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 hours. ; name: chopped barbecue beef sandwich ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, white onion, dill pickle, jalapeno, whole wheat hamburger buns ; preparation:On cutting board, cut beef into small pieces. Place in saucepan and mix in barbegue sauce until evenly coated and moist. Heat over low-medium until warmed. Spoon onto bun and top with onion & pickle slices. Top with additional barbeque sauce as desired. ; name: bbq beef smoked sausage ; ingredients: smoked sausage, barbecue sauce, water, hawaiian rolls ; preparation:

name: cajun grilled corn on the cob ; ingredients: dried oregano, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, dried thyme, black pepper, ground red pepper, corn, butter ; preparation:Prepare grill. Combine first 8 ingredients in a small bowl. Set aside. Pull husks back from corn, and scrub silks. Brush butter over corn. Sprinkle with spice mixture. Place corn on grill rack. Grill 12 minutes or until done, turning occasionally. ; name: grilled corn on the cob with roasted jalapeno butter ; ingredients: jalapeno pepper, unsalted butter, lime rind, honey, salt, corn ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium high heat, and place jalapeno on grill rack coated with cooking spray, cover and grill 10 minutes, or until blackened, turning occasionally. Place jalapeno in a small paper bag, and fold tightly to seal. Let stand 5 minutes. Peel and discard skins, and cut jalapeno in half lengthwise, and discard stem, seeds, and membranes. Finely chop jalapeno. Combine jalapeno, butter, lime rind, honey, and salt in a small bowl, and stir well. Place corn on grill rack, cover and grill for 10 minutes, or until lightly charred, turning occasionally. Place corn on serving plate and brush with jalaoeno butter. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: herb grilled corn ww ; ingredients: corn, butter, salt, fresh cilantro stems, dried rosemary, dried thyme ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium high. Tear off 4 sheets of tin foil. Brush corn evenly with melted butter and sprinkle with salt, cilantro sprigs and with the rosemary and thyme. Wrap corn with the tin foil. Place wrapped corn on the grill and grill covered until corn in tender. ; name: grilled pork cutlets with maple chipotle glaze ; ingredients: maple syrup, chicken stock, dried chipotle powder, fresh thyme, cornstarch, water, pork cutlets, salt, pepper, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat your grill. In a small saucepan, bring the first four glaze ingredients to a boil. In a small jar, mix together the cornstarch and water. Put the lid on and shake vigorously. Pour the cornstarch slurry into the boiling glaze mixture and reduce to a simmer. Cook about 2 minutes until it becomes clear and thickens. Season the cutlets with salt and pepper and brush with a little oil. Grill cutlets 3 to 5 minutes per side, brushing glaze on while cooking. ; name: corn on the cob packet ; ingredients: corn, butter, ice cubes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with ice cubes. Center corn inside 1 reynolds hot bag, large size. Double fold ends to form packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Grill 15-20 minutes, covered, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Cut open top of foil bag, carefully, using a sharp knife. Allow steam to escape, fold back foil. ; name: barbecued spiced lime corn on the cob ; ingredients: corn cobs, limes, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Pull the husks back from the corn, then remove and discard the silks. Rub each cob with a wedge of lime the fold back the husks to cover the kernels. Cook over medium hot coals for about 10 mins turning frequently until the corn is dark golden and the kernels tender. Mix together the salt and the cayenne pepper. Pull the husks away from the corn and sprinkle over the salt mixture. Serve with a wedge of lime for extra rubbing. ; name: grilled corn on the cob w chipotle molasses and orange glaze ; ingredients: unsalted butter, frozen orange juice concentrate, canned chipotle chiles, molasses, salt, fresh cilantro, corn ; preparation:

name: easy whole wheat pie crust ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, light brown sugar, shortening, cold water, sea salt ; preparation:Place flour, sugar, salt, sugar, and shortening in large tupperware or other plastic container with lid. Seal tightly. Shake 3 minutes. Open & make sure mixture is uniform. Add water. Shake 3 more minutes & open to see if mixture is large dough ball of uniform consistency. Roll out on floured surface. Can be frozen for later use. ; name: shake a pie crust ; ingredients: flour, sugar, crisco shortening, cold water, salt ; preparation:Put flour, sugar, salt and crisco shortening in a plastic bowl with a lid. Seal and wink. Shake until it sounds like sand. Add water. Seal and wink. Shake until it sounds like a rock. Roll out for your favorite pie or pastries. ; name: hot water pie crust ; ingredients: vegetable shortening, soy margarine, boiling water, baking powder, salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:In a large bowl, add the first three ingredients and mix until creamy. This might take a couple of minutes. Be patient. Add the remaining ingredients and mix until dough forms. Knead dough for two minutes. Wrap dough in wax paper and chill in the fridge for a minimum of three hours and a maximum of 24 hours. Makes two crusts or one crust with a lattice design on top. ; name: chocolate chip pie no crust ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsels, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pieplate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: weight watchers pumpkin pie makes own crust ; ingredients: pumpkin, unsweetened applesauce, powdered milk, pumpkin pie spice, splenda sugar substitute, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie-pan with non-stick cooking spray. Blend all the above ingredients in a bowl. Pour into greased pie pan and spread out evenly. Bake for 1 hour. One-quarter of a pie counts as 3 points. One-eighth of a pie counts as 1. 5 points. Can of crushed pineapple in its own juice. ; name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: vinegar pie ; ingredients: sugar, egg yolks, vinegar, flour, water, butter, lemon extract, pie shells ; preparation:In medium saucepan mix together sugar, beaten egg yolks, vinegar, flour and water. Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thick. Remove from heat. Add lemon extract and butter. Continue to stir until butter has completely melted. Pour into baked pie crust. Top with meringue, made with left over egg whites, and bake in 350f pre-heated oven until golden brown. Let cool and serve. ; name: alice s pie crust ; ingredients: flour, lard, sugar, salt, egg, vinegar ; preparation:

name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: chocolate banana bread puddings ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, bananas, milk, eggs, pure vanilla extract, white bread, milk chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes. ; name: yummy pineapple cake ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: pineapple cheese bread ; ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, crushed pineapple in juice, eggs, vegetable oil, sharp cheddar cheese, pecans, pineapple extract ; preparation:Using a large mixing bowl, sift the flour and sugar and mix together. In a separate bowl, mix the pineapple, eggs, oil, and add to the flour mixture, mix well. Fold in the cheese, nuts, and pineapple extract. Pour mixture into a greased 9 by 3-inch loaf pan. Bake for 1 hour. At 350 degrees. ; name: carrot pineapple bread ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, canola oil, carrot, pineapple, vanilla extract, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Beat eggs, sugar and oil. Add carrots, pineapple and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Stir into carrot mixture. Pour into two greased loaf pans. Bake at 325 degrees for 60-70 minutes cool in pans remove to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: pineapple stuff bread pudding ; ingredients: unsweetened crushed canned pineapple, eggs, sugar, butter, white bread ; preparation:

name: mussels in white wine and garlic ; ingredients: mussels, dry white wine, shallots, garlic cloves, salt, mixed fresh herbs, butter ; preparation:Rinse and scrub mussels under cold water. Using your fingers or paring knife, remove beards, and discard. In a large stockpot set over medium heat, combine wine, shallots, garlic, and salt. Simmer 5 minutes. Add mussels, cover, and increase heat to high. Cook until all mussels are open, about 5 minutes. Stir in herbs and butter. Remove from heat. Divide mussels and broth among four bowls. Serve immediately. ; name: filipino shrimps sauteed ; ingredients: shrimp, onions, garlic cloves, soy sauce, mountain dew soda, sugar, cornstarch, water, tomatoes, oil ; preparation:Put oil in skillet. Add crushed cloves garlic and finely diced onion. Peel and devein shrimp leaving tails on. Add to pan fry. Add tomato diced fine. Add sugar. Add mountain dew or sprite. Cook 5 minutes. Add cornstarch and water. Cook until thick. ; name: appetizing shrimp scampi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, lemon juice, fresh shrimp ; preparation:Heat butter over low heat. Add olive oil, and next 5 ingredients. Cook about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add shrimp and let stand for 30 minutes. Serve on large platter with toothpicks. ; name: greek shrimp scampi ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, red wine, tomatoes, feta cheese, parsley, kalamata olive, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: scampi shrimp skewers ; ingredients: shrimp, margarine, olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, ground black pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper ; preparation:If your shrimp is frozen, thaw before using. Peel shrimp leaving tails intact and devein. In a small saucepan using medium-high heat, melt margarine or butter and oil. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in wine, parsley, lemon peel, and ground pepper. Set aside. Using 6-inch long appetizer skewers thread shrimp, green onion, and pepper pieces and brush with garlic mixture. Grill the shrimp and vegetable skewers on a grill rack directly over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Turn once and brush with garlic mixture halfway through grilling. Serve immediately. ; name: seafood saute ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, oil, scallions, garlic, celery, lemon pepper seasoning mix, shrimp, stuffed green olives, fresh parsley, dill weed ; preparation:Prepare tomatoes, set aside. In large skillet, over medium heat saut scallions, garlic, and celery for 3 minutes. Add pepper, crab, olives, parsley, and dill. When well combined, add tomatoes and cook until all ingredients are hot. Serve over pasta, rice, or new potatoes. ; name: shrimp or crawfish monica ; ingredients: butter, shrimp, salt, red peppers, shallots, whipping cream, white pepper, paprika, cooked pasta, garlic ; preparation:Saute shallots and seasonings with butter. Add shrimp or crawfish and cook until pink. Add cooked pasta and whipping cream. Cook to desired thickness. Serve immediately, great with bread. ; name: shrimp scallop mussels pouches ; ingredients: large shrimp, sea scallops, mussels, shallots, tomatoes, basil, mushrooms, fresh ground pepper, white wine, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: pesto tilapia ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, salt & pepper, pesto sauce, diced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on a cookie sheet. Place fish on the foil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with pesto, tomatoes and then cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until fish flakes with fork. To prevent wasting the rest of the pesto in the jar, i make one recipe for dinner and freeze the ingredients to have another day. Just place each of the ingredients in its own quart-size freezer bag, then place all in a gallon-size freezer bag along with directions and freeze. When ready to make, just thaw completely and follow the above directions to prepare. ; name: pesto chicken with sun dried tomatoes and squash ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, olive oil, zucchini, basil pesto, parmesan cheese, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil ; preparation:In a large nonstick pan cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 4 to 5 minutes. Turn chicken and add zucchini. Cook for 4 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink and squash is tender. Spread pesto over chicken and sprinkle with cheese and sun dried tomatoes. Let that just warm and serve onto plates. ; name: tasty bbq tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, dried basil, ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut tomatoes in half. Drizzle with a little olive oil. Sprinkle with basil. Grind pepper over the top. I normally then pop in the fridge a while while working on other stuff as it helps the flavour develop. Cook uncut side down for around 5 minutes over low heat on bbq plate. Flip over and cook further 5 minutes with cut side down. Return to original position for the last 5 minutes of cooking. ; name: stuffed and barbecued tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, herbs, fresh parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Have grill preheated to medium. Cut tomatoes in half crosswise. Remove and discard seeds. In a bowl combine the herbs, cheese, garlic, oil, and pepper medley. Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Grill the tomatoes until tender and the cheese is starting to melt, 8- 10 minutes. Remove from bbq using a flat spatula. Enjoy. ; name: sicilian tomato pesto ; ingredients: pine nuts, fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, red pepper flakes, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat a small skillet over medium-high heat and add the pine nuts. Cook, stirring constantly, until golden, 3 to 4 minutes. Immediately remove from the pan. Place the basil leaves, garlic, pine nuts and olive oil in a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Stop and scrape down the sides. Add the grated cheese and crushed red-pepper flakes and pulse a few times to make a thick paste. Transfer to a bowl and fold in the tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: pasta with bacon and tomato pesto ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, pepper bacon, pesto sauce, romano cheese, black pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain tomatoes, reserve some of the oil. Cut tomatoes into strips. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium high heat until crisp. Drain and crumble. Drain pasta and place in a large bowl. Add tomatoes and pesto. Toss. Add bacon and cheese. Toss. If necessary add the reserved oil. Season with pepper. ; name: tomatoes and peppers for lunch ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, balsamic vinaigrette, tomatoes, red pepper, fat free mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Toast your bread. Douse with a balsamic vinaigrette add thinly sliced tomatoes. Add a layer of roasted peppers, any color. Add mozzarella. Sprinkle with herbs and salt and pepper. If you want melted cheese, place in broiler for a few minutes, do not nuke it, this will make it soggy. ; name: nif s grilled tomatoes with pesto and cheese ; ingredients: roma tomatoes, pesto sauce, green onion, mozzarella cheese, parsley ; preparation:

name: mexican fun chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, avocado, cheddar cheese, salsa, taco seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top breasts with more salsa, sliced avocado and cheese. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick. ; name: chicken quesadillas low fat ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, chicken broth, bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, salsa, taco seasoning, fat-free refried beans, light cheese, whole wheat tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute chicken in broth for 2 minutes. Add peppers, onions, garlic, salsa and taco seasoning. Cook until veggies are soft. Place tortillas on a baking sheet and spread refried beans onto half of each trotilla., top with chicken and veggie mixture and shredded cheese. Fold each tortilla over and bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. Serve with fat free sour cream and salsa. ; name: quesadilla ; ingredients: vegetable oil, flour tortillas, cooked chicken, cheddar cheese, fresh mushrooms, monterey jack cheese, salsa, sour cream ; preparation:Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired. ; name: quesadillas with chilies and olives ; ingredients: chili peppers, mozzarella cheese, feta cheese, green olives, coriander leaves, tortillas, olive oil, paprika ; preparation:Put cleaned and chopped chilies, mozzarella, feta cheese, olives and coriander into a food processor until you get a creamy texture. Put 4 tortillas onto a baking tray and divide the cheese spread evenly onto them. Put the other 4 tortillas onto them. Blend paprika powder and olive oil and sprinkle over the tortillas. Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 220c for about 5 minutes. Cut into 8 slices each. ; name: barbecue chicken quesadillas ; ingredients: red onion, bell pepper, butter, cooked chicken, barbecue sauce, monterey jack cheese, cilantro, flour tortillas ; preparation:Saute onions and bell peppers in pan with butter. Remove from pan and set aside. In another pan heat through shredded chicken with bbq sauce. Lightly butter one side of a tortilla. Place butter side down in saute pan. Quickly add some of the cheese, chicken and onions to one half of tortilla. Then quickly fold in half forming a semi-circle. Continue to cook until bottom side is golden brown, then carefully flip quesadilla over. Brown other side and remove from pan. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Cut quesadilla into wedges and serve with additional barbecue sauce. ; name: egg and bacon quesadilla ; ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 7-inch flour tortillas, monterey jack pepper cheese, mexican-style corn, bacon, hardboiled egg, scallion, salsa ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Coat a cookie sheet with nonstick spray. Place 4 tortillas on cookie sheet. Sprinkle with half the cheese, then all the corn and bacon. Cover with eggs. Top with scallions, the remaining cheese and tortillas. Lightly coat tortillas with nonstick spray. Bake 6 minutes. Then turn over and bake 6 minutes more until lightly browned and crisp. Cut in wedges. Serve with salsa. ; name: kickn quesadillas ; ingredients: cheese, vegetables, hot sauce, chicken, garlic, jalapeno, tortillas ; preparation:Take your tortillas and drop in all of your ingredients on top of it. Cheese will normally go first. If you would like to add your hot sauce, drop a tsp. Of it on top of every thing. Put into a hot pan and let cook until cheese starts to melt. Next add your second tortilla on top and flip. Let cook for about 3-8 minutes until serving. ; name: speedy salsa chicken quesadillas ; ingredients: salsa, miracle whip, chili powder, flour tortillas, boneless skinless chicken breast half, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:

name: cran apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch double-crust pie shells, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, tart apples, butter, sugar, cinnamon, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: fresh cranberry muffins ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, almond extract, flour, fresh cranberries, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potato packet ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, granny smith apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender. ; name: creamy fresh cranberry and fruit salad ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, green grape, apples, miniature marshmallow, macadamia nuts, heavy cream ; preparation:Mince the cranberries in a food processor. Do this in two batches. Stir together the cranberries and sugar. Let sit and chill for about 8 hours. After about 8 hours, drain the cranberries well and stir in the well-drained crushed pineapple. Add the grapes and apples and stir. Then fold in the marshmallows and nuts. Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. A few hours before serving, whip the cream until it is becoming stiff. Fold into the fruit mixture. Chill until serving. ; name: mango pear and ginger crumble ; ingredients: pears, dark brown sugar, mangoes, gingerroot, all-purpose flour, butter, pecan nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 180 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add pears, sugar, and 4 tbsp water. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until pears are just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the mangoes and stem ginger. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve with cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, orange marmalade ; preparation:Cut fresh potatoes into bite size pieces. In a large saucepan cook potatoes, covered in enough boiling water to cover, about 15 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Spread pie filling in an 8x8 inch baking dish. Arrange cooked fresh or canned sweet potatoes on top. In a small mixing bowl, stir together cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, and orange marmalade. Spoon over sweet potatoes. Bake uncovered in a 350f oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. ; name: apple cranberry crumble ; ingredients: apples, cranberries, sugar, oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, butter, pecans ; preparation:

name: sicilian tomato pesto ; ingredients: pine nuts, fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, red pepper flakes, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat a small skillet over medium-high heat and add the pine nuts. Cook, stirring constantly, until golden, 3 to 4 minutes. Immediately remove from the pan. Place the basil leaves, garlic, pine nuts and olive oil in a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Stop and scrape down the sides. Add the grated cheese and crushed red-pepper flakes and pulse a few times to make a thick paste. Transfer to a bowl and fold in the tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: broccoli pesto ; ingredients: broccoli florets, fresh basil leaf, garlic, pine nuts, coarse salt, ground black pepper, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli in container of blender. Add basil, garlic, pine nuts, salt, pepper, and oil. Process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in cheese. To serve, toss into warm buttered pasta. Can be refrigerated in a tightly covered jar for a week. May be frozen, but then it is best not to stir in cheese until after defrosting. ; name: pesto marsala style ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic clove, basil, pecorino cheese, almonds, olive oil, oregano, salt and pepper, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Chop garlic, basil and the pecorino or provola cheese. Place in a bowl, add the diced tomato and mix in the olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper and the crushed red pepper. It can be refrigerated overnight but it is preferable to use it the same day that it is made. To make this sauce for 1 lb. Of pasta, use 2 cups of tomato and double the amount of the other ingredients. Drizzle some olive oil on top of each dish of pasta and sprinkle with some toasted breadcrumbs for a true sicilian touch. ; name: sun dried tomato and rocket pesto pasta ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, garlic cloves, pine nuts, rocket, basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, cooked pasta ; preparation:Place the tomatoes, garlic, half of the pinenuts, rocket and basil in a food processor and process until smooth. Toast the remaining pinenuts until golden. Set aside. Slowly add the oil to the basil mixture while the processor is running. Turn the processor off and then stir through the parmesan. Stir pesto through the pasta then sprinkle with the reserved pinenuts. Serve immediately with salad and crusty bread. ; name: sauteed cherry tomatoes with mediterranean herbs ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, salt ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings. ; name: tomato pesto tart ; ingredients: puff pastry sheet, pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, whole canned tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f and lightly grease baking sheet. Unfold puff pastry on lightly floured surface, roll out into 12-inch square. Crimp edges. Spread pesto evenly over top, sprinkle with cheese. Top with thin tomato slices, top with rest of cheese. Bake 17 to 20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: low fat pesto sauce ; ingredients: chicken broth, garlic cloves, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, pine nuts ; preparation:Combine stock and garlic and heat in the microwave on high for 5 minutes. Allow to cool. Chop basil in food processor. Add cooled stock, parmesan cheese and pine nuts. Whirl until everything is finely chopped and blended. Meanwhile, cook pasta of your choice. Toss sauce with pasta. Serve with additional parmesan cheese if desired. Use as a topping for fish, chicken or potatoes also. Makes 4 servings. ; name: haloumi and pesto tomato stacks ; ingredients: tomatoes, halloumi cheese, pesto sauce, lemon juice, olive oil ; preparation:

name: cowboy food gooseberry patch ; ingredients: ground beef, spanish rice, chili beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat and drain. Add cooked rice and beans and return to heat until bubbly. Stir in cheese and allow to melt. You can also combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Serve with garlic bread and a salad. ; name: farmer s breakfast casserole ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack cheese, cooked ham, green onion, eggs, evaporated milk, pepper, salt ; preparation:Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: healthy breakfast burrito ; ingredients: low-carb flour tortillas, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, egg whites, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, bacon bits, onion, garlic powder, pepper, salt, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Scramble the egg whites with a little pam. Remove. Dice onion and saute with with a little pam till golden brown. Add the hash browns, cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring once. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder and worcestershire if using. Add the scrambled egg white, cheese and bacon. Divide filling evenly between the tortillas. Roll up and place seam size down in an empty pan and heat on medium till a little brown. Flip over and brown the other side of the tortilla. ; name: country style breakfast sausage ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, turkey breast, sage, sugar, dry mustard, onion powder, pepper, vegetable oil cooking spray ; preparation:Mix meat and seasonings together. Shape into 12 patties. Spray skillet with non-stick spray. Brown patties on each side. Add a few tablespoons water to pan, cover to reserve moisture, and cook till done. ; name: hobo breakfast special ; ingredients: bulk sausage, yellow onion, fresh mushrooms, vegetable oil, hash browns, eggs, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown the sausage. If desired, drain fat. Add onions and mushrooms and cook until tender, set aside in a separate bowl. In the same skillet, add the oil and hash browns over medium-high heat and cook until golden brown on 1 side. Once golden brown add eggs, add the sausage and mushroom mixture. Scramble together until desired consistency and top with cheese. Cover with a lid until cheese melts and serve. ; name: bed and breakfast sausage egg casserole ; ingredients: sausage, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, bread, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage and drain. Beat the eggs with milk, salt, and mustard. Layer bread cubes in the bottom of a buttered 9 by 13-inch casserole dish. Crumble the sausage over the bread and top with cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all. Refrigerate overnight. Bake in 350 degree oven for 30-40 minutes. When using a glass casserole, bake in 325 degree oven for 45-60 minutes. This is really good with a little bit of maple syrup on top. ; name: hashbrown breakfast skillet ; ingredients: potatoes, breakfast sausage, eggs, diced onion, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet add the sausage and cook until most of it is brown. Drain and return to pan. Add the grated potatoes, onion, and salt to the skillet. Cook on medium heat until the hashbrowns are golden brown. Push the mixture to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs in the empty space. Once cooked, stir them into the hashbrowns. Add the hot sauce, tomatoes, and cheese. Stir well and serve immediately. ; name: cowboy breakfast ; ingredients: bulk sausage, frozen hash brown potatoes, eggs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: beef and mushrooms ; ingredients: beef, cream of mushroom soup, bacon, mushrooms, butter, salt and pepper, toothpick ; preparation:Make up the soup using only half of the fluid needed according to the can or packet. Set aside. Wrap each piece of beef in a slice of bacon and secure with toothpicks. Fry the wrapped meat gently in a little butter to seal the meat. Turn to ensure both sides are browned. Pour prepared soup over the meat, add sliced mushrooms. Stir well. Season to taste. Simmer meat in the pan until tender. When tender, serve meat with creamy mashed potatoes and your favourite vegetables. Pour any remaining fluid over the meat as a gravy. ; name: crock pot stuffed steak ; ingredients: round steaks, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, prepared stuffing, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water ; preparation:Pound the salt, garlic powder and black pepper into the steak. Lay the stuffing on top of the steak and roll up jelly-roll style. Place toothpicks in steak to hold in place. Place the steak in the crock pot. Mix the cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix and water in bowl until smooth. Pour over the steak in the crock pot. Cook on low for about 6 hours. Thicken the broth for gravy if you like. Serve with mashed potatoes, if desired. Slice the steak into serving pieces. ; name: smothered cube steaks low carb ; ingredients: cube steaks, pork rind, heavy cream, water, butter, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Dredge cube steaks in a combination of pork rind flour, garlic powder & salt. Fry in butter. When done, remove steaks from heat, and scrape all browned bits from pan. Add water, and cream, and stir as it comes to a boil. Cook till thickened. Season to taste with salt, pepper& garlic powder place steaks back in cream sauce. Pepper and salt to taste. Serve with sauted mushrooms& onions. ; name: bacon and mushroom chowder ; ingredients: bacon, chicken broth, mushrooms, potatoes, onions, cream of mushroom soup, milk ; preparation:In a soup pot, fry bacon- set aside. With bacon drippings, fry onions until clear, add mushrooms. Stir for about 5 minute add chicken stock and potatoes. Cook until potatoes are tender. Return bacon to pot. Just before serving add milk, salt and pepper, to taste, and mushroom soup. Stir well and serve. ; name: yummy round steak with rich gravy ; ingredients: round steaks, onion soup mix, water, condensed cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Cut steak into 5 or 6 serving pieces. Place in a slow cooker. Add dry onion soup mix, water and condensed mushroom soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or on high about 4-5 hours. If making the pork chops, brown in oil and then put some of the sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 pan, then layer pork chops and add more sauce. Then bake for an hour and a half at 350. ; name: creamy swiss steak ; ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, boneless beef round steak, butter, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a shallow bowl combine the flour, salt, and pepper. Dredge beef. In a large skillet, brown beef in butter on both sides. Transfer to a 3 quart slow cooker. Top with onion. Combine soup and water, pour over onion. Cover and cook on low 8-9 hours or until meet is tender. Serve with noodles. ; name: hot roast beef sandwiches ; ingredients: chuck roast, dry onion soup mix, beef bouillon cube, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Cook beef until tender. Pull apart into shreds, saving beef juice. Use no salt as this contains boullion. Mix all ingredients into beef mixture and reheat. Perfect in a crockput. Serve on fresh rolls. ; name: foil packet cube steak dinner ; ingredients: cube steaks, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, dry onion soup mix, red potatoes, celery, baby carrots, water ; preparation:

name: pudding fruit salad ; ingredients: prepared vanilla pudding, frozen whipped topping, seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, mandarin orange segments, pineapple chunks in juice, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In a medium bowl, mix pudding and whipped topping. Gently stir in grapes, marshmallows, oranges, and pineapple. Add strawberries. Toss gently to coat. Serve immediately or store in refrigerator up to 8 hours. ; name: gigi s strawberry rhubarb salad ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, orange juice, orange rind, strawberries ; preparation:Combine rhubarb, water and sugar in pan and cook until rhubarb is tender. Place jello in glass bowl. Add hot rhubarb mixture and stir until jello has dissolved. Add orange juice and orange peel. Chill until syrupy, then fold in strawberries. Pour into an oiled 1 qt mold. Chill until set. Unmold and garnish with fresh strawberries. ; name: hawaiian sweet potato salad ; ingredients: bacon, sweet potatoes, pineapple chunks, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh lime juice, pepper, macadamia nuts, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Fry bacon in skillet until crisp. Drain. Crumble bacon. Mix the bacon with sweet potatoes and pineapple in a large bowl. Combine mayonnaise, dijon mustard, lime juice and pepper in a small bowl. Mix well. Add to sweet potato mixture. Mix gently. Stir in nuts. Spoon into lettuce lined serving bowl and serve. ; name: sunflower strawberry salad ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, apple, green seedless grape, celery, raisins, strawberry yogurt, sunflower seeds, lettuce ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, apple, grapes, celery, and raisins. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the sunflower seeds and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired. ; name: funky fruit salad ; ingredients: plain yogurt, vanilla bean, sugar, cantaloupe, fresh strawberries, dates, bittersweet chocolate ; preparation:Drain yogurt in cheesecloth lined colander for 2 hours. When drained, combine in a medium bowl with vanilla seeds & sugar. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to blend. Combine fruit in a large bowl. To serve, spoon yogurt over individual servings of fruit & grate chocolate over the top. ; name: autumn fruit salad ; ingredients: granny smith apples, red seedless grapes, mandarin orange segments, miniature marshmallows, low-fat vanilla yogurt, nuts, lime, zest of ; preparation:Core and wedge apples. Combine apples, grapes, and mandarin oranges in medium bowl. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: red hot jello salad ; ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, cherry jell-o, applesauce ; preparation:In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil. Stir red-hots in simmering water until dissolved. Remove from heat. Add jello mix and stir until dissolved. Stir in cold applesauce. Pour mixture into a serving dish and chill until set. ; name: rosewater salad indian dessert ; ingredients: cantaloupe, strawberries, rose water, icing sugar ; preparation:

name: double corn and cheddar chowder ; ingredients: margarine, onion, flour, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, creamed corn, frozen corn, red bell pepper, hot pepper sauce, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Melt margarine in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion. Cook and stir for 5 minutes. Add chicken broth. Bring to boil, stirring frequently. Add cream corn, corn kernels, bell pepper, and pepper sauce. Bring to simmer. Cover and simmer for 15 min. Remove from heat. Gradually stir in cheese until melted. ; name: cheeseburger chowder ; ingredients: ground beef, celery, green pepper, onion, potatoes, beef bouillon cubes, water, flour, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef in large pot. Drain off grease. Add potatos, onions, peppers, celery, salt and bouillon cubes. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Whisk flour into milk and slowly pour into pot with meat and vegetables. Stir until soup is thickened slightly. Mix in cheese and stir until melted. ; name: easy chicken corn chowder ; ingredients: bacon, onion, boneless skinless chicken, potatoes, chicken stock, milk, kernel corn, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown bacon bits in a large stock pot and drain leaving about 1 tbs. Of fat and the bacon in the pot. Turn the heat to medium and sautee onion until soft. Add in chicken pieces and cook until opaque. Add in potato chunks. Add in stock and milk, if you need more milk to cover the ingredients just add a bit more. Cook until the potatoes start to fall apart and thicken the soup. Add in corn and cook until hot. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Enjoy. ; name: broccoli potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, broccoli floret, low-fat sour cream, green onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the scrubbed potatoes and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the broccoli for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: cheddar cheese potato broccoli soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, potatoes, boiling water, chicken bouillon cubes, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed. ; name: pepper jack potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, diced pimentos, salt, fresh breadcrumb, margarine, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: chicken broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Cut up chicken into small pieces and cook throughly. You may want to spice up the chicken with the spices of your choice in a bowl, mix the cream of celery, cream of mushroom and mayo together. Empty the bag of broccoli into a rectangular casserole dish. Spread the cooked chicken evenly over the broccoli. Spread the cream of celery, mushroom and mayo mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the entire casserole. Cook at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Sprinkle the french onion toppings over the cheese and cook for another 5 mins. ; name: irish broccoli potato and cheddar chowder ; ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, chicken stock, celery, onion, mashed potatoes, fat-free half-and-half, thyme, cheddar cheese, pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: hamburger grand style ; ingredients: biscuits, ground beef, onion, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, salt, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Brown hamburger and onions. Combine softened cream cheese, soup, and milk. Combine browned hamburger and onions to mixture, add ketchup and salt. Mix well together and pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Place biscuits on top and bake until biscuits are done. ; name: mushroom bacon burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, sliced mushrooms, bacon, green onions, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, salt, pepper, hamburger buns, cheese slice ; preparation:Mix together first 8 ingredients in a bowl. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Grill over medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes or until done, turning once. Just before taking off the grill, place cheese slice on each patty. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, etc. ; name: stove top pork chop bake ; ingredients: pork chops, stove top stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, milk, seasoning salt, pepper ; preparation:Season chops with salt & pepper, brown in lightly oiled skillet. Place in 9x13 pan sprayed with cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 deg. Prepare stove-top according to package, spoon over chops. Mix soup and milk in bowl, pour over top. Cover with foil and bake 1hr, or a little more until pork has reached safe internal temperature. You can bake longer for increased tenderness if desired, chops will be moist. You can also uncover last 20 mins or so of baking for top of casserole to brown. ; name: chicken and corn tortilla bake ; ingredients: cooked chicken, green chilies, chicken broth, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, onion, corn tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In bowl, combine chicken, chilies, broth, soups and onion. Set aside. Layer half of the tortillas on the bottom of a greased 9x13 baking pan, cutting to fit pan if desired. Top with half of the chicken mixture and half of the cheese. Repeat layers. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: pork chops and mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, onions, sliced mushrooms, dry onion soup mix, water, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles. ; name: potato sloppy joe bake ; ingredients: lean ground beef, sloppy joe sandwich sauce, condensed cream of potato soup, frozen hash browns, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef until no longer pink, drain. Add sloppy joe sauce and soup, mix. Place thawed hash browns in a greased 9x13 pan. Top with the beef mixture. Bake at 450 degree for 20 minutes- covered. Remove foil and bake additional 10 minutes or more until heated through. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: beef gravy ; ingredients: beef round steak, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water, cornstarch, cooking oil, mushroom ; preparation:In 6-qt stockpot, in 2 t hot oil, brown meat on all sides. Stir in mushroom soup, onion soup mix, mushrooms and 1 cup water. Cover. Cook 45 minutes or until meat is tender. Stir together cornstarch and cup water until smooth. Gradually stir into gravy mixture. Cook until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly. Excellent served with rice and biscuits. ; name: hamburger mushroom bake ; ingredients: biscuit mix, water, ground beef, onion, cream of mushroom soup, onion soup mix, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:

name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: fruit and mascarpone italian cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, mascarpone cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, kiwi, strawberry ; preparation:Combine mascarpone, powdered sugar, and whipping cream in a medium bowl. Beat until creamy. Spread mixture evenly onto crust. Chill thoroughly in the refridgerator for at least 1 hour. Arrange sliced fruit over pie before serving. ; name: raspberry cream cheese pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, cinnamon, cream cheese, cream, unflavored gelatin, water, fresh raspberries, whipped cream ; preparation:Combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, melted butter, and cinnamon. Press into a 9-inch pie pan, set aside. Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Whip cream and gently fold into cheese mixture. Soak gelatin in water 5 minutes in the top of a double boiler, over hot water. Stir gelatin mixture until completely dissolved. Stir gelatin into cream cheese mixture. Fold in raspberries. Pour into prepared crust. Chill for 2 to 3 hours. Before serving, decorate with whipped cream. ; name: no cook coconut pie ; ingredients: vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, coconut extract, cool whip topping, coconut, 9-inch graham cracker crust ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat pudding mixes, milk, and coconut extract on low speed until combined. Then, beat on high for two minutes. Fold in cool whip and coconut. Pour into pie crust. Sprinkle with toasted coconut. Chill until serving. Keep leftovers refrigerated. ; name: no bake white chocolate cheesecake and not so bad 4 u ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, fat free cream cheese, fat-free cool whip, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Melt chocolate chips in the microwave for a minute, stir, then cook for another minute and stir. Cube cream cheese and add to the white chocolate. Mix with beaters until smooth. Fold in whip cream until completely incorporated. Pour into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. ; name: reduced fat double layered chocolate pie ; ingredients: low fat graham cracker pie crust, skim milk, fat-free chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie mix, reduced-fat cream cheese, sugar, light non-dairy whipped topping, milk chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Pour 2 cups milk into a medium bowl. Add pudding mix. Beat with an electric mixer 1 minute. Spread mixture evenly into crust. Beat cream cheese, sugar and 1 tablespoon milk with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping on low speed. Spread over chocolate mixture. Sprinkle with chocolate, if desired. Cover with dome. Chill at least 3 hours before serving. ; name: chocolate cherry ice cream pie ; ingredients: magic shell ice cream topping, graham cracker crust, maraschino cherries, vanilla ice cream, peanut butter cups ; preparation:Following package directions, drizzle half of the ice cream topping over the crust. Gently spread to coat bottom and sides. Freeze until firm. Meanwhile, set aside six cherries for garnish. Chop remaining cherries. In a large bowl, combine ice cream and chopped cherries. Spread into prepared crust. Sprinkle with peanut butter cups. Drizzle with remaining ice cream topping. Garnish with reserved cherries. Cover and freeze for 2 hours or until firm. Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving. ; name: no bake chocolate mousse pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, baking cocoa, milk, vanilla, frozen whipped topping, 9-inch graham cracker crust ; preparation:

name: cooked potato or pasta salad dressing ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, ground mustard, eggs, water, half-and-half, white vinegar, black pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad. ; name: simple tasty potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, sweet pickle, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, onion ; preparation:Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all. ; name: mexican pasta salad with salsa ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, pepper, garlic clove, salt, green onion, mayonnaise, salsa ; preparation:Cook and drain pasta according to package directions, rinse with cold water.
