In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until it is light and fluffy. Mix in the sugar and flour and continue beating until it is smooth. Add the zests, the yolks, the eggs, one at a time, thoroughly mixing after the addition of each with the mixer. Stir in the heavy cream, and mix only briefly until blended. Pour the mixture into the prepared crust in the 10-inch springform pan, and bake for 15 minutes at 475 degrees f. Then, reduce the oven temperature to 200 degrees f and continue to bake for 60 minutes. Then, turn the oven off and allow the cake to sit inside while it cools down for another 60 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven, allow to cool to room temperature, then chill in the refrigerator over night. ; name: easy cheesecake recipe ; ingredients: cream cheese, vanilla, sugar, eggs, pie crust ; preparation:Put cream cheese, vanilla, and sugar in a large bowl. Mix the ingredients in the bowl. Add eggs and mix until there are no remaining lumps. Pour into the pie crust. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. ; name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: cherry cream cheese dessert ; ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spoon into serving dishes. Cover and chill. Garnish with almonds. Prep time includes refrigeration time. ; name: honeycomb cheesecake ; ingredients: honey snap biscuits, butter, gelatin, water, cream cheese, caster sugar, vanilla essence, cream, chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Melt butter, add biscuit crumbs, mix well. Press mixture into a base of 22cm spring form tin. Refrigerate while making filling. Place water in a small bowl, sprinkle with gelatine, heat on medium in microwave for 30-40 seconds, do not boil. Place cream cheese in a mixing bowl, add sugar and vanilla essence, beat until smooth with electric mixer. Beat cream in a seperate bowl until soft peaks form. Stir gelatin mixture into cream cheese mixture, add cream and crushed honeycomb bars mix well, pour into crust. Refrigerate until set. ; name: felicia s cheesecake ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, eggs, powdered milk, lemon juice, honey, vanilla, almond essence ; preparation:

name: vanilla pudding dessert ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: very easy rich and creamy chocolate pudding ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, powdered sugar, half-and-half, butter ; preparation:In blender, process chocolate chips and powdered sugar until coarsley chopped. In saucepan on med heat, bring half and half and butter to a boil. Add to blender. Cover and process until melted and smooth. Chill. ; name: chocolate pudding deluxe for pies trifles etc ; ingredients: milk, sugar, cocoa, cornstarch, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Put milk in sauce pan. Add the cocoa, sugar, and cornstarch together, mix well add to the milk. Now add eggs. With a whisk, whisk till all is smooth and blended. Over medium heat, heat till a soft boil, add chocolate chips. Continue to stir for about another 2 minute or till nice and thick. Take off the stove and add the vanilla and butter. Pour into small pudding dishes or bowl or pie crust or what ever you want. ; name: hot chocolate pudding ; ingredients: granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, vanilla ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, mix sugar, cocoa powder, flour and salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled. ; name: coffee ricotta creams ; ingredients: raisins, rum, golden caster sugar, strong black coffee, ricotta cheese, double cream, dark chocolate, icing sugar ; preparation:In small bowl, mix together raisins, rum, sugar and 4 tablespoons of the coffee. Stir well and leave to sit for 1 hour. Lightly beat ricotta to soften. Gradually beat in raisin mixture. Whip the cream into soft peaks and fold into the ricotta with half of the chocolate. Spoon into four glasses or serving dishes, drizzle over the remaining coffee and sprinkle with remaining chocolate. Chill at least one hour and up to 4 hours. Dust lightly with icing sugar before serving. ; name: polka dot dessert ; ingredients: chocolate instant pudding, milk, mint chocolate chip ice cream, mini marshmallows ; preparation:Place pudding mix in large bowl. Add milk and beat on medium speed for 2 minutes. Fold softened ice cream into pudding mixture. Pour into an 8 inch square pan or dish. Sprinkle marshmallows on top. Freeze until firm. Let stand for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: cool cannoli pudding ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, semisweet mini chocolate chips, maraschino cherry, pecans, sugar, whipping cream ; preparation:

name: easy 4 ingredient cranberry crisp ; ingredients: sugar, flour, butter, whole berry cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Combine the sugar, flour and butter, using a pastry blender. Pour cranberry sauce into prepared dish and cover with the flour mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes. Cut into 9 pieces and serve warm or cold. ; name: spiced cranberry and zinfandel sauce ; ingredients: zinfandel, sugar, orange rind, orange juice, cloves, ginger, cinnamon sticks, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Combine everything except the cranberries in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and cook 15 minutes or until mixture begins to thicken and sugar dissolves, stirring occasionally. Strain the mixture through a sieve into a bowl, and discard the solids. Return mixture to pan. Add cranberries to pan. Cook over high heat 10 minutes or until berries pop. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 30 minutes or until mixture is slightly thick. Pour into a bowl and allow to cool. ; name: slow cooker cranberry sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, lime zest ; preparation:Combine the cranberries, sugar and water in the slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 2 to 2. 5 hours. The cranberries will have popped open. Stir the zest into the hot sauce. Turn off the cooker, remove the lid, and let cool in the crock to room temperature. When cooled store covered in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks. Serve chilled or at room temperature. If you use frozen cranberries, add 30 to 45 minutes cooking time. ; name: light cranberry pear sauce ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, bartlett pears, sugar, cranberry-grape juice, dried cherries, cinnamon ; preparation:In a medium-size, heavy-bottom non-aluminum saucepan, combine cranberries, pears, sugar, dried cherries, cinnamon and juice. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook, stirring frequently to prevent scorching, until berries have popped and are tender, about 10 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. ; name: tangy cranberry bbq sauce ; ingredients: barbecue sauce, canned whole cranberry sauce, apple cider vinegar, rosemary, garlic, ground white pepper ; preparation:Combine wet ingredients in a sauce pan over med-high heat. Add the garlic, rosemary, white pepper. Bring to a boil. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and add to blender. Blend until smooth. Good to use immediately but the flavors settle wonderfully overnight, can keep covered in the refrigerator for a week. ; name: cranberry spread jam ; ingredients: cranberries, water, cinnamon, sugar, pectin ; preparation:Put cranberries into a colander, rinse with cold water. Throw away any berries that are dried out or mushy. Bring water to a boil and put cranberries into boiling water. Cook over medium heat until the berries pop. Ladle cranberries into food mill and sieve. Pour prepared fruit back into pot, add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual. ; name: cranberries in red wine ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, full-bodied red wine, cinnamon sticks, orange rind ; preparation:Pick over cranberries, removing stems and any shriveled berries. Rinse under running water, drain. Combine sugar and wine in a non-corrosive heavy medium suacepan. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly, over moderate heat. Stir in cranberries, cinnamon stick, and orange peel. Increase heat to high, return mixture to boil, stirring constantly. Reduce to medium low heat and simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally until berries burst - about 10- 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Discard cinnamon stick. Lift out orange peel, cool slightly, and cut into thin julienne strips. Return peel to berries. Serve warm. ; name: cranberry port sauce ; ingredients: ruby port, cinnamon stick, dried cranberries, fresh cranberries, water, sugar ; preparation:

name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: double bran muffins ; ingredients: all-bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, buttermilk, honey, vegetable oil, prune ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes. ; name: whole grain jam squares ; ingredients: whole oats, whole wheat flour, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, baking soda, strawberry jam ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except jam in a bowl. Beat ingredients at low speed until crumbly. Reserve 2 cups of this mixture. Press mixture firmly into bottom of greased 13x9 pan. Spread jam in a thin layer across pressed mixture. Now evenly sprinkle the reserved 2 cups across the top of jam. Bake 20-30 minutes or until golden brown. Let sit in pan or glass dish to cool for about 15 minutes and than cut into squares before cookie bar is completely cooled. ; name: blueberry corn muffins ; ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, eggs, orange juice, vanilla extract, unbleached white flour, yellow cornmeal, baking powder, blueberries, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Beat the butter with the sugar in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, orange juice and vanilla. In another bowl mix the flour, corn meal and baking powder. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and stir just until blended. Fold in blueberries. Lightly grease muffin cups with canola oil. Fill the cups about two-thirds full. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: jam and oat bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, self raising flour, rolled oats, jam ; preparation:Heat oven 180c. Grease 2 pans 19cm x 29cm. Line trays with baking paper. Combine butter, sugar, eggs and essence in large bowl. Add sifted flour and oats and mix well. Divide mixture into 3 equal portions. Press 1 portion over base of one tray. Repeat with 2nd portion over base of 2nd tray. Heat jam and spread over the 2 bases. Crumble remaining mix over jam in both trays. Bake 30 minutes or till browned, cool in pans. ; name: corn muffins with sweet red peppers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, pepper, buttermilk, vegetable oil, egg, sweet red pepper ; preparation:In large bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt and pepper. In small bowl, beat together buttermilk, oil and egg, stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Stir in red pepper. Spoon batter into well greased or paper lined muffin cups, filling each two thirds full. Bake in 425f degree oven for 15 minutes or until tester inserted in centre comes out clean. Or bake in 8 inch square baking pan in 425f degree oven for 20 minutes or until firm to the touch. Cut into squares to serve. ; name: cornmeal jambuster muffins ; ingredients: cornmeal, buttermilk, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, margarine, jam ; preparation:

name: krispie candies ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, chow mein noodles, salted peanuts ; preparation:Put chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in the saucepan. Put the saucepan on the burner and turn on the stove to low. Stir and stir until the mixture is melted and smooth. Remove saucepan from heat. Turn off the burner and quickly add the chow mein noodles and the peanuts. Mix and stir until they are evenly coated. Cover the cookie sheets with wax paper. Drop the candy by teaspoonfuls onto the wax paper-covered cookie sheets. Put the cookie sheets into the refrigerator to cool the candies. When they are cool, take them off the waxed paper. Put them in plastic bags. Keep them in the refrigerator. ; name: peanut butter rice crispy bars ; ingredients: crispy rice cereal, karo syrup, granulated sugar, peanut butter, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Measure out rice crispies and set aside in large bowl. In saucepan combine sugar and karo. Bring just to simmer, then add the peanut butter and stir. Do not let the sugar mixture boil. Stir peanut butter mixture into rice crispies and stir quickly. It will start to harden immediately. Pour mixture into a 9x12 pan and flatten out evenly across pan. Combine chocolate and butterscotch chips into saucepan and melt over a double boiler and stir constantly. When melted pour over peanut butter mixture. Let it set. When set, cut into squares. ; name: mini chocolate chippers ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen. ; name: chocolate crispy biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, rice bubbles, self raising flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack. ; name: chocolate chip crispers ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, rice krispies, chocolate chips ; preparation:In large bowl beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon full onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: simple berry crisp ; ingredients: berries, sugar, flour, granola cereal, butter, vanilla yogurt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f in a large bowl, gently toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. Set aside. In a medium bowl, toss together granola and butter then scatter over berries in dish. Bake until top is golden brown and berries and their juices are bubbly, about 30 minutes. Let cool then spoon into dishes and serve with yogurt or ice cream on top. ; name: white chocolate party mix ; ingredients: small pretzels, cheerios toasted oat cereal, corn chex, salted peanuts, vanilla chips, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container. ; name: ting a lings ; ingredients: whole wheat cereal, peanuts, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: mini reuben appetizers ; ingredients: rye cocktail bread, sauerkraut, corned beef, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing ; preparation:Drain sauerkraut. Place coctail ryes on cookie sheet in single layer. Carefully place corn beef on each slice of rye. Add 1 tablespoon saurerkraut on top of corn beef. Squeeze a dash of thousand island dressing on top of saurkraut. Top with swiss cheese. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Just before serving slide cookie sheet into oven for 5-8 minutes -- just until cheese has melted. ; name: crock pot yummy bbq pork sandwiches ; ingredients: pork shoulder, beef broth, barbecue sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: crock pot spicy buffalo chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, buffalo wing sauce, dry ranch dressing mix, butter, sandwich buns ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour wing sauce and ranch mix over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours. Once chicken has cooked, uncover, add the butter, and shred chicken with 2 forks until mixed well. Serve on buns. ; name: jan s reuben casserole ; ingredients: potato & cheese pierogies, sauerkraut, corned beef, thousand island dressing, provolone cheese ; preparation:Line bottom of 9x13 pan with frozen peirogie. Spread sauerkraut on top. Add the corned beef. Top with thousand island dressing. Top all with provolone cheese. Bake at 350 deg. For 45 minutes. ; name: polish reuben bake ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, prepared yellow mustard, sauerkraut, noodles, polish sausage, swiss cheese, breadcrumbs, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13x9 inch baking dish. Combine mushroom soup, milk, chopped onion and mustard in medium bowl until well blended. Spread sauerkraut in prepared baking dish. Top with noodles. Spoon soup mixture evenly over noodles. Cover with sausage. Top with shredded swiss. Combine bread crumbs and butter in a small bowl. Sprinkle over swiss. Cover dish tightly with foil. Bake until noodles are tender, about 1 hour. ; name: french dipped sandwiches crock pot version ; ingredients: onions, butter, soy sauce, browning sauce, french rolls, boneless round roast, water, dry onion soup mix, garlic clove, swiss cheese ; preparation:Saute onions in butter until tender. Transfer to slow cooker. Cut roast in half and place on top of onions. Combine water, soup mix, soy sauce, browning sauce and garlic. Pour over roast and cook 7-9 hours in slow cooker. Remove roast with slotted spoon and let stand 15 minutes. Slice in thin slices, across grain. Place on roll and sprinkle with cheese. Broil 3-4 minutes until cheese is melted. Skim fat from juices and serve as the juice as a dipping sauce for the sandwiches. ; name: crock pot swiss cheese chicken ; ingredients: turkey bacon, potatoes, boneless chicken breasts, garlic clove, onion, carrot, cream of chicken soup, swiss cheese ; preparation:In skillet cook bacon until crispy, remove and crumble. Set aside. Add potatoes to crockpot. Add chicken to crockpot. Add garlic, onion, carrot and soup to crockpot. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours. Remove individual pieces of chicken to plates along with vegetables and place one slice of cheese on each piece of chicken. Sprinkle bacon on top of cheese. Enjoy. ; name: chicken reuben sandwiches in a crock pot ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing, pumpernickel bread ; preparation:

name: beef bean and tomato soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, onion soup mix, kidney beans, tomatoes, parsley, basil, pasta, water ; preparation:Brown the ground beef in a dutch oven or heavy stock pot, season with salt and pepper. Add the chopped onion and green pepper, and saute for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the kidney beans, tomatoes, onion soup mix, parsley, basil, water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta. Reduce heat and simmer for 10- 20 minutes, until pasta is cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: korean spinach soup ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, garlic clove, sesame oil, ground beef, soy sauce, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Wash the spinach thoroughly, then trim off the thick stems. Heat the sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Brown the ground beef, separating while stir-frying. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: kielbasa bean soup ; ingredients: beef broth, water, potato, carrots, celery, yellow onion, kielbasa, bean with bacon soup, black pepper ; preparation:In a kettle or dutch oven, add broth, water and vegetables. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Add both cans of soup, and the sliced kielbasa. Season with black pepper. Heat through and serve. ; name: asian pork and noodle soup ; ingredients: boneless pork sirloin, garlic cloves, gingerroot, chicken broth, water, soy sauce, fine egg noodles, carrot, red bell pepper, fresh spinach leaves ; preparation:Spray 3-quart saucepan with cooking spray. Heat over medium-high heat. Add pork, garlic and gingerroot. Stir-fry 3 to 5 minutes or until pork is brown. Stir in broth, water and soy sauce. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 5 minutes. Stir in noodles, carrot and bell pepper. Simmer uncovered about 10 minutes or until noodles are tender. Stir in spinach. Cook until heated through. ; name: lima bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, diced tomatoes, pinto beans, frozen lima beans, brown sugar, salt, water, white kidney beans ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: greens and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, dried oregano, fresh parsley, escarole, white beans, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Stir in garlic and seasoning and saute for 3 minutes. Stir in greens. Cover and cook until wilted. Remove cover and stir in beans. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken broth for juice and most importantly, flavor. ; name: black bean soup with sausage crock pot ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, black beans, salsa, low sodium chicken broth, hot italian sausage links, cilantro, salt, pepper ; preparation:Warm oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, until onion is softened and translucent, about 5 minutes. Combine onion mixture, beans, salsa and chicken broth in a slow cooker. Stir well and cook on low for 5 hours. Stir sausages into bean mixture in slow cooker and cook for 1 hour longer. Using tongs, remove sausages to a cutting board, cut into bite size pieces and then return to slow cooker. Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper. Serve soup hot in bowls, with chopped avocado and a dollop of sour cream on top, if desired. ; name: hoppin john soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, kielbasa, black-eyed peas, navy beans, brown rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, thyme ; preparation:

name: pumpkin cream pie ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, 9-inch graham cracker crust, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Beat first 5 ingredients together until fluffy, 1-2 minutes. Blend in pumpkin. Spoon into crust. Chill throughly. Top with whipped cream. ; name: pumpkin pie french toast baked ; ingredients: eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, texas toast thick bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and brown sugar in low flat bowl for easy dipping. Line two cookie sheets with foil and spray with pam. Dip the bread into the egg mixture on both sides and place on cookie sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, flipping them over half way through. Serve with maple syrup, powdered suger, or eat them plain if you are on the go. ; name: 3 layer pumpkin pie dessert ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, pumpkin pie filling, eggs, evaporated milk, sugar, cinnamon, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350f. Grease or use non-stick cooking spray and prepare 13x9 inches pan. Reserve 1 cup dry cake mix for topping. Crust - combine remaining cake mix, butter and egg, press into bottom of pan. Prepare filling - combine pie mix, 2 eggs and evaporated milk, mix well and pour over crust. Topping - combine dry mix, sugar, cinnamon and cut in butter to crumble mixture. Sprinkle over filling. Bake 350 for 50 minutes or until set. Serve with dollip of whip cream. ; name: pumpkin pie bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, salt, white sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, pumpkin puree, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving. ; name: festal golden pumpkin pie ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, deep dish pie shells, eggs, granulated sugar, salt, cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, ginger, carnation evaporated milk ; preparation:Prepare 1 pie crust. Combine eggs, sugar, salt, and spices and beat well. Blend in pumpkin. Add milk and beat well. Turn into pastry lined pie pan. Bake in a hot oven for 10 minutes, then reduce heat and bake at 350 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes. Pie is done when knife, inserted in center, comes out clean. Cool on rack for 2 hours, then serve immediately or refrigerate. ; name: cinnamon carrot pie ; ingredients: carrots, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine first seven ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Beat for two minutes. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Lower heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes longer or until the filling is set. ; name: yellow squash pie ; ingredients: evaporated milk, eggs, honey, cinnamon, yellow squash, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:Slice and cook squash in small amount of water until tender. Drain and cool. In blender, blend milk, eggs, cinnamon and honey. Add cooked squash. Blend together for 2 to 3 minutes. Pour into pie shell. Bake at 400f for ten minutes, then turn oven down to 350f and cook for 35 minutes or until set. Cool. Refrigerate until cold then serve. Or you can eat it warm like my family prefers--your choice. ; name: favorite pumpkin pie ; ingredients: unbaked pastry shells, fresh pumpkin, milk, egg yolks, egg whites, salt, clove, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:

name: simple zucchini pasta by mark bittman ; ingredients: salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, onion, thyme, tomatoes, pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of water to a boil and salt it. Put olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, onion and thyme, and cook, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and adjust heat so onion and zucchini release their liquid without browning. Cook for about 20 minutes, or until very tender. Add tomatoes and their liquid to zucchini and raise heat a bit so mixture bubbles. Cook pasta until it is nearly but not quite tender. If sauce threatens to dry out, add a little pasta cooking water. Drain pasta and finish cooking it in sauce. Serve, garnished with parsley or parmesan. ; name: zucchini salad ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, zucchini, pine nuts, raisins, mint, lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil, add the halved garlic clove, and cook gently until browned, discard. Add the zucchini to the pan, and cook until a little browned and just tender. Turn the zucchini and oil into a bowl, and add the remaining ingredients. Allow to cool completely, then cover and chill for at least 3 hours. Remove from the fridge about 15 minutes before serving. 4drained and chopped anchovies can be added in step 2 for a more robust flavour. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: basil zucchini boats ; ingredients: zucchini, butter, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Wash and dry the zucchini. Trim off the ends and slice in half lengthwise. Scoop out some of the seeds in the middle of each piece. You may leave some seeds in because you only need to scoop out enough to allow the butter to melt and stay inside. Put all zucchini boats on a baking sheet. Divide the butter between the zucchini boats, spreading all over cut side. Salt and pepper each piece and then divide the basil and parmesan between the boats. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until desired tenderness. ; name: zucchini medley ; ingredients: zucchini, mushroom, green pepper, onion, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, tomato sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can add hot sauce or peppers to your liking. This is very versatile. ; name: solange s zucchini and eggplant pasta ; ingredients: whole wheat penne, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, oregano, salt, basil leaves ; preparation:Cook the pasta. Peel and cube eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes. Saute onions in olive oil. When they become soft add garlic, stirring so not to burn. Add tomatoes, zucchini, and eggplant. Add oregano and salt. Put a lid on the skillet and let it cook until veggies are tender and cooked and most liquid has evaporated. Once pasta is cooked, throw it in the skillet and toss. Add and mix the shredded basil leaves in the pasta mixture. If you feel the sauce is too dry you can add a bit of the pasta water to moisten the sauce. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: zucchini delight ; ingredients: condensed tomato soup, lemon juice, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, zucchini, onion, bell pepper, mushroom, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine soup, lemon juice, sugar, garlic and salt in large saucepan. Mix well. Add zucchini, onion, bell pepper and mushrooms. Mix well. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and cook 20 - 25 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: herb zucchini and lemon pasta ; ingredients: rotini pasta, light butter, red onion, zucchini, parmesan cheese, tomatoes, lemon juice, dried basil leaves, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: skillet macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, elbow macaroni, onion, bell peppers, salt, dry mustard, water, cheddar cheese, pimento stuffed olives, roasted red peppers ; preparation:In skillet over medium heat, in hot butter, cook raw macaroni and next four ingredients for five minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in water. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low and cover. Simmer 10-15 minutes until macaroni is tender, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese and olives until cheese is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta macaroni salad ; ingredients: dry pasta, mayonnaise, buttermilk, fresh dill, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, cucumber, sweet red pepper, scallion ; preparation:Cook pasta to package. Drain and rinse with cold water. Set pasta to the side make sure all water is removed. In a big bowl combine mayo, buttermilk, dill, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Stir in pasta, celery, cucumber, scallions and sweet pepper. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk. ; name: cheeseburger macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: oil, onion, ground beef, flour, milk, butter, garlic salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, cooked macaroni ; preparation:In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts. ; name: grandma s mac n cheese ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, milk, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a 1. 5 quart baking dish put half of the macaroni in bottom of dish, followed by half the milk and half the butter. Season with salt and pepper. Cover with half the cheese. Repeat above direction for a second layer. Bake uncovered for 30 min or until cheese is thoroughly melted. ; name: macaroni and cottage cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, cottage cheese, milk, vegetable oil, salt, egg, garlic clove, cracker crumb ; preparation:Cook the macaroni according to directions. Stir cottage cheese with milk until smooth. In a seperate bowl, beat the egg, then beat the oil into it. Add salt and garlic to the cheese mixture. Now mix this with the cooked and drained macaroni, pour it in a baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs, and bake at 350 till set, about 25 minutes. ; name: super budget macaroni cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, flour, salt, ground black pepper, cheese, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Cook pasta. Drain. Set aside. Warm milk in saucepan. When it is just warm to the touch, whisk in half the flour. Let the milk begin to simmer, whisking all the time. You be the judge of the thickness - we like it really thick. If you want it thicker, add the remaining flour and continue to whisk until smooth and thick. Stir through the cheese and the salt and pepper until the cheese is melted. Take off the heat. Pour into a baking dish and sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 degrees celcius. ; name: carolina macaroni salad ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, butter, milk, miracle whip, hard-boiled eggs, green pepper, onion, sweet gherkin, black pepper, paprika ; preparation:Boil the macaroni, drain thoroughly. To the macaroni add the butter, milk and cheese packet mixing well. Add the miracle whip, eggs, pepper, onion, sweet pickles and black pepper. Mix lightly. Sprinkle with paprika, cover and chill several hours or overnight. ; name: mum s monday macaroni ; ingredients: butter, onion, elbow macaroni, tomatoes, water, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: surprise pie dough ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, vanilla, flour ; preparation:Cream together the butter, cream and cheese. If using a food processor, turn down to lowest setting. Add flour and mix till incorporated. Stop--do not mix any more. Make 3 balls from the dough. Wrap in plastic wrap. Chill for an hour before using. Uncooked dough may be frozen for up to 2 months. Freeze in balls or in pie tins. Makes 10-inch pies. Bake at 450 for about 10 minutes. ; name: egg free french toast ; ingredients: whole grain bread, milk, cornstarch, sugar, vanilla extract, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat griddle to just above medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: pancake souffle ; ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Place butter in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk and vanilla. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour mixture into dish with melted butter. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: waffles ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients. Beat eggs, milk, & melted lard. Add wet mixture to dry ingredients. If sweet waffles are desired, add the sugar. Pour onto a hot waffle iron. ; name: fast food biscuits ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: ultra low fat all bran muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, splenda granular, salt, baking powder, all-bran cereal, skim milk, egg whites, mashed banana ; preparation:Stir together dry ingredients, set aside. In large mixing bowl, combine cereal with milk. Let stand 5 minutes until cereal softens. Add egg whites and mashed banana, mix well. Add flour mixture, stirring only til moistened. Spoon into 12 muffin cups sprayed with pam. Bake at 400 f for about 20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: yogurt bran muffins from fiber one ; ingredients: all-bran cereal, egg whites, vegetable oil, nonfat yogurt, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Grease bottoms of 12 muffin molds, or use baking cups. Crush cereal. Stir together egg whites, oil, and yogurt. Stir in cereal and dry ingredients, just until moistened. Fold in optional additions. Spoon batter evenly into tins. Bake 18-20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: no egg no dairy pierogie dough ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, oil, water ; preparation:

name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: super easy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, salt, unsalted butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together eggs, reduced-fat mayonnaise, and salt. Heat a skillet over low-medium heat. Melt butter. Then add egg mixture. As eggs cook, slowly but constantly move them around skillet. Cook only until eggs are set, yet still soft and moist--avoid overcooking. Transfer scrambled eggs to a plate and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: bacon cheese waffles ; ingredients: egg, milk, sour cream, butter, pancake mix, bacon, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Beat egg, add milk, sour cream and butter. Stir in pancake mix. Mix well. Fold in bacon and cheese. Bake in preheated waffle iron. ; name: country style scrambled eggs ; ingredients: bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove to paper towels to drain. Cook and stir potatoes in drippings over medium heat for 12 minutes or until tender. Add onion and green pepper. Cook and stir for 3 or 4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Stir in the reserved bacon. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted. ; name: easy cheesy eggs ; ingredients: eggs, american cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Beat eggs with fork, until yolks are blended but not all one colour. Stir in salt & pepper. Put eggs in unheated nonstick pan. Rip cheese into strips & place with eggs in pan. Scramble until done but not too firm. Serve with toast or even ketchup if desired. ; name: cream cheese scrambled eggs 309cals per serve ; ingredients: eggs, low-fat cream cheese, chives, milk, salt and pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: yummy apple cake ; ingredients: apples, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes. ; name: fruit crisp ; ingredients: apples, granulated sugar, rolled oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, butter, coconut, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place fruit in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: irish apple crumble ; ingredients: pastry dough, granny smith apples, sugar, cinnamon, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: baked apple slices ; ingredients: baking apples, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground ginger, apple cider, butter, raisins, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Place apples in greased 1 quart baking dish. Combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and apple cider. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve warm over ice cream if desired. ; name: apple cinnamon cobbler ish dessert ; ingredients: apples, eggs, yogurt, cereal, brown sugar, cinnamon sugar, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x9 baking pan. Peel and thinly slice apples. Arrange in the bottom pan. Melt 3 tbsp butter. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and yogurt. Whisk in melted butter. Add cereal and brown sugar, and stir to combine. Spread over the apples and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Cut remaining 3 tbsp butter into small pieces and sprinkle on top. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden and bubbly. ; name: baked apple and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen harvest apples, sugar, flour, cheddar cheese, butter, vanilla wafer, orange juice ; preparation:Mix sugar and flour in a small bowl. Slowly stir in orange juice. Mix melted butter and vanilla wafer crumbs in a separate small bowl. Place apples in a greased 1 quart baking dish. Layer sugar mixture, cheese and vanilla wafer crumb mixture over apples. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: apple dumpling bake ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, granny smith apples, sugar, butter, mountain dew soda, ground cinnamon, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Seperate crescent rolls into 16 triangles. Cut each apple into eight wedges. Wrap a triangle around each apple wedge. Place in a greased 13-in. X 9-in. X 2-in. Baking dish. In a bowl, combine sugar and butter and sprinkle over rolls. Slowly pour the soda around the rolls. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 35-40 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with ice cream. ; name: creamy baked apples ; ingredients: granny smith apples, butter, cinnamon sugar, flour, sugar, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: cucumber lime agua fresca ; ingredients: cucumber, fresh lime juice, sugar, salt, cold water ; preparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, lime juice, sugar, salt and 4 cups of cold water. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture into a mesh strainer placed over a pitcher, pressing pulp to release as much liquid as possible. Discard pulp. Add enough ice to fill pitcher. Garnish glasses with cucumber slices and lime wedges. ; name: lemon sherbet ; ingredients: whipping cream, plain yogurt, sugar, lemon, juice of, yellow food coloring, lemon peel ; preparation:In a bowl, combine whipping cream and sugar. Whip with mixer on high speed until cream is stiff. Fold in lemon juice, yogurt, and lemon peel. Add coloring at this time, if desired. Put in freezer. Stir every 45 minutes until frozen. ; name: coconut melon ; ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, sugar, lime juice, coconut, honeydew melon ; preparation:In bowl, mix milk, sugar and lime juice. Stir well. Chill until ready to use. Place melon in lg bowl. Add coconut and stir gently to combine. Add coconut milk mixture and toss to coat. ; name: cucumbers with olives ; ingredients: cucumbers, fresh dill, lemon juice, olive oil, black olives, salt ; preparation:Put the cucumber slices in a colander, sprinkle with a little salt and leave to drain for 30 minutes. Rinse the cucumbers, drain, pat dry and put in a salad bowl. Sprinkle with dill, drizzle with lemon juice and oil. Add the olives, season with salt if necessary and toss. Leave to stand for a few minutes, then serve. ; name: two part lemonade ; ingredients: water, sugar, lemons, lemon juice, salt, ice water ; preparation:For the syrup, bring the water and the sugar to a boil in a medium-sized saucepan. Cook for 5 minutes, until sugar is dissolved. Add the lemon zest. Allow mixture to cool to lukewarm. Pour into a glass jar and store in the refrigerator. For the lemonade, combine the lemon juice, salt, syrup, and ice water in tall pitcher. Stir well and pour into tall, ice filled glasses. ; name: old fashioned homemade lemonade concentrate ; ingredients: citric acid, tartaric, epsom salts, lemons, juice of, lemons, zest of, granulated sugar, boiling water ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together well. Pour boiling water over mixture. Stir shortly. Let stand overnight. Strain mixture and then bottle. When you wish to drink it, add the concentrate to water to taste. ; name: asparagus with lemon curd ; ingredients: asparagus spears, olive oil, lemon curd, garlic clove, gingerroot, coarse salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan. ; name: vegan lemon curd ; ingredients: lemon juice, water, granulated sugar, cornstarch, salt, soymilk, margarine ; preparation:

name: cranberry jalapeno salsa ; ingredients: cranberries, green onion, fresh orange juice, honey, water, green bell pepper, fresh cilantro, sugar, jalapeno pepper, salt ; preparation:Place the cranberries in a food processor. Pulse 3-4 times until chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Add in all the remaining ingredients except the salt. Mix well to combine. Season with salt to taste and more sugar if needed. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 3 hours before using. ; name: macadamia crusted tilapia with pineapple salsa ; ingredients: flour, egg, macadamia nuts, tilapia fillets, fresh pineapple, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Dredge fish in flour, then egg, then nuts. Place on oiled baking sheet. Bake 20 minutes until golden brown. Make the salsa as far ahead as possible to allow time for flavors to meld. Combine all salsa ingredients and refrigerate. Serve over fish. ; name: barbara s hot salsa ; ingredients: lime, juice of, tomatoes, onions, jalapeno peppers, hot peppers, sugar, cumin, coriander, kosher salt ; preparation:Sprinkle salt in bottom of crock. Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, sugar, spices, and lime juice. Daily, sprinkle just a little salt into crock and stir. On the 4th or 5th day, pack into hot sterile pint jars. Process in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: grilled yellowtail tuna and pineapple salsa ; ingredients: yellowtail fish fillets, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, pineapple, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, salt & pepper ; preparation:Season yellowtail with salt & pepper on both sides, and place on hot grill. Grill to medium, as overcooking will lead to a dry finished product. While fish is cooking, place all ingredients for the pineapple salsa in a bowl and toss. When the fish is cooked, place a piece of banana leaf on the plate. Place fish on top of banana leaf and top with pineapple salsa, serve with rice and garnish with a grilled lemon. Salsa can be made 1-2 hours in advance, no need to chill. ; name: joanne s spicy shrimp salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno pepper, bay shrimp, fresh cilantro, cumin, garlic, lime juice, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Drop the fresh tomatoes into a small pan of boiling water for about 2 minutes or until the skins blister. Remove from the water, cool, and peel. Coarsely chop the fresh or canned tomatoes and place in a large bowl. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours. Serve with baked tortilla chips or as a side dish. For a thicker salsa, combine all the ingredients except shrimp in a food processor. Pulse 3 times or until desired consistency. Stir in shrimp. ; name: fresh tomatillo salsa verde ; ingredients: tomatillo, jalapeno, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, lime juice, sugar, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Husk and wash tomatillos. Chop the tomatillos into very course chunks. Set aside. Depending on how hot you like your salsa, either remove the seeds and veins from the jalapenos or leave them intact. Chop the jalapeno into small chunks and put into blender or food processor. Peel the garlic, put into blender. Take the cilantro, remove the leaves from the stems and put into blender. Put lime juice, salt, sugar and olive oil into the blender. Last, put the tomatillos into blender and blend until smooth. Serve chilled. Be sure to experiment with different amounts of jalapeno, lime juice, salt, etc. ; name: ww 3 points spicy shrimp with papaya salsa ; ingredients: paprika, dried thyme leaves, salt, fresh ground pepper, cayenne, large shrimp, papayas, scallion, fresh lime juice ; preparation:Prepare grill for hot fire. Spray a grill basket with nonstick spray. Combine the paprika, thyme, salt, pepper, and cayenne in a medium bowl. Add shrimp and toss to coat. To make the salsa, combine the papaya, scallions, and lime juice in a bowl. Set aside. Place the shrimp in the grill basket and place basket onto grill rack. Grill shrimp until just opaque in center, 2-3 minutes on each side. Serve with salsa. 3 points per serving. ; name: seared sea scallops with tropical salsa ; ingredients: pineapple, mango, cucumber, red bell pepper, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapeno, salt, pepper, sea scallops ; preparation:

name: can t be beat brownies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, salt, shortening, eggs, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Mix the flour, sugar, salt and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: cocoa cake brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, stirring well after each addition. Stir in vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt. Gradually add to butter mixture. Stir until moistened. Transfer to a greased 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: no cook brownies ; ingredients: almond meal, cocoa powder, sea salt, agave, water, cocoa nibs ; preparation:Mix almond meal, cacao, salt in mixing bowl. Mix in agave or honey and water. Stir in cacao nibs. Use a 2 tablespoon scooper to portion onto dehydrator trays. Dehydrate for 6 to 7 hours, or to desired consistency. ; name: 1 brownies in the world best ever ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, vanilla extract, brewed espresso, kosher salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Heat the oven to 350f and arrange the rack in the middle. Line an 8-by-8-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil. Combine chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just evenly incorporated. Add cooled chocolate and mix until uniform in color. Add flour and stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting. ; name: gluten free cocoa brownies ; ingredients: butter, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, vanilla, gluten-free flour, salt, xanthan gum ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees and grease an 88x2 pan or 12 muffin tins. Melt butter in a sauce pan or in a 1 quart container in the microwave. Remove from heat. Add cocoa until blended, then add sugar and mix well. Add eggs, one at a time. Stir in vanilla, flour, salt & xanthan gum do not overmix. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool and serve. ; name: brownies weight watchers 2 points ; ingredients: low-fat brownie mix, all-bran cereal, water, baking powder ; preparation:Put the all bran into a large bowl and add the water. Soak for 5 minutes. Add the brownie mix along with the baking powder to the all bran and mix well by hand. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan and bake according to directions on box. When cool, cut into 20 squares. One square will equal 2 points. ; name: lazy gourmet s chocolate brownies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, cocoa, eggs, flour, baking powder, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, sift flour and baking powder. Set aside. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add the white sugar, brown sugar and cocoa. Blend well. Beat in 1 egg at a time. Add flour and blend well. Add vanilla and walnuts, mixing well. Pour into prepared 9 x 13 pan. Bake for 30 minutes. Centre will be firm but not hard. ; name: dawn s special brownies ; ingredients: butter, cocoa, eggs, sugar, flour ; preparation:

name: sage and rosemary pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, olive oil, dried sage, black and red pepper blend, dried rosemary leaves, salt ; preparation:Heat contact grill for 5 minutes. Wash chops and pat dry. In a small container, thoroughly mix the seasonings together. Drizzle half the oil over the chops, sprinkle with half the seasoning mix. Turn chops over and repeat with oil and remaining seasoning mix. Place on heated grill and cook until meat thermometer inserted in center reads 160 degrees. Serve immediately. ; name: balsamic citrus pork chops ; ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, salt, pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, pineapple juice, honey, cornstarch, dried thyme ; preparation:Season both sides of the pork chops with the salt and pepper. In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, juice, honey, cornstarch and thyme until smooth. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add seasomed chops. Brown chops for 2 minutes on each side. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add vinegar mixture to skillet. Cover and simmer chops for 10-15 minutes. Serve with sauce poured over top. ; name: honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, honey, lemon juice, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops. ; name: tender pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic clove, salt, pepper, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: spicy pork patties ; ingredients: ground pork, curry paste, fresh breadcrumbs, onion, lime juice, fresh cilantro, red chile, soft brown sugar, oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita. ; name: grill pork with rosemary and lavender ; ingredients: pork loin, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, dried lavender flowers, fresh thyme leaves, fresh rosemary leaf, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Combine salt, pepper, lavender, thyme, rosemary, garlic, lemon juice and olive oil. Rub mixture onto the pork chops. Cover the chops with plastic wrap and let sit 1 to 2 hours at room temperature. Preheat barbecue grill. Place pork chops onto hot grill. Cover barbecue with lid and grill 4 to 5 minutes. Turn and grill an additional 3 to 4 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 155f on a meat thermometer. Remove from barbecue and serve. ; name: bbq pork steak ; ingredients: pork steaks, olive oil, salt, hot paprika, sage, garlic ; preparation:

name: chicken with egg noodles ; ingredients: chicken thighs, wide egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken until tender. Drain a little of the water off. Add noodles and cook til tender. Add can of cream of chicken soup and stir until well blended. Serve. ; name: ramen noodle coleslaw salad ; ingredients: chicken-flavored ramen noodles, cabbage, green onion, sesame seeds, vinegar, sugar, olive oil, salt, slivered almonds ; preparation:Break up noodles and place in colander. Pour boiling water over noodles, drain well, and mix with cabbage and onions. Mix 3 ramon seasoning packets with sesame seeds, vinegar, sugar, olive oil and salt. Pour over cabbage and noodle mixture. Refrigerate -- it gets better with time. Sprinkle almonds over salad before serving. ; name: oriental vegetable noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, sugar snap pea, fresh bean sprout, fresh mushrooms, ginger, noodles ; preparation:Combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, and peas in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the bean sprouts, mushrooms, and ginger. Simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the cooked noodles and heat for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: quick and easy longevity noodles ; ingredients: cornstarch, water, sesame oil, soy sauce, egg, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, cooked chicken, green onions ; preparation:Stir the cornstarch, water and sesame oil in a small cup. Set the mixture aside. Heat the broth and soy in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil. Stir the cornstarch mixture and stir it into the saucepan. Cook and stir until mixture is slightly thickened. Reduce the heat to low. Add the eggs, in a slow steady stream, stirring while adding. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Divide the pasta, chicken and green onions among 8 serving bowls. Ladle about 1 cup broth mixture into each bowl and serve immediately. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: german noodle salad ; ingredients: pasta noodles, mayonnaise, green onions, gherkins, eggs, fresh parsley ; preparation:Mix all other ingredients in a salad bowl. If you prefer, add some vinegar from the gherkins to taste. You can also add more mayo. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 24 hours. Garnish with optional egg slices. ; name: asian chicken and noodles ; ingredients: chicken-flavored ramen noodles, frozen broccoli, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until done, about 8 minutes. Stir in noodles, vegetables, stir-fry sauce and packet of seasoning. Mix well and heat through. ; name: ramen noodle egg drop soup ; ingredients: water, eggs, onion, celery, green bell pepper, chicken-flavored ramen noodles ; preparation:

name: mexican egg melts ; ingredients: eggs, plain yogurt, red onions, mexican seasoning, english muffins, green chilies, mexican cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Stir together eggs, yogurt, onion and mexican seasoning. Lightly toast english muffins and place on a foil covered baking sheet. Top each muffin with equal amounts of egg mixture, chilies and cheese. Bake for 10 min or until eggs are warmed and cheese is melted. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: breakfast nachos ; ingredients: tortilla chips, refried beans, eggs, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a large oven-safe platter with tortilla chips. Microwave refried beans for 1 minute, then spread over the tortilla chips. Crumble scrambled eggs evenly over beans. Evenly pour warmed salsa over eggs. Top with grated cheese. Broil entire platter in oven until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: homemade enchilada sauce ; ingredients: oil, cornstarch, chili powder, chicken broth, tomato sauce, salt, cumin, oregano, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low. ; name: chicken or turkey enchiladas with sour cream ; ingredients: chicken, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, canola oil, corn tortillas, medium hot salsa ; preparation:In a bowl, mix chicken or turkey, sour cream, 2 cups shredded cheese, and salt. Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving. ; name: swiss enchiladas enchiladas suizas ; ingredients: cooked chicken, anaheim chilies, green chili salsa, salt, heavy cream, corn tortillas, oil, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Mix the chicken, chilies, and salsa in a small bowl. Mix the salt and cream in a large shallow dish. Heat the oil in a frying pan over med-high. Fry the tortillas one at a time for a few seconds until they start to blister and turn soft. Immediately dip each one in the cream mixture. Put a large dollop of the chicken mixture on each tortilla and roll it up. Place it in a ungreased baking pan, flap side down. When all of the tortillas are done, pour the remaining cream over them and sprinkle the cheese over the top. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or so, until they are thoroughly heated. ; name: breakfast enchilada eggs ; ingredients: corn muffin mix, diced green chilies, egg, water, cheddar cheese, red enchilada sauce, refried beans, eggs, cilantro, four-cheese mexican blend cheese ; preparation:

name: garlic broccoli spears ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Set florets into a saucepan with a very small amount of water, cover with lid, and let steam until tender, about 5-10 minutes or so- it should still be bright green, but fork tender. Meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Drain broccoli and place in serving dish. Pour lemon mixture over broccoli and toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: basil garlic butter ; ingredients: unsalted butter, basil, garlic, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place the butter in a mixing bowl. Add basil, garlic, and cheese and whip with an electric mixer until mixture is smooth and evenly blended. Add salt to taste. Pack butter into four crocks. Allow flavors to blend for at least 4 hours before serving. Can be frozen for up to 3 months. ; name: garlic herb grilled pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh thyme, fresh rosemary, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut a horizontal slit in the pork tenderloin, leaving the halves attached. Rub tenderloin with olive oil. Insert garlic into the slit and on onto the fatty part of pork. Press thyme and rosemary into slit. Sprinkle tenderloin with salt and pepper. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat. Lightly oil the grill grate. Place pork on grill. Cook approximately 1 hour, turning every 15 minutes, to a minimum internal temperature of 145 degrees f. ; name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: garlic pork cutlets with buttered cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, pork loin chops, potatoes, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, white wine, butter, cabbage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Heat oil in a frypan that will take the cutlets in a single layer and which will go into a preheated oven. Over a moderately high heat, brown the chops on both sides until they are golden, remove to a plate. Add the potatoes and cook them until they are a golden colour, remove to a plate. Add the bruised garlic and cook for a minute of so longer. Add the chops back into the pan, and top with the potatoes and some of the bruised garlic. Season with salt and pepper and pour over the wine and boil for a few minutes. Put pan into the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Meanwhile melt the butter in a medium pot and add the cabbage and season with pepper and salt, cover and cook over a low heat for 3 to 5 minutes. To serve place a bed of cabbage on the plates and top with a chop and a portion of the garlic and potatoe wedges. ; name: roasted potatoes peppers and onions with rosemary ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet red pepper, sweet green pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: garlic prawns with squashed tomatoes ; ingredients: head broccoli, egg noodles, peanut oil, large shelled prawns, fresh garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, dry white wine, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Cut the florets from the broccoli into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Slice off and discard any rough pieces from the remaining stalk then slice into small pieces. Cook the noodles in a pan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Add the broccoli for the final minute of cooking. Drain. Meanwhile, heat a wok or large non-stick frying pan until hot. Add the oil, prawns and garlic and fry for 1-2 minutes, until the prawns turn pink. Remove from the pan and set aside. Add the tomatoes and squash down with the back of a spatula to release the juices. Cook for 1-2 minutes then add the wine and bubble for 1 minute. Return the prawn mixture to the pan, season with salt and pepper then toss through the drained noodles and broccoli. Divide among four bowls and serve immediately. ; name: oil poached garlic puree and roasted garlic oil ; ingredients: heads of garlic, water, canola oil, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:

name: stuffed cabbage roll skillet ; ingredients: cabbage leaves, tomato soup, ground beef, cooked rice, carrot, oregano, egg, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Mix 2 tablespoons of soup with rest of ingredients. Divide mixture among cabbage leaves. Fold in sides. Roll up and secure with toothpicks. In skillet, place rolls seam side down. Add remaining soup. Cover. Simmer on low 40 minutes. Every 10 minutes, spoon sauce over rolls. ; name: shredded cabbage with butter and bread ; ingredients: butter, seasoned croutons, dry mustard, caraway seed, head of cabbage, kosher salt, sugar ; preparation:Melt the butter and add croutons. Add the mustard and caraway seeds and stir over medium heat until the butter browns and smells nutty. Remove from heat. Place the cabbage in water and cook for 2 minutes, exactly. I prefer to steam the cabbage instead of boiling it. Add the cabbage to the butter crumb dressing and toss to coat thoroughly. Serve immediately. ; name: mediterranean vegetable and chicken sandwich wrap ; ingredients: tortilla, hummus, deli chicken, baby spinach, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted sweet red peppers ; preparation:Spread hummus over the tortilla. Place the slices of chicken down the middle of the tortilla so that the ends of each slice overlap. Arrange the spinach leaves over the chicken. Top with the artichokes and red peppers. Fold over the sides of the tortilla and roll up as you would any other wrap. Cut in half and serve. ; name: beef cabbage casserole ; ingredients: head of cabbage, lean ground beef, onion, tomato soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown beef with onion. Boil cabbage 3 min, than drain. Alternate layers of beef and onion with cabbage in 2 qt casserole or crock pot. Pour soup, undiluted, over top. Bake uncovered 30 min at 350 f, or 6-8 hrs on low in crock pot. ; name: egg roll salad ; ingredients: coleslaw mix, cooked chicken, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, garlic powder, egg roll wraps, green onion, sweet and sour sauce, vegetable oil ; preparation:In large frying pan heat oil.
