Bake chicken in marinade until just springy to touch, basting 2-3 times with marinade, about 40 minutes. Transfer chicken to platter. Tent with foil to keep warm. Strain marinade into saucepan. Boil until reduced to 2 cups, about 20 minutes. Serve sauce with chicken. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: chicken saffron risotto low fat ; ingredients: arborio rice, chicken stock, chicken breasts, leek, saffron strands, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: super easy chicken broccoli pie ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, frozen chopped broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bisquick, milk, dried onion flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting. ; name: chicken and rice with bacon ; ingredients: chicken pieces, bacon, rice, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, milk, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Line large baking dish with bacon. Pour rice evenly over top of bacon. Place chicken on top of rice. Season chicken with salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and paprika. Mix together soup, broth, milk and pour over chicken and rice. Cover and bake for 3 hours at 325. Uncover and bake for 15 minute more. ; name: savory cheddar cheese and rice cheesecake ; ingredients: brown rice, parsley, scallion, cheddar cheese, silken tofu, plain soymilk, ground pepper, herbs, hot sauce, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Preheat over to 375 degrees. Combine rice, parsley, scallions and cheese. In blender, combine tofu, milk, pepper, spices and hot sauce until well mixed. Combine rice and tofu mixtures. Pour into crust. Bake for 30 minutes or until set. Serve hot. ; name: cream of chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking. ; name: cheddar cheese pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, scallions, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Bake pie crust for 10 minutes. Mix eggs, cream, cheese & scallions in a large bowl and pour into the prepared pie crust. Bake for 10 minutes. Sprinkle the toasted nuts on top of the pie and bake for an additional 20 minutes. Let cool and enjoy. ; name: baked stuffed eggs ; ingredients: hardboiled egg, sour cream, dry mustard, salt, onion, butter, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, paprika ; preparation:Slice eggs in half lengthwise, remove yolks, set whites aside. In a bowl mash yolks with a fork, add sour cream, mustard and salt, mix well fill egg whites. Set aside. In a saucepan saute onion in butter until tender. Add soup and sour cream mix well. Pour half into a baking pan, arrange stuffed eggs on top spoon rest of sauce on top. Sprinkle with cheese and paprika. Cover and chill overnight. Remove 30 minutes before baking. Bake uncovered at 350 for 25-30 minutes. ; name: sarah s chicken pot pie ; ingredients: low-fat cream of chicken soup, low-fat milk, honey, frozen vegetables, pie crust, cooked chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Open pie crusts and let sit out to soften. Spray pie pan with nonstick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl - mix soup, milk, honey, vegetables together. Unroll 1 crust into pie dish. Pour in mix. Unroll 2nd pie crust on top. Pinch edges together. Poke 5-8 knife marks in center of crusts. Bake at 350 for 75 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and enjoy. ; name: chicken and cheese pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: low fat citrus pound cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, mandarin orange sections, egg substitute, powdered sugar ; preparation:Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. ; name: grandma chin s sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, butter, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat eggs until light. Beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat in milk and butter. Add dry ingredients very quickly and pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake 25 to 35 minutes or until toothpick placed in middle comes out clean. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream. ; name: colonel sanders lemon sponge pie ; ingredients: pie crust, flour, butter, milk, sugar, egg yolks, salt, fresh lemon juice, lemons, rind of, egg whites ; preparation:Temper butter. Cream butter and sugar thoroughly. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites. Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Pour into unbaked pie crust and bake slowly in oven at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Reduce oven to 300 degrees f, until tests done - about 45 minutes. ; name: easy white cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, egg whites, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch. ; name: a quick and easy white cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, vegetable shortening, milk, vanilla, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done. ; name: moist crock pot lemon cake ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, eggs, water, sour cream, vegetable oil, white chocolate chips, almonds ; preparation:Spray a 4 quart crock pot with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. In a large bowl, combine the cake mix and pudding mix. In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the water, then add the sour cream and oil and beat until smooth. Add to the dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in the white chocolate chips and almonds. Pour into crock pot. Cover slow cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours, until top springs back when touched very lightly with finger. ; name: baked lemon pudding ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, eggs, butter, milk ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath. ; name: easy lemon sponge cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, lemon juice, lemon, rind of ; preparation:

name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired. ; name: rosemary beef and tomato over noodles ; ingredients: butter, onion, beef base, salt, pepper, beef stew meat, wide egg noodles, plum tomatoes, fresh rosemary ; preparation:In a 4-6 quart slow cooker, combine butter, onion, beef base, salt, pepper and beef. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low for 9-10 hours. About 15 minutes before serving, cook noodles as directed on package. Add tomatoes and rosemary to beef and mix well. Increase heat to high. Cover and cook an additonal 10 minutes. Serve beef over noodles. ; name: buttered noodles with garlic and sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, tomato paste, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in small sauce pan. Add garlic and cook under low heat for about five minutes. Add tomatoes and tomato paste and stir until well blended. Combine noodles, sauce and chopped parsley in a large bowl. Toss until well mixed. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately. ; name: simple hamburger hot dish ; ingredients: rotini pasta, lean ground beef, onion, garlic powder, salt, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, sugar, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees f., cook and drain pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet, cook beef, onion, garlic powder and salt over medium heat 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beef is thoroughly cooked. Drain. Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, sugar and pasta. Pour into ungreased 8-inch square glass baking dish. Cover dish with foil. Bake 30-40 minutes or until bubbly around edges. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake uncovered 5-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: zesty skillet supper ; ingredients: ground beef, chili beans, rice, salsa, vinegar, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown beef in large skillet with cover. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 25 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and simmer 5 more minutes. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: savoury noodle goulash ; ingredients: fat, ground beef, onions, celery, noodles, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown meat in fat. Add onions and celery and cook 10 minutes. Gently mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer or place in a buttered 2 qt casserole. Simmer 30 minutes, or bake at 350f for 45. ; name: super suppers beef and noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, ground beef, onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: chicken noodle soup ii ; ingredients: chicken pieces, rosemary, hot water, pepper, celery, salt, carrot, thin egg noodles, dried basil ; preparation:In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender. ; name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: cabbage noodles ; ingredients: linguine, green cabbage, chicken broth, salt and pepper, garlic powder, sour cream ; preparation:Cook noodles according to pkg. Directions. Drain. Meanwhile saute the cabbage in the chicken broth until tender, about 10 minutes. Add cooked noodles and mix well. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder to taste. Take the pan off the heat and fold in the sour cream. ; name: simple chinese noodles ; ingredients: fried chinese noodles, ginger, green onions, oil, oyster sauce, soya sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this. ; name: pasta with herb butter ; ingredients: linguine, butter, fresh parsley, garlic powder, oregano leaves, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook linguine according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in large pyrex measuring cup and blend in remaining ingredients except cheese. Place pasta and butter back into saucepan used to cook the pasta in. Cook pasta for two minutes until reheated. Stir constantly. Put cooked pasta into serving bowl topped with parmesan cheese. ; name: german noodle salad ; ingredients: pasta noodles, mayonnaise, green onions, gherkins, eggs, fresh parsley ; preparation:Mix all other ingredients in a salad bowl. If you prefer, add some vinegar from the gherkins to taste. You can also add more mayo. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 24 hours. Garnish with optional egg slices. ; name: garlic scallion noodles ; ingredients: noodles, butter, scallions, garlic cloves, brown sugar, soy sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse. In a heavy skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add scallions and garlic. Stir and cook without browning the garlic. Cook until the garlic smell is fragrant and filling the room. Add brown sugar and soy sauce and cook for another minute. Increase the heat a bit and throw in the noodles. Quickly saute the noodles until they are all coated with the garlicky butter mixture. Serve immediately. Garnish with additional scallions if desired. ; name: noodles herbs ; ingredients: egg noodles, thyme leaves, basil leaves, parsley, chives, butter ; preparation:

name: low fat cinnamon rolls ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, water, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix the first three ingredients together. Then mix in the water. Knead the dough on a firm surface. Take 2 tablespoons of dough and dip it in cinnamon. Roll it with a rolling pin. Bake at 450 degrees for 10 minutes. ; name: danish cinnamon bars ; ingredients: egg, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, vanilla, granulated sugar ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat egg. Add remaining ingredients except granulated sugar and mix well. Press dough into ungreased 13x9x2 inch pan. Sprinkle granulated sugar evenly over bars. Bake 15 to 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into bars. Cool completely. Remove from pan and store in airtight container. ; name: glazed crackers ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla extract, pecans, crackers, semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Arrange crackers on two baking sheets. In a small saucepan over medium heat on stovetop, combine butter and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for 3 minutes. Stir in vanilla and chopped pecans. Spoon pecan mixture over crackers. Bake at 325 degrees for 6 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle chocolate chips over crackers. Return to oven and bake for 2 minutes more, or until chocolate chips are melted. Remove from oven and let cool briefly. Using a spatula, transfer crackers to a serving plate or an airtight container. ; name: splenda spice cookies ; ingredients: egg beaters egg substitute, splenda brown sugar blend, ginger, cinnamon, allspice, pepper, flour, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Beat eggs in a mixing bowl. Add brown sugar, cinnamon, ginger, allspice and pepper. Combine baking soda, flour and salt in a seperate bowl. Gradually add to the sugar mixture. Drop tablespoon size portions on a lightly greased baking sheet 2 inches apart. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until the surface begins to crack. Cool on wire racks. ; name: saltine cracker cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, saltine crackers, chocolate chips, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line cookie sheet with foil. Place 40 crackers in one layer on cookie sheet. In saucepan on low heat, combine butter and brown sugar. Heat until blended. Boil 3 minutes. Pour mixture evenly over crackers. Sprinkle cracker centers with chocolate chips. Place in oven until chips melt. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cut while warm. Store on wax paper. ; name: golden cinnamon biscuits ; ingredients: butter, golden syrup, brown sugar, caster sugar, self-raising flour, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Combine butter, golden syrup and sugars in medium heavy-based pan, stir over low heat until butter is melted. Cool for 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cinnamon. Roll rounded teaspoons of mixture into balls, pleace about 2cm apart on greased oven trays, flatten with a floured fork until 1cm thick. Bake in hot oven for about 12 minutes or until browned. Stand 1 minute before lifting onto wire racks to cool. ; name: soda cracker candy ; ingredients: milk, sugar, peanut butter, vanilla, saltine crackers ; preparation:Crush saltines in plastic bag. Bring milk and sugar to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil exactly 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. Add crackers and mix well. Cool until thick enough to be spooned onto wax paper. Spoon silver-dollar sized onto was paper. Cool, remove from paper, and store in an airtight container. ; name: cinnamon crackers ; ingredients: flax seed meal, almond flour, splenda granular, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: lemon garlic roasted chicken thighs ; ingredients: skinless chicken pieces, lemons, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Spray a deep baking dish, or roaster with non stick spray. Combine 1 tbs of olive oil, the juice and zest of both lemons, plus the additional lemon juice, and the 4 cloves of garlic minced in a small bowl. Place the chicken in the roasting pan. Sprinkle liberally with the lemon pepper salt. Pour the lemon mixture over all- you can throw the lemon rinds into the baking dish too. Bake at 400 for about 45 minutes to an hour, turning the chicken over halfway through baking. I sometimes make this, and seal it in a ziplock bag in the freezer, then when you are ready, thaw, dump in the roaster and bake- just adding the lemon pepper salt. My family likes this when i take the sauce from the chicken, combine it with a small amount of half and half and serve it over pasta. ; name: ginger hot thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, red wine, gingerroot, ground cumin, chili powder, fresh parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet over medium heat, heat oil. Add chicken. Cook 7 to 8 minutes on each side, or until browned. In small bowl, combine onion, garlic, wine, ginger, cumin and chili powder. Add mixture to skillet. Partially cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook about 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is fork tender and liquid has been reduced to a glaze. To serve, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: grilled lime chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, dry tarragon, onion, hot sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place olive oil, lime juice, onion, tarragon, salt, and hot sauce into a large, resealable plastic bag. Shake to mix. Add chicken thighs, coat with marinade, squeeze out air, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil grate. Remove chicken from marinade, and shake off excess. Discard remaining marinade. Season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for about 30 minutes, or until no longer pink in the center. ; name: chicken wings in honey bbq sauce ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt and black pepper, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce, oil, garlic cloves ; preparation:Cut off and discard wing. Cut each wing at joint to make two sections. Season wings with salt and pepper, to taste. Place wings on broiler pan and broil about 6 inches from heat for 10 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer wings to slow cooker. Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. Pour over chicken wings. Cover and place slow cooker on high for 2 hour or low for 4 hours. ; name: tipsy chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, dry sherry, soy sauce, olive oil, roasted garlic, brown sugar, ground thyme ; preparation:Mix marinade ingredients well in a large ziploc bag. Add chicken thighs and coat. Squeeze out as much air as possible and marinate for 2-3 hours in the fridge. Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat and remove thighs from marinade. Discard marinade. Grill thighs for approximately 7-8 minutes per side or until cooked through. ; name: honey balsamic chicken satay great for camping ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, honey, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, ranch dressing ; preparation:Cut each chicken breast into 3 or 4 long strips. Combine all other ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until combined. Place chicken in ziploc bag and add marinade. Marinate for at least one hour. Thread chicken onto bamboo skewers. Grill over medium to hot coals or fire until juices run clear. ; name: baked buffalo thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, vegetable oil, hot sauce, margarine, water, white vinegar, pepper, cooking spray, blue cheese ; preparation:Coat a non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Add oil. Place over medium-high heat until hot. Add chicken. Cook 4 minutes on each side. Transfer to an 11x7 baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine hot sauce and next four ingredients. Pour over chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 400 for 25 minutes. Serve with blue cheese dressing. ; name: sweet bbq chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thigh, honey, garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: easy broccoli and rice ; ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, water, milk, rice, frozen broccoli florets, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all the ingredients except the cheese in a 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and put in the oven until rice is tender. Remove from oven and add cheese to taste, wait about 2 minutes or until cheese has melted - there will be a little liquid left, you can let it sit longer for the rice to absorb it. Serve and enjoy. ; name: healthy cheesy broccoli casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, flour, low-fat milk, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, mustard, dried onion flakes, reduced-fat cheese, broccoli, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Stir the flour, milk, chicken broth, mustard, and onion flakes in a glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-6 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, steam the broccoli for about 4 minutes. Mix the cheese into the cream sauce. Put the broccoli and diced chicken in a 9 x 13 pan. Pour the cheese sauce over the top. Mix the cornflakes and parmesan together, and pour over the top. Broil until golden brown. ; name: cheesy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, plain flour, ground black pepper, unsalted butter, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dry white wine, dried oregano ; preparation:Beat fillets between 2 sheets of waxed paper until 5mm thick. Cut each slice of cheese in half and place 1 half on top of each fillet. Starting with short end tightly roll up fillets. Tie with kitchen string. On waxed paper, mix flour and pepper. Add chicken and toss gently. In a non-stick fry pan melt butter over medium heat. Add chicken fillets and fry turning occasionaly until golden about 3 minutes. Add chicken stock, wine and dried oregano. Increase heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened about 10-12 minutes. ; name: easy cheesy mexican rice ; ingredients: chicken broth, chunky salsa, instant rice, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Mix broth and salsa in medium saucepan. Bring to boil. Add rice and velveeta. Stir. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minute. Stir until velveeta is melted. ; name: broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, minute rice, salt, water, fresh broccoli, cheez whiz, chicken mushroom soup, corn flake crumbs ; preparation:Saute onions in butter. Add rice and brown with the onions about 5 minutes. Add salt and water and cover until water is absorbed. Mix rice, cooked broccoli, cheez whiz, and soup together and pour mixture into a large well greased casserole. Top with corn flake crumbs browned in a little butter. Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes. ; name: easy cheesy broccoli soup ; ingredients: frozen cut broccoli in cheese sauce, margarine, onion, flour, parsley flakes, instant chicken bouillon, garlic powder, water, milk ; preparation:Place unopened broccoli pouch in vigorously boiling water in saucepan. Do not cover. Bring water to a second vigorous boil and heat for 16 minutes. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan, melt margarine. Saute onion in margarine until tender. Stir in flour, parsley flakes, bouillon and garlic powder until well blended. Add water and milk. Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Stir in broccoli. ; name: layered chicken broccoli casserole no canned soup ; ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, sour cream, onion, cheddar cheese, sliced water chestnuts, ritz crackers, butter ; preparation:Line bottom of 9x13 glass baking dish with cooked broccoli. Top broccoli with cut-up cooked chicken. Stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, and chopped onion and spread this mixture over broccoli. Sprinkle the cheese over the previous layer, then layer with the sliced water chestnuts. For topping, combine the ritz cracker crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle over the casserole. Bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve hot. ; name: chic broc chee rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, onion, butter, instant rice, cream of chicken soup, milk, garlic salt, pepper, provolone cheese ; preparation:

name: yankee potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, fresh dill, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes whole for about 20-30 minutes or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain and cool completely. Large dice the potatoes. Plece in a bowl with enough room for stirring. Add the remaining ingrdients, using salt and pepper to taste. Stir and chill until ready to serve. Feel free to add more sour cream if salad seems dry. ; name: easy loaded baked potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, salt & pepper, sour cream, cheddar cheese, green onions, bacon bits ; preparation:Cut potatoes into bite sized pieces. Boil for about 12 minutes or until fork tender. Drain potatoes and allow to cool completely. Add remaining ingredients. All of which can be adjusted to your liking. ; name: potato nuggets with dill cream ; ingredients: potatoes, fresh dill, butter, heavy cream, salt & pepper ; preparation:Steam or boil your new potatoe nuggets until cooked. Melt butter in a skillet, add potatoes, toss to coat. Mix dill into the cream. Pour dilled cream over the potatoes and continue cooking over medium-low heat until the cream has turned into an almost golden sauce, stir frequently. Season to taste. ; name: authentic german potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, bacon, onion, water, white vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, parsley ; preparation:Place the potatoes in a pot, with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain, set aside to cool. Place the bacon in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until browned and crisp. Remove and set aside. Add onion to the bacon grease, and cook over medium heat until browned. Add the vinegar, water, sugar, salt and pepper to the pan. Bring to a boil, then add potatoes and parsley. Crumble half the bacon into the mix. Heat through, transfer to a serving dish. Crumble the remaining bacon over the top and serve warm. ; name: three potato salad ; ingredients: russet potatoes, red potatoes, sweet potato, onion, miracle whip, sugar, white vinegar, salt, dill weed, pepper ; preparation:Place all the potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 20-30 minutes. Drain and cool. Place potatoes in a large bowl and add onion. In a small bowl combine all the remaining ingredients and stir well. Pour over potato mixture and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours before serving. ; name: the ultimate baked potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, onion, cooked bacon, red bell pepper, black olives ; preparation:Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. ; name: cooked potato or pasta salad dressing ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, ground mustard, eggs, water, half-and-half, white vinegar, black pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad. ; name: red skin potato and dill salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, fresh dill, celery, onion, garlic, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: three can bean salad ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, dried rosemary, corn kernels, black beans, ham ; preparation:In medium-sized bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, and rosemary. Add drained corn and beans. Break ham into chunks with fork. Add to bowl. Toss all ingredients together. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: simple italian bean salad ; ingredients: spring onions, garlic cloves, red chile, cannellini beans, butter beans, olive oil, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the spring onions, garlic and chili. Add the three cans of beans and mix thoroughly. Whisk together the olive oil and white wine vinegar and season. Drizzle over the bean salad and stir in with the parsley. Serve straight away or refrigerate until ready. ; name: green bean cherry tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, shallot, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the green beans and cook about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside on a towel to cool. In large bowl, stir together shallot, vinegar, salt and pepper. Set aside for 15 minutes, then whisk in oil. Add cherry tomatoes and toss. Add beans and basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning. ; name: middle eastern bean salad with parsley and lemon balela ; ingredients: black beans, garbanzo beans, green onion, chopped tomatoes, fresh parsley, lemon juice, puree, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pour chick peas and black beans one at a time into colander placed in sink, rinse well until no more foam appears and let drain. Blot dry if they seem too wet. While beans are draining, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, garlic and let the flavors blend. Mix the salad ingredients together and let it marinate at room temperature for at least 30 minutes. Chop green onions, tomatoes and parsly and add to bowl. Combine this with the beans. Whisk dressing ingredients and gently add dressing to bean mixture. Add salt and pepper. ; name: white bean and roasted vegetable spread ; ingredients: red pepper, onion, garlic, cannellini beans, parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil and place the pepper and onion in rows on the foil. Broil the vegetables for 5-7 minutes or until slightly charred, and remove the cookie sheet from the oven. Flip over the vegetables, add the cloves of garlic to the cookie sheet. Return the cookie sheet to the oven and broil an additional 5-7 minutes to slightly char the other side. Allow the vegetables to cool slightly and then gently remove the skin from the peppers. In a food processor or blender, place the roasted vegetables, white beans, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and process until smooth. Add the parsley and process for an additional 30 seconds to thoroughly incorporate it. Transfer the mixture to a glass bowl. Use as a spread on crackers, bread, or sandwiches, or serve with raw vegetables. ; name: roasted corn and pepper salad ; ingredients: white shoepeg corn, red bell pepper, olive oil, green onions, sugar, cumin, salt, lime juice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: warmed herbed potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, rice wine vinegar, dry white wine, dijon mustard, salt, ground pepper, red onion, fresh parsley, fresh herbs ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender. While potatoes are cooking, combine olive oil, rice wine vinegar, wine if using, mustard, salt and pepper in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When potatoes are tender peel or not. Dice potatoes. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave. ; name: hot white bean salad ; ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, white beans, fresh parsley, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken and mushroom soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast, sesame oil, chicken stock, sherry wine, fresh mushrooms, fresh parsley ; preparation:Thinly slice the chicken breast meat. Bring the chicken stock to a rolling boil and add the chicken and mushrooms. When the soup starts to boil again and all of the ingredients float to the top, remove from the heat. Add the sesame oil and sherry and taste for seasoning. Add salt and pepper if necessary. Serve in individual soup bowls and sprinkle the parsley on top. ; name: chinese style noodle and pork soup ; ingredients: noodles, cabbage, cooked pork, green onion, low sodium chicken broth, white mushroom, fresh gingerroot, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired. ; name: asian pork and noodle soup ; ingredients: boneless pork sirloin, garlic cloves, gingerroot, chicken broth, water, soy sauce, fine egg noodles, carrot, red bell pepper, fresh spinach leaves ; preparation:Spray 3-quart saucepan with cooking spray. Heat over medium-high heat. Add pork, garlic and gingerroot. Stir-fry 3 to 5 minutes or until pork is brown. Stir in broth, water and soy sauce. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 5 minutes. Stir in noodles, carrot and bell pepper. Simmer uncovered about 10 minutes or until noodles are tender. Stir in spinach. Cook until heated through. ; name: chinese soup ; ingredients: oil, mushrooms, water, garlic clove, ramen noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, green onion ; preparation:Fry mushrooms, and garlic in oil. Add water and the flavour packs from the instant noodles. Bring to a boil. Add the noodles. Simmer 3 minutes. Add onions and your choice of any garnishes. ; name: spanish chickpea soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, carrot, chickpeas, vegetable stock, salt and pepper, bay leaf, butter, lemon juice ; preparation:Add oil and onions to a medium saucepan and saute on low heat, stirring, until very well done. Add the carrot and chickpeas, and saute for 2 minutes, stirring continuously. Add stock and bring to boil. Add seasonings and simmer on low until veggies are tender, adding water if necessary and stirring on occasion. Remove bay leaf and puree soup. Add butter and lemon juice. Simmer until heated through. Serve hot. ; name: portabella mushroom soup ww friendly ; ingredients: olive oil flavored cooking spray, red onion, garlic cloves, portabella mushrooms, chicken stock cubes, water, chives ; preparation:Saute the onion and garlic until they are soft. I put a lid on the pan and added a splash of water to keep them from sticking. When softened, add the mushrooms and saute until they are soft. When the veggies are all cooked down add the stock cubes and the 4 cups of water and bring to a boil, stirring. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Puree the soup with an immersion blender. Garnish with fresh chopped chives if you like, or as mentioned stir in some ff sour cream or a little reduced fat feta. ; name: egg flower soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, eggs, dried chinese mushrooms, salt, msg, frozen peas ; preparation:Boil chicken broth, ginger and green onion 2 minutes. Add salt, msg, mushrooms and frozen peas. Cook 5 minutes. Pour soup slowly into serving bowl containing eggs. Stir gently. Serve hot. ; name: shiitake mushroom soup ; ingredients: shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, olive oil, chicken stock, water, soba noodles, spinach, soy sauce, lime juice ; preparation:

name: baked rigatoni with sausage ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, broccoli florets, hot italian sausage, onion, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding broccoli during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook sausage and onion over medium heat until meat is brown and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in marinara sauce. Heat through. Stir meat sauce and cheeses into the cooked pasta. Transfer to a lightly greased 3-quart rectangular casserole dish. Bake, covered, at 375 for 20-25 degrees or until mixture is heated through. ; name: sausage cavatelli with broccoli rabe ; ingredients: italian sausages, pasta shells, garlic, broccoli rabe, chicken broth, butter, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute sausage, breaking into small pieces. Remove from pan. Pour off excess grease. Cut rabe into bite size pieces and saute in olive oil. Add garlic and saute another minute or two. Add chicken broth and simmer until rabe is tender. Add butter and cooked sausage to pan. Stir until butter is melted. Pour over cooked shells. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: summer slumgullion ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, tomatoes, zucchini, yellow squash, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large skillet. Add onions and saute until just a little soft. Add zucchini, tomatoes, and yellow squash and cook, stirring occasionally, until the squash is soft and the tomatoes liquefying. Top with parmesan cheese and allow to melt. Serve, perhaps with brown rice or as a side dish. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: italian sausage onion pizza ; ingredients: sausage, bell pepper, pizza sauce, prepared pizza crust, fried onions, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: polish sausage and cabbage ; ingredients: head of cabbage, potato, salt, caraway seed, onion, chicken broth ; preparation:Place sliced cabbage in crockpot. Toss with diced potato, salt and caraway seed. Add sliced onion and polish sausage. Pour chicken broth over all. Stir lightly. Cover and cook on low setting for 8 to 10 hours. ; name: sausage and summer squash ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, garlic cloves, polish sausage, summer squash, italian bread, oregano leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: italian rice and peas ; ingredients: fresh peas, long grain rice, onion, celery, dry white wine, boiling water, chicken stock cubes, butter, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste. ; name: egg fried rice ; ingredients: frozen peas, eggs, sesame oil, peanut oil, cooked rice, salt, pepper, spring onions, fresh bean sprouts ; preparation:Thaw frozen peas. Drain in colander. Combine eggs and sesame oil in a small bowl and set aside. Heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the oil and when it is hot and slightly smoking, turn the heat to medium and add the eggs. Stir fry the eggs for 2 minutes, then add the cooked rice and stir fry for 3 minutes, mixing well. Then add the peas, salt and pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes over high heat. Add spring onions and bean sprouts and stir fry for 2 minutes. Turn onto a platter and serve at once. ; name: brown rice split pea laf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, brown rice, vegetable broth, lemon juice, split peas, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot. ; name: easy vegetable rice medley ; ingredients: oil, onion, carrot, celery rib, red pepper, chicken broth, minute white rice, frozen peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas. ; name: white bean parsley and garlic mash ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, vegetable stock, flat leaf parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the onion gently for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 mins until soft. Add the stock or water to loosen. Stir in the parsley and seasoning. Serve. ; name: peas chickpeas and cumin ; ingredients: chickpeas, peas, garlic cloves, cumin, butter, black pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a pan. Add garlic and cumin and saut for 1 minute. Add chickpeas and saut until heated through. Add peas. Season with black pepper and serve hot. ; name: basic rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, rice, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in saucepan and cook onion over medium heat until golden. Stir in rice and cook for 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in chicken stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in parsley. ; name: parsleyed rice with peas ; ingredients: butter, onions, rice, water, bay leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, frozen peas, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: summer squash saute ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic, fresh tarragon, crookneck yellow squash, zucchini ; preparation:Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic and tarragon. Saute until onion is just tender, about 2 minutes. Add yellow squash and zucchini. Saute until crisp-tender, about 8 minutes or less. Season with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: sweet savory butternut squash and wild rice saut ; ingredients: butternut squash, cooked wild rice, green beans, garlic cloves, shallot, olive oil, thyme, sage, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Warm oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Place green beans and shallots in pan and cook 3 minutes. Add garlic, squash and herbs. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until beans are crisp but tender. Add rice and cook until heated through. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Spray cut surface with olive oil, and place cut side up on a baking pan. Place pan on center rack in a preheated 400f oven and roast 45 minutes, until fork-tender. When squash is cool enough to handle, scoop out flesh and cut into cubes. ; name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: sun dried tomato risotto ; ingredients: chicken stock, olive oil, diced onion, garlic, arborio rice, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sun-dried tomato ; preparation:Heat the stock in a saucepan and keep hot over low heat. Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a separate medium-sized pot. Add the onion and cook until it turns translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook 1 minute more. Add the rice to the onion mixture, stir and turn the heat to low. Add about 1 cup of the hot stock to the rice mixture, and stir slowly until the stock is absorbed. Continue to add the stock 1 cup at a time, stirring slowly, letting the rice absorb the stock before adding more. The risotto is cooked when it is creamy on the outside and slightly firm in the center, about 20 to 25 minutes in all. Stir in half of the parmesan cheese and half of the sun-dried tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. If the risotto is too thick, add a little more stock until it becomes creamy. Divide the risotto into serving dishes and sprinkle with the remaining cheese and sun-dried tomatoes. ; name: savoy cabbage risotto ; ingredients: savoy cabbage, onions, vegetable broth, olive oil, butter, risotto rice, white wine, camembert cheese, dill, pepper ; preparation:Prepare the savoy cabbage, remove the stalk and cut the leaves into small strips. Peel and dice the onions. In a large pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion dices and saute them. Then add the savoy cabbage together with the rice and saute for another three minutes, stirring occasionally. Deglaze with white wine, let simmer for about two minutes and then add half of the broth. Let simmer on medium heat for about 20 minutes, stirring frequently and adding the rest of the broth by and by. When the rice has soaked up nearly all the liquid, add the red camembert and the butter. Season with dill and pepper to taste. If you want to you can also top the risotto with some chopped walnuts. ; name: crookneck squash medley ; ingredients: yellow squash, onion, frozen corn, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Saut the onion in butter until almost translucent. Add the squash and cook until tender. Add one half of a bag of frozen corn. Salt and pepper to taste. Cook to desired doneness. ; name: mushroom risotto in pressure cooker ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, portabella mushrooms, arborio rice, chicken broth, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:In a presssure cooker, heat 4tbs olive oil and 2 tbs butter. Add onion and garlic. Saute until translucent. Add portabella and rice. Stir until rice is coated with oil. Add chicken broth. Cover and cook under high pressure for 7 minutes. Release pressure and add remaining 2 tbs of butter. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: weight watchers ww roasted squash risotto ; ingredients: butternut squash, fresh rosemary, red onion, risotto rice, vegetable stock, garlic cloves, light cream cheese, balsamic vinegar, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: pecan delight pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, vanilla, granulated sugar, brown sugar, soda crackers, pecan pieces ; preparation:Beat egg whites to foam. Add salt and cream of tartar. Beat to stiff peaks. Add vanilla extract and both sugars. Beat until consistency of 7 minute frosting. Fold in crackers and nuts. Grease bottom and sides of pyrex dish and add mixture to dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. Top with cool whip or whipped cream when pie is completely cool, or slice and add topping on individual slices when serving. ; name: amazing coconut pie ; ingredients: milk, sugar, biscuit mix, eggs, butter, vanilla, flaked coconut ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool. ; name: peanut pecan pie ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter morsels, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir well. Stir in pecans and all the chocolate and peanut butter morsels. Pour filling into graham cracker crust. Bake at 325f for 1 hour or until set. Cool on rack. ; name: granny s coconut pie ; ingredients: frozen pie crusts, milk, flaked coconut, sugar, vanilla, eggs, butter ; preparation:Put coconut in a bowl. Pour milk over and set aside. Cream butter and sugar, add eggs one at a time till mixed well. Add vanilla. Stir in coconut and milk. Poke thawed crusts well with a fork. Pour batter evenly into the two crusts. Bake at 350 for 30 to 40 mins or till center is almost set and pie is golden brown. ; name: reese s cup pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, peanut butter, milk, chocolate pudding mix ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl with mixer on low. Cream peanutbutter until soft. Gradually add milk while continuely to mix. When all milk is mixed with peanutbutter, add pudding mix and continue to blend until ingredients are smooth and combined well. Pour mix into baked shell, chill at least 4 hours. ; name: ny times pecan pie ; ingredients: pie shell, dark corn syrup, sugar, salt, eggs, margarine, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375, parbake pie shell until golden. In a saucepan, bring the corn syrup, sugar and salt to a boil over high heat until the sugar dissolves. Very slowly, pour in a thin stream into the beaten eggs while stirring vigorously. Add the vanilla, margarine and pecans to the mixture and pour into prepared pie shell. Bake for 50 minutes or until puffed. ; name: pecan pie award winning ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, sugar, light corn syrup, dark corn syrup, butter, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Defrost frozen pie crust. Combine eggs and next 5 ingredients. Stir in pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool on a rack. 1 frozen deep-dish pastry shell may be substituted. ; name: chocolate turtle pie ; ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, butter, pecans, milk chocolate, graham cracker pie crusts, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:

name: warm chorizo and thyme lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chorizo sausages, celery, garlic cloves, thyme, green lentils, chicken stock, salt and pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: steamed lentils with saffron ; ingredients: brown lentils, olive oil, onion, prosciutto, dry white wine, saffron thread, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Rinse the lentils well. Heat the vegetable stock in a small pot. Meanwhile, in a different medium pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 8 minutes, then add the prosciutto and cook for a few more minutes. Add the lentils, cook for another 2-3 minutes, and pour the white wine. Add the saffron and cook until the alcohol has evaporated, 4-5 minutes. Add the stock, salt to taste, and cook over low heat for 50 minutes to 1 hour, covered. Add water or more stock if necessary. ; name: lentils with chorizo red wine ; ingredients: green lentils, onions, garlic clove, chicken stock, red wine vinegar, red wine, chorizo sausage, parsley, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry the onion and garlic in a little oil then add the lentils, red wine, stock, vinegar and thyme. Simmer gently for 30 minutes until tender, add the chorizo for the last 5 minutes of cooking time. Season with salt and pepper. Stir through the parsley. Serve with lots of crusty bread. ; name: lentil burgers vegetarian ; ingredients: red lentil, celery, carrots, water, curry powder, all-purpose flour, egg whites, dried breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine lentils, celery, carrot, water, curry powder in a pan and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for approx 20 minutes or until the mixture has thickened. Remove from heat and cool. Stir in 2 cups of breadcrumbs. Shape the mixture into 8 burger patties. Toss them in the flour, dip in the egg white and cover with the remaining breadcrumbs. Heat the oil in a non-stick pan. Add the burgers and cook until well browned on both sides. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve on a bun as a burger or as a meal with a salad on the side. ; name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: brown lentil and vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, carrots, zucchini, celery, brown onion, diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, brown lentils, flat leaf parsley, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: rustic red lentil soup only 4 ingredients ; ingredients: onion, red lentil, chicken bouillon cubes, tomato paste, water ; preparation:Cook onions until very soft, in a medium size pot, with a little extra virgin olive oil. Add chicken cubes, lentils, and tomato paste. Turn the heat on high and add 8 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 30 minutes and soup has reduced significantly. Serve warm with italian crusty bread or flatbreads. ; name: ranch style lentils ; ingredients: dry lentils, salt, water, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, ketchup, prepared mustard, vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: potato egg bake ; ingredients: butter, onion, frozen hash browns, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Cook, drain and crumble bacon. Melt butter or margarine in a skillet. Add onions and hash browns. Cook and stir until potatoes are lightly browned. Grease a 9x13 inch pan and place hash browns in the bottom of the pan. Beat eggs, milk and salt and pepper 1- 2 minutes. Stir in grated cheese and bacon. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees 45-50 minutes, until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: kielbasa and potato bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, milk, kielbasa, salt, ground black pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: european kraut soup ; ingredients: mushroom, sauerkraut, onion, water, butter, flour, paprika ; preparation:Cook mushrooms in 1 quart of water for 30 minutes. Add kraut and cook for another 25 minutes. Lightly brown onion in 1 tablespoon butter and add to soup. In a saucepan, melt remaining butter. Whisk in flour and lightly brown. Add flour mixture to mushrooms, kraut and onions. Cook 1 -2 minutes longer. Add salt to taste. Top each serving with a dash of paprika. ; name: paprika potato wedges ; ingredients: baking potatoes, vegetable oil, paprika, salt ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. ; name: twice baked potatoes with cream cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, onion salt, butter, fresh ground pepper, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes. ; name: cheesy potato slices ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, paprika, pepper, potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine soup paprika and pepper. Place potatoes in a 2 quart baking dish. Sprinkle with the cheese. Spoon soup mixture over the cheese and potatoes. Cover. Bake at 400 degrees for 45 minutes. Uncover. Bake 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork. ; name: creamy mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, garlic, butter, paprika ; preparation:Peel and boil potatoes until soft. Drain potatoes, and mash. Add cream cheese, sour cream, and minced garlic to potatoes and mix until smooth. Grease a 13x9 baking dish and add mashed potatoes. Set the 4 pats of butter in various spots on top of potatoes, sprinkle with paparika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: kilasara potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion ; preparation:

name: mexican tuna salad ; ingredients: albacore tuna in water, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapeno peppers, salt, boston lettuce, baked corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips. ; name: tuna with pineapple and peppers ; ingredients: tuna steaks, pineapple ring, low sodium soy sauce, garlic, fresh ginger, red bell pepper, green bell pepper ; preparation:In small bowl stir together the soy sauce, garlic, pineapple juice and ginger. Place the tune steaks in a shallow dish and pour half the marinade over them. Flip to coat both sides. Place the peppers and pineapple in another dish and cover with remaining marinade. Toss lightly to coat. Cover both dishes and marinate in refrigerator for at least an hour. Coat broiler pan with non-stick cooking spray. Place the tuna steaks, pineapple and peppers on pan and broil for approximately 4-5 minutes per side. You may use the marinade from the pineapple and peppers to baste while cooking. Do not use the marinade from the tuna. ; name: tuna brandade ; ingredients: potatoes, skim milk, garlic cloves, shallot, tuna in water, white wine vinegar, olive oil, dill sprigs, crostini ; preparation:Peel and cut the potatoes into 1. 5cm cubes, place in a saucepan with milk, garlic and eschalot, then bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 mins until potato is soft. Remove pan from heat, then add tuna to potato mixture. Mash gently with a fork but still leavequite chunky. Add the vinegar, oil and half the dill sprigs, then stir to combine. Serve on crostini with remaining dill. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: honey glazed sesame tuna ; ingredients: honey, soy sauce, fresh lemon juice, whole grain dijon mustard, water, horseradish, canola oil, tuna steaks, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush sesame seed with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice. ; name: spicy tuna gourmet ribbon sandwiches ; ingredients: tuna, cream cheese, green capsicum, red capsicum, margarine, white sandwich loaf, whole wheat sandwich loaf ; preparation:Spread a slice of white bread with margarine, top with spicy tuna. Spread a slice of wholemeal bread with margarine and cover. Top this layer with cream cheese mixed with finely chopped capsicums and top again with a slice of white bread. Cut off the crusts as accurately as possible, and then cut long ways into three and then in half. Makes almost both loaves of sandwich bread. You can also mix and match using wholegrain loaf. Garnish sandwiches on a tray with parsley and serve. ; name: caribbean grilled tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, lime juice, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:

name: oven baked beans for 2 ; ingredients: bacon, onion, baked beans, ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes. ; name: barbecued butter beans ; ingredients: butter beans, ketchup, dark corn syrup, liquid smoke, hot sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Drain butter beans and pour into pan. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Bake for 1 hour or until brown and bubbling. ; name: german style beans ; ingredients: bacon, onions, green beans, vinegar, sugar ; preparation:Fry bacon until crisp. Drain and save approx 1 tbsp bacon drippings in skillet. Add onion and saut until tender. Add beans. Vinegar, and sugar. Heat until hot. Heat until hot. Serve. ; name: sweet savory gourmet baked beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, ground sirloin, bacon, lipton onion soup mix, heinz ketchup, white karo, light brown sugar, ground cumin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in large skillet, brown ground sirloin, breaking apart as you cook. Drain. Remove sirloin and set aside. In same skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Drain grease. In a large bowl combine all remaining ingredients until well blended. Add sirloin to mixture and crumble bacon in last. Mix lightly. Transfer mixture to 9x13 inch baking dish and bake for 2 hours at 350f. ; name: bacony beans ; ingredients: bacon, sweet onion, pork and beans, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, molasses ; preparation:Brown bacon in skillet till crispy. Set aside. Pour off all but a thin layer of the bacon fat and cook onion till soft. In large casserole dish, combine remaining ingredients and then add bacon, onion and the fat left in the skillet. Mix thoroughly and bake in a 375 oven for 45 minutes. ; name: beans and bacon ; ingredients: bacon, baked beans in tomato sauce, onion, green pepper, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, salsa, mustard ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp. Drain well. Turn into slow cooker. Add remaining ingredients. Stir. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 7 hours. ; name: three dollar baked beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, black beans, onion, smoked bacon, catsup, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, white sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown bacon until crisp then drain on paper towels. Cook onions in bacon drippings until translucent. Drain any excess fat from pan. Add beans, catsup, barbecue sauce, sugars and bacon to pan. Stir and pour into a baking pan. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: margaret lefever s wonderful baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, brown sugar, catsup, barbecue sauce, dry mustard, bacon ; preparation:

name: strawberry melon avocado salad ; ingredients: honey, sherry wine vinegar, of fresh mint, fresh ground pepper, salt, baby spinach, avocado, cantaloupe, strawberries, sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk honey, vinegar, mint, pepper and salt in a small bowl. Divide spinach among 4 salad plates. Arrange alternating slices of avocado and cantaloupe in a fan on top of the spinach. Top each salad with strawberries, drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Add sesame seeds and stir constantly until golden and fragrant, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a small bowl and let cool. ; name: chicken avocado salad ; ingredients: avocados, hard-boiled eggs, cooked chicken, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Scoop the pulp out of the avocado shells, reserving the shells. Dice pulp. Combine the chicken, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise and hot pepper sauce in a large bowl. Salt and pepper to taste. Add the diced avocado pulp to the chicken mixture and toss gently. Fill avocado shells with chicken mixture and top with egg slices. Serve on a bed of lettuce leaves. ; name: tomato rice salad with avocado and corn ; ingredients: tomatoes, corn, cooked rice, avocado, fresh lemon juice, salt, garlic, fresh ginger, fresh cilantro, olive oil ; preparation:Combine the tomato, corn, and rice. In a second bowl, toss the avocado in one tsp lemon juice, and then add to the other ingredients. In a third bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons lemon juice, salt, garlic, ginger, and cilantro. Slowly whisk in the oil. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and rice, and toss gently. ; name: cucumber and avocado salad ; ingredients: english seedless cucumber, sweet red pepper, salt, lettuce, chili pepper, avocado, fresh lime juice, fresh parsley, onion ; preparation:Peel and slice the cucumber paper-thin. Season with salt, chili pepper and lime juice. Sprinkle with onion and red pepper slices. Arrange lettuce on 6 serving plates. Pile cucumber mixture in center of each plate. Add avocado slices and parsley. 6 servings. ; name: orange salad with olives mint ; ingredients: red onion, navel oranges, olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, of fresh mint, kosher salt, black olives ; preparation:Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes, drain. Meanwhile, peel oranges as directed above, making sure as much of the white pith as possible is removed. Slice, crosswise as thinly as possible and save any juice that accumulates from the slicing. Lay the oranges in a spiral on a platter. Combine the oil, lemon and orange juice with salt, mint and any of the accumulated orange juice. Toss the onion slices over the oranges. Spread the dressing over both evenly. Then sprinkle with olives. ; name: citrus salad ; ingredients: ruby grapefruits, oranges, sugar, cinnamon stick, mint leaves ; preparation:Peel and remove the pith form the grapefruit and oranges. Carefully cut out the segments and mix together in a bowl. Put the sugar, cinnamon stick and mint leaves in a small pan with 3 tablespoons of water and sitr over low heat until sugar has dissolved. Remove the cinnamon stick and mint, and drizzle the syrup over the fruit. Garnish with fresh mint leaves. This salad can be kept in the refrigerator for up to 2 days and the flavor will actually improve as it develops. ; name: avocado orange and purple onion salad ; ingredients: navel oranges, avocado, purple onion, salt, light olive oil, dried italian seasoning ; preparation:With a sharp knife, cut the skin and all the white pith off the oranges. Working over a small bowl to catch the juice, segment the orange slices, cutting on either side of each segment to release it from the membrane. Arrange for great presentation in a salad bowl. Halve, pit, and peel the avocado and cut crosswise into thin slices. Add the salad bowl. Separate the onion slices into rings. Arrange in the bowl with tor orange segments and avocado slices. In a small bowl, whisk together the salt, 1 tablespoon the reserved orange juice, the oil and the bergs,. Immediately pour over the salad and serve at once. ; name: tangy avocado orange salad ; ingredients: oranges, red leaf lettuce, avocado, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: creamy italian crock pot chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces ; preparation:Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hours longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles. ; name: tomato crouton casserole ; ingredients: tomatoes, bread, butter, salt, dried basil, thyme, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Arrange tomatoes in a greased dish. Top with bread cubes. Combine butter, salt, basil& thyme. Drizzle over bread. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until light brown. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, black beans, rotel, black olives, corn, salsa, onion, garlic cloves, sea salt ; preparation:Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Add all other ingredients. Cook on high for 5-6 hours. Remove chicken and shred with two forks. Return chicken to crock pot, reduce to low, and cook for 1-2 hours. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & pepper, onion powder, red enchilada sauce, condensed cheddar cheese soup, black beans, chili powder, cream cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Place breasts in a large crock-pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the enchilada sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove the chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: crock pot chops ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, minced garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, rice ; preparation:Brown pork chops in oil if desired. I never do this step. Place chops in crock pot. Add to crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for 6 hours. Remove the chops carefully as they will fall apart quite easily. Combine cornstarch and cold water. Gradually stir cornstarch into the sauce in crock pot. Put the chops back into the crock pot and cook 20 to 30 minutes longer until sauce thickens. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: crock pot hoisin chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, hoisin sauce, plum sauce, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, lime, juice of, cornstarch, salt and pepper, fresh garlic ; preparation:Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the chicken to the mixture. Coat well. Put all ingredients in the slow cooker. Cook for 5-6 hours, or until chicken is tender. Serve with rice. ; name: crock pot herbed chicken and shrimp ; ingredients: salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, onion, tomato sauce, white wine, garlic clove, dried basil, medium shrimp ; preparation:Combine salt and pepper and rub over the chicken pieces. In a skillet, brown chicken on all sides in butter. Transfer chicken to crock pot. In a bowl combine the onion, tomato sauce, wine or broth, garlic and basil and pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the shrimp. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. ; name: crock pot chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, deli ham, cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: mandarin jell o salad ; ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, lemon juice, mandarin oranges, pineapple tidbits, orange sherbet, miniature marshmallow, whipped topping ; preparation:Add lemon juice to boiling water, then add water to jell-o. Stir in sherbet until dissolved. Mix oranges, pineapple, marshmallows and whipped topping together. Fold into mixture. Chill for two hours. ; name: citrus salad ; ingredients: ruby grapefruits, oranges, sugar, cinnamon stick, mint leaves ; preparation:Peel and remove the pith form the grapefruit and oranges. Carefully cut out the segments and mix together in a bowl. Put the sugar, cinnamon stick and mint leaves in a small pan with 3 tablespoons of water and sitr over low heat until sugar has dissolved. Remove the cinnamon stick and mint, and drizzle the syrup over the fruit. Garnish with fresh mint leaves. This salad can be kept in the refrigerator for up to 2 days and the flavor will actually improve as it develops. ; name: asian salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, head of cabbage ; preparation:Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh. ; name: orange salad with olives mint ; ingredients: red onion, navel oranges, olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, of fresh mint, kosher salt, black olives ; preparation:Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes, drain.
