Combine squash and next 6 ingredients in large roasting pan. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roast until squash is tender and sausage heated thoroughly, stirring once, about 30 minutes. Drizzle with vinegar and serve. ; name: homemade butternut squash soup ; ingredients: butternut squash, vegetable broth, onion, carrots, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ground black pepper, half-and-half ; preparation:

name: baked fish with orange sauce ; ingredients: white fish fillets, orange juice, butter, orange rind, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish in baking pan. Mix orange juice and butter. Pour half this mixture over the fish. Sprinkle the rind over. Bake for 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange mixture over. Bake another 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: sea bass and shrimp marinated in lime juice ; ingredients: sea bass, raw small shrimp, lime juice, garlic, salt, serrano chili, celery ribs, red onion, fresh cilantro, vegetable oil ; preparation:Put the fish and shrimp in a glass bowl. Add in the lime juice, garlic, salt, and serrano peppers. Stir to combine. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours. Add in the celery, onion, cilantro, and oil. Stir to combine. Refrigerate 30 minutes more. Serve at once. ; name: soused fish ; ingredients: mullet fillets, brown onion, olive oil, salt, white vinegar ; preparation:Lay out the fish fillets in the bottom of a casserole dish. Sprinkle the salt on top. Slice the onion into rings and spread on top. Pour the oil on top. Add enough vinegar to just cover the fish fillets. Cover dish and cook for one hour at 180c. Cool and store in a sealed container in the refrigerator. The fish taste great fresh but get better after a few weeks. ; name: sea farin portobellos ; ingredients: portabella mushrooms, crabmeat, roasted red peppers, mayonnaise, fresh parsley, fine dry breadcrumb, butter, lemon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Clean mushrooms, remove and disgard stems. Arrange mushrooms gill side up in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Combine crabmeat, peppers, mayonnaise and parsley. Divide mixture among the caps. Combine breadcrumbs and butter, sprinkle over stuffed mushrooms. Bake 15 minutes or until centers of mushrooms are tender. Serve with lemon wedges, if desired. ; name: fish in orange creme ; ingredients: butter, tilapia fillet, scallions, paprika, orange zest, orange juice, salt, pepper, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large frying pan, place the butter and scallions. Let it cook for about 2 minutes and add the fish in the pan and let the fish get a bit brown on each side. Then add the orange and the zest in the pan cover and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the paprika and mix very carefully without breaking the fish too much, until the paprika has dissolved. Then add the cream to the pan and stir it carefully until well blended. Add salt and pepper to taste. Let it simmer and serve warm. ; name: caribbean style fried fish ; ingredients: fish fillets, lemons, garlic cloves, onion, spring onions, scotch bonnet peppers, fresh coriander, salt & freshly ground black pepper, oil, plain flour ; preparation:Wash the fish and pat it dry with absorbent kitchen paper. Squeeze a few drops of lemon or lime juice on to the flesh. Place the garlic, onion, spring onion, chilli, coriander and seasoning into a small blender and pure to a paste. Spread the paste over the fish and leave it to marinate for at least 15 minutes. Heat some oil in a frying pan. Put some plain flour in a bowl and dip the fish in it. Place the fish in the hot oil, without overcrowding the pan. Fry the fish on each side until golden brown. Remove the fish from the pan and place on absorbent kitchen paper to absorb any excess oil. Serve with a light salad on the side. ; name: baked flounder ; ingredients: flounder fillets, salt and pepper, lemon juice, dried tarragon, low-fat sour cream, chives, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a large baking pan with cooking spray. Rub the fillets on both sides with lemon juice, then salt and pepper them to taste. Place the fillets in the baking disk and sprinkle evenly with tarragon. Cover evenly with sour cream. Bake for about 15 minutes until fish is done but not over cooked. Sprinkle with chives and parsley. ; name: barbecued chilean sea bass with orange ; ingredients: sea bass fillet, orange juice, tomato paste, vegetable oil, vinegar, brown sugar, garlic cloves, orange zest, ground ginger, hot red pepper flakes ; preparation:

name: garlic roasted red potatoes and vegetables ; ingredients: red potatoes, carrots, brussels sprout, vidalia onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, oregano, fresh parsley, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease roasting pan or cake pan using nonstick spray. Mix all ingredients together, and toss until all vegetables are coated with olive oil and spices. Spread vegetables into pan. Bake 45 minutes, removing from the oven and stirring twice during cooking. For crisper vegetables, cut cooking time a few minutes shorter. Switch oven setting to broiler. Place pan under the broiler for 7-10 minutes, sliding out and stirring vegetables once or twice. ; name: zesty red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:Arrange potatoes and onion in an ungreased 9 inch square baking dish. Combine butter, pepper flakes and salt. Drizzle over potatoes and onion. Cover and bake 400 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until potatoes are tender. ; name: simple side dish with red skinned potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, butter, seasoning salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean and cube redskins into small cubes and put in microwave safe dish that can be covered. Dot with butter and then, cover and microwave on high for 5 minutes. Add seasoned salt and pepper and mix to blend. Cover and return to microwave for five minutes. Then let rest for 8-10 minutes, check to see that potatoes tender. If not then microwave for 2 more minutes and then rest for 5 minutes. This is such a easy and fast dish to cook while meat is cooking on the grill. I usually make this with a chicken that i marinade and cook on the grill. ; name: pan browned potatoes with red pepper and whole garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, russet potatoes, red bell pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Add garlic. Saut until pale golden, 10 minutes. Increase heat to medium. Add potatoes. Cook until pale golden, stirring every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes. Stir in bell pepper. Cook until potatoes are tender and golden, stirring every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to bowl. ; name: garlic mashed red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, garlic cloves, butter, nonfat milk, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: greek lemon roasted potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, water, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown. ; name: baby new potatoes with mint bbq ; ingredients: red potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, garlic, pepper, of fresh mint ; preparation:Scrub potatoes. Cut each potato in half and place in bowl. Toss potatoes with 2 tablespoons oil and half of the salt. Wrap potatoes in tin foil packet and grill for about 20 minutes or until tender. Remove from grill and empty packet into bowl. Add garlic, pepper, half of the mint, remaining oil and salt. Toss well to coat. Sprinkle with remainder of mint and serve. ; name: grilled red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, garlic, salt ; preparation:

name: special salmon supper ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, onion, pickling spices, lemon, garlic clove, cucumber, mayonnaise ; preparation:Salt salmon to taste. Arrange onion and lemon slices, spices and garlic in a well-greased casserole. Place salmon skin side up over the seasonings. Cover tightly and bake in a moderate oven, 350 degrees for 1 hour. Chill. Place on a serving platter and remove skin carefully. Garnish with mayonnaise and cucumber slices. Serves 6. ; name: broiled salmon with chili glaze ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onion, ancho chilies, light brown sugar, cider vinegar, salmon fillets, cilantro ; preparation:Blacken the whole garlic and onion slices on all sides in a large, dry non-stick frying pan. Remove, cool briefly, then peel the garlic cloves. Soak the ancho chili in boiling water for 15 mins, drain then place in a blender with the sugar, vinegar, garlic, onion and some salt and pepper. Whizz to a smooth sauce. Heat the broiler. Brush each salmon fillet liberally with the sauce and save any remaining. Broil for 8 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro and serve with the remaining sauce. ; name: rosemary roasted salmon ; ingredients: fresh rosemary, red onion, salmon fillets, lemons, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place half of rosemary sprigs in a single layer in the center of a baking pan. Place sliced red onion ontop of the rosemary. Place salmon filet on top of the onion with skin side down. Sprinkle salmon with salt and pepper. Cover salmon with remainder of rosemary sprigs. Place lemon slices over rosemary. Drizzle olive oil over filet. Sprinkle with salt. In a preheated 500 degree oven, roast salmon for about 20 minutes or until cooked through. Serve salmon with onion and lemon. ; name: salmon with lemon capers and rosemary ; ingredients: salmon fillets, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh rosemary leaf, lemon slices, lemon juice, marsala wine, capers, aluminum foil ; preparation:Brush top and bottom of salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and rosemary. Place each piece of seasoned salmon on a piece of foil large enough to fold over and seal. Top the each piece of salmon with 2 lemon slices, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, 2 tablespoons of wine, and 1 teaspoon of capers. Wrap up salmon tightly in the foil packets. Place a grill pan over medium-high heat or preheat a gas or charcoal grill. Place the foil packets on the hot grill and cook for 10 minutes for a 1-inch thick piece of salmon. Serve in the foil packets. ; name: salt roasted salmon ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, lemon ; preparation:Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon. ; name: balsamic glazed salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic cloves, white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, salt, ground black pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. ; name: salmon roasted in garlic butter ; ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, salmon fillets, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. On a cutting board, with a fork, mass the garlic into a paste with the salt and pepper. Add the butter and mash into garlic paste. Arrange the salmon in a single layer in a baking dish. Top it with the garlic butter and drizzle with lemon juice. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through. Sprinkle with the parsley and serve with lemon wedges. ; name: emeril s salmon ; ingredients: basil leaves, butter, garlic cloves, hot sauce, tomatoes, lemon, bay leaf, salt, pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:

name: honey chipotle pecans ; ingredients: honey, dried chipotle powder, ground cinnamon, pecan halves, sugar, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a skillet, warm honey with chipotle powder and cinnamon over low heat, then add the nuts and stir to coat evenly. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, then spread nuts evenly in a single layer on the sheet. Bake in preheated oven until nuts are fragrant. Allow to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine sugar and salt. Add the warm pecans, and toss to coat evenly. Spread out on fresh sheet of waxed paper and let dry completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: sweet spicy glazed pecans ; ingredients: sugar, water, salt, cayenne pepper, pecan halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a large, heavy cookie sheet. In a small, heavy saucepan, combine first 4 ingredients. Over medium heat, stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to a boil. Boil 2 minutes. Add pecans and stir until they are coated with the mixture, about 1 minute. Transfer pecans to the cookie sheet, spreading evenly into a single layer. Bake until pecans are just starting to brown, about 13 minutes. Transfer to another cookie sheet that is lined with wax paper. Separate the pecans and cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: shortcut homemade cinnamon pecan rolls ; ingredients: brown sugar, pecans, butter, cinnamon, frozen bread dough, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Roll out thawed frozen bread dough into a 15 x 9 inch rectangle. Combine brown sugar, pecans, butter and cinnamon, and spread over bread dough. Roll up dough length wise and cut into 9 slices. Place slices in a greased 8-inch baking dish and bake at 375 degrees for 27 minutes. Mix powdered sugar with milk and use as glaze for cinnamon rolls. ; name: pecan butter cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: pumpkin pie spiced pecans ; ingredients: whole pecans, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, egg white, ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix nuts in with egg white. Add sugar and spices. Spread on a shallow pan sprayed with pam or greased. Bake at 250 degrees for 25 minutes. Cool on wax paper. Store in airtight container. ; name: cajun spiced pecans ; ingredients: unsalted butter, pecan halves, light brown sugar, paprika, chili powder, ground cumin, cider vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes. ; name: white chocolate pecan drop cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, light brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, pecans, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. In a bowl, combinte the first 3 ingredients. Set aside. In a larger bowl, cream the butter with the sugars for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add in the egg and vanilla. Beat well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly. Stir in the pecans and white chocolate. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly golden. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes. Then tranfer to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cinnamon sugared pecans ; ingredients: pecans, egg white, water, brown sugar, white sugar, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, peanut butter, vanilla extract, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Butter a 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, evaporated milk and butter in large saucepan. Stir constantly over medium heat and bring to a full boil. Stir 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter, vanilla and marshallow. Spread in pan. Cool completely and cut into squares. ; name: magic french fudge ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, nuts ; preparation:In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container. ; name: pineapple fudge ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple in juice, sweetened condensed milk, corn syrup, salt, butter, marshmallows, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:In 2-quart saucepan, combine sugars, pineapple, condensed milk, corn syrup, salt and butter. Cook to 238 degrees on a candy thermometer, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Add marshmallows and vanilla. Stir together to melt marshmallows. Beat until mixture is heavy and creamy. Add pecans. Spread in buttered 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan. Cool until firm. Cut into squares. ; name: cocoa fudge 1965 ; ingredients: white sugar, brown sugar, salt, cocoa powder, corn syrup, sour cream, butter, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:Mix sugars, salt, cocoa, syrup, and sour cream in a large buttered saucepan. Cook without stirring until candy temp. Reaches 235 degrees f. Or until a soft ball forms in very cold water. Add butter. Stir just til blended. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Let sit until cool. Add chopped nuts. Beat until creamy, and just until it starts to loose its glossy appearance dulls slightly. Pour into prepared buttered 8 x8 inch pan. Cut into squares while still soft and warm. ; name: walnut milk chocolate cream fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halves ; preparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half. ; name: no bake fudge cookies ; ingredients: sugar, milk, salt, cocoa, margarine, vanilla, peanut butter, oatmeal ; preparation:Mix first 6 ingredients in a sauce pan and cook until it boils. Boil for 1-3 minutes. Remove from heat and add peanut butter and oatmeal. Drop by teaspoonfuls on to wax paper. Chill until set. ; name: autumn pumpkin spice fudge ; ingredients: sugar, milk, light corn syrup, pumpkin, salt, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla extract, butter, nuts ; preparation:In 3 quart saucepan, combine sugar, milk, syrup, pumpkin, & salt. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to medium, continue boiling, do not stir. When mixture heats to 232 deg. On candy thermometer remove from heat. Stir in pumpkin pie spice, vanilla, butter& the nuts. Let cool to lukewarm. Beat until very thick& until it loses some of its gloss. Quickly, pour mixture into greased 8-inch square pan. When fudge is firm, cut into pieces. ; name: caramel almond fudge ; ingredients: brown sugar, heavy cream, salt, almonds ; preparation:

name: stir fry mushrooms and bell peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, green onions, garlic cloves, bell peppers, champignon mushrooms, chinese rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oil til really hot. Stir fry onions, then garlic. Then add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft,. Add the wine and soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes. When done, remove from heat and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve. ; name: roasted mushroom medley ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, fresh parsley, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar. ; name: garlic and mushroom burgers ; ingredients: field mushrooms, sunflower oil, gruyere, garlic clove, butter, hamburger buns, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven. ; name: french green beans sauted with mushrooms and almonds ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, button mushrooms, whole almond, frozen french-cut green beans, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture. ; name: mushroom brochettes ; ingredients: mushrooms, salt, white pepper, thyme, rosemary, summer savory ; preparation:Clean the mushrooms well. You can scuff up the skin a little, so that the mushroom juices combine with the herbs. Mix the herbs together and crush them with a mortar and pestle, or just crush them together. Put 6 mushrooms on each of 4 bamboo skewers. Salt and pepper them, and sprinkle the herb mix over them. Put them under a hot grill and turn them frequently. Sprinkle more herbs and salt and pepper once or twice. The mushrooms should be hot, and cooked but still crisp when they are done. ; name: finnish baked mushrooms ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, onions, butter, salt and pepper, flour, heavy cream, egg yolks, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix the breadcrumbs with 1 tbsp butter and toast until golden brown, stirring often to prevent burning. To the sliced mushrooms add the lemon juice, onion, butter, salt, and pepper. Saute until onions tender. Heat the cream to just short of the boiling point. Stir the flour into the mushrooms, stirring rapidly to prevent lumping. Stir in a bit of the cream. Stir in each egg yolk separately. Stir in the remaining cream. Cook, covered, until the sauce is just short of boiling. Sprinkle with the toasted bread crumbs and let sit 5 minutes before serving. Half and half is better than milk and whipping cream is best of all. ; name: little grilled mushroom bites ; ingredients: mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt & fresh black pepper, garlic cloves, fresh herbs, fresh breadcrumb, cheese, sherry wine ; preparation:Prepare a medium-hot fire in the grill with a vegetable grill in place. Remove stems from mushrooms and hollow out the caps. Brush both sides of mushroom caps with olive and sprinkle inside of caps with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, hollow side down, until partially cooked and set aside. Combine reserved mushroom stems and trimmings with remaining olive oil and garlic and toss to coat well. Grill, tossing frequently, until lightly cooked. Finely chop the mushroom pieces and garlic, either by hand or with a food processor. Combine in medium-sized bowl with the breadcrumbs, cheese, sherry and herbs. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Stuff into the mushroom caps, mounding up the filling and pressing with your fingers to pack tightly. Grill stuffed mushrooms, stuffing side up, until the mushrooms are completely cooked and the cheese is melted. Serve hot or warm. ; name: quick provencal mushroom and white bean stew ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh white mushroom, onion, garlic, herbes de provence, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, dry white wine, cannellini beans ; preparation:

name: mushroom tomato bacon and egg pie ; ingredients: puff pastry, bacon, sliced mushrooms, tomatoes, onion, ground black pepper, eggs, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190-200 degrees. Line a 20cm pie dish with baking paper. Place 1 sheet of pastry over the paper. Trim edges. Place bacon, mushrooms, tomato and onion in pastry case. Season with black pepper. Crack eggs over filling. Top pie with remaining sheet of pastry. Trim and crimp edges. Glaze top of pie with milk. Cut a vent in centre of pie. Bake for 25-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown. ; name: stuffed crust pepperoni pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, mozzarella string cheese, pizza sauce, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Place pieces of string cheese along the inside edges of dough. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: spinach and feta pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, sweet onions, olive oil, pesto sauce, frozen spinach, sun-dried tomato, feta ; preparation:In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions. ; name: italian spinach saute ; ingredients: olive oil, frozen chopped spinach, garlic cloves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: spinach and feta pie ; ingredients: phyllo pastry, spinach, olive oil, onion, fresh dill, eggs, feta cheese, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Cut the pastry to fit the size or your baking dish,, then keep it covered with a damp cloth. Prepare the spinach. Heat the oil and saute the onion for 5 minutes until soft. Add the spinach and stir for 5 minutes over a medium heat then increase the heat to evaporate any moisture. Leave to cool then mix in the dill, eggs, cheese, salt and pepper. Brush the baking dish with melted butter. Brush 8 layers of pastry with butter and lay them in the bottom of the dish. Spread with the filling, then cover with the remaining pastry, brushing each one with melted butter and scoring the top into diamond shapes. Sprinkle with water and bake in a preheated oven at 325f for 40 minutes until crisp and golden. Leave to stand for 10 minutes, then cut into wedges and serve with crisp lettuce leaves. ; name: veggie and pepperoni pizza ; ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pizza sauce, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, pepperoni, roma tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, onion ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450. Spread the pepperoni between two paper towels and blot to remove the excess grease. Brush the olive oil over the pizza crusts and cover with the pizza sauce. Next add the cheese, pepperoni, and tomatoes in that order. Finally topped with the chopped vegetables. Place pizzas on pizza stones or pizza pans. These really work better than cookie sheets. Change the oven temperature to 425 before putting the pizzas in the oven. Bake until the crust is a golden brown. About 15 minutes. ; name: baked eggs with spinach and parmesan ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, baby spinach leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, eggs, cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200d celsius lightly grease 4 ramekins and place on a baking tray. Heat a medium sized fry pan over a moderate heat and add the oil to the pan, then add the spinach and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the leaves are just softened. Drain the spinach in a colander and as soon as spinach is cool enough to handle, squeeze out excess liquid. Divide the spinach between the ramekins and break two eggs on top of the spinach. Pour one tablespoon of cream over the eggs and sprinkle with one tablespoon of parmesan. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the eggs are set and puffed up. Serve immediately with toast. ; name: pepper jack spinach pizza pie ; ingredients: bacon, frozen chopped spinach, monterey jack pepper cheese, fresh ground black pepper, prepared pizza crust, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: kay s banana nut cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant banana pudding mix, eggs, banana, oil, water, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs until thick. Add cake mix, pudding, water, oil, and bananas. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add walnuts, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish. ; name: vanilla pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Stir together flour and baking powder in small bowl. Gradually add flour mixture alternately with milk to butter mixture, beating at low speed until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: honey nut cake ; ingredients: hazelnuts, dried apple, honey, eggs ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 175c. Finely chop the hazelnuts and apple. Mix the nuts, apple and. Honey in a bowl. Whisk in the eggs. Spread the mixture into a large circle on a greased baking tray. Bake on the middle shelf for approximately 15 minutes. ; name: cake mix cake plus ; ingredients: cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan or 12-cup fluted tube pan with non-stick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl, combine cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk and margarine. Beat to mix well. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour, or until done. ; name: hot chocolate cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, hot cocoa, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Run a knife around the sides of the pan. ; name: 123 cake ; ingredients: oil, yellow cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, water, apple pie filling, egg ; preparation:In 9x13 pan, pour oil. Covering bottom and sides. Add cake mix, pudding, water and egg. Mix with fork. Moistening all dry ingredients. Pour in pie filling. Swirl into mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: crunchy pound cake ; ingredients: butter, shortening, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes. ; name: sprinkle nut cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, vegetable oil, water, eggs, walnuts, chocolate sprinkles ; preparation:

name: sauteed spinach with sesame korean ; ingredients: dark sesame oil, garlic, spinach, sugar, soy sauce, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Put 2 t. Of the oil in a large skillet over medium heat for one minute. Add garlic. The instant it begins to sizzle, add spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is completely wilted. Turn heat to low. Stir in sugar and soy sauce. Cook for a few more moments. Turn off heat. Taste to see if you need additional salt or soy sauce. Serve hot, warm, room temp or cold. Before serving, drizzle with remaining sesame oil and spinkle with sesame seeds. ; name: korean spinach soup ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, garlic clove, sesame oil, ground beef, soy sauce, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Wash the spinach thoroughly, then trim off the thick stems. Heat the sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Brown the ground beef, separating while stir-frying. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: spinach rice casserole ; ingredients: onion, spinach, brown rice, low-sodium tamari, cumin, tomatoes ; preparation:Saute onion in a small amount of water until translucent. Add spinach and steam until barely tender. Remove from heat. Mix the rice with the onions, spinach and tamari. Press into non-stick baking dish. Layer sliced tomatoes over the top. Bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: german style spinach or chard ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, bacon, ground nutmeg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spinach according to package directions. Drain well and set aside. In a large skillet, saute onion and garlic in butter until tender. Stir in spinach, bacon, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. Heat through. ; name: saute spinach with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: italian spinach saute ; ingredients: olive oil, frozen chopped spinach, garlic cloves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: spanakorizo spinach with rice ; ingredients: spinach, spring onions, dill, rice, oil, water, salt and pepper, lemon ; preparation:Wash the spinach well and cut as finely as possible. Clean onions and cut into fine strips. Put onions into a saucepan with the oil and cook til softened. Add dill and cook a bit longer. Add the spinach, salt and pepper, add 3 c water and allow to boil. Just before spinach is fully cooked, add in 3 more cups water and the rice. Cover the saucepan and allow the ingredients to cook, stirring occassionally. When the water is absorbed, serve with freshly ground pepper and lemon juice. Enjoy. ; name: afghani inspired spinach dish ; ingredients: frozen spinach, diced onion, ginger, garlic, cayenne pepper, curry powder, garam masala, salt, yogurt, grapeseed oil ; preparation:

name: twice baked potatoes with cream cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, onion salt, butter, fresh ground pepper, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes. ; name: medieval fine cakes ; ingredients: butter, salt, granulated sugar, cinnamon, unbleached flour ; preparation:Cream together the sugar, salt, and butter. Mix together the cinnamon and flour. Add this to the creamed mixture. Mix in water, as needed, to make the dough manageable. Press dough into 2-3 baking sheets lined with baking parchment. Prick all over with a fork at regular intervals. Bake at 325 degrees f for 30 minutes. Cut into 100 squares. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: norwegian gold cake ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Place butter and flour in a mixing bowl. Mix 5 minutes at low speed. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift together sugar, baking powder and salt. Add gradually to creamed mixture. Add vanilla and mix additionaly 2 minutes. Turn into greased and floured 10 inch tube or bundt pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: egg white cake ; ingredients: egg whites, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, potato starch, baking powder, butter ; preparation:Whisk the egg whites with 2 tbsp of sugar until thick and pale and very foamy. Mix the rest of the sugar with flour, potato starch and baking powder, then sift into the egg mixture and fold in gently. Finally fold in cool melted butter. Pour the batter into a buttered bundt-form and bake in a pre-heated 180 c oven for 30-40 minutes. Test for doneness with a wooden toothpick. Cool slightly before turning out of the cake tin. ; name: potato muffins ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, milk, eggs, yoghurt, spring onion, ham, self-raising flour, salt ; preparation:Preheat the oven and thoroughly grease the muffin pans. Blend the potato, milk, eggs and yoghurt or sour cream together. Stir in the chopped spring onion and ham or bacon. Fold the flour and salt into the wet mixture until all ingredients are just incorporated. Place in the prepared muffin pans and bake at 200 degrees c for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: old sussex potato cheese cakes ; ingredients: potato, flour, cheese, egg, butter, salt ; preparation:

name: roast veal with cream sauce kalbsbraten mit sahnesosse ; ingredients: boned leg of veal, salt, pepper, paprika, butter, onion, cornflour, water, sour cream ; preparation:Weigh the joint and calculate the cooking time. Allow 25 minutes per pound plus an extra 25 minutes if the meat is on the bone. 30 minutes per pound plus 30 extra minutes if the joint is boned and rolled. Season veal well with salt, pepper, and paprika. Fry the meat briskly in butter. Place the meat in a roasting pan, add a little water together with the onion and roast in a hot oven for the required time. When the meat is cooked, remove from the pan and keep warm. Blend cornflour with a little water and add to the meat juices in the pan along with the sour cream. Serve the meat whole or sliced with the sauce poured over it. This roast is frequently served with fried mushrooms as a side dish. ; name: mussels in wine sauce ; ingredients: mussels, dry white wine, shallot, garlic clove, fresh flat-leaf parsley, whole wheat baguette, mixed greens, white wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Scrub and de-beard mussels, discard any that do not close to the touch. In large pot, add wine, shallots, garlic and mussels, bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and cook stirring occasionaly until mussels are opened. Meanwhile, pre-heat broiler, and broil whole grain baguette 3 minutes each side. Remove and wrap in aluminum foil to keep warm, set aside. Remove mussels with sloted spoon into indivikdual bowls, discard unopened mussels. Bring remaining liquid to boil, boil 2-3 minutes. Pour hot liquid over mussels. Arrange mixed greens on salad plate, drizzle with white wine vinegar and olive oil. Serve with crusty whole grain baguette. ; name: veal medallions with blueberry citrus sauce ; ingredients: blueberries, orange juice, lemon juice, vermouth, orange rind, lemons, rind of, fresh ginger, butter, veal medallions, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine blueberries, orange juice, lemon juice, vermouth, orange peel, lemon peel and ginger. Stir to blend and set aside. Melt butter in a large, heavy skillet and saute until brown and just cooked through. Transfer veal to platter and keep warm. Add blueberry mixture to skillet and cook until mixture thickens, scraping up any browned bits. Spoon blueberry mixture over veal and serve. ; name: blazin venison steaks ; ingredients: venison steak, portabella mushroom caps, vegetable oil, jalapeno peppers, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, salt, dry red wine, dry mustard, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Place steaks in a casserole dish and arrange the mushrooms on top of each. Set aside. In a skillet, over medium heat, add the oil and sautee the jalapenos until slightly tender. Then, add the worcestershire sauce, garlic and salt -- heat until it sizzles a bit. Remove from the heat and add the wine, mustard and cinnamon -- whisk until blended. Pour the skillet contents over the steaks, cover with cling wrap and allow to marinate in the refrigerator overnight. After marinating overnight, remove them from the dish and grill the steaks and portabellos over hot charcoal. Baste with the marinade, grilling the steaks for about 6 minutes to a side and allowing the portabellos slightly longer. Do not baste for the final 3 minutes and discard any extra marinade. Serve with some buttery garlic noodles as a side dish. ; name: venison steak marinade ; ingredients: canola oil, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, garlic, ground pepper, venison steak ; preparation:Mix all marinade ingredients together in a small measuring cup. Place venison steaks in a large zip lock bag. Pour marinade over steaks and seal bag. Place bag in a flat casserole dish so that the steaks are in a single layer. Refrigerate and marinate at least 4 hours, turning every half hour to marinate each side. Drain marinade and grill steaks to desired doneness. I double or triple this recipe for each addition package of steak. Any wild game steak can be used in this recipe. ; name: veal in wine sauce ; ingredients: veal, butter, scallions, mushrooms, paprika, flour, white wine, whipping cream, salt and pepper, rice ; preparation:

name: patty cakes egg dairy gluten nut and soy free ; ingredients: dairy-free margarine, caster sugar, eggs, gluten-free self-raising flour, rice flour, gluten free baking powder, rice milk, icing sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Line 12 hole muffin trays or patty pans with paper cases. Beat the margarine and sugar together using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add the eggs or the eg replacer. Beat well. Sift the dry ingredients into a seerate large bowl. Fold the dry ingredients into the margarine alternately with the rice or soy milk. Spoon the mixture evenly into the patty cases and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until just cooked. Allow to cool in trays 10 minutes before moving to a wire rack to cool. Dust with the icing sugar or ice with a suitable icing or frosting. ; name: gluten free fairy cakes ; ingredients: margarine, caster sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, gluten-free flour, milk, baking powder ; preparation:Make sure you have 12 paper cases handy. Preheat oven to 200 degrees. Cream together margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla, followed by the sifted baking powder, sifted flour and milk. Half fill paper cases standing on baking tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes. When cold, decorate the top with jam or icing or just icing sugar, if desired. ; name: georgia cornbread cake ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, self-rising flour, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish. Stir together sugar, brown sugar,, eggs and oil in a medium bowl until smooth. Stir in flour and vanilla. Add pecans and stir until evenly mixed. Spoon into prepared pan and bake for 30 to 35 minutes. Good served with a dollop of whipped cream, enjoy. ; name: pistachio and lemon cake naturally gluten and lactose free ; ingredients: lemons, pistachios, sugar, eggs, salt, baking powder, icing sugar ; preparation:Boil the whole lemons in boiling water for 1 hour. Pre heat oven to 180c grease and line a 22cm cake tin with baking paper drain the lemons and cool. Cut the cooked lemons in half and remove the pips. Puree in a blender until smooth. Blanch 200g of the pistaccios in boiling water for 30 seconds then blend with the other 100g. Sererate the egg yolks from the egg whites. Whisk the yolks with the sugar until light then fold in the pistaccio cream, the lemon cream and baking powder. Whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt till stiff. Fold into the lemon pistacchio mixture. Pour th emixture int th eprepared cake tin and bake for about 40-45 minutes. Cool, remove from cake tin and dust lightly with icing sugar. Decorate with some candied peel. ; name: pecan bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, milk, egg, pecans ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Mix milk and egg and add to dry ingredients. Mix, do not beat. Stir in pecans. Baked in greased loaf pan in a 350 preheated oven about 1 hour. Best kept a day or two before eating. Freezes well, great thinly sliced with cream cheese. ; name: cake mix lemon pecan cookies ; ingredients: lemon supreme cake mix, butter, eggs, milk, lemon extract, pecans ; preparation:With mixer blend butter, eggs, milk and extract. Mix in cake mix and chopped pecans. Chill dough before placing on parchment lined baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with fork. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet. ; name: vanilla wafer cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, milk, eggs, vanilla wafers, coconut, vanilla extract, pecans ; preparation:Cream together the sugar and the butter. Add the eggs to the milk while stirring, one at a time. Combine the egg-milk mixture with the sugar-butter one. Add the crushed vanilla wafers and beat well. Add the vanilla, coconut, and pecans and mix together well. Pour mixture into a 9 inch x 13 inch pan and bake for one hour and 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree f oven. ; name: nut cake gluten free ; ingredients: pecans, eggs, brown sugar, maple syrup, cinnamon, flour, salt ; preparation:

name: pasta salad with spinach olives and mozzarella ; ingredients: orecchiette, fresh mozzarella cheese, baby spinach, kalamata olives, parmesan cheese, red wine vinegar, kosher salt, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Bring a medium pot of heavily salted water to a boil over high heat. Cook pasta according to the package directions, or until al dente. Drain, then rinse under cold water until cool. Transfer pasta to a large bowl and add mozzarella, spinach, olives, and parmesan. Toss to combine. In a separate, nonreactive bowl, combine vinegar, salt, and pepper. While whisking constantly, slowly add oil by pouring in a thin stream down the side of the bowl. Whisk until completely incorporated. Pour vinaigrette over salad and toss until pasta is coated. Taste, adjust seasoning as desired, and serve. ; name: garlic roasted potato salad ; ingredients: new potato, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, creole mustard, parsley, scallions, lemon, juice of, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, and scallions. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: mixed bean and tomato salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook green and yellow beans in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain beans and put in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking, then drain. Combine vinegar, oil, salt and pepper with a whisk in a large bowl. Add beans, onion and tomatoes and toss gently. Cover and refrigerate. Right before serving, add basil and feta cheese and toss. ; name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: broccoli salad with bacon ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, red onion, sunflower seeds, raisins, fresh mushrooms, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, sugar, bacon ; preparation:Clean and cut the whole broccoli into small pieces. Use all of the broccoli except the end chunks. Mix together broccoli, onion, sunflower seeds, raisins and mushrooms. Make the dressing by mixing the mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar. Twenty minutes before serving the salad, toss and then toss again with the bacon and the dressing. ; name: new york style potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, lemon juice, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, celery ribs, hard-boiled eggs, red onion, fresh parsley, mayonnaise, cider vinegar ; preparation:Boil the potatoes just until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain, peel and dice. Toss with the lemon juice, oil and salt and pepper to taste. Let cool. Add the celery, eggs, chopped red onion, and parsley toss gently. Combine 1 cup mayonnaise with vinegar, blend well then toss over the potato salad, gently folding until completely coated. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary. ; name: lemony potato broccoli and goat cheese salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, broccoli, green beans, dill, salt & freshly ground black pepper, goat cheese, pine nuts ; preparation:

name: roasted sausages peppers potatoes and onions ; ingredients: potato, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, italian pork sausage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: italian tomato sausage sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, italian sausage, shallots, garlic clove, plum tomatoes, mixed italian herbs, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta. ; name: one pan sausage tortellini ; ingredients: hot italian sausage, roasted garlic, onion, refrigerated cheese tortellini, tomato and basil pasta sauce, extra virgin olive oil, water, garlic salt ; preparation:Place onions, garlic and olive oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat. Squeeze sausage from casing into pan. Cook until meat is brown and no pink remains, stirring frequently and breaking meat up as it cooks. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to boil and cook 12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender and sauce thickens. ; name: penne with collards sausage and mushrooms ; ingredients: spicy smoked sausage, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, collard greens, dried italian seasoning, tomatoes seasoned with basil garlic & oregano, penne pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and plan to have it cooked& ready to go by the end of the cooking process. Brown sausage slices in a large deep pot until browned on each side. Remove sausage slices from the pan and drain off any fat. Add oil to the same pot, heat over medium briefly, then add garlic and mushrooms, stirring constantly until mushrooms are tender - this will take only a few minutes. Return the sausage slices to the pan along with collards, italian seasoning, and tomatoes with their juices. Cook, stirring as needed, for about 10 minutes. Add the cooked pasta and toss well. Serve with grated parmesan cheese sprinkled over each serving to taste. ; name: sal and judi s sausage and peppers ; ingredients: sweet italian sausage, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, italian peppers, onions, olive oil, dry white wine, salt and pepper, oregano ; preparation:In a large skillet, put in peppers and onions and coat them with olive oil. Make sure they are lightly coated. Start to cook the veggies on med-high heat until they soften a bit, season with salt, pepper, basil and oregano. Add the wine and continue to cook the veggies on medium heat. Cook the veggies until they cook down and become tender, 10 minutes or so. In a separate skillet, pan fry your sausage. When they are cooked through, add your peppers and onions and mix. Serve on hoagie rolls or italian bread. If you are going to serve these on sandwiches, cut the sausage into bite sized pieces before pan frying them. ; name: phil s italian sausage ; ingredients: pork, sage, garlic powder, onion powder, mace, black pepper, allspice, clove, fennel seeds ; preparation:Mix well. Shape into patties. Wrap individually to freeze if desired. To prepare, fry as any pork sausage. Will make 24 patties. ; name: tomatillo hash with sausage ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, poblano chile, salt, tomatillos, white wine, cooked brown rice ; preparation:

name: yellow squash with peanuts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, yellow squash, roasted peanuts, salt, brown sugar ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet and cook squash until it becomes tender. Stirring often. Add peanuts, salt and sugar. Reduce heat to low and simmer until the flavors have mingled, about 5 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: squash zucchini and potatoes ; ingredients: squash, zucchini, potatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put water in pot add potatoes. Cook potatoes until a little soft. Add vegetables and cook until desired texture of veges. Olive oil or butter can be spread on top. Salt and pepper to desired taste. Since i am always watching my weight i do not put butter or olive oil on top only salt and pepper. ; name: yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic, water, salt, black pepper, basil ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute squash until browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes. Stir in basil. ; name: delicious squash bread ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, vanilla, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, summer squash, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 4 mini loaf pans and dust with flour. Beat eggs in a large bowl. Add sugar, oil, and vanilla to eggs. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and baking powder and add to egg mixture. Fold in squash and nuts and stir until just mixed. Pour in loaf pans, filling half full. Bake for 25- 30 minutes or an hour and 5 minutes for regular loaf pans. Cooking times vary upon moisture of squash also. Cool before slicing. ; name: low fat yellow squash bake ; ingredients: squash, onion, milk, cream of broccoli soup, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, cajun seasoning, pepper ; preparation:Cook squash and onion in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. When done lightly mash mixture. Combine milk and soup mix well and add squash mixture. Put in a baking dish and layer breadcrumbs then cheese. Cook in 350 degree oven for 10-15 minutes. ; name: squash delight ; ingredients: squash, maple syrup, onion, oil, carrot, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, chicken flavor stuffing mix ; preparation:Prepare squash, either by peeling and boiling or bake in oven until tender. Cool and mash. Yield for cooked squash is about 2 cups of puree. Saute onion and carrot in frying pan with tsp oil. Cool. In small bowl combine cooled onion, carrot, sour cream, maple syrup and soup. Fold in squash. Prepare stuffing according to package directions. Spread half of stuffing in bottom of prepared 8x8 baking dish. Spoon squash mixture on top, sprinkle with remaining stuffing. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: squash snackers ; ingredients: yellow squash, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh garlic, fresh basil, celery salt, asiago cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves. ; name: the black eyed pea s baked squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, breadcrumbs, butter, sugar, salt, onions, pepper ; preparation:

name: pacific pesto grilled halibut ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, garlic clove, lime zest, fresh lime juice, jalapeno, soy sauce, vegetable oil, halibut steaks, new potatoes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. In a food processor or blender, combine the cilantro, garlic, lime zest and juice, jalapeo, and soy sauce. Blend until mixed. With processor or blender running, gradually pour in the oil and process until thickened. Place the fish steaks on a greased broiler pan. Brush top of each steak with the sauce. Coat the potatoes with remaining sauce. Place in broiler pan with the fish. Broil about 10 minutes, or until fish flakes with a fork. ; name: halibut baked with scallion and worcestershire ; ingredients: halibut steaks, salt, pepper, butter, worcestershire sauce, scallions, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Wash and dry fish steaks. Salt and pepper both sides of the fish to taste and put in a greased shallow baking pan. In a small saucepan, melt the butter and worcestershire sauce together and then pour over the fish. Arrange chopped scallions on top. Sprinkle with parsley and bake for 25 minutes. ; name: zucchini delight ; ingredients: condensed tomato soup, lemon juice, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, zucchini, onion, bell pepper, mushroom, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine soup, lemon juice, sugar, garlic and salt in large saucepan. Mix well. Add zucchini, onion, bell pepper and mushrooms. Mix well. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and cook 20 - 25 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: roasted zucchini with garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, bulb of garlic, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Wash and trim ends of zucchini. Slice zucchini lengthwise and then into 1-inch pieces. Slightly crush and peel all the cloves of garlic. Mix zucchini, garlic and remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Lay evenly onto a foil lined pan. Bake uncovered at 425f for about 60 minutes or until tender and browned, turning once after first 30 minutes. ; name: zucchini with serrano ham ; ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, salt & pepper, garlic clove, serrano ham ; preparation:Wash zucchini, cut in half and remove the seeds. The cut into cubes. Warm olive oil in a pan, add zucchini, garlic, salt & pepper. Cook until done. With fingers, shred the serrano and spread over zucchini. Serve. ; name: lemon rosemary zucchini ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, yellow bell pepper, fresh rosemary, zucchini, lemon juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In medium non-stick skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add yellow pepper and rosemary and saute 2 minutes. Add zucchini and salt and pepper, to taste. Continue to saute for another 4 to 5 minutes or until zucchini is just tender. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. ; name: zucchini salad ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, zucchini, pine nuts, raisins, mint, lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil, add the halved garlic clove, and cook gently until browned, discard. Add the zucchini to the pan, and cook until a little browned and just tender. Turn the zucchini and oil into a bowl, and add the remaining ingredients. Allow to cool completely, then cover and chill for at least 3 hours. Remove from the fridge about 15 minutes before serving. 4drained and chopped anchovies can be added in step 2 for a more robust flavour. ; name: halibut zucchini saute ; ingredients: halibut steaks, salt & pepper, zucchini, onion, garlic, oil, tomatoes, parsley, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: pecan liqueur pralines ; ingredients: sugar, light brown sugar, salt, cream, pecans, praline liqueur ; preparation:Combine sugars, salt and milk. Cook to soft ball stage. Add pecans and liqueur. Beat until stiff. Drop quickly onto wax paper. ; name: southern style pecan fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla, salt, pecans ; preparation:Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares. ; name: chunky pecan pie bars ; ingredients: flour, butter, brown sugar, eggs, corn syrup, sugar, vanilla, semisweet chocolate chunks, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: caramel butter pecan bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, pecans, caramel ice cream topping, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350 f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars. ; name: pecan delight pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, vanilla, granulated sugar, brown sugar, soda crackers, pecan pieces ; preparation:Beat egg whites to foam. Add salt and cream of tartar. Beat to stiff peaks. Add vanilla extract and both sugars. Beat until consistency of 7 minute frosting. Fold in crackers and nuts. Grease bottom and sides of pyrex dish and add mixture to dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. Top with cool whip or whipped cream when pie is completely cool, or slice and add topping on individual slices when serving. ; name: sand tarts ; ingredients: butter, sugar, pecans, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Cream butter until soft. Add sugar, pecans, and flour, mixing well. Shape into balls and bake at 300 degrees on ungreased cookie sheet for 45 minutes. While hot, roll balls in powdered sugar. Roll in sugar again after all have been rolled once. ; name: dried cherry and pecan oatmeal ; ingredients: water, nonfat milk, whole oats, dried cherries, salt, brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract, pecans ; preparation:Bring the first 5 ingredients to a boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in 4 tablespoons brown sugar and the next 3 ingredients. Spoon 1 cup of oatmeal into each of 6 bowls. Sprinkle evenly with pecans and the remaining brown sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: individual pecan tartlets ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, almond extract, all-purpose flour, dark corn syrup, powdered sugar, pecans, pecan halves ; preparation:

name: caramelized garlic chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, brown sugar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Heat oven to 500 degrees. Line shallow roasting pan with foil. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Heat oil in small nonstick skillet over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic. Cook 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic begins to soften. Remove from heat. Stir in brown sugar until well mixed. Place chicken breast halves in sprayed foil-lined pan. Spread garlic mixture evenly over chicken. Bake at 500 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear. ; name: garlic lime chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, olive oil, garlic, salt, black pepper, chicken breast halves, lime wedge ; preparation:Whisk together lime juice, oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Add chicken, turning to coat. Marinate chicken, covered and refrigerated, turning once or twice, for at least 2 hours and up to 8 hours. Put a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat to 400 degrees. Remove chicken from marinade and arrange skin side up, without crowding, in a shallow baking dish. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until just cooked through, 25 to 30 minutes. If chicken has a skin, turn oven to broil. Broil chicken about 2 inches from the heat until skin is crisp, about 2 minutes. Serve with lime wedges. ; name: easy barbecued lemon garlic chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon, juice of, olive oil, minced garlic clove, dried oregano, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Combine lemon juice, oil, garlic, oregano and cayenne. Mix wll. Pour over chicken and turn to coat both sides. Let stand at room temperature for 20 minutes or cover and refrigerate up to 6 hours. On greased grill, cook chicken over hot coals for 4 to 5 minutes on each or until meat is no longer pink inside. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: lemon pepper chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, lemons, black pepper, garlic cloves, honey, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400. Cover a glass baking dish with aluminum foil and place the chicken breasts on top. Zest all 3 of the lemons into a small bowl, and then add the juice of 2 of the lemons. Add the pepper and all the other ingredients into the bowl. Mix the combine and pour over all the chicken breasts. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill. ; name: oriental chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, teriyaki sauce, water, orange marmalade, garlic ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe. ; name: sauteed chicken breasts w fresh herbs and ginger ; ingredients: peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice of, chicken broth, fresh gingerroot, fresh basil leaf, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken. ; name: roasted skinless duck breast ; ingredients: skinless duck breasts, lemon pepper, garlic heads, olive oil, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:

name: chicken enchiladas with red sauce ; ingredients: chicken breasts, enchilada sauce, cheddar cheese, sour cream, refried beans, cilantro, diced green chilies, taco seasoning, tortillas ; preparation:Pre heat oven at 350 degrees. Combine the chicken, cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chiles, taco seasoning and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Fill each tortilla with 2 spoonfuls of filling mix. Fold tortillas and place in baking pan seam side down. When the pan is filled, pour enchilada sauce over the top of all the filled tortillas. Cover the pan and bake for 20-40 minutes. ; name: sarah s beef enchiladas with chicken soup ; ingredients: hamburger, green chilies, refried beans, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onions, cheddar cheese, flour tortilla, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the hamburger. Drain off fat, mix in chillies and re-fried beans. Heat and then set aside. Mix soup, sour cream and onion together, heat on medium heat until mixed thoroughly. Add enough of the soup mixture to lightly cover the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch pan. Place a scoop of meat and scoop of soup mixture in each tortilla, sprinkle cheese on top. Place in baking dish. Repeat until dish is full. Pour remaining soup mixture on top and top that with the cheese. Bake at 300f for 30 minutes. ; name: traditional style new mexico green chile sauce ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic, flour, ground cumin, salt and pepper, pork stock, new mexico pepper, dried oregano ; preparation:In a medium sauce pan, saute the onion and garlic in the oil over medium-high heat, until tender. Stir in the flour, cumin, salt and pepper and cook over medium heat, stirring, for 2 minutes. Stir in the stock and simmer until thick and smooth. Stir in the chiles and oregano. At this point you may cool, and store in refrigerator, covered, for up to one day. To serve, heat thoroughly. ; name: jana s church enchiladas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, cream of chicken soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta cheese, green onion dip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Brown ground beef and onion. After meat is finished, add taco seasoning. In a saucepan, combine soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta and onion dip. Heat on low till creamy. Fill tortillas with spoonful of meat, roll and put seamside down. Pour creamy mixture over tortillas in a 9x13 pan. Cook at 350 for 20-30 minutes. ; name: cuban garlic sauce mojo cubano ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, sour orange juice, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:For the mojo, you will need a large bowl. In a large bowl, pour the sour orange juice or lime juice, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic and sliced onion into the bowl and stir. Heat the olive oil over medium-high for 2 minutes, then when hot, pour olive oil into bowl. Be careful not to get burned, since some of it might splatter out. Mix the mojo ingredients, then let sit for 30 minutes. ; name: swiss enchiladas enchiladas suizas ; ingredients: cooked chicken, anaheim chilies, green chili salsa, salt, heavy cream, corn tortillas, oil, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Mix the chicken, chilies, and salsa in a small bowl. Mix the salt and cream in a large shallow dish. Heat the oil in a frying pan over med-high. Fry the tortillas one at a time for a few seconds until they start to blister and turn soft. Immediately dip each one in the cream mixture. Put a large dollop of the chicken mixture on each tortilla and roll it up. Place it in a ungreased baking pan, flap side down. When all of the tortillas are done, pour the remaining cream over them and sprinkle the cheese over the top. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or so, until they are thoroughly heated. ; name: skillet beef enchiladas ; ingredients: ground round, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheese ; preparation:Brown meat and onion in large skillet. Drain fat. Stir in chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, and milk. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 20 minutes. Soften tortillas in the microwave wrapped in paper towels. Place grated cheese inside each tortilla and roll up. Place tortillas in sauce in skillet and spoon sauce over tortillas. Top with any remaining cheese. Cover and heat on medium for 5 minutes. ; name: el charro cafe green enchilada sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, flour, anaheim chilies, garlic cloves, chicken stock, salt ; preparation:

name: raspberry apple crisp ; ingredients: raspberries, apples, brown sugar, rolled oats, flour, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together berries and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: hot apple pie sandwiches ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, white bread, medium cheddar, butter ; preparation:Combine apples and cinnamon. Place cheese on the outside of 4 slices of toast. Spoon apples onto cheese. Top with remaining bread slices. Brush outside with butter.
