Broil on each side until golden brown. ; name: harvest baked apples ; ingredients: apples, quick oats, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, pecans ; preparation:Cut all ingredients together in a bowl except apples. Place apples in a glass baking dish. Stuff each of them as full as you can get them with the oatmeal mixture, sprinkling the remainder over the tops. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream. ; name: fried bread cookies ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, salt, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Cut crusts off of the bread and cut into 1 inch wide strips. Beat egg. Add egg to milk, salt, and sugar. Dip the bread strips into batter. Roll in chopped nuts. Deep fry until brown or bake in oven 15 minutes. ; name: apple butter ain t b s recipe ; ingredients: apples, dark brown sugar, molasses, apple juice, cinnamon, allspice, clove, nutmeg ; preparation:Wash your apples and quarter them, place in the stock pot. Add the remaining ingredients in the stock pot and cook at very low temperature until apples start to juice. Once there is plenty of liquid turn heat up to medium high. Cook until mixture starts to thicken. Take apples off the stove and cool to room temperature. Run apples through a food mill. Poor apples back into a suitable size pot for the apple butter. Cook down until very thick. Sometimes i use a crock pot to finish off the apple butter to the very thick stage to keep from burning it. Once apple mixture has thicken, place in large container and refrigerate or this will make about 9 8-ounce canning jars. ; name: simple apple crisp ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon juice, butter, sugar, flour ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350. Placed sliced apples in buttered 8x8 pan. Add spices, lemon juice and water. In separate bowl, mix butter, sugar and flour until crumbly. Sprinkle on top of apples. Bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown and apples are tender. ; name: fruit crisp ; ingredients: apples, granulated sugar, rolled oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, butter, coconut, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place fruit in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: fried apples and bread slices ; ingredients: margarine, apples, brown sugar, white bread ; preparation:

name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: old fashioned chocolate pudding ; ingredients: white sugar, cornstarch, cocoa, milk, margarine, vanilla ; preparation:In a sauce pan combine sugar, cornstarch and cocoa. Slowly add milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat and continue. Stirring until thick. Remove from heat and add margarine and vanilla. ; name: french vanilla bread pudding for 2 ; ingredients: cinnamon-raisin bread, egg, non-dairy coffee creamer, caramels, pecans, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the bread cubes in two greased 6-oz. Custard cups. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and creamer. Pour over the bread. Sprinkle with the caramel pieces, nuts, and cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly before serving. ; name: french pudding ; ingredients: vanilla wafers, margarine, powdered sugar, eggs, crushed pineapple, whipping cream, granulated sugar, pecans ; preparation:Line a 9x13-inch glass dish with vanilla wafers. Melt margarine in a saucepan. Add powdered sugar. Beat eggs into margarine mixture gradually. Pour over wafers. Spread pineapple over sauce. Whip cream and sweeten with granulated sugar to taste. Spread over pineapple layer. Sprinkle with pecans. Chill for several hours. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: tee s corn pudding ; ingredients: sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, whipping cream, butter, corn ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients. Whisk together eggs, whipping cream and butter. Gradually add sugar mixture, whisking until smooth. Stir in corn. Pour mixture into a lightly greased 13 x 9 baking dish. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes or more until deep golden and set. Let pudding stand 5 minutes. ; name: virginia s cinnamon sauce bread pudding ice cream crepes etc ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:

name: grilled brie sandwiches with greens and garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh spinach, brie cheese, whole wheat bread, margarine ; preparation:In a large skillet cook garlic in hot oil for 30 seconds. Add spinach. Cook over medium heat, tossing till spinach begins to wilt. Remove from heat and set aside. Divide the cheese among 4 slices of the bread. Top with spinach-garlic mixture. Cover with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet cook half of the sandwiches over medium-low heat for 5 to 7 minutes or till golden brown. Turn sandwich and cook for 2 minutes more or till golden brown and cheese melts. Transfer to a warm oven. Repeat with remaining sandwiches. ; name: brie appetizer to travel ; ingredients: brie round, caramel apple dip, mixed dried fruit, cashews, crackers ; preparation:Cut off top rind of brie. Center cheese on a plate. Cover with caramel apple dip. Sprinkle with dried fruit, then the cashews. Surround with crackers and serve. ; name: country brunch skillet ; ingredients: bacon, hash browns, green pepper, onion, salt, pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon. Crumble and set aside. Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper to drippings. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are browned and tender, about 15 minutes. Make six wells in the potato mixture. Break one egg into each well. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes or until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and bacon. ; name: baby brie crab appetizers ; ingredients: brie cheese, crabmeat, mayonnaise, diced pimento, shallot, phyllo dough, fresh chives ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Trim rind from outside edge of cheese. Cut crosswise into 6 strips. Trim rind from each strip. To form 30 pieces, cut the 4 longest strips each into 6 cubes. Cut the 2 shortest strips each into 3 cubes. In small bowl, combine crab meat, mayonnaise, pimiento and shallot. Arrange tartlet shells on large cookie sheet. Spoon crab mixture evenly into tartlet shells, about 1 teaspoons each. Top with cheese cube. Bake 5 minutes or until cheese is soft and melted. Sprinkle with chives. ; name: baked brie with caramelized pecans ; ingredients: brie cheese, sour cream, brown sugar, pecans, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Dot top with butter. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers. ; name: warm brie berry dip ; ingredients: sourdough bread rounds, brie cheese, brown sugar, pecans, pine nuts, blueberries, raspberries ; preparation:Slice the top off a round loaf of sourdough bread. Save the top, but hollow out the inside of the loaf. Discard insides or use for breadcrumbs later. Combine brie, sugar, nuts and berries. Place into the hollowed-out loaf and cover with bread top for a lid. Wrap in foil and bake for 40 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve warm with a tray of sliced baguettes. Bread lid can be cut into pieces and also used for dipping. ; name: brie and easy ; ingredients: brie round, green onion, walnuts, raisins ; preparation:Remove rind from top of cheese. Place cheese on a foil lined baking sheet. Top with onions, nuts, and raisins. Bake at 350 degrees for 12 minutes or until cheese softens. Serve warm with crackers or sliced granny smith apples. ; name: brie pancake ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, brie cheese, salt, butter, chives, cayenne pepper ; preparation:

name: baked pork chops with potatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, chicken bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, flour, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring 2 cups water to a boil. Add bouillon cubes and bay leaf. Remove from heat and set aside to allow to cool. Layer potatoes in casserole dish. Layer onion slices on top of potatoes. Place pork chops on top of onions. Remove bay leaf from broth then whisk flour in chicken broth. Pour over pork chops and potatoes. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover dish with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350f oven for one hour and thirty minutes. ; name: pork chops etc ; ingredients: butter, pork chops, potato, cream-style corn, salt, pepper, garlic ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine. If desired add garlic. Brown pork chops on both sides arrange in bottom of a casserole dish. Put drained potatoes in skillet and stir to coat in pork chop drippings. Layer potatoes over pork chops season to taste. Pour creamed corn evenly over potatoes. Cover and bake at 350f for 30-90 minutes. Serve with applesauce. ; name: pork chops with mushroom sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, garlic cloves, mushroom, chili flakes, sherry wine, cream, parsley ; preparation:Trim chops and score the fat rind. Dry-fry the chops in a very hot pan, or use a little oil if the chops are too lean. Keep warm. In the same pan fry the onion or leeks, garlic and chili, adding a little oil or butter, until soft but not brown. Add the mushrooms and stirfry a few minutes. Add the sherry and cream and cook until sauce thickens slightly. Stir the chopped herbs through, and pour the sauce over the chops. ; name: pork chop sauerkraut bake ; ingredients: pork chops, cream of mushroom soup, sauerkraut, fresh ground black pepper, dumplings ; preparation:Pan fry chops until light brown. Grease 13x9-inch pan and place chops within pan. Using milk, make soup according to directions. Pour over chops. Drain sauerkraut. Place 2 tbsp of sauerkraut on top of each chop. Grind pepper over top of all. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes covered with foil. If choosing to top with dumplings, remove foil after the 30 minutes and then cook as long as required for the dumplings. ; name: dutch pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, salt, pepper, sweet onion, sauerkraut, tomato soup, olive oil ; preparation:Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper. Heal olive oil in frying pan until hot. Add pork chops and brown on one side. Flip chops and add onion. When browned on second side, and onion is translucent, add saurkraut and tomato soup. Turn down heat and simmer for about 20 minutes, turning chops over in sauce every so often. Serve with mashed potatoes or rice. Tastes even better when served the next day. ; name: church supper chops ; ingredients: pork chops, cream of mushroom soup, water, milk, vegetable oil, flour, salt, pepper ; preparation:Mix the flour, salt and pepper. Dredge chops in it. Brown chops in the oil in a skillet. When browned, remove chops to a platter and drain fat. Stir soup water and milk into skillet, mixing well. Put chops back in. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 45 minutes. If gravy is too thin, stir in a teaspoon full of leftover flour and cook a bit. ; name: pork chops in mushroom gravy ; ingredients: pork chops, flour, salt and pepper, butter, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, milk, dry red wine, dried thyme ; preparation:Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Melt butter in large skillet and brown pork chops on each side. Remove chops from skillet. Saute onion, garlic and mushrooms in same skillet. Add leftover flour that was used to coat chops, then add milk, wine and thyme. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done. ; name: pork chops and potato scallop ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, water, dried dill weed, potatoes, pork chops, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, parsley ; preparation:

name: pasta shells with tuscan tuna ; ingredients: medium pasta shells, red onion, fresh basil, capers, extra virgin olive oil, lemon rind, salt, fresh ground black pepper, albacore tuna in water ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. Drain pasta in a colander over a bowl, reserving 2 tablespoons cooking liquid. Return pasta to pan. Add reserved 2 tablespoons cooking liquid, onion, and remaining ingredients. Toss well. ; name: authentic italian spaghetti sauce ; ingredients: fresh tomatoes, olive oil, fresh garlic, fresh basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:To cook sauce, heat olive oil over medium heat in a large iron skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti siracusani ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, chopped tomato, anchovy fillet, capers, olives, basil leaves, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil and add garlic. Cook gently. Add tomatoes, anchovy, capers and olives. Simmer. Stir in basil. Season. Cook pasta in boiling, salted water whilst sauce is simmering. Drain and serve. ; name: tomato and bell pepper spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, olive oil, green pepper, grape tomatoes, parmesan cheese, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: spaghetti with italian sausage spinach and diced tomatoes ; ingredients: spaghetti, sweet italian turkey sausage, diced tomatoes, baby spinach, white onion, olive oil, garlic clove, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Boil spaghetti until al dente. Prepare a large non-stick skillet on med-high heat with olive oil. Chop sausage links into bite size chunks and cook until browned in the skillet. Chop onion into large chunks and add to the skillet, mix with sausage. Add garlic, salt, and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes and spinach. Mix well until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or mix it all up. ; name: jewish spaghetti ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, yellow onions, canned tomato sauce, salt, pepper, cooked spaghetti ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat in large frying pan. Cook onions until softened. Add peppers and cook until soft. Add tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Add to spaghetti. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: spaghetti with italian tuna capers ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, anchovy fillet, crushed tomatoes, capers, tuna in olive oil, spaghetti, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: crustless crab quiche ; ingredients: onion, butter, salt, parmesan cheese, crab, feta cheese, eggs, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Saut onions in butter until caramelized. Add salt to taste. Beat eggs and milk together in small bowl. Sprinkle parmesan in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer onions, then crab, then feta cheese. Pour egg mix over top. Cook 20 minute. Let cool 8-10 minutes. If it is sticking, scrape the edges with a knife to help release. ; name: cheesy potato beef bake ; ingredients: ground beef, mushroom stems and pieces, au gratin potato mix, boiling water, milk, butter, salt, seasoning salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place ground beef in a greased 9x13 baking dish and top with mushrooms. Combine potatoes and contents of sauce mix packets, water, milk, butter, salt, seasoned salt and pepper. Pour over beef and mushrooms. Cover and bake at 400 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with cheese and bake, uncovered for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: sausage quiche ; ingredients: sausage, 9-inch deep dish pie crust, eggs, heavy cream, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet, drain well. Spoon into pie shell. Mix the eggs and cream in a bowl. Spoon over sausage. Top with cheese. Bake ar 350. For partially bake pie crust i bake it about 10 minutes to set the crust. ; name: tomato onion quiche ; ingredients: onion, tomatoes, eggs, yogurt, milk, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, sharp cheddar cheese, pastry shells ; preparation:Spread onion and tomato in a 9-inch pastry shell. Mix eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper and basil. Pour into pastry shell. Sprinkle cheese over top. Bake at 400 degrees ot 10 minutes. Then bake at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until a knife comes out clean. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: quick bacon tomato quiche ; ingredients: cooked bacon, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, cheddar cheese, green onion, plum tomato, black pepper, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Beat eggs and combine with all other ingredients. Mix well and pour into pie shell. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 minutes. Cut while warm and serve. Any leftovers may be refrigerated and microwaved at a later date. ; name: ham quiche ; ingredients: cooked ham, red bell pepper, green onion, swiss cheese, all-purpose flour, half-and-half, eggs, pie crusts ; preparation:Mix ham, bell pepper, green onion, cheese and flour. Toss all ingredients lightly. Mix half-and-half gently into eggs. Still gently. Fold ham mixture into egg mixture. Pour this mixture into unbaked pie shell. Bake 10 minutes at 425 degrees, and then lower heat to 325 degrees and bake 20 minutes more or till done. ; name: beef pot pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, beef gravy, frozen mixed vegetables, worcestershire sauce, cornstarch, sliced mushrooms, roast beef ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Prepare pie crusts as directed on package for 2 crust pie using a 9 in pan. In large saucepan combine gravy, and cornstarch. Add frozen mixxed vegetables, mushrooms, worcestershire sauce and mix well. Cook over med-high heat until bubbly. Stir in the roast beef. Pour into pie crust lined pan. Top with the second crust and flute. Cut decorations as you like but at least put several slits into top crust to allow steam to escape. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. ; name: meat and potatoes quiche a k a the man s quiche ; ingredients: frozen pie crusts, ground beef, hash brown potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, heavy cream, eggs, salt, black pepper, onion salt ; preparation:

name: banana split cake dessert ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, sugar, powdered sugar, eggs, crushed pineapple, bananas, whipped cream, nuts, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Mix 1 stick melted butter and 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Press into pan and chill 30 minutes. Combine 2 cups powdered sugar, 2 sticks room temp butter, 2 eggs. Beat 15 mins and spread in a layer on crumb shell. Spread over mixture pineapple, sliced bananas. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with crushed nuts and decorate top with maraschino cherries. ; name: dump it in rhubarb cake ; ingredients: rhubarb, strawberry gelatin, sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, whipped topping, flour ; preparation:Spread rhubarb in an 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with sugar and dry jello powder. Sprinkle dry cake mix over sugar. Pour a cup of water evenly over mixture. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 350 f for 30 minutes or so until cake is done. ; name: carrot cake cake mix ; ingredients: carrot cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, nuts, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour a bundt pan. I use bakers joy spray. Beat cake mix, water, oil, eggs and pineapple on low speed 3 minutes. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 50-55 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack. Cool at least 1 hour before frosting. ; name: cherry cupcakes ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, water, vegetable oil, cherry pie filling, vanilla frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry. ; name: pumpkin dump cake ; ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, white sugar, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, salt, spice cake mix, pecans, butter ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350 f. Grease a 9x13 baking pan. In a large bowl combine pumpkin, eggs, brown sugar, white sugar, evaporated milk and salt and spice. Stir well to combine, or beat on low to mix. Pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with cake mix and nuts over the top of that. Drizzle the melted butter over all. Bake for 50-60 minutes until edges are lightly browned. Cool and serve with whipped cream. ; name: boiled chocolate cake ; ingredients: sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, self raising flour, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes. ; name: cherry crisp ; ingredients: cherry pie filling, white cake mix, pecans, margarine ; preparation:Spread pie filling in 9x13 cake pan. Sprinkle dry cake mix on top. Spread with fork to even it out. Sprinkle nuts on top of cake mix. Pour melted margarine over all. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: chocolate cherry dump it cake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, cherry pie filling, chocolate cake mix, margarine, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: creamy chicken and chilies casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, green chilies, cooked rice ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: too easy cheesy chicken broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: broccoli and cheese flavored rice mix, boiling water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, frozen broccoli, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Add broccoli and cheese. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center. ; name: cream of chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking. ; name: crispy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken broth, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, frozen mixed vegetables, ritz crackers, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Boil your chicken in a pot of water with the chicken broth. When the chicken is done let it cool. Then debone the chicken and remove the skin. Cut chicken meat into bite size pieces. Cook the vegetables and drain liquid. In a large bowl mix chicken meat, vegetables, sour cream, can of soup, and spices. Place chicken mixture in 13x9 casserole dish. In another bowl crush ritz crackers into small pieces and spread over chicken mixture. Place dots of butter all over the crackers. Place in oven preheated at 350 for about 45 minutes or until bubbly in the middle. If crakers start to get too brown before done place a piece of tin foil over the top of chicken. ; name: cheesy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, plain flour, ground black pepper, unsalted butter, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dry white wine, dried oregano ; preparation:Beat fillets between 2 sheets of waxed paper until 5mm thick. Cut each slice of cheese in half and place 1 half on top of each fillet. Starting with short end tightly roll up fillets. Tie with kitchen string. On waxed paper, mix flour and pepper. Add chicken and toss gently. In a non-stick fry pan melt butter over medium heat. Add chicken fillets and fry turning occasionaly until golden about 3 minutes. Add chicken stock, wine and dried oregano. Increase heat and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened about 10-12 minutes. ; name: cheesy shredded chicken bites ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cream cheese, creole seasoning, chili powder, italian seasoning, kosher salt, shredded cheddar cheese, cracked black pepper, butter flavored cracker ; preparation:Place swanson white premium chunk chicken breast into a medium, microwave safe bowl. Shred. Add cream cheese, creole seasoning, chili powder, italian seasoning and kosher salt to the chicken. Stir together until blended. Place in a microwave for 2-3 minutes, stopping half way through to stir. Remove bowl from the microwave and add shredded cheddar cheese. Stir together until well blended. Place 1 tablespoon cheesy chicken mixture onto a cracker. Top with freshly cracked black pepper. Serve warm or cold. If serving cold, place in the refrigerator until ready to serve. ; name: easy southern chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of celery soup, ritz cracker, margarine ; preparation:Place cooked chicken in a baking dish. Mix sour cream and soups. Pour over chicken. Mix cracker crumbs and melted margarine. Sprinkle on top of casserole. Bake in 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: chicken and rice cheesy casserole ; ingredients: healthy request cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, vegetables, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, reduced-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: quick coconut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, coconut milk, butter, vanilla extract, unsweetened coconut, currants ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift dry ingredients into mixing bowl. Blend in egg, milk, butter, and vanilla. Mix in the grated coconut and the currants or raisins, if used. Turn out onto a floured board and knead slightly. Shape into two loaves and pat into two buttered medium loaf pans. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until a toothpick in the centre comes out clean. ; name: chocolate cherry loaf ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cherries, sugar, sour cream, eggs, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and baking soda. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the flour mixture. Fold the chopped cherries into the batter. Gradually stir in the butter. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely. ; name: easy peasy quick chocolate orange cake ; ingredients: caster sugar, margarine, flour, egg, baking powder, cocoa powder, vanilla essence, orange, juice and zest of ; preparation:Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the egg and the flour and baking powder. Add the orange rind and juice coco powder and vanilla essence. Mix well and pour into microwavable dish. Zap for five minutes in the microwave on medium. Serve with custard. ; name: carrot pineapple bread ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, canola oil, carrot, pineapple, vanilla extract, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Beat eggs, sugar and oil. Add carrots, pineapple and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Stir into carrot mixture. Pour into two greased loaf pans. Bake at 325 degrees for 60-70 minutes cool in pans remove to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: one bowl chocolate cake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, milk, self-rising flour, cocoa, bicarbonate of soda, almond meal, eggs, almond essence ; preparation:Heat butter, sugar and milk in saucepan till melted. Stir to combine and remove from heat. Sift flour, cocoa and soda together into saucepan. Stir in almond meal, eggs and essence. Pour into greased and lined 20 cm round cake tin. Bake at 180 degrees celsius for 40 - 50 minutes. Cool in tin and the turn onto rack. Ice with your favourite frosting or ganache. ; name: mini chip shortbread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, miniature chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares. ; name: easy cocoa 1 layer cake ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, water, powdered sugar ; preparation:Stir dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs, vanilla and water. Mix in dry ingredients. Mix well. Bake in preheated 350 oven in buttered and floured 9 inch cake pan for about an hour or til cake tests done with a toothpick. Cool in pan for an hour then remove to rack and sift powdered sugar over top. ; name: quick domino slice ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, cocoa, plain flour, coconut, icing sugar, boiling water ; preparation:

name: hazelnut chocolate brownies ; ingredients: hazelnuts, dark chocolate, butter, eggs, brown sugar, vanilla, plain flour, baking powder ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 160 c. Grease 16 x 16 cms pan and line with baking paper. Melt chocolate and butter together in bowl over saucepan of boiling water. Cool slightly. Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla with electric beaters till thick and pale. Stir in cooled chocolate. Sift in flour and baking powder, stir till just combined. Add hazelnuts, mix in well. Pour into prepared pan, bake for 35 - 40 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then turn onto wire rack. ; name: absolutely best brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cocoa, salt, self-rising flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm. ; name: mom s blonde brownies blondies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar well, until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla. Stir in dry ingredients. Fold in chocolate chips. Spoon into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: easiest ever blonde brownies ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, baking powder ; preparation:Mix all ingredients well. The batter will be very thick and sticky. Pop into a well-greased 8 x 8 baking pan and push it around until it is evenly distributed. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until the edges are browned and just start pulling away from the pan. Cool at least an hour but not more than 3 hours before cutting into squares. You need to cut them while the chocolate bits are still softish because if you wait until the chocolate hardens up completely, they become difficult to cut. ; name: white chocolate blondies ; ingredients: butter, white chocolate, granulated sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, milk chocolate, dark chocolate ; preparation:Grease a deep 19cm square pan and line base and sides with baking paper. Combine butter and white chocolate in a pan. Stir well over a low heat until melted. If it begins to separate, remove heat and stir until blended again. Cool 10 minutes. Meanwhile, chop the milk and dark chocolate and set aside. Stir in sugar and eggs, then flour. Mix in milk and dark chocolate chunks. Spread into the prepared pan. Bake in a moderate oven for about 30 mins or until firm to the touch. If desired, sprinkle with icing sugar or cocoa before cutting. ; name: brown sugar chews ; ingredients: egg, light brown sugar, vanilla flavoring, flour, salt, baking soda, nuts ; preparation:Beat egg. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend in dry ingredients. Add nuts. Pour into well greased 8 inch square pan. Bake in 350 degrees f oven for 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool completely before cutting. This will be slightly soft when removed from oven. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: blond brownies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, self rising flour, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsel, pecans ; preparation:

name: garlic dill rice ; ingredients: minced garlic cloves, olive oil, rice, chicken broth, dill weed, salt, onion powder ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute garlic in hot olive oil until softened. Add rice and saute for 2 minutes over high heat. Add broth and seasonings and bring back to a boil. Lower heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until done. Fluff and mix rice and allow to stand uncovered for a few minutes before serving. ; name: spiced lemon rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, mustard seeds, ground turmeric, onion, garlic cloves, chilies, long-grain white rice, fresh lemon juice, kosher salt, roasted cashews ; preparation:Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and turmeric and cook, shaking pan, until mustard seeds pop, 1-2 minutes. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews. ; name: rice with a chilean flair ; ingredients: basmati rice, water, onion, vegetable oil, english cucumber, tomatoes, cilantro leaf, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Clean rice. Cover with plenty of water and boil until done. Drain and rinse with cold water. Saute chopped yellow onion in bottom of deep pot. When soft, add rice and salt and combine. Reduce heat to low and let simmer awhile. Prepare vegetable topping and let marinate. Dish rice and top with vegetables. This dish is very good with dal curry. ; name: onion rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, chicken broth, salt, butter, yellow onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving. ; name: savory vegetable rice casserole ; ingredients: basmati rice, cauliflower, chili pepper, eggs, fresh mushrooms, onion, tomatoes, olive oil, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the rice according to the method that you prefer. Steam the cauliflower until tender. Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the mushrooms and onions and saute until soft. Add the chile pepper and tomatoes, continue sauteing until completely cooked through. Mix the rice with the sauteed vegetables. Add the eggs and mix well. Add the paprika, and the salt and pepper to taste. Pour into a greased baking dish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. ; name: savory consomme rice ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, long grain rice, beef consomme, water, salt, pepper, dried parsley, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute onion and mushroons in butter. Add rice, consomme, water, salt, pepper, parsley, and garlic powder. Pour into greased two quart pyrex dish. Cover and bake one hour at 350 degrees. ; name: rice with chayote fritanga ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chayote, onion, garlic cloves, cooked rice, tomatoes, salt, pepper, chives ; preparation:Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in 12 inch skillet until hot. Cook and stir chayote over medium heat until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon oil until onion is tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in rice, cook and stir until hot, about 8 minutes. Stir in chayote, tomato, salt and pepper. Cook and stir until tomato is hot, 3 to 5 minutes. Sprinkle with chives. ; name: low salt savoury rice ; ingredients: white rice, olive oil, margarine, chopped tomatoes, garlic clove, onion, green capsicum, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:

name: purist s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, white onion, fresh cilantro, kosher salt ; preparation:Cut onion into small dice. In a mortar and pestle or molcajete, pound onion and salt to a rough paste. Add cilantro and pound until well incorporated. Peel and seed avocados, add to mortar, and mash until mixture is a lumpy puree. Place one avocado pit in the center of the mixture and serve from the mortar or molcajete with tortilla chips. Makes about 2 cups. ; name: low fat guacamole with cottage cheese ; ingredients: avocado, low fat cottage cheese, fresh lime juice, green onion, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeo and garlic. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: runnin rebels ranch guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, red onion, fresh cilantro leaves, red bell pepper, anaheim chili, fresh lime juice, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl, using a fork or potato masher, mash the avocados until chunky. Add the onion, cilantro, bell pepper, and chile. In a small bowl, combine the lime juice and package of hidden valley original ranch salad dressing & seasoning mix. Add to the avocado mixture along with the pepper and stir gently to combine. Transfer the dip to a serving bowl and place a piece of plastic wrap directly on the surface of the guacamole, pressing to eliminate any air pockets. Serve at room temperature. This dip is best when made within 8 hours of serving, but it can be prepared up to 1 day in advance. Cover and refrigerate. Remove from the refrigerator 30 minutes before serving, but keep covered until ready to serve. ; name: easy awesome guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, salsa, sour cream, mayonnaise, onion powder, pepper, salt, garlic, lemon juice, fresh chives ; preparation:Cut avocados in half and take out the seed, scoop out meat with a spoon and place in bowl. Mash the avocado with a fork. Add the salsa, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Mix together well. Add lemon juice, mix and serve. Garnish with fresh chives. ; name: chipotle restaurant guacamole recipe ; ingredients: avocados, red onions, jalapeno, garlic cloves, lime juice, salt ; preparation:Wash avocados. Cut in half and scoop out the meat into a large bowl. Partially mash the avocados. Add onion, jalapenos, garlic and lime juice. Mash together until well blended and fairly creamy in consistency. Salt to taste. ; name: rachael ray s garlicky holy guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, jalapeno, plum tomato, yellow onion, coarse salt, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Cut avocados in half around the pit. Separate the halves. Pop out pit with spoon, then scoop flesh of avocados into a bowl. Squeeze the juice of a lemon over the avocados. Add garlic, jalapeno, tomato, onion and salt to the bowl. Mash and mix the ingredients into a chunky dip using a fork. Serve with corn tortilla chips. ; name: splendiferous guacamole with sour cream dip ; ingredients: avocados, lime juice, hot sauce, sour cream, fresh cilantro, dried cilantro, jalapeno pepper, yellow onion ; preparation:Peel and pit the avocados, then coarsely mash them in a bowl with a fork. Mix in the lime juice, blending well. Add the other ingredients and combine well. Garnish with sour cream and sprinkle a little cilantro on top. May be served at room temperature or chilled. Serve with warm tortilla chilps or veggie dippers. ; name: sizzlin southwest guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, limes, juice of, cilantro leaf, corn kernel, red bell pepper, red onion, jalapeno jack cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:

name: broccoli cheddar muffins ; ingredients: eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, corn muffin mix, frozen chopped broccoli, scallion ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, broccoli and scallions and mix at low speed for another minute. Coat a 12 cup muffin pan with cooking spray. Divide batter among muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on a rack before turning muffins out of pan. ; name: cheesy corn bites ; ingredients: cream cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, egg, frozen corn kernels, tortilla chips, chives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, mix the cream cheese, pepper jack cheese, egg & corn. Arrange the chips on a large baking sheet and place 1 tsp corn mixture in each. Bake until the filling sets, approx 20 minute. Sprinkle the corn bites with garnish, serve warm. ; name: quick taco casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook ground chuck with onion until chuck is brown. Drain off grease. Spoon into ungreased 9x13x2-inch baking dish. Stir in dry taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: cheesy potato and ham casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, black pepper, milk, water, velveeta cheese, potatoes, ham, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Melt 6 tablespoons butter and remove from heat. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk and water and cook over medium heat until thick. Add cheese and stir until melted. Combine potatoes and ham and add cheese sauce, stir gently, then place in greased casserole dish and set aside. Melt butter in a skillet. Add and brown bread crumbs. Sprinkle crumbs on top of potato casserole and bake at 350 for 30 to 45 minutes. ; name: cheesy broccoli rice casserole ; ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cream of broccoli soup, broccoli cheese soup, velveeta cheese, minute rice, butter, chicken in a biscuit crackers ; preparation:Melt the soups and velveeta in microwave until smooth. Stir in broccoli and rice. Pour miixture into a greased 13 x 9 pan or glass baking dish. Stir cracker crumbs into melted butter. Sprinkle bread crumbs over casserole. Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake 10-15 minutes longer or untilcasserole is golden brown. ; name: easy breakfast egg casserole ; ingredients: white bread, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned. ; name: easy cheesy corn bake casserole ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, eggs, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: incredible granola bars ; ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, brown sugar, sunflower oil, honey, salt, cocoa nibs, dried banana ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly,. Press into an oiled 9 inch square tray,. And bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow to cool before cutting into bars. Will keep for weeks stored in airtight container in fridge. Also freezes well. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: chocolate rice bubble bars ; ingredients: chocolate chips, walnuts, condensed milk, rice bubbles, oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Mix ingredients. Place into a lined baking tray. Bake for 5 minutes. Remove from oven and mark outline of bars. Bake for 35 minutes, or until crispy. ; name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: smudgy bars ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, vanilla extract, rice krispies, peanuts, raisins, chocolate chips ; preparation:In large saucepan over low heat, melt margarine. Add marshmallows. Stir until melted and well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Add cereal, peanuts and raisins, then chocolate chips, stirring until thoroughly coated. Using lightly-buttered spatula, press into buttered 3. 5 l pan. Cool. Cut into bars. ; name: simple no bake mountain bar cookies ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, milk, cocoa, quick-cooking oats, peanut butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients in sauce pan. Boil one minute. Remove from heat. Stir in oats. Add remaining ingredients. Drop onto wax paper and let cool. ; name: dolores chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, vegetable shortening, creamy peanut butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl, set aside. Combine shortening, peanut butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix until well blended. Blend in reserved dry ingredients, stir in coconut. Batter will be very stiff. Spread batter into a well-greased 13x9x2in baking pan. Bake at 350 degree for 25-35 minutes, or until golden brown. Cut into bars when completely cool. ; name: whole grain energy bar ; ingredients: honey, mini chocolate chip, millet, wheat germ, puffed kashi, oatmeal, natural-style peanut butter, raisins ; preparation:

name: chilled curried yellow squash soup ; ingredients: leek white, extra virgin olive oil, curry powder, turmeric, garlic clove, yellow squash, water, sour cream, chutney ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, cook leek in oil over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until softened. Add curry powder and turmeric and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add garlic, squash and water and simmer, stirring occasionally, until squash is very tender, about 15 minutes. Cool mixture slightly and in a blender puree in batches until smooth, transferring to a bowl. Season soup with salt and pepper. Chill soup, covered, at least until cold, about 6 hours, and up to 1 day. Before serving, season with salt and pepper, if necessary. Serve soup with dollops of sour cream and chutney. ; name: basil and zucchini soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, boiling water, chicken stock cubes, zucchini, fresh basil, evaporated low-fat milk ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan and lightly cook the onion and garlic untilgolden. Add the water, stock, zucchini and basil. Bring to the boil, lower heat and simmer for about 10 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Process in a food processor until smooth return to pan, add the milk. And heat do not boil. ; name: creamy curry cauliflower soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, onion, garlic cloves, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, red curry paste, vegetable broth, coconut milk, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put cauli, onion, garlic, celery, tomatoes, water and curry paste in a large pot. Bring to a boil and simmer until all ingredients are well cooked. Using an immersion blender, puree all ingredients to desired smoothness and return to heat. Lower temperature and add milk and coconut milk. Heat through and serve. ; name: easy creamy vegetable soup ; ingredients: onion, carrot, celery, water, vegetables, salt, pepper, chicken broth, half-and-half ; preparation:Simmer onion, carrot and celery in water for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. In a blender or food processor. Puree all vegetables. Add salt, pepper, chicken broth and cream. Heat before serving, but do not boil. ; name: secret ingredient curried cauliflower soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, tart apple, curry powder, garlic clove, cauliflower, vegetable broth, honey, rice wine vinegar ; preparation:Saute onions in oil in large stock pot for 5-7 minutes or until soft and golden. Add apple, curry powder and garlic and cook 2 minutes more or until curry powder turns deep yellow. Add cauliflower and vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cover, reduce heat to medium low and simmer 20 minutes. Cool 20 minutes then blend in food processor or blender until smooth. Stir in honey and vinegar. Season with salt to taste. Reheat or serve cool. ; name: curry cheese and broccoli soup ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, butter, curry powder, onion, chicken broth, potatoes, carrots, milk, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Trim the flowerets from broccoli and cut into small pieces. Discard tough ends of stems. Peel remaining stems and slice thin in a 6 to 8 quart kettle, melt butter over medium heat. Add curry powder and onion and stir for 5 minutes. Add broth, potatoes, broccoli stems and carrots. Cover and simmer until potatoes mash easily, about 30 minutes. Whirl about half the broth and vegetables in a blender or food processor until pureed. Return to kettle. Heat soup to boiling and add broccoli flowerets and milk. Simmer, uncovered, until flowerets are tender when pierced. Stir in cheese a little at a time until melted. ; name: low fat butternut squash soup ; ingredients: butternut squash, onion, low-fat chicken broth, cumin, coriander, garam masala, ground black pepper, kosher salt, low-fat plain yogurt ; preparation:Cut squash into quarters and seed. Place in a plastic bag and microwave on high for approximately 5 minutes. Remove from bag, peel and chop. Place squash, onion, broth, and spices in saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until squash is fully cooked. Remove from heat and puree with a stick blender until smooth. Reduce heat on stove to low and slowly stir in plain yoghurt. Add more spices if needed. Reheat and serve. ; name: easy low fat curried zucchini soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, curry powder, zucchini, baking potato, broth, salt ; preparation:

name: fish house panko cod fillets ; ingredients: cod, flour, egg, panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, black pepper, dried parsley, pam cooking spray ; preparation:Lay out the flour, beaten egg and panko bread crumbs on three separate plates, or shallow pans. Mix the onion, black pepper and parsley into the panko. Blend well. Dip the seasoned fish in the flour, then egg and then press the fish into the seasoned panko bread crumbs, coating the fish evenly on all sides. Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Place the fish carefully in the baking pan. Spray the top with pam or oil. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: cod with onions and chives kabeljau mit schnittlauch zwiebeln ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, onions, chives, oil, white wine, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Lightly fry onions and chives in oil and lightly salt. Salt the fish and sprinkle with lemon juice. Place the fish on the onions and pour the white wine over. Simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Serve with boiled potatoes. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: lemon cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, vegetable oil cooking spray, parsley, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish. ; name: baked fish fillets ; ingredients: leeks, fish stock, salt, pepper, dijon mustard, cod ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except fillets. Spread on bottom of casserole dish. Place fish on top and cover casserole. Bake at 400 f 10 to 15 minutes or until fish is done. Serve with leek mixture spread over fillets. ; name: mediterranean cod ; ingredients: cod, olive oil, red onion, plum tomatoes, black olives, dried thyme, dried basil ; preparation:Rinse fish, pat dry with paper towels. Season fish with salt and pepper to taste. In a large skillet heat 4 tsp of the oil over medium high heat. Add fish and onion. Cook 1 minute, turning once. Top fish with tomatoes, olives and thyme. Reduce heat. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Drizzle with remaining 4tsp oil, sprinkle with basil. Cover and cook 2-3 minutes more or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: spicy cod with tomatoes and spinach ; ingredients: cod, frozen chopped spinach, chopped tomatoes, tomatoes and green chilies, onion, shallots, garlic, tomato paste, cumin, olive oil ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium high heat. Add the onions, shallots, and garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent. Add all the tomatoes, the tomato paste, and the cumin. Stir and let it simmer 3-5 minutes or until it starts to thicken slightly. Add the spinach and stir until it is combined. Let it cook 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile chop the cod into small even pieces. Add it to the tomato sauce, stirring to make sure it is all covered with sauce. Let it simmer 5-8 minutes or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. ; name: horseradish topped cod ww ; ingredients: horseradish, lemon, garlic cloves, fennel seed, panko breadcrumbs, parsley, pepper, salt, cod fish fillets, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: sweet and sour cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: butter, green cabbage, carrots, onion, brown sugar, reduced sodium soy sauce, cider vinegar, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: carrots with raisin sauce ; ingredients: carrots, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, cider vinegar, raisins, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in salted water until tender, drain. While carrots are cooking, mix brown sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in water, vinegar and raisins. Cook over low heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat, add butter, stir until melted and pour over carrots. ; name: caramel apples carrots ; ingredients: apples, baby carrots, water, salt, margarine, brown sugar, cinnamon, dried tart cherry ; preparation:Place apples, carrots, water and salt in 3-quart saucepan. Cover and cook over medium heat until water starts to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 3-5 minutes. Drain. Add remaining ingredients, tossing gently until combined. Cook over medium heat 3 minutes longer or until sugar is dissolved and apples are glazed. ; name: glazed orange carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, orange juice concentrate, brown sugar, parsley ; preparation:Cover carrots with water, bring to boil. Simmer until crisp tender. Melt butter, stir in orange juice concentrate, parsley and sugar. Pour over carrots. Cook and stir until glaze thickens. ; name: unusual glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Place carrots in a saucepan. Add 1 inches of water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and set aside. In the same pan, combine butter, brown sugar and salad dressing mix until blended. Add carrots. Cook and stir over medium heat for 5 minutes or until glazed. ; name: kicked up carrots ; ingredients: carrots, water, raisins, butter, brown sugar, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel and thinly slice carrots. About a quarter of an inch or so. Place carrots in a sauce pan with plenty of water to cover. Cook carrots at a boil over medium high heat till they are tender. About a minute before removing the carrots from stove add your raisins to the water to allow them to hydrate. Remove the pan from stove when the carrots are done and drain the water, returning carrots and raisins to the pan afterward. Drop the heat to low and return the pan to the stove adding the butter to the pan. Once the butter is melted add the brown sugar and cyanne pepper gently mixing in the flavors. Finally add the salt and pepper to your own personal preference. ; name: carrots for a change ; ingredients: carrots, bacon, onion, brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Boil carrots until barely tender. Fry bacon until crisp, then drain and crumble. Brown onion in part of the bacon grease after draining off some juice. In a buttered baking dish, combine carrots, bacon, onion, salt and pepper. Sprinkle brown sugar over top and pour melted butter all over. Bake carrots covered until thoroughly heated. ; name: sweet carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, water, brown sugar, butter, white wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:

name: stir fry mushrooms and bell peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, green onions, garlic cloves, bell peppers, champignon mushrooms, chinese rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oil til really hot. Stir fry onions, then garlic. Then add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft,. Add the wine and soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes. When done, remove from heat and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve. ; name: wild mushroom and bean salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, green beans, bacon, white wine vinegar, mustard, parsley ; preparation:Boil the beans until tender and drain when done. Cut the bacon into small cubes and fry in a shallow pan until golden. Add the vinegar and let it bubble for a few seconds. Season with salt, pepper, the mustard and parsley. Mix the beans and mushrooms together and serve. ; name: roasted mushroom medley ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, fresh parsley, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar. ; name: glazed rosemary honey mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, rosemary, garlic clove, honey, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, button mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat onven to 325 degrees. In a heavy bottom pan place oil through salt and pepper heat and whisk to blend and melt honey. Add mushrooms and toss to coat. Bake for 30-40 minutes stirring a couple times. Serve with a sprig of rosemary. ; name: mushrooms with sour cream ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, all-purpose flour, sour cream, salt, pepper, dill weed ; preparation:Cook and stir mushrooms in butter for 3 minutes. Stir in flour. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Heat, stirring occasionally, just until hot. Sprinkle with dill weed. ; name: marinated garlicky mushrooms ; ingredients: garlic cloves, button mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, tomatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, bay leaf, white wine, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Slice garlic thinly. Cut tomatoes in wedges. Trim mushrooms. Discard stems of shiitake mushrooms. Cut in bite size pieces. Sprinkle the button mushrooms with lemon juice to prevent darkening. Place oil, garlic slices and bay leaf in skillet. Heat until aroma is released. Add all mushrooms and stir fry over high heat. Swirl in white wine and season with salt and pepper. Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour. Garnish with tomato wedges and parsley. ; name: mushroom and shredded chicken salad ; ingredients: olive oil, button mushrooms, mushrooms, chicken, mixed salad greens, lime juice, soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat one tablespoon of oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and cook over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened. Toss the mushrooms in a large bowl with the shredded chicken. Combine all the lime and soy dressing ingredients in a small jug or bowl, mix well and pour two-thirds of the dressing over the warm mushrooms. Arrange the salad leaves in a serving dish and toss through the remaining dressing. Top with the chicken and mushrooms and serve warm. ; name: marvelous mushrooms ; ingredients: button mushrooms, olive oil, water, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: peanut butter and banana oat cookies ; ingredients: bananas, peanut butter, rolled oats, oat flour, raisins, butter, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Let sit for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 350. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment lined or lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes until lightly golden. ; name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: peanut butter marshmallow fluff coconut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, creamy peanut butter, all-purpose flour, baking soda, marshmallow cream, coconut flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda. Stir in to the peanut butter mixture. Then fold in the marshmallow fluff in just until combined. When you drop the cookies by the rounded spoonfuls or use a cookie scooper into the ungreased cookie sheet first put a pinch of coconut flakes on bottom on cookie sheet then place dough on top of coconut then after all your cookies have been drop place a nice hefty pinch of coconut flakes on top of cookie dough then press with fork as you would with regular peanut butter cookies to impress a criss cross with fork. Bake for 15 minutes. ; name: amazing double peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, dark brown sugar, sugar, crunchy peanut butter, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, flour, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Line baking sheets with parchment or a silpat. Cream butter, sugars, peanut butter, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add eggs one at a time. Stir in the flour until incorporated. Stir in peanut butter chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto prepared sheets. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until set. And brown around the edges. Remove from oven and cool on pan 5 minutes. Remove from pan to finish cooling. ; name: no bake peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: sugar, milk, peanut butter, butter, vanilla, quick oats ; preparation:Combine sugar, butter and milk. Bring to a boil. Boil for one minute. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and peanut butter. Then stir in oats. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Allow to cool. ; name: peanut butter n banana cookies sugar free ; ingredients: peanut butter, fat-free margarine, banana, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:

name: barbara s hot salsa ; ingredients: lime, juice of, tomatoes, onions, jalapeno peppers, hot peppers, sugar, cumin, coriander, kosher salt ; preparation:Sprinkle salt in bottom of crock. Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, sugar, spices, and lime juice. Daily, sprinkle just a little salt into crock and stir. On the 4th or 5th day, pack into hot sterile pint jars. Process in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: herb roasted mediterranean vegetables ; ingredients: vegetables, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, dried rosemary leaves, salt, sugar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Toss vegetables with oil, garlic, rosemary, salt and sugar. Place in 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Add a little water. Bake at 375 degrees f for 20 minutes. Stir and cover with aluminum foil. Bake another 20 minutes or until tender. Drain of any extra liquid before storing. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: citrus salsa ; ingredients: grapefruit, orange, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onions, cilantro, sugar, salt ; preparation:Peel, section and chop the grapefruit and orange. Place in a medium bowl. Seed and dice the tomato, green pepper and jalapeno. Add to the fruit. Dice the red onion and cilantro. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Drain juice before serving. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork. ; name: mediterranean vegetables ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, red onion, zucchini, crookneck yellow squash, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray large baking sheet with nonstick spray. Toss onion and next 5 ingredients together on prepared baking sheet. Spread in single layer. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake vegetables until tender and brown around edges, stirring occasionally, about 35 minutes. Makes 4 servings. ; name: tunisian potato olive salad ; ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, sugar, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, garlic cloves, oil-cured black olives, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Place the potatoes in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the potatoes into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature. ; name: stuffed and barbecued tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, herbs, fresh parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Have grill preheated to medium. Cut tomatoes in half crosswise. Remove and discard seeds. In a bowl combine the herbs, cheese, garlic, oil, and pepper medley. Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Grill the tomatoes until tender and the cheese is starting to melt, 8- 10 minutes. Remove from bbq using a flat spatula. Enjoy. ; name: chicken and broccoli couscous with salsa ; ingredients: fresh tomato, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, sugar, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli florets, water, couscous ; preparation:In small bowl, stir salsa ingredients together. Season to taste with salt & pepper, set aside. Bring water to a boil and stir in oil, couscous & seasoning packet from box. Cover, remove from heat & let stand while you prepare the chicken. In large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add chicken & cook 3-5 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring frequently. Add the broccoli & cook while stirring 3 minutes or until broccoli is crisp tender. Fluff couscous with fork & stir into chicken & broccoli. To serve, portion couscous on plates & top with salsa. ; name: lebanese tomato salsa banadurah harrah ; ingredients: tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper, dried mint ; preparation:

name: pecan delight pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, vanilla, granulated sugar, brown sugar, soda crackers, pecan pieces ; preparation:Beat egg whites to foam. Add salt and cream of tartar. Beat to stiff peaks. Add vanilla extract and both sugars. Beat until consistency of 7 minute frosting. Fold in crackers and nuts. Grease bottom and sides of pyrex dish and add mixture to dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. Top with cool whip or whipped cream when pie is completely cool, or slice and add topping on individual slices when serving. ; name: chunky pecan pie bars ; ingredients: flour, butter, brown sugar, eggs, corn syrup, sugar, vanilla, semisweet chocolate chunks, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: two layer pecan pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, egg, pecan pieces, eggs, light corn syrup, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Beat bottom layer ingredients together until smooth. Pour into an unbaked pie shell. Mix top layer ingredients and pour gently over the cream cheese mixture. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top. ; name: caramel pecan cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, unbaked pastry shells, pecans, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: pecan truffles ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate chips, pecans, pie crust ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients together. Unroll pie crust and cut into small rounds. Place in bottom of mini muffin pan. Put 1 teaspoons pecan and sugar mixture on each. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: ny times pecan pie ; ingredients: pie shell, dark corn syrup, sugar, salt, eggs, margarine, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375, parbake pie shell until golden. In a saucepan, bring the corn syrup, sugar and salt to a boil over high heat until the sugar dissolves. Very slowly, pour in a thin stream into the beaten eggs while stirring vigorously. Add the vanilla, margarine and pecans to the mixture and pour into prepared pie shell. Bake for 50 minutes or until puffed. ; name: peanut pecan pie ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter morsels, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir well. Stir in pecans and all the chocolate and peanut butter morsels. Pour filling into graham cracker crust. Bake at 325f for 1 hour or until set. Cool on rack. ; name: kahlua chocolate pecan pie ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, kahlua, pecan pieces, flour, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, deep dish pie shell ; preparation:

name: cinnamon chip applesauce cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, applesauce, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon baking chips, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce.
